Title: Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About UsSunbit builds financial technology for real life. Our technology eases the stress of paying for life’s expenses by giving people more options on how and when they pay. Founded in 2016, Sunbit offers a next-generation, no-fee credit card that can be managed through a powerful mobile app, as well as a point-of-sale payment option available at more than 16,000 service locations, including auto dealership service centers, optical practices, dentist offices, veterinary clinics, and specialty healthcare services. Sunbit was included on the 2022 Inc. 5000 list. The financial technology company has also been named as a Most Loved Workplace®, Best Point of Sale Company, and as a Top Fintech Startup by CB Insights. We use cutting-edge innovations in financial technology to bring leading data and features that allow individuals to be qualified instantly, making purchases at the point-of-sale fast, fair and easy for consumers from all walks of life. We create value focused on our core values; we work tirelessly to ensure that Sunbit becomes available to everyone, everywhere.We invite you to #UnleashYourCuriosity and join our ever-growing R&D organization.Check out the open positions & feel free to reach out with any questions!What You’ll Do: Own and manage BI initiatives and become a focal point for business data matters - You should be the Go-To person in these matters.Understanding business requirements, analyzing big data, and creating useful and plan solutions to address data needs.Partner with product and business professionals to establish data-driven policies and strategies across the organizationDevelop, design, and maintain Tableau reports and dashboards, and analytics with utmost accuracyCollect, refine, and prepare data for analytics and visualizationRequirements:At least 5 years of analytical experience Experience in SQLExperience in Tableau/Power BI/QlikView Hands-on experience with a programming language (python or similar)Knowledge of data architecture, data modeling, data analysis & data visualizationEnterprise-level experience in data presentation Experience in MySQL, ETL platformsExperience with Product/marketing analysis - AdvantageExperience with AWS platforms - AdvantageExperience with financial domains - AdvantageExperience with Spark - Advantage

Title: Head of Learning and Quality
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Mixtiles is a home design startup, we want the whole world to have homes they love.Today, home design is kind of boring! All companies make the same products, with slightly different styles and prices. Not us! We bring tech, design and engineering to the challenge 🤓We started with the world's best way to put photos on walls. Simple yet powerful software, and frames that stick to walls. Now millions of people have homes full of beautiful memories, and we've become one of the largest photo companies in the world.Today we also deal with art and houseplants, all of which are growing at a rapid pace!We're looking for a Head of Learning and Quality to lead the Customer Services' training, knowledge, communication, and quality team to ensure we maintain the highest level of support and give our org the infrastructure to do so. You will own the quality of our customer service, overlook, measure, and improve our Learning and Development, onboarding, up-training, and knowledge management tools and procedures. Title: Legal Counsel
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!What you’ll do:WSC Sports’ Legal Team deals with the fascinating intersection between law, sports and technology. The team supports the company in all of its day-to-day activities and is involved in a wide variety of complex projects with our clients, vendors and business partners. The position of legal counsel requires attention to details, experience working on various types of commercial agreements and an in-depth understanding of intellectual property, alongside a “close the deal” attitude.As legal counsel, you will have an integral part of building WSC Sports’ newly formed legal team. You will lead various initiatives and establish the connection between the legal team and the various stakeholders across the company, with which you will collaborate with - many teams within the company, ranging from Product, Business Development, R&D, Account Management, Operations, Finance and more, and provide legal advice and recommendations on a wide variety of legal issues, negotiate commercial and other agreements, and create and maintain business processes and internal policies to support the company’s growthRequirements:What you’ll need:5+ years of experience (post internship) in commercial law as an associate in a hi-tech department of a top law firm and/or in-house legal work with a global SaaS company. Qualified lawyer and member of the Israel Bar Association (an additional certification in another jurisdiction is a plus).Strong communication and negotiation skills and ability to connect with, and gain the respect of, cross-functional stakeholders.A collaborative approach and the interest in working in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.The ability to lead tasks independently with high integrity and professionalism, while demonstrating a strong sense of ownership and eagerness to learn.Strong project management skills and an ability to prioritize multiple cross-departments tasks and deadlines.Fluent in English (written and spoken)Experience with handling personal data protection is an advantage.
Requirements: ['5+ years of experience (post internship) in commercial law as an associate in a hi-tech department of a top law firm and/or in-house legal work with a global SaaS company.', 'Qualified lawyer and member of the Israel Bar Association (an additional certification in another jurisdiction is a plus).', 'Strong communication and negotiation skills and ability to connect with, and gain the respect of, cross-functional stakeholders.', 'A collaborative approach and the interest in working in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.', 'The ability to lead tasks independently with high integrity and professionalism, while demonstrating a strong sense of ownership and eagerness to learn.', 'Strong project management skills and an ability to prioritize multiple cross-departments tasks and deadlines.', 'Fluent in English (written and spoken)', 'Experience with handling personal data protection is an advantage.']

Title: Product Manager

Text: We are Papaya Gaming, a Tel Aviv-based mobile games startup with one of the fastest growth rates in the market since 2019 and millions of players worldwide.We are looking for a brilliant and passionate product owner to join our top-notch product department.Requirements:At least 2 years of experience as a product manager/owner in mobile products - a must.Experience as product manager/owner in the gaming industry - advantage. Project management skills - organized, self-sufficient & self-motivated, goal-oriented.A great communicator who can clearly convey messages in written and oral form (in English).A problem solver - highly inventive thinker that will provide insightful, innovative solutions to any problem.Strong passion for games and the gaming industry.Responsibilities:Own mobile product features from end to end.Work on features for several mobile games in parallel.Collect and analyze requirements, write clear and detailed PRDs, UI/XU & flow, wireframes, define AB test and user stories, prioritize backlog and handle development.Analyze the success of the feature once it is released to production, responsible for the usage data and patterns, and run tests to optimize & improve performance and business results.Work with all relevant cross-functional teams (R&D, Designers, BI/BA, etc.) to guarantee smooth, efficient implementation.

Title: Head of Learning and Quality

Text: Mixtiles is a home design startup, we want the whole world to have homes they love.Today, home design is kind of boring! All companies make the same products, with slightly different styles and prices. Not us! We bring tech, design and engineering to the challenge 🤓We started with the world's best way to put photos on walls. Simple yet powerful software, and frames that stick to walls. Now millions of people have homes full of beautiful memories, and we've become one of the largest photo companies in the world.Today we also deal with art and houseplants, all of which are growing at a rapid pace!We're looking for a Head of Learning and Quality to lead the Customer Services' training, knowledge, communication, and quality team to ensure we maintain the highest level of support and give our org the infrastructure to do so. Title: Head of Experts Brand
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: With over 30 million users and counting, we’re here to change the future of business. Our all-in-one platform makes starting a business affordable and accessible to everyone, and we welcome more than 800k new business owners every month. From our products to our careers, there are endless opportunities for growth.Our team | Our core | Our dream fulfillersWhen we started Tailor Brands, we wanted to help people to accelerate their growth and fulfill their dreams. This also defines us internally; we put our focus on maximizing individual impact and creating an environment of absolute transparency.About our “Experts” business unit:Our Experts unit is the “human envelope” around Tailor’s core product, providing human-assisted guidance to our users on top of our otherwise self-serve platform. We see this unit as an extension of our overall product vision - to help anyone become independent by starting their business successfully.Since 2022, this team has grown by 1,300%, and we’re expecting it to triple itself in 2023.This business unit is responsible for several key aspects:End-to-end ownership over the personal interaction between Tailor Brands and our customers Providing assistance to customers through phone, chat and email, in order to guide them throughout the platform, resolve issues, and address both emotional and functional needsProactively reaching out to customers to offer complementary services that will help them build their businessInfusing support-success-sales into one organization, while providing a seamless experience to customers across the platformWorking alongside the product team to validate and test future solutions and productsAbout The RoleThis role is for the person who can translate their creativity into strategic action. You intuitively understand people the same way you understand how to move things forward, which you’ll use to steer and grow an entire E2E unit - being responsible for all KPIs and full P&L. You will lead a large team internationally, operating and growing the business opportunity alongside the Marketing and Product departments. This will include:Establishing and measuring goals and objectives for team performanceManaging day-to-day operations - making sure that the business unit has adequate staff, equipment, facilities, and other resources to accomplish its goals, across 2-3 international sitesTroubleshooting and solving problems as they ariseMonitoring the progress of ongoing projects to ensure that they are on schedule and within budgetFollowing and implementing new product trends and suggesting new ways to scaleMaintaining relationships with vendors and suppliersCreating and implementing processes and policies to support the overall businessHire, manage (and fire when necessary)Requirements:Past experience in managing P&L unitsVast managerial experience, preferably from a B2C or SMB-oriented companyStrong analytical skills and knowledge of SaaS metrics and KPIsWillingness to travel and work US hours as neededResource integrator; i.e. creating extra value from existing resourcesAbility to plan, prioritize and build hands-on solutions to support business growthProven ability to manage multiple complex operational projects and different stakeholdersA motivator that can inspire large teamsA people-person with excellent communication skills
Requirements: ['End-to-end ownership over the personal interaction between Tailor Brands and our customers', 'Providing assistance to customers through phone, chat and email, in order to guide them throughout the platform, resolve issues, and address both emotional and functional needs', 'Proactively reaching out to customers to offer complementary services that will help them build their business', 'Infusing support-success-sales into one organization, while providing a seamless experience to customers across the platform', 'Working alongside the product team to validate and test future solutions and products', 'Establishing and measuring goals and objectives for team performance', 'Managing day-to-day operations - making sure that the business unit has adequate staff, equipment, facilities, and other resources to accomplish its goals, across 2-3 international sites', 'Troubleshooting and solving problems as they arise', 'Monitoring the progress of ongoing projects to ensure that they are on schedule and within budget', 'Following and implementing new product trends and suggesting new ways to scale', 'Maintaining relationships with vendors and suppliers', 'Creating and implementing processes and policies to support the overall business', 'Hire, manage (and fire when necessary)', 'Past experience in managing P&L units', 'Vast managerial experience, preferably from a B2C or SMB-oriented company', 'Strong analytical skills and knowledge of SaaS metrics and KPIs', 'Willingness to travel and work US hours as needed', 'Resource integrator; i.e. creating extra value from existing resources', 'Ability to plan, prioritize and build hands-on solutions to support business growth', 'Proven ability to manage multiple complex operational projects and different stakeholders', 'A motivator that can inspire large teams', 'A people-person with excellent communication skills']

Title: Senior Data Analyst (Operations)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Mixtiles is on a mission to create homes people love. We started by creating the easiest way to get photos out of your smartphone and onto your walls. Mixtiles is one of the biggest B2C startups in Israel, selling hundreds of millions of dollars a year, manufactures and delivers over a million framed photos every month to happy customers in over a hundred countries. If you ask the average American about us, they would probably know us. You should too.Our Operation team manages 6 factories around the world, with hundreds of workers and millions of shipments every month. Our culture of operational excellence has been one of the key drivers to the company's growth and profitability. The problem is that today, our operation grew so much it's become really data-intensive, and although we're not bad at it, we think it deserves a lot of focus from the best people out there, and for that, we need someone really great to join us and to help us rock the world, do amazing work and have lots of fun in the process.What type of person are we looking for?A business person who has good business intuitions, great "product sense" and critical thinking around operationsSharp analytical skillsGreat at communicating results of the analysis in simple business languageAt least 2 year as a Product/ Business/ Data analystProficient in Excel/Google SheetsGreat SQL - a big advantageExpert at Data Visualization - a big advantageDegree in Exact Science, Economy, Industrial Eng. or equivalent from a top universityWhat kind of person are you?You're driven, transparent, and always strive for excellence. You love working closely in a team and are great at communicating. You're an owner - whenever you do something, you do it 100%. You're someone who has what it needs to grow into other managing roles in Business/Operations in the future, and we will be happy to support such growth.In addition to being highly analytical, you have great common sense, you're detail-oriented, and you're a problem solver. You're great at taking complicated domains and modeling them in a simple way, making the right decisions pop up almost effortlessly.
Requirements: ['A business person who has good business intuitions, great "product sense" and critical thinking around operations', 'Sharp analytical skills', 'Great at communicating results of the analysis in simple business language', 'At least 2 year as a Product/ Business/ Data analyst', 'Proficient in Excel/Google Sheets', 'Great SQL - a big advantage', 'Expert at Data Visualization - a big advantage', 'Degree in Exact Science, Economy, Industrial Eng. or equivalent from a top university']

Title: Marketing Communication & PR Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: In a nutshell:We’re looking for a communication & PR specialist who loves a good story and is excited about creating a buzz!Requirements:An experienced marketer with 2+ years of experience in a Marketing Communication \ PR role at a global SaaS company OR at a global PR agency in the tech space. A phenomenal storyteller who can convert technical capabilities and commercial updates into compelling stories that people identify with. Native English speaker and writer, familiar with the North American market. Fluent in Hebrew - a plus. Familiar with the SMB market, Martech, Fintech - a big advantage. A critical thinker with a good eye for detail and the ability to set & meet high standards of execution. Strong interpersonal and communication skills Curious, ambitious, and ready to share vcita’s unique story with the world. Full Description:As a Marketing Communication & PR specialist at vcita, you will become one of our brand’s key storytellers and narrative masters. You will craft, pitch, and oversee the distribution of vcita’s communication across many channels, in line with vcita’s strategy & industry trends.Responsibilities:Manage vcita’s media relations, and work closely with our PR agency to increase vcita’s brand presence and reach.Craft messaging and identify angles to strengthen vcita’s position as a market leader. Identify opportunities to amplify vcita’s story to SMBs, potential partners, potential employees, and investors. Monitor vcita’s reputation on review websites, update the content regularly and respond to reviews. Produce case studies & success stories that showcase vcita’s value to users and partners. Write and edit press releases and other forms of communication in English. Collaborate with with brand, product marketing, partners and product teams to create and push compelling company stories and angles
Requirements: ['An experienced marketer with 2+ years of experience in a Marketing Communication \\ PR role at a global SaaS company OR at a global PR agency in the tech space.', 'A phenomenal storyteller who can convert technical capabilities and commercial updates into compelling stories that people identify with.', 'Native English speaker and writer, familiar with the North American market. Fluent in Hebrew - a plus.', 'Familiar with the SMB market, Martech, Fintech - a big advantage.', 'A critical thinker with a good eye for detail and the ability to set & meet high standards of execution.', 'Strong interpersonal and communication skills', 'Curious, ambitious, and ready to share vcita’s unique story with the world.', 'Manage vcita’s media relations, and work closely with our PR agency to increase vcita’s brand presence and reach.', 'Craft messaging and identify angles to strengthen vcita’s position as a market leader. Title: מנהל/ת תחום יועצים

Text: לניהול, הובלת והרחבת תחום מיקור חוץ בחברת Comm-IT דרוש/ה מנהל/ת תחום נמרץ/ת הבא/ה מעולם הניהול, גיוס ומכירות (ניהול תיקי לקוחות).התפקיד כולל:בניית והרחבת התחום בהיבטי מכירות/גיוס/שימור/שיפור תהליכים ועוד.זיהוי הזדמנויות והגדלת מאגר הלקוחות החדשים.הרחבת פעילות אצל הלקוחות הקיימים תוך חיזוק ושימור הקשר.מתאים למועמדים מנוסים שמגיעים מעולמות הגיוס וניהול תיקי לקוחות לתחום ה OS, המעוניינים להתקדם בציר העסקי/ניהולי.Requirements:ניסיון בעולם הגיוס הטכנולוגי/ניהול גיוס טכנולוגי לתחום OS - חובהניסיון בעבודה מול חברות היי טק, חברות Enterprise , תעשיה בטחונית, חברות סטארט אפ - חובהיכולת ניהול מו"מ וחוש עסקי מפותח – חובהניסיון בעולם מכירות OS – - חובהתואר אקדמאי רלוונטי - חובהנכונות לנסיעות ללקוחות בכל הארץ

Title: Head of Content
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Tarci is a well-funded startup revolutionizing the SMB data market. Much like the Tarsier, who served as an inspiration for our name, aim to give our clients the superpower to see in the dark when others can’t. For us, this is our unique special superhero power.Our team of superheroes is a mix of industry veterans and experienced professionals in data, AI, product, marketing, and sales working together to solve challenges and give our partners and customers that superpower of seeing SMBs clearly and in their entiretyWe are looking for a passionate, creative, and resourceful content manager who will initiate and hands-on create content that will demonstrate our unique value to the market and develop our brand voice and narrative to increase demand and brand positioning.The ideal candidate has hands-on experience writing compelling content for the SMB segment for various digital assets and media channels.The content manager will join our growing marketing team and report to the CMO.What you’ll do: Understand our ICP and develop our brand narrative and tone of voice through content creation Develop a differentiating content plan to build trust and increase interest and demand for Tarci across all stages of the acquisition funnel and execute it Create engaging content for our digital assets and media channels in various formats (website, social media, blogs, infographics, webinars, and more) Monitor market trends, spot opportunities, and act upon them to create compelling content Collaborate with our data analysts to develop and create content based on unique insights that drive engagement and increase demand Create content hands-on and in collaboration with independent writersRequired Skills and Qualifications: For this role, we are looking for a storyteller that has a passion for creating a brand experience through content Enjoys creating engaging copy, short and long-form content Experienced in various media channels and understand how to make content a part of our acquisition funnel A minimum of 3 years of experience in content creation for a SaaS B2B Company – A Must! Native English level, written and spoken – A Must!A few more things to know:In 2 years, Tarci data and services have already been adopted by enterprises including Fortune200, fintech unicorns, financial services, and insurance companies.This is a great opportunity for the right individual to be a part of a high-caliber team in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment.We love coaching and training and look for people who will be long-term partners on the amazing Tarci journey.
Requirements: ['Understand our ICP and develop our brand narrative and tone of voice through content creation', 'Develop a differentiating content plan to build trust and increase interest and demand for Tarci across all stages of the acquisition funnel and execute it', 'Create engaging content for our digital assets and media channels in various formats (website, social media, blogs, infographics, webinars, and more)', 'Monitor market trends, spot opportunities, and act upon them to create compelling content', 'Collaborate with our data analysts to develop and create content based on unique insights that drive engagement and increase demand', 'Create content hands-on and in collaboration with independent writers', 'For this role, we are looking for a storyteller that has a passion for creating a brand experience through content', 'Enjoys creating engaging copy, short and long-form content', 'Experienced in various media channels and understand how to make content a part of our acquisition funnel', 'A minimum of 3 years of experience in content creation for a SaaS B2B Company – A Must!', 'Native English level, written and spoken – A Must!']

Title: IT Support
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who We AreLightico digitally completes end-to-end customer journeys at lightning speed. We empower businesses to complete entire customer-facing processes in real time by streamlining, digitizing and automating interactions. With Lightico, businesses can instantly collect customer documents, eSignatures, eForms, payments, consent to disclosures, confirm orders and verify ID, even while they have customers on their mobile phone. By simplifying these processes, businesses complete sales cycles faster and service their customers effortlessly, earning customer’s trust and loyalty, translating to higher profits. The company is headquartered in Tel Aviv.What Will You DoSupport IT purchasing and maintenance.Respond to requests for technical assistance in person, via phone, email and ticket systemAssisting with network administration tasks.Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues.Install and troubleshoot end user equipment, software and hardware systems.Provide guidance, assistance, coordination and follow-up on co-workers questions and problems.Setup of production and development IT systems.Supporting internal security systems and tools (VPN, FW and EDR systems).Follow standard IT procedures, logging all IT interactions and administering helpdesk software.Identify situations requiring urgent attention.Requirements:At least 1 year of experience as a Help Desk/IT Support.Knowledge and experience supporting FW (Fortigate).Good understanding with IT backend environment (Single Sign-On, Azure AD, Intune, G-Suite).Familiarity with hardware components (desktops, laptops and servers).Experience handling IT tasks on MacOS and Windows OWell-experienced in supporting end-user desktop applications such as internet browsers, antivirus, VPN clients, MFA tokens etc.Knowledge of networking components and infrastructure (Lan/Wan, TCP/IP, DHCP, DNS).Solid knowledge of information security principles and practices.Knowledge of PowerShell scriptingFluent Hebrew and high EnglishWhy People Love Working at Lightico﻿Office in a great location in Tel AvivHybrid workCompany Stocks OptionsMeal card & Fully stocked kitchen with drinks, goodies and snacksFrequent company and team-building eventsLots of company swag!Bringing the Best Out of Everyone!We celebrate diversity and know that our people are the key to our success. We create an innovative environment with smart, creative people and we welcome a diverse team where people with different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives can bring strong value to Lightico. Anyone who joins us is encouraged to bring their best self, share their ideas and grow with the company!#ITsupport #LighticoHiring #Lighticons
Requirements: ['Support IT purchasing and maintenance.', 'Respond to requests for technical assistance in person, via phone, email and ticket system', 'Assisting with network administration tasks.', 'Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues.', 'Install and troubleshoot end user equipment, software and hardware systems.', 'Provide guidance, assistance, coordination and follow-up on co-workers questions and problems.', 'Setup of production and development IT systems.', 'Supporting internal security systems and tools (VPN, FW and EDR systems).', 'Follow standard IT procedures, logging all IT interactions and administering helpdesk software.', 'Identify situations requiring urgent attention.', 'At least 1 year of experience as a Help Desk/IT Support.', 'Knowledge and experience supporting FW (Fortigate).', 'Good understanding with IT backend environment (Single Sign-On, Azure AD, Intune, G-Suite).', 'Familiarity with hardware components (desktops, laptops and servers).', 'Experience handling IT tasks on MacOS and Windows O', 'Well-experienced in supporting end-user desktop applications such as internet browsers, antivirus, VPN clients, MFA tokens etc.', 'Knowledge of networking components and infrastructure (Lan/Wan, TCP/IP, DHCP, DNS).', 'Solid knowledge of information security principles and practices.', 'Knowledge of PowerShell scripting', 'Fluent Hebrew and high English', '\ufeffOffice in a great location in Tel Aviv', 'Hybrid work', 'Company Stocks Options', 'Meal card & Fully stocked kitchen with drinks, goodies and snacks', 'Frequent company and team-building events', 'Lots of company swag!']

Title: Visual Designer
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!We are looking for a Visual Designer to join our design team.As a Visual Designer at WSC Sports, you will work on company-wide projects to apply brand guidelines as well as contribute to expanding our visual language. You will create video content, graphics, and animation for a variety of digital platforms.What you’ll do:Create and execute concepts, artwork, animation, and video content which may include:Typography, image-making, and layout work for promotional and marketing contentEvent branding and materials for both live and digital eventsContent design (posters, GIFs, etc.)MerchandiseIllustrations, animated or static compositions for campaigns (social media posts, email marketing, etc.Requirements:What you’ll need:3+ years of design experience, an advantage to being familiar with the startup environmentB.Des degree or an equivalent Proficient at After Effect and basic video editingIn-depth understanding of typography, iconography, color, space, being able to create a compelling and consistent visual experience.The ability to partner with other creative team members and key stakeholders to create content used across a variety of platforms (web, mobile, video, and more). For this purpose must be proficient at creating storyboards and have storytelling skillsStrong understanding of design systems. Why should you apply:You will join a small close-knit team- https://www.behance.net/WSCSportsYou’ll get to work at the company with cutting edge technology- https://www.geektime.co.il/wsc-sports-raised-23m/You could be a part of our great company culture, that puts people first- https://www.instagram.com/wsc_sports/?hl=en
Requirements: ['Typography, image-making, and layout work for promotional and marketing content', 'Event branding and materials for both live and digital events', 'Content design (posters, GIFs, etc.)', 'Merchandise', 'Illustrations, animated or static compositions for campaigns (social media posts, email marketing, etc.', '3+ years of design experience, an advantage to being familiar with the startup environment', 'B.Des degree or an equivalent', 'Proficient at After Effect and basic video editing', 'In-depth understanding of typography, iconography, color, space, being able to create a compelling and consistent visual experience.', 'The ability to partner with other creative team members and key stakeholders to create content used across a variety of platforms (web, mobile, video, and more). Title: VP International Marketing & Sales
Location: Holon, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We’re looking for a professional with robust marketing experience, who will be the lead for our international business growth & development.To be successful in this role, you should be passionate about marketing, have experience working globally, background in defense industry and technology oriented.Responsibilities:Lead Bagira’s international marketing strategy and implementation to optimize and meet our business goalsMaximize the potential of new and existing marketing channels to ensure business growthBuild relationships and partnerships with varied organizations, and agencies to strengthen Bagira’s brand and expand our market opportunitiesPartner with the Product department as well as other business leaders to ensure comprehensive and collaborative marketing effortsLead the planning and implementation of marketing communication initiatives targeted at customers and external stakeholdersWork in close collaboration with Bagira Leadership teamPlanning, implementing and monitoring of Bagira’s marketing activities and campaigns including: websites, social media, events and conventionsSupport the business developments efforts by providing informatics and research analytics Provide regular updates and share reporting on activities progress and impactRequirements:Significant experience in international marketing management or product marketing roles in leading Defense Industry companies (B2G)Knowledge of simulation technology, products and trendsAbility to quickly grasp the challenges and opportunities of managing marketing in defense industry environment Proven experience in leading, implementing and monitoring effective marketing strategies that align with the company’s business goals, revenue growth, maximizing ROI and business potential and managing a team of at least 4 direct reports. Own the ability to form and lead an international marketing teamSelf-starter attitude combined with strong collaboration skillsA self-motivated team player and ability to work in fast-paced environments with minimal oversight and strong execution skillsNative English Speaker/ Mother-tongue Level, both verbal and written – mandatory. Spanish – an advantage. Ability to travel globally frequently (once or twice a month), working in tight schedules and intensive environment.Military background – Lt. Col up to Brig. Gen (advanced in Res. duty) – understanding End User experience and operational needs.Your Mission:Lead our international business growth & development. The role will combine leadership with hands-on. You will create, shape, and be responsible for our international marketing aspects including business. Form our international marketing unit and lead the development, product marketing, PR, branding and communications.Your mission is to build and maintain a strong and consistent brand, entering new markets through managing strong connections across all our marketing channels.Your Profile:You should be demonstrating our company value - mart, loyal, excellent communication, highly accountable, strong executer and detail-oriented.Friendly, sophisticated, multinational and cross cultural person.Passionate for marketing, defense industry and for winning!What you will gain:Making a strong impact on Bagira's international expansion, development and growth.

Title: Bookkeeper
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Requirements:Type 1+2 bookkeeper certification (type 3 is an advantage) At least 10 years of experience in an international high-tech company Experience in Netsuite ERP system – an advantageAdvanced skills in ExcelHigh-level English (both spoken and written)Ability to meet deadlinesHighly organized and reliable with high attention to detailsExperience in working for a global High-Tech companies - a MustExperience in startup environmentAbility to work independently in collaboration with other team membersAbout Bionic:Bionic is a high-growth startup that raised over $85 million in funding with the world’s most prestigious VCs, and was named the 2021 Cool DevSecOps Vendor by Gartner.Bionic is the first Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) platform that proactively reduces security, data privacy, and operational risk through continual analysis of the entire application architecture throughout production. Unlike cloud security posture offerings, Bionic provides deep visibility into the application layer to help organizations manage the risk of their services, APIs, dependencies, and data flows in production.Responsibilities:Record AP invoices and manage payments cycleGenerate invoices to customers and be part of the billing process and AR cycle Perform reconciliations for banks, Credit cards, AP, AR and I/C (including other payment methods such as Mesh)Monitor and record fixed assetsReport to the Tax authorities (VAT, ITA, etc) Prepare Inter-company invoices and transactions Manage accruals on a monthly basisManage travel and expense reimbursements Participate as a key member of Monthly and Annual financial closing

Title: Motion Graphic Designer

Text: A little about us:Our mission at Karma is simple (but ambitious!): to create the best online shopping experience. Our mobile app and desktop extension helps over 4 million people to get what they want—by making shopping a magical experience for all.We’re team players, focused on winning together and building a company that will revolutionize the online shopping industry.We are currently in hyper-growth mode and looking for a full-time Motion Graphic Designer to join our *kickass* marketing team in our Tel-Aviv HQ.A little about you:If you’re looking for career growth, new challenges, and incredible coworkers - you’ve come to the right place. Title: Executive Assistance
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are seeking a highly motivated, detail oriented, seasoned Executive Assistant to support Zynga’s global Publishing Leadership team. You are highly organized, a self-starter and possess a proactive & professional attitude. Possessing the drive to do what it takes to get the job done will make you an outstanding team member to the Zynga family. The Executive Assistant must be creative and enjoy working within a fast-paced environment. The ideal individual will have the ability to exercise good judgment in a diversity of situations, with strong written and verbal communication, administrative, and organizational skills, and the ability to maintain a realistic balance among multiple priorities.ResponsibilitiesPerform a wide variety of difficult, time sensitive and confidential work requiring a high degree of initiative, responsibility, accuracy, diplomacy, and tactManage and maintain executives’ schedules, appointments and travel arrangements. Title: Junior Data Scientist
Location: Ra'anana, Center District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a junior data scientist to join our Data Science group.The ideal candidate is a true data science enthusiast who can take full responsibility and lead a project from idea to production.Responsibilities Be a part of the data science team and work on projects such as real-time predictions, data handling, market manipulation, etc. Work closely with other teams, developers, and business owners. Write production models and code. Research and innovation in new content and technological domains. Solve business problems and integrate solutions into production.Requirements: 1+ year as a data scientist. MSc degree in a quantitative discipline. Excellent hands-on SQL skills. Strong proficiency in R or Python. Experience with writing production code and model deployment. Knowledge and experience with Machine Learning algorithms, best practices, project life cycle, etc. Solid knowledge in statistics. Willingness to own a project from research to deployment. Experience in FinTech, Algo Trading – a big advantage.

Title: Junior Project Manager

Title: Procurement Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Does negotiating the best contract the company has ever seen excite you? Interested in providing all aspects of procurement-related services for the Product, People Experience, IT, and Marketing teams sound interesting to you? If this sounds like you, join Atera’s mighty Finance Department as our new Procurement Manager!Located in the heart of sunny Tel Aviv after raising $102 million in 2021, we develop an automated and easy-to-use platform for IT professionals, designed to proactively identify and solve IT issues before they become a problem for their organization. We’re growing quickly and now have over 10,000 customers across more than 105 countries!As Procurement Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing hands on the company’s overall supply chain and logistics both daily and strategically, in order to maximize process efficiency and productivity. In addition, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining good relationships with vendors and distributors.what you'll do:Work closely with the different departments in the execution of engagements for their ongoing activities, enabling them to achieve their goals as planned and on time, while ensuring alignment with Atera’s policy and optimizing ROI.Lead negotiations and contracts, collaborating with the relevant stakeholders (Legal, IT, Finance, etc.) to optimize terms, cost, and deliverables, ensuring the quality of service/ goods, mitigating risks, and that Atera’s policies and procedures are followed and met.Manage vendor relations, and conduct periodic business reviews for continued improvement of the quality of deliverables/ services.Conduct market research and sourcing for the right vendors and/or solutions for business needs.Conduct periodic data analysis to identify trends as well as opportunities to optimize value.Perform risk assessments and ensure the ongoing feasibility of existing contracts.Train internal stakeholders on procurement policies, processes, and systems.Approve purchase orders, and oversee and confirm receipt of goods and services.Control the procurement budget and promote a culture of long-term savings on procurement costs.Requirements:Requirements:5+ years of experience as a senior buyer/ procurement manager in the tech industry (Software company).Strong negotiating skills, capable of managing complex engagements and work with Senior Management.Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English — must, Hebrew an advantage.Previous experience working with ERP systems — must, specific experience with NetSuite an advantage.Experience with procurement for marketing and sales activities — an advantage.Highly organized and detail-oriented.A desire to learn and grow with the team, and the ability to adapt as our needs and mission evolve.Some Of Our BenefitsAtera is highly collaborative and yes, fun! To support you at work (and play) we offer some fantastic perks: ample time to learn from your teammates and contemporaries, time off to relax and recharge, community volunteer days, an annual budget to support your learning & growth, a company paid trip and lots more.More About AteraSmall and medium IT operators are the heroes behind the scenes supporting companies around the world. They care a lot for their clients (external or internal) and often work virtually 24/7. However, small and medium IT service providers have always been underserved.Atera was built for exactly that. With the vision to simplify and streamline the work of Managed Service Providers and IT professionals. To create something that saves them time, energy, and money. To free them from needing to constantly put out fires.That vision created the remote-first IT management software – enabling IT professionals to shift from reactive task takers to proactive problem solvers.Now operating from our beautiful offices on Rothchild in Tel Aviv, Atera is currently used by thousands and thousands of IT professionals all over the world (105+ countries).As we rapidly grow, our goal remains the same: to transform the IT industry with revolutionary technology, while creating one of the happiest and healthiest work environments in the world.
Requirements: ['Work closely with the different departments in the execution of engagements for their ongoing activities, enabling them to achieve their goals as planned and on time, while ensuring alignment with Atera’s policy and optimizing ROI.', 'Lead negotiations and contracts, collaborating with the relevant stakeholders (Legal, IT, Finance, etc.) to optimize terms, cost, and deliverables, ensuring the quality of service/ goods, mitigating risks, and that Atera’s policies and procedures are followed and met.', 'Manage vendor relations, and conduct periodic business reviews for continued improvement of the quality of deliverables/ services.', 'Conduct market research and sourcing for the right vendors and/or solutions for business needs.', 'Conduct periodic data analysis to identify trends as well as opportunities to optimize value.', 'Perform risk assessments and ensure the ongoing feasibility of existing contracts.', 'Train internal stakeholders on procurement policies, processes, and systems.', 'Approve purchase orders, and oversee and confirm receipt of goods and services.', 'Control the procurement budget and promote a culture of long-term savings on procurement costs.', '5+ years of experience as a senior buyer/ procurement manager in the tech industry (Software company).', 'Strong negotiating skills, capable of managing complex engagements and work with Senior Management.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English — must, Hebrew an advantage.', 'Previous experience working with ERP systems — must, specific experience with NetSuite an advantage.', 'Experience with procurement for marketing and sales activities — an advantage.', 'Highly organized and detail-oriented.', 'A desire to learn and grow with the team, and the ability to adapt as our needs and mission evolve.']

Title: מנהל.ת מחלקת תוכן דיגיטלי ומסחרי
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: תיאור המשרה:לחטיבה המסחרית של קשת דרוש.ה מנהל.ת מחלקת תוכן דיגיטלי מסחרי﻿ליחידת הקראייטיב והתוכן של החטיבה המסחרית של קשת דרוש.ה מנהל.ת מחלקת תוכן דיגיטל - מסחרי.ניהול ופיתוח תוכן מסחרי במגוון המוצרים והפלטפורמות הדיגיטליות של קשתניהול ממשקי החטיבה המסחרית מול מערכות התוכן של mako, N12, tech12ניהול תהליכי פיתוח תוכן וקריאייטיב ללקוחות החטיבה המסחרית במגוון רחב של תחומים – בריאות, לייף סטייל, צרכנות, טכנולוגיה, פארמה, פעילות חברתית וכדומהRequirements:דרישות התפקיד:הכרה והבנה של עולם הדיגיטל – פלטפורמות, ממשקים, כלי פרסום, מוצרים, חדשנויותהיכרות עם עולמות התוכן השיווקי – פיצוח בריפים, בניית מהלכי תוכן שיווקי, אופטימיזציה של תכנים, בקיאות בקידום אורגני וכלי קידום ממומןניסיון בעבודה מול לקוחות, ניהול שיתופי פעולה מסחריים, הכנת והצגת פרזנטציות של מהלכי פרסום
Requirements: ['ניהול ופיתוח תוכן מסחרי במגוון המוצרים והפלטפורמות הדיגיטליות של קשת', 'ניהול ממשקי החטיבה המסחרית מול מערכות התוכן של mako, N12, tech12', 'ניהול תהליכי פיתוח תוכן וקריאייטיב ללקוחות החטיבה המסחרית במגוון רחב של תחומים – בריאות, לייף סטייל, צרכנות, טכנולוגיה, פארמה, פעילות חברתית וכדומה', 'הכרה והבנה של עולם הדיגיטל – פלטפורמות, ממשקים, כלי פרסום, מוצרים, חדשנויות', 'היכרות עם עולמות התוכן השיווקי – פיצוח בריפים, בניית מהלכי תוכן שיווקי, אופטימיזציה של תכנים, בקיאות בקידום אורגני וכלי קידום ממומן', 'ניסיון בעבודה מול לקוחות, ניהול שיתופי פעולה מסחריים, הכנת והצגת פרזנטציות של מהלכי פרסום']

Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The Cymbio team is a group of innovators and leaders on a mission to seamlessly and efficiently connect, scale, and automate the full cycle of digital retail operations - for every brand. We believe in building a transparent and dynamic world, and we highly invest in our people, customers, and product. We have a flexible work model, connecting people from multiple locations, including the US and Israel. We’re rapidly growing and always looking for talented people to be part of the Cymbio team to help shape our business and culture. Join us on this journey in building the future of connected commerce!We are looking for incredible Customer Success Managers. You will be the key point of contact for brands. This role takes ownership of the relationship once the brand becomes a client and works closely with the Operations Teams to ensure the continued growth of the brand.Requirements:2-4 years of experience in Customer Success for SaaS companies Sales/Retail experienceKnowledge in the US &/or EU retail & brand market Analytical and data drivenProblem solver who works well in a fast-paced environmentAbility to prioritize workload and meet tight deadlinesStrong interpersonal and communication skills in English - written and verbal (native speaker level)Passion for innovative solutions and process improvementA team player with a can-do attitudeResponsibilities:Develop strong relationships with brands and act as a trusted advisor to each clientAnalyze and identify opportunities within existing businesses and for new business opportunitiesBe the go-to resource for any questions regarding our platform and services and provide training as neededAddress and resolve any issues in a timely fashion both directly with clients and with internal teamsWork internally to provide feedback on our platform and service offering based on client feedback

Title: Financial Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who we are:We’re Vesttoo.We connect the insurance industry and the capital markets by combining proprietary AI-powered technology with expertise in data science, insurance and finance so that insurers have the capacity they need and investors have opportunities to diversify with confidence.Our digital insurance risk transfer platform, the Vesttoo Marketplace, is where insurers and global investors connect. It is the source of deal flow for many of our investment products, providing transparent, data-driven analytics to all participants.Beyond all that, we are a dynamic, fast growing and an exciting start-up, in a diverse and friendly atmosphere, where both our employees and our business are in the center.What you'll do: Partnering with the department heads to assist with creating project budgets, maintaining cost control, recognizing potential deviations, and finding ways to increase cost efficiencyAssist with creating and implementing financial analysis methodologies using new information systems Creating rolling and periodic forecasts and providing reporting materials to ManagementParticipating in building and maintaining the company budget and ongoing tracking of actual performancePerform Ad-Hoc analysis to support the Company’s financial strategyRequirements:Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Economics, or Finance or equivalent experience2-4 years experience as a financial analystExcellent oral and written communication skills, both in English and HebrewAdvanced Excel skills

Title: Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Convizit’s advanced AI technologies are revolutionizing how user behavior data is collected, structured and analyzed.Convizit’s data analysis team is responsible for analyzing and improving the quality of the digital experience data generated by our AI-based visitor activity tracker. As a Data Analyst, you will work closely with an awesome group of engineers, data scientists and product managers. The complexity and richness of our platform requires advanced analytical skills, a solid business perspective and excellent customer relationship skills – in order to ensure that we are delivering exactly what our customers need.What You’ll DoWork closely with other analysts, data scientists and software engineers to understand, evaluate and improve the data flows within the system.Analyze collected behavior data to validate accuracy, completeness and relevance.Tag data to train self-learning AI models and support various customer needs.Establish success metrics and KPIs that reflect our customers’ needs.Understand customer business use cases and needs, and suggest new and innovative ways to leverage Convizit’s unique data to create value for them.Requirements:What You HaveB.Sc. in Information Systems Engineering, Industrial Engineering or similar, specializing in Data Analysis, Data Science, or similar expertise, with an excellent academic recordPrevious experience in a data analysis role, performing data validation or data analysis – a significant advantageProficiency in data querying (SQL) using relational databases, data lakes and/or data warehousesProgramming experience in scripting languages (such as Python) and experience with data analysis frameworks (such as pandas)Excellent presentation skills, including the ability to summarize and present findings in a clear and concise mannerFluency in English, with excellent written and verbal communication skillsExperience working with product and marketing analytics tools, such as Google Analytics 360, Adobe Analytics, Kissmetrics, Mixpanel, Amplitude or Heap – an advantageExperience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Google Data Studio, PowerBI, Qlik or SiSense – an advantageWho You Are﻿Responsible, accountable and dedicatedProactive with a can-do attitudePerceptive and curious, with a sharp eye for detailA clear thinker with excellent communication skillsA great teammate who loves to collaborate with coworkers and customersA person with strong organizational skills and a business mindsetA person who adapts quickly to changes and thrives in a fast-paced environment

Title: Executive Assistant Focus
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About The RoleMitrelli is a global company that initiates large-scale turnkey projects in developing countries, mainly in Africa.Our offices in Israel are in Herzliya Pituach provides services and logistic solutions to the group.Here, you will have the chance to build a career that is highly visible and varied, providing a comprehensive and confidential high level administrative role in supporting Mitrelli’s mission and vision, worldwide.The position purpose is to provide day to day support, allowing the managers to fully focus on the business aspects of the job, while the operational and administrative follow up of the ongoing projects is covered in a professional and thorough manner.This role requires the ability to juggle multiple requests and meet tight deadlines.Integrity and discretion in handling confidential information as well as professionalism in dealing with senior executives is crucial.This is your opportunity to join an international team of professionals.You will encounter a friendly atmosphere with a high performing mentalityRequirements:Your Key Responsibilities:The Assistant will be part of a team which reports to the group’s management;Provide administrative back-office support, including diary management;Responsible for preparing and reviewing reports, preparing presentations, etc; Connection between internal and external interfaces in the group, in Israel and worldwide; Concentrating and following up commercial and business development issues; Conducting surveys, business intelligence and finding data, people, connections, networking, among other tasks; Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Nayax is looking for a Customer Success Manager who will drive retention and growth among our most valuable customers and distributors by understanding their business needs and helping them succeed. As a Customer Success Manager, you will be responsible for assisting and consulting Nayax’s customers about our new or existing products and will make sure that all our customer’s needs are being addressed.We are looking for candidates who can build a solid relationship with a genuine passion for the success of their customers, as well as a proactive problem solver with impressive communication and presentation skills.The Customer Success Manager at Nayax will be part of the Customer Success team, and will report to the Customer Success Director.IN THIS POSITION YOU WILL:Build a solid and genuine relationship with Nayax’s customers and distributors.Ensure customers receive the best value from the product or customer support team to increase sales volume to existing customers.Serve as the trusted focal point of contact for Nayax distributors and large customersIncrease the retention and growth of Nayax’s most valuable customersWork with the customer to map goals and requirements and assist in building the customer's strategy.Plan initiated interactions with the customer and be responsible for providing a suitable technological solution to improve our customer existing systems and handling continued sales and contract renewals.Ensure that our customers are familiar with Nayax future products and servicesCollaborate with the Sales, R&D, Product Manager, Operations and Technical support teams for making sure our customers request is taken care of.Occasional travel for customer events, training, and/or meetings may be required.Requirements:WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WITH:Bachelor’s degree in technical fields or BA in Business with emphasis in technical aspects3-5 years of experience in Customer facing or Project Management roles with technical knowledgeNear-native English speaker Business background from sales or account management in global companiesStrong technical skills with the ability and desire to guide and assist customers through technical processesExperience in delivering customer-focused solutions based on customer needs in a global company.Excellent verbal and written communications skills.Driven, self-motivated, enthusiastic and with a bias for action.ADVANTAGES:Knowledge in Networking Protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, SSL)Knowledge in CRM, Salesforce or BI toolsOrientation for Customer Success role (Upselling, Customer Growth based in KPIs, Churn and Retention Rates)Other European languagesWho we are:Nayax is a global Fin-tech company and is the leading provider for cashless payment solutions for devices such as vending machines, self-check-out stations, electric vehicle chargers and more.Nayax develops both hardware and software products, telemetry, remote management, BI solutions, and mobile apps. Nayax devices can be found all over the world, with branches in 9 countries, and 40 distributing partners. Our devices serve consumers in 55 countries and accept 26 currencies.Our HQ is in the new Herzliya Hills neighborhood. We invite you to check out our incredible offices by clicking here.Join us in our fast paced, cutting edge environment. We love friendly, creative, and fun people.Nayax is constantly growing and we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic, innovative and eager individuals to join us in our growth!

Title: Customer Support Representative, TLV
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DescriptionFiverr is looking for a dynamic, high-performing team player who thrives in fast-paced environments to join our Tel-Aviv Customer Support team. If you are an experienced Customer Support Professional who enjoys communicating, helping others and providing long-term solutions to your customers, then this is the role for you. Our Support team quickly adapts to customer needs to deliver a human and consultative support experience through creative problem-solving and a thorough knowledge of how Fiverr works.Our work model is hybrid, combining remote and on-site work. This allows us to get things done when and where we are most productive.WHAT AM I GOING TO DO?Provide independent and high-quality responses to our customers via email ticketing system and chatProvide reliable resolution of critical and high impact problems for customersTake ownership of customer issues and follow problems through to resolutionWork closely with our team leads and shift managers to ensure customer satisfaction.Contribute ideas and practical solutions to ensure customers’ satisfaction. Recognize trends and service impacting events and escalate properlyLearn from others and develop yourself as a customer support pro!RequirementsAt least 1 year of customer support/service experience, ideally for a technology product with international clients Native-level English Speaker - advanced proficiency in written and spoken EnglishExceptional communication and interpersonal skills, a real team-playerService-oriented personality with a can-do attitude Strong problem-solving/troubleshooting skillsStrong ability to operate multiple applications and platformsCommitment to excellence: willing to accept constructive feedback, and drive toward continuous improvementDetail-oriented, capable of handling multiple responsibilities at onceAt Fiverr, we’re not about checklists. If you don’t meet 100% of the requirements for this role but still feel passionately about the position and think it’ll make your life more fulfilling, we want to hear from you.EQUAL OPPORTUNITIESAt Fiverr, we prioritize diversity. We celebrate difference and embed it into every aspect of our workplace and product, as well as our community. Fiverr is proud and committed to providing equal opportunity employment to all individuals regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, citizenship, national origin, disability, Veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. In addition, Fiverr will provide accommodation to individuals with disabilities or a special need.

Title: Bookkeeper
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Work at a fast-growing baby care brand that’s been featured on Business Insider, the Ellen Show, CNN, and on the cover of TIME magazine. Nanobébé products are sold at retailers globally and Nationwide, including Target, Amazon, Walmart, Buybuy Baby/Bed Bath & Beyond, and Meijer.Seeking a full-time Bookkeeper who will report directly to the Senior Bookkeeper and the CFO. The applicant will have a minimum of 3-5 years of bookkeeping experience in the retail consumer goods industry or at an established company. This is a hybrid position.Responsibilities: Work with teams in various areas to accurately collect and enter monthly sales information Calculate commission reports -monthly Ensure all payments, invoices, and supporting documentation are archived electronically Maintain ongoing sales tax filings for all states as needed, monthly, quarterly, annually Collect receipts for entry from departments/subsidiaries as needed Track spending Maintain sub-contractor documentation Enter orders for independent customers foreign and domestic Prepare monthly A/P closing and reconcile A/P sub-ledgers Assist with all accounting-related functions Produce other various miscellaneous reports, duties, and special projects as needed Support the various departments within the company as needed Ensure compliance with all internal processesRequirements: Skilled with Quickbooks and Priority software for daily invoice processing Intermediate to advanced Excel skills Possess strong organizational skills with the ability to meet communicated schedules and deadlines Strong communication skills; both written and verbal Ability to successfully handle bank and shipping reconciliations as well as handling AP/AR Ability to multitask and handle fast pace environment Ability to maintain good working relationships with vendors Ability to learn and adapt to new software Must work well independently and as a team player Possess values of honesty, integrity, and teamwork

Title: General Submission
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Years of devastating wildfires make it clear that the pace and scale of vegetation management needs to be dramatically increased. It is our mission to mitigate fire severity, protect ecosystems and human communities, and reduce the massive air pollution generated by out of control wildfires.Earth Force is a unique early-stage startup, bringing together people, partners, and new tools to solve problems at the scale of the environmental challenges humanity faces. Together, we are building unique products involving a mix of cutting-edge technologies, hardware, and software to enable efficient mitigation of wildfires effects at scale. If you're ready to focus your work on the climate crisis, this is the time to join us!If you haven't found an open role that's a good fit for you skills and interest but would like to be considered for future role with Earth Force - please submit your resume here.

Title: Marketing Project Manager
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Papaya Global is an established B2B tech unicorn in hypergrowth. We are on a mission to reimagine the payroll category with a game-changing, disruptive technology. Papaya Global is reinventing workforce management, global payroll and payroll payments to remove the friction of complexity and regulation create. Our automated platform helps companies hire, onboard, manage, and pay people in more than 160 countries. We don’t just cover the globe with our solution; we are global. We are comprised of people from different countries, different cultures, and different backgrounds. Diversity is our secret weapon.Papaya Global’s Marketing Team is on the lookout for a Marketing Project Manager. As the Marketing team’s inaugural Project Manager, you will be glue that helps keep projects — and people — together. You will be responsible for planning, organizing, scheduling, managing and executing projects from beginning to end. The project scope can vary from single pieces of collateral to multifaceted, multichannel marketing campaigns. You will be part of the journey of all marketing projects, from inception to final delivery, ensuring that all assignments reach optimal state for approvals.You will bring marketing assignments to life through collaboration with multiple internal teams and external vendors, from copy and design and through to external web and graphic partners. You’ll create and implement deadlines, assess capacity, project goals and workflows to ensure smooth production process with on-time delivery.The variety of projects will bring new challenges, and as project manager, you’ll be able to assess how much time is required to achieve each task successfully. You’ll nurture each assignment to ensure briefs are thoughtful and that the work meets various stakeholder approvals. As an advocate for the brand, you’ll recognize when tasks hit the mark and know how to garner the best work from a myriad of designers and content writers.You’ll bring your previous experience in marketing and see it as an exciting space for brands to reach their potential and beyond. You have a passion for nurturing the creative spirit, refining the right tools to enhance the creative process, and helping to bring to life brand moments to the market.What you will do:Have a big picture view of all marketing goals and objectives across a large marketing team (27 and growing)Bring all marketing missions to life, from briefing to final productionEnable writers and designers to achieve project production efficiently and effectivelyTroubleshoot creative and execution blockersManage timelines, production process and competing prioritiesHave a solid understanding of how competing priorities can impact the businessDemonstrate agility managing requests from multiple stakeholders, within and external to the marketing teamDevelop a solid understanding of the brand to ensure all studio assignments effectively meet the communications and brand goalsIdentify creative ways to overcome creative blockers and challengesRequirements:High level of English proficiency4+ years of project/studio management, preferably for marketing teams within scaling organizationsA mastery of timelines, details, and helping multiple teams manage and pace their workloadStrong understanding of creative design, copy and the creative process to help deliver a wide range of creative tasks, including online, animation, offline, and moreA creative problem solverA team player who works well in a fast and dynamic environment
Requirements: ['Have a big picture view of all marketing goals and objectives across a large marketing team (27 and growing)', 'Bring all marketing missions to life, from briefing to final production', 'Enable writers and designers to achieve project production efficiently and effectively', 'Troubleshoot creative and execution blockers', 'Manage timelines, production process and competing priorities', 'Have a solid understanding of how competing priorities can impact the business', 'Demonstrate agility managing requests from multiple stakeholders, within and external to the marketing team', 'Develop a solid understanding of the brand to ensure all studio assignments effectively meet the communications and brand goals', 'Identify creative ways to overcome creative blockers and challenges', 'High level of English proficiency', '4+ years of project/studio management, preferably for marketing teams within scaling organizations', 'A mastery of timelines, details, and helping multiple teams manage and pace their workload', 'Strong understanding of creative design, copy and the creative process to help deliver a wide range of creative tasks, including online, animation, offline, and more', 'A creative problem solver', 'A team player who works well in a fast and dynamic environment']

Title: Design Director
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Imagine your dream office... Now, try again.Mindspace is a rapidly growing global provider of inspiring workspaces for teams of all sizes. Our community consists of enterprise companies and established startups, as well as small businesses, entrepreneurs, and creative freelancers. With members in more than 30 locations across 7 countries (plus another ~10 locations under development), we are setting the gold standard for flexible workspaces around the world.Who is the Design Director?This full-time position is based in Tel Aviv. The Director of Design will lead and manage the entire interior design of our global spaces. The director of Design will play a key role in Mindspace’s growth.What You Will Be Responsible For, Mainly.Managing the global Design team to create overall interior design concepts and FF&E and lighting selection and overseeing the design presentations for new MINDSPACE locations.Working closely with the Real Estate team to prepare and develop layouts for potential new properties.Working with the global Projects team to oversee bid and construction documents, drawings, and details during execution stage and ensuring these are aligned with the MINDSPACE standard.Managing communication with external vendors (e.g. architects, suppliers) Requirements:Experience & Minimum Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or Architecture10+ years of experience as an interior designer3+ years of management experience1-2 years of field-relevant experience, experience in office planning – an advantageGlobal experience - an advantageProficiency in Revit, AutoCAD, Sketchup, Adobe Suite, and MS OfficeHigh level of English – a must﻿Critical Competencies for Success:Multitasking is a must! You must be able to balance multiple projects at the same time and adhere to strict deadlines (strong time management skills are a key).Strong decision maker: you need to be able to make considered, responsible decisions on a whim, when things don’t go according to plan.A problem solver – you are a highly resourceful thinker who is quick on their feet and a fast learner.A keen eye for aesthetics and demonstrated ability to deliver high-quality design.Highly motivated and passionate with the ability to think outside of the box.Excited about MINDSPACE; you are ready to live, eat and breathe MINDSPACE.Spread the love to everyone you encounter.Portfolio must be submitted for consideration.Please submit your application in English.

Title: Frontend Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Sightfull is a rapidly growing Revenue Analytics startup backed by top-tier VCs. Our platform helps SaaS companies quickly drive revenue growth by leveraging the full power of their real-time business data.This is a rare opportunity to join a startup on the ground floor. You will join a small but powerful R&D team that is ambitious and dynamic. We take pride in creating a hugely impactful product that is being built at the highest level of craft and execution and is already delighting multiple customers.Who are we looking for? You are an upbeat problem solver with a can-do spirit, a self-learner, and enjoy working in a team.You are looking to make a significant impact on the company and its journey You take pride in writing high-quality code with attention to product needsYou have a passion for creating great UI/UX‍What will you be doing?As a developer, you will take a central role in building Sightfull’s platform. You will have a real impact on our product and company.You will work closely with our amazing designers to create the best experience for our customersRequirementsTop-notch FE developer with curiosity, 2+ years of Typescript/Javascript experience, working knowledge of asynchronous programming and ES6 conceptsExperience working on SaaS products and cloud environments2+ years of HTML/CSS/SASS experience, familiarity with cross-browser compatibility, and accessibility.Experience with React.Experience with browser APIs & front end performance optimizationsExperience working in a high-paced environmentAdvantagesExperience working in a small startup companiesYou have worked closely with a product designerYou have worked as a frontend tech/team-leaderYou know your way around the backend side and feel comfortable working on that as well.If your experience is close but doesn’t fulfill all requirements, please apply! We value talent and motivation and believe that specific knowledge will follow.‍Our Tech StackOur requirements are not limited to our current tech stack. However, because some are curious, our current tech stack is mainly composed of Python, Node/Typescript, React/Typescript, big-scale ETL, Graph databases, GraphQL, Pulumi, Kubernetes, AWS, and many more :)

Title: Manager Digital Marketing & Brand Comm , CRM and Membership
Location: Holon, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Purpose & Overall Relevance for the OrganisationCoordinate and Implement the Global Brand Strategy ensuring excellence in execution and consistent deployment of brand marketing plans across mainline digital & media, and drive the communication in accordance with Global positioning and guidelines. Based on the global Consumer Engagement (CRM and Membership( strategy and aligned to the overall Israel Digital Activation strategy, refine, and ensure the Israel CRM and Membership Targets and KPI’s are achieved. Work closely with key business units, CRM vendor agencies to bring key strategies and plans to life. Focus will be on consumer acquisition through different channels and retention through the following key areas: email marketing, SMS, App Push Notifications. This role will be part of Digital Activation team and will work closely with our Brand Activation team, Performance Marketing Manager, Omni channel team, DTC excellence team, Retail Ops team.Key ResponsibilitiesDraft strong marketing briefs & lead the process of agency briefings, Creative development, Digital and Media planning for all campaign & business objectives. Implement digital & marketing plans and strategies in sync with business plans, annual marketing calendar, drive Reason-to-Believe & support Reason-to-Buy campaigns along with all the stakeholders.Create and enhance cross department, Creative & Media Agency relationships that drive them to deliver exceptional performance with best effective ROI Manage and enhance adidas brand image, position and reputation in the public's eye in accordance with brand guidelines, design formats and marketing principles.Drive digital & social media strategy to create a strong pull for the brand including tactical promotions and consumer engagement activaties.Develop and drive the CRM & Membership strategies; bring the over-arching Digital Activation ambition to life via a progressive strategy, ensuring that the brand takes a more consumer-centric approach to key activations.Develop a personalized communication strategy using email, SMS, app notifications, etc.Create seasonal plans, working in partnership with the global CRM & Membership teams on strategy and seasonal plan development. Utilize local CRM/global’s existing tools and agencies, supplementing when necessary.Drive collaboration with key business units to implement activations and deliver on quarterly / yearly consumer data acquisition targets.Collaborate for planning and execution for Membership Activation for best Members experiences. Drive checks, monitoring/tracking standards, media trends, up-to-date global guidelines and provide timely feedback with action plans for effective market planning.Maintain a close watch on the financial aspects of all campaigns and programs, such as budgets, expenditures, timelines and Return-On-Investment.Implement timely roll-out of tactical campaigns to enhance the consumer reach and engagement.KPI’sMembership KPIS. (acquisition, engagement rate, LTV) CRM KPIS.Digital Media reach & engagement rate.Brand Health KPIS (Brand momentum, Net Promoter Score, Spontaneous purchase intent, etc.)Execution excellence in brand concepts/storiesInnovative & Noteworthy campaignsDigital & Social traction & consumer engagementMWB management – Timelines & Audit Protocols Key RelationshipsBU Brand Activation ManagersCreative & Media AgenciesNPT & Finance TeamOther external AgenciesKnowledge, Skills And AbilitiesSolid understanding of the Digital & Media planning processes including benchmarking Plans, media costs, consumer segmentation & consumer journey and new media trends. Good understanding of the creative development process, layouts, artworks, and eye for details – tenacious about ‘peeling the layers’.OthersAbility to work across multiple functions with exemplary cross-functional collaboration, resourcefulness and influencing skills. Operate independently and efficiently to manage multiple tasks, media negotiations with professional judgement and discretion.Persuasive ‘Impossible is Nothing’ attitude and a drive for continuous improvement. Hands on Experience in CRM / consumer engagementRequisite Education And Experience / Minimum QualificationsPost Graduate in Management & a minimum of 5-8 years equivalent professional experience in Digital, Creative & Media, from Marketing background. Candidates with a flair for creative development process, content creation, viral marketing will have an advantage. Perfect candidate will have interest in Sports, an active participant or would have represented school/college in the field on play.
