Title: Design Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Imagine your dream office... Now, try again.Mindspace is a rapidly growing global provider of inspiring workspaces for teams of all sizes. Our community consists of enterprise companies and established startups, as well as small businesses, entrepreneurs, and creative freelancers. With members in more than 30 locations across 7 countries, we are setting the gold standard for flexible workspaces around the world.Who is the Design Manager? Want to join our team? We’re on the lookout for someone with an eye for aesthetics and design who knows how to work hard and play hard. MINDSPACE is looking for a Design Manager to join our growing family.The Design Manager will be based in Tel Aviv and will report directly to the Director of Design. An ideal candidate should be able to source inspiration from various outlets and be able to translate moods into beautifully designed and practical spaces. As a member of our creative and design team, you will take an active part in equipping our spaces with unique elements of design.The main responsibilities of an Art Manager at MINDSPACE include (but are not limited to):Ensuring that design projects are in line with Mindspace standards and best practicesResearching and seeking out new design initiativesCuration of art.Conveying design intent for new projectsIdentifying and selecting vendors, suppliers, artists, and products for new and existing projectsManaging deliveries of design and Art installations in coordination with suppliers and artistsRequirements:RequirementsExperience & Minimum Qualifications:Bachelor degree in Interior Design2+ years of field-relevant experienceProficiency in MS Office, Adobe Creative Suite, and Revit AutoCadHigh English language skills – a mustCritical Competencies for Success:You should be a great communicator who is able to convey messages in a clear and concise mannerA keen eye for aesthetics and demonstrated ability to deliver high-quality designMulti-tasking is a must; You must be able to balance multiple projects at once and adhere to deadlines (strong time management skills are key)Are you detail oriented and highly organized? Good- we need someone focused and reliable who can keep up with rapidly changing projectsA problem solver – you are a highly resourceful thinker who is quick on his feet and a fast learnerExcited about MINDSPACE; you are ready to live, eat and breathe MINDSPACE, spreading the love to everyone you encounterPortfolio must be submitted for consideration.Please submit your application in English.
Requirements: ['Ensuring that design projects are in line with Mindspace standards and best practices', 'Researching and seeking out new design initiatives', 'Curation of art.', 'Conveying design intent for new projects', 'Identifying and selecting vendors, suppliers, artists, and products for new and existing projects', 'Managing deliveries of design and Art installations in coordination with suppliers and artists', 'Bachelor degree in Interior Design', '2+ years of field-relevant experience', 'Proficiency in MS Office, Adobe Creative Suite, and Revit AutoCad', 'High English language skills – a must', 'You should be a great communicator who is able to convey messages in a clear and concise manner', 'A keen eye for aesthetics and demonstrated ability to deliver high-quality design', 'Multi-tasking is a must; You must be able to balance multiple projects at once and adhere to deadlines (strong time management skills are key)', 'Are you detail oriented and highly organized? Good- we need someone focused and reliable who can keep up with rapidly changing projects', 'A problem solver – you are a highly resourceful thinker who is quick on his feet and a fast learner', 'Excited about MINDSPACE; you are ready to live, eat and breathe MINDSPACE, spreading the love to everyone you encounter']

Title: Office Admin
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About us: BigPanda is a fast-growing, values-driven, global company that enables Tech Ops teams to keep the digital economy running. BigPanda’s AI-driven IT operations (aka AIOps) platform transforms IT data into insight and action. By eliminating IT noise, automating incident management, and keeping our customers’ digital services up and running around the clock, we become a mission-critical part of our customers’ IT operations.With BigPanda, some of the world’s largest enterprises including Hulu, Cisco, United, Abbott, Marriott, Expedia and many others are able to reduce costs and increase efficiencies, accelerate business velocity, and deliver extraordinary customer experiences.BigPanda is backed by top-tier investors including Sequoia, Mayfield, Battery, Insight Partners, Advent International, and Greenfield Partners.We have an awesome team of motivated, knowledgeable, fun-loving, and friendly Pandas. We provide comprehensive health coverage, parental leave, competitive cash and equity compensation, and a supportive, collaborative, and innovative environment to empower you to do the best work of your career.Our Benefits: Competitive EquityHybrid work scheduleCompany funded health insurance6 weeks fully Paid Parental LeaveCritical Family Medical LeaveFinancial planning servicesEmployee learning & development budgetValues-based recognition (Quarterly and Annually)Social community & ERG programsFreeFit gym packageWork-life harmonyDog friendly officeLocation requirements:The job requires full office attendanceAbout the Role:The Office Admin will be handling all Israel office-related administrative tasks; facilities maintenance, vendor relations, supporting HR, R&D, Product related operations, and providing general administrative support.We're looking for an ambitious, adaptive, and well-organized person to join our People team.What you will do:Maintain high standards of office appearance and be responsible for all maintenance needsBe the contact person for various vendors (office equipment, kitchen supplies, etc.)Responsibility for calendar management for internal and external meetingsAssist employees, managers, and stakeholders with their administrative and logistical needsMaintain employees’ positive workplace experience (order groceries, onboarding administrations, etc.)Administrative support of wellness activities and events on the siteWhat skills and experience you’ll bring to BigPanda:Great verbal and written communication skills in Hebrew and EnglishAdministrative experience in a fast-paced companySelf-sufficiency and independenceProactiveness and ability to work as part of a teamAccuracy and ability to deliver high-quality outcomesAbility to prioritize tasks based on a sense of urgencyService-oriented approach

Title: מנהל/ת חשבונות
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: מאליס היא חברת אי-קומרס עולמית בתחום הקוסמטיקה, הנמצאת בצמיחה מהירה במיוחד . אנחנו שוברים את המוסכמות של תעשיית הקוסמטיקה העולמית עם מוצרי חיטוב מוכחים קלינית, ושילוב חכם של דאטה, שיווק ומותג חזק וייחודי בנוף.אנחנו מלאים תשוקה, עם אנשים שאוהבים לראות תוצאות מיידיות, ולהיות חלק משמעותי, ולא בורג קטן במערכת גדולה - ואנחנו מחפשים מנהל/ת חשבונות שיצטרפו לצוות שלנוכמנהל/ת חשבונות, אתם תטפלו בפעילות הפיננסית השוטפת של החברה, ותהיו אחראים על הנהלת החשבונות של החברה מקצה לקצה.תחומי האחריות שלך במאליס יהיו:מחזור רכישה הכולל שליטה על ספקים, רישום חשבוניות, תשלומים והתאמה.ביצוע התאמות תקופתיות של כל החשבונות כדי להבטיח את דיוקם.הבאת הספרים לשלב מאזן בוחן (צבירה, הוצאות ששולמו מראש).ביצוע התאמות תקופתיות של כל החשבונות כדי להבטיח את דיוקם.ווידוא ששיטות החשבונאות וחישובי מס עומדים בדרישות החוק המקומיות.תמיכה בפרויקטים ומשימות אחרות של בקרה ניהולית לפי הצורך.סיוע בסגירת תקופות ולהכין ניתוח שונות לפי הצורך.תמיכה בבקשות לנתוני בקרה ובתהליכי ביקורת.הכנה והגשת דוחות מע"מ ומס על פנקסים נתמכים.אתם תאהבו לעבוד איתנו עם יש לכם:תשומת לב גבוהה לפרטים, יכולת פתרון בעיות ויכולת ניהול מספר פרויקטים במקביל - חובה.שליטה בתוכנת פריוריטי - חובה.תעודת מנהל/ת חשבונות מוסמכת - רמה 2 מינימום.חוכמה פיננסית מוכחת, יכולות אנליטיות חזקות וניסיון בתקשורת יעילה עם כל רמות הארגון - חובה.הבנה גבוהה ב-Microsoft Excel כולל שילוב נוסחאות (sumif, vlookup וכו')יכולת להפעיל שיקול דעת וניהול מידע ומסמכים סודיים.להיטות ללמוד ואישיות בעלת מוטיבציה עצמית.
Requirements: ['מחזור רכישה הכולל שליטה על ספקים, רישום חשבוניות, תשלומים והתאמה.', 'ביצוע התאמות תקופתיות של כל החשבונות כדי להבטיח את דיוקם.', 'הבאת הספרים לשלב מאזן בוחן (צבירה, הוצאות ששולמו מראש).', 'ביצוע התאמות תקופתיות של כל החשבונות כדי להבטיח את דיוקם.', 'ווידוא ששיטות החשבונאות וחישובי מס עומדים בדרישות החוק המקומיות.', 'תמיכה בפרויקטים ומשימות אחרות של בקרה ניהולית לפי הצורך.', 'סיוע בסגירת תקופות ולהכין ניתוח שונות לפי הצורך.', 'תמיכה בבקשות לנתוני בקרה ובתהליכי ביקורת.', 'הכנה והגשת דוחות מע"מ ומס על פנקסים נתמכים.', 'תשומת לב גבוהה לפרטים, יכולת פתרון בעיות ויכולת ניהול מספר פרויקטים במקביל - חובה.', 'שליטה בתוכנת פריוריטי - חובה.', 'תעודת מנהל/ת חשבונות מוסמכת - רמה 2 מינימום.', 'חוכמה פיננסית מוכחת, יכולות אנליטיות חזקות וניסיון בתקשורת יעילה עם כל רמות הארגון - חובה.', "הבנה גבוהה ב-Microsoft Excel כולל שילוב נוסחאות (sumif, vlookup וכו')", 'יכולת להפעיל שיקול דעת וניהול מידע ומסמכים סודיים.', 'להיטות ללמוד ואישיות בעלת מוטיבציה עצמית.']

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: PayBox continues to grow, and we are searching for a great and talented Product Manager.Responsibilities:Ownership of product life–cycle, responsibility for creating product innovation by answering customers' needs.Analyze market trends, competitive landscape, and new business opportunities.Manage road map in line with the company's strategyWrite product requirements, and prioritize product features and delivery plans.Work closely with cross-functional teams such as development, marketing, design, etc.Requirements:3+ years of product management experience in consumer-facing products (B2C) in mobile product/services management.Knowledge of the UI/UX environment, and highly creative capabilities.Experience in writing HLD specification documents.Experience in product development methodologies.Strong analytical skills, technical abilities, written and verbal communication, organizational skillsGreat communication and presentation skillsAdvantages:Experience within the payments space and/or servicing of credit products - a significant advantage.Experience working in highly cross-functional product areas, especially with partners with naturally conflicting objectives.About Us:We’re PayBox, the first digital wallet in Israel (with over 3 million users).We’re the only app that allows users to hold and manage their funds separately from their bank accounts. Through our easy and flexible technology, we’re leading the group money collection segment and allow different communities to achieve a variety of goals in a convenient and transparent way.But Paybox is not only about groups and communities. We’re a leading player in the world of digital payments, fund transfers, payments for businesses, client memberships, and benefits. Paybox is owned by Discount Bank and Shufersal Group, which have partnered to change the world of our day-to-day finances. PayBox is developing an innovative digital platform for financial services, which will change the way we do banking and compete with traditional banking players.Candidates Privacy Policy:הכתוב מטה מתייחס באופן שווה לכל מין ומגדר***** כללימסמך זה משקף את מדיניות החברה ביחס לאיסוף, שימוש והעברת מידע לצד ג' אודות מועמדים לעבודה בחברה, בכלל זה מי שמועמדותו נבחנה ונדחתה איסוף ושימוש במידע:תהליך המיון לעבודה בחברה כרוך באיסוף ושמירת מידע אודות המועמד, המידע שיאסף וישמר יכלול מידע כדלקמן:א. מידע שנמסר מרצון חופשי: פרטי מידע אשר ימסרו על-ידי המועמד מרצונו החופשי לרבות המידע המפורט בקו"ח, תעודות, המלצות, מידע רפואי (אם נמסר) מידע אודות מקורבים וכיוצ"ב.ב. מידע ממקורות מידע נוספים: החברה תהיה רשאית לאסוף מידע אודות המועמד מצדדי ג' לרבות ממאגרי מידע חיצוניים, חברות מיון והשמה, ממליצים (ששמותיהם יימסרו לחברה על-ידי המועמד בידיעה והסכמה שהחברה עשויה לפנות אליהם לבקש מידע נוסף אודות המועמד) ועוד. יובהר כי פניית החברה לחברת מיון והשמה לצרכים שונים של החברה תיעשה בהסכמתו של המועמד בלבד (אם כי עשויה להוות תנאי לבחינת מועמדותו על ידי החברה) ופרטיו עשויים להישמר בידי חברות המיון וההשמה בהתאם לתנאים שיפורטו על-ידי חברות אלה בפני המועמד בעת ביצוע הליך המיון וההשמה ובהתאם לדין. ביצוע הליך המיון וההתאמה כפוף להסכמת המועמד לתנאים אלה. בנוסף החברה תהיה רשאית לאסוף מידע אודות המועמד, על ידי פנייה למאגרי המידע הפנימיים של החברה.ג. המידע המפורט בסעיפים א-ב ישמר במאגרי המידע של החברה על ידי החברה או מי מטעמה בארץ או בחו"ל לרבות אצל ספקי שירותי ענן וישמש למטרות הבאות: ניהול הקשר עם המועמד; מיון המועמד לתפקידים בחברה; דיוור ישיר; מחקר; בדיקות אמינות; פניות עתידיות באשר למשרות שימצאו רלוונטיות עבור המועמד בהתאם לשיקול דעת החברה. העברת המידע לצדדים שלישייםא. החברה תהיה רשאית להעביר את המידע שנאסף אודות המועמדים לצדדים שלישיים לצורך עיבודו בהתאם למטרות האמורות לעיל. בנוסף, ייתכן שמידע אודות המועמדים ייחשף או יועבר לצדדים שלישיים המעניקים לחברה שירותים בתחום אבטחת המידע, שירותי ייעוץ, בקרה, מחקר ועמידה בדרישות החוק, ובכפוף לדין החל על החברה.ב. ייתכן שהמידע כאמור יועבר לצדדים שלישיים שנמצאים מחוץ לישראל, לרבות למדינות המעניקות הגנה פחותה בהיבטי פרטיות מאשר ההגנה הניתנת על פי דיני מדינת ישראל. למשל, ייתכן שחלק מהמידע יישמר בשרתים (שירותי ענן) בארצות הברית או במדינות נוספות. המועמדים מסכימים במפורש להעברת מידע לצורך שמירתו בשרתי ענן כאמור לכל מדינה בה החברה תבחר לקבל שירותי עיבוד מידע לפי שיקול דעתה הבלעדי. זכות עיון:מועמד לעבודה זכאי לעיין במידע השמור עליו במאגרי המידע של החברה ואף לבקש לתקן מידע זה אם אינו נכון, שלם או מדויק. לצורך מימוש זכות זו ובכל שאלה או הבהרה בנוגע לתנאים המפורטים לעיל - ניתן לעיין במדיניות הפרטיות של החברה המפורסמת באתר החברה ולפעול בהתאם לאמור בהיובהר כי מדיניות פרטיות המועמדים הנ"ל של החברה, חלה על מועמד לעבודה בחברה ולא יהא באמור במסמך זה כדי לגרוע מהאמור במדיניות הפרטיות של החברה.
Requirements: ["Ownership of product life–cycle, responsibility for creating product innovation by answering customers' needs.", 'Analyze market trends, competitive landscape, and new business opportunities.', "Manage road map in line with the company's strategy", 'Write product requirements, and prioritize product features and delivery plans.', 'Work closely with cross-functional teams such as development, marketing, design, etc.', '3+ years of product management experience in consumer-facing products (B2C) in mobile product/services management.', 'Knowledge of the UI/UX environment, and highly creative capabilities.', 'Experience in writing HLD specification documents.', 'Experience in product development methodologies.', 'Strong analytical skills, technical abilities, written and verbal communication, organizational skills', 'Great communication and presentation skills', 'Experience within the payments space and/or servicing of credit products - a significant advantage.', 'Experience working in highly cross-functional product areas, especially with partners with naturally conflicting objectives.', 'הכתוב מטה מתייחס באופן שווה לכל מין ומגדר*****', 'כללי', 'איסוף ושימוש במידע:', 'העברת המידע לצדדים שלישיים', 'זכות עיון:']

Title: Social and content manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Social and Content ManagerRun:ai is seeking a Social and Content Manager to support our growing go to market and brand awareness efforts.Working with the head of growth marketing, the Social and Content Manager will be responsible for creating industry-relevant and developer-targeted content as well as owning our social media strategy including releasing relevant updates such as company news, product announcements, events etc.,The Social and Content manager will be responsible to produce short and long-form content such as videos, LinkedIn posts, testimonials, memes, etc. from ideation stage, to script development, to design and post-production.He/She will grow and interact with Run:ai's internal subject-matter experts, community, partners and follower-base, and will play a key role in presenting Run:ai's story and P.O.V to our clients, prospects, employees, peers and partners according to our positioning, brand, tone-of-voice and social media goals.As part of their role, the Social and Content Manager will be responsible to feed back insights such as audience sentiment, interest topics, and key insights about our market wants and needs.Responsibilities:Be able to interview subject matter experts on deep technical topics and build a synopsis and script around themTake a project from ideation to publication including all production and editing stagesOwn Run.ai social channels (Linkedin, FB, Twitter, Youtube, etc.) including, company news, Product releases, new content drops, Op-ed and ghost writing for senior leadershipHold customer interviews for video and written content such as testimonials, Ask Me Anything sessions and moreHelp repurposing of Run:ai content (Blogs, Whitepapers, PR) into social media-ready format such as Interviews, recorded customer testimonials, retrospectives, webinar summaries, market-research pitches etc. Write marketing emails for nurture flows, blog posts announcements, and eventsAssist with ad copy, creative, editing and productionAssist with landing pages copy / micro-copy and message testingAssist with adjacent pre/post event activities for other marketing programs such as partner events, trade shows, customer panels etc.'Assist with Run:ai employer branding social media activitiesQualifications:Native English speaker - a must Presentable and comfortable being in front of a camera as a host or as a narrator - a mustAbility to grasp complex technical concepts and explain them in fluent and concise writing / verbal manner - a must5+ years experience in B2B content writing / copywriting - a must 5+ years experience managing social media in B2B tech specifically Linkedin/ Twitter - a mustExperience in managing social media for developers - a big plusExperience with social video content production such as YouTube, Reels, TikTok - a big plusExperience with social media scheduling, and listening tools such as Hootsuite, Buffer, as well as Hubspot - a plus
Requirements: ['Be able to interview subject matter experts on deep technical topics and build a synopsis and script around them', 'Take a project from ideation to publication including all production and editing stages', 'Own Run.ai social channels (Linkedin, FB, Twitter, Youtube, etc.) including, company news, Product releases, new content drops, Op-ed and ghost writing for senior leadership', 'Hold customer interviews for video and written content such as testimonials, Ask Me Anything sessions and more', 'Help repurposing of Run:ai content (Blogs, Whitepapers, PR) into social media-ready format such as Interviews, recorded customer testimonials, retrospectives, webinar summaries, market-research pitches etc.', 'Write marketing emails for nurture flows, blog posts announcements, and events', 'Assist with ad copy, creative, editing and production', 'Assist with landing pages copy / micro-copy and message testing', "Assist with adjacent pre/post event activities for other marketing programs such as partner events, trade shows, customer panels etc.'", 'Assist with Run:ai employer branding social media activities', 'Native English speaker - a must', 'Presentable and comfortable being in front of a camera as a host or as a narrator - a must', 'Ability to grasp complex technical concepts and explain them in fluent and concise writing / verbal manner - a must', '5+ years experience in B2B content writing / copywriting - a must', '5+ years experience managing social media in B2B tech specifically Linkedin/ Twitter - a must', 'Experience in managing social media for developers - a big plus', 'Experience with social video content production such as YouTube, Reels, TikTok - a big plus', 'Experience with social media scheduling, and listening tools such as Hootsuite, Buffer, as well as Hubspot - a plus']

Title: Mechanical Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Uveye is looking for a Mechanical Engineer to join our R&D Department.Responsibilities:Plan and create mechanical designs for new productsDevelop testing processes and perform testing and validation of new designsGenerate working prototypes for beta testing and customer demonstrationCreate and review technical drawings, plans, and specificationsCollaborate with multi-disciplinary engineering teams work with vendors and contractorsCreate assembly, installation and maintenance procedures Ensure project timeline is met and project stays within budgetRequirements:Bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering2-5 years of relevant experience from Companies with multidisciplinary systemsProven experience in designing mechanical systems and productsExcellent math skills: ability to apply advanced mathematical principles to solve problemsExperience using SolidWorks softwareAbility to write installation and maintenance procedures Willingness to travel to customer sites worldwideDriver license - MustExperience working in startup companies - AdvantageUSA visa - Advantage
Requirements: ['Plan and create mechanical designs for new products', 'Develop testing processes and perform testing and validation of new designs', 'Generate working prototypes for beta testing and customer demonstration', 'Create and review technical drawings, plans, and specifications', 'Collaborate with multi-disciplinary engineering teams', 'work with vendors and contractors', 'Create assembly, installation and maintenance procedures', 'Ensure project timeline is met and project stays within budget', "Bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering", '2-5 years of relevant experience from Companies with multidisciplinary systems', 'Proven experience in designing mechanical systems and products', 'Excellent math skills: ability to apply advanced mathematical principles to solve problems', 'Experience using SolidWorks software', 'Ability to write installation and maintenance procedures', 'Willingness to travel to customer sites worldwide', 'Driver license - Must', 'Experience working in startup companies - Advantage', 'USA visa - Advantage']

Title: VP Marketing
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Identiq is looking for an enthusiastic VP Marketing to lead our marketing activity. This role is an amazing opportunity to be a player-coach and to make a true impact and be the focal point for all marketing activities in the company. Having the responsibility for designing, executing, and scaling our marketing strategy in collaboration with the Identiq management team.Requirements:7+ years of B2B SaaS experience as a marketing manager Strong knowledge of enterprise marketing tactics and best practicesTrack record of success in delivering pipeline and revenue outcomesPrior experience with startupsSelf-starter with the ability to use data and industry insights to make strategic decisionsOutstanding communicator and creative thinkerExperience with marketing automation tools for reporting analytics and campaign executionTeam player with a positive attitude and strong motivationResponsibilities:Lead Acquisition: Responsible for generating qualified leads and opportunities through various outbound and inbound channels, feeding the sales team, and growing our network.Demand Generation: Build brand awareness and thought leadership in the industry around Identiq, and measuring the impact in terms of traffic and leadsContent: Owning the content calendar and managing the content team to position us as a leader in the industry with case studies, eBooks, webinars, blogs, and social postsEvents: Plan and execute our sponsorship and exhibiting at industry events, and creating our own virtual and in-person events for customers and prospectsMarket analysis: Mapping the potential market for Identiq, identifying the ideal customer, and defining the qualification criteria needed to deliver the right opportunity to salesMarketing operations: Owning the CRM (Salesforce) and marketing platform (HubSpot) to ensure everything is tracked properly and can be reported on easilyBranding: Managing the company’s website and delivering branding assets that match the company’s style, identity, and visual languageGTM Collaboration: Working closely with the sales and customer success teams, under the umbrella of the CRO’s core teamAbout Us:Identiq is a visionary startup company set to change the fraud prevention and identity verification market.We build a network of companies that work together to fight fraud and validate legitimate users without sharing any dataOur offices are located in Tel Aviv, next to Ha’Shalom train station (but we do encourage WFH)Why join Identiq?:We act to be impactfulWe act with intent and consistently searching for ways to have an impact.When we see something that doesn't make sense/inefficient you try to make it better and we believe that we are changing the world for the betterWe go one step beyondWhether it's for a colleague or client, we are always willing to go one step beyond their expectations. No matter how small or large. It's our way of showing we care, and it's what makes us so nice to work with.
Requirements: ['7+ years of B2B SaaS experience as a marketing manager', 'Strong knowledge of enterprise marketing tactics and best practices', 'Track record of success in delivering pipeline and revenue outcomes', 'Prior experience with startups', 'Self-starter with the ability to use data and industry insights to make strategic decisions', 'Outstanding communicator and creative thinker', 'Experience with marketing automation tools for reporting analytics and campaign execution', 'Team player with a positive attitude and strong motivation', 'Lead Acquisition: Responsible for generating qualified leads and opportunities through various outbound and inbound channels, feeding the sales team, and growing our network.', 'Demand Generation: Build brand awareness and thought leadership in the industry around Identiq, and measuring the impact in terms of traffic and leads', 'Content: Owning the content calendar and managing the content team to position us as a leader in the industry with case studies, eBooks, webinars, blogs, and social posts', 'Events: Plan and execute our sponsorship and exhibiting at industry events, and creating our own virtual and in-person events for customers and prospects', 'Market analysis: Mapping the potential market for Identiq, identifying the ideal customer, and defining the qualification criteria needed to deliver the right opportunity to sales', 'Marketing operations: Owning the CRM (Salesforce) and marketing platform (HubSpot) to ensure everything is tracked properly and can be reported on easily', 'Branding: Managing the company’s website and delivering branding assets that match the company’s style, identity, and visual language', 'GTM Collaboration: Working closely with the sales and customer success teams, under the umbrella of the CRO’s core team']

Title: Senior Bookkeeper
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are Papaya Gaming, a Tel Aviv-based mobile games startup with one of the fastest growth rates in the market since 2019 and millions of players worldwide.We are looking for Senior bookkeeper to join our top-notch Finance department.Requirements:Bookkeeping Certificate Type 1+2, 3.10+ years of relevant work experience with at least 3 years’ experience in a High-Tech industry – a must.Experience with Priority – a must.Comfortable with Excel.Team player with great interpersonal; communication skills.Solid understanding of a payroll process.Flexibility and ability to deal with changing priorities.High English levelTechnology orientedResponsibilities:Managing all bookkeeping aspects of the company (Israel & US & other countries).Take lead on the month-end close: Prepare the trial balance and supporting documentation for the monthly closing of the company’s books.Manage AP balances and maintaining approval flow and payments.Financial reporting tax authorities (i.e., VAT, corporate tax, etc.).1099 reporting, and assistant in any other IRS monthly requirements.Monthly reconciliations.Sales Tax submission assistance.Support implementation of SOX.
Requirements: ['Bookkeeping Certificate Type 1+2, 3.', '10+ years of relevant work experience with at least 3 years’ experience in a High-Tech industry – a must.', 'Experience with Priority – a must.', 'Comfortable with Excel.', 'Team player with great interpersonal; communication skills.', 'Solid understanding of a payroll process.', 'Flexibility and ability to deal with changing priorities.', 'High English level', 'Technology oriented', 'Managing all bookkeeping aspects of the company (Israel & US & other countries).', 'Take lead on the month-end close: Prepare the trial balance and supporting documentation for the monthly closing of the company’s books.', 'Manage AP balances and maintaining approval flow and payments.', 'Financial reporting tax authorities (i.e., VAT, corporate tax, etc.).', '1099 reporting, and assistant in any other IRS monthly requirements.', 'Monthly reconciliations.', 'Sales Tax submission assistance.', 'Support implementation of SOX.']

Title: VP of Products
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Our company is reinventing the real estate industry across the globe by harnessing the power of AI and cutting-edge technology to make home buying better for everyone. We are looking for a talented and creative person to join our team as our VP of Product.As our VP of Product, you will be positioned in a unique & central role where you will lead our product strategy and delivery for both the US market (Localize) and the Israeli market (Madlan).While both brands/products share the vision of revolutionizing the Real Estate consumer market, each is at a unique positioning in their respective markets.Localize is building an “AWS for real estate”, a suite of cloud-based services, leveraging AI, chatbots, predictive algorithms, and a set of operational tools to redefine and effectively create an on-demand operating system for real estate agents and brokers globally. Localize is in early revenue stages in NY, our 1st market and is growing rapidly. We already power over 600 agents and more than 100,000 consumers enjoy our services. By introducing cutting edge technology into real estate, we empower brokerages and real estate agents and allow them to maintain a close relationship with an unlimited number of leads at any given moment, eventually scaling their business and growing their bottom line. We are about to expand to additional markets within the US and have only started to scratch the surface of the product potential.Madlan is Israel’s leading real estate listings marketplace led by technology and product. With high revenues and post-hitting profitability, Madlan is at a more mature stage.In Madlan we are working to:Expand our consumer offering Expand to new marketsResearch new B2B product opportunitiesImprove core product funnelsYou will be working closely with the GMs in both territories, and with marketing, sales, data science, and engineering. Your key responsibilities will include :Lead the company’s product strategy and innovationSet the product road map according to the business KPIKeep the product ahead of potential competitionLead, mentor, and support a strong team of product managers & product designBuild processes to drive efficiency and increase velocity across the teamWork closely with leadership to drive revenue, innovative technologies, and differentiationThe position is based in Tel Aviv, and is reporting directly to our CEORequirements:What you bring to the table:At least 8 years of experience in product management rolesYou experienced leading both B2B + B2C products that span across multiple territories Previously lead a team of product managersCurious, data-driven, and passionate about solving customer needs
Requirements: ['Expand our consumer offering', 'Expand to new markets', 'Research new B2B product opportunities', 'Improve core product funnels', 'Lead the company’s product strategy and innovation', 'Set the product road map according to the business KPI', 'Keep the product ahead of potential competition', 'Lead, mentor, and support a strong team of product managers & product design', 'Build processes to drive efficiency and increase velocity across the team', 'Work closely with leadership to drive revenue, innovative technologies, and differentiation', 'At least 8 years of experience in product management roles', 'You experienced leading both B2B + B2C products that span across multiple territories', 'Previously lead a team of product managers', 'Curious, data-driven, and passionate about solving customer needs']

Title: Head of Growth
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Guesty is looking for an experienced Head of Growth Marketing to join our vibrant Marketing team in Tel Aviv.As the Head of Growth Marketing reporting to the Director of Growth, you will be responsible for developing and executing our growth strategy, collaborating across teams to identify opportunities to drive growth, reporting on performance and managing the team’s effectiveness. You will work closely with other arms of the Marketing Team along with Sales to achieve big results as we enter into an exciting phase of our company’s life cycle.This is a strategic and impactful role that provides a unique opportunity to join a fast-growing travel disruptor.Roles and Responsibilities:Plan, manage and execute Guesty’s growth strategy.Build and implement a growth marketing plan in line with overall business objectives.Execute longer-term, strategic goals as well as quick wins to achieve targetsUtilize data and analytics for decision-making and measuring marketing. effectiveness as well as creating a culture of structured experimentation and iteration to drive growth.Build dashboards for measuring and sharing results on business-critical KPIs related to growth and own achievement of weekly and monthly KPIs.Create growth opportunities with new activities.Work closely with the SDR team, lead initiatives, and provide ongoing analysis and input.Requirements:3-5 years of marketing experience in growth positions with technology companies, preferably B2B oriented - managing a team of 3+ people.Managerial experience in demand generation and a proven track record of success.You have a strong experience in performance marketing (SEO, SEM).Demonstrated experience in growing web traffic and converting visitors into qualified leads.Knows the ins & outs of email marketing, lead nurturing, marketing automation (preference to HubSpot), and web analytics.Experience in running an ABM program for a B2B company.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines.Experienced in working with marketing and analytics tools and campaign management tools, preferably Monday.Strong analytical skills, data-driven decision-making, technical ability.Experience managing marketing professionals and vendors to achieve key business metrics.Excellent spoken and written English.Excellent communication, time management, and project management skills.

Title: Director of Design
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!The Director of Design is responsible for developing and managing all aspects of our design and creative output within the company. You’ll report to the VP Product and be part of the product department leadership, establishing our department culture, goals and vision.What you’ll do:Lead the overall Product Design, Brand Design and Motion teams and oversee their activities. In addition you’ll be responsible for recruiting and managing third party design suppliers as well as internal design resources. Develop and manage productivity and to continuously improve the design team’s production capabilitiesManage design team leaders and designers and be responsible in mentoring them, shaping career development and managing performance.Work closely with Product leadership to define a high-level product strategy and vision and contribute to the definition and development of the product roadmap.Work closely with Marketing leadership to help define our brand strategy and guidelines and be an active part of the execution of our brand materials.Ensure consistency between Marketing branding, Product branding, and visual consistency throughout our products and messaging collateral promoting our products. Maintain and enrich the design system & brand book to allow scalability and efficiencyInfluencing design-led thinking across the business. Take active part in brainstorms and product improvements. Be initiative, suggest solutions and find problems.Set craft quality standards with a deep understanding of the customer's goals, business requirements, and technical limitations. Conduct customer interviews to ensure usage and business insights are central to your team's work and processEnsure the design and creative deliverables are aligned to stakeholder expectations and executed within budget and deadlines. Deliver a design strategy, along with a plan for evolutionary, iterative updates that actualize the larger strategy over time. Make sure that design helps to achieve our business goals and the design strategy follows the overall company strategy.Lead with customer obsession, guide towards strong user experience and strategically leverage user research.Requirements:What you’ll need:6+ years of design leadership experience with direct reports, including hiring and developing and scaling both product and visual design teams. Experience working with Product and Marketing teams.Have a great passion for design with proven ability to execute a creative vision.Proven experience in all phases of the design process including user research, copywriting, wireframing, prototyping, visual design, interaction design, and usability testingKnowledge of layouts, graphic fundamentals, typography & limitations of online and offline design workVast experience in digital products: web apps, mobile apps, graphic design. Passion for delightful product experiences, ability to collect and interpret both qualitative and quantitative feedbackWell-versed in collaborative design techniques, Agile and Lean frameworks, rapid prototyping, UX design, UX patternsExperience in branding, attention to detail A strong working knowledge of online and offline design, brand development and the creative process.Experience with Figma, Sketch, Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, After-effect, Premiere, etc)Excellent organizational and communication skills and the ability to manage multiple projects from concept to completion. Remarkable writing and verbal communication skills in English.B.Des degree or an equivalentBonus - love for sports

Title: Risk Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: EverC is a pioneer of advanced technology that provides risk intelligence for global enterprises. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning modeling to crawl millions of domains and give our clients full visibility, insight, and understanding of the internet. We shine a light on hidden merchant risk and reveal new opportunities to help businesses grow.EverC is seeking a talented individual who is passionate about helping organizations protect themselves from fraud threats. As a Risk Analyst at EverC you will get the chance to detect, investigate, and remediate emerging e-commerce threats using EverC unique technology. As a Risk analyst, you will be required to identify and investigate pieces of information to evaluate the level of risk a merchant presents to the financial institution, as well as identify connections across the web to other non-compliant activities.Main responsibilities:Use proactive methods to identify fraudulent activities in accordance with company strategyConducting risk and Compliance AnalysisWorking with regulations and lawSupport new product initiatives through analysis and reporting of customer and market trendsBuild and optimize operational delivery models & monitoring operations Main Requirements:2+ years experience as an Analyst in Fintech, Marketplace, Product, Pharma, Payments, or online industryProfessional English skills, internet wizardry, and enthusiasm for technologyStrong Excel skillsExperience in risk/compliance analysis and/or working with law and regulations – a big advantageA fast mind with an extremely high level of attention to detailOpenness to learning, lots of creativity, and proven desire to solve problemsThe ability to work under competing deadlines across multiple time zones

Text: About UsWith over 30 Million users on our platform, we’re here to change the future of business. Our all-in-one platform makes starting a business affordable and accessible to everyone – we welcome more than 800k new business owners every month. From our products to our careers, there are endless opportunities for growth.Our team | Our core | Our dream fulfillersWhen we started Tailor Brands, we wanted to help people to accelerate their growth and fulfill their dreams. This also defines us internally; we put our focus on maximizing individual impact and creating an environment of absolute transparency.About The Role﻿We are looking for a Sales Trainer to develop training courses and monitor performance for our sales team.As a Sales Trainer, you are responsible to collaborate between our headquarters and sales staff offshore and identify issues the employees are facing. You will also be responsible for maximizing their effectiveness through these training programs. Your role includes creating the learning material, monitoring performance after each session and making recommendations for improvements.If your skills and work experience match the criteria for this role, we would like to meet you.Develop material required for training for example outline, handouts, and analyze day to day needs for training in the sales teamTraveling abroad to conduct sales training and monitor performance in an offshore environment (a minimum of 8-10 times yearly)Monitoring performance and building new strategies to increase revenueConduct training sessions for new and current sales personnelDevelop new approaches and techniques for making improvements in training programsCoordinate with external trainers and monitor their performance while generating results and measuring their performanceStay up-to-date with the latest product developments and be able to train the representativesRequirements:Proven 1-2 years of experience as a Sales Training Specialist, or as a sales representative, preferably in B2CStrong working knowledge of the sales process and its best practicesExcellent oral and written communication skillsAbility to design effective sales training programsAbility to measure an employee's performance.Outstanding coaching and sales skillsExcellent time management and customer service skillsExcellent presentation skillsGreat interpersonal and organizational skillsAbility to multitask as and when required

Title: Blog Editor
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Artlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.Artlist consists of 4 products:Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platformArtgrid.io, a curated stock footage platformMotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photosFXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing softwareWe’re looking for a full-time to join our vibrant creative team in Tel-Aviv.Wake up for this:Define the blogs' content strategy in correlation to the company goalsResearching, developing, editing, and writing engaging content for our blogsWork with a team of blog writers, provide them with topic briefs, keyword research and other insightsWork closely with the SEO team to ensure optimal blog performanceOwn and manage a blog content calendarDevelop a strong understanding of our users and the market to help drive new compelling ideasTrack and monitor relevant KPIs to ensure content performance and alignment with company OKRsRequirements:3-5 years of copywriting experience and editing content in a B2B/B2C companyStrong understanding of the video creation and social influencers industryStrong knowledge of web traffic metrics, SEO, and other relevant analyticsEnglish written and communications skills - Native English - A MUSTGreat interpersonal skillsExcellent ability to write and edit content to produce compelling stories that will attract and engage our readers.Self sufficient, and comfortable working autonomously in a fast-paced environment.Excellent knowledge of and passion for established and emerging social platforms, trends, and best practices.Ability to manage creative flow from start to end using content writers, designers and developersStrong leadership skills, ability to guide a team of creative staff and oversee marketing activities through all its stages

Title: Marketing Director
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: What makes Workiz unique?This is a special place with a unique combination of brilliance, spirit, and just all-around great people. Here, if you’re willing to do more, your career can take off. We are a leading SaaS company for the field service industry, one of the most recession-proof and lucrative industries today.Workiz is located in the heart of Tel Aviv, just a short walk from the Hashalom train station. Our open-space offices can accommodate our 100+ employees and when we are not hard at work, you can find us relaxing with a cup of coffee on the balcony or surfing the TLV beaches. Workiz understands that you have a life outside of the office, so we have a flexible work week that allows you to work 3 days from the office and two days from home, but you won't want to miss happy hour!Who are you?A passionate marketing expert, with the ability to lead toward growth and scale. Strong experience in content writing, managing projects such as professional webinars, writing customer testimonials, and enhancing our social media presence.So, what will you be doing all day?The Marketing Director oversees all internal and external communications and marketing activities for the company, ensuring its message is consistent and engaging, from events management, PR, and marketing strategies to the creative side of promotional literature, and advertising.Manage and organize our trade shows, customer events, and participation in conferencesLeading the planning and implementation of PR - create informative and interesting press releases, press kits, newsletters, and related marketing materials. Develop and implement effective communication methods to build brand awareness and develop our thought leadership position in the industry and direct the workflow of building and maintenance of consistent branding and corporate identity across marketing and public relations channels, creating webinar series, podcast opportunities, trade publications, and more.Create communication strategies for new products, launches, events, and promotions.Manage the social media activity.Directing the creation of internal communications, press releases, and speeches given by executives, as well as Web content.Ensure all products, services, and other offerings conform to brand identity; conduct ongoing brand management.Work with the creative team and other team members to produce marketing collateral in accordance with brand messages.Managing a team of two [content writer and copywriter]Requirements:Ideally, we’re looking for7+ years of experience in integrated marketing, ideally in B2C/B2B SaaSExcellent writing skillsManagerial experienceA relentless passion for innovative marketingStrong understanding of design and content excellenceA creative thinker who can execute big ideas independentlyA team player who works well in a dynamic environmentNative English is a must Hiring process with usAt Workiz, we aim to complete our hiring processes at lightning speed, keeping the time between when we receive your CV until you (hopefully) sign with us super short, communicative, and transparent.Why You’ll Love Being a WorkizerYou’ll actually love the product you work with and the people too:)Excellent benefitsTeam players. Rockstars without the ego. Fast learners that work hard and get S*** doneThere is no such thing as a bad idea40% female %60 male  You can grow your career in any direction you chooseDiversity isn’t just a buzzwordWe know how to have fun! Join our surf club, ping pong tournaments, and other spontaneous activities. Oh, and we throw some killer partiesWe build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we recognize the value in always nurturing and training them so they can go above and beyond in their skills and job duties

Title: אנליסט/ית SOC
Location: Rehovot, Center District, Israel
Text: למרכז הגנת הסייבר של חברת Citadel Cyber Security דרוש/ה אנליסט/ית SOC.התפקיד כולל ניטור וטיפול בהתראות אבטחת מידע עבור מגוון לקוחות בארץ ובחו"ל.הניטור מתבצע תוך כדי שימוש במערכות וכלי אבטחת המידע המתקדמים ביותר בתעשייה.השתלבות בצוות אנליסטים גדול ומקצועי.העבודה במשמרות 24/7 (בוקר, צהריים, לילה) כולל שבתות וחגים.מיקום - פארק המדע, רחובותRequirements:היכרות טובה עם רשתות, סיסטם ואבטחת מידע- חובהניסיון קודם בתפקידי תמיכה טכנית/סיסטם/רשתות ותקשורת- חובהבוגר/ת קורס סייבר - חובהאנגלית ברמה גבוהה - חובהניסיון קודם כבקר/ית ו/או אנליסט/ית אבטחת מידע – יתרוןהיכרות עם מערכות SIEM של ArcSight או QRADAR - יתרוןיוצאי יחידות אבטחת מידע וסייבר – יתרון

Title: Legal Counsel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who We AreWalnut is a fast growing startup in the sales automation space, backed by top-notch investors.We help some of the best sales teams in the world to dramatically perform better, by easily creating failure-free, interactive, and personalized demo experiences for each prospect - without coding.We are a young company that values culture, transparency, and achievements, and put our founding members at the very heart of our company.As Walnut's Legal Counsel, you will be reporting to our Head of Legal and you will be responsible for handling a variety of legal endeavors for our global teams. Including regulation, privacy, corporate, commercial agreements, employment and compliance.This is an exciting opportunity to join a successful Hyper Growth startup and be part of establishing the legal function in the organization. We are searching for bright and passionate lawyers in a high-tech company or in a high-tech department of a quality law firm.What your day to day will look like:Review, draft, negotiate and interpret a variety of agreements to support the company's business, including NDAs, services, procurement, customers, software, data processing and data licensing agreements, and other complex agreements related to the company's domestic and international operations. Communicate with third-party bodies such as external counsel. Conduct legal analysis and research legal matters, draft legal opinions, memoranda, and briefing documents. Be part of designing and implementing company policies and procedures. Help promote legal, compliance and risk management best practices throughout the company. Corporate governance, grant of options, maintaining the Company's capitalization table and involvement in financing rounds. Requirements:Law Degree Required. Licensed to practice in Israel. 2 years of proven experience in negotiating and drafting commercial agreements, including NDAs, DPAs, SaaS and other types of related agreements. Knowledge and understanding of privacy and data protection laws. Strong organizational skills and ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively. English speaker with superb written and verbal communication skills. Prior in-house experience at a global tech company - an advantage. Outstanding negotiation skills; excellent communication skills; service-oriented; proactive; a team player; ability to work under pressure. In the News: The 5 Next Billion-Dollar Start-Ups of 20234 Tech CEOs Building Iconic BrandsLinkedIn Top Startups 2022: The 15 Israeli Companies on the RiseYou better believe it! We raised $35 million in our Round B!Tech Crunch: Walnut Growing 700% in 4 months!World Financial Review: Walnut Raises #35 millionTed Talk: How Walnut is Reshaping the Greater B2B Sales Experience

Title: Head of Go-to-Market Strategy
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Guesty is a start-up that provides an all-in-one platform that is innovating the short-term property management industry. In Guesty we build products that help property managers operate their inventory efficiently, improve guest experience, reduce costs and optimize the revenue generated from short-term stays.We’re looking for a Head of Go-to-Market Strategy to join our leading Marketing Department. To build go-to-market strategies for a variety of Guesty products and offerings. The ideal candidate demonstrates attention to detail and quality, along with the ability to clearly present our value proposition and describe the unique benefits of Guesty products.This position requires a data driven storyteller that can translate technical ideas. You will collaborate with cross-functional leaders and all aspects of product and marketing strategy, messaging, positioning, storytelling, go-to-market execution and analysis.The ideal candidate should be versed in B2B, B2C and SaaS.Requirements:4-8 years of experience as a product marketer/go-to-market strategist professional with 8+ years of experience in the B2B SaaS spaceExceptional storyteller, with exemplary written and verbal communication skills in EnglishPast experience in working closely with high level management, with the ability to translate technical concepts into successful Marketing strategy and executionHighly detail-oriented and organized, can-do team player with strong interpersonal and project management skillsPrevious people management experienceResponsibilities:The Head of Go-to-Market Strategy will implement and own product positioning and messaging, translating product functionality and technical details into key messaging, and value proposition, strategy, and executionWorks collaboratively with both our VP Marketing and internal partners to understand goals and metrics, and considers strategic cross-product/aggregate business metricsBuilds and lands growth plans. In partnership with the strategy & growth team, develops competitive strategies to drive target market share gains.Research and understand Guesty’s products and business model along with market insights and translate into concrete marketing strategy model GTM ownership; Drive product launches and develop holistic go-to-market marketing plans.Be a key contact with the product and business organizations; driving communications of product direction, positioning, key messages, and value proposition.Competitor Intelligence; build and keep up to date a competitor comparison matrix. Using this intelligence to inform new product development, pricing strategies and marketing tactics.Measurement; Define, track and report key performance indicators of engagement, usage and revenue.
Requirements: ['4-8 years of experience as a product marketer/go-to-market strategist professional with 8+ years of experience in the B2B SaaS space', 'Exceptional storyteller, with exemplary written and verbal communication skills in English', 'Past experience in working closely with high level management, with the ability to translate technical concepts into successful Marketing strategy and execution', 'Highly detail-oriented and organized, can-do team player with strong interpersonal and project management skills', 'Previous people management experience', 'The Head of Go-to-Market Strategy will implement and own product positioning and messaging, translating product functionality and technical details into key messaging, and value proposition, strategy, and execution', 'Works collaboratively with both our VP Marketing and internal partners to understand goals and metrics, and considers strategic cross-product/aggregate business metrics', 'Builds and lands growth plans. In partnership with the strategy & growth team, develops competitive strategies to drive target market share gains.', 'Research and understand Guesty’s products and business model along with market insights and translate into concrete marketing strategy model', 'GTM ownership; Drive product launches and develop holistic go-to-market marketing plans.', 'Be a key contact with the product and business organizations; driving communications of product direction, positioning, key messages, and value proposition.', 'Competitor Intelligence; build and keep up to date a competitor comparison matrix. Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who Connecteam is:Connecteam is a TLV-based startup that's on a mission to change the work experience for 80% of the world's global workforce - the deskless employees.Our business management platform helps thousands of businesses thrive by taking away the daily hustle and complexities of managing teams, so they can have the peace of mind to grow and run their business.What's the job?As Connecteam's customer success manager, you will be responsible for developing customer relationships that promote retention and loyalty. Your job is to work closely with our international customers through system characterization, training and implementation of new capabilities while focusing on retention, renewal and clients implementation of our product.All this of course with a very high level of customer satisfaction.The persona we're looking for:Service-orientedTeam playerStart-up mentalityAutodidactA will to conquer the market!Which qualifications you'll need:Native English speaker ( spoken and written)- MUSTExperience in B2B SaaS – 1 year of experience MUSTCustomer-facing experienceTech-savvy***The position requires availability during US business hours***Hiring process with us: At Connecteam, we aim to complete our hiring processes at lightning speed, keeping the time between when we receive your CV until you (hopefully) sign with us super short, communicative and transparent.Joining Connecteam Is The Smart Move:We build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we recognize the value in always nurturing and training them so they can go above and beyond in their skills and job duties. We make an impact on our customer's business. We are on a mission to provide managers of all business types and sizes with the tools they need to communicate, operate, engage, and run their deskless workforce. Our product offers them an effective and affordable solution to run their business. We get the job done. Connecteam employees are passionate in executing their job duties so they can drive the company forward and provide real value to our customers. We have fun! From weekly happy hours to holiday parties, we always enjoy each other's company (and good food, of course). Connecteam is like one big, happy family!Everyone is welcome. Connecteam is committed to building an encouraging, caring, and supportive environment. We share a responsibility to support our team and enrich their lives. Together we will shape the future of work!

Title: Operations Specialist
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are searching for a self-motivated and passionate Operations Coordinator to support the ongoing business of a Nayax Capital, a fintech startup growing within Nayax.The Operations Coordinator will be part of a small team, reporting to the CEO and the Chief of Product. This person will be responsible for Nayax Capital operations activities from customer order processing through completion while assuring on-Time product delivery.IN THIS POSITION YOU WILL:Manage relations with stakeholders in various departments in the organization, including Finance, Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, etc. Ensure all manual operations work smoothly. Support different initiatives taken by the company. Assist with different invoices, matching invoices to receiving reports and tracking payments. Provide general administrative support for all company related matters. Requirements:WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WITH:Proficient in English.Capability to work independently under limited supervision with attention to detail, accuracy, documentation, and follow-through.Customer oriented with strong organizational capabilities.Multi-tasking/planning and time management skills.Excel proficiency.Can do attitude.Previous experience with SAP – an advantage. Who we are:Nayax Capital is incubated within Nayax and is a new subsidiary of the latter, which aims to serve as Nayax financing arm. To watch the latest promotion video, click here: http://bit.ly/3ONNG45.Nayax is a leading global end-to-end retail technology platform for unattended & attended commerce. Our mission is to simplify commerce and payments for retailers while driving growth, optimizing operations, and enhancing consumer engagement.Nayax Israel is located in the prestigious Herzliya Hills, just a short drive north of Tel Aviv or a very short walk from the train station.Our open space offices accommodate our 400+ employees and when we’re not hard at work, you can find us enjoying an afternoon coffee on the balcony. We’re the largest Nayax site, housing over 20 different departments.For a glimpse of what it's like to work at Nayax, check out our Instagram account! https://bit.ly/3G3QDc4.Check out Nayax's page under "Best Cool Israeli Companies 2022" by Secret Tel-Aviv: https://bit.ly/3LqzElA.Nayax is constantly growing and we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic, innovative and eager individuals to join us in our growth!

Title: Global Events Team Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Guesty is seeking a creative and experienced Events Team Lead to join our dynamic Marketing team in Tel Aviv and manage our Events operation. This role, reporting to the Head of Marketing Programs, will manage a team of Event Marketing Managers and be responsible for producing Guesty’s events worldwide ranging from our flagship conference to virtual meetups to exhibition booths. This role is an excellent opportunity for a natural-born leader and hands-on team player. If you are entrepreneurial in spirit and have excellent project management skills, then this position is for you.Requirements:Skills & Requirements: 5+ years in B2B event management - managing conferences, exhibition booths and virtual events - experience in B2B SaaS preferableNative English speaker - a mustExperience managing a small in-house team and outsourced suppliers - a mustProven ability and desire to work in a fast-paced environment, to meet tight deadlines and to align with marketing budgetsExcellent communicator, collaborator, and creative thinker, with the ability to use data to inform all decisionsFamiliarity with sales, marketing, and project management software (i.e. Salesforce, Hubspot and Monday.com)Flexible work schedule and the willingness to travelExperience creating event content - a plusResponsibilities:Responsibilities:Manage a team of Event Marketing ManagersDevelop, plan and execute Guesty’s event initiatives globally, including sponsored and owned events, both in-person and virtually - with a focus on measurable outcomes.Oversee the planning and logistics for each of our in-person and virtual events, including venue sourcing, merchandise, printed materials, and more. This role will be both hands-on managing events, and overseeing the team managing other events.Conceptualize and work alongside the Content Team, to create event-related content, promoting Guesty’s offering to our target audience. This includes event themes, landing pages, virtual presentations, print materials, booth copy, email content for campaigns and more.Connect - and maintain constant communication - with associations, Guesty’s Marketplace partners and industry leaders/organizations on their owned events, uncovering relevant opportunities for our participation.Take the lead in planning GuestyVal, Guesty’s 3-day event for clients, prospects and partners, working with external and internal teams to ensure everything is aligned with our goals.Track key earned speaking opportunities as well as sponsorship opportunities. Work with teams across the company – from Sales to Strategy to Product - to identify and evaluate new event opportunities that will position Guesty as a thought leader and bring the right leads into our pipeline.Work with teams within Marketing and other departments to build processes for working together on cross-team projects.Own and manage the events budget, making sure all activities are in line with Guesty's lead generation efforts and contribute to our funnel of marketing activities.Generate in-depth reports together with our Performance team to showcase event ROI and track converted leads.
Requirements: ['5+ years in B2B event management - managing conferences, exhibition booths and virtual events - experience in B2B SaaS preferable', 'Native English speaker - a must', 'Experience managing a small in-house team and outsourced suppliers - a must', 'Proven ability and desire to work in a fast-paced environment, to meet tight deadlines and to align with marketing budgets', 'Excellent communicator, collaborator, and creative thinker, with the ability to use data to inform all decisions', 'Familiarity with sales, marketing, and project management software (i.e. Salesforce, Hubspot and Monday.com)', 'Flexible work schedule and the willingness to travel', 'Experience creating event content - a plus', 'Manage a team of Event Marketing Managers', 'Develop, plan and execute Guesty’s event initiatives globally, including sponsored and owned events, both in-person and virtually - with a focus on measurable outcomes.', 'Oversee the planning and logistics for each of our in-person and virtual events, including venue sourcing, merchandise, printed materials, and more. This role will be both hands-on managing events, and overseeing the team managing other events.', 'Conceptualize and work alongside the Content Team, to create event-related content, promoting Guesty’s offering to our target audience. This includes event themes, landing pages, virtual presentations, print materials, booth copy, email content for campaigns and more.', 'Connect - and maintain constant communication - with associations, Guesty’s Marketplace partners and industry leaders/organizations on their owned events, uncovering relevant opportunities for our participation.', 'Take the lead in planning GuestyVal, Guesty’s 3-day event for clients, prospects and partners, working with external and internal teams to ensure everything is aligned with our goals.', 'Track key earned speaking opportunities as well as sponsorship opportunities.', 'Work with teams across the company – from Sales to Strategy to Product - to identify and evaluate new event opportunities that will position Guesty as a thought leader and bring the right leads into our pipeline.', 'Work with teams within Marketing and other departments to build processes for working together on cross-team projects.', "Own and manage the events budget, making sure all activities are in line with Guesty's lead generation efforts and contribute to our funnel of marketing activities.", 'Generate in-depth reports together with our Performance team to showcase event ROI and track converted leads.']

Title: Payroll Accountant & Bookkeeper
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Nuvei is a trendy technology company and will be the facilitator of a modern payroll process that will be friendly and compelling for our employees and fully compliant with the changing regulatory requirements. We strive to adopt technologies that automate and streamline every aspect of the payroll process and to continuously improve the service to our employees, provide transparency and improve our internal monitoring, reporting, and controls.As a Payroll accountant and bookkeeper, you’ll be responsible for preparing monthly salaries for all employees and assisting with end-of-month closing.ResponsibilitiesResponsible for payroll process for 300+ employees – working with an outsourcing vendorPayroll data review and control; making sure data is accurate and setting processes for improvementsImplementation of the Hilan systemManage employee attendance, including new hires, terminations, vacation, military reserve, etc.Manage the attendance systems- pull reports, ongoing iteration with the HR department, and guidance of employeesReview and report employees’ taxes to tax authorities in IsraelOngoing interaction with the insurance agency, including preparation of the relevant forms for new hires and terminated employeesAct as a focal point for employee's payroll queriesPrepare month closing tasks - review of monthly payroll recording and reconciliation including analytical paper worksMaintain a high degree of service and confidentialityCollect, record, and reconcile supplier invoicesBank and credit card reconciliationEnd-of-month closing - support the monthly processAd-hoc projects as required.Requirements Certified Payroll accountant in Israel Certified bookkeeper (Level 2 or 3) Experience with the Priority system, SAPB1 - an advantage At least 2 years of experience in payroll calculation for more than 100 employees Experience in managing payroll & attendance processes within a high-scale growth global organization Solid working knowledge of payroll, including payroll taxes, social insurance, and compliance Strong knowledge of compliance and legal regulations for payroll & benefits Experience with Shiklulit, Michpal, and Hilan Payroll software is an advantage Excellent Excel skills Independent, and strong attention to details Ability to operate in a fast-paced environment, taking ownership and setting directionsBenefitsA challenging job in a fast-developing, international companyA friendly work environment where you can thrive and develop your skillsBest office location, above the train station in Tel Aviv / work-from-home optionsCompetitive remuneration package

Title: Community Associate
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: ReceptionistsAt Spaces, we call our receptionists Community Associates. Our customers come to us for an inspiring work environment. As one of our receptionists, you’ll help deliver it. How? By providing sparkling service. Going the extra mile. And making sure everyone who visits us feels totally at home.A typical day at SpacesYou arrive 15 minutes before your centre opens to make sure everything is ready to go. You make it your responsibility to order the first cappuccino of the day at the bar and make your round through the business club to make sure all lights are turned on and the place looks tidy.Slowly, the first members start to arrive and one of them asks you for the changed WiFi code. Afterwards, while digging through your emails, a guest walks in and says she’s coming to provide training in one of the meeting rooms. You check the meeting room agenda and notice that almost all of the meeting rooms will be occupied today. You take her to the right meeting room, but you find out that our catering partner forgot to put coffee in the room and make sure that this is still done.A bit later, a member asks you if his mail has already arrived; he’s expecting a really important letter. Later that morning, the mail comes in and you put it in the corresponding mailboxes – and send an email to the member that came by earlier, saying that his mail arrived and that it’s waiting for him in his mailbox.After a hectic morning, it’s time for lunch. You grab a homemade soup and a healthy salad together with your favourite colleagues in the restaurant.After lunch, you sit down with the Community Manager to discuss the organisation of next week’s summer event. However, he mentions that one of the members just had a baby. You take it upon yourself to organise an act of kindness from Spaces, and to congratulate the parents of the new-born. Once you’re done with ordering, a guest pops by to sign up for a membership. Because your Sales colleague isn’t available right now, you help the guest with the online registration. Once the registration is done, you immediately hook her up with a badge (and immediately arrange one for the new employee on the 4th floor who just emailed you as well).At 6:00pm, it’s time to gently ask the large group in meeting room 3 to wrap it up. Maybe they would like to join us for drinks at our weekly Friday drinks, or you direct them to that nice nearby restaurant you know so that they can grab a bite. Once the last people have left the building, and everything’s left behind nice and tidy, you head home to enjoy your eveningBring your personality to workYou Also Need To BeWe look for people who are sociable and outgoing and who can bring their own style to our fun, thriving work environment. Super customer-focused  A great team player  Someone who takes good care of their appearance  Confident using MS Office and other basic IT packages Last but not leastOn Top Of a Competitive Salary Package We Offer An inspiring work environment with room for your ideas  Lots of social events you won’t want to miss  Training and development
Requirements: ['Super customer-focused', 'A great team player', 'Someone who takes good care of their appearance', 'Confident using MS Office and other basic IT packages', 'An inspiring work environment with room for your ideas', 'Lots of social events you won’t want to miss', 'Training and development']

You will also be responsible for managing our internal network and supporting our staff.Requirements:Bachelor’s degree in IT, computer science, or a related field3 years of experience in IT managementStrong teamwork and communication skillsStrong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills Knowledge of industry-standard computer hardware and software systemsExperience with network administrationFamiliarity with our software platforms, including Okta, Google workspace and moreResponsibilities:Plan and oversee the installation and maintenance of computer systems, hardware, and networksAssist the IT department head with leading and training IT staff (2 persons)Develop and implement policies related to network security, disaster recovery, and IT infrastructureAnalyze resource utilization and develop strategies to optimize performanceEstablish, measure, and define IT goals and maintain an IT roadmapMonitor and analyze the success of IT initiatives and projects and continually develop and evaluate new technologies and tools for the companyDirect the activities of the help desk to ensure the IT needs of users are metManage development projects to integrate new technologies into existing systemsPerform ongoing support and maintenance of all hardware, software, and network componentsJob Qualifications and Skill Sets
