Title: מנהל/ת פרויקטים
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: למחלקת דיגיטל דרוש/ה מנהל/ת פרויקטים.כחלק מחברת ייעוץ גלובאלית, חטיבת Data and Analytics מפתחת מוצרים ומובילה פרויקטים בחזית הטכנולוגיה ועומדת מול הלקוחות הגדולים והמשפיעים בעולם.אנחנו מחפשים מנהל/ת פרויקטים לצוות הדיגיטל , שיוביל תהליכים טכנולוגיים, ינהל פרויקטים ויעמוד מול לקוחות החברה.התפקיד כולל בין היתר : הובלת פרויקטים ברמה טכנית הובלת תהליכים רוחביים בארגון ייעוץ וRESALE מול לקוחות החברה יכולת אפיון וכתיבת דרישות טכניות מול לקוחותRequirements: תואר רלוונטי- חובה ניסיון מעולם הייעוץ- חובה ניסיון בניהול פרויקטים טכנולוגיים- חובה ידע והבנה בתהליכים טכנולוגים כגון- אפיונים, פיתוח, בדיקות. ניסיון בPresale/ Resale מול לקוחות. יכולת התנהלות שוטפת באנגלית בכתב ובעל פההמשרה מיועדת לגברים, נשים ואנשים עם מוגבלות
Requirements: ['הובלת פרויקטים ברמה טכנית', 'הובלת תהליכים רוחביים בארגון', 'ייעוץ וRESALE מול לקוחות החברה', 'יכולת אפיון וכתיבת דרישות טכניות מול לקוחות', 'תואר רלוונטי- חובה', 'ניסיון מעולם הייעוץ- חובה', 'ניסיון בניהול פרויקטים טכנולוגיים- חובה', 'ידע והבנה בתהליכים טכנולוגים כגון- אפיונים, פיתוח, בדיקות.', 'ניסיון בPresale/ Resale מול לקוחות.', 'יכולת התנהלות שוטפת באנגלית בכתב ובעל פה']

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: PayBox continues to grow, and we are searching for a great and talented Product Manager.Responsibilities:Ownership of product life–cycle, responsibility for creating product innovation by answering customers' needs.Analyze market trends, competitive landscape, and new business opportunities.Manage road map in line with the company's strategyWrite product requirements, and prioritize product features and delivery plans.Work closely with cross-functional teams such as development, marketing, design, etc.Requirements:3+ years of product management experience in consumer-facing products (B2C) in mobile product/services management.Knowledge of the UI/UX environment, and highly creative capabilities.Experience in writing HLD specification documents.Experience in product development methodologies.Strong analytical skills, technical abilities, written and verbal communication, organizational skillsGreat communication and presentation skillsAdvantages:Experience within the payments space and/or servicing of credit products - a significant advantage.Experience working in highly cross-functional product areas, especially with partners with naturally conflicting objectives.About Us:We’re PayBox, the first digital wallet in Israel (with over 3 million users).We’re the only app that allows users to hold and manage their funds separately from their bank accounts. Through our easy and flexible technology, we’re leading the group money collection segment and allow different communities to achieve a variety of goals in a convenient and transparent way.But Paybox is not only about groups and communities. We’re a leading player in the world of digital payments, fund transfers, payments for businesses, client memberships, and benefits. Paybox is owned by Discount Bank and Shufersal Group, which have partnered to change the world of our day-to-day finances. PayBox is developing an innovative digital platform for financial services, which will change the way we do banking and compete with traditional banking players.Candidates Privacy Policy:הכתוב מטה מתייחס באופן שווה לכל מין ומגדר***** כללימסמך זה משקף את מדיניות החברה ביחס לאיסוף, שימוש והעברת מידע לצד ג' אודות מועמדים לעבודה בחברה, בכלל זה מי שמועמדותו נבחנה ונדחתה איסוף ושימוש במידע:תהליך המיון לעבודה בחברה כרוך באיסוף ושמירת מידע אודות המועמד, המידע שיאסף וישמר יכלול מידע כדלקמן:א. מידע שנמסר מרצון חופשי: פרטי מידע אשר ימסרו על-ידי המועמד מרצונו החופשי לרבות המידע המפורט בקו"ח, תעודות, המלצות, מידע רפואי (אם נמסר) מידע אודות מקורבים וכיוצ"ב.ב. מידע ממקורות מידע נוספים: החברה תהיה רשאית לאסוף מידע אודות המועמד מצדדי ג' לרבות ממאגרי מידע חיצוניים, חברות מיון והשמה, ממליצים (ששמותיהם יימסרו לחברה על-ידי המועמד בידיעה והסכמה שהחברה עשויה לפנות אליהם לבקש מידע נוסף אודות המועמד) ועוד. יובהר כי פניית החברה לחברת מיון והשמה לצרכים שונים של החברה תיעשה בהסכמתו של המועמד בלבד (אם כי עשויה להוות תנאי לבחינת מועמדותו על ידי החברה) ופרטיו עשויים להישמר בידי חברות המיון וההשמה בהתאם לתנאים שיפורטו על-ידי חברות אלה בפני המועמד בעת ביצוע הליך המיון וההשמה ובהתאם לדין. ביצוע הליך המיון וההתאמה כפוף להסכמת המועמד לתנאים אלה. בנוסף החברה תהיה רשאית לאסוף מידע אודות המועמד, על ידי פנייה למאגרי המידע הפנימיים של החברה.ג. המידע המפורט בסעיפים א-ב ישמר במאגרי המידע של החברה על ידי החברה או מי מטעמה בארץ או בחו"ל לרבות אצל ספקי שירותי ענן וישמש למטרות הבאות: ניהול הקשר עם המועמד; מיון המועמד לתפקידים בחברה; דיוור ישיר; מחקר; בדיקות אמינות; פניות עתידיות באשר למשרות שימצאו רלוונטיות עבור המועמד בהתאם לשיקול דעת החברה. העברת המידע לצדדים שלישייםא. החברה תהיה רשאית להעביר את המידע שנאסף אודות המועמדים לצדדים שלישיים לצורך עיבודו בהתאם למטרות האמורות לעיל. בנוסף, ייתכן שמידע אודות המועמדים ייחשף או יועבר לצדדים שלישיים המעניקים לחברה שירותים בתחום אבטחת המידע, שירותי ייעוץ, בקרה, מחקר ועמידה בדרישות החוק, ובכפוף לדין החל על החברה.ב. ייתכן שהמידע כאמור יועבר לצדדים שלישיים שנמצאים מחוץ לישראל, לרבות למדינות המעניקות הגנה פחותה בהיבטי פרטיות מאשר ההגנה הניתנת על פי דיני מדינת ישראל. למשל, ייתכן שחלק מהמידע יישמר בשרתים (שירותי ענן) בארצות הברית או במדינות נוספות. המועמדים מסכימים במפורש להעברת מידע לצורך שמירתו בשרתי ענן כאמור לכל מדינה בה החברה תבחר לקבל שירותי עיבוד מידע לפי שיקול דעתה הבלעדי. זכות עיון:מועמד לעבודה זכאי לעיין במידע השמור עליו במאגרי המידע של החברה ואף לבקש לתקן מידע זה אם אינו נכון, שלם או מדויק. לצורך מימוש זכות זו ובכל שאלה או הבהרה בנוגע לתנאים המפורטים לעיל - ניתן לעיין במדיניות הפרטיות של החברה המפורסמת באתר החברה ולפעול בהתאם לאמור בהיובהר כי מדיניות פרטיות המועמדים הנ"ל של החברה, חלה על מועמד לעבודה בחברה ולא יהא באמור במסמך זה כדי לגרוע מהאמור במדיניות הפרטיות של החברה.
Requirements: ["Ownership of product life–cycle, responsibility for creating product innovation by answering customers' needs.", 'Analyze market trends, competitive landscape, and new business opportunities.', "Manage road map in line with the company's strategy", 'Write product requirements, and prioritize product features and delivery plans.', 'Work closely with cross-functional teams such as development, marketing, design, etc.', '3+ years of product management experience in consumer-facing products (B2C) in mobile product/services management.', 'Knowledge of the UI/UX environment, and highly creative capabilities.', 'Experience in writing HLD specification documents.', 'Experience in product development methodologies.', 'Strong analytical skills, technical abilities, written and verbal communication, organizational skills', 'Great communication and presentation skills', 'Experience within the payments space and/or servicing of credit products - a significant advantage.', 'Experience working in highly cross-functional product areas, especially with partners with naturally conflicting objectives.', 'הכתוב מטה מתייחס באופן שווה לכל מין ומגדר*****', 'כללי', 'איסוף ושימוש במידע:', 'העברת המידע לצדדים שלישיים', 'זכות עיון:']

Title: Private Wealth Management Specialist

Text: Private Wealth Management - Single Family Office Salary: €negotiable, dependent on experience Location: Tel Aviv, IsraelA successful, entrepreneurial family with multiple business interests and investments are now seeking a Private Wealth Manager to oversee their estate. The family have successfully run and sold am number of businesses, and have assets and investments across a number of different sectors.The role will have the following responsibilities:advising on current investments, including property and stocks and sharestax planning across a varied portfolio of assets estate planning, to ensure growth in overall wealthliaising with brokers, buying and selling stocks on behalf of the clientFinancial administration and support You must have strong financial acumen and an appropriate educational background to support this. Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are making the future of Mobility come to life starting today.At Autofleet we support the world’s largest vehicle fleet operators and transportation providers to optimize existing operations and seamlessly launch new, dynamic business models - driving efficient operations and maximizing utilization.We’re looking for a Product Manager to join our product team and guide products from conception to launch.Product development at Autofleet is an extremely collaborative effort between engineering, design, and business teams. In your day-to-day you will define product requirements based on a deep understanding of our clients’ mobility operations and work closely with R&D during the development and release cycle. You’ll meet with customers and remain in close contact with the operations and business teams, keeping an ear to the ground of developing trends.Things here move quickly, so you’ll need the ability to think on your feet, breaking down complex problems into steps that drive product development at high velocity.What you’ll do:Play a key role at every stage of the product life cycle, from planning the roadmap, defining needs and writings PRDs, to working closely with the R&D team and managing releases to productionMeet with clients to make sure that our goals are aligned with their needsConduct industry research, defining problems and needs and discovering new opportunitiesBuild wireframes and work closely with our designers, making sure that our products have top-notch usability, meet requirements and look greatManage the QA and release process of featuresMonitor the adoption of new functionality and measure against the defined KPIsProactively communicate project status, issues and risks to the business teamKeep in close contact with our clients, making sure that we continue to deliver value, enhance our products, and learn from our clients’ experience.Requirements2+ years of Product Management experience in building SaaS B2B productsA solid technical understanding of web technologies and SaaS architectures and how these impact development time and releasesExperience working with B2B customers and extracting needs and requirements and translating these into scalable product featuresYou possess ownership abilities and entrepreneurial qualities. You’re self-driven and feel comfortable motivating, leading, and making decisions without consensusYou thrive in a fast-paced, agile work environment where needs can change quickly. You’re comfortable making quick changes to plans and pushing products to production that have an immediate impact on users around the globeBe the best multi-tasker you know, managing many projects in parallel Bachelor Degree in a technical field is preferredFantastic spoken and written EnglishBonus: Knowledge of SQL, JavaScript, Python or other coding languages

Text: Papaya Global is an established B2B tech unicorn in hypergrowth. We are on a mission to reimagine the payroll category with a game-changing, disruptive technology. Papaya Global is reinventing workforce management, global payroll and payroll payments to remove the friction of complexity and regulation create. Our automated platform helps companies hire, onboard, manage, and pay people in more than 160 countries. We don’t just cover the globe with our solution; we are global. We are comprised of people from different countries, different cultures, and different backgrounds. Diversity is our secret weapon.Papaya Global is looking for a prolific, professional content marketing writer with proven, significant hands-on experience in the fintech, HR, or strategy consulting/analyst firm space(s).The ideal candidate is tech savvy and excels at writing blog posts, thought leadership articles, and other long(er) form pieces.You will:Write mostly blog posts, thought leadership articles, ebooks, newsworthy industry analyses, and other such content materials on the word count's long(er) spectrum.Contribute towards other content team tasks, from the occasional email writing to ideation.Utilize your ability to catch, adopt, and convey someone else’s “voice” – and do so with multiple non-writing contributors.Work closely with internal stakeholders/subject matter experts to deliver content pieces that are crisp, explanatory, engaging, and thorough.Requirements:Strong content marketing/article portfolio in English – in the aforementioned field(s).Native-level English in writingProven ability to write in different voicesSufficiently tech savvy to work in a hi-tech environmentStrong work ethic and respect for deadlinesProven ability to convey technical ideas in engaging language

Text: MAЁLYS is one of the fastest-growing D2C beauty brands in the world. And now that we’ve gotten the formalities out of the way, let’s be frank. We are crushing it. How? We are breaking the mold of the body care industry with innovative targeted body care solutions for specific skin concerns, an intricate and unique combination of data and marketing, and a seriously sassy and bold brand voice.What’s our vibe? Title: Community Manager

Text: Join the original creators behind a blockbuster series with over 250,000,000 downloads, leading App stores charts and one of the world's leading mobile games bike racing category.Join one of the most well- funded, experienced teams in the Web3 gaming space today in making this natural gaming evolution come to life. They are beyond excited to be one of the first group of highly experienced game creators and publishers that will utilize the Web3 concepts, capabilities and innovative technologies to create and build massive gaming projects that will become the natural metaverse space for their players, competitive gamers and the Web3 guilds supported by the biggest brands from all over the world.We are now in search for highly motivated team players, passionate about Web3, Blockchain Gaming and the fast-growing crypto world. Its time to join in!We are looking for a qualified Community Manager to join the team. If you are a tech-savvy professional, experienced in social media, PR and promotional events, we would like to meet you.This is a unique opportunity to join the most exciting space in the gaming industry and take an important part in today’s most desirable positions in the gaming space, you will challenge yourself, your team and the company's growing international well-known brand, to the next level of excellence.Our ideal candidate is a master at managing communities on platforms like Discord and Telegram, is active in gaming communities and has a passion for blockchain and Web3. The candidate must have exceptional oral and written communication skills and is able to develop engaging content. You should be a ‘people person’ with great customer service skills and the ability to moderate online and offline conversations with our community.Ultimately, you should be able to act as the face and voice of the company's brand and manage all community communications.What Would Work Great Set and implement social media and communication campaigns to align with marketing strategies A deep understanding of community building on Telegram and Discord, including but not limited to bots and other necessary technicalities required.  Generate and maintain a conversation in all communities.  Set up, build and manage community accounts of platforms like Reddit and other relevant applications. Title: Marketing Content Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: PayEm is a global procurement and spend management platform that automates finance processes from request to reconciliation. By reducing friction and tedious tasks for finance teams, our clients increase productivity, reduce risk and lower operating costs to contribute to business growth. Title: Personal Assistant

Text: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded, medical start-up developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening in-hospital complications, such as malnutrition, ventilator-associated pneumonia, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster.We are looking for an experienced Personal Assistant for our CEO. In this role, you will provide high-level administrative support to the CEO. The ideal candidate will serve as the primary point of contact for all matters pertaining to the CEO’s office. Title: Executive Administration Assistant
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Fireblocks is an enterprise-grade platform delivering a secure infrastructure for moving, storing, and issuing digital assets. Fireblocks enables exchanges, lending desks, custodians, banks, trading desks, and hedge funds to securely scale digital asset operations through the Fireblocks Network and MPC-based Wallet Infrastructure. Fireblocks serves over 1,500 financial institutions, has secured the transfer of over $3 trillion in digital assets, and has a unique insurance policy that covers assets in storage & transit. Some of the biggest trading desks have switched to Fireblocks because it’s the only solution that CISOs and Ops Teams both love.We’re seeking an experienced Executive Assistant to support Tel Aviv based directors across multiple time zones. The ideal candidate will have exceptional communication skills and will have the ability to partner closely with the broader team and other cross functional teams.You will manage meeting cadence, lead and monitor internal projects. The ideal candidate should be well-organized, have great time management skills, and able to proactively act with limited guidance.In this role:Managing the executives calendar, including making appointments and prioritizing the most sensitive mattersProviding administrative assistance, such as writing and editing e-mails, drafting memos, and preparing communications on the executives behalfAssist in the preparation of regularly scheduled reportsBook travel arrangementsOrganize events and off-sitesHigh response rate to emails, messages, and other communicationsProvide general support to visitorsPlay a role in ensuring smooth day-to-day flow of communications within the team.Manage, coordinate, and support special projects as neededSupport with personal tasks if neededWork cooperatively with the administrative assistants team, in positive partnership to support each other smoothly﻿Requirements: 3 years of full-time, administrative experience directly supporting 2 or more executive members (Director Level or above)Knowledge of office management systems and proceduresSense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company’s successIncredibly organised and detail-orientedCritical thinker and problem-solving skillsAbility to prioritise multiple assignments quicklyTeam playerStrong interpersonal, written, and oral communication skillsGood time-management skillsGreat interpersonal and communication skillsStrong work ethicPast experience working in the tech or global industry - Advantage

Title: Quality Assurance Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Job Purpose And ScopeAssurance (QA) Manager to head-up & lead relevant operations within theAN Abbott Affiliate.To provide expert quality advice and support to the Abbott affiliate.To lead any QA activities as they arise.Core Job Responsibilities Maintain high standard quality systems, divisional policies/procedures and regulations related to Quality for the Affiliate. Manage and control an appropriate Quality system for the Affiliate. Ensure local Affiliate QA Policies and Procedures are up-to-date in accordance with applicable external local requirements/regulations and in accordance with Abbott 's global procedures. Where applicable, coordinate training programs related to Affiliate Quality System education, ensuring all relevant employees are trained & records maintained. Manage the Affiliate customer complaints system in compliance with divisional policies/procedures, within the designated IT system. Monitor status of complaints reports. Review complaint data regularly, identifying trends for continuous improvement & preventative actions. Manage the Affiliate NC/CAPA system in compliance with divisional policies/procedures, within the designated IT system. Provide input and assist other Functional areas regarding any QA-related activities and keep GM abreast of any practices that could impact Abbott 's products and/or processes. Conduct QA internal audits & facilitate/direct all external audits/regulatory inspections. Support Warehouse and or Distributor operation regarding all AN QA product compliance activity as required. Provide direct QA oversight to local Product finishing (e.g. over-labelling) activities if required. Evaluates, manages and monitors quality related Supplier performance in compliance with divisional policies/procedures, within the designated IT system. Participate in QA projects with global QA as required. Keep up to date with current best practice and guidelines relevant to the role. Ensure compliance of validation requirements for Affiliate processes, systems (including Quality related computer systems) and distribution centers. Review and approve master validation plans and validation protocols (if applicable).Position Accountability / ScopeEnsure that the affiliate quality systems are in alignment and in compliance with the Abbott Quality System and local regulations Direct ReportsComplaints Coordinator/QA SupportInteraction WithAffiliate Country ManagerFinanceMarketingSupply and DemandLogisticsRegulatory AffairsThird Party WarehousesExternal suppliersKnowledge / Education RequiredThird Level qualifications: Degree in Quality Assurance, Pharmacy, science or medical discipline.Minimum Experience RequiredAt least 2 years’ experience in a Quality Assurance role within the Nutrition or Pharmaceutical industry is essential.Knowledge and experience of GDP and GMP beneficial.People management experience beneficial but not essential.Minimum Skills RequiredProficient in spoken and written EnglishStrong written and oral communication skills with ability and confidence to speak up and present to all levels of the management.Accuracy and an eye for detail.Demonstrate ability to manage, motivate, coach direct reports.Analytical skills to digest and quickly grasp large amounts of data, and to recognize key issues / opportunities and act accordingly.Demonstrate responsibility for adhering to all local laws and with full compliance of policies/procedures.Strong interpersonal skillsCompetenciesTeamworkTake initiativeInnovationAdaptabilityEnthusiasm for achievementStrong numeric and analytical skillsPlanning and PrioritizingCalm with ability to work under pressureStrong interpersonal skillsMotivation to learnFunctional Standards IT Skills to keep up to date with new concepts, techniques, tools and technologies.IT skills: Excellent working knowledge of MS Excel and MS PowerPoint is required.This is a 6 month contract for maternity leave cover.

Title: BI Analyst
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We’re looking for a BI Analyst to join our BI team to assist in building and maintaining a robust analytics platform for internal and external purposes.As a BI Analyst, you will serve as an analytics expert, working closely with various departments and stakeholders across the organization helping to drive growth and success of our company.If you are excited to work in a cutting-edge big data environment, if you are eager to expand our data-driven culture and drive actionable insights to meet always changing business needs, we’d love to meet you!We are looking for someone with exceptional analytical skills who is resourceful, bright, proactive, works well independently and as part of a team and who will be passionate about what she or he does.Requirements:Proven 2 years of experience with Tableau and ability to communicate insights in a visual and slick manner.Strong SQL (at least 2 years) with experience in querying large and complex data sets.Excellent verbal and communication skills (in English).BSc/BA in a highly quantitative field such as Industrial Engineering / Economics / Statistics or equivalent academic knowledge.Bonus Points:Hands-on experience with Snowflake.Proficiency with Tableau Server.Experienced in various methods of predictive analytics.True passion for gaming (i.e. you identify yourself as a gamer).Experienced in the gaming industry.Familiar with Airflow.About Us:Overwolf is the world’s leading platform for in-game creators and gamers who build or consume user-generated content around their favorite games. We’re talking about some of the biggest AAA titles out there – games like Minecraft, League of Legends, World of Warcraft, PUBG, and Fortnite – to name just a few.The way people create and play games around the world is changing, and Overwolf is leading the revolution. We empower just about 100K creators to make the best games even better - giving them everything they need to create unique gaming experiences that serve more than 31M gamers every month.Our mission is to turn in-game creation into a new profession and build the next generation of games. And we’re just getting started.Are you ready to join the pack and shape the future of gaming?Responsibilities:In this role, you will:Serve as a cross-organization data champion, helping to drive growth and success.Identify data related key insights and needle movers across business units.Drive data value for both internal and external customers, presented in clear and aesthetic Tableau dashboards and reports.
Requirements: ['Proven 2 years of experience with Tableau and ability to communicate insights in a visual and slick manner.', 'Strong SQL (at least 2 years) with experience in querying large and complex data sets.', 'Excellent verbal and communication skills (in English).', 'BSc/BA in a highly quantitative field such as Industrial Engineering / Economics / Statistics or equivalent academic knowledge.', 'Hands-on experience with Snowflake.', 'Proficiency with Tableau Server.', 'Experienced in various methods of predictive analytics.', 'True passion for gaming (i.e. you identify yourself as a gamer).', 'Experienced in the gaming industry.', 'Familiar with Airflow.', 'Serve as a cross-organization data champion, helping to drive growth and success.', 'Identify data related key insights and needle movers across business units.', 'Drive data value for both internal and external customers, presented in clear and aesthetic Tableau dashboards and reports.']

Title: Business Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Artlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.Artlist consists of 4 products:Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platformArtgrid.io, a curated stock footage platformMotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photosFXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing softwareWe’re looking for a full-time Business Analyst to join our vibrant Data team in Tel-Aviv.Wake up for this:Own the business performance analysis and data visibility of all the metrics and KPIs, such as retention, conversion, MRR, LTV, ARPU etc. Responsible for developing a strong understanding of our business performance across all the activities, while developing and implementing a repeatable process for monitoring and reporting it.Synthesize business performance trends and proactively Identify opportunities for performance improvement.Work closely with different stakeholders (Marketing, Finance, operation teams etc.) to continuously collect feedback and define requirementsRequirements:At least 2 years of similar experience - MUSTExcellent analytical skills, combined with a broad and comprehensive business vision.Data story-telling expert; ability to communicate with senior management, to deliver & explain insights and recommendations.Quick-thinking, fast learner and problem solver.Readiness to work in a high paced, dynamic and challenging environmentExcellent hands-on SQL skills - MUSTExpertise in a data visualization tool - MUST (Tableau - big advantage)Master abilities in Excel and PowerPoint.Excellent English skills

Title: Community Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Join the original creators behind a blockbuster series with over 250,000,000 downloads, leading App stores charts and one of the world's leading mobile games bike racing category.Join one of the most well- funded, experienced teams in the Web3 gaming space today in making this natural gaming evolution come to life. They are beyond excited to be one of the first group of highly experienced game creators and publishers that will utilize the Web3 concepts, capabilities and innovative technologies to create and build massive gaming projects that will become the natural metaverse space for their players, competitive gamers and the Web3 guilds supported by the biggest brands from all over the world.We are now in search for highly motivated team players, passionate about Web3, Blockchain Gaming and the fast-growing crypto world. Its time to join in!We are looking for a qualified Community Manager to join the team. If you are a tech-savvy professional, experienced in social media, PR and promotional events, we would like to meet you.This is a unique opportunity to join the most exciting space in the gaming industry and take an important part in today’s most desirable positions in the gaming space, you will challenge yourself, your team and the company's growing international well-known brand, to the next level of excellence.Our ideal candidate is a master at managing communities on platforms like Discord and Telegram, is active in gaming communities and has a passion for blockchain and Web3. The candidate must have exceptional oral and written communication skills and is able to develop engaging content. You should be a ‘people person’ with great customer service skills and the ability to moderate online and offline conversations with our community.Ultimately, you should be able to act as the face and voice of the company's brand and manage all community communications.What Would Work Great Set and implement social media and communication campaigns to align with marketing strategies A deep understanding of community building on Telegram and Discord, including but not limited to bots and other necessary technicalities required.  Generate and maintain a conversation in all communities.  Set up, build and manage community accounts of platforms like Reddit and other relevant applications.  Respond to comments and users queries in a timely manner Monitor and report on feedback and online comments and reviews Lead experiments that help scale the company's community programs and their impact Report on the health of the community servers, and make recommendations for improvement Responsible for managing all moderators on communities  Building and executing a strategy to drive community growth and engagement Organize and participate in events to build community and boost brand awareness Coordinate with Marketing, PR and Communications team members and suppliers to ensure brand consistency Liaise with Development and Business Development departments to stay updated on new products and features Build relationships with users, potential customers, industry professionals and journalists Stay up-to-date with digital technology trendsQualifications Proven work experience as a community manager Capable of working on your own initiative and unsupervised Experience launching community initiatives (e.g. building an online forum, launching an ambassador program, creating an event series and writing an email newsletter) Ability to identify and track relevant community metrics (e.g. repeat attendance at events) Excellent verbal communication skills Excellent writing skills Hands on experience with social media management for brands Ability to interpret website traffic and online customer engagement metrics Knowledge of online marketing and marketing channels Attention to detail and ability to multitask

Title: Sales Operations Manager
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports is one of the world’s fastest-growing sports-tech companies and the developer of an AI-based solution for real-time content creation and distribution.Why WSC Sports You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, machine learning, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, NHL, DAZN, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!What you’ll do:Design, implement and improve workflows and processes between the sales team and other teams and stakeholders within the organizationOKRs tracking, including constant insights and areas for improvement. Business reviews, forecast and pipe, goals distribution and moreProvide hands-on cover and support for all Sales needs related to Dashboard maintenance, reporting, tooling, and general FAQsProvide the Business Development team with operational support, process tracking, monitoring and analytics; Implement sales processes, procedures and policiesResponsible for the ongoing integrity of data entered in the CRM systemRequirements:What You'll Need:BSc. Industrial Engineering, Economist or other business-oriented field+3 years of sales/business operations experience or similar positionAbility to drive processes end-to-end from concept to executionAbility to extract and turn reports and dashboards into insights and actionsAdvanced skills in Excel as a basic understanding of relational database conceptsExcellent communication and critical thinking skills to understand sales processes at a company and individual sales rep levelStrong planning and process orientationStrong analytical skillsCapable of independently analyzing data and building reports to effectively communicate trends, patterns and predictionsAttention to detailsExperience with BI platforms - Advantage

Title: RESPONSABLE PLAIDOYER & PARTENARIATS INTERNATIONAUX H/F  — Contrat à Durée Déterminée (CDD)
Location: Rishon LeZion, Center District, Israel
Text: MISSIONLe Groupe SOS est un groupe associatif, leader de l’entrepreneuriat social. Il regroupe 650 associations, établissements et services, qui combattent, agissent et innovent au profit des personnes en situation de vulnérabilité, des générations futures et des territoires.A l’international, nos 10 entreprises sociales et associations internationales réunissent 500 salariés dans 40 pays. Nous travaillons au renforcement de capacités avec nos ONGs (Planète Urgence, PLAY, Santé Sud, Pulse, PPI, Ateliere Fara Frontiere) ainsi qu’au changement systémique avec nos entreprises sociales et think tank (Groupe SOS Consulting, Impact Campus, Impact tank).La.le Responsable Plaidoyer & Partenariats internationaux travaille au quotidien et en étroite collaboration avec le Directeur général en charge de l’international du Groupe SOS.Cette offre vise un CDD de remplacement dans le cadre d’un congé maternité.Missions Stratégie de plaidoyer et de partenariats– Participe à la réflexion stratégique quant au développement et aux actions de plaidoyer international du Groupe SOS– Coordonne les instances de réflexion stratégique internes (comités de direction, séminaire stratégique)– Apporte sa contribution aux documents relatifs au positionnement stratégique des organisations internationales du Groupe SOS Gestion de partenariats et relations institutionnelles– Coordonne l’instance de réflexion stratégique internationale du Groupe SOS (Advisory Board)– Coordination de la stratégie du plaidoyer international du groupe et de sa participation à des réseaux internationaux (e.g. Coordination Sud, EVPA, OCDE, Catalyst 2030, World Economic Forum), gestion de relations institutionnelles de haut niveau– Contribution à la prospection de partenaires internationaux du Groupe SOS Plaidoyer– Veille, recherche et analyse de l’écosystème de l’Économie sociale et solidaire et de la solidarité internationale– Contribution à la rédaction de contenu intellectuel en lien avec le changement systémique et l’Économie sociale et solidaire (tribune, analyses), ainsi que sur 4 grandes transversales : genre, climat, numérique et mesure d’impact– Soutien aux organisations internationales du Groupe SOS pour les appuyer dans leurs propres travaux de plaidoyer Événementiel– Organisation de prises de parole des dirigeant.e.s internationaux du Groupe SOS, avec notamment l’organisation d’un événement de haut niveau prévu en avril prochain (programmation, invitations, relations institutionnelles)– Gestion des relations presse en lien avec la direction de la communication et des relations presse du siège du Groupe SOS– Potentielle prise de parole à des événements, forums ou tables-rondes Management– Supervision d’un(e) Chargé.e de communication en stagePROFILVous cumulez au moins 5 ans d’expérience professionnelle, passés au sein d’une ou plusieurs ONG, organisations internationales, entreprises sociales internationales et/ou cabinets de conseil. Vous y officiez en tant que responsable plaidoyer, responsable grands comptes, responsable des partenariats ou équivalent.Vous êtes familier-e du secteur de la solidarité internationale et adhérez aux valeurs et au modèle de l’entrepreneuriat social.Vous êtes autonome, polyvalent-e, et rigoureux-se. Vous avez d’excellentes capacités relationnelles, d’analyse et de synthèse, et maîtrisez parfaitement le français et l’anglais, à l’écrit et à l’oral.Votre énergie, votre créativité et votre pragmatisme seront des atouts essentiels.Vous aimez rencontrer des nouvelles personnes ! Vous adhérez aux valeurs et au modèle de l'entrepreneuriat social.  Convention collective : CCN Syntec : Sociétés de conseil
Requirements: ['Stratégie de plaidoyer et de partenariats', 'Gestion de partenariats et relations institutionnelles', 'Plaidoyer', 'Événementiel', 'Management', "Vous adhérez aux valeurs et au modèle de l'entrepreneuriat social.", 'Convention collective : CCN Syntec : Sociétés de conseil']

Title: Financial Operation Coordinator
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Rewire is a young and dynamic startup creating an International Financial Services Platform for migrants. Rewire provides a game-changing all-in-one solution that is transparent, cost-effective, and simple to use.We are looking for a passionate Junior Finance Operation Analyst who will become the driving force of Rewire’s growing team by finding competent, ambitious and kind people to join the team.You will supervise all kind of processes relate to the financial side of the company’s operations such as cash flow management, supervising cash balance, maintaining banks and other financial partners accounts and relationships and much moreYou will report to and work closely with the Director of finance and treasury. You will play an important role in setting and executing our financial operation process at Rewire.Skills and Competencies: Supervise the company’s operational cash flow on a daily basis according to the activity requirements and volumes. Ensuring the company's cash flow is adequate to allow it to operate effectively Prepare and review the cash balance report on a daily basis, including reporting to management and other stakeholders in the company Partner with other functions in the company to identify and manage day-to-day cash needs and facilitate global cash flow forecasting process Assisting with managing the company’s foreign currency balances and minimizing the market risk. Maintaining relationships with the banks, exchanges, and other financials partners, including bank account opening, negotiation on financial terms and onboarding new financial partners Daily resolution of all bank reconciliation items Working closely with R&D team on maintaining and improving the company’s internal systems Ensuring all related processes are documented appropriatelyRequirements: Knowledge in various fields in the financial industry, such as banking, cashflow management, foreign currency exchanges, financial markets, etc. Previous work experience in such relevant role i.e. finance operation, treasury, banking etc. Analytical abilities, problem solving, hands on, with high attention to details and accuracy Excellent time management, organizational with the ability to work under strict timetables, high commitment to the role and tasks Must have ability to multitask and work independently and as a member of a group Excellent written & verbal communication skills in English and Hebrew Strong Microsoft Excel skills, Advantage: experience of working with financials systems and BI tools Advantage: BA in economics, accounting or other relevant field
Requirements: ["Supervise the company’s operational cash flow on a daily basis according to the activity requirements and volumes. Ensuring the company's cash flow is adequate to allow it to operate effectively", 'Prepare and review the cash balance report on a daily basis, including reporting to management and other stakeholders in the company', 'Partner with other functions in the company to identify and manage day-to-day cash needs and facilitate global cash flow forecasting process', 'Assisting with managing the company’s foreign currency balances and minimizing the market risk.', 'Maintaining relationships with the banks, exchanges, and other financials partners, including bank account opening, negotiation on financial terms and onboarding new financial partners', 'Daily resolution of all bank reconciliation items', 'Working closely with R&D team on maintaining and improving the company’s internal systems', 'Ensuring all related processes are documented appropriately', 'Knowledge in various fields in the financial industry, such as banking, cashflow management, foreign currency exchanges, financial markets, etc.', 'Previous work experience in such relevant role i.e. finance operation, treasury, banking etc.', 'Analytical abilities, problem solving, hands on, with high attention to details and accuracy', 'Excellent time management, organizational with the ability to work under strict timetables, high commitment to the role and tasks', 'Must have ability to multitask and work independently and as a member of a group', 'Excellent written & verbal communication skills in English and Hebrew', 'Strong Microsoft Excel skills, Advantage: experience of working with financials systems and BI tools', 'Advantage: BA in economics, accounting or other relevant field']

Title: Customer Support Team Leader
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Our Operations Team is growing and it's now time for our Support Team to find a leader, someone who can work with the team to offer our customers excellent customer service.As vHive’s Head of Customer support you will be accountable for all aspects of the day-to-day operation of the customer support staff ensuring the team provides all customers with an efficient, professional high quality support service in accordance with the Service Level AgreementsJob DescriptionDay-to day management of Technical Support team located remotely in different time zones around the world (shift coordination, personal development, technical training and general people management related duties)Lead individuals effectively. Mentor and develop Analysts within the team, enabling them to pro-actively and effectively resolve technical faults and queriesEnsure service activity and performance is managed effectively to deliver against agreed KPIs & SLAsDevelop, manage, and maintain the vHive’s online support system, including ticketing, Knowledgebase articles and support documentationIdentify, and provide input on recurring, systemic, or high complexity issues and share that information with other technical teams when relevantDefine, implement, manage and monitor customer and technical support processes and procedures on a regular basis and in particular:Produce weekly and monthly summary management reports on technical support ticketsEnsure that the incoming support requests are monitored and actioned effectivelyReview all team members performance on a regular basis and offer guidance and advice where necessaryEnsure the workload is evenly distributed amongst the teamEnsure the team provides effective correct and prompt resolutionsRequirements:Minimum of 3 years in a global customer-facing technical support and/or customer service management roleCustomer driven, proactively seeking to exceed customer expectationsA strong focus on quality and solution drivenEffective handling of customer complaintsExperience in developing and leading team members across the globe with excellent interpersonal and communication skillsThe ability to train staff and provide meaningful feedbackAdditional Desirable QualificationsExcellent English Language skillsGood French Language skills is an advantageExperience with Drones, photogrammetry and CAD
Requirements: ['Day-to day management of Technical Support team located remotely in different time zones around the world (shift coordination, personal development, technical training and general people management related duties)', 'Lead individuals effectively. Mentor and develop Analysts within the team, enabling them to pro-actively and effectively resolve technical faults and queries', 'Ensure service activity and performance is managed effectively to deliver against agreed KPIs & SLAs', 'Develop, manage, and maintain the vHive’s online support system, including ticketing, Knowledgebase articles and support documentation', 'Identify, and provide input on recurring, systemic, or high complexity issues and share that information with other technical teams when relevant', 'Define, implement, manage and monitor customer and technical support processes and procedures on a regular basis and in particular:', 'Produce weekly and monthly summary management reports on technical support tickets', 'Ensure that the incoming support requests are monitored and actioned effectively', 'Review all team members performance on a regular basis and offer guidance and advice where necessary', 'Ensure the workload is evenly distributed amongst the team', 'Ensure the team provides effective correct and prompt resolutions', 'Minimum of 3 years in a global customer-facing technical support and/or customer service management role', 'Customer driven, proactively seeking to exceed customer expectations', 'A strong focus on quality and solution driven', 'Effective handling of customer complaints', 'Experience in developing and leading team members across the globe with excellent interpersonal and communication skills', 'The ability to train staff and provide meaningful feedback', 'Excellent English Language skills', 'Good French Language skills is an advantage', 'Experience with Drones, photogrammetry and CAD']

Title: VP R&D
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Trusstor is a young, fast-growing construction-tech company disrupting the process of construction site operations.We’re breaking down the construction production floor, analyzing and reconstructing it - literally!Focusing on data, Trusstor enables a more productive, efficient, and safe building process.Position:Be a strategic partner and advisor in terms of technology, innovation, know-how, R&D strategy, and program execution as well as being a key member of the senior management team of the Group.Ensure that R&D projects are delivered on time and that the products meet the specifications agreed at the outset.Responsible for ensuring that the R&D team is structured and organized for long-term success.In charge of the development, QA, and DevOps efforts of the company.Requirements:What You'll DoDrive the long-term roadmap and detailed product development plans that support the company's strategic business plans.Managing the entire range of development activities from product requirements, through design, verification and validation including supporting product transfer to production.Responsible for a range of technical disciplines including software, hardware integrations, cloud, testing, DevOps, and algorithm development.Balance the requirements between the disciplines and manage development activities according to related tradeoffs.Provide technical supervision and support for the ongoing production of products including guidance, product investigations, problem-solving, and implementation of solutions.What You'll NeedMinimum of 8 years of experience in progressive research and development leadership roles that develop and manufacture SaaS products.Experience in setting, scaling, and managing the research and development function, with the proven ability to attract, inspire, motivate and retain top-tier talent.Proven ability to establish, articulate, and implement a concrete product development strategy that clearly aligns with corporate and commercial goals.Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both Hebrew and English.B.Sc. in Computer Science or in a relevant field – an advantage
Requirements: ["Drive the long-term roadmap and detailed product development plans that support the company's strategic business plans.", 'Managing the entire range of development activities from product requirements, through design, verification and validation including supporting product transfer to production.', 'Responsible for a range of technical disciplines including software, hardware integrations, cloud, testing, DevOps, and algorithm development.', 'Balance the requirements between the disciplines and manage development activities according to related tradeoffs.', 'Provide technical supervision and support for the ongoing production of products including guidance, product investigations, problem-solving, and implementation of solutions.', 'Minimum of 8 years of experience in progressive research and development leadership roles that develop and manufacture SaaS products.', 'Experience in setting, scaling, and managing the research and development function, with the proven ability to attract, inspire, motivate and retain top-tier talent.', 'Proven ability to establish, articulate, and implement a concrete product development strategy that clearly aligns with corporate and commercial goals.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both Hebrew and English.', 'B.Sc. in Computer Science or in a relevant field – an advantage']

Title: Assistant Controller
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Lusha is a growing startup looking for a talented Assistant Controller with a business approach to join our Accounting team and help to strengthen our Finance posture of the company’s financial processes.If you are a pro at analyzing financial data, can make calculations during sleep, interested in taxes, and you are creative in combining compliance requirements and accounting standards with financial processes - continue reading because this may very well be what you are looking for!What will you be doing?Maintain compliance with U.S. law - Income tax, state tax, and other reports for the US subsidiariesControl the U.S. payroll processes - Overseeing payroll agency work, including handling employee benefits.P2P - Supervise the work of the AP team to ensure the accuracy of financial records and authorize invoices for payments for the US entities.Take part of the monthly, quarterly and annual closing processSupport, guide and supervise of the process of credit card usage (PayEm) by U.S. employeesTake part in preparing the IL Tax reports and other Israeli-related tasks upon requestFinancial reports and analysisAd-Hoc tasks as requiredYou willBe the focal point of the US siteWork, interact and coordinate with colleagues in various operational departments to ensure proper accounting treatment, execution of accounting functions and reporting of results. Have a significant impact on how the financial processes in the company will be conductedReport to Lusha’s Controller.You areA team player. Working with colleagues, debating, analyzing and creating procedures for the requirements and needs of our organization.Creative. Creativity is critical for this role to support our growth along with strengthening regulatory and tax compliance without delaying business processes.Communicative. You will be a focal point for many departments in the organization and will be required to address financial issues. This requires professionalism, patience and a pleasant and service-minded approach.Self Learner. Bring innovation into the company by learning the business and financial needs and implementing new tools to support the fast growth of our company. Detail-Oriented. Noticing every minor change, and foreseeing any potential problems, big and small.Requirements:RequirementsAt least 3 years of experience in a Big 4 accounting firm auditing global hi-tech companies or working at global hi-tech companiesCPA with a Big 4 firm experience - high-tech departmentsAdvanced proficiency in spoken and written EnglishProficient knowledge of US GAAPStrong Microsoft Excel skillsFamiliarity and understanding of transfer pricing models and international tax planningProven ability to execute on-demand projectsNice to HaveKnowledge in ERP/CRM Systems - NetSuite and SalesforcePrevious experience as an assistant controller in a SaaS companyBeing introduced by a Lusha employeeWhy Lusha?Lusha connects you to your most relevant potential customers by creating simple, self-served products that provide access to meaningful and insightful B2B data. We offer ways to leverage data as an enabler for better, smarter and faster conversions at every stage of the customer lifecycle. Lusha was named Top 100 G2 Best Software Company and Top 100 Fastest-Growing product in 2021. Based in the center of Tel Aviv, Lusha is a fast-growing startup that offers its 300+ employees the opportunity to take an active role in shaping the future of the company. While all of us are dedicated to that mission, we surely know how to have a good time.

Title: Content Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: AI21 Labs (makers of Wordtune) is changing the way writers work, using the latest and most powerful AI technology. This is probably the most interesting opportunity for writers today!As a content manager at AI21 Labs, you’ll be responsible for overlooking the creation of helpful, well-researched, and informative content. You will be part of a team that produces industry leading content that spans the entire content creation spectrum: articles, videos, case studies, social media content and more.Requirements:Native English speaker - must!At least 2 years of experience writing content, preferably in tech/SaaS settings.Experience in researching topics.A true passion for writing and editing.Basic knowledge of SEO best practices.Self-starter, able to find opportunities and take initiative.Please provide writing samples with your resume.CMS management and maintenance skills (Webflow experience is a major plus).Experience in managing a content workflow (Monday experience is a plus).Role and Responsibilities:Collaborate with writers, designers and other content creators, both internal and external to the company.Align content efforts around revenue and SEO results.Develop new ideas and concepts to enrich AI21 Labs’ content strategy.Stay up-to-date on content marketing and writing news and trends by researching industry-related topics.Manage blog content calendarBrainstorm article ideasCommunicate with writersManage content creation workflowImprove website SEOOutreach websites for guest posts and appearancesConduct keyword researchProduce monthly content reportsAbout Us:AI21 Labs was co-founded by AI luminaries and serial entrepreneurs Prof. Amnon Shashua (Hebrew U, Mobileye), Prof. Yoav Shoham (Stanford, Google), and Ori Goshen (8200, Crowdx). The company is set to reimagine the way we interact with text, making reading and writing an AI-first experience. It is also one of the world's leading NLP research labs, conducting basic research in the field and publishing award winning papers in the prominent AI conferences.The company’s product portfolio includes Wordtune, a writing companion tool used daily by millions across the world, that helps you rephrase your writing to say exactly what you mean. Wordtune Read, an AI reader that summarizes long documents so you can understand more, faster. And AI21 Studio, helping developers and businesses use cutting-edge language models, with no NLP expertise required.
Requirements: ['Native English speaker - must!', 'At least 2 years of experience writing content, preferably in tech/SaaS settings.', 'Experience in researching topics.', 'A true passion for writing and editing.', 'Basic knowledge of SEO best practices.', 'Self-starter, able to find opportunities and take initiative.', 'Please provide writing samples with your resume.', 'CMS management and maintenance skills (Webflow experience is a major plus).', 'Experience in managing a content workflow (Monday experience is a plus).', 'Collaborate with writers, designers and other content creators, both internal and external to the company.', 'Align content efforts around revenue and SEO results.', 'Develop new ideas and concepts to enrich AI21 Labs’ content strategy.', 'Stay up-to-date on content marketing and writing news and trends by researching industry-related topics.', 'Manage blog content calendar', 'Brainstorm article ideas', 'Communicate with writers', 'Manage content creation workflow', 'Improve website SEO', 'Outreach websites for guest posts and appearances', 'Conduct keyword research', 'Produce monthly content reports']

Title: QA Team Lead
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: About GROOLocation Kfar Saba, Israel﻿We are GROO (previously Groupon), The master of eCommerce in Israel, and the largest eCommerce brand.We have been recently acquired by Melisron Group, the leading and most professional shopping centers group in Israel, and evolving to become their digital division with many fascinating new projects!We are looking for a QA Team lead to be responsible for our production environment (both manual and automatic testing).How will your day-to-day look like?First, you will be in charge of getting into our users had and imagine every relevant scenario they can come out with.Also, you will be in charge of:Write test plans for both day-to-day and strategic featuresCoordinating releases to productionTesting new features and performing regression testingImplementing automation testing on all platformsCollaborate closely with other team members and departmentsOwn the features release lifecycle through our production environment!Who are you?We believe that people should enjoy fun opportunities more often. Title: AR Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who are we?Mindspace is the rapidly growing global provider of inspiring coworking space for teams of all sizes. Our community consists of enterprise companies and established startups, as well as small businesses, entrepreneurs, and creative freelancers.Who is the AR specialist?This full-time position is based in Tel Aviv and will be Managing our Members' processes and accounting.Your day at Mindspace.With all the relevant experience and extra-motivation, you go above and beyond to keep our members satisfied and manage accurate books recordings. From bank reconciliation to customer billing, you are a true numbers person and are highly organized.The main responsibilities of an AR specialist at MINDSPACE include (but are not limited to):Responsible for performing billing and collections for Mindspace Israel locationsAssist and support the finance team and operation department in the company with variety of tasksProven ability to review invoices and payments on accounts and demonstrate good Judgement in resolving discrepancies and cleansing dataSupport and service members with various financial requestsParticipating in monthly closing processesMaintaining members' records in SAP B1 and Sales Force Requirements:Experience & Minimum Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree (accounting, finance, industrial engineering, economics preferred)At least 2 years of experience as a finance admin ,FP&A, AR or Accounts manager - advantageAt least 2 years of experience providing administrative support in a fast paced environment and dealing with huge database - advantageDemonstrated ability to communicate effectively orally and in writingDemonstrated ability to maintain effective working relationshipsExpert Excel skillsFluent Hebrew and English language skills essentialExcellent follow-up skillsStrong customer service skillsExperience working with SAP B1 and Sales Force - an advantageCritical Competencies for Success:You must have strong data entry skills and a knack for numbers – be highly attentive to details and keep your finger on the pulseGood organizational skills are key to getting you far in this position, so things don’t fall out of balanceYou must be a thorough and accurate worker who is able to recognize errors when made, and takes the necessary steps to correct themYou should be a fast-paced mover with strong interpersonal relation skills, who is able to work efficiently both independently and in a teamDon’t let rules confine you – thinking outside the box is necessary at such a role in such a dynamic environmentYou must be a great communicator who is able to convey messages in a clear and concise manner (in English)Excited about MINDSPACE; you are ready to live, eat and breathe MINDSPACE, spreading the love to everyone you encounter

Title: Store Success Manager ( HaSharon area)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Shopic is an AI start-up specializing in retail solutions and shopping experiences. Our technology turns any shopping cart into a smart cart. Powered by computer vision and data analytics, the cart lets shoppers grab the products they want and skip the checkout lines when they leave the store.We are based in Tel Aviv, deployed by significant grocery chains worldwide, and employ some of the best minds in the AI sector. We are looking for a new member to join our team, the Store Operations Manager will be part of and lead the on-site operational team and provide training and support. As a Store Operations Manager, you will act as the primary interface between the customer and Shopic.Work will consist of conducting day-to-day operations to adhere to project deadlines, providing technical support, training shoppers, managing project schedules, and tracking on-site. Streamline data collection efforts, promote shoppers' adoption, and manage Shopic’s equipment inventory at the store. Working at a global retail store, the Store Operations Manager will support a cutting-edge technological solution and be the focal point of contact.Requirements:2+ years Operations/ Project Management experience (retail – advantage)Experience in Monitor and control on site team KPISales orientedResourceful, out-of-the-box thinker and problem solverStrong mentorship and training skillsProven mechanical and technical abilitiesExperienced with Software delivery projectsPassion for serviceSelf-motivated and able to work independently, outside of the officeResponsabilities:Manage, lead, train and support an operational teamAddress customer needs, escalate issues to relevant teams at Shopic, and monitor smooth processesBeing a Shopic ambassador at the store, advocate our product among retail employees and consumersMaintain equipment stability and manage its storageCreate and promote procedures and best practices for operational processesProvide on-site support and assistance

Title: Data Scientist (Tel Aviv)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Chaos Lab's mission is to secure the future of finance. We’re looking for a passionate Data Scientist who can help us build ground breaking solutions for handling risk and decision making in the web3 world.At Chaos Labs, we’re developing a cloud security platform for DeFi (Decentralized Finance) protocols through run-time simulations. We work with protocols to automate economic security, risk management, parameter selection optimization, and battle test protocols through the most chaotic (🤗) market conditions. Our platform and tools are used by leading protocols, helping them manage and secure over $50 Billion in assets.Chaos Labs was founded by ex-Facebook, Apple, Instagram, Amazon, and Microsoft engineers, being 8200 (Israeli Cyber Intelligence) and Technion alumni. We’re looking for curious, hungry data scientists and engineers to join the team and help define the security and risk stack of the future.ResponsibilitiesWork alongside leading crypto engineers and product managers to deep dive into market leading protocols and help drive game changing insights and predictions (see example)Lead and drive innovative research to understand how different actors in the crypto market behave and interact, and drive modeling of such actors into Chaos Labs’ simulation platformPresent your insights and suggestions to audiences both internally and externally with the opportunity to publish industry-defining researchExplore new algorithms and techniques to surface insights in DeFi security and optimizationsBuild data models and visualizations of public blockchain data and simulation results that provide intuitive analytics to customers such as AAVE, Uniswap, dydx, Chainlink and othersRequirements4+ years of professional experience in Data Science - a mustPrevious experience in FinTech or DeFi domains - a mustBroader understanding of crypto and blockchain ecosystem - a plusSolid understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithmsHands-on experience with Python and relevant data science packagesYou love working in small, dynamic, fast-paced teams that encourage you to learn and growBonus points for prior web3 experience using Dune or writing smart contractsLet's connect! Please send your resume today to careers@chaoslabs.xyz

Title: Stock Runner
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About The JobLouis Vuitton offers a fantastic opportunity to join the Brand as a Stock Runner in Tel Aviv.As the professional in charge of Stock & Administration, you will secure back-of-house efficiency, in line with the standards of the Brand.You will ensure smooth operations, to enable the store team to maximize the time spent with Clients, and work across all of Louis Vuitton's product categories.Duties & ResponsibilitiesMaintain the stock inventory in a perfect condition ensuring an efficient and logical organization of all stock rooms (product and packaging)Manage the delivery operations, preparing and replenishing stock quickly and accuratelyEnsure the right products are available on the sales floor to improve store efficiency and maximize Client experienceBe fully integrated to the store team (participate in the morning briefing) and contribute to achieving the overall objectives of the storeDevelop the highest Brand and product knowledgeWe value forward thinking individuals eager to contribute their creativity and passion to the success of the Maison.This is an ideal position for someone seeking to grow their career in luxury retail in a back-of-house environment, and who has a passion for operational efficiency and in interest in developing their knowledge of operations, stock, repairs and after sales, and administration, and who loves problem-solving and approaches all issues with a creative and proactive approach.ProfileAt least 1-3 years of experience in stock management in a retail companyFluent in EnglishOrganized, careful and responsibleCommitted, proactive and able to adapt to a changing environment as retailAbility to work in a team and having a global vision of the businessAdditional informationAs an employee at Louis Vuitton, you can expect to be provided with industry leading training which offers you an in-depth insight into the luxury retail field. In addition and upon performance and attitude, you will receive unparalleled career development opportunities, both locally & globally, in addition to learning from the very best colleagues, managers and mentors.

Title: Recruiter
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: A Media Group, investing in and working with global media and digital marketing companies & startups is looking for a Recruiter with full-cycle recruiting experience, from talent sourcing and attracting candidates to interviewing and hiring great employees.What does a Recruiter do?A successful recruiter will collaborate with department managers on a regular basis and proactively identify future hiring needs. You should also be able to attract candidates using various sources, like social media networks and employee referrals. Our ideal recruiter holds an academic HR background combined with work experience in screening, interviewing and assessing candidates.Ultimately, the responsibilities of the Recruiter are to ensure our company attracts, hires and retains the best employees, while growing a strong talent pipeline.ResponsibilitiesDesign and implement overall recruiting strategyDevelop and update job descriptions interpersonal skillsStrong decision-making skillsBS/MS in Human Resources Management

Title: Medical Data Specialist Full Time
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are hiring a Medical Data Specialist to join our Data team.In this role you’ll get the opportunity to build image analysis models powered by AI, and do something that really matters to biology research and immune treatment. Join our core team of med students and biology majors to help define better treatment for cancer patients!A cancer patient wants to know that their diagnosis and treatment are determined with the greatest precision, and preferably using the most advanced technology. At Nucleai, we bring cancer patients cutting edge AI-based technology, by improving biopsy interpretation with machine learning and by creating novel precision medicine technology. Come and join our team of experienced AI engineers and world-renowned clinicians, and help us make a difference.At Nucleai we believe that talents are our most valued asset and as such, hiring the right people is one of our most strategic missions.Why join us? Text: About UsWith over 30 Million users on our platform, we’re here to change the future of business. Our all-in-one platform makes starting a business affordable and accessible to everyone – we welcome more than 800k new business owners every month. From our products to our careers, there are endless opportunities for growth.Our team | Our core | Our dream fulfillersWhen we started Tailor Brands, we wanted to help people to accelerate their growth and fulfill their dreams. This also defines us internally; we put our focus on maximizing individual impact and creating an environment of absolute transparency.About The RoleAs a Junior Product Marketing Manager, you’ll be managing Tailor Brand’s email funnels, automation, pop-ups, and user journeys: from ideation, through configuration to analysis & optimization.You’ll be Tailor Brand’s go-to person with everything related to email automation - collaborating with content, paid acquisition and product, orchestrating Tailor Brands’s automated communications aligned with business and brand goals.We’re looking for an individual who’s a self-starter — someone who knows how to get things done but always seeks ways to innovate and test new ideas.Manage email automation and email funnels, including content messaging strategyMonitor email performance, deliverability, analyze results, and enhance campaigns accordingly. Text: Job Description:  Direct management of the QA team (10~ testing engineers) Manage and ensure Quality testing, schedule, including adherence to Work Standards and Procedures, Quality Audits and Certifications for all Bagira systems. to meet local and international requirements (testing of 6~ projects). Ensure training of the team. Build and improve the company's testing methodology. High logic sense, Self-learning, and high motivation person. At least 2 years’ experience as a team leader in the hi-tech industry. Writing testing documents (STP, STD, STR, ATP, ATR etc.). Prioritizing tasks and values. Leading the implementation of automation and SW tools. Experience with Windows desktop applications. Ability to work closely with developers and engineering specialists.Preferred Qualifications Worked in an Agile/Scrum environment. Basic Knowledge of the defense and training environment. Knowledge in TFS Experience with system of systems and distributed solutions

Title: Quality Manager (QARA)
Location: Ra'anana, Center District, Israel
Text: Amimon– Who are we?Amimon designs and manufactures end products of wireless UHD/4K video for up to 2KM range, with zero latency. Leading the solutions for the studio cameras, Live production and enterprise marketsAmimon is R&D centric company. The complex system is based on innovative concept with many new patents and algorithms and includes video processing and advanced video compression methods, RF, OFDM modem, Wireless transmission, ASIC & FPGA ICs, several processors integration including their software and User interfaces.Amimon have won both Oscar and Emmy rewards for scientific and technology for its cinema product line.What will I be doing?The quality manager will oversee the company quality & regulation activities.The role requires working internally with all the relevant departments to work according to ISO13485 standard; Work with international standardization bodies to complete annual reviews as well as new Class I/II product submissions to FDA & Europe.Requirements:Qualified candidates must have: A minimum of 3 years in quality assurance in the medical device field. A minimum of 3 years in quality management positions in the medical device field. In-depth knowledge and practical application of ISO 13485 and/or ISO9001 and related standards Experience with FDA and MDD/ EU-MDR regulations Ability to accurately estimate tasks and track/communicate progress’ Excellent verbal and written communication skills Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills High level EnglishAdvantage to applicants with: BS in Engineering, Computer Science or related field Experience in working with remote factories, including performing remote and on-site audits

Title: Director of Risk Management
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: ﻿About the Position:Fireblocks is one of the most well-funded and fastest-growing start-ups in the crypto and blockchain space. We’re on a mission to enable every business in the world to securely and easily support digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Today, over 1500 customers rely on the Fireblocks platform to store, transfer and issue digital assets – and we’re just getting started.Fireblocks is looking for a Director of Risk Management with the ability to assess risk, develop mitigation plans, and serve as a risk subject matter expert on all product risk fronts.This is an opportunity to join a newly formed team with a mandate to help drive meaningful growth for Fireblocks. The right individual will have a hand in building a risk management team from the ground up.Description:Deep involvement in the product development processes - Identify, quantify, and monitor risks to enable risk-based actions and decision-making by business leadersProvide risk expertise consultation, support, and constructive challenge to complex business areas with high risk Co-develop risk mitigation strategies/action plans with risk owners to address the highest priority risks and be able to execute themDevelop, support, and track reporting requirements (KPIs and KRIs), and communicate these metrics to senior leadershipChampion a strong risk cultureMonitor industry trends and maintain compliance with regulatory expectations and requirementsRequirements:6+ years of product background, high technical skills, and ability to work closely with the Product and R&D teamsHigh level understanding of risk management and experience in evaluating risk and implementing corrective action.Proven leadership capabilities as well as building strong collaborative relationships with senior stakeholders.Great communication, analytical and problem-solving skills Strong project management experience and prioritization skills needed Undergraduate degree required

Requirements: ['ניהול צוות מנהלי קמפיינים', 'אחריות על תפעול וניהול כלל הקמפיינים הפרסומיים בנכסים הדיגיטליים של הקבוצה כמו mako, N12, 12+, Tech12', 'עבודה מול המחלקה הטכנולוגית - AdOps, אפיון ופיתוח כלי פרסום, בדיקות QA, בדיקות טכניות שוטפות, התוויות מדיניות פרסום וניהול מלאי', 'עבודה בכל הפלטפורמות לרבות אפליקציות, דסקטופ, אתר מותאם מובייל, טלויזיות חכמות ועוד', 'נסיון של 4 שנים לפחות בעולם הפרסום דיגיטלי', 'נסיון בניהול עובדים בדגש על מודל עבודה היברידי', 'היכרות מעמיקה Hands On עם מערכת Google Ad Manager (DFP לשעבר)', "היכרות עם עבודה מול DSP's בינלאומיים", 'אורייטציה טכנולוגית ועבודה מול מחלקות פיתוח, בדגש על הטמעת מערכות פרסום', 'יכולת אנליטית בניתוח נתונים והצגת מסקנות ותובנות', 'שליטה מלאה באקסל ברמה גבוהה', 'תקשורת בינאישית ויכולת התבטאות בכתב ובעל פה ברמה גבוהה מאוד', 'יכולת הובלת תהליכים וניהול פרויקטים חוצי מחלקות פנים ארגוניות ומול גורמים חוץ ארגוניים']
