Title: Fraud Analyst
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Fraud analyst – student positionGlobal-e is looking for analytical people who can find the right way to solve a case!We are looking for analytical, proactive, self-driven and independent junior fraud analysts to join our fraud team in our fast-growing company.The perfect student position – great conditions, high flexibility, working in shifts (both from the office and from home).Responsibilities:Fight Cybercrime by performing risk assessments for online e-commerce transactionsBuild, design and improve fraud prevention strategies and mechanismsIdentify fraudulent patterns via data analysisAnalyze users behavior and background to determine legitimacy, using open source intelligenceRequirements:Student with at least 2 years remaining until graduation - MustSQL and Excel proficientHigh availability to workAbility to work under pressureIntelligence background - advantageEqual Opportunity EmployerAt Global-e, our people play a key role in our success.If you need reasonable adjustments at any point in the application or interview process, please let us know. We’re passionate about creating a workplace that promotes and values Diversity, Equity and Inclusion. We pride ourselves on being diverse in age, gender identity or expression, race, sexual orientation, religion, neurodiversity, disability status, ethnicity and any other aspect which makes us unique.

Title: FP&A Analyst
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports is the world’s fastest-growing sports-tech company, the developer of AI-based automation solutions for sports content creation and distribution, automatically and in real-time.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!We are looking for a talented and motivated FP&A Analyst to join our growing finance team. In this role, you will be focusing on analyzing and forecasting the revenue-related financial results and working with key business partners to support the company’s high growth and scale.What you’ll do:Analyze revenue-related financial metrics within different business models.Work closely with the BizDev teams to track, review and analyze customers deals and contracts.Deliver key financial forecasting while engaging with various stakeholders in the company.Analyze actual, forecast and planned revenue on a monthly and quarterly basis.Provide ongoing and ad-hoc support while partnering with cross-functional teams to support decision-making.Create and maintain complex financial models using advanced tools.Design, automate, and standardize solid and scalable FP&A processes and policies.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Accounting and a CPA license.+3 years experience, either as an FP&A function or a Big-4 alumni. SaaS B2B experience is preferred.Able to take ownership of fast-paced projects with rapidly shifting priorities, managing them through to completion with patience, flexibility, and passion.Efficient and creative problem-solver, comfortable with ambiguity and complexity.Great Microsoft Excel skills.Power Query and SQL knowledge– an advantage.Experience working with BI tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.) – an advantage.Fluent English (both spoken and written).
Requirements: ['Analyze revenue-related financial metrics within different business models.', 'Work closely with the BizDev teams to track, review and analyze customers deals and contracts.', 'Deliver key financial forecasting while engaging with various stakeholders in the company.', 'Analyze actual, forecast and planned revenue on a monthly and quarterly basis.', 'Provide ongoing and ad-hoc support while partnering with cross-functional teams to support decision-making.', 'Create and maintain complex financial models using advanced tools.', 'Design, automate, and standardize solid and scalable FP&A processes and policies.', "Bachelor's degree in Accounting and a CPA license.", '+3 years experience, either as an FP&A function or a Big-4 alumni. SaaS B2B experience is preferred.', 'Able to take ownership of fast-paced projects with rapidly shifting priorities, managing them through to completion with patience, flexibility, and passion.', 'Efficient and creative problem-solver, comfortable with ambiguity and complexity.', 'Great Microsoft Excel skills.', 'Power Query and SQL knowledge– an advantage.', 'Experience working with BI tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.) – an advantage.', 'Fluent English (both spoken and written).']

Title: Sales Bootcamp
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Kickstart your career in the Israeli techby joining the next big thing!You got the talent - we've got the opportunity. Apply now for a full sales and consulting Bootcamp and get your foot in the door of Israel's hottest industry, no prior experience necessary. We will teach you everything - SaaS products, tech companies structure, operational tools, mastering the sales process, and much more.All candidates accepted will get a full-time job offer to join ConnecteamAnd after 8 weeks of training will be fully joining our sales teams! We're looking for charismatic self-startersNative/professional level English, written and verbal - a MUSTExcellent written and oral communication skillsEnergetic, adaptable, inquisitive, and excited to work in a rapidly growing start-up environmentData-orientedBasic familiarity with tech toolsAdvantages: additional languages, previous experience with client-facing or sales rolesYou are:A team player! Challenge seeker! Willing to grow in the company! Love managing processes and having responsibilities! A self learner and independent!Good under pressure and in a fast paced environment! Hungry to conquer the market!Want to grow with us! Work hard, but also play hard! We love fun! We want:Fluent English speaker (spoken and written) – MUSTExperience in customer facing roles - advantageTech-savvyWillingness to work varying hours with a flexible schedule, including late hours, sometimes (most of our customer are located in North America)Be energetic, happy and positive – MUSTOwnerships & Responsibilities:You will become a product expert! The Account Executive position is a quota-carrying position; you will own the full sales cycleBe the company's eyes – No one in the company knows our clients better than the Sales teamBe the face of the company – Connecteam is known for our outstanding customer service and approachInfluence the product in the light of client demands and needsCross department involvement and information sharingInitiative independence and ownershipTrain with Connecteam's expert Account ExecutivesWhere: Connecteam's TLV officesJoining Connecteam Is The Smart Move:We build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we recognize the value in always nurturing and training them so they can go above and beyond in their skills and job duties. We make an impact on our customer's business. We are on a mission to provide managers of all business types and sizes with the tools they need to communicate, operate, engage, and run their deskless workforce. Our product offers them an effective and affordable solution to run their business. We get the job done. Connecteam employees are passionate in executing their job duties so they can drive the company forward and provide real value to our customers. We have fun! From weekly happy hours to holiday parties, we always enjoy each other's company (and good food, of course). Connecteam is like one big, happy family!Everyone is welcome. Connecteam is committed to building an encouraging, caring, and supportive environment. We share a responsibility to support our team and enrich their lives. Together we will shape the future of work!

Title: General administration - Herzlyah
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Company Descriptionפורצלנוסה ישראל מתרחבת ולך יש הזדמנות מצוינת להצטרף לצוות שלנו!פורצלנוסה היא מובילה עולמית בחדשנות, עיצוב, ייצור והפצה של מוצרי אריחים, מטבח ואמבטיה.כחברה אנו שואפים להיות מובילים בתעשייה על ידי אספקת עיצובים מובילים של יופי ועידון שאין שני להם, איכות ללא פשרות מבחינה טכנולוגית , מוצרים מעולים ושירותים אמינים ללקוחותינו.Porcelanosa נוסדה לפני למעלה מ-45 שנה מאז הייתה לנו צמיחה מדהימה וכיום הנוכחות הגלובלית שלנו משתרעת על למעלה מ-140 מדינות באמצעות יותר מ-400 אולמות תצוגה בבעלות החברה, מרכזי הפצה ורשת נרחבת של מפיצים וקמעונאים עצמאיים.Job description:Job Outlineאנו מחפשים מנהל/ת אדמיניסטרטיבי שיתמוך בפעילות העסקית היומיומית ויתקשר בצורה יעילה עם כל רמה בארגון.עליו להיות אחראי על מתן תמיכה למנהלי המחלקות וטיפול במגוון רחב של פעילויות ועניינים סודיים תוך שיקול דעת ומחויבות עמוקה להצלחת הארגון.Responsibilities:dהוספת הזמנות מכירה למערכת SAPבדיקה שהתמחור וההנחות נכונים.קשר עם צוות המחסן לגבי הזמנותניהול הזמנות חוזרותקשר עם חברת הובלה \ לוגיסטיקהתפקידי מינהל כללייםSeeked profile:Requirements:ניסיון בעבודה operations or administrative positions יכולת אנליטית ומספרית גבוה, בעל אופי מכוון לפרטים רב משימות מיומן, בעל כישורי ארגון מצוינים ויכול לתעדף עומסי עבודה פותר בעיות פרואקטיבי ובעל יוזמה שולט בSAP – יתרון אנגלית ברמה גבוהה – חובה ספרדית – יתרון משמעותי הופעה ייצוגית  * המודעה פונה לגברים ונשים
Requirements: ['הוספת הזמנות מכירה למערכת SAP', 'בדיקה שהתמחור וההנחות נכונים.', 'קשר עם צוות המחסן לגבי הזמנות', 'ניהול הזמנות חוזרות', 'קשר עם חברת הובלה \\ לוגיסטיקה', 'תפקידי מינהל כלליים', 'ניסיון בעבודה operations or administrative positions', 'יכולת אנליטית ומספרית גבוה, בעל אופי מכוון לפרטים', 'רב משימות מיומן, בעל כישורי ארגון מצוינים ויכול לתעדף עומסי עבודה', 'פותר בעיות פרואקטיבי ובעל יוזמה', 'שולט בSAP – יתרון', 'אנגלית ברמה גבוהה – חובה', 'ספרדית – יתרון משמעותי', 'הופעה ייצוגית', '* המודעה פונה לגברים ונשים']

Title: Product Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About UsDemostack is the world's first Demo Experience Platform. Our solution gives software companies complete control, customization, and insight over demoing their product. Demostack customers can create, share, and track personalized demo experiences for every prospect, without requiring R&D resources. We're on a journey to build the perfect demo environment and we want you to join!The roleWe are looking for a curious, motivated, fast-learner, product-oriented Data Analyst to join our awesome product team. This person should have a strong passion for leveraging data to solve business and product problems. The responsibilities of this role include:Drive the way data is used in our decision-making process by helping define our north star metrics, measuring their impact, and diving deep into the data to find supporting insights.Define key metrics and analyze them to uncover the reasons behind changes, identify trends, and make recommendations.Perform funnel analysis to understand the path users take through our product and find new opportunities using different breakdowns.Create SQL processes that pull data from both raw events and aggregated databases.Create and maintain dashboards that make key metrics easier to understand for all stakeholders.Present key findings to stakeholders across the company in order to drive business and product decisions.Requirements3+ years of experience as a data/product/business analyst, preferably at a SaaS, B2B company, or a fast-growing tech startupExcellent SQL skills with experience in querying large, complex data setsAdvanced Excel / Google sheets capabilitiesExperienced in working with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.)Educational background in a field emphasizing quantitative analysis (industrial engineering, mathematics, statistics, or a related field).Passionate about data with outstanding analytical skillsIndependent, fast learner who is able to prioritize well while working in a fast-paced environment Excellent visualization and presentation skills, and great communication skills both in person and in writing, including in English in a professional capacity.AdvantagesExperience with PythonExperience in blending data from cross-platform sources such as marketing tools, sales management platforms and CRM systemsExperience working in a product teamExperience with data pipelines and processes, including event definition and maintenance.
Requirements: ['Drive the way data is used in our decision-making process by helping define our north star metrics, measuring their impact, and diving deep into the data to find supporting insights.', 'Define key metrics and analyze them to uncover the reasons behind changes, identify trends, and make recommendations.', 'Perform funnel analysis to understand the path users take through our product and find new opportunities using different breakdowns.', 'Create SQL processes that pull data from both raw events and aggregated databases.', 'Create and maintain dashboards that make key metrics easier to understand for all stakeholders.', 'Present key findings to stakeholders across the company in order to drive business and product decisions.', '3+ years of experience as a data/product/business analyst, preferably at a SaaS, B2B company, or a fast-growing tech startup', 'Excellent SQL skills with experience in querying large, complex data sets', 'Advanced Excel / Google sheets capabilities', 'Experienced in working with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.)', 'Educational background in a field emphasizing quantitative analysis (industrial engineering, mathematics, statistics, or a related field).', 'Passionate about data with outstanding analytical skills', 'Independent, fast learner who is able to prioritize well while working in a fast-paced environment', 'Excellent visualization and presentation skills, and great communication skills both in person and in writing, including in English in a professional capacity.', 'Experience with Python', 'Experience in blending data from cross-platform sources such as marketing tools, sales management platforms and CRM systems', 'Experience working in a product team', 'Experience with data pipelines and processes, including event definition and maintenance.']

Title: איש/אשת סיסטם
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Globalbit_ היא חברה מובילה בתחום פיתוח מערכות דיגיטל. יותר מ-200,000,000 אנשים בעולם מסתמכים על האפליקציות והאתרים שבנינו בחיי היומיום שלהם. כן, גם את/ה.אנו מגייסים איש/אשת סיסטם שיצטרף לצוות שלנו בחברת ביטוח פיננסים מובילה במרכז!Requirements: ניסיון של 5 שנים ומעלה במערכות IT מורכבות בסביבת מייקרוסופט ON PREM וענן. ניסיון בפועל HANDS ON בהקמה, תחזוקה וטיפול בתקלות בסביבת 365 ו AZURE ניסיון רב ומוכח ב AD, יישום תשתית מבוססת ADFS, DHCP, IIS, CA, KERBEROS מוכוונות ואוריינטציה שירותית ברמה גבוההדרישות המהוות יתרון- ניסיון מוכח בכתיבת SHELL SCRIPTS וסקריפטים מורכבים – יתרון ניסיון בטרנספורמציה מסביבת EXCHANGE ON PREM לענן – יתרוןResponsibilites:אחריות למימוש פרויקטים בתחומי תשתיות מייקרוסופט, תחת הנחיות אבטחת מידע ולביצוע מיטבי של משימות.שירות ומשימות פרוייקטאליות – מתן מענה לאתגרים טכנולוגיים הקשורים לתשתיות מייקרוסופט מורכבות, בדגש על AD, ו EXCHANGE אבטחת מידע הפעילות היא במסגרת פרויקטים ופעילות שוטפת של תחזוקת מערכות פנים ארגוניות ושירות ללקוחות פנימיים כפיפות לראש צוות

Title: Administrative Assistant
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel

Whatever your race, gender, age, creed, or taste in music – if you’ve got the drive, commitment, and dedication to be the best, do your best, and work with the best, then come join us. We’re waiting for you.Curious? Apply now.Start the adventure

Title: Director of Product Management
Location: Center District, Israel
Text: Who are we?Kramer is a leading player and pioneer in the Pro AV industry.Kramer audio visual experiences power creativity, collaboration, and engagement. From AVSM to advanced cloud-based communication, collaboration and control solutions, Kramer creates audio visual experiences that are more engaging, more inclusive and more connected than ever before.About The RoleKramer is looking for a Director of Product Management to lead Kramer’s portfolio of Audio-Visual productsWe are looking for a passionate products leader with experience in leading large technology-intensive product portfolio in the field of audio-visual experiences. The qualified candidate will lead our current and next generation Audio-Visual Signal Management hardware-based product lines. The job includes: Managing a team of product managers.Defining product strategies and translating those to innovative products portfolio and products roadmap.Managing end-to-end products life cycles, in matrix organization across all company functions, from inception through volume sales, until phase out.Close collaboration with R&D, sales & marketing teams WW to create winning products, effective value propositions and product campaigns to meet sales targets.High engagement with customers. Requirements  :  B.Sc. in Electrical/Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Exact Sciences.MBA – Significant advantage.Proven experience of at least 5 years as product manager of hardware products.Excellent managerial skills, with at least 5 years of experience in leading product management teams in hardware products. Proven experience in defining new product strategies and business plans.Proven ability to create value for customers through product portfolios.Willingness to frequently travel abroad.Exceptional communication skills in English: verbal, writing and presentation skills.Powered by JazzHRRRDcVhi8kH

Title: New Media Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: לובי 99 הוא המקף שבין ההמון לשלטון – הלובי הציבורי הראשון שעובד למען האינטרסים של הציבור הרחב. לטייקונים ולחברות ענק יש למעלה מ-200 נציגים רשומים בכנסת שעובדים כדיי לקדם את האינטרסים של בעלי ההון – אנחנו עובדים למען ה99% שאין להם ממון לשכירת לוביסטים במטרה לקדם האינטרסים של הציבור הרחב למול מקבלי ההחלטות בכנסת ובממשלה בנושאים חברתיים-כלכליים.מה אנחנו מחפשים?שחקן/ית נשמה לחיזוק ארגון חברה אזרחית מהמובילים במדינת ישראל,  בעל/ת יכולת עבודת צוות, לצד עצמאות בניהול זמנים ומשימות.תחומי אחריות במסגרת התפקיד:>> ניהול רשתות חברתיות (פייסבוק, אינסטגרם, טיק טוק, טוויטר, לינקדין ועוד)>> כתיבה ועריכה תכנים שיווקיים.>> עיצוב גרפי עבור תוצרי התוכן של הלובי.>> כתיבה, צילום, עריכה והפקת סרטוני וידאו.>> עריכת בלוג ותפעול אתר האינטרנט של הלובי.דרישות התפקיד:>> ניסיון בתפעול רשתות חברתיות - פייסבוק, אינסטגרם, טיקטוק וכו' - חובה.>> היכרות עם מערכות ניהול רשתות חברתיות (facebook business manager, sproutsocial) - יתרון.>> ניסיון קודם בעריכת וידאו - חובה>> ניסיון קודם בעיצוב גרפי - חובה>> יכולות כתיבה ועריכת תוכן - יתרון>> יצירתיות וחשיבה מחוץ לקופסה>> יכולת עבודה בסביבה דינמית וניהול משימות עצמאי.>> הזדהות עם מטרות המיזם - חובה.* עבדה היברדית משלבת עבודה ממשרדי הלובי בתל אביב (צמוד לתחבורה ציבורית), הכנסת בירושלים ועבודה מהבית.להגשת מועמדות יש להעביר קורות חיים בצירוף 2 סרטוני וידאו ו-2 עיצובים גרפיים מתוך תיק עבודות. ניתן לפנות גם במייל לכתובת - mail@lobby99.org.il

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About CloudShare:CloudShare is a leading product experience platform that helps software companies increase customer acquisition and retention by providing their end-users with engaging hands-on virtual POCs, demos, and training experiences in the cloud. We are proud to serve leading global software companies such as Atlassian, SAI Global, ForgeRock, Motorola, and many more.Our Culture:We are a people-first company. We believe in honest communication, transparency, and respecting the fact that people have other things going on in their lives unrelated to work that are equally important to us. Our Israeli offices are located in Tel-Aviv (14 Yad-Harutzim street, a 12 min walk from HaHagana train station), although we work in a hybrid format with a remote-centric focus.The Role: Own the vision, strategy and execution of Cloudshare's cloud offerings to deliver product outcomes and value.Develop new product ideas and experimentation plans via brainstorming, market research, customer interviews, discovery processes, and competitive analysis. Partner with engineering, design, customer success, marketing, and sales teams to develop value and create growth. Engage the full cycle of product development from conception to in-depth data analysis, through collaboration with engineers to ensure accurate execution and overall product success.Define and analyze product metrics, ensuring continuous growth in product valueRequirements3+ years experience as a Product Manager, preferably in SaaS and B2B products from data-driven companies.Ability to understand highly technical processes.Experience and knowledge in cloud infrastructure and IT processes Great understanding of all aspects of the product development lifecycle.Excellent understanding of data and how to interpret it to improve products.Strong user experience skills, along with technical understanding. Strong execution of qualitative and quantitative analysis.Experience in outbound product activities of directly engaging with customers.You are a team player with the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, startup environment.Bachelor’s Degree in relevant field

Title: Head Of Engineering
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About PayUPayU, a leading payment and Fintech company in 50+ high-growth markets throughout Asia, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa, part of Prosus group, one of the largest technology investors in the world is redefining the way people buy and sell online for our 300.000+ merchants and millions of consumers.As a leading online payment service provider, we deploy more than 400 payment methods and PCI-certified platforms to process approximately 6 million payments every single day.Thinking of becoming a PayUneer and you are curious to know more about us? Read more about the life in PayU hereAbout The RoleWe are looking for a brilliant Head of Engineering to join and lead our amazing engineering team in Israel and work on the company's core products. You will take the lead in designing and building our cloud-based solutions. You will face challenges of performance, scalability, and availability all of them in a cloud-based environment with the newest tools and services. This is a truly unique engineering position putting you in charge of every aspect of the system and the development life-cycle in addition to managing a brilliant group of engineers and managers.What you’ll doLead the entire engineering team in Israel (including managing manager) in a dynamic and global environment (40-50 people, in multi-disciplinary domains; BE, FE,DevOps, SRE). Leading the strategy, planning, and execution of the technology roadmap. Design our future group structure and way of work. Defining, evolving, and implementing PayU’s Architectural Principles Face challenges of scale and mature our system and engineering organization. Work closely with PayU stakeholders such as product, support, and data teams. Be a true partner to the global engineering management team and help shape and design the engineering organization of the company. Own end-to-end our main platform, from the birth of a design to production monitoring and maintenance. Build cutting edge solutions for high scale in the payments landscape. Mentor engineering managers, tech leads, and engineers to continuously grow and become better engineers. Promoting a positive work environment; recruiting and training new team members; continuously providing feedback, mentoring, and coaching to existing team members Will take a major role in designing and building important products for the company. Build a 100% cloud-native containerized distributed system for 99.999% availability. You may fit this role if you…A great leader who is also a team player. Have extensive managerial experience in mentor leaders and engineers. Have experience in leading and scaling large engineering organizations in a global environment. Would like to take an important role in designing our engineering organization and systems. Design and work with distributed system concepts like parallel processing, consistency, replication, and scalability. Love to explore new technologies to find the best solution for complex problems. - Extensive experience with SaaS platforms and CI/CD methodologies. A creative thinker, passionate about problem-solving. Have strong programming skills in at least one of the following languages - Go, Node.js, Scala, Go, Java or Python. Believe that good API matters. Happy to collaborate and communicate remotely and asynchronously. Have an urge to deliver quickly and iterate fast. Keen to inspire, share knowledge and push others to get the best out of the team. English - fluent About us:At PayU, we are a global fintech investor and our vision is to build a world without financial borders where everyone can prosper. We give people in high-growth markets the financial services and products they need to thrive. Our expertise in 18 high-growth markets enables us to extend the reach of financial services. This drives everything we do, from investing in technology entrepreneurs, to offering credit to underserved individuals, to helping merchants buy, sell and operate online. Being part of Prosus, one of the largest technology investors in the world, gives us the presence and expertise to make a real impact. Find out more www.payu.comOur Commitment To Building A Diverse And Inclusive WorkforceAs a global and multi-cultural organization with varied ethnicities thriving across locations, we realize that our responsibility towards fulfilling the D&I commitment is huge. Therefore, we continuously strive to create a diverse, inclusive and safe environment, for all of our people, communities and customers. Our leaders are committed to create an inclusive work culture which enables transparency, flexibility and unbiased attention to each and every PayUneer so they can succeed, irrespective of gender, color or personal faith. An environment where every person feels they belong, that they are listened to, and where they are empowered to speak up. At PayU we have zero tolerance towards any form of prejudice whether a specific race, ethnicity, or of persons with disabilities or the LGBTQ communities.

recruiting and training new team members; continuously providing feedback, mentoring, and coaching to existing team members', 'Will take a major role in designing and building important products for the company.', 'Build a 100% cloud-native containerized distributed system for 99.999% availability.', 'A great leader who is also a team player.', 'Have extensive managerial experience in mentor leaders and engineers.', 'Have experience in leading and scaling large engineering organizations in a global environment.', 'Would like to take an important role in designing our engineering organization and systems.', 'Design and work with distributed system concepts like parallel processing, consistency, replication, and scalability.', 'Love to explore new technologies to find the best solution for complex problems. -', 'Extensive experience with SaaS platforms and CI/CD methodologies.', 'A creative thinker, passionate about problem-solving.', 'Have strong programming skills in at least one of the following languages - Go, Node.js, Scala, Go, Java or Python.', 'Believe that good API matters.', 'Happy to collaborate and communicate remotely and asynchronously.', 'Have an urge to deliver quickly and iterate fast.', 'Keen to inspire, share knowledge and push others to get the best out of the team.', 'English - fluent']

Title: Survey Research Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who are we?Zencity is re-inventing the way governments hear from, understand, and engage with their residents. Our community input & insights platform and community survey solution use advanced NLP and ML algorithms to help government organizations make data-driven decisions. Our global team of urban enthusiasts and data geeks works with over 300 cities - from Los Angeles, to Chicago, to Tel Aviv. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic company focused on leveraging data and tech to work on real-world challenges and radically improve life in cities – your place is with us!What is the role?Zencity’s surveys help state and local governments to understand and respond to the needs of their residents. Our research enables clients to effectively tackle many of their most critical challenges, in areas such as COVID-19 response, infrastructure spending, economic development, and police transparency. With the insights from these surveys, leaders are able to make more informed decisions and deliver better results for their communities.As a Survey Research Analyst, you will create customized survey solutions for our clients, from project planning and questionnaire design through data analysis and reporting. You will also help to develop the next generation of Zencity’s survey research tools and methods and to make innovative and high-quality surveys more scalable through automation and productization. As part of a fast-growing team and organization, you’ll also have plenty of opportunities to build new skills and help shape the direction of the program in the years to come.﻿ResponsibilitiesWork closely with the Customer Success team to determine client needs and deliver on end-to-end survey projectsWrite and customize questionnaires to measure residents’ beliefs, opinions, attitudes, and behaviors on local and national issuesProcess, and analyze survey results to inform clients’ decisionsCreate and deliver to customers reports presenting survey findings and recommendationsCollaborate with other team members in developing best practices, testing new research methods, and creating tools to streamline the survey processRequirements:Required:Bachelor’s degree in urban planning, psychology, sociology, economics, public policy, or other social science degreesAt least two years of experience with quantitative research in a professional or academic contextExperience working with survey data and analysis Native-level English proficiencyExcellent writing skillsPreferred:Proficiency in survey design, fielding, and/or methodology, including questionnaire designProficiency in statistical analysis methodsAbility to analyze data using software such as Python or RExperience presenting findings to senior-level stakeholdersExperience working in a service-oriented and client-focused environmentPublic policy and government experienceFamiliarity with current events (especially social and political) in the United States
Requirements: ['Work closely with the Customer Success team to determine client needs and deliver on end-to-end survey projects', 'Write and customize questionnaires to measure residents’ beliefs, opinions, attitudes, and behaviors on local and national issues', 'Process, and analyze survey results to inform clients’ decisions', 'Create and deliver to customers reports presenting survey findings and recommendations', 'Collaborate with other team members in developing best practices, testing new research methods, and creating tools to streamline the survey process', 'Bachelor’s degree in urban planning, psychology, sociology, economics, public policy, or other social science degrees', 'At least two years of experience with quantitative research in a professional or academic context', 'Experience working with survey data and analysis', 'Native-level English proficiency', 'Excellent writing skills', 'Proficiency in survey design, fielding, and/or methodology, including questionnaire design', 'Proficiency in statistical analysis methods', 'Ability to analyze data using software such as Python or R', 'Experience presenting findings to senior-level stakeholders', 'Experience working in a service-oriented and client-focused environment', 'Public policy and government experience', 'Familiarity with current events (especially social and political) in the United States']

Title: PMO
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: SolarEdge is a top global leader in smart energy technology. Solar Edge’s broad range of products encompasses intelligent & efficient conversion systems, EV chargers, smart energy solutions, monitoring platforms and more.We are looking for a motivated and talented PMO in a full-time position for the R&D department. This position provides a unique opportunity for Industrial Engineering engineer to start their career at SolarEdge.In this role, you work with the all R&D groups managers to define, manage and implement project plans and working process. Title: Business Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a sharp and passionate Business Analyst to join our top-notch analytics team. Using your technical and analytical skills, your mission will be to tell the story behind the numbers, understand how players interact with our games, and leverage our data to propose new ideas that you’ll then see implemented.ResponsibilitiesAnalyze large, complex data sets to solve business questions and be a data-oriented users behavior expert.Plan, create & implement day-to-day events and promotions strategies based on users' behavior analysis.Build automated dashboards and reports to facilitate company-wide awareness and understanding of key business metrics and players' experience.Coordinate with designers and product teams to execute monthly events and promotions across all our game platforms.Recommend new ways to optimize and maximize game revenues.RequirementsB.A. / B.Sc. in Industrial Engineering, Math, Statistics, Computer Science or an equivalent background.At least 4+ years’ experience in B2C or 2+ years in Gaming Industry analyzing large datasets centric role Strong SQL with experience in querying large complex data sets -must have.Experience with BI Visualization tools (Tableau/Looker) - must have.Work experience analyzing large datasets in an Analytics / Product / Monetization centric role- Advantage.Experience with Python (Pandas, SciPy, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn) – Advantage.Soft Skills RequirementsThrive in an environment of a fast-growing startup.Ability to turn complex concepts into actionable recommendations.A true passion for understanding consumers’ social gaming behavior.

Title: Tier 2 Support

Text: About Sensi:Sensi is on a mission to change the way we, as a society, take care of every older adult who needs it. Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: A company that is building the future of audio advertising is looking for a Customer Success Manager. It's a startup focused on creating solutions for publishers to unlock the fastest-growing segment of marketing spend, and empowering advertisers to reach mobile audiences at scale.As a Customer Success Manager, you’ll oversee existing publisher accounts. Through day-to-day communication, you’ll build strong relationships and establish growth and up-sell strategies tailored to your book of business. Additionally, you’ll be responsible for onboarding new publishers, while working with counterparts internally and externally to ensure that all technical and performance issues are resolved quickly and appropriately.Success in this role is achieved through building strong relationships, up-selling, performance analysis, technical support, and optimization. The strategic partnership manager is expected to actively contribute to the ongoing success of the business while working in close partnership with the sales, product, and R&D.Job DescriptionCommunicate and work closely with Advertisers and Publishers worldwide to manage relationships.Growing revenue from existing accounts and clients.Performance and technical focal point for product integration, best practices, and overall account operations.Manage and optimize campaigns; analyze performance and recommend/implement improvements to meet customers’ monetization objectives.Supporting the sales team in pre and post-sale stages.RequirementsMinimum 1-year experience within a global advertising or gaming company.2 years experience in client management from global operating companies.English at a native level.Sales-oriented, strong ability to negotiate.Strong interpersonal skills to interact with clients, management, and peers.Ability to multitask and handle various priorities.Details-oriented with an ability to see the bigger picture.Passionate for games and knowledge of the gaming industry.Bachelor degree.

Title: Junior embedded engineer
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Summary At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.Dynamic, smart people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple products. The same real passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it. Join us to help deliver the next groundbreaking Apple product.Work with logic designers to understand the operation of the block and system levels. Investigate the use cases, system-level operation, and performance requirements .  Develop low-level software to validate functionality, conformance, and performance of the systems. Key Qualifications Strong knowledge in C.Computer structure knowledge.Understanding in HW-SW integrations -advantage. Description In this highly visible position you will be working on best in class Apple SoC. You will be in charge of SW development. You will be working on design, development and integration of complex drivers, tests and SW infrastructure, as well as SoC Bring-ups and complex debug activities. Education & Experience Bachelors Degree or Master Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or equivalent experience. Role Number: 200196581

Title: Quantitative Researcher
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Energy markets are vast and intricate systems. Mastering the entire ecosystem is a huge undertaking. We are looking for fast independent learners who are able to incorporate new insights into existing algorithms and devise groundbreaking new data sources.If you enjoy learning and mastering expansive new areas and are extremely curious and detail oriented by nature, then this job is for you.This position will focus primarily on investigating, generating, and managing complex data projects of various types and sources. You will have ownership of several domains of interest and work closely with our data scientists, software engineers and ML experts to drive efficient decision-making and optimization processes via data-driven insights and recommendations.Requirements: M.Sc or Phd in Physics 1-3 years of experience as a Researcher (can be academic experience) Good Knowledge in statistical computer languages (Python, R, Matlab etc.) Self-learning skills- an ability to master concepts, disciplines, and methods quickly Passion for technology, data, and analytics Good communication and interpersonal skills Ability to work independently and in a team in a fast-paced environment A can-do approach with a desire to tackle complex problems

Title: Customer Success Manager- Spanish
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Agritask, a well-financed startup whose agronomic Intelligence & Analytics platform helps the world’s largest Food & Beverage Enterprises create a more sustainable and predictable world. Agritask has a mission to provide Global Food & Beverage Enterprises, with greater control over supply by: Guiding, monitoring, and enforcing sustainable and agronomic practices at scale Forecasting yields and detecting supply risks early, leveraging historical & in-season dataThe impact of climate change on global food systems is becoming ever more apparent. Yield reduction and volatility patterns in food crops comprise and break supply chains. This, combined with growing concern for farm communities and the environment by both manufacturers and consumers, is pushing the industry to adopt solutions that will help the transformation toward predictable and sustainable supply chains and production practices.Over the past two years, Agritask has seen significant growth and adoption by world-leading Food & Beverage companies. Brands such as Starbucks and Heineken use Agritask to minimize risk and better predict supply chains, optimize farming operations, and ensure sustainable farming and sourcing practices.After a recent multi-million-dollar investment from a consortium of investors, the company is well-positioned to continue growing.We are looking for a Spanish Customer Success Manager to become a part of our business team Tel Aviv office (Hybrid).You Will Serve as a trusted advisor to our clients, while driving product adoption and growing our large enterprise' customers'rs clients Develop new business with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement Identify and develop new business opportunities together with sales representatives Maintain a deep understanding of the customer’s business as well as their technical environment, to drive value across their operations, retention, and growth Prepare reports on account status Assist with challenging client requests Serve as a focal point of contact for all customer account management matters Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions, according to customer needs and goals Communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders Manage customer onboarding and product training Promote user engagement and monitor system usageRequirements 4 years of experience as a Customer Success Manager/ Account Manager, or relevant role in B2B SaaS startups Fluent in English & Spanish - must Experience delivering client-focused solutions to customer needs Ability to handle multiple account management projects simultaneously while maintaining sharp attention to details Effective communication and presentation skills, as well as the ability to influence senior executives and C-level executives High analytical skills Self-motivated with a proactive approachNice to have BA in Agronomy, Engineering, Geography, or related studies GIS and Database experience

Title: Pre-clinical Study Manager

Text: EMENDO is a biotech company that develops gene editing-based therapies for various diseases. We are seeking for highly motivated scientists to support preclinical development of gene editing products from early proof of concept studies to regulatory filing and submission.The position requires adaptability, creativity, and capacity for constant innovation in pursuit of company goals. Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Noname Security, founded in 2020, is rapidly growing with more than 200 team members globally, and only a year out of stealth, the company is the first API Security Unicorn, at $1B valuation and $220M in total financing. Noname Security is also one of the fastest growing cybersecurity companies ever. Our mission is to reduce the risk of API security vulnerabilities and cyber-attacks. Our API Security Platform is an out-of-band solution that doesn’t require agents or network modifications and offers deeper visibility and security than API gateways, load balancers, and WAFs. No one addresses the API security challenge like Noname.Requirements:A Bachelor's degree or equivalent and 5+ years of experience in a CSM, TAM, CSE, or similar customer-facing role are required. A Master's degree is preferred. Experience with one or more of the following: API technologies, container technologies, security, or SaaS/Cloud Well-organized self-starter with excellent work ethic, attention to detail, and a desire to learn. Strong written and verbal communication/presentation skills and technical aptitude. Strong listening skills with the demonstrated ability to ask effective questions, dive deep, understand the customer’s business priorities and anticipate the customer’s needs. A demonstrated history of growing customer happiness, adoption, and/or retention. Experience/familiarity with CRM, service desk, CS tools (e.g., Salesforce, Zendesk, Gainsight). Fluent English (Spoken and written). Other languages- advantageResponsibilities:Manage the entire post-sales journey including all CS activities through readiness for renewal. Ensure rapid and robust adoption of our solution by the customer, including understanding their data and practices well enough to always lead them to the next value/benefit they can achieve with the platform. Develop and maintain long-term relationships with stakeholders in your account portfolio. Develop success plans for customers that outline their critical success factors, metrics for success, and provide recommendations. Prioritize and drive resolution on escalated customer issues. Identify expansion and upsell opportunities as part of continued engagement. Collaborate actively with Product Management, Engineering, Sales, Solution Architecture, Marketing, and other internal teams. Bring the voice of the customer to the Product Manager, Engineering, and Marketing to deliver the best-in-class customer experience for your portfolio. Measure, report and analyze account health, playbook progress, account sentiment to optimize the customer journey continuously through innovative practices focused on driving adoption, retention, and expansion.

Text: This is usArtlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.Artlist consists of 4 products:Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platformArtgrid.io, a curated stock footage platformMotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photosFXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing softwareWe’re looking for a full-time Footage Content Specialist who lives and breathes video to join our colorful in-house Footage team, Artgrid Original, in our Tel Aviv office.Wake up for thisResearch and analyze the Artgrid catalog and our competitors, and create briefs accordinglyCollaborate with filmmakers from all over the world and set the creative tone Work alongside the production team to create breathtaking cinematic videosCome up with data-based footage briefs for new productionsBe in charge of storyboard, lighting, grading and art references for various productions Supervise animation processes Come up with innovative ways to create creative and useful footageRequirements:Portfolio is a mustDeep understanding of composition, lighting, lenses and camera movementsDirecting experience is a huge plusExperience in art direction (not necessarily set art direction)Master of all that is beautifulPassionate about footage with a deep understanding of various styles and genresUp-to-date on design and animation trendsTech-savvyExperienced in the advertising/film/video industry Fluent English speaker Skilled with computer programs and advanced technologies Understanding of filmmaking (shooting and editing) - advantageFast learner with positive attitude and great vibesHighly organized with a keen eye for detailsTeam player is a must

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who We AreHi, we are Carbyne. We are on a mission to help emergency call centers save lives every day. As the leader in emergency collaboration technologies, we’re building a platform that brings game-changing capabilities to people in crisis, such as live video, instant chat, and location tracking. Our platform unifies the flow of life-saving information to emergency call centers, so they can handle emergencies faster than ever, and get to the right people, at the right place, at the right time. We currently provide services to over 400 million people in over eight countries around the world, and partner with Google, Cisco, Amazon, and Microsoft to deliver life-saving technologies. Want to join our mission-driven team? Read on.Headquarters: New York City, New YorkCurrent Headcount: 180 People and counting….Carbyne WebsiteCarbyne Corporate VideoNew-Orleans VideoCarbyne APEX Launch in RioCOGTechcrunch article: Carbyne raises $56M Series CAbout the role:As a Product Manager at Carbyne, you will be responsible for the entire life cycle of the product and will work with engineering, design, sales, customers, and other internal stakeholders to execute on Carbyne’s vision. You will identify opportunities, create and execute on the product roadmap, as well as define, scope, and work with developers to make your ideas come to life. Our perfect candidate brings a blend of business vision, technical knowledge, and focus on execution. We are building something that will have a material impact on people and save lives, we are in a rapid phase of growth and looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and loves building things that matter.What you’ll be working on:Lead Carbyne's efforts to develop innovative product solutions that meet the needs of the market.Synthesize feedback from customers, competitors, partners, and market trends to create business problem statements for new and existing products and services.Collaborate with other product managers, marketing, and pre/post sales teams to achieve product success.Handle customer and market discovery, requirements gathering (MRDs and PRDs), and regulations.Create user stories, refine requirements, and work with engineering teams to create software.Work with cross-functional teams to launch the software that was created.Own the product roadmap, use case prioritization, and feature definition.Requirements5+ years of experience in SaaS product management as a PM or PO.Expertise in voice platforms, call handling systems, specifically VoIP and SIP for and cloud-native services.Product management experience on a large scale. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex information in a clear and concise manner.Action-oriented with an ability to leverage collaboration skills and initiative to get things done.Experience in Agile development methodology.Experience in managing multiple stakeholders, both internal & external.Willingness to travel for client visits.Ability to build relationships and influence outside of the authority.Bonus points for:Experience with UCaaS, CCaaS and/or CPaaSBackground in the 911 industry - i3, ESINet, Call taking, CAD, ANI\ALI, CAMA trunk, NG9-1-1 architectures and product/solution ecosystem within the public safety sectorAn understanding of i3 standards and interface specifications including MSRP, PIDF-LO, SIPREC, and NGCS parametersKnowledge of PSAP solutions and NG Call Handling requirementsWhat else we’re looking for:Carbyne’s responsibility is great, and so are our people. People at Carbyne choose us because they see how much each person matters, contributes, and counts.We’re a mission-driven team with a strong set of values. We take them pretty seriously here at Carbyne, and want to make sure that anyone who joins our team takes them seriously, too. If you grabbed coffee with any of our team members, you would see that we: Excellence - Thrive to create great things. Mistakes create innovation, collaboration and authenticity - people can be themselves - ask any questions, see mistakes as opportunities to learn, to get better. Responsiveness - Adaptive to new situations, new people, clients expectations, solving problems fast and together. Simplicity - Listening, thinking, smart solutions, tools that work for you and for our customers, Services which warms the heart, Delivery that makes the complex simple. Warmth - To collaborate with our internal teams and partner with our clients, we must show our empathy, warmth, and mutual respect. It’s a big part of who we are at Carbyne. Reliability - Everyone takes responsibility and is very proactive. Tech forward, to keep people first - Our consistent, unyielding drive to iterate and improve is linked to our desire to manifest real change for the people who use our tools every day.With Carbyne, Every Person Counts.

Title: Store Manager, Israel
Location: Rishon LeZion, Center District, Israel
Text: What To ExpectAs a Store Manager at Tesla you are a seasoned and charismatic retail leader, responsible for overseeing and driving sales and delivery operations at your location. In this role, you will be responsible for leading the overall management and sales execution, recruitment, training, and development of a dynamic store team. Your team will look to you to set the standard for open communication, active problem solving, and a positive work environment. We expect you to be 100% committed to the success of your team, and actively involve yourself in your team members’ growth and development. You are a hands-on coach with a strong business acumen. You seek constant improvement of performance and have a strong understanding of numbers and KPIs.Your job comes with a high level of autonomy that enables you to creatively develop your operation which also entails a large responsibility of self-evaluation and constantly seeking excellence.What You’ll DoBusiness Performance and DevelopmentEnsure that the location Sales targets, KPIs, and Operational priorities are communicated to the team and subsequently met or exceeded, including but not limited to sales opportunity creation, test drive scheduling, new orders, pre-delivery readiness, maximum delivery yield, and customer satisfaction scoresDrive business and maximize sales through excellent customer service, deep product knowledge, and superb product presentation and promotionLead the planning, implementation and follow up of store events / sales networking activitiesSeek out, review, and analyze performance data to translate numbers and establish the best strategy/ action plans; communicate these regularly to the location staffProactively discover new business opportunities and partner with the business sales leaders as needed to highlight any commercial opportunities that may ariseOperational ExcellenceEnsure that processes and best practices are well understood, implemented, and followed at your locationPartner with relevant stakeholders to set up and facilitate delivery operations (Service and Operations teams, etc.)Drive continuous improvements to facilitate exceptional team output and customer service including designing innovative solutions to problems at your locationChampion efficiency, productivity, quality, and overall excellence in all of your actions and decisionsTake responsibility for implementing EHS and safety requirements in your locationManage facilities and closely follow up on dedicated costs and budgets (store supplies, location works, contractors, etc.)Maintain a strong overview of processes and resourcesEstablish close cooperation with all business stakeholders, internally and externallySupport the local team in the execution of their activities and other business needsCustomer ExperienceGuide and coach employees towards providing a best in class customer experience at all timesEnsure that the showroom is always presentable and that Tesla’s customer-facing standards are consistently met (Merchandising, Tesla uniform/ dress code, floor presence, proactive management of inbound activities)Demand flawless execution of all customer-facing eventsProvide support to the team in dealing with difficult customers conversations, ensuring that customer needs are understood and metContinuously follow up and analyze CSAT scores, and proactively take appropriate actions to improve itPeople Management Interview and cooperate on recruitment activities with your recruitment partners in order to build a team of top talent and mentor the next generation of Tesla leadersProvide regular coaching, training, and feedback to your team members and maintain deep knowledge of your team’s strengths and opportunitiesBe responsible for leading change and inspiring your team every day(lead by example)Create and drive a structured and inclusive culture in your teamIn collaboration with your HR partner, assess your team’s performance and deal with underperformance and disciplinary issues quickly and efficientlyListen to your team – remove blockers and partner with your local teams to ensure you have the resources and tools necessary for your location’s success.What You’ll BringSignificant manager experience in retail sales and operations with proven track record of meeting and exceeding targets and goals.Strong experience in coaching and managing performance on a team and individual levelIn-depth knowledge of sales processes and ability to translate this in a manner that motivates your team to exceed targetsBeyond taking ownership, be accountable for your own actions and responsibilities, you can create a culture where your team does the sameGreat understanding and experience in creating extraordinary customer journeysEntrepreneurial and analytical mindset with great understanding of the local market.Ability to develop collaborative relationships and act as a well-respected, trusted partner and leader that others want to work withConfident in learning and adapting to multiple technologies.Passionate about the mission of TeslaExcellent communication skills in English and HebrewValid driver's license

Title: Data Analyst - ML team
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: UVeye is looking to hire a data analyst to join our forming data team. You will manage our master data set, develop reports, work closely with our data scientists and troubleshoot data issues. To do well in this role, you need a very fine eye for detail, proven experience as a data analyst, and deep understanding of the popular data analysis tools and databases.Responsibilities:Managing master data, including creation, updates, and deletion.Managing users and user roles.Commissioning and decommissioning of data sets, and supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization.Providing technical expertise in data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing.Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines.Managing and designing the reporting environment - including data sources, security and metadata, and troubleshooting as neededSupporting the data warehouse in identifying and revising reporting requirements.Assessing tests and implementing new or upgraded software and assisting with strategic decisions on new systems.Provide quality assurance of imported data, working with quality assurance analysts if necessary.Evaluating changes and updates to source production systems.Training end-users on new reports and dashboards.Requirements:B.Sc. in computer science / Industrial engineeringOver 3 years of experience as a data analyst and managing large-scale databases.Experience analyzing existing tools and databases and providing software solution recommendations. Python - mustDemonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases (MongoDB - advantage)Ability to work with stakeholders to assess potential risks.Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, lay terms.Understanding of addressing and metadata standards.High-level written and verbal communication skills.

Title: Data Collector
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Multinarity is a startup in the field of Augmented Reality. In order to make this happen, we need people to collect the data to develop this technology.We are looking for a Data Collector to join the Algorithms team.In this role you will be in charge of collecting data that will enable the product to work in Mixed Reality- where the physical world affects the virtual world. This will enable a unique experience for our users and can’t be done without high quality data.The position requires working at the office all week.ResponsibilitiesCollect data with motion capture toolsData collection from various locations- mostly our offices, occasionally it will include other offices, homes and outdoorsOrganize data collected within our data management infrastructure﻿Requirements:Basic programming experienceMust be able to perform operations with computers and operate software such as Windows, Excel, Word, etcStrong communication skills and ability to work in a team environmentPleasant personality, can do attitudeDesire to learn new thingsSolid English skillsNo related previous experience needed or technological background in the field of Augmented Reality

Title: Community Manager
Location: Rishon LeZion, Center District, Israel
Text: Join the original creators behind a blockbuster series with over 250,000,000 downloads, leading App stores charts and one of the world's leading mobile games bike racing category.Join one of the most well- funded, experienced teams in the Web3 gaming space today in making this natural gaming evolution come to life. They are beyond excited to be one of the first group of highly experienced game creators and publishers that will utilize the Web3 concepts, capabilities and innovative technologies to create and build massive gaming projects that will become the natural metaverse space for their players, competitive gamers and the Web3 guilds supported by the biggest brands from all over the world.We are now in search for highly motivated team players, passionate about Web3, Blockchain Gaming and the fast-growing crypto world. Its time to join in!We are looking for a qualified Community Manager to join the team. If you are a tech-savvy professional, experienced in social media, PR and promotional events, we would like to meet you.This is a unique opportunity to join the most exciting space in the gaming industry and take an important part in today’s most desirable positions in the gaming space, you will challenge yourself, your team and the company's growing international well-known brand, to the next level of excellence.Our ideal candidate is a master at managing communities on platforms like Discord and Telegram, is active in gaming communities and has a passion for blockchain and Web3. The candidate must have exceptional oral and written communication skills and is able to develop engaging content. You should be a ‘people person’ with great customer service skills and the ability to moderate online and offline conversations with our community.Ultimately, you should be able to act as the face and voice of the company's brand and manage all community communications.What Would Work Great Set and implement social media and communication campaigns to align with marketing strategies A deep understanding of community building on Telegram and Discord, including but not limited to bots and other necessary technicalities required.  Generate and maintain a conversation in all communities.  Set up, build and manage community accounts of platforms like Reddit and other relevant applications.  Respond to comments and users queries in a timely manner Monitor and report on feedback and online comments and reviews Lead experiments that help scale the company's community programs and their impact Report on the health of the community servers, and make recommendations for improvement Responsible for managing all moderators on communities  Building and executing a strategy to drive community growth and engagement Organize and participate in events to build community and boost brand awareness Coordinate with Marketing, PR and Communications team members and suppliers to ensure brand consistency Liaise with Development and Business Development departments to stay updated on new products and features Build relationships with users, potential customers, industry professionals and journalists Stay up-to-date with digital technology trendsQualifications Proven work experience as a community manager Capable of working on your own initiative and unsupervised Experience launching community initiatives (e.g. building an online forum, launching an ambassador program, creating an event series and writing an email newsletter) Ability to identify and track relevant community metrics (e.g. repeat attendance at events) Excellent verbal communication skills Excellent writing skills Hands on experience with social media management for brands Ability to interpret website traffic and online customer engagement metrics Knowledge of online marketing and marketing channels Attention to detail and ability to multitask

Title: Business Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who are we?:Join the world's fastest-growing mobile games company!SuperPlay is on a mission to create the world's best mobile games, and have fun while doing it.Founded in 2019 by industry veterans from Playtika, Rovio, and the movie industry.We set out to create delightful, memorable casual games that players can enjoy for years.Our first game Dice Dreams has become a top-100 grossing global hit, and our team has grown to include dozens of top-talent, dedicated, and driven individuals.Our plans are even more exciting - if you want to be part of the journey, check out the role below!What will you do in SuperPlay?:Analyse large, complex data sets to address strategic and operational business decisionsProvide actionable recommendations and conclusions from game data to shape features, game economies, and future product roadmapsWork closely with internal departments to drive insights that will help produce better games and insights that will drive towards monetization and retention improvementsBuild automated dashboards and reports to facilitate company-wide awareness and understanding of key business metrics and player’s experiencesWho are you?:At least a year of analytical work experience, preferably for a web or mobile company, Online Gaming industryBA/B.Sc. in Statistics / Math / Engineering / Economy or other quantitative fieldsStrong SQL with experience in querying large, complex data setsAdvanced Excel knowledge, experience with BI tools (Looker is an advantage)High level of analytical and problem-solving skills with strong attention to detailsExcellent communication skills – someone who can turn complex concepts into actionable recommendationsA true passion for understanding consumers' social gaming behaviour and tolerance for ambiguity
