Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: StoreMaven has developed leading app store marketing tools to support and accelerate the mobile growth strategy of top-grossing app developers such as Uber, Ebay, King, and Jam City.We’re looking for customer-centric Strategic Consultants to join our team and work directly with our enterprise clients to develop and advance their app store marketing and mobile growth strategy. To do so, they will conduct app store research, develop testing strategies, analyze app store tests to glean insights, and broaden their knowledge of the app store and mobile marketing industry as a whole.The result? Deliver value by leveraging our suite of products to optimize clients’ app store conversions and mobile growth.We are looking for candidates with 3+ years' experience in a similar type of consulting role, with a preference for those from the mobile marketing industry, though not exclusively. Candidates should exhibit strong relationship-building and critical thinking skills, business acumen, an ability to think outside of the box, and an eagerness to learn, develop, and make an impact.Requirements:Excellent communication skills; strong ability to articulate clearly and concisely and develop intricate, senior enterprise-level client relationshipsStrong analytical skills; ability to synthesize large amounts of information and draw insightsStrategic-oriented thinker; proactive, takes initiative, and thinks outside the boxVersatile, resilient, thrives in a challenging, fast-paced environment
Requirements: ['Excellent communication skills; strong ability to articulate clearly and concisely and develop intricate, senior enterprise-level client relationships', 'Strong analytical skills; ability to synthesize large amounts of information and draw insights', 'Strategic-oriented thinker; proactive, takes initiative, and thinks outside the box', 'Versatile, resilient, thrives in a challenging, fast-paced environment']

Title: Internal Communications Leader
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: SolarEdge is a top global leader, creating smart energy solutions. By leveraging world-class engineering capabilities, and with a relentless focus on innovation, SolarEdge creates smart energy solutions that power our lives and drive future progress.We are looking for an exceptional Internal Communications Leader who will bring in story-telling, communications, employee engagement, and strategies to cascade our goals and messages. Communications approaches should be innovative to build ongoing engagement across all company, driving collaboration and interaction. The ideal candidate will be a candidate who excels at building bridges, deliver consistent messaging, and communicating in a sharp and creative way.What will you do?Lead the ICOM strategy and execution: Develop, shape, and execute an internal communication strategy that drives employee engagement and organizational alignment of SolarEdge.Be responsible for the EVP Implantation in the organization.Build Icom for unique critical populations – focus on R&D, HR, Business aligned with the SolarEdge culture.Simplify complex business information and produce engaging and effective content in a variety of styles and formats for multiple channels at the global, regional, and site levels.Ensure organizational initiatives and projects are successfully communicated to employees and stakeholdersPlan, edit, and write content for a variety of internal communications mediums, such as a staff intranet, monthly magazine, or regular email bulletin. You may also be required to work on the layout of content.Ensure internal communication messages are consistent with external communication messagesSelect effective tools, mediums, and technologies for message delivery in alignment with communication strategy.Act as program manager for all communications initiatives.Provide internal communication guidelines across businesses units around important messages and SolarEdge goals.Required Skills/Experience5-10 years of overall experience in corporate communications, PR, or marketing with a focus on internal communications. Excellent native English language verbal and written communication skills.Proven experience in corporate writing and communications experience.Experience with a variety of communications techniques.Social media experience is a must and a focus.The passion of Storytelling.Creative thinking.Strategic communications planning.Social and multimedia communications approach (written, video & animation, blogging, social).Demonstrated ability to operate both strategically & execute tactically as required.Experience with Icom inside a business.
Requirements: ['Lead the ICOM strategy and execution: Develop, shape, and execute an internal communication strategy that drives employee engagement and organizational alignment of SolarEdge.', 'Be responsible for the EVP Implantation in the organization.', 'Build Icom for unique critical populations – focus on R&D, HR, Business aligned with the SolarEdge culture.', 'Simplify complex business information and produce engaging and effective content in a variety of styles and formats for multiple channels at the global, regional, and site levels.', 'Ensure organizational initiatives and projects are successfully communicated to employees and stakeholders', 'Plan, edit, and write content for a variety of internal communications mediums, such as a staff intranet, monthly magazine, or regular email bulletin. You may also be required to work on the layout of content.', 'Ensure internal communication messages are consistent with external communication messages', 'Select effective tools, mediums, and technologies for message delivery in alignment with communication strategy.', 'Act as program manager for all communications initiatives.', 'Provide internal communication guidelines across businesses units around important messages and SolarEdge goals.', '5-10 years of overall experience in corporate communications, PR, or marketing with a focus on internal communications.', 'Excellent native English language verbal and written communication skills.', 'Proven experience in corporate writing and communications experience.', 'Experience with a variety of communications techniques.', 'Social media experience is a must and a focus.', 'The passion of Storytelling.', 'Creative thinking.', 'Strategic communications planning.', 'Social and multimedia communications approach (written, video & animation, blogging, social).', 'Demonstrated ability to operate both strategically & execute tactically as required.', 'Experience with Icom inside a business.']

Title: VP R&D
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Xyte is looking for a passionate and experienced VP R&D to lead the development team (Hands-on, currently 10 engineers and hiring). This is an opportunity to join an outstanding team within a fast-paced and growing organization. As VP R&D, you will be responsible for establishing and managing end-to-end development processes: from design to successful production and post-production supportResponsibilities:Lead a growing R&D organization of a complex SaaS productSet and manage workflows, rules, and development approachesWork with the product, marketing and sales departments to define the company’s goalsMentor, grow and improve the R&D groupRequirements:﻿Requirements:5+ years of exceptional leadership experience and proven success in managing R&D groupsMinimum 10 years of experience in software developmentStrong understanding of scalable applicationsAbout XyteXyte is an early-stage start-up backed by world-class investors and industry leadersOur disruptive, product-first approach makes it easy for equipment manufacturers to cloudify their devices, better support and service customers, and commercialize their products with As-a-Service business modelsLeading organizations deploy Xyte’s Connected Device Management Platform to bridge the gap between their devices and modern cloud applicationsCome join us and see what the Xytement is all about!
Requirements: ['Lead a growing R&D organization of a complex SaaS product', 'Set and manage workflows, rules, and development approaches', 'Work with the product, marketing and sales departments to define the company’s goals', 'Mentor, grow and improve the R&D group', '5+ years of exceptional leadership experience and proven success in managing R&D groups', 'Minimum 10 years of experience in software development', 'Strong understanding of scalable applications']

Title: Customer Experience Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Faye is looking for a Customer Experience Specialist to join our fast-growing team as we take over the travel industry. This key role will ensure we are delivering a customer-first, best-in-class service to our valued users and will be pivotal in setting the bar for standard and excellence in the travel space.We work in a fun, collaborative and entrepreneurial environment and are looking for a proactive, accountable leader focused on continuous learning and growth to push themselves and our team forward. If you’re process-driven, passionate about the travel space and keen to make an impact, then this is the role for you.Responsibilities:Be customer obsessed and set the highest bar for customer care in our industry. This role will be key in developing a top-notch reputation for our growing brand - one that is known for excellence, speed, empathy, proactivity and positivity.Handle incoming calls and digital inquiries from our US customers who are traveling stateside and abroad.Provide real-time support related to travel inquiries & emergency events.Collect & monitor travel intelligence information.Interact with travel & medical providers.Effectively manage customer contacts across various channels of communication, including phone, e-mail and chat.Efficiently handle customer complaints with empathy, knowledge and understanding.Complete customer requests in a friendly, professional and timely manner.Work collaboratively across teams and departments to help solve any matter at hand.Qualifications:Native English speaker / English mother-tongue level- mustExcellent verbal & written communications skillsAbility to display great time management and prioritize workload while remaining organized and efficientProven experience in customer service/call center rolesFamiliarity with American customer service and cultureA medical and/or travel background - a plusTech-orientedAbility to work in shifts - 24/7
Requirements: ['Be customer obsessed and set the highest bar for customer care in our industry. This role will be key in developing a top-notch reputation for our growing brand - one that is known for excellence, speed, empathy, proactivity and positivity.', 'Handle incoming calls and digital inquiries from our US customers who are traveling stateside and abroad.', 'Provide real-time support related to travel inquiries & emergency events.', 'Collect & monitor travel intelligence information.', 'Interact with travel & medical providers.', 'Effectively manage customer contacts across various channels of communication, including phone, e-mail and chat.', 'Efficiently handle customer complaints with empathy, knowledge and understanding.', 'Complete customer requests in a friendly, professional and timely manner.', 'Work collaboratively across teams and departments to help solve any matter at hand.', 'Native English speaker / English mother-tongue level- must', 'Excellent verbal & written communications skills', 'Ability to display great time management and prioritize workload while remaining organized and efficient', 'Proven experience in customer service/call center roles', 'Familiarity with American customer service and culture', 'A medical and/or travel background - a plus', 'Tech-oriented', 'Ability to work in shifts - 24/7']

Title: VP Product
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Monogoto’s IoT cellular cloud network enables innovation and flexibility for services that drive a more connected world. Our rapidly expanding 5G IoT connectivity service provides seamless, accessible and cost-effective device connectivity that scales developers’ requirements.Today Monogoto connects millions of devices in over 160 countries and 500 networks across multiple verticals such as from point of sale, manufacturing, healthcare, fleet management, micromobility, retail and so much more.Monogoto was founded in 2018 by a team of highly experienced telecommunications, cellular and security experts. Backed by a group of well-known and highly engaged investors and strategic partners, its growing, dynamic and diverse team operates globally from Tel Aviv, and Silicon Valley.ResponsibilitiesCollect, prioritize and communicate product requirements and featuresDrive the execution of product life cycle, including research, planning, roadmap development, requirements development, and features launchWork closely with designers, developers, QA, and researchers on a daily basisInteract with customers to collect feedback and design upcoming featuresWork closely with external and internal users to identify gaps and opportunities for product improvement and innovation, and align all product efforts﻿Requirements:Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or equivalent practical experience5+ years of experience as a product manager and/or significant software development backgroundExperience with api / developer platform – MustExperience in IoT / Cellular networks – advantage Experience in field roles – a big advantagePrior experience working in a small startup that grew from 20 to 100+ – mandatory Experience working collaboratively with designers, product managers, and engineersAbility to present and analyse technical information Highly analytical with the ability to research and analyse technical informationAttention to detailsExcellent communication, influence, and cross-functional engagement skills
Requirements: ['Collect, prioritize and communicate product requirements and features', 'Drive the execution of product life cycle, including research, planning, roadmap development, requirements development, and features launch', 'Work closely with designers, developers, QA, and researchers on a daily basis', 'Interact with customers to collect feedback and design upcoming features', 'Work closely with external and internal users to identify gaps and opportunities for product improvement and innovation, and align all product efforts', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or equivalent practical experience', '5+ years of experience as a product manager and/or significant software development background', 'Experience with api / developer platform – Must', 'Experience in IoT / Cellular networks – advantage', 'Experience in field roles – a big advantage', 'Prior experience working in a small startup that grew from 20 to 100+ – mandatory', 'Experience working collaboratively with designers, product managers, and engineers', 'Ability to present and analyse technical information', 'Highly analytical with the ability to research and analyse technical information', 'Attention to details', 'Excellent communication, influence, and cross-functional engagement skills']

Title: BI Developer (Entry Level)
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Medison is the first to create an international commercialization platform for highly innovative therapies, helping to save and improve lives by making the best available novel treatments accessible to patients in international markets. Medison has a track record of multi-territorial partnerships with leading pharmaceutical and biotech companies seeking to expand their global reach.We pride ourselves on our deep expertise in local regulatory requirements, market access know-how, and our uncompromising excellence in compliance. We offer an affiliate-like partnership and tailored solutions for country-specific and regional commercialization, enabling emerging biotech companies to navigate local complexities and expand their reach to patients in Israel, Canada, and across Central Eastern Europe.Requirements:Relevant bachelor's degree (BSc in Industrial and Management Engineer/Information Systems Engineer/Statistics or equivalent academic knowledge)Fluent written and spoken English1-2 years of BI developer experienceStrong knowledge of SQL queriesExperience in ETL processes according to BI methodologiesKnowledge in Priority ERP/Netsuite - AdvantageKnowledge in Netsuite - AdvantageThorough understanding of business processesStrong self-learning capabilities, great interpersonal skillsResponsibilities:As a BI Developer at Medison Pharma, a fast-growing company, you will join our great BI & Data Team and be responsible for building dashboards and reports across the organization from scratch.End-to-end development cycle, particularly Dashboards and Front End.Provide ongoing support for existing BI solutions and Collaborate across the business with various stakeholders.
Requirements: ["Relevant bachelor's degree (BSc in Industrial and Management Engineer/Information Systems Engineer/Statistics or equivalent academic knowledge)", 'Fluent written and spoken English', '1-2 years of BI developer experience', 'Strong knowledge of SQL queries', 'Experience in ETL processes according to BI methodologies', 'Knowledge in Priority ERP/Netsuite - Advantage', 'Knowledge in Netsuite - Advantage', 'Thorough understanding of business processes', 'Strong self-learning capabilities, great interpersonal skills']

Title: VP Product
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: CYREBRO is the first interactive SOC Platform, transforming how today’s businesses respond to and mitigate cyber threats with a centralized security operations infrastructure. The platform provides complete clarity, insight, and real-time cyber recommendations for businesses of all sizes by integrating all of their security events into one central command.We are looking for an experienced VP Product to lead CYREBRO product vision. In this position, you will oversee multiple product disciplines and drive the company’s strategic transition to become a fully SaaS-based firm. In this role, you will cooperate with teams from across the organization to shape the product’s roadmap by combining a deep understanding of the business as well as the technical operation that drives it.Requirements: Experienced in Product and Team Management – must  Experience working with the cybersecurity B2B market – must. High Technical orientation, with emphasis on endpoints, cyber-attack & detection methods, and Cloud deployment architectures. Experience working in Agile framework (Scrum/Kanban). Excellent communication skills. Proven data orientation. Fluent English – spoken and written.Responsibilities: Define product roadmap according to strategic goals of the company. Manage the Product team, comprised of multiple Product disciplines: Outbound, inbound, UX/UI design, and data analysis. Maintain a deep understanding of the market and the cybersecurity ecosystem. Lead the implementation of Agile methods within the Product and R&D teams. Manage internal stakeholders – Cooperate with fellow managers to create sustainable workflows according to the product’s vision. Release Authority – approve any major release before Production rollout.
Requirements: ['Experienced in Product and Team Management – must', 'Experience working with the cybersecurity B2B market – must.', 'High Technical orientation, with emphasis on endpoints, cyber-attack & detection methods, and Cloud deployment architectures.', 'Experience working in Agile framework (Scrum/Kanban).', 'Excellent communication skills.', 'Proven data orientation.', 'Fluent English – spoken and written.', 'Define product roadmap according to strategic goals of the company.', 'Manage the Product team, comprised of multiple Product disciplines: Outbound, inbound, UX/UI design, and data analysis.', 'Maintain a deep understanding of the market and the cybersecurity ecosystem.', 'Lead the implementation of Agile methods within the Product and R&D teams.', 'Manage internal stakeholders – Cooperate with fellow managers to create sustainable workflows according to the product’s vision.', 'Release Authority – approve any major release before Production rollout.']

Title: Customer Service Representative
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The Customer Care Specialist acts as a liaison between Gett, its drivers, clients and passengers. Customer Care is key to the delivery of our service commitments and is vital in your approach towards your duties.Your responsibility is the key to growing the business and developing a reputation for service excellence, and acting like a role model in both action and attitude.The position includes 90% working from home.To be available during the following shifts from Sunday to Saturday (including Holidays): 07.00 – 15.00, 15.00 – 23.00, 23.00 – 07.00.Requirements:Commitment of 4 shifts per week (including nights and weekends).Previous experience in a service center - an advantage.
Requirements: ['The position includes 90% working from home.', 'To be available during the following shifts from Sunday to Saturday (including Holidays): 07.00 – 15.00, 15.00 – 23.00, 23.00 – 07.00.', 'Commitment of 4 shifts per week (including nights and weekends).', 'Previous experience in a service center - an advantage.']

Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: לאבא יישום אסטרטגיות דרוש/ה PMOבמסגרת התפקיד:ניהול תוכניות עבודה מפורטות, תמיכה טכנית של התקדמות הפרויקט.ניתוח דאטה, אנליזות וכו, יודע להניע תהליכים ,לעמוד מול מנכלים ולהציג נתונים עם מנהל הפרויקטים.יתרון –– חשוב לציין שהחברה תעשה הכשרה במקום לעובד .Requirements:תואר בהנדסה תעשייה וניהול.ניסיון כPMO 3-4 שנים (אפשר גם טיפה פחות)יומיים במשרד , 3 ימים מהבית.הכירות עם כלי ניהול וMS

Title: Chief of Staff to the CIO
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Descriptionmonday.com is looking for a passionate Chief of staff Manager (Officer of the CIO).In this role you will act as a trusted advisor to the CIO and senior management, working closely with the Data, R&D and business applications teams to take end-to-end responsibility, oversee all the processes, projects and initiatives of Data and IS Technologies department.You will work closely with leadership, to create a meaningful impact. Title: Data Annotator
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The company is on a mission to change the way we, as a society, take care of every older adult who needs it. We are leveraging the power of AI and data to ensure safety, dignity, and satisfaction in every caregiver-care recipient interaction.Why SensiWork with a purpose. Join us in creating an ideal care environment for older adults. Be a part of our founding team; help us make Sensi a new industry standard for the long-term care industry.About the role:This role is a critical component in any AI-driven machine. We are looking for a detailed and audio-oriented individual to join our team to help train AI/ML and improve predictions’ quality. As a data annotator, you will be responsible for annotating and analyzing various data sets and drawing intelligent conclusions to support our mission to train machine learning algorithms and clients.Requirements:Native English speaker – an advantageTeam playerGoals orientedStrong analytical skillsDedicated to customer successDigital literacy
Requirements: ['Native English speaker – an advantage', 'Team player', 'Goals oriented', 'Strong analytical skills', 'Dedicated to customer success', 'Digital literacy']

Title: PMO for Product department
Location: Center District, Israel
Text: Portfolio Operations Manager/ PMO for Product departmentWho are we?Kramer is a leading player and pioneer in the Pro AV industry. Title: Head of Design
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Tango is a successful, market leader, a live-streaming Platform with 450+ Million registered users, in an industry projected to reach $240 BILLION in the next couple of years.The B2C platform, based on the best-quality global video technology, allows millions of talented people around the world to create their own live content, engage with their fans and monetize their talents.Tango live stream was founded in 2018 and is powered by 300+ global employees operating in a culture of growth, learning, and success!The Tango team is a vigorous cocktail of hard workers, creative brains, energizers, geeks, overachievers, athletes, and more. We push the limits to bring our app from “one of the top” to “the leader”.The best way to describe Tango's work style is not to use the word “impossible”. And we believe that success is a thorny path that runs on sleepless nights, corporate parties, tough releases, and of course our users' smiles (and as we are a LIVE app, we truly get to see our users all around the world smiling right in front of us in real-time!).Do you want to join the party?Requirements:5+ years of relevant experience in product design and 3+ years of management experience.Experience leading and scaling product design teams.Vast experience in digital products: mobile apps, web apps, graphic design.Excellent hard skills to take the most challenging design tasks by your own.Excellent soft skills and stress tolerance.Experience in fast-paced and growing start-up environments, such as product companies, growing startups.Excellent writing and verbal communication skills in English.Bonus but no must: experience working in social media or entertainment products.Responsibilities:Build and manage a talented team of product designers, that consistently delivers on projects and is well-balanced across a range of design skill sets. Guide creative and holistic thinking across diverse product releases, platforms, and devices.Deliver a UX strategy, along with a plan for evolutionary, iterative updates that actualize the larger strategy over time. Make sure that design helps to achieve Tango's business goals and the design strategy follows the overall company strategy.Take part in all brainstorms and product improvements. Be initiative, suggest solutions and find problems.Communicate with product owners and stakeholders directly and transfer business requests to design team and team feedback back to business.Use design to go beyond jobs-to-be-done to delight and bring in brand experiences.Lead with customer obsession, guide towards strong user experience and strategically leverage user research.Think across all layers of design from systems to interactions, balancing feasibility and compelling experiences. Improve the quality of overall design output by example and through definition of system design thinking for cross experiences within the platform.Support and build positive and effective communication with other company’s departments.Supervised of what is happening in marketing designs, synchronization, reviews, marketing assistance.

Title: Bioinformatician
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: You will be joining a multi-disciplinary team of bioinformaticians and biologists to tackle the most burning questions of the pharmaceutical industry using cutting-edge data.You will run the pipelines that generate and integrate machine-learning models of the immune system. Title: MSL (Medical Science Liaison)
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: Are you passionate about scientific exchange and business relationships? Are you a dynamic & results oriented individual who loves to drive results with a passion for success? If yes, you may be our newest MSL!About The DepartmentThe Clinical, Medical & Regulatory (CMR) department in Novo Nordisk provides clinical development, regulatory compliance, and it is responsible for medical support of marketed and non-marketed products in high quality.The PositionNovo Nordisk Israel is looking for a MSL, to support the business performance by contributing actively to building and maintaining scientific understanding of Novo Nordisk marketed products and to the development of portfolio products. The position reports to the Therapeutic Area (TA) Medical Lead in Israel.As MSL You Will Be Focusing OnCommunicating with KOLs and HCPs in their practice setting (e.g., academic centres, investigators, IISs research site) to update their understanding of relevant data in each context, as well as to build and maintain relationships to facilitate scientific exchange. Building and updating scientific and medical knowledge about Novo Nordisk products, dedicating time to search for relevant information about new developments and competitors’ products and attending scientific events and/or symposia. Help to coordinate internal training (e.g., educational programmes and workshops) for internal stakeholders (e.g., Sales, Marketing), ensuring successful implementation.This position is field-based.QualificationsIn order to be eligible for this role, you will need to hold an Advanced Degree in Health Sciences (MD\ PhD\PharmD\DVM\DMD) and you speak both English and Hebrew fluently.For being successful on our MSL role, we would also like you to have: Prior experience in a health-related system/pharmaceutical company – preferred. Strong communication and presentation skills Readiness to travel around the country and attending conferences abroad when required.ContactTo submit your application, please upload your CV online (click on Apply and follow the instructions). Internal candidates are kindly requested to inform their line Manager before applying.DeadlineApply before November 20We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.
Requirements: ['Communicating with KOLs and HCPs in their practice setting (e.g., academic centres, investigators, IISs research site) to update their understanding of relevant data in each context, as well as to build and maintain relationships to facilitate scientific exchange.', 'Building and updating scientific and medical knowledge about Novo Nordisk products, dedicating time to search for relevant information about new developments and competitors’ products and attending scientific events and/or symposia.', 'Help to coordinate internal training (e.g., educational programmes and workshops) for internal stakeholders (e.g., Sales, Marketing), ensuring successful implementation.', 'Prior experience in a health-related system/pharmaceutical company – preferred.', 'Strong communication and presentation skills', 'Readiness to travel around the country and attending conferences abroad when required.']

Text: at HUB Security will be responsible for implementing and running the enterprise information security program. The CISO will identify the most critical assets in the organization and will establish protection mechanisms.What CISO does on day to day:Facilitates an information security governance structure through the implementation of a hierarchical governance program, including the formation of an information security steering committee or advisory boardProvides regular reporting on the current status of the information security program to enterprise risk teams, senior business leaders and the board of directors as part of a strategic enterprise risk management programDevelops, socializes and coordinates approval and implementation of security policiesWorks with the vendor management office to ensure that information security requirements are included in contracts by liaising with vendor management and procurement organizationsLeads the information security function across the company to ensure consistent and high-quality information security management in support of the business goalsDetermines the information security approach and operating model in consultation with stakeholders and aligned with the risk management approach and compliance monitoring of non-digital risk areasManages the budget for the information security function, monitoring and reporting discrepanciesDevelops an information security vision and strategy that is aligned to organizational priorities and enables and facilitates the organization's business objectives, and ensures senior stakeholder buy-in and mandateAssists with the identification of non-IT managed IT services in use ("citizen IT") and facilitates a corporate IT onboarding program to bring these services into the scope of the IT function, and apply standard controls and rigor to these services; where this is not possible, ensures that risk is reduced to the appropriate levels and ownership of this information security risk is clearWorks effectively with business units to facilitate information security risk assessment and risk management processes, and empowers them to own and accept the level of risk they deem appropriate for their specific risk appetiteRequirements:10+ years of experience in information security filed in a startup environmentGood understanding of GRC and process implementation cross functional units Good understanding of SAAS, PAAS and IAAS environment Good understanding of networking and monitoring

Title: Data Analyst
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About The PositionWe are looking for a sharp and highly analytical Data Analyst to join our fast-growing company and help us make data-driven decisions for business performance optimization.As a Data Analyst, you will play a key role in shaping Elementor's business strategy, defining our KPIs, and identifying business opportunities.As a member of the Analytics team in our Data department, you will work across the organization and provide key insights to multiple departments (Marketing, Product, Finance, Business Strategy, CX, and more), helping them focus on what’s important.This position is located in Israel only.Responsibilities:Work with various managers to learn their business insight needs, including tracking metrics, dashboards, and reports Act as a bridge between units’ business needs and the BI department, ensuring high-quality execution quality, data integrity of analyzed insights, and reporting deliverablesEstablish reporting methodologies and cross-department standards Go beyond the numbers to communicate, influence, support, and execute business decisionsRequirements: 3+ years of experience in quantitative analysis, preferably at an internet company Excellent communication skills with the ability to deliver results of analyses clearly and effectivelyExcellent SQL skills - a mustExperience with at least one of the following visualization tools: QlikView, Qlik Sense, Power BI, Tableau - a mustStrong Python capabilities - a major advantageExperience working with big data tools: Redshift, BigQuery, Databricks, etc. - a mustA highly independent and creative team player who works well with othersHands-on technical experience with Google Analytics, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads - an advantageBSc/BA in a highly quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics, economics, or engineering - an advantageWhat do we do?Elementor is the leading website-building platform for WordPress professionals.Our vision is to empower web creators - developers, designers, and marketers, with the ability to create their futures one pixel at a time. We provide our users with everything they need to become successful web creators.A new website is created every 10 seconds using Elementor!Since we launched in Israel in 2016, we have expanded to more than 150 countries, with more than 12M websites powered by Elementor. More than 8% of all websites worldwide are built using Elementor! How do we do it?At Elementor, we're building the future of web creation.We’re all about empowering people, both our employees and our users.Elementor is a place where you can truly grow.We encourage professional development and personal growth.Creativity, friendship, curiosity, motivation, and professionalism are the driving force behind our journey.Elementor's constant scaling is an important aspect we take great pride in.
Requirements: ['Work with various managers to learn their business insight needs, including tracking metrics, dashboards, and reports', 'Act as a bridge between units’ business needs and the BI department, ensuring high-quality execution quality, data integrity of analyzed insights, and reporting deliverables', 'Establish reporting methodologies and cross-department standards', 'Go beyond the numbers to communicate, influence, support, and execute business decisions', '3+ years of experience in quantitative analysis, preferably at an internet company', 'Excellent communication skills with the ability to deliver results of analyses clearly and effectively', 'Excellent SQL skills - a must', 'Experience with at least one of the following visualization tools: QlikView, Qlik Sense, Power BI, Tableau - a must', 'Strong Python capabilities - a major advantage', 'Experience working with big data tools: Redshift, BigQuery, Databricks, etc. - a must', 'A highly independent and creative team player who works well with others', 'Hands-on technical experience with Google Analytics, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads - an advantage', 'BSc/BA in a highly quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics, economics, or engineering - an advantage']

Title: PSYCHOLOGUE DU TRAVAIL F/H
Location: Rishon LeZion, Center District, Israel
Text: Description du poste Intitulé PSYCHOLOGUE DU TRAVAIL F/H Métier/Emploi CONSEIL - PSYCHOLOGUE DU TRAVAIL Filière Relation de services Type de contrat CDI Durée du contrat si CDD 24 mois Temps de travail Temps complet Missions/Activités Dans le cadre de sa mission de service public, Pôle emploi, acteur majeur du marché du travail, œuvre pour accélérer le retour à l’emploi des demandeurs d’emploi et répondre aux besoins de recrutement des entreprises. L’ensemble des équipes de Pôle emploi agissent au quotidien pour leur satisfaction.Portée par l’ensemble du réseau, l’offre de services en orientation à Pôle emploi s’articule autour de l’orientation généraliste du conseiller référent du demandeur d’emploi et de l’orientation spécialisée du psychologue du travail. Cette dernière, vise à apporter un éclairage différent et complémentaire. L’objectif est d’agir de façon plus spécifique grâce à des outils dédiés et d’appuyer le conseiller référent sur le projet professionnel du Demandeur d’Emploi.Au sein d’une agence de Pôle emploi, vous aurez pour mission de : Intervenir en tant que professionnel de l’orientation spécialisée auprès des Demandeurs d’emploi par la mise en œuvre du Conseil en Evolution Professionnelle et de prestations internes sur le champ de l’orientation et de la formation. Accompagner des personnes dans leur projet professionnel, leur développement de compétences et leur évolution professionnelle. Animer des prestations individuelles et collectives en lien avec le projet professionnel et le parcours de formation Prescrire, si besoin, l’offre de service de Pôle emploi en concertation avec le conseiller référent du demandeur d’emploi Contribuer au diagnostic partagé sur les besoins des demandeurs d’emploi en formation, insertion… Participer au déploiement de nouveaux dispositifs avec les acteurs du territoire En fonction des besoins, apporter votre expertise sur l’accompagnement des entreprises dans leur recrutement. Travailler en coopération avec les conseillers et contribuer au développement de la maîtrise et de la mise en œuvre des méthodes ou outils d’orientation, en animant par exemple des temps d’échanges avec les conseillers de l’agence sur ces thématiques Compétences Capacité d'accueil, d'écoute et d'observationCapacité d'analyse et de synthèseCapacité à faire des choix, à arbitrer et à prendre une décisionCapacité à faire un diagnostic personnaliséCapacité à travailler en équipe et en transversalitéMaîtrise des différentes techniques d'entretienMaîtrise des outils et méthodes d’orientationConnaissance des apports théoriques et méthodologiques de la psychologie applicables aux activités de Pôle emploiSavoir élaborer un projet professionnel ou un dossier de formationSavoir construire une alliance de travailCapacité à l’animation de groupe et d’action collectiveBonne communication écrite et oraleSens du service et du résultatCapacité à gérer des situations difficilesSens de l’implication et de l’engagement Rémunération annuelle brute (proratisée sur la durée effective du contrat) 38 230Localisation du poste Localisation DR Ile-de-France, Val d'Oise (95), APE ERMONT (75554) Déplacements Des déplacements sont à prévoir dans le cadre de l'exercice des missions et formations dispenséesCalendrier Date de prise de poste souhaitée Dès que possibleProfil candidat Profil souhaité Impérativement titulaire du titre de psychologue, vous êtes enregistré(e) au registreADELI.Votre Formation licence en psychologieet Master 2 (ou BAC+5) dans l'une des spécialités suivantes : Psychologie du travail Psychologie de l'orientation professionnelle Psychologie de l'évaluation et/ou différentielle Psychologie sociale Psychologie du développement avec une nécessaire orientation « adulte » Psychologie cognitiveVous justifiez d'une expérience de 5 années dans l'accompagnement individuel et/ou collectif sur le champ de l'orientation, de la formation et plus globalement de l'insertion professionnelle.Une expérience en entreprise ou d'intervention en entreprise sur le champ RH serait appréciée.La maîtrise et l'appétence pour les outils numériques et bureautiques est nécessaire. Diplôme exigé BAC +5 Domaine d'étude Psychologie Expérience professionnelle Plus de 5 ans
Requirements: ['Intervenir en tant que professionnel de l’orientation spécialisée auprès des Demandeurs d’emploi par la mise en œuvre du Conseil en Evolution Professionnelle et de prestations internes sur le champ de l’orientation et de la formation.', 'Accompagner des personnes dans leur projet professionnel, leur développement de compétences et leur évolution professionnelle.', 'Animer des prestations individuelles et collectives en lien avec le projet professionnel et le parcours de formation', 'Prescrire, si besoin, l’offre de service de Pôle emploi en concertation avec le conseiller référent du demandeur d’emploi', 'Contribuer au diagnostic partagé sur les besoins des demandeurs d’emploi en formation, insertion…', 'Participer au déploiement de nouveaux dispositifs avec les acteurs du territoire', 'En fonction des besoins, apporter votre expertise sur l’accompagnement des entreprises dans leur recrutement.', 'Travailler en coopération avec les conseillers et contribuer au développement de la maîtrise et de la mise en œuvre des méthodes ou outils d’orientation, en animant par exemple des temps d’échanges avec les conseillers de l’agence sur ces thématiques', 'licence en psychologie', "Master 2 (ou BAC+5) dans l'une des spécialités suivantes :", 'Psychologie du travail', "Psychologie de l'orientation professionnelle", "Psychologie de l'évaluation et/ou différentielle", 'Psychologie sociale', 'Psychologie du développement avec une nécessaire orientation « adulte »', 'Psychologie cognitive']

Title: IT Manager
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: join our amazing R&D team as a IT Manager!We are looking for someone to help us with our mission to connect every entity in cyberspace easily, by providing an ID-based connectivity and access control solution.Powered by the most adaptive, simple, and secure zero trust solution on the market, we are on a mission to connect every entity in cyberspace.What’s in it for you?Develop, maintain, and create existing Corporate IT infrastructure projects as required by various business needsProvide professional service for colleagues and customersExperience in automation workflows of IT processesProactive monitoring and maintenance of the IT environmentAs our IT Manager, you must have:At least 3 years of experience in a System Administrator position in a medium/large company (Hi-tech preferably)Service-oriented attitude and ability to work in a high-workload environment Experience with MDM/MAM solutions, e.g., JAMF, Intune, etc.Experience with scripting languages. (PowerShell, Python, Bash).Experience in configurations and troubleshooting of macOS, Windows and Linux SystemsHands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting in AWS cloud environmentsHands-on experience with managing and setting up Office 365 apps (Mail, SharePoint, OneDrive, Intune)Proven experience in managing DNS and SSL on an internal and external levelGood understanding of mail security settings DKIM, SPF, etc. Hands-on experience with AzureAD, including integration with different SaaS services for SSOExcellent English, both written and verbalIt would be great if you also have:Experience with managing projects in a project management system (JIRA)Experience of at least three years in a startup environment in a similar roleProven experience in leading complex IT/System projectsNetwork, Security, Microsoft, AWS, VMware, or other relevant certifications

Title: Import & Export Coordinator
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: UVeye is looking for an Import and Export Coordinator to join the Operations team!What will you do?Schedule shipments through freight carriers or via air freight according to company scheduleOrganize and plans day-to-day work of shipment requestsProcessing all Import & export courier shipments via UPS, FedEx, DHL and others as requiredCoordinate with customs agents to ensure that all documentation is in order prior to shipmentFollow-up shipment status in the customs and during transportDeal with customs import and export paperworkManage intercompany stock transfers between warehouses in multiple regionsWork with Customs Brokers to release shipments from custom.Prepare shipping orders or documentation for international or domestic shipmentsCoordinate with vendors to ensure that all materials are available for packaging or shippingTrack deliveries, Pickup goods and tracking receipt of goods to warehousesCoordinate daily with company branches and subcontractsRequirements:At least 2 years of experience as Import & export coordinatorKnowledge of the IncotermsBasic knowledge in Excel and ERP (Priority - an advantage)Proven working knowledge in the manufacturing industryFamiliar with shipping documentation such as Bills of LadingHigh proficiency in English, both oral and in writingAbility to keep track of and report on activityGreat interpersonal skills, team player, "can do" attitudeAble to handle multiple ongoing tasks with changing priorities

Title: Product Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Artlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.Artlist consists of 4 products:Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platformArtgrid.io, a curated stock footage platformMotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photosFXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing softwareWe’re seeking a full-time Product Analyst to join our vibrant BI department at Tel Aviv.Wake up for this:Proactively support the business growth through product efforts ,by providing top-notch analyses, insights and recommendations, focusing on Artlist catalogs performance.Playing a key role in the product, that aligns the business needs with the product development.Designing, building, and maintaining product-related reports and dashboards for various roles.Work closely with key stakeholders to drive strategic product initiatives forward.Analyze behavioral data and product performance data, develop measures to ensure product health and business growth.Act as an analytical focal point for stakeholders for all product data related matters.Conduct exploratory data analysis to find new opportunities arising from the data.Requirements:At least 4 years of similar experienceExcellent analytical skills, combined with a broad and comprehensive business vision.Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with proven story-telling skills.Quick-thinking, fast learner and problem solver.Readiness to work in a high paced, dynamic and challenging environmentExcellent hands-on SQL skills.Expertise in a data visualization tool ( Tableau - big advantage)Master abilities in Excel and PowerPoint.Excellent English skillsStatistical knowledge and experience using statistics for analyzing datasets - advantage
Requirements: ['Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platform', 'Artgrid.io, a curated stock footage platform', 'MotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photos', 'FXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing software', 'Proactively support the business growth through product efforts ,by providing top-notch analyses, insights and recommendations, focusing on Artlist catalogs performance.', 'Playing a key role in the product, that aligns the business needs with the product development.', 'Designing, building, and maintaining product-related reports and dashboards for various roles.', 'Work closely with key stakeholders to drive strategic product initiatives forward.', 'Analyze behavioral data and product performance data, develop measures to ensure product health and business growth.', 'Act as an analytical focal point for stakeholders for all product data related matters.', 'Conduct exploratory data analysis to find new opportunities arising from the data.', 'At least 4 years of similar experience', 'Excellent analytical skills, combined with a broad and comprehensive business vision.', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with proven story-telling skills.', 'Quick-thinking, fast learner and problem solver.', 'Readiness to work in a high paced, dynamic and challenging environment', 'Excellent hands-on SQL skills.', 'Expertise in a data visualization tool ( Tableau - big advantage)', 'Master abilities in Excel and PowerPoint.', 'Excellent English skills', 'Statistical knowledge and experience using statistics for analyzing datasets - advantage']

Title: Automotive Body Technician / Collision Tech
Location: Shoham, Center District, Israel
Text: Autobody TechnicianCHAMPIONS DO MOREWelcome to our story. It’s a tale of being different. Obsessing over details. It’s the product of patience, and steadily honing our craft before setting out to innovate the industry we all love.Today, Crash Champions is home to a collection of team members driven by a deeply-rooted purpose and guided by a powerful principle: Here, We Do More.It’s the Crash Champions DNA and it’s the mark of who we are. Above everything, we believe in what we do; and we hold fast to the conviction of why we do it. We serve our customers and business partners with an unexpected level of personal and professional service to build trust at every touch point.BECAUSE WE BELIEVETHE DIFFERENCE IS TRUSTResponsibilitiesExamines damaged vehicle and efficiently plans repair process.Works and communicates with others on vehicle repair status.Performs quality repairs while keeping on-time status in mind.Makes decisions on repair vs. replace considering safety, cost and cycle time.Removes upholstery, accessories, electrical and hydraulic window operating equipment, and trim to gain access to vehicle and fenders.Participates in all required safety meetings.Files, grinds, and sands repaired surfaces, using power tools and hand tools.Directs the work of an apprentice in the performance of tasks when needed, i.e., unusual problems or questions and explains procedures to assistant.RequirementsAbility to use frame machine.Certification in body repair preferred.Knowledge of vehicle repair process by manufacturer.I-CAR welding certified.Skill in analyzing and interpreting measuring data.Ability to supervise repair personnel.Must be able to pass thorough background checkBenefitsCompetitive payWeekly Paychecks/Bonus PayTransfer Between Markets401K with company matchMedical/Vision/Dental Insurance

Title: Director of Product Marketing
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Riverside empowers creators and businesses to create high-quality audio and video content. Since launching, we have experienced rapid growth and are trusted by customers such as Spotify, NY Times, NBC, CNN, and iHeartMedia.We are looking for a product marketing leader to join our Marketing team. This role combines strategy and hands-on execution where you’ll be responsible for what we sell, to whom we sell, how we sell, and to make selling easier.What you’ll do:Conduct market, competitive, audience, and use case research to inform our marketing strategy and product developmentOwn the messaging architecture of the company; ensuring messaging is always up-to-date with the most current customer, competitor, and market insights, as well as target segments and customer segmentation and persona definitionPartner with the product team from inception to launch on product features, with an eye toward company strategy, differentiators, and customer needs. Full funnel research and mapping of user flows to identify opportunities to improve performance. Identify revenue opportunities and act on them (i.e. new use cases, restructured partnerships, new features, or reimagined audience segments)Collaborate with our demand gen and creative teams to inform the targeting and messaging of new campaignsWork with Sales, CSM, and Support to channel structured insights Requirements:Who you are:4+ years of product marketing experience, with 2+ years working at a B2B SaaS companyYou have owned the product marketing of a product or product line Creative marketer with storytelling capabilitiesStrong communicator (verbal and written) that can turn research into actionable insightsCross-functional skills to build processes and work with product, sales, and support﻿Bonus:Worked in the audio/video/media industryExperience with a PLG and sales-assisted motionValues that help you succeed at Riverside:Hungry, passionate, and deeply curiousBias towards actionIndependent, self-starterEntrepreneurial spirit–do what’s best for the company at any time
Requirements: ['Conduct market, competitive, audience, and use case research to inform our marketing strategy and product development', 'Own the messaging architecture of the company; ensuring messaging is always up-to-date with the most current customer, competitor, and market insights, as well as target segments and customer segmentation and persona definition', 'Partner with the product team from inception to launch on product features, with an eye toward company strategy, differentiators, and customer needs.', 'Full funnel research and mapping of user flows to identify opportunities to improve performance.', 'Identify revenue opportunities and act on them (i.e. new use cases, restructured partnerships, new features, or reimagined audience segments)', 'Collaborate with our demand gen and creative teams to inform the targeting and messaging of new campaigns', 'Work with Sales, CSM, and Support to channel structured insights', '4+ years of product marketing experience, with 2+ years working at a B2B SaaS company', 'You have owned the product marketing of a product or product line', 'Creative marketer with storytelling capabilities', 'Strong communicator (verbal and written) that can turn research into actionable insights', 'Cross-functional skills to build processes and work with product, sales, and support', 'Worked in the audio/video/media industry', 'Experience with a PLG and sales-assisted motion', 'Hungry, passionate, and deeply curious', 'Bias towards action', 'Independent, self-starter', 'Entrepreneurial spirit–do what’s best for the company at any time']

Title: Sales Specialist On Premise - Musketeer
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: PURPOSE OF THIS JOB"Musketeers" have always been the main volume contributors, trial generators, and sparks for creating kindred spirits in the On Premise environment, such as bars, restaurants, events, clubs, and hospitality. As the face of the brand and the indispensable consultant to their On Premise territory, they are responsible for driving both the current and future distribution and sales of our product portfolio in key accounts. Musketeers plan, develop and execute measures to intensify consumption in existing On Premise locations and identify opportunities to win and activate Key Accounts in new On Premise playgrounds.RESPONSIBILITIES#Red Bull AmbassadorEstablish and nurture relationships with key influencers, industry players, and business partners (including, but not limited to, outlet owners/managers, buyers, F&B managers, bar staff, distribution partners, etc.)Build affinity and understanding of the Red Bull brand and products within your network.Be seen as the credible, reliable, and knowledgeable face of Red Bull in the On Premise.Deliver excellence with Red Bull's premium brand image in all activity and execution.#City EntrepreneurKnow your national account landscape like the back of your hand.Develop local customer strategies in line with the national business strategy and create innovative measures in order to achieve your goals.Align with HQ on international key accounts.Master the On Premise universe by staying on the cutting edge of industry knowledge, trends, and new opportunities (accounts, occasions, consumers).Establish P&L for each key account in line with the national strategy and manage internal and external resources (materials, tools, budget) accordingly.Collaborate with internal (other departments) and external stakeholders (decision makers and influencers within key accounts, DP partners, wholesalers, and the beverage industry) to leverage business success.#Indispensable Business ConsultantBuild and maintain long-lasting collaborations with key stakeholders.Negotiate win/win partnership agreements that add value to both the Red Bull business and the customer's business.Leverage your impressive communication, sales, and marketing ability to keep Red Bull number one in the On Premise.Drive and expand the business by identifying the right sales and marketing occasions at which Red Bull should be present (brand, product).Turn insights into impactful programs to drive sales and leverage Red Bull brand image.Measure success by diligently tracking, analyzing, and reporting on performance and areas of growth and opportunity.EXPERIENCEKey Account management experience in B2B preferred.Previous experience with an expansive network in the hospitality and/or FMCG industry is preferred.Market knowledge and integration into local On Premise industry and community preferred.Self-motivated and able to work independently in a high-energy, fast-paced, field-based environment.Strategic and innovative commercial awareness and acumen (understanding of sales and finance processes).Strong planning, prioritization, and organizational ability.Ability to think and act like an entrepreneur.Proficient in MS office, especially Excel and PowerPoint.Social Chameleon. Understands all groups of people, what every type of person has to deal with daily, and knows how to act around them. Self-aware and able to adapt communication, presentation, and professional appearance according to audience and scene.
Industries: Food and Beverage Services and Manufacturing

Title: Technical Support
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a talented Support Engineer to join our Technical support team.Requirements:Ability to work Monday to Friday - MandatoryUp to 2 years’ experience in technical support/NOCExcellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a strong sense of customer commitment.Quick learner & Details orientedProactive, highly-organized, and able to manage multiple tasksPositive, professional, with a desire to learnExcellent verbal and written communication skills.Proficient in English speaking and writingTeam PlayerAbility to work well under pressure and maintain a positive attitude.On this role you will:Provide tier 1 and 2 tech support for customers and partners around the world.Troubleshooting issues via ticket systems, phone and email in proficient English.Identify root causes, proposing test cases and solutions.Provide timely information to customer-facing teams to improve overall customer satisfaction.Train customers on our solutions and products.Help build and retain the technical support knowledge base and training materialsWill be nice that you have:Experience with tech support web tools such as ZendeskExperience with CRM, IIS, Web Services

Title: Account Executive
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About Juno Journey:Juno is an all-in-one solution for companies' employee development. Juno takes the entire life cycle of every employee in the company and creates a visualize learning and development journey they can take-from onboarding to enablement for their day-to-day job to preparing them for their next role and responsibility - With Juno Journey companies like Monday.com, Rapid, WalkMe and more already changing their employees experience completely.An Account Executive with Juno Journey: The Account Executive is at the very center of Juno Journey’s growth team. As an Account Executive, you will be responsible for telling the story of our product and helping customers solve their organizational pain. Every AE has its own style of negotiating and presenting the Juno story and we believe that diversity is what gives our team its strength. As our team grows, so do our people, and we offer plenty of chances to take responsibility and lead, whether it is other team members or projects and experiences that can make us all better.Our ValuesAccountability- We are all accountable for achieving the company's mission by making sure that every activity moves the needle.Data-Driven- We embrace the use of data to make decisions and treat data as a strategic asset of the company by making it widely available, unified, agreed and accessible.Customer-oriented- Our customers’ satisfaction and success are at the heart of everything we do because we believe that when our customers win, we win.Lead by example-We influence and drive others to success through our behavior.Speed Execution and iteration-We believe the faster you execute, the faster you learn, iterate, and improve. We are constantly seeking feedback, both internally and from customers, so we can outdo our best.Walk The Talk-We use our product to onboard, enable, and develop our people, so we can constantly improve.Job Description / Responsibilities:Acquiring new business and further developing our B2B client base across all company sizes (from SMB to global operating companies)Meet and exceed all quarterly and annual sales quotasResearch and identify potential clients, interact with them through a multi-channel approach (phone, email, social platforms, etc.), and initiate the sales processWork with clients throughout the entire sales cycleDraft, conceptualize and share new sales campaigns and ideas within our growing teamSet meetings with the correct point of contact in organizations and introduce our platform at a high levelPossess a full understanding of customers’ specific decision-making and purchasing processDevelop and manage pipeline activity and monitor sales activity against assigned quotasAcquire and integrate industry knowledge related to general trends, emerging technologies, and competitorsRequirements:Minimum of 3 years experience in business development and sales in a hi-tech startup environment; B2B Saas experience - mustEnglish Native Speaker, living in Israel or the USAbility to communicate clearly and professionally at all levels within an organization (internally as well as externally)Quick learner, creative, detail-oriented, passionate, positive, can-do attitude with a strong drive to succeedA solo runner with good time management skills, able to work individually as well as a part of a teamStrong customer-facing and presentation skills with the ability to establish credibility with executives.Knowledge of CRM (Hubspot)Excellent written and oral communication skillsAttention to detail, follow-up, and time management skills

Title: QA Team Leader

Text: ראש צוות בדיקות תוכנה ידני -יש לנו הזדמנות מצויינת עבורכם להשתלב במשרה ניהולית.אנחנו מחפשים אתכם, בודקי תוכנה עם נסיון מוכח בהובלת צוות וניהול תהליכי הבדיקות.התפקיד דורש ניהול ותכנון תהליכי בדיקות, ניהול יעדים ולוחות זמנים של אנשי הצוות, הפקת דוחות וניתוח תוצאות.חניכה והכשרה של חברי צוות ועובדים חדשים.Requirements: נסיון של 3 שנים לפחות בבדיקות תוכנה והובלת צוות אנגלית ברמה גבוהה בוגר תואר בהנדסת תוכנה, מדעי המחשב או בתחום רלוונטי. ייתרון לבעלי היכרות ונסיון בבדיקות אוטומציה.

Title: VP Marketing
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Serverless and containers technologies are taking the software development world by storm, and Lumigo is at the forefront of this revolution.We are looking for a product and solutions marketing leader with a history of success in growing demand, and an understanding of how to market to developers (B2D). Product-Led Growth (PLG) experience is an advantage.This leadership role will be highly visible, partnering with the executive team and leaders across the organization to position the company and its products, driving awareness, increasing demand, and creating market leadership.The successful candidate will be a highly effective communicator and collaborator with a demonstrated history of working successfully across all levels of an organization. This role reports to our CEO.Main Responsibilities:Build effective customer journeys: Define personas and buyer journeys utilizing data, research, and insights. Lead the implementation of multi-touchpoint journeys that provide the audience with the right content at the right time and drive customer acquisition through automation.Drive growth with demand generation: Lead the demand gen team, including outside agencies, to design integrated campaigns that generate awareness and leads. Be proactive in recognizing where pipeline gaps exist and partner with Sales to deliver focused campaigns and sales playsLead our content strategy and development: Lead the content strategy and development of powerful content assets (blogs, webinars, videos, e-books, how-to guides, etc.) enabling customers and prospects to easily understand the value proposition including business value, product capabilities, and differentiationLead with market, customer, and product intelligence: Drive ongoing analysis of the market, customers, products, and the competition, message testing, and product usage and adoption analysisExecute successful feature launches: Align with the Product Management and Engineering teams to drive strategy around positioning for existing and new launches. Bring new products to market, both internally through sales enablement and externally through digital marketing, press, analyst, and influencer outreach, and thought leadership programs. Build supporting awareness and demand generation plansDeliver differentiated positioning and messaging: Develop a compelling product narrative and value proposition for Lumigo’s offeringsEmpower our Sales teams with best-in-class enablement: Partner with sales to develop sales plays and GTM programs that help drive the pipeline, find new buyers, and cross-sell into existing accounts﻿Requirements:5 years of experience bringing cutting-edge technology to market: driving company positioning, branding, launch messaging, lead gen programs, thought leadership, and content programs targeting technical audiences2+ years experience leading marketing activities at a startupA history of success communicating new SaaS products to technology leaders, DevOps, and Developers. Experience with technical products is a mustStrong organizational and analytical skills along with excellent communication skillsProven ability to build creative and collaborative teams, develop people, and link performance to overall business objectivesCollaborative, high energy, charismatic, innovative, and creative individual with leadership DNATeam player; ability to work cross-functionally, great communication & presentation skills.Familiarity with marketing automationAbility and drive to work long hours when needed

Title: Manufacturing Tech Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Job Summary: Support the manufacturing team members by providing knowledge, experience, and motivation.Responsibilities: Member of the assembly team. Support for the manufacturing manager and assistance in technical accompanying the team, Training, apprenticeship, and professional development of work teams. Working with various departments - quality, engineering, purchasing, development, and management. Read work orders, follow production drawings and sample assemblies, or receive verbal instructions regarding duties to be performed. Perform intermediate assembly tasks such as potting, encapsulating, cleaning, epoxy bonding. Performs testing and inspection, using measuring instruments, and electronic test equipment to ensure parts and assemblies meet production specifications and standards. Work according to the organization’s plan - daily, weekly, and monthly. Compliance with indicators, goals, supervision and control and writing work procedures. Implementation of work safety regulations and programs.Requirements:Qualifications: At least 3-4 years of experience from manufacturing team including manual assembly and test stations – must! Work with multidisciplinary system / medical device – an advantage. Familiarity with the field of machining, electronics, and plastics - an advantage Good technical understanding, ability to read blueprints and work instructions – must! Very good communication skills in Hebrew and English - reading, writing, and speaking High organizational skills, meeting deadlines and creative thinking. Knowledge of Office software. ERP system – an advantage.

Title: Chief Executive Officer (Relocation to Cyprus)
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Klips is a fast-growing innovative Fintech company, creator of next generation Financial services including CFD trading, Digital banking facilities, Shares dealing, Payments, and CRM using cutting-edge technologies.Our mission is to solve day-to-day issues by unifying services and making them accessible, reducing friction caused by using multiple service providers.We are now recruiting Klips’ core team! This is your opportunity to take part in changing the financial world as we know it.Klips is a global company with offices in Israel, Bulgaria, Ukraine, Cyprus, Romania and South Africa (coming soon). Working in Klips means enjoying flexibility, personal growth and professional development.Klips is currently seeking for its Cypriot subsidiary (CIF) a CEO who will have a primary responsibility of leading the company’s operations towards achieving it’s goals.JOIN US!Requirements:2 years of experience as a lawyer or accountant in a company in the field of financial services.Self-reliant, reliable, good problem solver and results oriented.Excellent interpersonal and communications skills.Knowledge of CFD trading and a keen interest about financial markets.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.Fluent English – A must.Open for a relocation to Limassol, Cyprus for a minimum of 3 years.Responsibilities:Monitor and maintain short- and long-term goals, objectives, policies, and operating procedures.Oversee operating plan, budget, and company's finances.Ensure company and its businesses comply with all applicable legal and regulatory requirements and, where appropriate, best practices.Managing the company's finances, including regulatory capital requirements, money transfers, clearing, and managing balances and bank accounts in large amounts.Management and operation of the company vis-a-vis the parent company regarding all other activities that are outsourced.Manage relationships with partners/vendors.Help build and lead an effective and cohesive team to include all company employees.Responsible for all elements of managing and maintaining staff (i.e. HR, Legal, Finance, etc.).

Title: Tour The Land Online Guide
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: אוהבים להדריך טיולים בארץ, אבל לפעמים צריכים לתת לרגליים קצת מנוחה?אולפן רוזן קורא לכם:באולפן רוזן מלמדים עברית אונליין תלמידים מכל רחבי העולם, אבל התלמידים שלנו רוצים יותר – הם גם רוצים להכיר את הארץ. לא כולם יכולים להגיע לארץ פיזית ולכן פיתחנו עבורם קורס וירטואלי שמאפשר להם להכיר את הארץ לאורכה ולרוחבה – ממש כאילו הם מטיילים כאן.הקורס בנוי כטיול מתמשך בארץ. המדריך והתלמידים נפגשים מדי שבוע למשך שעה ומטיילים בארץ בתמונות בעודם יושבים בנוחיות ליד המחשב בבית. אנחנו מספקים לכם את המסלול, מצגות מושקעות והסברים מעמיקים, ואתם נותנים לתלמידים את ההרגשה שהם ממש עכשיו דורכים על אבני ירושלים, צופים בשרידי אמת המים בקיסריה וטובלים את רגליהם במימי הכינרת.הקורס מועבר בשפה האנגלית אבל חשוב לתבל אותו במילים עבריות ובאווירה ישראלית.Requirements:תעודת מורה דרך מורשה / מוסמך - חובה.תואר ראשון באחד התחומים הקשורים לארץ ישראל (ארכיאולוגיה, גיאוגרפיה, היסטוריה) - יתרון.אנגלית ברמה גבוהה (ההוראה נעשית בשפה האנגלית).זמינות ללמד באופן קבוע לאורך כל השנה בשעות הערב והלילה.נכונות ויכולת לעבודה באמצעות מחשב.
Requirements: ['תעודת מורה דרך מורשה / מוסמך - חובה.', 'תואר ראשון באחד התחומים הקשורים לארץ ישראל (ארכיאולוגיה, גיאוגרפיה, היסטוריה) - יתרון.', 'אנגלית ברמה גבוהה (ההוראה נעשית בשפה האנגלית).', 'זמינות ללמד באופן קבוע לאורך כל השנה בשעות הערב והלילה.', 'נכונות ויכולת לעבודה באמצעות מחשב.']

Title: Head of Data & Analytics
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Department: OperationsEmployment Type: Full TimeLocation: Tel-AvivDescriptionHello, we are myInterview 🤩We have taken a mission to redefine how companies and job candidates interview, assess and engage! By revealing the personality behind the resume with video interviews, we are putting candidates first in their recruitment journeys.Since we launched, we have helped over 7 million candidates have their voice heard and show their true personality 🙌 We are backed by Aleph and Entree Capital (they've invested in a few companies you may have heard of - Lemonade, Monday, Stripe etc, so we're in good company)We are a passionate and international team, based in Tel Aviv and Sydney.We're looking for our new team mate: a driven, energetic and experienced Head of Data, seeking to put their mark on the high-growth of a well-funded innovative Saas company.Key ResponsibilitiesYou will be the management's focal point to any discussion, decision or planning, pinpointing our strengths and places to improve, using KPIs and data trends and patterns. We are on a way to be a data-driven business and you will be the angular stone in this transformation. Your responsibilities will include:Work closely with the leadership team, Product, Sales, Marketing and R&D to define KPIs and drive insights for improvementsDetect, collect and analyze data from a variety of sources, outline impactful business insights, and draw operative conclusions and ensuing recommendationsManage the development and maintenance of reports, databases, dashboards, etc.Lead the Data Analysis team: recruit, train, and develop team members' professional skills and career pathSkills Knowledge And ExpertiseBachelor's degree, or equivalent experience, in Statistics, Mathematics or Computer Science7+ years of working experience in data analytics, preferably working as a Senior Data/Business Analyst in a fast-paced and complex business settingProficiency in the use of SQL, being able to draw complex queriesUnderstanding of data warehouses, modelling and cleansing best practicesTrack record of recruiting, hiring, and managing peopleExcellent communication skills in a multicultural environment
