Title: Business Intelligence Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About us: It’s 2022, people. Health ‘benefits’ should be easy, accessible, and affordable. Enter Healthee, which helps employees discover what’s covered, which provider to see, what it costs, and how to book an appointment—all within 27 seconds. It’s a win-win for HR Pros, reducing your workload and costs, and making your employees healthier, happier, and more loyal. Empower your employees to take full advantage of their health benefits, without replacing your broker.We’re on a mission to support employees and transform their health care experience. We’re building an AI powered platform that is designed to support every employee with healthcare benefits, navigate their plans and optimize care..Want to join our mission-driven team? Read on.We are looking for an experienced product manager with proven ability to create successful products that customers love, that is excited to join our growing team and to be part of making people healthier. Responsibilities:Create data infrastructure to enable decision making across all departments and company-wideDesign, develop and implement initiatives to drive Healthee’s data-driven cultureServe as a Subject Matter Expert and point person for data-driven decision making across all departmentsCreate centralized data structures across disparate data sources in order to drive meaningful reportingBuild BI deliverables (reports, dashboards, etc.) based on company OKRs and prioritiesWork across departments to understand and address issues with data sourcingWork closely with Healthee’s leadership to ensure BI deliverables provide the right visibility into performance across the organizationLead the integration of BI into client-facing deliverables and processesSupport performance benchmarkingRequirements:>5 years of experience in working with BI or analytics systemsExtensive experience with ETL processes across disparate data sourcesPrior experience with BI dashboards and/or platforms (e.g., PowerBI, Tableau, Looker)Strong communication skills- Hebrew & English Ability to work in dynamic environments

Title: Frontend Engineering
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Delivering cloud data security to companies is what Eureka Security is all about. If you store sensitive data in clouds such as AWS, Azure, GCP, and Snowflake, our DSPM solution will help your security team understand where data is, the type of data it is, learn who and what can access it, and keep it continuously secure. Our SaaS platform is easy-to-deploy and can be spun up in minutes for actionability on day one.In an age where data breaches are occurring far too often and security leaders desperately need a real-time look at risks, our mission is to help our customers achieve their "Eureka!" moment - find and secure all data risks in the cloud without slowing down the business.We are expanding and looking for great people to join our R&D center in Tel Aviv and help change the world of cloud data security.You are:A motivated developer with significant experience working on client-side development in enterprise cloud-based products. You have experience with HTML/CSS, TypeScript, and the latest JavaScript frameworks (React, Angular, Vue, etc.).You care about design and are passionate about technology. You can work independently and are a great team player with excellent communication skills, who enjoys sharing knowledge and best practices.In this role, you will:Solve real complex problems at high scaleWork with JavaScript, Typescript, React, Webpack, Jest, Tailwind CSS and other technologiesWork on end-to-end frontend development, from requirement analysis and design, through development and testing, to deployment and monitoringTake part in architectural discussions and decisions and directly impact & influence the future of our productImprove your skills and learn from top-notch engineersWork in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management
Requirements: ['Solve real complex problems at high scale', 'Work with JavaScript, Typescript, React, Webpack, Jest, Tailwind CSS and other technologies', 'Work on end-to-end frontend development, from requirement analysis and design, through development and testing, to deployment and monitoring', 'Take part in architectural discussions and decisions and directly impact & influence the future of our product', 'Improve your skills and learn from top-notch engineers', 'Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management']

Title: JUNIOR ANALYST - Dubai, UAE
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence What We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term ResponsibilitiesDeveloping new trading tools, strategies and improve existing ones Conducting fundamental research & analysis using Python Working hand in hand with the tech team to implement new business ideas Spearheading entry into new markets/ fields Upholding and living our cultural values Basic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skills Ability to think clearly in critical situations Passion, resilience, and integrity Preferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Analyst. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

Title: Head of User Acquisition
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: With over 30 Million users on our platform, we’re here to change the future of business. Our all-in-one platform makes starting a business affordable and accessible to everyone - we welcome more than 800k new business owners every month. From our products to our careers, there are endless opportunities for growth.Our team | Our core | Our dream fulfillersWhen we started Tailor Brands, we wanted to help people to accelerate their growth and fulfill their dreams. This also defines us internally; we put our focus on maximizing individual impact and creating an environment of absolute transparency.About The Role﻿Develop and own the UA strategy and its implementation across Tailor’s portfolio with a monthly multi-million dollar budget;Manage several UA managers to deliver unparalleled results and operational excellence;Ensure that Tailor’s UA employs cutting-edge approaches and technologies, whether it’s BI solutions, LTV prediction models, programmatic buying algorithms, UA automation or something else that’s yet to surface;Build strong internal communications to deliver exceptional performance and synergy with the Creative, Analytical and Engineering teams;Serve as a main point of contact and expert for the Product Teams in the field of UA;Manage the relationships with all of the key UA partners to ensure the best outcomes and competitive advantages for Tailor Brands;Cultivate a growth-oriented, data- and achievement-driven mindset of the UA teams while also inspiring a good-natured and friendly working environment.Requirements:A minimum of 3-5 years of proven UA experience across variety of online marketing platforms;Technical background and/or deep understanding of automation, programmatic buying, analytics and machine learning with regards to UA;Verifiable track record of growing revenue with the help of UA and managing multi-million dollar budgets;Success at building teams and processes to thrive in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment;Demonstrated experience in approaches for creative testing at high velocity with great exit KPIs;Uncanny ability to derive actionable insights from scraps of data;Must-haves: a positive attitude, a passion for games and a love of problem-solving.

Title: VP Marketing
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Namogoo is hiring an experienced, innovative, results-oriented, and engaging VP Marketing.﻿This leadership role will partner with the management team and leaders across the organization to position the company and its products, driving awareness, increasing demand, and creating market leadership. This role reports to our COO.Namogoo’s Digital Journey Continuity platform gives back control of the customer journey, by uncovering and preventing all the hidden factors interacting with eCommerce visitors — ensuring their experience ends exactly as they initially intended. Namogoo is trusted by more than 250 leading global retailers, including Asics, Samsonite, Office Depot, Teva and more, to keep their customer journeys flowing hesitation-free, right to their intended destinations.About You:8+ years of experience leading marketing activities in B2B companies.5+ years of experience leading marketing teams at a startup utilizing account-based marketing techniques.Comfortable in optimizing marketing budgets while optimizing towards ROI.Proven experience partnering with Sales leadership to achieve business objectives.Proven ability to build creative and collaborative teams, develop people, and link performance to overall business objectives.Proven experience managing business development and sales development teams.Proven track record of managing marketing budgets, funnel performance, and forecasts, to achieve new sales and revenue growth goals.What You'll Do:Drive growth with demand generation: Lead the demand generation team to design integrated campaigns that generate awareness and leads.Manage the Sales Development inbound and outbound team while increasing their reach.Lead the content strategy and development of powerful content assets (blogs, webinars, videos, e-books, how-to guides, etc.) enabling customers and prospects to easily understand the value proposition including business value, product capabilities, and differentiation.Partner with sales to develop sales plays and GTM programs that help drive the pipeline, increase leads, and cross-sell into existing accounts.Own the marketing budget and establish KPIs and processes for tracking marketing success.Our Culture:Since the company was founded in 2014, we have established good relationships with customers from all over the world and realized a win-win result. Our company and all the staff are committed to providing better value and services to fulfill the needs of each and every customer.We persist in the value of “Collaboration, Excellence, Trust and Passion” and “Customer First” all the time. That is our momentum of going forward and the key to success. When it comes to our success, it is all about people, people, people!

Title: Banking Analyst - Expert Off Cycle Intern Programme - 2023
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Join the world of bankingFeel the pace of international finance as you get involved in delivering financial advisory, capital raising, financing and risk management services to clients worldwide. Our bankers advise on everything from privatisations and mergers and acquisitions to debt and equity financings and restructuring. Want in? Apply to become an Off-Cycle Analyst.The chance to make an impactYou May Also Work On Projects That IncludeAs an Off-Cycle Analyst, you’ll be surprised by what you can achieve. This is a unique opportunity to work within one of our Banking teams for an extended period of time, allowing you to truly immerse yourself in our work and culture and gain invaluable insight. You'll have ample opportunities to expand your horizons across different sectors and products within Banking, and across the Investment Bank as a whole. We invite top-performing, eligible Off-Cycle Analysts to join us as full-time Banking Analysts after graduation.To Be Considered For This Programme, You Must currently be pursuing an undergraduate degree with anticipated graduation year of 2023 or 2024Meet the following language requirements for the location you are applying toAmsterdam – Mandatory: Dutch and EnglishDubai – Mandatory: English, Desirable: ArabicFrankfurt – Mandatory: German and EnglishMadrid – Mandatory: Spanish and EnglishMilan – Mandatory: Italian and EnglishParis – Mandatory: French and EnglishStockholm – Mandatory: one of the following - Swedish / Norwegian / Danish / Finnish + EnglishTel Aviv - Mandatory: Hebrew and EnglishIdeally, You Would Also Haveenthusiasm, drive and an aptitude for identifying opportunities and solving problems for clients.an ambitious problem-solver.It is the policy of Barclays to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, disability, protected veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by law.

Title: Community Sales Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Imagine your dream office... Now, try again.Mindspace is a rapidly growing global provider of inspiring workspaces for teams of all sizes. Our community consists of enterprise companies and established startups, as well as small businesses, entrepreneurs, and creative freelancers. With members in more than 40 locations across 7 countries, we are setting the gold standard for flexible workspaces around the world.Who is the Sales Manager? This full-time position includes traveling between Mindspace sites in Israel .and you will be reporting to Israel’s Sales Manager, and you will be responsible for expanding and deepening our relationships with existing clients and successfully converting new clients.Your day at Mindspace: As a Sales Manager, you will be responsible for all aspects of pre-sales and sales of our spaces, as well as customer success, retention, and upsell. You play a key role in our sales efforts through the qualification of leads and deal-closing.What will you be responsible for: Pre-sale and Sales- Qualify SMB leads - convert them to tours and closed deals (inbound & outbound)- Understand the customer’s needs, ensuring that solution that is provided matches customer expectations across all areas - functional, service, timeline, budget, quality, etc.- Provide a suitable proposal offer (Office+AR), based on Mindspace guidelines- Follow up with the customer, maintaining a consistent, open channel - Work closely with the Community teams to achieve smooth onboardingCustomer Success - Retention and UpsellAnalyze and optimize sales targets (Office+Ancillary Revenue) for each customerIdentify new needs/challenges for the customer and forecast future expansionMake sure any payment issues are taken care of on a monthly basisExecute Mindspace retention planSupport the Customer Experience team in terms of member support and serviceRequirements:Do you have the following experience? Experience in B2B salesBA degree in a related field- a plusExcellent team playerStrong Extensive experience working with various companies and stakeholdersExcellent oral and written communication skills both in Hebrew and EnglishFamiliar with CRM software such as SalesForce and HubSpot - An Advantage! You must be able to balance multiple projects at the same time and adhere to strict deadlines (strong time management skills are key)Strong decision-maker: you need to be able to make considered, responsible decisions on a whim when things don’t go according to planYou must be a thorough, self-aware worker who’s able to recognize errors and take the necessary steps to correct themGetting the job done – no matter the cost – is critical. You should be a practical, creative, quick thinker who is aware that others are counting on you!Problem solver – you are a highly resourceful thinker who is quick on their feet and a fast learnerAbility to gain the trust and confidence of a wide range/types of customer Ability to work independently based on targets and goals, and raise any flags in timeAbility to adjust quickly to a fast-paced, changing environmentAbility to plan ahead with a clear focus on execution Please submit your application in English.Mindspace is an equal-opportunity employer.

Title: יועצ/ת אסטרטגי/ת
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: מחלקת S&C לייעוץ אסטרטגי בפירמת KPMG מחפשת אנליסטיות ויועצות אסטרטגיות מצטיינותאם אתן רוצות להשפיע, לסייע לארגונים המובילים בישראל לבנות את האסטרטגיה שלהםלעבוד במשרה מגוונת עם אנשים מצוינים ולהיות שותפות משמעותיות בצוות. אנחנו מחפשים אתכן!﻿תיאור המשרה:איסוף וניתוח מידע, ביצוע מחקר משווה, ניתוחי שוק ובניית מודלים כלכלים ועסקיים.תכנון וליווי חברות מובילות במשק בבנייה ומימוש אסטרטגיה עסקית ובהובלת תהליכי דיגיטציה.לקיחת חלק משמעותי בגיבוש ויישום מדיניות ואסטרטגיה בגופים ממשלתיים.עבודה ישירה מול מנהלים בכירים בסקטור הפרטי והציבורי, בהתמודדות עם אתגרים, פתרון בעיות והובלות שינויים בארגון.יישום מתודולוגיות עסקיות לפיתוח כלכלי וייעול ארגונים.Requirements:בוגרות תואר ראשון בתחום כלכלי, ניהולי או מחקריעדיפות למצטיינות באוניברסיטאות מובילותיכולות אנליטיות גבוהותסקרנות, יכולת מחקר והסקת מסקנותיכולת פתרון בעיות והפרדה בין עיקר לתפלכושר ביטוי גבוה בכתב ובעל פהיכולות ביצוע גבוהותנא לציין ציון פסיכומטרי וממוצע ציונים בתוארהמשרה מיועדת לנשים, גברים ואנשים עם מוגבלות.
Requirements: ['בוגרות תואר ראשון בתחום כלכלי, ניהולי או מחקרי', 'עדיפות למצטיינות באוניברסיטאות מובילות', 'יכולות אנליטיות גבוהות', 'סקרנות, יכולת מחקר והסקת מסקנות', 'יכולת פתרון בעיות והפרדה בין עיקר לתפל', 'כושר ביטוי גבוה בכתב ובעל פה', 'יכולות ביצוע גבוהות']

Title: HR Business Partner
Location: Holon, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Make Your MarkCymulate's Continuous Security Validation enables companies to challenge, assess and optimize their cyber-security posture against the evolving cyberthreat landscape, simply and continuously.With world-class clients like YMCA, Brinks, and EuroNext we strive to bring the highest level of service to everything we do. Our team is made up of the very best people for the job and as we grow, we're always on the lookout for people with the skills, experience, and personality that will let us both shine. With high scores on Gartner and Glassdoor, our clients and employees have let us know what they love about us.What will you actually do?Provide HR consultation and "hands on" support to leaders, teams and employees in IsraelDirect and coordinate all HR activities in the employee life cycle such as cyclical programs, focal plans, benefits, personal issues, retention, managers training and developmentCoach business leaders to drive talent strategies that engage and retain our best employeesSupport ongoing HR development programs and processes, including: Career development , performance review cycle, employee engagement, HR process improvements, surveys and etc. Partner with Talent Acquisition, Compensation & Benefits, and HR Operations to support or implement people initiativesEnsure legal compliance and drive resolution for complex employee issuesWhat should you bring to the table?Minimum 5 years of HRBP-related experience in fast-growing technological companies - MustExperience partnering with R&D departments - Advantage Must be able to demonstrate strategic thinking, influencing, and decision-making skillSuccessfully coaching and mentoring highly skilled managers & team members in all levelsDemonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills: ability to analyze data, understand trends and develop recommendations for action based on the analysisAble to work in a highly dynamic environment and is comfortable with ambiguity and changeWorking in a multinational environmentStrong verbal and written communication and influencing skills (Hebrew and English)
Requirements: ['Provide HR consultation and "hands on" support to leaders, teams and employees in Israel', 'Direct and coordinate all HR activities in the employee life cycle such as cyclical programs, focal plans, benefits, personal issues, retention, managers training and development', 'Coach business leaders to drive talent strategies that engage and retain our best employees', 'Support ongoing HR development programs and processes, including: Career development , performance review cycle, employee engagement, HR process improvements, surveys and etc.', 'Partner with Talent Acquisition, Compensation & Benefits, and HR Operations to support or implement people initiatives', 'Ensure legal compliance and drive resolution for complex employee issues', 'Minimum 5 years of HRBP-related experience in fast-growing technological companies - Must', 'Experience partnering with R&D departments - Advantage', 'Must be able to demonstrate strategic thinking, influencing, and decision-making skill', 'Successfully coaching and mentoring highly skilled managers & team members in all levels', 'Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills: ability to analyze data, understand trends and develop recommendations for action based on the analysis', 'Able to work in a highly dynamic environment and is comfortable with ambiguity and change', 'Working in a multinational environment', 'Strong verbal and written communication and influencing skills (Hebrew and English)']

Title: Expeditor (Tactical Buyer) מתאם.ת אספקות רכש
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel

Title: HR Admin
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: At AstraZeneca we embrace a company culture that is personal and welcoming. It was built by our employees, is maintained by them, and is stronger because of them. It brings out the best in every one-off us and provides the framework for how we want to grow. As an organization, we are committed to delivering consistently high ethical standards of practice worldwide. We are driven by the desire to develop innovative medicines that bring hope and improve lives.Job DescriptionAs an HR Admin in the HR team, you are responsible for full administrative support including organizing and maintain of personnel records, updating internal databases (e.g Workday), preparing HR documents, like employment health insurance forms and new hire guides, revising company policies in our HR Portal, liaising with external partners, like insurance vendors, and ensuring legal compliance, creating regular reports and presentations on HR metrics (e.g. turnover rates), answering employees queries about HR-related issues, assisting payroll department by providing relevant employee information, arranging travel accommodations and process expense formsParticipate in HR projects (e.g. help organize a welfare events).Position RequirementsBS in Human Resources or relevant field.2+ years as an HR Administrator, HR Administrative Assistant or relevant role.Possess strong writing and communication skills and the ability to interact confidently with executives/ employees.Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail with the ability to prioritize important tasks.Should be able to work independently, and at the same time, collaborate effectively with other.Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Project and Outlook.Able to effectively multitask in a dynamic environment while maintaining confidentiality and discretion.Proficient in verbal and written communication both in English and HebrewNext Steps – Apply today!To be considered for this exciting opportunity, please complete the full application on our website at your earliest convenience – it is the only way that our Recruiter and Hiring Manager can know that you feel well qualified for this opportunity. If you know someone who would be a great fit, please share this posting with them.AstraZeneca is an equal opportunity employer. AstraZeneca will consider all qualified applicants for employment without discrimination on grounds of disability, sex or sexual orientation, pregnancy or maternity leave status, race or national or ethnic origin, age, religion or belief, gender identity or re-assignment, marital or civil partnership status, protected veteran status (if applicable) or any other characteristic protected by law.

Title: Project Manager
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: ThriveDX Labs, a subsidiary of ThriveDX Group LTD, is a world-renowned pioneer in cyber services, digital knowledge transfer, and technical solutions. We are a young, fast-growing company focused on our flagship product, a cutting-edge educational platform that uses innovation to make the ideal learning environment for B2B and B2C ecosystems around the world.Responsibilities:Manage information security projects with top-down oversight throughout entire execution to ensure success as defined by adherence to standards of scope and timelines. Develop comprehensive project plans that merge customer requirements with company goals and coordinate various managers and non-technical/ technical personnel during all project phases, from initial development through implementation. Monitor project progress continuously and make detailed scheduled reports on measurable items, such as milestones and deliverables. Ensure resource availability and allocation. Communicate proactively with all involved personnel to provide encouragement, identify problems, create solutions, and implement efficiency improvements. Measure project performance using appropriate tools and techniques. Perform risk management to minimize project risks. Track project performance, specifically to analyze the successful completion of short and long-term goalsAnalysis, planning, developing requirements documents, building functional models, developing procedures, developing functional architectures, and other related management and technical duties. Communicate with vendors and 3rd party suppliers as part of the procurement and/or service processes. Initiate RFI/RFP processes with potential vendors. Job RequirementsMinimum 1-3 years management experience in a high-tech environment (development & operations). Ability to lead and motivate cross-functional teams and interact with all levels. Excellent critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group of developers, product owners, vendors, 3rd party suppliers and subject matter experts. AdvantagesBachelor's degree in industrial engineering, computer science, PMP certificate or related field. Familiarity with AWS cloud technologies. Familiarity with virtual technologies (VM's) / Docker. Experience using Jira / Confluence. Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Title: Head of Global SDR & BDR
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Panorays is dedicated to eliminating third-party security risk so that companies worldwide can quickly and securely do business together. We automate, accelerate, and scale the vendor security evaluation and management process so customers can quickly and easily manage, mitigate and remediate risk, reduce breaches, ensure supplier compliance and improve their security across the board.About The RoleWe are looking for a Head of Global SDR and BDR. In this role, you will own the design and direction of the strategy for a segment of our business and be responsible for driving the teams. This role requires a self-starting, proactive, results-oriented sales management professional with experience in scaling high-growth organizations.The ideal person will have sales/business development and management experience in both areas and a proven track record of delivering strong team results while maintaining a motivating team culture.This position will report to the VP of Sales.Lead strategic initiatives to increase efficiencies and revenue.Managing, Optimizing, and Maintaining Tech Stack.Drive a high-performance, high accountability, data-driven, evidence-based culture to achieve and exceed sales goalsAnalyzing performance data and creating actionable insights.Design, implement, and maintain, effective sales processes, methodologies, and protocols.Provide strong coaching and mentoring through an understanding of the sales, our go-to-market strategy, and our sales methodology; This includes coaching on territory planning (including prospecting methods & prioritization).Conduct weekly pipeline forecast meetings with your team.Collaborate with Demand Generation and define sales strategies to build and develop a pipeline based on the coverage needed.Regularly report on key individual and team metrics to identify strengths and areas for improvement.Operative liaison between sales and other cross-functional teams (support, legal, finance, etc).Active participant in sales leadership and company growth initiatives.Experience & Skills5+ years of experience managing managers of Inbound/Outbound reps internationally, preferably at a fast-growing tech company. A history of managing Managers is preferred, but not required.Must have direct experience in building, developing processes for, and managing a team of SDRs/ BDRs.Strong experience in SaaS sales and recruiting new enterprise leads/prospects.Fundamental department building and start-up experience.Data-driven, evidence-based, transparent decision-maker.An analytical mindset focused on efficiency and production.Highly adept technical understanding of common sales software (Salesforce and Sales Enablement Required).Track record of exceeding pipeline generation goals.Experience hiring and onboarding top talent.Native English speaker - must.
Requirements: ['Lead strategic initiatives to increase efficiencies and revenue.', 'Managing, Optimizing, and Maintaining Tech Stack.', 'Drive a high-performance, high accountability, data-driven, evidence-based culture to achieve and exceed sales goals', 'Analyzing performance data and creating actionable insights.', 'Design, implement, and maintain, effective sales processes, methodologies, and protocols.', 'Provide strong coaching and mentoring through an understanding of the sales, our go-to-market strategy, and our sales methodology; This includes coaching on territory planning (including prospecting methods & prioritization).', 'Conduct weekly pipeline forecast meetings with your team.', 'Collaborate with Demand Generation and define sales strategies to build and develop a pipeline based on the coverage needed.', 'Regularly report on key individual and team metrics to identify strengths and areas for improvement.', 'Operative liaison between sales and other cross-functional teams (support, legal, finance, etc).', 'Active participant in sales leadership and company growth initiatives.', '5+ years of experience managing managers of Inbound/Outbound reps internationally, preferably at a fast-growing tech company. A history of managing Managers is preferred, but not required.', 'Must have direct experience in building, developing processes for, and managing a team of SDRs/ BDRs.', 'Strong experience in SaaS sales and recruiting new enterprise leads/prospects.', 'Fundamental department building and start-up experience.', 'Data-driven, evidence-based, transparent decision-maker.', 'An analytical mindset focused on efficiency and production.', 'Highly adept technical understanding of common sales software (Salesforce and Sales Enablement Required).', 'Track record of exceeding pipeline generation goals.', 'Experience hiring and onboarding top talent.', 'Native English speaker - must.']

Title: Technical Project Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About us:ChargeAfter is a market-leading payments platform shaping the future of multi-lender “Buy Now Pay Later” financing solutions for modern enterprises. We are creating the next wave of credit at the point of sale: Omnichannel, global, personalized, optimized credit from multiple-tiered lender sources in real-time. ChargeAfter was founded in 2017 to help every consumer access fair and attainable financing options tailored to their unique needs. Our global financing network facilitates and connects B2C and B2B lenders with merchants, creating a global financing network that enables enterprise brands and merchants to offer real-time, low-cost, flexible financing options to their customers regardless of credit profile.About the role:We are looking for a Technical Project Manager (TPMJ) to join the ChargeAfter Delivery team, focusing on managed partners and client integrations (merchants, shopping carts, payment gateways, marketplaces) and strategic integrations with Banks and Financial Institutions. The TPJM will coordinate, manage, drive and execute client/partner project plans to successfully integrate the ChargeAfter solutions into the market. This is both a client/partner facing role, and R&D facing role, where you will work in conjunction with both pre-sale, integration and post-sales teams facilitating negotiations and technical solution brainstorming for a variety of high-volume solutions including web and mobile applications, browsers, platforms, etc.Primary responsibilities:Taking the identified business requirements and solution proposal, drive delivery of successful end-to-end client/partner integrations through comprehensive project delivery plans, operating rhythms and execution strategiesOwn overall project management, internal and external communicationDrive engagements across a wider cross-functional team of internal ChargeAfter business units (legal, compliance, operations, etc.).As required, work with internal product, engineering, development teams to prioritize the delivery of identified requirementsApply professional services methodologies, project management disciplines, metrics creation, Risk management, task managment in order to manage complex, multi-work stream efforts Have an excellent proven track record of managing large collaborative efforts across strategic/enterprise level partnership engagements.Requirements:You will:Work effectively with peers in a global organization to successfully onboard new enterprise partners and drive internal & external complex projects.Inspire and influence others to solve problems and seize opportunities.Effectively communicate with both internal and external C-level personnel.Manage integration POCs and technical sessions internalyCollaborate effectively in a highly dynamic and maturing business context.Balance inward/outward decisions (customer, financial, risk, compliance, execution).Maintain strong competency in cross-functional interaction models and matrix organization.Effectively partner with product and engineering teams to achieve the best solution for both client and company.Implement new services, and processes, and manage the continuous improvement feedback loop.You have:4+ years experience in Project Management or Professional Services, ideally in a high-paced delivery environmentExperience working with project management tools (Monday.com, MS Project, etc.) to create Gantts and other visual representations of project status and timelinesExperience in global payment products and business solutionsProven track record of successfully driving and delivering development & customization based project across different departmentsTeam player, excellent interpersonal skillsExcellent English, written and verbal communication, and presentation skills.Advantage Qualifications:Prior experience working with shopping carts, payment gateways, marketplaces, banks, and financial institutions B.sc/B.cs/ Engineering Certification in Project Management discipline - preferred (PMP, Six Sigma, or PRINCE2)Ability to analyze strategic objectives and define specific tactical goals Knowledge in SalesForce, Azure DevOps, PM tools, MongoDb

Title: Onboarding Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who are we?Zencity is re-inventing the way governments hear from, understand, and engage with their residents. We’ve created the most effective and comprehensive solution available: a suite of tools, all providing different methods of hearing resident feedback, all aimed at fostering effective, inclusive, and consistent community engagement.Our global team of urban enthusiasts and data geeks work with over 300 cities - from Los Angeles, to Chicago, to Tel Aviv. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic company focused on leveraging data and tech to work on real-world challenges and radically improve life in cities – your place is with us!What Is The RoleAs an Onboarding Manager, you will be responsible for shepherding our customers through the onboarding process and ensuring they are well-equipped to reap value from various Zencity tools. You are well-versed in government and are able to serve as a trusted advisor in assisting them to understand how to best integrate Zencity tools into their day-to-day. You will be responsible for managing our customers’ initial set up, value plan development, and training in a timely manner. This is not a technical onboarding manager role, but rather a strategic partner and advisor for our clients to get them started on the right path efficiently and effectively.ResponsibilitiesLeading all deployment phases of our customer’s onboarding process until full completion within a predefined time frame, including:Kick-off and use case mappingValue Plan developmentSetup and launching of all toolsTraining Project manage and collaborate working closely with Sales, Customer Success, Professional Services and Support to ensure a seamless transition between the Sales process to post-onboarding lifecycle with Customer Success. Proactively nurture the relationship with the customer while creating the necessary trust and confidence that the goals will be met. Be perceived as a trusted advisor with customer executives (Mayors, City Managers), champions, and other stakeholdersDevelop and maintain a deep understanding of cities’ decision making processes and challenges regarding citizen feedbackMonitor, measure, and map the customer’s onboarding and statusPlan, lead, and execute workshops and training sessionsBecome an expert on the Zencity productCommunicate customer feedback to the product teamRequirements:Minimum 3 years of experience as Customer Success/Consultant/Project Manager/ Delivery related “hands-on” background in complex environments US government background/expertise Ability to work under pressure and within deadlines.Detail-oriented – able to capture proper information correctly and accurately.Tech Savvy with the ability to understand customer's needs and provide solutionsSelf-starter, capable of thriving in a small, dynamic, and high growth startup environmentStrong digital skills, with the ability to simplify complex technical products to audiences with low digital proficiencyAbility to establish professional and personal connections with both senior officials and entry-level personnelProactive, charismatic, professional, motivated, organized and responsibleExcellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to work in a team-oriented, client-focused environmentExperience working for a B2B/B2G SaaS company- advantageAvailability for US working hoursBA/BSc degreeNative English speakerZencity provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

Title: QA Server Side
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who are we?:Join the world's fastest-growing mobile games company!SuperPlay is on a mission to create the world's best mobile games, and have fun while doing it. Founded in 2019 by industry veterans from Playtika, Rovio, and the movie industry, we set out to create delightful, memorable casual games that players can enjoy for years.Our first game Dice Dreams has become a top-100 grossing global hit, and our team has grown to include dozens of top-talent, dedicated, and driven individuals.Our future plans are even more exciting - if you want to be part of the journey, check out the role below!What will you do in SuperPlay?:We are looking for a QA server side to join SuperPlay R&D team and test our next big casual hit.Writing and working with test case documentation (STD, STP);Cross-platform manual testing: Android, iOS, Web;Testing the Backend side of the application.Working with in-house and external test toolsManual exploratory and regression testingInvestigating issues in productionWorking in cross-functional Scrum teams that also include Unity game developers and Backend developers.Who are you?:Must-Have:At least 3 years of experience as a QA EngineerExperience performing Manual QA testsExperience in applications testing (iOS, Android)Experience with SQL- MustExperience with Postman and REST API testing - MustAbility to read logs and identify critical informationExperience writing and working with test case documentation (STD, STP, STR)Good spoken and written EnglishExperience working with databasesExperience with agile / scrum methodologiesExperience with mobile testingExperience with writing scripts Advantage:Experience with Jira Experience with mobile games testingExperience with databases: Redis, MySQL A user/customer-focused approachFamiliarity with Agile frameworksEnthusiastic to new technologies and games in particular
Requirements: ['Writing and working with test case documentation (STD, STP);', 'Cross-platform manual testing: Android, iOS, Web;', 'Testing the Backend side of the application.', 'Working with in-house and external test tools', 'Manual exploratory and regression testing', 'Investigating issues in production', 'Working in cross-functional Scrum teams that also include Unity game developers and Backend developers.', 'At least 3 years of experience as a QA Engineer', 'Experience performing Manual QA tests', 'Experience in applications testing (iOS, Android)', 'Experience with SQL- Must', 'Experience with Postman and REST API testing - Must', 'Ability to read logs and identify critical information', 'Experience writing and working with test case documentation (STD, STP, STR)', 'Good spoken and written English', 'Experience working with databases', 'Experience with agile / scrum methodologies', 'Experience with mobile testing', 'Experience with writing scripts', 'Experience with Jira', 'Experience with mobile games testing', 'Experience with databases: Redis, MySQL', 'A user/customer-focused approach', 'Familiarity with Agile frameworks', 'Enthusiastic to new technologies and games in particular']

Title: Head of QA
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for Head of QA at 365scores to join our R&D team in a global sports technology hub providing real-time results, in-depth stats, original content, customized news feeds, and more.Requirements:5 years of management experience in hiring, mentoring a big group of manual and automation testers.Establish best practices of working closely with engineering and product management during the design phase to ensure solid understanding of design and product details;Experience with different types of manual testing: WEB/Mobile (iOS and Android native mobile apps), Cross browser testing, API testing;Understanding of test strategies;Experience in writing test cases using different Test Design Techniques;Ability to work by scrum and/or kanban methodologies.Strong advantage for candidates who are familiar with one or more of the below:Experience with API testing using tools such as Charles Proxy, PostmanExperience writing code in at least one of the following languages: C#/Java/Python/JavaScriptTechnical orientation and demonstrated familiarity with web and mobile technologies such as HTTP, HTML, SQL and NoSQL databases, caching and client-serverFamiliar with cloud-based deployment: AWS, Docker, Serverless, etc Responsibilities:As Head of QA, you will be fully responsible for assessing and communicating the quality of 365scores software at any given time.You will manage the QA team to ensure compliance with the goals listed hereYou will strongly advocate for proper QA process and procedure, insisting on the correct documentation of QA test cases, plans and procedures.You will review the work of the team, making sure that the testing defined adequately assesses the quality of the work at hand, looking beyond the current feature or release, and validating any other affected areas are covered.You will make recommendations to the automation teams for which tests should be automated, which should be a part of the CI/CD process, and which should be part of the regression cycleYou will be a strong advocate for quality and the customer
Requirements: ['5 years of management experience in hiring, mentoring a big group of manual and automation testers.', 'Establish best practices of working closely with engineering and product management during the design phase to ensure solid understanding of design and product details;', 'Experience with different types of manual testing: WEB/Mobile (iOS and Android native mobile apps), Cross browser testing, API testing;', 'Understanding of test strategies;', 'Experience in writing test cases using different Test Design Techniques;', 'Ability to work by scrum and/or kanban methodologies.', 'Experience with API testing using tools such as Charles Proxy, Postman', 'Experience writing code in at least one of the following languages: C#/Java/Python/JavaScript', 'Technical orientation and demonstrated familiarity with web and mobile technologies such as HTTP, HTML, SQL and NoSQL databases, caching and client-server', 'Familiar with cloud-based deployment: AWS, Docker, Serverless, etc', 'As Head of QA, you will be fully responsible for assessing and communicating the quality of 365scores software at any given time.', 'You will manage the QA team to ensure compliance with the goals listed here', 'You will strongly advocate for proper QA process and procedure, insisting on the correct documentation of QA test cases, plans and procedures.', 'You will review the work of the team, making sure that the testing defined adequately assesses the quality of the work at hand, looking beyond the current feature or release, and validating any other affected areas are covered.', 'You will make recommendations to the automation teams for which tests should be automated, which should be a part of the CI/CD process, and which should be part of the regression cycle', 'You will be a strong advocate for quality and the customer']

Title: מנהל.ת תוכן וסושיאל
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: תיאור המשרה:לאתר mako דרוש.ה מנהל.ת תוכן וסושיאל.התפקיד כולל:אחריות על הנכסים הדיגיטליים של אתר mako.ניהול עמודים וקמפיינים בכל הפלטפורמות הדיגיטליות - Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube ועוד.הכרות מעמיקה ברשתות החברתיות – מגמות, טרנדים, טכנולוגיות, פלטפורמות וכלים חדשים.הובלת מהלכים דיגיטליים חדשניים - עריכה, יצירה וכתיבת תוכן תוך גיבוש יוזמות קריאטיביות.יצירת שיתופי פעולה עם משפיענים, קבוצות ויצרני תוכן לצורך חשיפה והפקת תכנים למותג.פיתוח קהילות מעורבות והנעתם לפעולה.מענה ומעקב אחר אזכורים ותגובות בזירות הרשת השונות.הפקת דו"חות מדידה תקופתיים לצורך למידה, שיפור והבנת המגמות ברשת (ידע ב-Google Analytics).עבודה ישירה מול גורמים רבים בארגון – רמת אחריות, דיוק ומשמעת עצמית גבוהה.משרה מלאה, עבודה במשמרות, ימים א'-ה'Requirements:דרישות התפקיד:ניסיון של שנתיים לפחות בעולמות השיווק הדיגיטלי.תואר ראשון בתחום התקשורת / השיווק.הכרות וזיקה לתחום האקטואליה, חדשות ולייף סטייל.יכולת כתיבה, עריכה, ניסוח וחשיבה קריאטיבית גבוהה.הבנה וניסיון בעיצוב לפלטפורמות השונות בסושיאל.ניסיון עבודה עם מערכות כגון – Business Manager ,Creator Studio ,Google Analytics.יכולת עבודה בצוות, למידה מהירה, סדר וארגון.ראש גדול להתמודדות עם מצבי לחץ, יכולת לבצע תיעדוף משימות ומולטיטסקינג.
Requirements: ['אחריות על הנכסים הדיגיטליים של אתר mako.', 'ניהול עמודים וקמפיינים בכל הפלטפורמות הדיגיטליות - Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube ועוד.', 'הכרות מעמיקה ברשתות החברתיות – מגמות, טרנדים, טכנולוגיות, פלטפורמות וכלים חדשים.', 'הובלת מהלכים דיגיטליים חדשניים - עריכה, יצירה וכתיבת תוכן תוך גיבוש יוזמות קריאטיביות.', 'יצירת שיתופי פעולה עם משפיענים, קבוצות ויצרני תוכן לצורך חשיפה והפקת תכנים למותג.', 'פיתוח קהילות מעורבות והנעתם לפעולה.', 'מענה ומעקב אחר אזכורים ותגובות בזירות הרשת השונות.', 'הפקת דו"חות מדידה תקופתיים לצורך למידה, שיפור והבנת המגמות ברשת (ידע ב-Google Analytics).', 'עבודה ישירה מול גורמים רבים בארגון – רמת אחריות, דיוק ומשמעת עצמית גבוהה.', "משרה מלאה, עבודה במשמרות, ימים א'-ה'", 'ניסיון של שנתיים לפחות בעולמות השיווק הדיגיטלי.', 'תואר ראשון בתחום התקשורת / השיווק.', 'הכרות וזיקה לתחום האקטואליה, חדשות ולייף סטייל.', 'יכולת כתיבה, עריכה, ניסוח וחשיבה קריאטיבית גבוהה.', 'הבנה וניסיון בעיצוב לפלטפורמות השונות בסושיאל.', 'ניסיון עבודה עם מערכות כגון – Business Manager ,Creator Studio ,Google Analytics.', 'יכולת עבודה בצוות, למידה מהירה, סדר וארגון.', 'ראש גדול להתמודדות עם מצבי לחץ, יכולת לבצע תיעדוף משימות ומולטיטסקינג.']

Title: Assistant Controller
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: With over 30 Million users on our platform, we’re here to change the future of business. Our all-in-one platform makes starting a business affordable and accessible to everyone - we welcome more than 800k new business owners every month. From our products to our careers, there are endless opportunities for growth.Our team | Our core | Our dream fulfillersWhen we started Tailor Brands, we wanted to help people to accelerate their growth and fulfill their dreams. This also defines us internally; we put our focus on maximizing individual impact and creating an environment of absolute transparency.About The RoleJoin our Finance department to oversee all financial aspects of the company, including general accounting, month close, tax returns, audits, operations, cash management, payroll and much moreAnalyze financial results (monthly, quarterly, and annual reports) with respect to cash burn, trends, costs, and compliance with budgetsDetermine and manage the company revenues and revenue recognition, monitor collection, billing, and preparation of commission and royaltiesPrepare investors and management periodical packsCash management and cash projectionsEquity related matters, including managing the cap table, option plans etc.Interact with other departments to provide consultative support for planning initiatives through financial analysis, reports, and recommendationsWork with the Company’s external auditors and ensure the timely and accurate filing of the Company’s financial reportsPrepare tax returns and other statutory reports, including tax planningEnhance and implement financial and accounting system processes, tools, and controls Requirements:Professional certification (CPA)Internship from one of the Big 4 firmsGreat communication skills and ability to collaborate with other departments and external 3rd partiesExperience in preparing financial statements according to US GAAPAbility to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, well organized and function as a team member to accomplish job rolesGreat attention to details and problem-solving skillsSuperb written and verbal communication skills both in English and HebrewWorking knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel) and Priority accounting software - AdvantageFamiliarity with SaaS metrics (especially in B2C) - an advantage

Title: Office & Employee Experience Manager- Temporary Position
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We create a safe space for communities to thrive.OpenWeb is on a mission to improve the quality of conversations online — and build an internet where content creators of every kind are empowered to truly own their audience relationships & thrive independently.We build technologies that are rooted in healthy conversations, transparent first-party data relationships and mutual economic prosperity for all stakeholders. Wherever there is a content creator to empower, a conversation to protect or a community to host — OpenWeb will be there.Today, OpenWeb partners with more than 1,000 top-tier publishers (including Wall Street Journal, New York Times, News Corp, Verizon Media, CBS, Fox News, Hearst, Refinery 29 and more) and hosts 100 million monthly active users.Founded in 2012, OpenWeb has over 220 employees between New York City and Tel Aviv, Kiev, San Diego and Canada, and is backed by Insight Venture Partners, Georgian, Entrée Capital, AltaIR Capital, The New York Times, Samsung Next, Dentsu, Norma Investments, and ScaleUpTogether, we are empowering individuals to take action, and demand more from one another. We're crafting technology that naturally brings people together and fosters healthy discussion—so they have more dinner-table talks and less shouting matches online. It starts with us. Let's take the web back from the trolls - together. Are you in?How You'll Contribute as our Office & Employee Experience Manager:Passion. You're enthusiastic about creating magical moments, inspiring fun, keeping the office a place where people love to be. Have your finger on the pulse of day to day operations to keep our office running smoothly. "Yes!" No task is too big or too small. Even if it's something you've never done before, your first reaction is to keep calm under pressure and dive in to get it done. Adaptable. You'll have 15 small tasks and several giant projects popping up every day. You should be able to stay organized, accurate, and super responsive. Employee Experience. Fun is your middle name. You'll make all the FUN moments like happy hours, activities, parties and more. You'll ensure a seamless experience for our party people by managing the budget, finding the best vendors, creating new swag and bringing creative concepts. Onboarding. Once we have a new hire, it's showtime! You step in to coordinate with the Manager & IT to create a remarkable first day and great start for everyone. The Skills and Experience You Bring:2+ years of experience as an Office Manager in a fast paced environmentFluent Hebrew; reading, writing and speakingFluent English; reading, writing and speakingExperienced with planning complex, high-budget eventsExperienced with managing multiple vendors and budgetsSuper energetic and friendly even under pressureHighly organized, attentive to detail, pro at multitaskingYou should love having fun and spreading joy!Build your skills with us as you build a better web for everyone. Join us!Also, we care about your privacy! Please take a moment to review OpenWeb's Privacy Practices.
Requirements: ["Passion. You're enthusiastic about creating magical moments, inspiring fun, keeping the office a place where people love to be. Have your finger on the pulse of day to day operations to keep our office running smoothly.", '"Yes!" No task is too big or too small. Even if it\'s something you\'ve never done before, your first reaction is to keep calm under pressure and dive in to get it done.', "Adaptable. You'll have 15 small tasks and several giant projects popping up every day. You should be able to stay organized, accurate, and super responsive.", "Employee Experience. Fun is your middle name. You'll make all the FUN moments like happy hours, activities, parties and more. You'll ensure a seamless experience for our party people by managing the budget, finding the best vendors, creating new swag and bringing creative concepts.", "Onboarding. Once we have a new hire, it's showtime! Title: PMO - Scrum Master
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Finonex is looking for a technological PMO with a can-do approach, strong interpersonal skills that thrives in a fast-paced environment, ambitious, persistent and highly motivated.We are looking for a PMO to play a key role in our product and R&D organization, continuously improving our ways of working, and driving towards operational excellence. You will be a critical part of many of our day-to-day decision-making, feature launches, and product roadmap items.This is a great opportunity to join our company of professionals and work with cutting edge technologies.Requirements:3+ years of experience in a similar role (Agile Project Manager / PMO)Experience working in a Tech environment.Experience working with agile project methodology (Scrum, Kanban) and management, and PMO processes (e.g., scheduling, budget management, Risks management)Knowledge & experience in managing and administrating TFS, troubleshooting, and system automationExcel Proficiency - pivot tables, functions, graphs, etcRelevant Bachelor’s Degree in Industrial Engineering, Information System (or equivalent degree).Excellent communication skills.On this role you will:Define working processes between departmentsDefine working processes between R&D and ProductAsist to set the new R&D methodologies in an increasing of R&D department + assist to define the R&D teamsSet and own of project management platform + integration to R&D system (Currently TFS)Manage R&D platform (TFS) transformation to Jira or any other solutionFind the appropriate solutionManage Cross organizational (not only in Finonex) projects such as: new regulation request, new implementations, Regulations reporting projectsBeing Scrum master of the company and teaching the teams + make a periodic scrum master from the R&D teamsManage implementation project in the organizationManage new implementation of suppliers and budget platformResponsible for projects progress trackingPerform reports with KPIsSupport the R&D routines: such, as periodical meetingsEnsure each person on a project team has the access to all materials neededEnsure that projects are planned correctly and that the owner of each deliverable is identified correctly to meet their KPIs and planned deliverablesProvide an integrative view and analysis of the various project aspects within the program to enable better decisions makingNurture agile squads, work closely with squads and their leadership to adopt agreed best practicesRefine and improve the definition of metrics as the company’s challenges and data evolveWork independently, solve problems and deal with ambiguityWill be nice that you have:Agile certification (SAFe, Professional Scrum Master)Experience working with BI tools

pivot tables, functions, graphs, etc', 'Relevant Bachelor’s Degree in Industrial Engineering, Information System (or equivalent degree).', 'Excellent communication skills.', 'Define working processes between departments', 'Define working processes between R&D and Product', 'Asist to set the new R&D methodologies in an increasing of R&D department + assist to define the R&D teams', 'Set and own of project management platform + integration to R&D system (Currently TFS)', 'Manage R&D platform (TFS) transformation to Jira or any other solution', 'Find the appropriate solution', 'Manage Cross organizational (not only in Finonex) projects such as: new regulation request, new implementations, Regulations reporting projects', 'Being Scrum master of the company and teaching the teams + make a periodic scrum master from the R&D teams', 'Manage implementation project in the organization', 'Manage new implementation of suppliers and budget platform', 'Responsible for projects progress tracking', 'Perform reports with KPIs', 'Support the R&D routines: such, as periodical meetings', 'Ensure each person on a project team has the access to all materials needed', 'Ensure that projects are planned correctly and that the owner of each deliverable is identified correctly to meet their KPIs and planned deliverables', 'Provide an integrative view and analysis of the various project aspects within the program to enable better decisions making', 'Nurture agile squads, work closely with squads and their leadership to adopt agreed best practices', 'Refine and improve the definition of metrics as the company’s challenges and data evolve', 'Work independently, solve problems and deal with ambiguity', 'Agile certification (SAFe, Professional Scrum Master)', 'Experience working with BI tools']

Title: Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Noname Security, founded in 2020, is rapidly growing with more than 200 team members globally. Onnly a year out of stealth, the company is the first API Security Unicorn at $1B valuation and $220M in total financing. Noname Security is also one of the fastest growing cybersecurity companies ever.Our mission is to reduce the risk of API security vulnerabilities and cyber attacks. Our API Security Platform is an out-of-band solution that doesn’t require agents or network modifications and offers deeper visibility and security than API gateways, load balancers, and WAFs. No one addresses the API security challenge like Noname.Join a truly agile team, work collaboratively with cpp developers, data scientists, product managers and more to truly shape the product we deliverRequirements: 4 years of cyber security & data analyst research. Experience with web hacking techniques. 2+ years of experience with Python development. Experience with data analysis techniques: SQL, pandas (Python). Ability to take ownership and execute tasks end-to-end. Good understanding of HTTP and APIs - advantage. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent - advantage.Responsibilities:As part of our product, we show our clients a full discovery of their APIs and any anomalous activities and attacks on them. Our team is responsible for solving the product’s most problematic core cyber algorithms based on comprehensive data research. Perform extensive research on customer traffic for architectural decision-making. Design and develop complex algorithms to solve some never-before-addressed challenges. Create and take end-to-end ownership of core and difficult cyber problems.
Requirements: ['4 years of cyber security & data analyst research.', 'Experience with web hacking techniques.', '2+ years of experience with Python development.', 'Experience with data analysis techniques: SQL, pandas (Python).', 'Ability to take ownership and execute tasks end-to-end.', 'Good understanding of HTTP and APIs - advantage.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent - advantage.', 'Perform extensive research on customer traffic for architectural decision-making.', 'Design and develop complex algorithms to solve some never-before-addressed challenges.', 'Create and take end-to-end ownership of core and difficult cyber problems.']

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About UsSunbit builds financial technology for real life. Our technology eases the stress of paying for life’s expenses by giving people more options on how and when they pay. Founded in 2016, Sunbit offers a next-generation, no-fee credit card that can be managed through a powerful mobile app, as well as a point-of-sale payment option available at more than 16,000 service locations, including auto dealership service centers, optical practices, dentist offices, veterinary clinics, and specialty healthcare services. Sunbit was included on the 2022 Inc. 5000 list. The financial technology company has also been named as a Most Loved Workplace®, Best Point of Sale Company, and as a Top Fintech Startup by CB Insights. We use cutting-edge innovations in financial technology to bring leading data and features that allow individuals to be qualified instantly, making purchases at the point-of-sale fast, fair and easy for consumers from all walks of life. We create value focused on our core values; we work tirelessly to ensure that Sunbit becomes available to everyone, everywhere.We invite you to #UnleashYourCuriosity and join our ever-growing R&D organization.Check out the open positions & feel free to reach out with any questions!What You’ll Do:We are looking for an exceptional Product Manager who has a passion for building high-quality products that tailor to the financial needs of American consumers in various retail and healthcare businesses. In this role, you will be leading the entire process from product strategy to deployment, including ideation, planning, designing, prioritizing, and defining requirements. You will work closely with the management team to ship products that directly contribute to the company’s growth.Sunbit’s Product Managers are cross-functional leaders who deliver value every day and work relentlessly towards achieving Sunbit’s vision and goals. You will work with a group of passionate individuals in Product Management, Engineering, Sales, Marketing, Operations, and Legal. Through teamwork and collaboration, you will build world-class products leveraging our robust technology stack, deep analytics capabilities, and streamlined deployment processes.Define product vision, strategy, and business metricsBuild and maintain a product roadmap that contributes to strategic goalsDeliver innovative features by driving ideation, testing, and developmentResearch and identify new opportunities to continuously add, enhance and improve Sunbit’s productsDefine product development timeline and resource allocationBe a champion of testing and iterative delivery to provide best-in-class productsDefine business requirements and functional specifications based on an intimate knowledge of customers, the product, the market, the competitive landscape, and internal dependencies within the companyConduct business and financial analysis to understand performance, gaps, and future enhancements.Use quantitative and qualitative data and insights from user feedback and experimentation (A/B Testing) to inform product decisions.Work cross-functionally with designers, engineers, and other stakeholders to guarantee a smooth and efficient product deliveryWork with external business partners and vendors to deliver products and services that grow and maintain the business.Requirements:7+ years experience as a Product Manager, preferably in fintech and/or SaaS companiesProven record of delivering products from ideation to implementationWorking knowledge of APIs, SDKs, and software integrationsExperience working with external business partners on implementation projectsOwnership mindset; a drive to roll up your sleeves and get things doneAdvanced analytics capabilities to drive informed decision makingResearched customer needs to help support product ideation and strategyA natural curiosity to learn all parts of our technology and how it affects our businessA collaborative mindset with the ability to balance teamwork and autonomous decision makingAbility to embrace the velocity of a fast-growth startup and thrive in ambiguityWorked with business leaders to build game-changing features that directly contribute to the company’s growthA passion for our company’s missionThe ability to work independently and interface with all levels of managementExperience at a fast-growth startup

Title: QA Operations

We are looking for an excellent QA Operations Engineer to join the QA team.Job Description:QA Operations Engineer will support quality oversight in operation activities. maintain quality standards and regulatory requirements.Responsibilities:Support the operation and production (clean room, warehouse, supply chain, maintenance, engineering) department activities with all quality controls and demands, support with biological testing.Initiate and implement NCMRs for non-conforming materials/products/process including corrective actions.Perform Internal audits and take part in external (regulatory, customers) audits.Analyze and present to management trends and statistics related to QA oversight in operations. Title: Community Associate
Location: Or Yehuda, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Regus, we’ve built the world’s largest workspace network so that our customers can work better, faster, happier. Join us in one of our Regus centre teams. Bring more freedom to more people and businesses. And you’ll be able to work better, faster and happier too.The opportunityAs a Community Associate, you’ll work closely with new and existing customers, solving problems for them and making sure they have everything they need.A typical day at RegusYou arrive 15 minutes before your centre opens to make sure everything is ready and check there’s nothing the cleaners have missed.Customers start coming in thick and fast. One asks you for a changed WiFi code. Another wants to know if his important package has arrived. A woman needs directions to her meeting room… and can you help her set up the projector and take an order for drinks?The mail arrives. You sort through it while dealing with a whole host of other customer requests, remembering to email the customer from earlier to let him know his package is waiting for him in his mailbox. And that’s lunch.Early afternoon, you sit down with the Community Manager to discuss the organisation of next week’s networking event. You plan and write the invites to customers, then create, print and put up posters on the noticeboards around the centre.The day is coming to a close. Time to gently ask the large group in meeting room 3 to start wrapping up. You direct them to the nice restaurant you know around the corner, so they can grab a bite and continue their discussion. Once the last person has left the building and everything’s nice and tidy, it’s time to head home.About YouWe’re looking for someone who knows how to manage multiple tasks while providing customers with the best possible service. You also need to be: A good communicator, with the ability to build strong professional relationships and empathise with people’s needs  Happy taking ownership of problems and finding ways to solve them  Positive, enthusiastic and able to adapt to fast-changing situations  Confident using MS Office and other basic IT packages What We OfferOn top of a competitive salary package you’ll enjoy: A bright and inspiring work environment  Training and development opportunities
Requirements: ['A good communicator, with the ability to build strong professional relationships and empathise with people’s needs', 'Happy taking ownership of problems and finding ways to solve them', 'Positive, enthusiastic and able to adapt to fast-changing situations', 'Confident using MS Office and other basic IT packages', 'A bright and inspiring work environment', 'Training and development opportunities']

Title: Product Owner
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The Cymbio team is a group of innovators and leaders on a mission to seamlessly and efficiently connect, scale, and automate the full cycle of digital retail operations - for every brand. We believe in building a transparent and dynamic world, and we highly invest in our people, customers, and product. We have a flexible work model, connecting people from multiple locations, including the US and Israel. We’re rapidly growing and always looking for talented people to be part of the Cymbio team to help shape our business and culture. Join us on this journey in building the future of connected commerce!We are looking for an exceptional Product Owner who is passionate about building products that customers love. You will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment and work with our cross-functional teams to design, build, and roll out products that deliver the company’s vision and strategy to drive success to Cymbio’s core product.Requirements:Hands-on product owner, keen on details, and enthusiastic about dataCurious and committed to solving customers’ needs and excited about always being ahead of their expectations2+ years of product management/ownership experience, preferably in B2B startups Proven ability to deliver results and collaborate with multiple teamsCulture is our priority! Our awesome team is our biggest asset and our secret sauce to our successFast learner, logical thinker, and self-drivenAbility to prioritize workload and meet tight deadlines of multiple projectsA team player with a can-do attitudeStrong interpersonal and communication skills in English - written and verbalExperience working with project management tools and technology Responsibilities:Collecting and analyzing feedback from customers, stakeholders, and other teams to shape the product’s roadmapManage the entire lifecycle of our product and features, from inception, wireframes, specs, and development processDeeply understand our product and technology, along with the ability to communicate with our developers about product requirementsWork closely with developers, designers, sales, product marketing, and customer success teams
Requirements: ['Hands-on product owner, keen on details, and enthusiastic about data', 'Curious and committed to solving customers’ needs and excited about always being ahead of their expectations', '2+ years of product management/ownership experience, preferably in B2B startups', 'Proven ability to deliver results and collaborate with multiple teams', 'Culture is our priority!
