Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About UsSunbit builds financial technology for real life. Our technology eases the stress of paying for life’s expenses by giving people more options on how and when they pay. Founded in 2016, Sunbit offers a next-generation, no-fee credit card that can be managed through a powerful mobile app, as well as a point-of-sale payment option available at more than 16,000 service locations, including auto dealership service centers, optical practices, dentist offices, veterinary clinics, and specialty healthcare services. Sunbit was included on the 2022 Inc. 5000 list. The financial technology company has also been named as a Most Loved Workplace®, Best Point of Sale Company, and as a Top Fintech Startup by CB Insights. We use cutting-edge innovations in financial technology to bring leading data and features that allow individuals to be qualified instantly, making purchases at the point-of-sale fast, fair and easy for consumers from all walks of life. We create value focused on our core values; we work tirelessly to ensure that Sunbit becomes available to everyone, everywhere.We invite you to #UnleashYourCuriosity and join our ever-growing R&D organization.Check out the open positions & feel free to reach out with any questions!What You’ll Do:We are looking for an exceptional Product Manager who has a passion for building high-quality products that tailor to the financial needs of American consumers in various retail and healthcare businesses. In this role, you will be leading the entire process from product strategy to deployment, including ideation, planning, designing, prioritizing, and defining requirements. You will work closely with the management team to ship products that directly contribute to the company’s growth.Sunbit’s Product Managers are cross-functional leaders who deliver value every day and work relentlessly towards achieving Sunbit’s vision and goals. You will work with a group of passionate individuals in Product Management, Engineering, Sales, Marketing, Operations, and Legal. Through teamwork and collaboration, you will build world-class products leveraging our robust technology stack, deep analytics capabilities, and streamlined deployment processes.Define product vision, strategy, and business metricsBuild and maintain a product roadmap that contributes to strategic goalsDeliver innovative features by driving ideation, testing, and developmentResearch and identify new opportunities to continuously add, enhance and improve Sunbit’s productsDefine product development timeline and resource allocationBe a champion of testing and iterative delivery to provide best-in-class productsDefine business requirements and functional specifications based on an intimate knowledge of customers, the product, the market, the competitive landscape, and internal dependencies within the companyConduct business and financial analysis to understand performance, gaps, and future enhancements.Use quantitative and qualitative data and insights from user feedback and experimentation (A/B Testing) to inform product decisions.Work cross-functionally with designers, engineers, and other stakeholders to guarantee a smooth and efficient product deliveryWork with external business partners and vendors to deliver products and services that grow and maintain the business.Requirements:7+ years experience as a Product Manager, preferably in fintech and/or SaaS companiesProven record of delivering products from ideation to implementationWorking knowledge of APIs, SDKs, and software integrationsExperience working with external business partners on implementation projectsOwnership mindset; a drive to roll up your sleeves and get things doneAdvanced analytics capabilities to drive informed decision makingResearched customer needs to help support product ideation and strategyA natural curiosity to learn all parts of our technology and how it affects our businessA collaborative mindset with the ability to balance teamwork and autonomous decision makingAbility to embrace the velocity of a fast-growth startup and thrive in ambiguityWorked with business leaders to build game-changing features that directly contribute to the company’s growthA passion for our company’s missionThe ability to work independently and interface with all levels of managementExperience at a fast-growth startup

Title: Customer Success Team Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Bigabid is an innovative technology company led by data scientists and engineers devoted to mobile app growth. Our proprietary ad platforms powered by machine learning are a culmination of that devotion.We deliver valuable results and insights for a fast growing clientele of major app developers using elite programmatic user acquisition and retargeting technologies.We are looking for a motivated, customer-centric individual to join our Customer Success team as a Team Leader. In this role, you will support and manage a group of CSMs managing a number of customers of various sizes.As a Customer Success Team Lead, you will be responsible for empowering the team while leading and formulating Customer Success best practices aimed at maximizing customer satisfaction, and overall customer lifetime value.The ideal candidate is resilient, detail-oriented, organized, and with outstanding communication and people skills.Responsibilities:Develop, coach, and support a group of Customer Success ManagersDevelop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders, and executive sponsorsClearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholdersForecast and track key account metrics (e.g. quarterly results and annual forecasts)Collaborate with the sales team to identify growth opportunitiesManage, prioritize, and oversee the daily tasks of the teamLead key customers for growth and success Coach, motivate, and empower the team to meet and exceed monthly and quarterly targets by providing ongoing performance feedbackUse data to identify and implement initiatives that will drive better outcomes for our customers and our mutual growthWork cross-functionally to identify and implement initiatives to help scale the businessRequirements:6+ years in a B2B customer-facing role2+ Years of experience in managing a customer success teamKnowledge of ad-tech and/or Mobile marketing - Title: HO Anti-Fraud, Reconciliation & Payments
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The Fraud Prevention, Reconciliation & Payments Head will be in charge of the global operations team to take care about both business (P&L) and technical part of payments processing. This includes but is not limited to partnership management, payments flow optimization, acceptance rate, fraud protection and reconciliation. Will act as a key source of knowledge and focal point for all the payments related topics - both strategic and operational including guidance on regulation and industry standards.Responsibilities:Manage the global operations team. Address any personal and professional concerns.Drive Gett payments and anti-fraud strategy sharing expertise and providing guidance for the internal teams throughout the organisation. Be responsible for the team P&L as well as ensure payments related KPIs are met.Serve as superior decision maker for all fraud concerns and escalations.Be responsible for processing all transactions at Gett: set up payments processing and new payment methods in new and existing locations;Work closely with the global team in a positive and respectful way to achieve maximum collaboration (Ego is a no-go);Work with other departments and units to solve fraud, payments service and reconciliation concerns to the best outcome of Gett;Suggest and implement new measures to counter fraud, payments and reconciliation: tools, rules, procedures, fraud rings detection, analysis.Requirements:Minimum 3 years of leadership and people management experience;5+ years experience in Payments & Fraud operations in digital business or e-commerce; 2+ years of experience in payments operations, working with various vendors and performance analysisStrong knowledge about card payments industry, alternative payment methods such as ApplePay & GooglePay and reconciliation.Deep insight into Payments & Anti-Fraud industry KPIs and approaches. Advanced Excel and SQL knowledge; Python, Java Script - nice to haveStrong analytical skills and data-driven thinking;Good organisational, personal and social skills, self-time-management and efficient prioritisation;Ability to perform in a fast paced changing environment;Flexible thinking and ability to adjust and find solutions;Innovative and resourceful approach;

Text: Mitrelli is an international group of subsidiaries with strong financial performance and funding capabilities, that develops sustainable synergetic holistic models in various fields of activity for countries in Africa. Combining technology, innovation, knowledge and decades of experience, we deliver successful sustainable tailor-made, turnkey projects for public and private entities.Our Vision We envision a better world, where we improve the quality of life and the wellbeing of the people in the countries where we operate.Making an Impact Our projects contribute to improving national security and economic prosperity by providing innovative solutions, that help citizens contribute to their families, communities and countries in all aspects of life. Text: Papaya Gaming is one of the world's fastest-growing mobile game companies, providing entertainment for millions of users across multiple apps. The company is headquartered in the heart of Tel Aviv. We're looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our team and take a key role in helping us deliver higher quality data and insights on a fast growing data scale platforms.Requirements:BSc / BA in Computer Science / Engineering / Information Technology / Data Systems Management or an equivalent background3+ years of experience as a BI Developer / Data Engineer (DWH, ETL)Proficient in SQLSignificant experience with GCP Platform (BigQuery, IAM & Admin, Monitoring, etc.)Significant experience with workflow managers such as Airflow/dbtExperience with Python DevelopmentExperience with BI reporting platforms (Looker, Tableau, Power BI, etc)Experience with 24/7 production systems and real-time analyticsResponsibilities:Be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining complicated data pipelinesWork closely with Analytics, R&D, Product & Marketing departments to make in-game data accessible & reliableTake ownership of existing ETL processes overseeing extensive data scale & complex structuresPull data from various data sources and integrate it into the ETL processMaintain and support data platforms for analytics (e.g. GCP)Optimize workloads to reduce run time and improve performanceDevelop monitoring over BI infrastructureConduct data flow validation testing and AdHoc troubleshooting from in-company & external data sourcesTranslate business requirements to technical specifications in conjunction with other departments as part of the development of new featuresDesign, build and deploy BI solutions (e.g. reporting tools) - Create visualizations and reports for company-wide projectsDevelop and update technical documentation

Title: Product Manager, Claims
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Location: Hybrid/FlexibleAt Fairmatic we’re on a mission to make roads safer, one fleet at a time. We think about insurance, risk and underwriting in an unconventional way. Auto insurance has always been unfair: safe and unsafe drivers that look alike pay the same. Because of this, safe drivers end up subsidizing risky ones. It doesn’t make sense. We’re using data and AI to introduce a personalized option that incentivizes safe driving with savings. Our predictive risk models have been trained with nearly 200 billion miles of driving data and tested with hundreds of thousands of paying drivers with industry-leading underwriting results. And we’re just getting started.Our leadership team includes serial entrepreneurs, insurance industry savants and start-up veterans. We’ve raised $42M from leading VCs as well as insurtech, fintech and technology industry angel investors.At Fairmatic we do our best work while living our best lives, regardless of where we are. We have thriving teams across the globe and we are constantly looking for talented folks to welcome into the family. We are a curious, adaptable and diverse bunch of technologists and problem solvers who are obsessed with creating a positive impact in the world. In our work together, we strive for close collaboration, humbleness and constant learning.We are looking for a talented and motivated Product Manager to join our Claims Product team. This team will be responsible for delivering a delightful claims experience and optimized claims outcomes for our customers (drivers, fleets, and brokers) and internal stakeholders (for example, claims adjusters). Claims is the most impactful insurance-related experience for our customers, and our ability to deliver a seamless and fair end-to-end experience is a critical component of our value proposition and our success in fulfilling our mission.RequirementsA day in the life:Develop a claims product strategy and roadmap to deliver optimized claims outcomes and a delightful experience for our customers and internal stakeholders using technology and dataDevelop clear and concise written materials to align cross-functional teams around a shared vision or problem statement Partner closely with the Customer Success, Claims and other cross-functional teams as well as other Product & Engineering individuals and teams to develop products and experiences that maximize value creation to our customers and our businessDevelop product hypotheses, design and conduct lean and focused experiments to prove or disprove themRegularly and proactively share progress towards solving focus problem statements and advancing on shared visionUncover high-impact improvement opportunities for the Claims Product team by monitoring and analyzing key quantitative and qualitative metricsPropose and champion ways in which the rest of the organization can help maximize value creation from your workExemplify and foster Fairmatic’s humble, collaborative and impact-obsessed cultureWhat you will need:5+ years of Product Management experienceStrong analytical skills, with experience setting up and executing tests or experimentsExceptional prioritization and project management skills Excellent written, verbal, and visual communication skillsDemonstrated capabilities owning end to end quantitative and qualitative customer research and effectively identifying and interpreting key findingsDemonstrated ability to work closely and effectively with engineering, design, and cross-functional stakeholders to deliver impactExperience in building customer facing claims experiences is a plus.Self-starter and ability to define and initiate work from scratchA knack for balancing multiple projects at the same timeSelf-driven, motivated, and willingness to work in a rapidly changing, early stage startup environment BenefitsEmployee Health Insurance ProgramPrivate Health CareUnlimited HolidaysMobile and Broad Band allowanceEntertainment allowance Wellbeing allowancePension contribution

Title: Business Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DescriptionMoon Active is one of the world's fastest-growing mobile game companies, providing entertainment to millions of active users across the universe. The company is headquartered in the heart of Tel Aviv.We're looking for a sharp and passionate Business Data Analyst to join our top-notch business analytics team. Using your technical and analytical skills, you'll be responsible for telling the story behind the numbers and to understand how people interact with our products.ResponsibilitiesBe on the cutting edge of analysis, leveraging our data sources to propose new ideas that you’ll then see implemented.Analyze large, complex data sets representing users’ behavior, see beyond numbers and help to inform, influence, support and execute our business decisions.Work closely with Product, Monetization and management, be proactive and provide actionable recommendations and conclusions from game data to shape features, game economies and future product roadmaps and business strategies.Plan and analyze effective A/B tests in order to improve business KPIs.Balance and monitor flows from all the features in the game.Measure and improve performance of promotions and live-ops for each segment.Build reports and dashboards to monitor product performance, key business metrics and player’s experience.Requirements3+ years of analytical work experience, preferably for a web or mobile company, online gaming industry.BSc/BA in highly quantitative field such as mathematics / Industrial Engineering / Economics / Statistics or equivalent academic knowledge.Outstanding analytical & technical skills.Strong SQL with experience in querying large, complex data sets.Self-motivated and independent.Ability to turn complex concepts into actionable recommendations.AdvantagePrevious experience as a product analyst in the gaming industry.Python, R or any other scripting language.Previous experience in business analysis management position.

Title: SOX Controller
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: SolarEdge is a global leader in smart energy technology. By leveraging world-class engineering capabilities and with a focus on innovation, SolarEdge creates smart energy solutions that power our lives and drive future progress.We are looking for SOX Controller that will join our team.As a SOX Controller, you will be responsible for the definition, documentation, testing, and evaluation of the effectiveness of internal controls over financial statementsYou will also be involved in the Company’s internal audit activities, ensuring compliance with Company’s financial and operational internal controls, policies, and procedures.What will you be doing:  Identify and assess areas of significant business risk Develop and maintain business process narratives and flowcharts Perform walkthrough and risk assessment with process owners to ensure adequate control design and identification of key controls Set up internal controls test plans and perform the internal testing Perform internal audits in the Company's headquarters and subsidiaries worldwide Identify control deficiencies, recommend remediation plans, and monitor remediation progress Identify areas of potential improvement related key processes and procedures Take part in Oracle ERP implementation project Communicate and provide accurate reporting to Company’s managersRequirements: CPA or certified internal auditor with at least 5 years of proven experience in internal audit Self-motivating individual who can work independently with some guidance Ability to build strong working relationships across all levels of the organization Strong analytical skills, detail-oriented and well organized Ability to manipulate large amounts of data and compile detailed reports Remarkable presentation and report writing skills Ability to function well in a dynamic multi-tasking environment A team player English at a mother tongue level

Title: בק אופיס
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: גרו (גרופון) , מותג האיקומרס הגדול בישראל מחפשת אחר איש/אשת בק אופיס לתפעול אתר ואפליקציית My Ofer.מהות התפקיד: תפעול אתר, אפליקציה ומערכות Back Office.מה עוד? תחזוק וניהול המידע השוטף בפלטפורמה ריכוז והזנה של תכנים למערכת ניהול תפעולית של הארגון בקרה אחר עסקאות תמיכה תפעולית בקמפיינים תמיכה שוטפת על מערכת ניהול הזמנות עבודה שוטפת מול ממשקים בתוך ומחוץ לארגוןדרישות:כושר תכנון, ארגון, סדר והנעה עצמיתנכונות למשרה מלאה + שעות נוספות במידת הצורך (יושבים באזור תעשייה כפר סבא).מחויבות, ירידה לפרטים, תקתקנות, א.נשים שחיים ונושמים תפעול, א.נשים שאוהבים.ות ללמוד!יחסי אנוש מצוינים, גישה חיובית, אנרגטית ומשמעת עצמית גבוההניסיון בניהול תיקי לקוחות אסטרטגיים - יתרון משמעותיתואר ראשון - יתרון
Requirements: ['תחזוק וניהול המידע השוטף בפלטפורמה', 'ריכוז והזנה של תכנים למערכת ניהול תפעולית של הארגון', 'בקרה אחר עסקאות', 'תמיכה תפעולית בקמפיינים', 'תמיכה שוטפת על מערכת ניהול הזמנות', 'עבודה שוטפת מול ממשקים בתוך ומחוץ לארגון']

Title: Data Analyst
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: SolarEdge is a top global leader, manufacturing smart energy solutions. The company's broad range of products encompasses intelligent inverter and storage systems and revolutionary EV charger; by doing that, we are changing the way Electricity is being produced and consumed around the world.The Data Analyst will be responsible for compiling and analyzing sales and market data and providing valuable feedback and actionable insights to guide sales activities. He will champion data collection and governance for sales and marketing proprietary databases. He would present reports and conclusions to the SolarEdge executive management team.To be successful as a Sales Data Analyst you should be able to demonstrate a high understanding of SolarEdge market, products and business processes, compile and analyze large amounts of data, accurately project sales trends, identify sales opportunities and provide practical guidance to optimize sales strategies and increase market share.The position is located in Herzeliya What you will be doing: Compiling, analyzing, and reporting sales data. Drive data collection and data cleansing activities. Monitoring and analyzing competitive activity, customer, and market trends. Providing actionable insights to guide the sales and marketing teams. Contributing to the development of sales plans and objectives. Monitoring and evaluating sales performance. Determining sales potential and making recommendations. Lead IS automation solutions to help compile and manage sales data. Establish tools/dashboards to present the data trends.Requirements: BSc in Industrial Engineering or Accounting.Accounting - Experience in a Big 4 accounting firm - An Advantage. At least 3 years experience in sales analysis. Strong research and data analysis skills. Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Click BI tools. SQL and DB programming skills. Excellent English - a must. Strong communication and presentation skills. Ability to work independently and with cross-functional teams.
Requirements: ['Compiling, analyzing, and reporting sales data.', 'Drive data collection and data cleansing activities.', 'Monitoring and analyzing competitive activity, customer, and market trends.', 'Providing actionable insights to guide the sales and marketing teams.', 'Contributing to the development of sales plans and objectives.', 'Monitoring and evaluating sales performance.', 'Determining sales potential and making recommendations.', 'Lead IS automation solutions to help compile and manage sales data.', 'Establish tools/dashboards to present the data trends.', 'BSc in Industrial Engineering or Accounting.', 'At least 3 years experience in sales analysis.', 'Strong research and data analysis skills.', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Click BI tools.', 'SQL and DB programming skills.', 'Excellent English - a must.', 'Strong communication and presentation skills.', 'Ability to work independently and with cross-functional teams.']

Title: Senior Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The OpportunityWe’re looking for a talented Senior Product Manager who’s passionate about shaping the future of the real estate investing marketplace. If you have a deep understanding of consumer products, love designing and delivering consumer-facing apps, and have a love for data, this one’s for you. You’ll be responsible for leading product work, and collaborating closely with designers, engineers, and content writers. You’ll create product strategies consistent with the company’s vision, and translate them into detailed requirements and prototypes.What You Will DoIdentify opportunities for growth around the entire user journey and work with hypotheses and experiments to understand our users better.Take ownership and establish a shared concept & roadmap of growth opportunities that will affect our key metrics significantlyLead product work, and collaborate closely with designers, engineers, and content writersDefine and analyze metrics that inform the success of our productsCommunicate details, updates, and implementations across all stakeholders and teams with attention-to-detailWhat Do You Bring4+ years of experience as a product manager in a B2C company4+ years of experience in analytics, marketing or growth2+ years of experience with SQL You’re self-driven and you feel comfortable motivating, leading, and making decisions.You have strong communication skills- verbal and written and can articulate problems into stories that people want to care about.You are a fast learner, adaptive, and thrive in a fast-paced environmentYou have a strong understanding of all aspects of the product development lifecycle.Superior attention to details while maintaining an understanding for the big picturePrevious experience leading consumer products – An advantageAbout LandaLanda is an app designed to make real estate investing easy and affordable. Our app allows anyone to invest in shares of rental properties for as little as $5, thanks to a model that splits rental properties into shares. Landa runs 430 properties in 7 markets, with plans to expand to 15 markets in the next eight months. To date, the company has raised $33 million of equity and $80M of debt from investors, including Viola, NFX, 83North, and others. We are a family of 45 located in TLV and NYC. We love people who learn quickly and move fast. We appreciate the energetic, humble executors. We don't do email (we're on Slack). We don't do lengthy or big group meetings. Memo culture is engraved in our hearts. We get things done and focus on creating value. We are hustlers that use our Macs to build incredible products.You should be value-driven at heart, believe in your ability to think big & create change, and get excited about creating an equal financial opportunity for everyone.
Requirements: ['Identify opportunities for growth around the entire user journey and work with hypotheses and experiments to understand our users better.', 'Take ownership and establish a shared concept & roadmap of growth opportunities that will affect our key metrics significantly', 'Lead product work, and collaborate closely with designers, engineers, and content writers', 'Define and analyze metrics that inform the success of our products', 'Communicate details, updates, and implementations across all stakeholders and teams with attention-to-detail', '4+ years of experience as a product manager in a B2C company', '4+ years of experience in analytics, marketing or growth', '2+ years of experience with SQL', 'You’re self-driven and you feel comfortable motivating, leading, and making decisions.', 'You have strong communication skills- verbal and written and can articulate problems into stories that people want to care about.', 'You are a fast learner, adaptive, and thrive in a fast-paced environment', 'You have a strong understanding of all aspects of the product development lifecycle.', 'Superior attention to details while maintaining an understanding for the big picture', 'Previous experience leading consumer products – An advantage']

Title: CHARGE(E) DE PROJET EN APPRENTISSAGE F/H

Text: Description du poste Intitulé CHARGE(E) DE PROJET EN APPRENTISSAGE F/H Métier/Emploi PROJET, APPUI ET PILOTAGE - CHARGE(E) DE PROJET Filière Support Type de contrat CAP - Contrat d'apprentissage Temps de travail Temps complet Missions/Activités Dans le cadre de sa mission de service public, Pôle emploi, acteur majeur du marché du travail, œuvre pour accélérer le retour à l’emploi des demandeurs d’emploi et répondre aux besoins de recrutement des entreprises. L’ensemble des équipes de Pôle emploi agissent au quotidien pour leur satisfaction.Au sein de la direction, vous aurez pour mission de : Assurer la coordination et la conduite de projet Participer à la définition et à la conception du projet Contribuer à l'élaboration de la note de cadrage et du cahier des charges du projet Définir les indicateurs de suivi du projet Concevoir et mettre à disposition des outils et livrables à destination des acteurs du projet Participer à l'animation des instances de pilotage et de suivi du projet Suivre la réalisation des étapes du projet Participer et animer des groupes de travail Réaliser un reporting auprès du responsable de projet, de son responsable hiérarchique et/ou du commanditaire du projetCe poste est ouvert aux personnes en situation de handicap. Compétences Connaissance de la méthodologie de conduite de projetCapacité à synthétiserCapacité à proposer, à concevoir des solutionsCapacité à s’exprimer clairement par écrit et par oralCapacité à argumenter, à convaincreCapacité à travailler en équipeCapacité à travailler en réseau Rémunération annuelle brute (proratisée sur la durée effective du contrat) Conformément à la législation en vigueur Détail de la rémunération salaire incluant un 13ème mois et une allocation vacancesLocalisation du poste Localisation DR Ile-de-France, Seine Saint-Denis (93), APE NOISY LE GRAND (75722) Déplacements Des déplacements sont à prévoir dans le cadre de l'exercice des missions et formations dispenséesCalendrier Date de prise de poste souhaitée 1er septembreProfil candidat Profil souhaité Nous recrutons en contrat apprentissage uniquement.Dans le cadre d'une préparation Bac+4 et/ou Bac +5 Diplôme exigé BAC +4 Domaine d'étude Gestion de projet / programmeCommunicationSciences humaines et socialesStratégie & Management Expérience professionnelle Aucune

Title: Social Media Manager (Remote)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The objective of this role is to help drive the social media needs of the INFUSEmedia business. This encompasses all of our social media platforms (Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, youtube, etc).Position Objectives:Working with the marketing and sales teams to help build and manage the social media campaigns, content promotion, and driving inbound lead generation. Identifying patterns in social media performance and guiding creation. Managing and assisting in the creation of a social media schedule across multiple platforms (incl. LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter). Creating regular reports, monitoring campaign and content success rates to guide future strategies. Helping to build and maintain a consistent brand voice with different audiences. Coordinate with the Creative Team to produce graphics and designs that support our social media promotions. About YouYou are passionate about social media and have experience in managing all the above elements. Any B2B marketing experience would be advantageous but is not necessary. Experience using all social media platforms and tailoring campaigns to meet their requirements. Experience using Hubspot to manage social media campaignsExcellent verbal and organizational skills. Experience building social media strategies that drive results and grow engagement. You are not afraid to bring new ideas to the table and challenge the status quo when necessary. Keen to learn and progress. Familiar with Google Analytics, Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Hubspot, and the ins and outs of social media analytics. Our Hiring Process:We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals—every person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment.We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team.At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting (or Zoom, for as long as we are in a pandemic) where you will meet our INFUSEmedia team.From thereon, it's decision time! If you are still excited to join INFUSEmedia and we like you as much, we will have a conversation about your offer. We do not make offers without giving you the opportunity to speak with us live. After all, we consider our team members our family, and we want you to feel comfortable and welcomed.
Requirements: ['Working with the marketing and sales teams to help build and manage the social media campaigns, content promotion, and driving inbound lead generation.', 'Identifying patterns in social media performance and guiding creation.', 'Managing and assisting in the creation of a social media schedule across multiple platforms (incl. LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter).', 'Creating regular reports, monitoring campaign and content success rates to guide future strategies.', 'Helping to build and maintain a consistent brand voice with different audiences.', 'Coordinate with the Creative Team to produce graphics and designs that support our social media promotions.', 'You are passionate about social media and have experience in managing all the above elements.', 'Any B2B marketing experience would be advantageous but is not necessary.', 'Experience using all social media platforms and tailoring campaigns to meet their requirements.', 'Experience using Hubspot to manage social media campaigns', 'Excellent verbal and organizational skills.', 'Experience building social media strategies that drive results and grow engagement.', 'You are not afraid to bring new ideas to the table and challenge the status quo when necessary.', 'Keen to learn and progress.', 'Familiar with Google Analytics, Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Hubspot, and the ins and outs of social media analytics.']

Title: JUNIOR DATA SCIENTIST - Dubai, UAE
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)Starting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentAbout Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflectionIndependent thinking through a meritocracy of ideasThe team is more important than the individualBeing the best in any market we enterHiring and keeping only the most effective peopleOthers must benefit from our existenceWhat We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial teamCommitted and remarkably talented colleaguesHighly competitive compensation dependent on performanceAn exciting, challenging and fulfilling careerInvestment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in businessEquity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long termThe key to success of a winning trade can be found in the fluid processing of the latest relevant data. As a Junior Data Scientist, you have a key role in this process. The gathering, structuring, and using of the data into models to be able to translate it into usable information for the traders is an essential part along the chain.As a Junior Data Scientist your focus will be but not limited to:Developing deep understanding of the industry and delivering key insights by analysing dataForecasting different fundamentals such as wind power generation and demandResearching and implementing new trading strategiesBuilding and developing new or existing data infrastructureYour backgroundHaving basic programming skills, like for example Python, R or MATLAB,Strong academic background in mathematics, statistics, or modellingExperience that demonstrates your team-oriented, innovative, and strategic working styles. Familiarity with data visualisation toolsPro-active and flexible work mentalityInterest in data-driven tradingFluency in English, both written and spoken. The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses.Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP). The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to data science, trading, and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent analytical skills.

Title: Data Scientist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who we are:We’re Vesttoo.We connect the insurance industry and the capital markets by combining proprietary AI-powered technology with expertise in data science, insurance and finance so that insurers have the capacity they need and investors have opportunities to diversify with confidence.Our digital insurance risk transfer platform, the Vesttoo Marketplace, is where insurers and global investors connect. It is the source of deal flow for many of our investment products, providing transparent, data-driven analytics to all participants.Beyond all that, we are a dynamic, fast growing and an exciting start-up, in a diverse and friendly atmosphere, where both our employees and our business are in the center.What you'll do:As a data scientist at Vesttoo, you'll be responsible for end-to-end algorithm development that creates insurance risk models, Starting from raw data, algorithm design, implementation, and defining requirements for deploying algorithms to production. You will be working with state-of-the-art technologies coupled with Vesttoo’s unique internally developed suite of tools and methodologies.We are looking for accomplished data scientists, both mid-career and senior practitioners, who will be able to contribute immediately and have significant impact as individual contributors and leading projects.Requirements:Must have:Relevant graduate degree (at least M.Sc.) from a university5+ years of data science experienceExperience in Python and relevant scientific packagesProven ability to design and implement machine learning algorithmsExperience writing high-quality, testable, and reusable code under a source control environmentAbility to deep dive into details without losing the big pictureSelf-starter and can learn new technologies and tools quicklyAdvantages:Advantages:Ph.D in relevant fieldExperience with the insurance or finance domains Understanding of Bayesian modeling and inference and kernel density estimationExperience working with cloud services such as AWSExperience writing requirements for deploying algorithms to productionExperience working in a startup company

Title: Risk Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Melio is a TLV-based Fintech startup (and tech Unicorn!) that enables small businesses in the US to pay their bills in more efficient ways. This improves their finances and frees them up to focus more on managing the businesses they love. With our unique approach to small business payments, we’re the fastest-growing payment solution in the United States.What makes Melio unique?Well, we’ve made B2B payments as simple as P2P payment apps. Currently, 42% of business payments in the US are made by check… yikes!As a Risk Data Analyst you’d be joining the team working behind the scenes to protect Melio from bad actors; managing the risks that might have adverse impacts on our product, financials and our ability to meet client needs.This includes not only ‘classic fraud’, but also compliance and anti-money laundering initiatives. You’d also be evaluating the verticals we work with to understand their unique profiles and exposures.System Design And MaintenanceHow you’ll make an impact Perform Risk investigations and analyses  Understand system vulnerabilities and gaps  Draw conclusions based on multiple data set and user behavior  Work with R&D to design decisions and system logic  Provide data-driven analytical insights  Research and monitoring our system rules and features Day To Day Risk Monitoring Perform hands-on risk analysis and provide insights  Aggregate data from multiple sources to provide a comprehensive assessment  Collaborate with other team members to effectively analyze and present data  Monitor internal and external data points that may affect the risk level of a decision What We Would Love To See 2-4 years of experience in research and analysis  Solid knowledge of SQL or a similar database languages to review data at scale  Solid analytical skills, fast learner, problem-solving skills  Hands-on experience with Python - an advantage Our ideal candidate?You are fascinated by data. Always thinking of potential research and gaps that need attention. You are able to think of solutions and are able to have an ecosystem point of view.If you are fascinated by the world of fraud and payments. Always thinking of potential vulnerabilities. You are able to think about the big picture and leads while handling live payments and raw data.You are able to connect multiple data points and see the all-picture to drive conclusions from.You’re here to problem-solve rather than criticize existing conditions, and you’re always looking for better ways to do things.Most importantly, you’re a top-notch team player, proactive, positive and fun to be around.If you’re still nodding your head in agreement and this seems like a good fit, don’t hesitate to reach out—we’re looking for you!
Requirements: ['Perform Risk investigations and analyses', 'Understand system vulnerabilities and gaps', 'Draw conclusions based on multiple data set and user behavior', 'Work with R&D to design decisions and system logic', 'Provide data-driven analytical insights', 'Research and monitoring our system rules and features', 'Perform hands-on risk analysis and provide insights', 'Aggregate data from multiple sources to provide a comprehensive assessment', 'Collaborate with other team members to effectively analyze and present data', 'Monitor internal and external data points that may affect the risk level of a decision', '2-4 years of experience in research and analysis', 'Solid knowledge of SQL or a similar database languages to review data at scale', 'Solid analytical skills, fast learner, problem-solving skills', 'Hands-on experience with Python - an advantage']

Title: Content Partnerships Manager, IL
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Responsibilities TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. Why Join UsAt TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.At TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.About the roleThis role requires a passion for popular culture, artistic creativity and technology. The ideal candidate should be a motivated self-starter who is excited working in fast-paced environments and on multiple projects simultaneously. We are looking for individuals who are flexible, can find solutions to ambiguous problems, be resourceful and bring positivity to the work environment.Responsibilities:- Take ownership and empower a portfolio of content creators at scale by creating and sharing engaging content around TikTok;- Drive product adoption and provide ongoing education about new and existing TikTok products;- Analyze, interpret and translate key quantitative metrics and business trends into tailored and regular strategic insights that drive content creators account satisfaction, growth and retention;- Develop innovative and high impact partnerships directly with creators, as well as to their respective agencies and management companies;- Regularly develop new content strategies to grow diversification;- Regularly communicate data-driven creators insights to leadership and interface regularly with other cross-functional teams to ensure consistency across the company teams;- Be the face and voice of creators to our internal teams, and work collaboratively with cross-functional partners across initiatives; Qualifications Minimum Qualifications- BA/BS degree or higher;- 3+ years experience working with content creators, entertainment celebrities, high profile artists and public figures;- Native-speaker level in Hebrew language and advanced fluency in English is required. Other languages are also a plus;Preferred Qualifications- Solid and confirmed relationships network of content creators and celebrities, with a demonstrated ability to manage and influence top creators towards partnership;- Demonstrated success in process management and developing client relationships;- Experience managing high level relationships with entertainment industry partners (talent agencies, management companies, publicity firms, etc);- Digital media industry expertise, with an understanding of digital video and social platforms;- Deep passion for TikTok, mobile entertainment, social media and popular culture;- Strong negotiation and deal-making skills;- International expertise in multinational companies or digital advertising agencies;TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Title: Associate Scientist, Analytical Chemistry
Location: Rehovot, Center District, Israel
Text: A great opportunity to join the core team of a fast-growing startup: join DeepCure and have a massive impact on redefining drug discovery.DeepCure is seeking a highly-skilled, well-organized, and motivated Asociate Scientist, Analytical Chemistry to strengthen our Molecular Foundry team in Ness Ziona Israel. The successful candidate will have a unique opportunity to have a significant impact on redefining drug discovery by applying our transformative Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform to the development of novel therapeutics.More about DeepCure:DeepCure is a next-generation therapeutics company, built from the ground up with equal importance to computation and life sciences. Our mission is to deliver to patients safer and more efficacious therapeutics that are extremely unlikely to be discovered by traditional drug discovery pipelines. We are a team of curious, multidisciplinary, and impact-driven professionals on a quest to redefine the way drugs are discovered.We are currently building our Israel-based team, which is based in the Rehovot Science Park, to establish and run the lab operations in our cutting-edge automated lab. The Israeli team will collaborate closely with our global team on the exciting challenges on our way to revolutionizing the drug discovery industry.Requirements:BSc in chemistry or another relevant natural science degree, preferably with 0-3 years of industrial experience in the pharmaceutical or agrochemical industry.Experience in working with triple quadrupole mass spectrometry (QQQ) - preferred.A passion for analytical chemistry and bench work.Excellent written communication skills in English and a strong scientific curiosity Ability to gather data and distill key information into reports. Preference for prior experience with electronic notebooks.Experience in small molecule drug discovery in a biotech or pharmaceutical setting - preferredStrong collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a diverse team of internal and external co-workers.Responsibilities:Assistance in the development of analytical, bioanalytical, and chromatographic purification-directed MS methods for small molecules.Assistance in execution and troubleshooting of chemical analyses, bioanalytical analysis, and chromatographic purification.Proficient in the following techniques: HPLC, LC-MS, SPEAnalysis and summary of analytical data in an electronic notebook.Benefits:For the right candidate, we'll offer a competitive salary and a generous equity grant. Your compensation is rounded out by a strong benefits package: A leadership team that values and prioritizes your professional development Flexible work hours Unlimited paid leave and sick timeEmployer contribution to an education fund Lunch subsidies Transportation expenses/parking Work in a cool and vibrant space at the heart of Rehovot Science Park Have the opportunity to work with an international team of innovative scientists across different disciplines.“Brainstorming on my challenges with all these amazing brains deserves a shout-out every sprint” (Jon, a member of our Machine learning team).Most importantly, you'll have a huge impact, do important work, and work with a team of people you'll genuinely enjoy spending the day with.DeepCure is an equal opportunity employer, dedicated to creating a workplace that is free of harassment and discrimination. We base our employment decisions on business needs, job requirements, and qualifications — that's all. We do not discriminate based on race, gender, religion, health, personal beliefs, age, family or parental status, or any other status. We don't tolerate any kind of discrimination or bias, and we are looking for teammates who feel the same way.
Requirements: ['BSc in chemistry or another relevant natural science degree, preferably with 0-3 years of industrial experience in the pharmaceutical or agrochemical industry.', 'Experience in working with triple quadrupole mass spectrometry (QQQ) - preferred.', 'A passion for analytical chemistry and bench work.', 'Excellent written communication skills in English and a strong scientific curiosity', 'Ability to gather data and distill key information into reports. Preference for prior experience with electronic notebooks.', 'Experience in small molecule drug discovery in a biotech or pharmaceutical setting - preferred', 'Strong collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a diverse team of internal and external co-workers.', 'Assistance in the development of analytical, bioanalytical, and chromatographic purification-directed MS methods for small molecules.', 'Assistance in execution and troubleshooting of chemical analyses, bioanalytical analysis, and chromatographic purification.', 'Proficient in the following techniques:', 'HPLC, LC-MS, SPE', 'Analysis and summary of analytical data in an electronic notebook.', 'A leadership team that values and prioritizes your professional development', 'Flexible work hours', 'Unlimited paid leave and sick time', 'Employer contribution to an education fund', 'Lunch subsidies', 'Transportation expenses/parking', 'Work in a cool and vibrant space at the heart of Rehovot Science Park', 'Have the opportunity to work with an international team of innovative scientists across different disciplines.']

Title: JUNIOR ANALYST - Dubai, UAE
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence What We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term ResponsibilitiesDeveloping new trading tools, strategies and improve existing ones Conducting fundamental research & analysis using Python Working hand in hand with the tech team to implement new business ideas Spearheading entry into new markets/ fields Upholding and living our cultural values Basic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skills Ability to think clearly in critical situations Passion, resilience, and integrity Preferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Analyst. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

Title: Sales Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Tango is a successful, market leader, a live-streaming Platform with 450+ Million registered users, in an industry projected to reach $240 BILLION in the next couple of years.The B2C platform, based on the best-quality global video technology, allows millions of talented people around the world to create their own live content, engage with their fans and monetize their talents.Tango live stream was founded in 2018 and is powered by 300+ global employees operating in a culture of growth, learning, and success!The Tango team is a vigorous cocktail of hard workers, creative brains, energizers, geeks, overachievers, athletes, and more. We push the limits to bring our app from “one of the top” to “the leader”.The best way to describe Tango's work style is not to use the word “impossible”. And we believe that success is a thorny path that runs on sleepless nights, corporate parties, tough releases, and of course our users' smiles (and as we are a LIVE app, we truly get to see our users all around the world smiling right in front of us in real-time!).Do you want to join the party?Requirements: Arabic speaker- MUST.2 + experience in sales/retention A business-oriented thinker who can see the bigger picture.Strong relationship-builder, initiator, and outstanding verbal, and written communication skills.A strong individual contributor who drives results.Responsibilities:Communicating with customers, making outbound calls to potential customers, and following up on leads.Reaching daily and monthly sales goalsManaging inbound leads - understanding customers' needs and identifying sales opportunities.Researching and qualifying new leads based on existing customers to drive sales pipeline.Achieving revenue growthBuilding and maintaining relationships with new and existing users

Title: Regional Operations Manager (m/f/d) Israel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: THIS IS USTIER Mobility is Europe's leading shared micro-mobility provider, with a mission to Change Mobility for Good. By providing people with a range of shared, light electric vehicles, from e-scooters to e-bikes and e-mopeds, powered by a proprietary Energy Network, TIER helps cities reduce their dependence on cars. Founded in 2018 by Lawrence Leuschner, Matthias Laug and Julian Blessin.TIER is headquartered in Berlin and currently operates in 190+ cities across 20 countries in Europe and the Middle East. With a focus on providing the safest, most equitable and most sustainable mobility solution, TIER has been climate neutral since 2020.Permanent employee, Full-timeTHE ROLE AND YOUR IMPACT AT TIERKPIs & Ops Reviews: Manage in-region KPI review processes; focus the attention of the Operations Manager (OM) in the City on the highest value KPIs & prioritize OM time on the highest value tasks based on their KPI impactOps Improvement: Support the Head of Operations in defining in-region ops priorities; project manage ops initiatives & encourage innovation through facilitating experiment in local marketsAnalytical Support: Provide analytical support to OMs, including the use of Looker, Excel, and other analytical toolsProduct & Process Iteration: Ensure that new product features and processes are rolled out smoothly in local markets; ensure that feedback, ideas, and issues raised by local markets are fed back to HQCommunication & Best-Practice Sharing: Build relationships with local markets, ensuring that problems are understood and insights & expertise are shared; identify examples of best practice developed in local markets, work to playbook them, and spread them to other marketsExpansion: Support the Expansion team when executing in-region expansion; ensure that new OMs have been trained appropriately & have sufficient knowledge of Tier processes and tools Performance Management: Responsible for the performance of the whole operations performance in IsraelYou'll Fit Great With These Skills And QualificationsDegree or masters from a university or business school4-5 years' experience in start-up, hands-on operationsPrior experience in the mobility, transport, or logistics industry (e.g. Uber, Lime, Deliveroo) is preferredAnalytical & data-driven; knowledge of data tools & visualisers (e.g. Excel/Google Sheets, Looker, Tableau, Kepler, SQL) is a plusOrganized and structured mentality; comfortable working in a fast-paced and demanding environmentExcellent communication skills in English and HebrewTHIS MAY INSPIRE YOUJoin us at the forefront of one of the most exciting and rapidly moving industries We're agile, we're growing and so will you! At TIER, there's space for exponential professional development and room to make a huge impact on the business going forwardBeing part of the team means you're part of its success. Our ESOP program gives you an opportunity to have a share in the company – nothing like invested interest!For Head Office roles - We support your growth with an annual development budgetIn your 2nd year at Tier you have the opportunity to take advantage of our "CPTO: Second Year Growth Program" Surf your city with free rides on our e-scooters and e-mopedsDiversity and inclusivity is super important to us, so enjoy initiatives & programs such as #WomenofTIERExpect company onboarding and team events with international colleagues from all over the worldBenefit from flexible hours and our remote work optionsProfit from competitive compensation combined with perks like memberships with Urban Sports Club, Blinklist and Headspace Be part of one of the fastest growing and most funded startups in Europe with a world-class team of serial entrepreneurs (Co-founder of Rebuy, Takeaway, and Coup) and high-performers (Ex BCG, Uber, JPMorgan, Delivery Hero, and more)Depending on the role and location your benefits may differ. We actively encourage a diverse and inclusive environment that fosters each employee's individuality at TIER. We take affirmative action to ensure equal opportunity for your application, regardless to your nationality, ethnic or national origin, skin colour, religion, disability, sex, sexual orientation or gender identity. Come as you are and join our ride!In case you are living with disabilities, chronic illness or neurodiversity please inform us, to provide you with the proper assistance in the application process.If we could spark your interest and you want to change mobility for good with us, apply now and let us know why you're the one for the job! We encourage everyone to apply and grow with us. Even if you may not tick all the boxes of the requirements, we are happy to hear about the value you can add to the team. We are all learners! Please check your junk/spam folders for our response.We are looking forward to your application!
Requirements: ['KPIs & Ops Reviews: Manage in-region KPI review processes; focus the attention of the Operations Manager (OM) in the City on the highest value KPIs & prioritize OM time on the highest value tasks based on their KPI impact', 'Ops Improvement: Support the Head of Operations in defining in-region ops priorities; project manage ops initiatives & encourage innovation through facilitating experiment in local markets', 'Analytical Support: Provide analytical support to OMs, including the use of Looker, Excel, and other analytical tools', 'Product & Process Iteration: Ensure that new product features and processes are rolled out smoothly in local markets; ensure that feedback, ideas, and issues raised by local markets are fed back to HQ', 'Communication & Best-Practice Sharing: Build relationships with local markets, ensuring that problems are understood and insights & expertise are shared; identify examples of best practice developed in local markets, work to playbook them, and spread them to other markets', 'Expansion: Support the Expansion team when executing in-region expansion; ensure that new OMs have been trained appropriately & have sufficient knowledge of Tier processes and tools', 'Performance Management: Responsible for the performance of the whole operations performance in Israel', 'Degree or masters from a university or business school', "4-5 years' experience in start-up, hands-on operations", 'Prior experience in the mobility, transport, or logistics industry (e.g. Uber, Lime, Deliveroo) is preferred', 'Analytical & data-driven; knowledge of data tools & visualisers (e.g. Excel/Google Sheets, Looker, Tableau, Kepler, SQL) is a plus', 'Organized and structured mentality; comfortable working in a fast-paced and demanding environment', 'Excellent communication skills in English and Hebrew', 'Join us at the forefront of one of the most exciting and rapidly moving industries', "We're agile, we're growing and so will you! At TIER, there's space for exponential professional development and room to make a huge impact on the business going forward", "Being part of the team means you're part of its success. Our ESOP program gives you an opportunity to have a share in the company – nothing like invested interest!", 'For Head Office roles - We support your growth with an annual development budget', 'In your 2nd year at Tier you have the opportunity to take advantage of our "CPTO: Second Year Growth Program"', 'Surf your city with free rides on our e-scooters and e-mopeds', 'Diversity and inclusivity is super important to us, so enjoy initiatives & programs such as #WomenofTIER', 'Expect company onboarding and team events with international colleagues from all over the world', 'Benefit from flexible hours and our remote work options', 'Profit from competitive compensation combined with perks like memberships with Urban Sports Club, Blinklist and Headspace', 'Be part of one of the fastest growing and most funded startups in Europe with a world-class team of serial entrepreneurs (Co-founder of Rebuy, Takeaway, and Coup) and high-performers (Ex BCG, Uber, JPMorgan, Delivery Hero, and more)', 'Depending on the role and location your benefits may differ.']

Title: Executive Assistant
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DescriptionCome [legally] hack with us the data on the largest exchange that’s running our world. Not NASDAQ; the one with way more events - the Global Ads Exchanges, where millions of ads are born and clicked every second. Step behind the curtain of algorithms and competitors that move $1T of annual budgets. Plunge into a world of ISP-volumes of traffic, sub-second predictions and TBs of live, real-world data. Use cutting-edge analysis, ML and engineering or just plain hacker-like thinking to out-perform the market.Arpeely is a Data-Science startup, leveraging data analysis, ML, engineering, multi-disciplinary thinking to gain a market edge and exploit hidden opportunities in real-time advertising. Processing over 350k requests per second and serving over 20B sub-second predictions daily, we build and operate Machine Learning algorithms running on the world’s largest Real-time-bidding (RTB) Ad-Exchanges. Arpeely is a Google AdX vendor and serves clients spanning from startups to Fortune-50 companies.We are looking for an Executive Assistant who will support our founders from A to Z. To ensure they have all they need to manage Arpeely successfully. Find creative solutions for any issues that may arise in a timely manner, and predict future obstacles and come up with quick solutions.What You'll Do:Complex scheduling for Arpeely’s founders and ensuring their calendar is up to date.Support with administrative tasks such as booking travels ,appointments, schedule and organizing meetings, conference calls and other business functions. Building relationships with members of leadership, investors, and key people both internal and external to the company.Provide timely responses to emails, voice mails, and written correspondence on behalf of the CEO.Initiate special projects, including high-profile planning events, board meetings, reports, presentations, and briefs.Solve all issues both beforehand and also in real-time.RequirementsWho we are looking for:Three years of experience as a personal assistant or executive assistant or a similar position.Full proficiency in English and Hebrew, verbal and written.Maintain a high level of integrity and discretion in handling confidential information.A high degree of proactiveness, professionalism, and strong work ethic coupled with a sense of responsibility and integrity.Excellent organizational skills and ability to multitask.Great interpersonal skills, service orientated, and a team player.In-depth understanding of the entire MS Office suite.
Requirements: ['Complex scheduling for Arpeely’s founders and ensuring their calendar is up to date.', 'Support with administrative tasks such as booking travels ,appointments, schedule and organizing meetings, conference calls and other business functions.', 'Building relationships with members of leadership, investors, and key people both internal and external to the company.', 'Provide timely responses to emails, voice mails, and written correspondence on behalf of the CEO.', 'Initiate special projects, including high-profile planning events, board meetings, reports, presentations, and briefs.', 'Solve all issues both beforehand and also in real-time.', 'Three years of experience as a personal assistant or executive assistant or a similar position.', 'Full proficiency in English and Hebrew, verbal and written.', 'Maintain a high level of integrity and discretion in handling confidential information.', 'A high degree of proactiveness, professionalism, and strong work ethic coupled with a sense of responsibility and integrity.', 'Excellent organizational skills and ability to multitask.', 'Great interpersonal skills, service orientated, and a team player.', 'In-depth understanding of the entire MS Office suite.']

Title: Commercial Lawyer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We Are:Artlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.Artlist consists of 4 products:Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platformArtgrid.io, a curated stock footage platformMotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photosFXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing softwareArtlist’s legal department is looking for a lawyer to work closely with the growing enterprise customers sales department in our Tel Aviv offices.Wake up for this:Work closely with our sales and business teamsConduct negotiations and draft commercial international agreementsProvide ongoing legal counsel on all global legal aspects of our enterprise activitiesRequirements:You are:A certified lawyer in Israel, with 2-4 years of experience (not including internship) as an in-house counsel in a high-tech company or prominent law firm, experiensed in commercial agreementsWell versed in English & Hebrew, both written and spokenPassionate, smart, hardworking, analytical, thrive in a very fast-paced and dynamic environmentAble to work independently and are a team player who cares about your work, team members, and your customers
Requirements: ['Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platform', 'Artgrid.io, a curated stock footage platform', 'MotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photos', 'FXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing software', 'Work closely with our sales and business teams', 'Conduct negotiations and draft commercial international agreements', 'Provide ongoing legal counsel on all global legal aspects of our enterprise activities', 'A certified lawyer in Israel, with 2-4 years of experience (not including internship) as an in-house counsel in a high-tech company or prominent law firm, experiensed in commercial agreements', 'Well versed in English & Hebrew, both written and spoken', 'Passionate, smart, hardworking, analytical, thrive in a very fast-paced and dynamic environment', 'Able to work independently and are a team player who cares about your work, team members, and your customers']

Title: Product Marketing Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Paragon is a fast-growing cybersecurity startup with a groundbreaking product! If you are a sharp-minded autodidact, cyber-savvy, and not afraid of facing challenges that require you to dig deep and explore - Paragon is looking for you!The Product Marketing Manager is responsible for the products’ positioning and messaging. This involves understanding the consumers’ needs, operational use cases and the products' benefits. He/she will enable the presentation of products in ways that will strengthen the brand in order to promote sales. The Product Marketing Manager is also responsible for understanding and translating technical capabilities into business and customer values to enable the work of the business unit (Sales, Pre sales and CSMs).We are looking for a passionate storyteller, who can dive deep into product technical details, as well see the big picture, and translate the products features into a meaningful value proposition, answering customer trends, needs and pain points.ResponsibilitiesEnsure that the product and its new features are appropriately positioned on the market.Develop product messaging that differentiates the product from others in the market.Communicate the value of new products to the business unit, and make sure they have all the necessary knowledge and materials enabling them to attract new customers.Disseminate technical knowledge including the creation of all technical product documentation such as datasheets, release notes, product presentations, FAQs etc.Communicate to customers new products and features, and prepare product content.Plan and take part in the launch of new products and work together with other departments on such launches.Organization of periodic business unit gathering events for product updates.products.Ownership of competitor analysis.Serve as the “go-to” person for many product requests from our customers.Requirements:3+ years of experience as a Product Marketing Manager or in a similar positionStrong written, presentation and verbal communication skills in English (Mother tongue level is an advantage)Ability to analyze and understand market dynamicsAbility to be self-contained and self-sufficientDetail oriented, highly meticulous and perceptiveGood ability for multi-tasking and performance under pressureCreative thinkerExcellent people and communicationIntelligent/Cyber/B2G product marketing experience- an advantageBackground in design- an advantage
Requirements: ['Ensure that the product and its new features are appropriately positioned on the market.', 'Develop product messaging that differentiates the product from others in the market.', 'Communicate the value of new products to the business unit, and make sure they have all the necessary knowledge and materials enabling them to attract new customers.', 'Disseminate technical knowledge including the creation of all technical product documentation such as datasheets, release notes, product presentations, FAQs etc.', 'Communicate to customers new products and features, and prepare product content.', 'Plan and take part in the launch of new products and work together with other departments on such launches.', 'Organization of periodic business unit gathering events for product updates.', 'products.', 'Ownership of competitor analysis.', 'Serve as the “go-to” person for many product requests from our customers.', '3+ years of experience as a Product Marketing Manager or in a similar position', 'Strong written, presentation and verbal communication skills in English (Mother tongue level is an advantage)', 'Ability to analyze and understand market dynamics', 'Ability to be self-contained and self-sufficient', 'Detail oriented, highly meticulous and perceptive', 'Good ability for multi-tasking and performance under pressure', 'Creative thinker', 'Excellent people and communication', 'Intelligent/Cyber/B2G product marketing experience- an advantage', 'Background in design- an advantage']

Title: Content Manager
