Title: Marketing Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Chain Reaction designs and builds hardware that fuels disruptive blockchain technologies by accelerating compute performance. Our world class teams are transforming the future of data, creating the infrastructure that will power the next generation of secure, scalable, green computing. The main bottleneck in scaling cutting edge solutions in privacy tech, data-analysis and real-time computing is acceleration – existing hardware cannot keep up with data processing needs. Chain Reaction’s products reshape how data is processed and used on a global scale, and we’re looking for the brightest people to join us.Chain Reaction is seeking a Creative or Marketing Manager to join its fast-growing team. The successful candidate is an outside-of-the-box creative personality, open-minded, and works in imaginative ways. We seek a team player, who is committed, clever problem-solver, well-presented, organized and interested in the cryptocurrency and blockchain industries.Chain Reaction requires an expert in brand aesthetics and social trends, with the ability to turn nothing into something, adapt to last-minute changes, and think on the spot. You thrive in concept creation, design, and development while understanding the content creation space.Job Responsibilities:Execute marketing campaigns for the purposes of delivering rich and impactful content of Bitcoin mining products.Support with planning and executing product launchesSupport local and overseas events (planning and execution)Maintain and develop social media content and increase presence through customer feedback monitoringDevelop competitor and market trend analysis for the cryptocurrency mining industryShow a successful record in supporting sales teams in their marketing needs, marketing directly to end users as well as distributors.Drive the PR efforts of the company internationallyRequirements:﻿5+ years of experience of marketing, market branding or strategy experience. Ideal previous roles may include marketing manager, brand management, brand planning, brand strategy manage at a tech or crypto/blockchain company3+ years market research experienceExperience developing brand architecture, positioning and messaging, writing narratives and thought leadershipExperience leveraging data and insights to make informed recommendationsBachelor degree in marketing communication or above, MBA or relevant education is preferredTeam player, highly collaborative and proactive, strong communication skillsInterest in the blockchain industry

Title: Global Recruiting Manager
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The global recruiting manager provides leadership, support, advocacy and vision to recruit and support staff who provide recruiting support to hiring new employees to the company. The Recruiter will research, develop, and implement effective recruiting and staffing strategies to attract a diverse pool of qualified and capable talent for the organization.Supervisory Responsibilities: Recruits, interviews, hires new staff. Oversees the daily workflow of the department. Provides constructive and timely performance evaluations. Supervising the recruiting team and reporting on its performanceDuties/Responsibilities: Designs, develops and maintain the recruitment process in the organization (including its description, recruitment measurement definitions, regular measurement reporting, taking proper actions to close gaps) Designs the selection matrix for choosing the optimum recruitment channel and recruitment source Explores the market best practices in the recruitment and staffing and implement appropriate best practices in the organization Builds a quality relationship with the internal customers and external recruitment agencies Monitors and constantly reduces the costs of the recruitment process Sets the social media communication strategy for different job profiles and functions in the organization Conducts job interviews for the managerial job positions (or key jobs in the organization) Monitors the labor legislation and implements required changes to keep the process compliant Manages and develops the team of HR Recruiters Acts as a single point of contact for managers regarding recruitment topics Designs training recruitment for HR Recruiters and line managers Develops new strategies and programs to attract candidates. Finds the right people for open positions. Manages the recruiting team for the assigned region. Works closely with recruiting managers in other regions to share best practices, provide assistance on critical needs and coordinate on national-level initiatives. Promote diversity awareness in hiring practices. Collaborates with division managers and consultants to identify and draft detailed and accurate job descriptions and hiring criteria. Identifies and implements efficient and effective recruiting methods and strategies based on the available role, industry standards, and the needs of the organization. Assists with the interview process, attending and conducting interviews with managers, directors, and other stakeholders. Collaborates with the HR staff during the offer process, identifying and recommending salary ranges, incentives, start dates, and other pertinent details. Ensures compliance with employment laws and regulations, and company policies. Keeps track of recruiting metrics (e.g. time-to-fill and cost-per-hire) Performs other duties as assigned. Recommend ways to improve our employer brand Advise hiring managers on interviewing techniquesRequirements:Required Skills/Abilities: In-depth understanding of recruiting methods and best practices, as well as applicable policies and employment laws and regulations. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills. Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines. Strong supervisory and leadership skills. Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to function well in a high-paced and at times stressful environment. Strong ethics and reliabilityEducation and Experience: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management required. Five years of global recruiting experience required.

Title: Data Annotator
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The data annotator will be responsible for delivering a unified management, maintenance and annotation of public & proprietary metadata from life science research and clinical trials. CytoReason relies, among other things, on accurate annotations of huge data sets, public and proprietary and this is a central role in the company. It requires a highly detail-oriented person who strives for order and is not afraid of digging into and standardizing huge amount of data.You will be joining our expanding, multidisciplinary and creative team of biologists, data engineers, data scientists and bioinformaticians.Requirements:BSc in the life sciences field Detail-oriented, organized, and capable of meeting deadlines 1+ years experience in the life sciences field 1+ years of experience working with a team Very strong communication skills in English Full proficiency in ExcelResponsibilities:Understanding and defining data structure, quality, and ontologiesMaintaining and updating large databases with experimental data related to human samples & sorted cells including related data, patient demographics, and clinical dataManual and automatic annotation of datasetsMapping the availability of relevant data sourcesWork with immunologists, bioinformaticians, and project managers to implement needed search requestsWork with the multidisciplinary product and software teams to define new tools for data annotation and maintenanceAdvantages:Immunological knowledgeExperience with Tableau, SQL, PythonExperience with multiple omics technologies

Title: Marketing Content Writer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Granulate is on a mission to help companies scale by removing the compute cost pain and overcoming performance challenges. We’re developing the world’s first autonomous, continuous workload optimization solution, enabling immediate application performance improvements and reduced infrastructure costs by up to 63% - with no code changes required.We are looking for a Content Writer to join our marketing team.This person will develop clear and crisp marketing copy for blogs, social posts, emails, ads, landing pages, presentations, and video scripts to drive lead engagement and increase brand awareness.Content Writer responsibilities include conducting thorough research on industry-related topics, generating ideas for new content types, and proofreading any copy before publication. A can-do attitude person, who isn't satisfied with mediocre writing, but will strive for high professional content. This person will be driven by a constant contribution to the creation of Granulate's content machine. Ultimately, you'll deliver quality writing pieces that appeal to our audiences, attract customers and boost brand awareness.Requirements:4+ years of proven work experience as a Content Writer, Copywriter, or similar role.Portfolio of published articles and/or marketing copy.Experience working in a start-up environment (SaaS, B2B - preferred).Experience researching complex subjects and technologies.Native English speaker.Excellent writing and editing skills in English.Ability to meet deadlines and work with a team.BSc in Marketing, English, Journalism or a related field.Responsibilities:Researching industry-related topics (combining online sources, interviews, and studies). Understanding Granulate's ecosystem and personas to create clear and crisp audience-focused copy that will promote our products/services. Develop related content for multiple platforms, such as websites, email marketing, social posts, landing pages, presentations, product descriptions, videos, and blogs.Proofread and edit all copies before publication Utilize industry best practices and apply knowledge of Granulate's mission to inspire creative ideas and content.
Requirements: ['4+ years of proven work experience as a Content Writer, Copywriter, or similar role.', 'Portfolio of published articles and/or marketing copy.', 'Experience working in a start-up environment (SaaS, B2B - preferred).', 'Experience researching complex subjects and technologies.', 'Native English speaker.', 'Excellent writing and editing skills in English.', 'Ability to meet deadlines and work with a team.', 'BSc in Marketing, English, Journalism or a related field.', 'Researching industry-related topics (combining online sources, interviews, and studies).', "Understanding Granulate's ecosystem and personas to create clear and crisp audience-focused copy that will promote our products/services.", 'Develop related content for multiple platforms, such as websites, email marketing, social posts, landing pages, presentations, product descriptions, videos, and blogs.', "Proofread and edit all copies before publication Utilize industry best practices and apply knowledge of Granulate's mission to inspire creative ideas and content."]

Title: Data Scientist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The positionThe main mission of our research team is to define accessibility problems and develop the technological tools to identify them. By developing new and revolutionary algorithms, we can discover critical accessibility issues and provide our customers with key insights and data analytics.The research team has a dramatic impact on the direction of the products and technology decisions through data science and creative research.We are offering you to take ownership onDesigning and developing robust and efficient Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms.Developing novel solutions to complex problems in the Accessibility domain.Leading data science development cycle including ideation, literature research, development and deployment to production.Designing and running experiments on large scale data sets.Collaborating with team members to define future technology and features.Requirements:You are bringing with you4+ years of experience as a data scientist in a production settingBSc/MSc in computer science, software engineering, mathematics, statistics or a similar technical fieldStrong deep learning knowledge and experience in solving data science problems using computer vision methodsNLP/GNN experience - an advantageProven experience in end-to-end research projects from exploration to productionSubstantial experience in programming in PythonExperience with common data science toolkits, such as PyTorch, Pandas, Scikit-learn and more.Good software development foundations including: clean code, testing, logging, code reviews (proper software development experience is an advantage)Team player with great communication skills, who can also work independently and methodically.Highly motivated to solve real-world problems and create a high impact on company products.Good analytical skills and creative thinking.This position will be based in our Tel Aviv office, located 5-minute walk from Hashalom train station, and we also have our own parking lot. We work in a hybrid mode, with flexible working hours.About UsEvinced is the market leading web and mobile accessibility software company focused on providing accessibility automation to enterprise developers by going beyond legacy static/syntax analysis. Built with advanced rulesets, computer vision and AI algorithms, Evinced automatically detects and pinpoints accessibility problems during the product development lifecycle and suggests fixes. Leading enterprises use Evinced to weave accessibility into their software development process - including design, development, automated testing, and production/compliance monitoring.
Requirements: ['Designing and developing robust and efficient Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms.', 'Developing novel solutions to complex problems in the Accessibility domain.', 'Leading data science development cycle including ideation, literature research, development and deployment to production.', 'Designing and running experiments on large scale data sets.', 'Collaborating with team members to define future technology and features.', '4+ years of experience as a data scientist in a production setting', 'BSc/MSc in computer science, software engineering, mathematics, statistics or a similar technical field', 'Strong deep learning knowledge and experience in solving data science problems using computer vision methods', 'NLP/GNN experience - an advantage', 'Proven experience in end-to-end research projects from exploration to production', 'Substantial experience in programming in Python', 'Experience with common data science toolkits, such as PyTorch, Pandas, Scikit-learn and more.', 'Good software development foundations including: clean code, testing, logging, code reviews (proper software development experience is an advantage)', 'Team player with great communication skills, who can also work independently and methodically.', 'Highly motivated to solve real-world problems and create a high impact on company products.', 'Good analytical skills and creative thinking.']

Title: Global Trade Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The Global Trade (GT) Site Manager will operate out of a Pratt & Whitney Business Office located in Israel supporting the timely and compliant import, export, and re-export of F135 Propulsion System items. The GT Site Manager is responsible for working closely with internal and external customers to develop process solutions to GT issues.Key responsibilities include:Overall management of Israeli export and import licenses, applications, amendments, renewals, and general trade compliance. This includes applying for, obtaining and managing Israeli licenses and U.S. re-transfer/re-export authorizations. Ensure program activities remain within Israel and U.S. government approved authorization scope, values and restrictions. Ensure international trade related activities are conducted in accordance with U.S. (ITAR, EAR, etc.) and Israeli laws and regulations, including imports, exports, re-transfers, re-exports, anti-boycott, sanctions, end-use / end-user restrictions. Manage screening records as applicable. Monitor Israeli regulatory changes impacting the program and ensure update of business operations and systems in a timely manner. Maintain a database of export jurisdiction and classification of goods, technology, software and services and manage updates. Maintain a database of harmonized tariff schedule (HTS) and “country of origin” of the goods and manage updates. Coordinate and support Israeli GT related registration and renewal activities. Support and manage governmental inquiries and audits with regard to GT activities. Maintain GT standard work in accordance with the Israeli GT laws and regulations, as well as Raytheon Technology and P&W policies. Maintain applicable trade compliance records and metrics in accordance with policy and regulatory requirements Israel (and U.S.). Support/manage all GT related reporting requirements imposed by all applicable government regulations. Manage international trade related Power of Attorney and Standard Operating Procedures activities with Israeli customs brokers and other third parties, and ensure records are maintained and auditable. Monitor Site GT implementation, identify gaps, and implement controls. Implement GT related technology & access controls and facility & visitor controls, audit/assessment standard work. Support regulatory (Israel /U.S.) and company policy related investigation and disclosure activities, implement resulting corrective actions. Work closely with Freight Forward and Customs Brokers for all activities to ensure documents and records are compliant. Support Internal Audits for all transactions, base warehouse & multi-use warehouse activities (if applicable)Education / CertificationsBachelor of Arts (BA)/ Bachelor of Science (BS) degree with 5 or more years of relevant experience in a business role involving management of international trade requirementsBasic QualificationsUnderstanding of Israel entity registration, import, customs and export laws and requirementsKnowledge of U.S. ITAR and EAR export requirements, and other applicable laws and regulations (and governing agencies) related to international trade. Experience with the application and management of Israeli export authorizationsProficient with MS Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)Preferred QualificationsExcellent interpersonal, communication (written and verbal), problem solving and presentation skillsAbility to manage and meet multiple goals, plans and milestones with focus on resultsProject / Program Management experienceData management/analysis experienceExperience with SAP/GTSExperience managing the international movement of military goods and servicesExperience working directly with government regulatory bodies is a plusCustoms broker experienceProfessional maturity to work with minimal daily supervision while balancing numerous prioritiesAbility to work in a team environmentOtherOffice location: Tel Aviv, Israel. Ability to commute and work from office location.Candidate will be required to provide citizenship/passport information and detailed job history due to applicable export regulations.If employed, the candidate will be required to sign non-disclosure agreement in accordance with applicable export regulations.Background checks may be required.01585809

Title: Client Solutions - Account Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Responsibilities TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. Why Join UsAt TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.Client Solutions are the trusted advocates connecting key stakeholders, providing inspiration and insights, driving collaboration that translate into long term client partnerships and growth! We are responsible for the day to day relationship and for ensuring success of advertiser investment. As trusted partners, we proactively advise our clients of opportunities and solutions to exceed their expectations, securing future investment.ResponsibilitiesClient & Campaign Management- Manage and grow post-sale client relationships of auction ads offerings by monitoring and analyzing ad campaigns, and proactively take initiative to improve results.- Proficient in campaign management, setting up and optimization. -Analyze campaign performance data to offer clients data-driven business insights, at the same time use those insights to improve our advertising offerings.- Establish long-term relationships with key clients and make sure their business needs are taken care of by cross-functional team.- Drive education on product and company updates, and share company best practices as relevant to clients or agencies' business.- Share marketplace feedback and guide our advertising strategy;- Conduct regular business reviews and take a consultative, long-term approach to build productive relationships with clients, in collaboration with the sales team;- Investigate and work directly with product & engineering teams to help them troubleshoot client issues during a campaign.- Responsible for improvement of product feature adoption and consistently drive the product improvement from market feedback. Qualifications - At least 2-4 years of experience in account management/client service roles in digital marketing.- Experience in media buying / user acquisition positions focused on performance marketing.- Experience in managing key accounts in entertainment app/e-commerce/affiliate marketing industries.- Ability to analyze data and identify insights to assess campaign performance.- Proactive attitude with excellent data analytical skills in excel, SQL is a plus.- Proficient in English.- BA/BS degree or above.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Title: System Engineer
Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded, medical startup developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening in-hospital complications such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real-time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster.As a System Engineer in the System Engineering team in ART MEDICAL, you will be part of a multidisciplinary group of system, hardware, firmware, software and software test engineers. You will serve as an internal and external technical liaison for multiple interfaces in the organization and externally you will drive medical products into the next level of maturity and performance to meet the user and business needs.Main position duties:Work in a multidisciplinary and complex technical medical environmentTranslate user needs into actionable technical system and sub system requirementsManage system requirements, system specifications, and system working parameters of a Medical Systems and Devices.Perform risks management activities for product and production FMEAResponsible for development of the system architecture and top-level designAct as the technical lead of multidisciplinary medical system and subsystemsMaintain the Design History File of a complex medical system against updated regulatory standardsOverall professional responsibility for the system functionality, performance and quality.Translate field and production feedback into product and production improvements.Work closely with internal multidisciplinary R&D team Product, SW, HW, Mechanics, Algorithms, SW Testing, V&V team, Quality, Service, Program/project managers, RA.Participate and lead medical device life cycle processes like Design reviews to support changes, root cause investigations, technical experiments and more.Assist the project manager in project phases breakdowns and tasks breakdownRequirements:B.Sc or M.Sc from a leading institute in the fields of: Electrical/mechanical/Software/bio-medical engineering or Systems engineeringStrong technical foundation in product development principals and solution finding with a systematic approach to problem solving, R&D processes and troubleshootingExperience through full product development cycle of complex medical device systems, or other regulated fields, from initial concept to release to marketSelf-driven, Can-Do attitude3+ years of experience in development roles in multidisciplinary/medical products3+ years of experience in system engineering roleA team player with engagement creation skillsGreat interpersonal and soft skillsFluent in technical English – verbal & writtenGood documentation skillsCurious and self-learning abilities.Experience from multidisciplinary medical device company - AdvantageExperience in EMC & Safety testing- AdvantageExperience from a global company- Advantage

Title: Social Media Manager (Remote)
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: The objective of this role is to help drive the social media needs of the INFUSEmedia business. This encompasses all of our social media platforms (Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, youtube, etc).Position Objectives:Working with the marketing and sales teams to help build and manage the social media campaigns, content promotion, and driving inbound lead generation. Identifying patterns in social media performance and guiding creation. Managing and assisting in the creation of a social media schedule across multiple platforms (incl. LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter). Creating regular reports, monitoring campaign and content success rates to guide future strategies. Helping to build and maintain a consistent brand voice with different audiences. Coordinate with the Creative Team to produce graphics and designs that support our social media promotions. About YouYou are passionate about social media and have experience in managing all the above elements. Any B2B marketing experience would be advantageous but is not necessary. Experience using all social media platforms and tailoring campaigns to meet their requirements. Experience using Hubspot to manage social media campaignsExcellent verbal and organizational skills. Experience building social media strategies that drive results and grow engagement. You are not afraid to bring new ideas to the table and challenge the status quo when necessary. Keen to learn and progress. Familiar with Google Analytics, Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Hubspot, and the ins and outs of social media analytics. Our Hiring Process:We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals—every person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment.We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team.At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting (or Zoom, for as long as we are in a pandemic) where you will meet our INFUSEmedia team.From thereon, it's decision time! If you are still excited to join INFUSEmedia and we like you as much, we will have a conversation about your offer. We do not make offers without giving you the opportunity to speak with us live. After all, we consider our team members our family, and we want you to feel comfortable and welcomed.
Requirements: ['Working with the marketing and sales teams to help build and manage the social media campaigns, content promotion, and driving inbound lead generation.', 'Identifying patterns in social media performance and guiding creation.', 'Managing and assisting in the creation of a social media schedule across multiple platforms (incl. LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter).', 'Creating regular reports, monitoring campaign and content success rates to guide future strategies.', 'Helping to build and maintain a consistent brand voice with different audiences.', 'Coordinate with the Creative Team to produce graphics and designs that support our social media promotions.', 'You are passionate about social media and have experience in managing all the above elements.', 'Any B2B marketing experience would be advantageous but is not necessary.', 'Experience using all social media platforms and tailoring campaigns to meet their requirements.', 'Experience using Hubspot to manage social media campaigns', 'Excellent verbal and organizational skills.', 'Experience building social media strategies that drive results and grow engagement.', 'You are not afraid to bring new ideas to the table and challenge the status quo when necessary.', 'Keen to learn and progress.', 'Familiar with Google Analytics, Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Hubspot, and the ins and outs of social media analytics.']

Title: JUNIOR ANALYST - Dubai, UAE
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence What We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term ResponsibilitiesDeveloping new trading tools, strategies and improve existing ones Conducting fundamental research & analysis using Python Working hand in hand with the tech team to implement new business ideas Spearheading entry into new markets/ fields Upholding and living our cultural values Basic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skills Ability to think clearly in critical situations Passion, resilience, and integrity Preferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Analyst. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

Title: Senior Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About PayUPayU, a leading payment and Fintech company in 50+ high-growth markets throughout Asia, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa, part of Prosus group, one of the largest technology investors in the world is redefining the way people buy and sell online for our 300.000+ merchants and millions of consumers.As a leading online payment service provider, we deploy more than 400 payment methods and PCI-certified platforms to process approximately 6 million payments every single day.Thinking of becoming a PayUneer and you are curious to know more about us? Read more about the life in PayU hereAbout The RoleWe are looking for a Senior Product Manager to join our Global product team of payment evangelists developing the next generation product for PayU. We’re looking for passionate, proactive, and innovative and thrive in a dynamic, evolving, and global environment. This position will build awesome products, thrive on analyzing and understanding the customer and the ecosystem, and shouldn’t be afraid to get your hands dirty.Excited yet? Continue reading to find out More about the role: What you’ll doExplore and analyze merchant's product needs as well as the global competition. Translate the product needs into great product functionality. Define and execute the vision and roadmap for your domain of responsibility while ensuring it is aligned with the border area and company strategy.Priorities features and tasks according to their importance.Evaluate and work with partners and providers to build our product offering.Work hand in hand with the engineering team to deliver great products and functionalities, and be part of the rollout process guaranteeing their success Be a key evangelist of your domain of responsibility and work with teams to build the proper commercial and operational training as well as the required product marketing materials.What are we looking for?Experience working with cross-functional teams spread across different geographies, including operations, commercial, engineering, etc.Experience owning priorities and managing the product roadmap of the team Experience leading product lifecycle from ideation through technical development and launch capabilities to research competitors’ services and products to ensure your product is a leading product in the market.Capabilities to translate merchant and internal stakeholders' needs and different regulations into product goals and features.Experience coordinating product releases with marketing, sales, operations, and development team.What you’ll need to succeed4+ years of proven track record in product management from ideation to delivery.Ability to drive decisions, take action and roll up your sleeves and dive into the work.Strong analytical skills and good technical understanding. BS/BA degree, MS preferred in Computer Science, Engineering, or related technical field.Exceptional communication and presentation skills.Strong understanding of the payments industry - a huge advantage Team player with the ability to contribute to the strong team culture of our co-located and diverse group.Superb leadership capabilities.What we offerCareer progression program.Wellbeing programs.Flexible program and hybrid way of working.Free subscription to an Internal Elearning platform with courses from Udemy, Coursera, and many others.Truly International Environment with almost 40 different cultures.An inclusive environment that listens to a diverse range of voices when making decisions.A positive, get-things-done workplace.A dynamic, constantly evolving space (change is par for the course – important you are comfortable with this)Ability to learn cutting-edge concepts and innovation in an agile start-up environment on a global scale.A democratic work environment where you can drive your outcomes.About us:At PayU, we are a global fintech investor and our vision is to build a world without financial borders where everyone can prosper. We give people in high-growth markets the financial services and products they need to thrive. Our expertise in 18 high-growth markets enables us to extend the reach of financial services. This drives everything we do, from investing in technology entrepreneurs, to offering credit to underserved individuals, to helping merchants buy, sell and operate online. Being part of Prosus, one of the largest technology investors in the world, gives us the presence and expertise to make a real impact. Find out more www.payu.comOur Commitment To Building A Diverse And Inclusive WorkforceAs a global and multi-cultural organization with varied ethnicities thriving across locations, we realize that our responsibility towards fulfilling the D&I commitment is huge. Therefore, we continuously strive to create a diverse, inclusive and safe environment, for all of our people, communities and customers. Our leaders are committed to create an inclusive work culture which enables transparency, flexibility and unbiased attention to each and every PayUneer so they can succeed, irrespective of gender, color or personal faith. An environment where every person feels they belong, that they are listened to, and where they are empowered to speak up. At PayU we have zero tolerance towards any form of prejudice whether a specific race, ethnicity, or of persons with disabilities or the LGBTQ communities.

Title: Creative Performance Team Leader
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Performance Marketing Creative leader? This is where you’re meant to be!We are looking for an innovative, forward-thinking, and highly skilled Marketing Performance Creative Lead. In your role you will be managing the creative strategy and deliverables for the performance vertical. You will have the opportunity to work with talented designers, motion designers, copywriters, campaign managers, and you'll have the best design team to manage and to hire.Responsibilities:Lead by example with your creative energyBuild a strong, accurate, fearless, and innovative creative muscle for the performance groupLead the performance marketing creative direction, roadmap, and delivery including videos, motions banners, landing pages, emails, and sales collateralsOwn the knowledge of best practices for creatives for the leading media channels like YouTube, Facebook, and GoogleBalance high-cadence with high-quality, work fast and smart, adapt, learn, and practice flexibilityManage a team of designers, video creators, editors, and copywritersInspire and enforce a solve performance channels objectivesHelp to create meaningful, friendly, respectful teamwork with the marketing leadersWork closely with creative leads to maintain consistency of deliverables, share knowledge, and initiate cross-team collaborationsRequirements:﻿Requirements:An exceptional online portfolio demonstrating web-based performance marketing creative experienceAnalytical mind yet creative and outstanding conceptual and visual design skills, as well as a strong understanding of digital marketing metrics across multiple channels4+ years of experience as a designer or copywriter or video creator for digital design marketing in a global online start-up2+ years of experience in people management4+ years’ experience in user acquisition dashboards/metrics/best practices for different platforms such as Facebook, Google, YouTube, and other platformsHighly experienced in performance video productionsHighly creative mindset, always looking to innovate and find new ways for creative to solve business objectivesProven experience in the recruitment, multi-tasking, direction, and contribution to the growth of creative team membersThe ability to execute big ideas while still seeing the tiny detailsHigh level of written and spoken EnglishSome Of Our BenefitsAtera is highly collaborative and yes, fun! To support you at work (and play) we offer some fantastic perks: ample time to learn from your teammates and contemporaries, time off to relax and recharge, community volunteer days, an annual budget to support your learning & growth, a company paid trip and lots more.More About AteraSmall and medium IT operators are the heroes behind the scenes supporting companies around the world. They care a lot for their clients (external or internal) and often work virtually 24/7. However, small and medium IT service providers have always been underserved.Atera was built for exactly that. With the vision to simplify and streamline the work of Managed Service Providers and IT professionals. To create something that saves them time, energy, and money. To free them from needing to constantly put out fires.That vision created the remote-first IT management software – enabling IT professionals to shift from reactive task takers to proactive problem solvers.Now operating from our beautiful offices on Rothchild in Tel Aviv, Atera is currently used by thousands and thousands of IT professionals all over the world (105+ countries).As we rapidly grow, our goal remains the same: to transform the IT industry with revolutionary technology, while creating one of the happiest and healthiest work environments in the world.

Title: Frontend Developer
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!What you’ll do:Be responsible for the development and delivery of our UI sports products using React, Typescript and unique video editing functionality.Work both autonomously and collaboratively across disciplines with Product, UX Designers, QA Engineers, and Developers.Be a part of our frontend guild where we mentor engineers and discuss technological innovations and best practices in the frontend space.Requirements:What you’ll need:3+ years of experience developing single-page web applications using React and Typescript.Strong Software Engineering and problem-solving skills.Strong UX skills and aesthetic sensibilityBe a team player!Bonus Points:BSc in Computer Science or equivalentExperience with Agile development.Experience in deploying features to production in a costumer-facing application.

Title: Bookkeeper | Global Markets
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: The Bookkeeper will champion the bookkeeping of the company’s European Headquarters, and act as a liaison ERP expert to international accounting partners, being a focal point for professional accounting and bookkeeping questions.The successful candidate will translate finance requirements into workable NetSuite business solutions, develop and mentor international accounting partners regarding their bookkeeping accuracy and allocations, including planning, assigning, directing work, and providing constructive feedback to staff; addressing ERP issues and resolving problems.The Bookkeeper will manage the monthly close process and ensure proper reconciliation of Medison's global subsidiaries general ledger accounts and integrity of the financial statements. They will manage intercompany transactions between Corporate and international entities and ensure proper consolidation and eliminations of these transactions.The successful candidate will maintain compliance with internal controls; refine policies and procedures, with continuous focus on ERP process improvement and accuracy. He/She will be responsible for overseeing the monthly trial balance close for the Medison global subsidiaries, including but not limited to bank and credit card reconciliations, posting of journal entries, fixed asset register management, month-end accruals and reconciliations, and cut-off accounts. Responsibilities will also include process Travel & expenses reports and maintain approval flow; assisting and support in the year-end audit process; assistance in improving, developing, and documenting accounting policies, procedures, and internal controls; and ad hoc accounting and bookkeeping projects as needed.Requirements:The successful candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of bookkeepingExperience in a global company and multi-currency environment.The successful candidate will be a Certified Bookkeeper to Level 2 or 3.Fluent English is essential for this role. Proficient in Microsoft Office tools, specifically Excel.We are looking for a candidate that works efficiently, accurately and pays attention to detail.An excellent multi-tasker and team player ready to work in a fast-paced environment.Previous working Experience in a public company is an advantageResponsibilities:Develop and mentor foreign accounting partners regarding their bookkeeping accuracy and allocations, including planning, assigning, directing work, and providing constructive feedback to staff; addressing ERP issues and resolving problem.Ensure completion of tasks, milestones, components to maintain project progressionManage the monthly close process and ensure proper reconciliation of Medison's global subsidiaries general ledger accounts and integrity of the financial statementsManage intercompany transactions between Corporate and foreign entities and ensure proper consolidation and eliminations of these transactionsMaintain compliance with internal controls; refine policies and procedures, with continuous focus on ERP process improvement and accuracyResponsible for overseeing the monthly trial balance close for the Medison global subsidiaries, including but not limited to bank and credit card reconciliations, posting of journal entries, fixed asset register management, month-end accruals and reconciliations, and cut-off accountsProcess Travel & expenses reports and maintain approval flowAssist and support in the year-end audit processAssist in improving, developing, and documenting accounting policies, procedures, and internal controlsAd hoc accounting and bookkeeping projects as needed

Title: Corporate FP&A manager

Text: Silverfort is a fast-growing cyber security startup, which provides a unique identity protection solution for large enterprises. Title: Data Analyst (part-time)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for an experienced Data Analyst for a part-time job to join a fast-paced, challenging, and fun team. The Data Analyst will lead all aspects of data analytics, including mining, generation, and visualization to support our continued innovation and growth.The Data Analyst will report to the Head of Customer Success (CS) and will be working in close collaboration with all teams, including Customer Success, Product, Marketing, R&D, and Science teams to make a company-wide impact.Code Ocean is shaping the future of computational research to drive advances in drug discovery, genetic analysis, and bioinformatics.We’re a passionate group of people who care about advancing computational research to make computational research an open, connected community. By collaborating together on a common platform, scientists drive faster and more collaborative discoveries. We are fortunate to have amazing customers including Sema4, CytoReason, Dragonfly Therapeutics, and many others who are successfully creating, organizing, and sharing higher quality discoveries every day with our leading Computational Research Platform.As a Data Analyst, you will utilize your communication and technical skills to engage with internal teams and add value across the organization. You will be a proactive and trusted partner and predict, identify, and resolve challenges along the way. You will work in a dynamic, collaborative environment and operate both hands-on and at a strategic level with scientists and internal teams to accommodate growth and scale.The CS Team is responsible for helping our customers achieve their strategic objectives and maximize the value from working with Code Ocean. The team also serves as the liaison between the customer and other Code Ocean teams, playing a key role in developing our product roadmap.What you’ll do:Become a subject matter expert on Code Ocean use cases and data.Partner with stakeholders in Product, Marketing, Engineering, Customer Success, and Science teams to help streamline their reporting, and create value from multiple data sources.Effectively communicate findings and feedback to technical and non-technical stakeholders.Analyze raw data and recommend actions based on it.Create data pipelines from analytics tools to allow automation of business reporting dashboards and generation of insights.Develop and monitor metrics and KPIs to determine business performance against objectives.Empower stakeholders across the business to make data-informed decisions by building self-serve reportingIdentify key drivers of user engagement and growth and optimize metrics in collaboration with key stakeholders.Identify process improvements to our in-house experimentation and reporting processes.Responsibilities will adapt to our customer’s changing needs. We are open to change and love to continuously learn and improve our processes as we grow.The ideal candidate:Exceptional team player with the ability to collaborate, support, and influence others.Proficiency in SQL - a must. Experience with SQL in combination with PostgreSQL JSON functions is ideal.BS or MS Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related technical field.2+ years of experience as a Data Analyst in a technology-centered company.2+ years of experience with Business Intelligence tools.Experience working with Cloud Data Warehouses such as Snowflake, BigQuery, or Redshift, and transformation platforms.Experience with Python and/or R to analyze large datasets.Experience with web analytics and funnel optimization.Strong data visualization skills, using BI tools such as Tableau, Power Bi, Qlik, Superset, or similar tools.Knowledge of modern cloud data architectures, infrastructure, and tools such as AWS, GCP, Apache Airflow, and collaboration tools such as Github, and Shortcut.Great communication skills with the ability to express sophisticated concepts effectively.Autonomous and problem-solving-oriented.Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills.informed by data and understand how to utilize qualitative information to support impactful decisions.Keen to challenge the status quo and take initiatives to drive positive changes.Able to navigate complex and disparate systems and datasets.Preferred but not required:Experience working with Superset.Familiarity with graph-DB technologies such as Neo4J.Data science and machine learning model-building experience.
Requirements: ['Become a subject matter expert on Code Ocean use cases and data.', 'Partner with stakeholders in Product, Marketing, Engineering, Customer Success, and Science teams to help streamline their reporting, and create value from multiple data sources.', 'Effectively communicate findings and feedback to technical and non-technical stakeholders.', 'Analyze raw data and recommend actions based on it.', 'Create data pipelines from analytics tools to allow automation of business reporting dashboards and generation of insights.', 'Develop and monitor metrics and KPIs to determine business performance against objectives.', 'Empower stakeholders across the business to make data-informed decisions by building self-serve reporting', 'Identify key drivers of user engagement and growth and optimize metrics in collaboration with key stakeholders.', 'Identify process improvements to our in-house experimentation and reporting processes.', 'Responsibilities will adapt to our customer’s changing needs. We are open to change and love to continuously learn and improve our processes as we grow.', 'Exceptional team player with the ability to collaborate, support, and influence others.', 'Proficiency in SQL - a must. Experience with SQL in combination with PostgreSQL JSON functions is ideal.', 'BS or MS Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related technical field.', '2+ years of experience as a Data Analyst in a technology-centered company.', '2+ years of experience with Business Intelligence tools.', 'Experience working with Cloud Data Warehouses such as Snowflake, BigQuery, or Redshift, and transformation platforms.', 'Experience with Python and/or R to analyze large datasets.', 'Experience with web analytics and funnel optimization.', 'Strong data visualization skills, using BI tools such as Tableau, Power Bi, Qlik, Superset, or similar tools.', 'Knowledge of modern cloud data architectures, infrastructure, and tools such as AWS, GCP, Apache Airflow, and collaboration tools such as Github, and Shortcut.', 'Great communication skills with the ability to express sophisticated concepts effectively.', 'Autonomous and problem-solving-oriented.', 'Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills.', 'informed by data and understand how to utilize qualitative information to support impactful decisions.', 'Keen to challenge the status quo and take initiatives to drive positive changes.', 'Able to navigate complex and disparate systems and datasets.', 'Experience working with Superset.', 'Familiarity with graph-DB technologies such as Neo4J.', 'Data science and machine learning model-building experience.']

Title: Marketing Business Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We’re looking for a sharp and passionate Analyst to join our top-notch Marketing analytics team. Using your technical and analytical skills, your mission will be to tell the story behind the numbers, leverage our data to propose new ideas that you’ll then see implemented, and guide the Marketing department in their decision making processResponsibilitiesOwnership of all marketing analytics aspects - reporting, KPI tracking and optimization of marketing campaigns.Analyze large, complex data sets to solve business questions and lead the Marketing department to an ongoing improvement process.Build automated dashboards and reports to facilitate company-wide awareness and understanding of key business metrics.Collaborate with Marketing teams and support them in their day to day routine.Provide actionable recommendations and business insights to improve performance of marketing campaigns. Title: Social Media Manager (Native English Speaker)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: ZenGo is looking for a skilled and enthusiastic Social Media Manager to join our growing team. You will support the company’s ongoing marketing and communications efforts and become our company’s social media all-star. Our ideal candidate knows how to tell compelling, authentic, & engaging stories, has exceptional writing skills, and excels using social media channels (particularly Twitter and Discord) to engage our audiences, strengthen brand recognition among Web3 communities, and support ZenGo’s growth.This is a highly collaborative role, working both internally and with external partners, influencers, and thought leaders. You will help drive our brand voice by crafting what our community sees from us on a daily basis. You will be the creative force behind many of ZenGo’s successful campaigns to build our brand, support company growth, and establish ZenGo’s global mindspace as the go-to crypto wallet for everyone. You will also get to work with the best, most funnest marketing team in Tel Aviv with a view of the mediterranean.ResponsibilitiesAggressively build active social media channels (Twitter, Discord, LinkedIn) and manage other channels (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook)Build and run evergreen social media campaigns and contribute to product-specific social media campaignsDesign and run creative giveawaysDevelop content strategy that encourages growth across all channelsDraft engaging, educational, and compelling content for ZenGo’s various campaigns, working with the rest of the Marketing team to help launch new productsCollaborate with influencers and Web3 thought leaders to broaden ZenGo’s reachOutreach to and engagement with Web3 communities, in concert with the rest of the marketing teamRequirements:2+ years of relevant work experience in a content or social media position, ideally in the tech industry (and bonus if you are passionate about/have worked in crypto!)Crypto-native, or highly motivated to learn about crypto and onboard quickly to the ecosystem.Passion for social media and experience running campaigns in our top social media channelsAbility to understand and identify with ZenGo’s voice and brandExperience implementing content marketingAbility to consume external social content and distill relevant strategies for brand growthExcellent interpersonal skills with the ability to simply communicate complex mattersAbility to work autonomously while still communicating progress and direction to the teamNative written and spoken English. Did you find the typo?We are a global company: Other languages are a bonus!

Title: Physicist
Location: Modiin-Maccabim-Reut, Center District, Israel
Text: Dustphotonics is a developing cutting-edge technology in Silicon Photonics which is revolutionizing connectivity and communication in the data centers.Silicon photonics is becoming a standard technology used for high performance systems, solving challenges of performance, integration, power and cost.This technology is growing rapidly also in other markets such as Healthcare, LIDARs and other sensors.At Dustphotonics, we are looking to solve the difficult problems, in a smart and simple way, by thinking out of the box, leveraging the knowledge and know-how of the team members, and work as team to create Magic.Our Company culture is characterized by accountability for our ethics, for being fair to every employee, customer, supplier and partner.We believe we must work hard and have fun on the way to success.We welcome you to join our team - Apply for your next career opportunity with us!We are looking for a Physicist to join our R&D team.Requirements:Previous Experience: 2~5 years of experience working at R&D groups at multidisciplinary and high-tech companies.Preferably, experience working for optical, or semiconductor technological companies.Skills:Good understanding of optics and photonics.Experienced in preparation and execution of test plans, Data analysis and DOE.Advantage - Hands-on experience with laser and photonics test at wafer, bar, and chip level.Programming skills, python an advantage.Good grasp of Statistical analysis methods and tools.Education:B.Sc./MS Responsibilities:Own the silicon-photonics laser testing platform.Develop the test platform capabilities and analyze data to enable product development. Drive characterization of photonics and laser devices over temperature for power, noise, and other attributes. Design and carry out experiments for mapping device performance.

Title: Technical Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: TriEye is the pioneer of SWIR sensing technology. Based on nanophotonic research, TriEye’s technology is disrupting the world of vision sensors for the automotive market along with other exciting applications.We are looking for some exceptional talent to join our product team as a Technical Product Manager, leading the new multidisciplinary products definition to the emerging markets.Requirements:Bachelor’s or higher degree in exact science, engineering or computer scienceAt least 3 years of proven experience in technical product job with a record of successfully delivering complex multi-disciplinary products (Experience with the products involving imaging, image processing and lasers – advantage)At least 3 years of experience in technical roles (R&D or Applications)Ability and desire of deep technical dive into the product operationOutstanding message composition, presentation and storytelling skills Ability to summarize complex problems and present to executive staff in a clear and concise way.Fluent EnglishStrong interpersonal skills and teamworkExperience working in a hi-tech or start-up environmentYour Day to Day:Facing customers across the world from various segments (automotive, industrial, consumer, medical etc.), understanding their technical needs and the potential of TriEye system to solve their problemLearning the specific market needs and the competition and tailoring the product roadmap to provide added value and to outperform any other solutionTranslating customer experience and market needs into technical requirements and product solutions. Creating documentation of requirements, and acceptance criteriaDefining product performance and effectiveness metrics that measure and benchmark product success. Performing validation of features against customersWorking daily with multi-disciplinary engineering team to align on feature sizing and delivery planning. Supporting execution by making decisions and trade-offs to guarantee the product successClose work with customers to support their new product introduction process, providing technical advice and problem solutions to both customers and to the business teamWhy should you be a TriEyoneer?:Timing is everything! You want to be a part of a fast-growing deep-tech company backed by industry leaders, as it enters a significant stage of global growth.Inspiring skill development by providing growth opportunitiesInterest in supporting TriEye’s mission to improve and save lives by making Short-Wave Infrared (SWIR) technology accessible to everyone. Harnessing the power of SWIR sensing to provide superior vision, enables access to mission-critical image data even in the most challenging visibility conditions. This is a unique opportunity to take an active part in building a world’s first technology. Benefits:Free Gym MembershipParkingHolidays and Birthday giftsCibusGenerous vacation allowanceHappy hours and team eventsGeneral statement:TriEye is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.

Title: Director of Physical R&D, easyplant
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Mixtiles is a home design startup, our mission is to create homes people love. Today, home design is kind of boring!All companies make the same products, with slightly different styles and prices. Not us! We bring tech, design and engineering to the challenge.We started with the world's best way to put photos on walls. Then we got into art and built the world's best art service!And now, we are thrilled to introduce easyplant! An exciting product that is helping people to fill their homes with beautiful long-living plants and improve the way we all live and breathe.We're looking for a Director of Physical R&D,easyplant. Out of the box & creative-thinker who can bring a new product from idea to mass-production. A full stack maker and engineer who understands how material functions, and knows how to make almost anything.Meet easyplant - who we are?As part of our mission to make home design frictionless we understood that plants are the worst home design product that dies constantly. We believe this is an engineering issue and we forged our focus towards a mission to prevent plants from dying. Hence, we invested 2 years and developed a self-watering system that prevents plants from dying. The adoption rates of the product in the market are just phenomenal and we are accelerating our activity which is increasing our need for a top-notch Director of R&D to build new products and further enrich our offering.This is an amazing opportunity to join the core team of a new, promising startup, that operates under the umbrella of "Mixtiles", one of the top largest Israeli consumer companies.What will you do?Define and prototype next generation easyplant products Manage the entire NPI process all the way to launch Manage ongoing communication with external manufacturers Manage sourcing activity Compile 3D and 2D drawings to communicate production plans Analyze the cost structure of existing products Build and execute cost reduction plans Monitor and optimize products quality and functionality Conduct consumer research Constantly assess product's quality, identify and track issues. Define and execute remidiating actions as part of the product roadmapWho should you be?More than 5 years of experience manufacturing in small series as well as mass productionExtremely comfortable with numbers and statisticAbility to communicate ideas with high clarity and coherenceProven experience with most basic manufacturing fields, including injection molding, vacuum forming, metal machining, PCB production, wood machiningA Skilled maker who has created many products on their ownGreat sense of user experience and physical product useabilityExcellent verbal and written englishYou should be a quick thinker who can move fast, despite the limitations of the industryThis role is full-time, based at the Tel Aviv office.
Requirements: ['Define and prototype next generation easyplant products', 'Manage the entire NPI process all the way to launch', 'Manage ongoing communication with external manufacturers', 'Manage sourcing activity', 'Compile 3D and 2D drawings to communicate production plans', 'Analyze the cost structure of existing products', 'Build and execute cost reduction plans', 'Monitor and optimize products quality and functionality', 'Conduct consumer research', "Constantly assess product's quality, identify and track issues.", 'Define and execute remidiating actions as part of the product roadmap', 'More than 5 years of experience manufacturing in small series as well as mass production', 'Extremely comfortable with numbers and statistic', 'Ability to communicate ideas with high clarity and coherence', 'Proven experience with most basic manufacturing fields, including injection molding, vacuum forming, metal machining, PCB production, wood machining', 'A Skilled maker who has created many products on their own', 'Great sense of user experience and physical product useability', 'Excellent verbal and written english', 'You should be a quick thinker who can move fast, despite the limitations of the industry']

Title: Regional Service Manager - Israel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Your missionHey there and welcome to your new Opportunity with us. Being a Regional Service Manager for Israel is an exciting task, since you are the superhero our clients need. You know what setup of our solutions will satisfy their needs, therefore, these here are your most important task:Coordinate Field Service Team activities onsite for failure research and corrective maintenance. Project Management for commissioning services.Ensure operational procedures, processes and practices are well defined, documented, and consistently applied, registered, and followed.Ensure up-to-date documentation and processes for existing and coming service contracts and agreements. Take care of Health & Safety on behalf of service for the country and ensure all team members follow the regulationSupport EMEA Service Management by participating in improving overall activities Support EMEA Sales by attending and participating in exhibitions.Negotiate and work on customer contracts for Service level agreements.Deliver support and contribute service solutions for Sungrow customers as a point of contact.Achieve consistent customer satisfaction ratings and get better brand recognition from customers. Take responsibility for customer escalations and act as a point of escalation.Take over randomly on call duties, partly on weekends.Surely, you are free to develop into this role, give it your "own spin". This is not only a job - it is a just cause that will fill you with satisfaction every day! Your profileYou are seeking your next step in your career, you like being outdoors, erecting great projects and be part of the idea of a "Clean power for all"! Several years’ experience working in similar function.Experience In working with contracts and contract negotiations.Experience In establishing processes.Basic Project management skills.Hands on and onsite experience.Experience with H&S regulation of the country.Language Package: Hebrew and English at least C1.Soft skill for Interactivities between different departments and cultures.Willing to take ownership and responsibility.Driving license.Willing to travel, national / International.Why us?Why us?This decade might be overshadowed by Covid19, but sooner or later we will beat and overcome that son of a germ, am I right?But the true topic for this decade lies in energy！We are more than happy to state that not only We are leading this discourse, we also offer the fitting solutions for it. We have the strongest PV-Inverter R&D there is and became the world`s biggest Inverter Manufacturer, which we are extremely proud of!And now, for this decade, we are increasing our game, and You, You might become part of it! Besides that, many things await You:Opportunities for Career advancement Bonus payment based on pre-agreed and signed KPI agreements A multinational team awaits You with lots of european and transeuropean exchange!Possibility for technical and commercial knowledge increasement in regard to string inverters, central inverters, inverter stations including transformer and switch gear and storage solutions Technical and commercial training in our headquarter in Germany and even visits to the big R&D facility in China!We are a green tech company unlike any other green tech company. We are a team of lateral thinkers, young professionals, and creative minds. We are fighting every day to make our mission happen – Clean Power For All!With nearly 300GW (!) of clean power presently installed worldwide, we are more than ready to sate the worlds hunger for clean energy!Welcome at SungrowSungrow is the global leading inverter solution supplier for renewables. We are proud to look back to a success story that already began in 1997, but we never stopped striving for more. We want to give fresh impulses, inspire, and contribute to a sustainable development of our planet, that’s why we constantly improve our portfolio.From floating solar plants to large-scale utility projects and to small residential products we always offer the best and most suitable solution. At Sungrow we hold more than 1500 patents – no wonder as we employ the biggest research and development team of the whole industry. 40 % of all Sungrow workforce is continuously investigating on how to further improve the existing portfolio.Want to know more? Check out what working with us is like!

Title: Product Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About Daisy:Daisy is changing city living. We’re a digital-first, full-stack, customer-centric residential management company. Launched in mid-2021, we’ve seen massive growth in the last 6 months as we rapidly replace the age-old traditional management companies with our end-to-end innovative operating system that improves building health and residential life.About the role:Product Designers at Daisy play a central role in advocating our users’ wants and needs. This role requires high motivation and skills to ensure our products and features provide real value and are easy to use. This is a unique opportunity for a pixel-perfect designer to own a strategic business domain, solve company-level problems, and create the best experience for our users.Requirements:Requirements:3+ years of strategic product thinking with experience in identifying opportunities, and making decisions based on the impact on people and the company3+ years of product design experience with proficiency in typography, desktop/mobile UI, color, layout, iconography, and aesthetic sense and how these elements impact product function3+ years of mobile-first design, you live and breathe building flows and solutions in a mobile context, and have a deep understanding of the in and outs of both iOS and Android Native app designAbility to own and manage all design-related processes - from idea to prototype to handoffYou have the communication skills to help oversee projects from brainstorming initial design concepts to executionYou have a bias towards action, execution, and efficiency balanced with maintaining high-quality outputExperience in using, maintaining, and developing design system assets and documentation, streamlining collaboration between dev and design teamsYou are a team player and a leader - you know how to get buy-in on your ideas and thoughts and get people excited about designHighly skilled in Figma and other design toolsYou have an excellent portfolio showcasing product design work across a variety of platformsBachelor's Degree in Graphic Design, Interaction, Media Arts, or similar (nice to have)

Title: Data Implementation Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The Cymbio team is a group of innovators who are changing the way commerce and business relationships are initiated and conducted. We are on a mission to enable every company to connect and work with any business in a seamless and efficient manner. We connect, scale, and automate the full cycle of digital commerce from technology to daily operations. We believe in building a transparent and dynamic world, and we highly invest in our people, customers, and product. We have a flexible work model, connecting people from multiple locations, including the US and Israel. We’ve recently raised our Series B funding and added PayPal as an investor! We are rapidly growing and are looking for talented people to be part of the Cymbio team, to help shape our business and culture. Join us on this journey in building the future of connected commerce!We are looking for a data-enthusiast who will work alongside the Delivery team to seamlessly and efficiently onboard and support brands on our platform. You will identify opportunities for data process enhancements and build out automation processes internally to improve data SLAs. You will work closely with internal teams to continue supporting and expanding Cymbio’s taxonomy.Requirements:Love working with data and excel - a must!Exceptional organizational skills, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to spot errors with accuracy and efficiencyGreat communication skills and the ability to collaborate well with colleaguesAbility to work independentlyTime management skills and the ability to prioritize tasksStrong interpersonal and communication skills in English - written and verbalResponsibilities:Retrieve brand data and adjust with limited data discrepanciesBe an expert in Cymbio and Retailer taxonomyEfficiently transform brand data to meet Cymbio’s taxonomyIdentify and resolve any data discrepancies Adhere to best data management practices and maintain a high standard of accuracy and efficiencyWork closely with Customer Success Managers to provide our brands with reporting Partner with Delivery, Support, and Product teams to identify opportunities to improve processes relating to data automation
