Title: QA Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: MAЁLYS is one of the fastest-growing D2C beauty brands in the world. And now that we’ve gotten the formalities out of the way, let’s be frank. We are crushing it. How? We are breaking the mold of the body care industry with innovative targeted body care solutions for specific skin concerns, an intricate and unique combination of data and marketing, and a seriously sassy and bold brand voice.What’s our vibe? We are a team of people who want to make lasting, impactful changes, who live (and love) to see results, who innovate with passion, and who have a badass sense of humor. Is our vibe your vibe? Then keep reading…Role Descriptions: The QA Engineer will join our dev team and have the ability to make an impact on both QA processes and platform quality. The ideal candidate is meticulous in their work and wants to further develop their manual QA skills while looking to acquire automation testing knowledge.Your life at MAËLYS will look like…While primarily responsible for Quality Assurance of our platform, you are expected to proactively contribute in all agile ceremonies (Sprint planning, Estimation, Daily Stand ups and retrospectives)Black box testing following existing test plans and self-written test plans:defining test plan and test cases for new products and product featuresregularly execute sanity and regression tests for correctness and usabilityexploratory testing on newly developed featurescreating new tests while updating, improving, and correcting tests where necessaryWork closely with people across marketing, product, and support to help develop an amazing customer experience.Deep dive into complex problems & find their root cause.Approve new versions to be released to production.Find defects, reproduce and diagnose those defectsYou will thrive in this role if you have…2-4 years’ experience in a web environment/B2CExperience in designing test plans (STP, STD).Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.Basic knowledge in SQL.Attention to details.Can multitask in a fast paced, high-growth start-up environment.Excellent communication skills.Fluent English & Hebrew both written and spoken - a must. Experience in working within a scrum team (Agile).We could also benefit if you have…Experience in CI/CD Process.Good understanding of the test automation process and keen to learn.Knowledge in TDD, BDD.

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: First, let's talk about you and the impact you will have!Play an essential role in the development and refinement of Dazz remediation cloud's vision, strategy, roadmap, and executionOwn all product aspects from design through development and rolloutBecome an expert on our product and collaborate with our phenomenal R&D & CTO teams to bring our vision and strategy to lifeWork closely with the Dazz sales team and customers on strategic accounts, providing strong technical leadershipWork with Product Marketing, Customer Success, and Sales to deliver an amazing Dazz experience to our customersReport to our CTORequired Skills:3+ years of product management experience in a B2B & SaaS product (DevOps / Security / Compliance / IT – preferred) Background in cyber-security technologies (either in endpoint security, network security, incident response, or forensics)Excellent communication and presentation skills in English, as our Product Managers maintain close customer relationshipsExperience in cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure or GCP) & modern DevOps technologiesPassion to build things from the ground up and synthesize complex problems into clear plans of actionAmbitious and passionate individual with a pioneering spirit to lead our team in the right way (we’re collaborative!)Now, what is Dazz?At Dazz, we're changing cloud security for the better. In an industry where virtually all of the innovation has been in finding security issues in the software development pipeline, we're focused on fixing them and reducing risk within the cloud. The Dazz Remediation Cloud takes aim at the single biggest problem in cloud security with a three-step process: We discover and visualize our customers’ code-to-production environment, reduce noise and find root causes and owners, and tee up a super dev-friendly fix that massively improves efficiency and builds trust between security and engineering teams. No small feat!But we also realize it’s not just about what you can do for Dazz. We see your employment here as very much a two-way street. We want you to feel like you’re doing your best work, stretching yourself, learning new things, receiving relevant, timely feedback, and being given growth opportunities. We want Dazz to be a great place to be and a great place to be from, and that means making your experience here a transformative one.
Requirements: ["Play an essential role in the development and refinement of Dazz remediation cloud's vision, strategy, roadmap, and execution", 'Own all product aspects from design through development and rollout', 'Become an expert on our product and collaborate with our phenomenal R&D & CTO teams to bring our vision and strategy to life', 'Work closely with the Dazz sales team and customers on strategic accounts, providing strong technical leadership', 'Work with Product Marketing, Customer Success, and Sales to deliver an amazing Dazz experience to our customers', 'Report to our CTO', '3+ years of product management experience in a B2B & SaaS product (DevOps / Security / Compliance / IT – preferred)', 'Background in cyber-security technologies (either in endpoint security, network security, incident response, or forensics)', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills in English, as our Product Managers maintain close customer relationships', 'Experience in cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure or GCP) & modern DevOps technologies', 'Passion to build things from the ground up and synthesize complex problems into clear plans of action', 'Ambitious and passionate individual with a pioneering spirit to lead our team in the right way (we’re collaborative!)']

Title: Assistant Controller

Text: About YouAppi:We are an exciting fast-growing worldwide tech company.YouAppi enables mobile applications to find their users through content analysis and activity. YouAppi offers the first comprehensive programmatic platform for premium mobile brands, designed to dramatically increase acquisition and retention of high-value customers. The platform combines the power of machine learning and artificial intelligence to deliver a highly optimized user journey that begins with awareness, propels toward purchase and continues to deliver via re-engagement. Text: אנו מגייסים לחברת סטארט אפ, לאחר גיוס כספי ורוצים להציע לך משרתDirector of Operations, Service & Support   ידע ונסיון ב LTE/5G networkאם מתאים, אנא החזר מיל ונשלח לך תאור משרה מלאהטכנולוגיה של החברה כוללת הפשטה של הרשתות הסלולריות הפרטיות והנגשתם למנהלי המחשוב של חברות שאין להן ניסיון בניהול רשתות סלולריות. Director of Operations, Service & Support for a Telecommunication Start UpWe are seeking a senior  Operation professional to lead an Operations team which includes System Networking Operations, Client Implementation and Customer Support. It is a critical role to ensure the successful creation of the customers on cloud/prem workspace, implementation, and migration of the customers workload onto the workspace and then providing support for the customer from Tier 1-3. This dynamic leader will ensure we excel in all aspects of Operational performance metrics including deploying the workspace quickly, with quality and within committed time frames, rapid time to migrate and implement client's data and application into the workspace (client implementation), adoption of a secure process including agile ways of working and cost optimization. As the Head of Operations, you will also teach, mentor, challenge, and develop individuals, teams and organizations while fostering an innovative and inclusive culture. building up (as well as turning around organizations into) a highly efficient operations organizationDemonstrated ability to lead and inspire a teamOutstanding communication & presentation and Title: UI/UX Designer
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We're Edgybees, a startup on the fast track to bring Clarity, Reliability, and Speed to Lifesaving Missions. We instantly transform spatial content into actionable & reliable information to deliver a safer world. We do so, by providing accurate geo-registration and augmented reality of aerial video and satellite imagery in real-time, enabling defense, public safety, and critical infrastructure command centers to accomplish life-saving missions. We are growing fast and looking for enthusiastic team players.If you would like to be part of envisioning the future using cutting-edge technologies and be a member of a team that constantly breaks new grounds, then Edgybees is searching for you!We are searching for an experienced UI/UX Designer to join our growing team in Israel (we are working on a hybrid model) to make an impact!The UI/UX designer should work closely with the product and the R&D teams, by taking features from concept to production. Title: Medical Reviewer
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: Do you have a strong desire to be part of a patient-centric company improving patient lives? Does translating and communicating scientific data to key decision makers sound interesting?The Position Gaining knowledge and staying up to date with scientific data on relevant medications. Working in close collaboration with cross functional brand teams to track all scheduled NNIL activities with HCPs presenting on behalf of Novo Nordisk.Communication with HCPs presenting on behalf of Novo Nordisk.Reviewing presentation materials in timely manner to ensure that presentation is :In alignment with Novo Nordisk and local rules and regulations.Balanced and reflects published data. Documenting and archiving to ensure traceable record of aforementioned materials.Required Skillsreading and understanding of scientific publications basic knowledge on statistics in clinical trials capability to navigate through scientific data in multiple therapeutic areas precision and accuracy good interpersonal skills working cross functionally capability to operate within defined timelinesAbout The DepartmentThe Clinical, Medical and Regulatory (CMR) department at Novo Nordisk is one of the most diverse and collaborative groups within the organization. From health-care-provider interactions and developing and implementing regulatory strategies, providing medical education, and collecting data to support efficacy and new product development, CMR is involved. Title: Director of Operations
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: אנו מגייסים לחברת סטארט אפ, לאחר גיוס כספי ורוצים להציע לך משרתDirector of Operations, Service & Support   ידע ונסיון ב LTE/5G networkאם מתאים, אנא החזר מיל ונשלח לך תאור משרה מלאהטכנולוגיה של החברה כוללת הפשטה של הרשתות הסלולריות הפרטיות והנגשתם למנהלי המחשוב של חברות שאין להן ניסיון בניהול רשתות סלולריות. Director of Operations, Service & Support for a Telecommunication Start UpWe are seeking a senior  Operation professional to lead an Operations team which includes System Networking Operations, Client Implementation and Customer Support. It is a critical role to ensure the successful creation of the customers on cloud/prem workspace, implementation, and migration of the customers workload onto the workspace and then providing support for the customer from Tier 1-3. This dynamic leader will ensure we excel in all aspects of Operational performance metrics including deploying the workspace quickly, with quality and within committed time frames, rapid time to migrate and implement client's data and application into the workspace (client implementation), adoption of a secure process including agile ways of working and cost optimization. As the Head of Operations, you will also teach, mentor, challenge, and develop individuals, teams and organizations while fostering an innovative and inclusive culture.  Key ResponsibilitiesDeploy a multi-mode on cloud/prem  LTE/5G network to customer locations, verify the operational readiness of all components, and facilitate documentation of correct installation and operations processesSetup and integrate network components (Packet core, RAN, Spectrum Access System, transport, user equipment, IoT devices and applications)Support network activities in Private Wireless deployment as well as provide expert technical assistance in support of new business opportunitiesPerform system and component level tests to qualify the LTE/5G network and support onboarding customers onto the networkIn depth troubleshooting of customer issues in a production environment.Handling customer escalations in close co-operation with stakeholders On-site support at customer premises to support our customers while upgrading or fault isolationManage end-to-end escalation process and alarms, and provide with an immediate response and resolution  Active sharing of knowledge and helping others in our agile team (local and international)Manage  Global Support activities (personal on-call support only during daytime)Job Requirements Engineering degree and/or equivalent network and support Working knowledge of IP networks configuration and setup and excellent knowledge of server hardware·      Experience in the cloud space or edge compute space with emphasis on including Opensource initiativesExpertise in physical networkingKnowledgeable in setup, configuration, and troubleshooting of switches, routers, etc.Excellent knowledge of 3GPP technologies in FR1 and principlesKubernetes and ADP experience is of advantage & Requirements:Track record of success in start-up and highly agile with a complex multi-cultural and multi-national environmentsTrack record of building up (as well as turning around organizations into) a highly efficient operations organizationDemonstrated ability to lead and inspire a teamOutstanding communication & presentation and interpersonal skillsBuild a customer focused organization and drive an exceptional customer experienceTrack record in leading, motivating and coaching teams

Title: UI/UX Designer
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We're Edgybees, a startup on the fast track to bring Clarity, Reliability, and Speed to Lifesaving Missions. We instantly transform spatial content into actionable & reliable information to deliver a safer world. We do so, by providing accurate geo-registration and augmented reality of aerial video and satellite imagery in real-time, enabling defense, public safety, and critical infrastructure command centers to accomplish life-saving missions. We are growing fast and looking for enthusiastic team players.If you would like to be part of envisioning the future using cutting-edge technologies and be a member of a team that constantly breaks new grounds, then Edgybees is searching for you!We are searching for an experienced UI/UX Designer to join our growing team in Israel (we are working on a hybrid model) to make an impact!The UI/UX designer should work closely with the product and the R&D teams, by taking features from concept to production. It starts from getting product requirements, understanding the user needs, and prototyping possible solutions. Title: Frontend Developer
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Frontegg is the leading User Management platform in the market today, providing robust and scalable infrastructure for B2B SaaS companies. Frontegg's platform provides a complete solution for authentication, authorization and user management flows, scaling from hyper-growth startups to enterprise leaders. Backed by top-tier VCs and a rapidly growing team, Frontegg’s innovative technology protects millions of users around the globe and serves high-tier applications and developers to solve the most complex use-cases.What are we looking for?We are seeking a Frontend developer with a strong passion for web technologies and frontend frameworks to join the team. Title: Unilever Future Leaders Programme (UFLP) – Finance
Location: Center District, Israel
Text: Our Future Leaders Programme will ignite the leader in you. This unique programme is designed to develop Unilever’s Future Leaders (UFL) by providing challenging and purposeful opportunities that accelerate their readiness to take on business leadership roles.Our Future Leaders Programme will ignite the leader in you. This unique programme is designed to develop Unilever’s Future Leaders (UFL) by providing challenging and purposeful opportunities that accelerate their readiness to take on business leadership roles.The Unilever Future Leaders Program (UFLP) is about developing tomorrow’s leaders today. We offer world-class development opportunities in a fast-paced, challenging work environment. That means you'll learn from the best, both internally and externally; inspiring leaders and colleagues to support your professional and personal growth. As well as learning on the job, you'll have access to many carefully selected learning programmes to build fundamental leadership and business skills.You'll need to be focused and ambitious to get where you want, identifying opportunities and taking responsibility for your own development.Our programme is looking to make you ready for management.We offer world-class development opportunities in a fast-paced work environment.Accelerate your development through challenging projects and job rotations.The Unilever Future Leaders Programme – FinanceFinance at Unilever is about a lot more than just numbers. We know the value of seeing the bigger picture behind the figures and believe that sustainable business growth is only possible when you bring together the best talent. Our Finance team plays a crucial role in building our business and being a force for good. In finance, you will be at the heart of multi-billion-euro brands, shaping their development, pricing strategies and more.Over the course of your placements, you’ll gain an in-depth understanding of our operations and innovative processes. You’ll work with financial accounting, management reporting and analysis, as well as working across other business functions. As a crucial part of our team, you will get to experience real work straight away.Key Features Of UFLPHands-on experience in business challengesWork with experts across multiple disciplinesDuration: 3-year programHybrid WorkingWhat do we look for?Fresh graduates of Bachelor's or Master's DegreesIndividuals, who have 0-2 years of work experienceFluent in EnglishStrong analytical skillsStrong interpersonal skillsUnilever is an organisation committed to equity, inclusion and diversity to drive our business results and create a better future, every day, for our diverse employees, global consumers, partners, and communities. We believe a diverse workforce allows us to match our growth ambitions and drive inclusion across the business. At Unilever we are interested in every individual bringing their ‘Whole Self’ to work and this includes you! Thus if you require any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of your application so that we can support you through your recruitment journey.

Title: Service Technician - Petah Tikva, Israel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: What To ExpectAt Tesla, our Service Technicians are the backbone of the Service operation, who consistently deliver a revolutionary and exceptional experience to Tesla customers every day, supporting our mission to accelerate the world’s transition to sustainable energy. As a Service Technician, you will carry out a wide range of technical vehicle repairs, both with and without supervision, as well as focusing on the continuous development of your technical skills. We’ve created one of the most innovative vehicles ever made, and you will help ensure an equally innovative service to customers. To succeed at Tesla, you must be energetic, highly organized, and smart working. You should have a passion for the brand and the ability to build on your technical skill set and thrive in a team environment.What You’ll Do Perform repairs and maintenance on all types of Tesla vehicles, either with or without supervision depending on skill level  Demonstrate a fundamental understanding of multiple Tesla vehicle systems and subsystems  Clean and detail vehicles when needed, inspecting vehicles prior to customer delivery either after a completed service or the delivery of new cars  Collaborate with Senior Technicians in their work and move towards more advanced tasks as part of your development, continuously learning and developing your knowledge and skills  Self-manage technical expertise development  Operate a variety of hand-powered and motorized shop tools, calibrating and inspecting equipment as well as working with Tesla specific software and vehicle diagnostic tools  Work across teams, engaging with other technicians and service center staff to solve problems and establish best practice  Support other service centers as well as carrying out remote working if required by the business  Effectively handle multiple priorities, organizing workload and meeting challenging deadlines by having excellent time management  Work as cost effectively as possible and keep a tidy workspace  Follow all Tesla specified repair guidelines to the accepted quality levels, following safety instructions at all times  Complete accurate technical write ups and administration, ensuring all internal systems are up to date What You’ll Bring Education in a mechanical or electrical-related discipline and significant technical work experience from automotive industry or a related industry Aeronautics, Engines, Electrical, Marine, Aviation, other mechanics or industrial mechanic etc.)  Ability to learn and adapt to a changing environment while delivering on performance KPIs  You are expected to have a strong motivation to develop your skills, knowledge and demonstrate a performance mindset  Ability to collaborate and succeed in a dynamic team environment, contributing positively to the collective environment and team spirit  Motivated to work in a high-paced, dynamic environment that constantly evolves by introducing new technology and work methods  Excellent communication skills in English are essential and an ability to translate technical concerns to our customers  A passion for Tesla, serving as an advocate and brand ambassador to our customers  A valid driving license and maintain a clean driving record

Title: מהנדס.ת מכונות משאבות

Text: "אורמת" מובילה בעולם בתחום אנרגיה מתחדשת, חברה בינלאומית שמתכננת, מייצרת, מקימה ומפעילה תחנות כוח המפיקות חשמל ממקורות אנרגיה ירוקה. תיאור תפקיד: תכנון מערכות מורכבות בציוד סובב ומערכות תומכות – הדורשות ידע בחוזק, זרימה, מעבר חום וייצור.אחריות על כל שלבי התכן משלב הרעיון דרך תכנון מפורט עד שלב ניסויים והרכבה בשטחליווי ותמיכה בייצורעבודה מול שאר הדיספילנות- מחלקות ההנדסה, תפ"י, רכש, ייצור, פרויקטים ותפעולעבודה מול ספקים וקבלני מישנה בארץ ובחולעבודה על פרוייקטים שוטפים במקביל לפיתוח מוצרים חדשיםעבודת HANDS ONעבודה בצוות פרויקטלי מולטידיסציפלינרי דרישות: מהנדס.ת מכונותניסיון בתוכנת CAD – solidworks/NXמעל שנתיים ניסיון בתכן מכאניאנגלית ברמה גבוההיכולת טכנית וראיה מרחבית גבוההיכולת לעבוד על מספר משימות במקביליכולת למידה עצמיתנכונות לנסיעה לחו"ל בתדירות נמוכה לצורך הטמעת מוצרים חדשים

Title: Commercial Legal Counsel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: HUB is looking to add a new team member to the expanding legal department. You will help the rapidly growing public high-tech company negotiate and execute commercial transactions for customers worldwide and for incoming procurement requests. You will as well assist on a variety of internal legal matters such as marketing, IT, M&A, licensing, data protection laws etc.If you are a highly motivated, organized, thorough, proactive, independent self-starter who enjoys working in a dynamic, fast-paced and collaborative environment - HUB is where you want to be!We view the ideal candidate as one who is passionate to learn what it takes to run commercial agreements from start to finish. In this challenging position, you will partner with internal clients (Sales, Business Development, Marketing, Product Management and Cyber Security) in managing, negotiating and executing commercial transactions.﻿What you will be doing:Become the first team member leading commercial matters, reporting to HUB’s Chief Legal OfficerWork with HUB’s Sales Organization to negotiate and close commercial agreements (NDAs, MSAs, SLAs, SAAS Agreements, SPAs, APAs, DPAs etc.)Work with HUB’s internal departments to negotiate and close procurement agreementsRemain updated on applicable laws and regulations surrounding IP, privacy and securitySupport and advise on a wide variety of general legal matters throughout the different departmentsRequirements:2-5 years of relevant legal experience as an in-house lawyer in a legal department of a high-tech company or in the commercial/high-tech department of a major law firm - mandatoryLaw degree from a top academic instituteCertified Lawyer with an active Bar membership (not necessarily from the Israeli Bar)English at a mother tongue level - mandatoryPrior experience working with large multinational customers and partners, preferably in technology-related agreements and SaaSPrior experience working with NASDAQ traded companies - an advantageExcellent negotiation, drafting and analytical skills; commercial transactions experienceAbility to effectively prioritize and manage multiple matters and conflicting priorities, while balancing legal and business concernsExperience with data privacy and security issues (CCPA, GDPR etc.)Exceptionally strong communication and interpersonal skillsAbility to work flexible hours and daysAbility to work effectively remotely

Title: Product UX & UI
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who is Eleos Health?Today, more people than ever are speaking publicly about their mental health. Whether it’s ourselves, our friends and family or even public figures, taking care of your behavioral health is no longer a taboo, it’s vital, and it’s only human. Eleos is on a mission to help deliver the world’s most effective behavioral care through data, measurement, and personalization. Or simply put,We want to give clinicians the support they need to do the important work only they can do.What is this opportunity?The Product Designer will be an integral part of the product team. We have an innovative technology that can offer a lot of value, and we need an excellent user experience to be able to deliver it most effectively to our customers. This is an opportunity to lead the design of end-to-end workflows and be responsible for UX strategy, planning, and execution, working closely with Product, Engineering, and Customer success, as well as with our customers and partners to build product features our customers love to use.Who are you?You are passionate about designing an exceptional user experience that solves real pain points and creates value in people’s lives. You love problem-solving and diving into user research to deliver simple solutions to complex problems. You can drive processes independently and balance the big picture view with the day-to-day tasks to move the product forward on all fronts. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and enjoy the dynamic and collaborative atmosphere of a startup.How will you contribute?Lead the design and process of our products from end to endBrainstorm and design new features from conception to productionDesign a seamless user experience based in user research and testingPartner with product and engineering to problem solve and explore potential solutions through low-fidelity prototypesGather and evaluate user requirements to define new featuresWhat qualifications and skills will help you to be successful?2+ years of experience in product/UX design with experience owning the design process from end to endExperience creating prototypes and testing at low fidelity stagesCommunicate design decisions effectively to relevant stakeholdersA high level of written and spoken EnglishExperience with user research and user testingOnline portfolio is a mustSome nice-to-haves are:Experience in designing and maintaining design systems in FigmaExperience with digital health systems
Requirements: ['Lead the design and process of our products from end to end', 'Brainstorm and design new features from conception to production', 'Design a seamless user experience based in user research and testing', 'Partner with product and engineering to problem solve and explore potential solutions through low-fidelity prototypes', 'Gather and evaluate user requirements to define new features', '2+ years of experience in product/UX design with experience owning the design process from end to end', 'Experience creating prototypes and testing at low fidelity stages', 'Communicate design decisions effectively to relevant stakeholders', 'A high level of written and spoken English', 'Experience with user research and user testing', 'Online portfolio is a must', 'Experience in designing and maintaining design systems in Figma', 'Experience with digital health systems']

Title: JUNIOR ANALYST - Dubai, UAE
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence What We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term ResponsibilitiesDeveloping new trading tools, strategies and improve existing ones Conducting fundamental research & analysis using Python Working hand in hand with the tech team to implement new business ideas Spearheading entry into new markets/ fields Upholding and living our cultural values Basic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skills Ability to think clearly in critical situations Passion, resilience, and integrity Preferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Analyst. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

Title: Technical Project Manager
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!What you’ll do:As a Technical project manager, you will be responsible for providing technical project planning, management, and oversight for key initiatives and implementation projects. Ensuring first that these initiatives and projects are closely aligned with WSC strategic priorities, and second, that the projects are completed on time, within the scope, and with high-quality deliverables.You’ll be a member of our Product department and serve as a key link between product managers, all R&D teams, QA, Operations and CSM, and Account delivery team. You will also assess risks, anticipate bottlenecks, and provide escalation management.Track, report, monitor and control projects from initiation throughout the project life cycle until full implementation.Implement project management best practices around: progress management, Gantt, resource management, cost management, risk assessment, change management, Stakeholder management and tracking of external commitmentWork closely with all R&D teams, product teams, QA, Operations and account delivery teamSolve problems throughout the project life cycle, balance the needs of both business and technological interfaces.Track product quarterly goals reaching the implementation within the time and scope definedPart of defining the solutioning and align with product lead and r&d leadLead cross-domain projects with multiple teams involved Become the department key link for external project for example: clients in risk, and projects with a deadline .Requirements:What you’ll need:﻿5+ years of experience in project management, including experience in R&D /product projects from High-Tech companiesAbility to handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced environmentExperience with Agile project management & software development methodology.Technological background, academic or professionalMatrix management abilities as well as proven experience.Multitasking - ability to work on multiple projects in parallelStrong analytical skills and technical aptitude.University degree, B.Sc. preferred.English at a mother tongue level.

Title: Head of Product

Text: Quantum Machines is the global leader in control systems for quantum computing, a field on the verge of exponential growth, bringing about opportunities like those made possible with the invention of classical computing 50 years ago. We are assembling the strongest team of professionals in the world with the goal of revolutionizing how quantum computers are built and controlled and accelerating their arrival. Title: QA (V&V) Team Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Luna | 6over6, our mission is to make quality, affordable vision care accessible for all.We are looking for a strong QA professional and team leader to be responsible for all testing activities in the company.Our products are medical devices that have gone through regulatory approvals in the highest standards.This is a critical role that constitutes a final confirmation of the quality of the products, it's a cross-functional role and interfaces with various teams within the company.We are looking for someone highly motivated, technical, detail-oriented, bright, and energetic who can effectively lead a big team, to be a professional and personal mentor.You will be the main point of contact for our different departments regarding all quality issues and personally responsible for the quality of our products.What you'll do:Establishing testing best practices, defining and updating testing strategy and methodologyOwnership of creating, updating, reviewing test documentation for the company's entire product suite. Constant and ongoing improvement and validation of documentation quality, testing execution including hands-on testing when needed. Responsible for professional development and excellence of the testing team for achieving company goals. Collaborate with product, R&D and business teams on product requirements, developments and tailor made requests. Responsibility for product quality and performance with accordance to the company products' acceptance criterias. Manages a team of testing professionals and oversees their work, assists them with personal and professional improvement and handles escalations for team members. Create new processes as needed end-to-end from ideation to execution. Responsible, highly attentive project manager, with superb people & communication skills. Analytical & KPI driven with a understanding of client-server side technologiesProfessional level English What you'll need:5+ year of experience in Software QA3+ years in a leadership role Vast Knowledge of QA methodologies including experience in drafting test documentation (STD/STP/STR/Monthly Reports/Release notes)Experienced Jira AdminBachelor degree or other relevant diplomaQA Experience in a multiple products environment including Web, Cloud, Mobile applications and client-server products

Title: Bookkeeper
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Wiz, we move quickly. We’ve set the record for the fastest first year revenue growth of any tech startup, the fastest company to acquire more than 25% of the Fortune 500 as customers, the fastest company to reach $1B (and then $6B) in valuation, and now the fastest-growing software company ever by going from $1M to $100M in ARR in just 18 months. Most importantly, we provide the fastest ROI of any security product – Wiz connects to the entire multi-cloud environment within 15 minutes and identifies the specific infiltration vectors that make clouds susceptible to a breach in under 24 hours so organizations of all sizes and industries can rapidly identify and remove the most critical risks in AWS, Azure, GCP, and Kubernetes. Join us as we help organizations create secure cloud environments that accelerate their businesses.SummaryWe are looking to hire an experienced bookkeeper to join the finance team located in Tel Aviv and report to the Financial Controller Team Lead. We work in a hybrid model and provide excellent conditions for our employees.What You’ll DoProvide bookkeeping for all global accounts (P&L and Balance Sheet).Process, verify and reconcile AP invoices, including payment process.Process employee expense reports.Charge expenses to accounts and cost centers by analyzing invoice/expense reports.Record fixed assets and depreciation, and prepare reconciliations.Record pre-paid expenses and amortization.Maintain bank account ledgers and perform reconciliations.Prepare analytical reviews and month-end accruals.Report VAT and vendor tax withholding reports to global authorities.Report to additional institutions such as social security, the IRS, etc.Assist with audit and quarterly closing support as necessary.What You’ll BringAt least 6 years of experience as a sole bookkeeper.Experience with bookkeeping for all accounts (P&L and Balance Sheet).Previous experience in a high-tech company and multi-currency environment – Must.Strong Excel skills – Must.High-level of English proficiency (writing, reading, and speaking) – Must.Experience with NetSuite – Advantage.A high degree of accuracy and attention to detail.Excellent interpersonal relations and teamwork.Ability to work independently to implement process.Startup mentality, roll up your sleeves attitude!If your experience is close but doesn’t fulfill all requirements, please apply. Wiz is on a mission to build a special company. To achieve our goal, we are focused on hiring Wizards with different backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences.Wiz is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, reproductive health decisions, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, genetic information, political views or activity, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.By submitting your application, you acknowledge that Wiz will process your personal data in accordance with Wiz's Privacy Policy.

Title: Mechanical Engineer
Location: Center District, Israel
Text: Airspan is a US-based provider of ground-breaking, disruptive software and hardware for 5G networks and a pioneer in end-to-end Open RAN solutions interoperable with other vendors. As a result of our innovative technology and significant R&D investments to build and expand our 5G solutions portfolio, Airspan is well positioned with Open RAN, private networks, fixed wireless access (FWA) and CBRS solutions, providing solutions to Tier 1 mobile network operators to deploy their networks of the future, today. With over 1 million cells shipped to 1,000 customers in more than 100 countries, Airspan has global scale. For more information visit https://www.airspan.com/In this role you will have full responsibility for the mechanical design of modules and products.Work in close collaboration with other teams in R&D, in order to meet a complex set of requirements. A true team playerMethodical. Able to set and follow your own tasks and scheduleCreative and innovativeAn analytic thinker with attention to detail and autodidactic natureExceptionally skilled in SolidWorksFluent in English and HebrewExperienced in design for injection molding, die-casting, machining, and sheet metalHands-on approachWilling to travel abroad (mostly to China) up to 1-2 times a yearSkills and Qualifications - Advantage:Certified SolidWorks Associate (CSWA) or betterSolidWorks PDM ProAnsys thermal simulationsExperienced with structural/thermal analysisExperience in research of materials and technologiesFDM 3D printingAgile PLM

Text: About The PositionIguazio is looking for QA Engineer to be part of our all-star QA Automation Team and play a critical role in our mission to deliver the highest quality and efficiency of our product software development.The QA Automation Team is responsible for QA automation and is involved with all R&D test activities including high complexity, software design, and development to improve the existing automation framework.What You'll DoPlan and write comprehensive test plans to cover various featuresExecute end-to-end manual tests that involves different aspects of our productReport and track product issues and validate fixes and investigate failuresExecute automated tests and use python code as a part of the manual testingWork closely with development teams including participating in design reviews and discussionsEssential SkillsYou must be focused, take initiative, be a great communicator and have excellent prioritization skills. Backed by top financial and strategic VCs including Bosch, Verizon Ventures, Samsung SDS, CME Group and Dell, the company is led by serial entrepreneurs and a diverse team of seasoned innovators in the USA, UK, Singapore and Israel. Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for an experienced, cyber-oriented Customer Success Manager to take full ownership of partners and customers. In this role, you will focus on delivering an exceptional customer experience to the Cynet customers by partnering with them to achieve their goals with Cynet. A successful CSM will enable the customer on the Cynet products while learning about their customer’s goals and the KPIs they are tracking.This position requires a passion for customer success. If you are able to add immediate value to your customer engagements and identify risks while up-selling opportunities, then this is the job for you!Requirements:3+ years of experience in Customer Success rolesExcellent communication skillsTeam player with a positive and forward-looking attitudeAbility to work creatively under pressureStrong business skillsWhat will you do: Manage customer relationship with Cynet via a regular cadence of communication. Partner with customers to determine goals and KPIs and manage them through successful completion. Serve as a point of escalation for customers. Perform Executive Business Reviews (EBRs) involving C-levels from the customer and Cynet Advocate internally and externally while effectively maintaining a customer communication plan on pending issues. Collaborate with internal teams such as product management, PS, engineering, and sales Become a trusted advisor with customers by deeply understanding their business and aligning their needs with our solutions. Track and monitor customer status, identify risk, and demonstrate new product features and functionality.About Us:Cynet is a technology-oriented company continuously looking for new ways to innovate the Cybersecurity world. Our main priority is to defend our customers from any harm in the vast digital ocean. But Cynet is more than just a product; we are a family. We value each one of our members and their inputs. Cynet is a place where your work will directly impact the way we service our customers.You’ll be joining a growing company with offices in Boston, the UK, Italy, and Israel and collaborating with a world-class Sales, Marketing, and executive team in a fast-paced, rapidly advancing cybersecurity space.BENEFITS:Compensation will depend on skills and experience. Cynet offers a comprehensive, high-quality benefits program that includes medical and dental care, Paid Time Off, 401k matched by the company, maternity leave plan, and other benefits to its employees.EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER:Due to the anticipated volume of responses, we will contact only those candidates who most closely match our requirements. We’re an equal opportunity employer dedicated to building a culturally and experientially diverse and balanced team.

Title: Payroll Accountant (Temporary)
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a forward-thinking Interim Payroll Specialist to be part of the financial success team of our quickly-growing company. The Interim Payroll Specialist will play an integral role within the accounting team and as such you will:Responsibilities:Play an integral role within the accounting team Be the focal point between Pipl Search Ltd & the outsourced payroll firm and review their work and handling onboarding & offboarding and payroll insurance agents. Update monthly revenue trackersAssist with managing revenue on our ERP systemAssist with the financial month-end closesReview bills are adequately approved prior to outgoing payments Requirements:6+ years of experience in similar positions. Israeli Payroll Specialist training Experience in MS Office tools with intermediate or advanced Excel skillsBroad knowledge of accounting principles and practices (GAAP), financial policies and procedures, and internal controlsExperience with Israeli payroll and familiarity with payroll lawsStrong team orientation and willingness to help the entire team meet goals and responsibilities.Experience with NetSuite ERP a plusThis is a hybrid role with a minimum of in-office time of two days (not including during training which will require more in-office presence) Working at PIPL:Pipl is an identity trust company that makes sure no one pretends to be you. We do this by understanding the deep connections between the data elements that make up an identity and looking at the big picture. We analyze the relationships of many identifiers such as email, mobile-phone and social-media data that spans the globe.Our identity resolution engine continuously collects, cross-references and connects identity records to create data clusters across the internet and numerous exclusive sources. The result is a searchable index of more than 3.5 billion identity profiles comprising over 3.6 billion phone numbers and 1.7 billion email addresses, with coverage in more than 150 countries.Our API and manual review solutions allow merchants to provide frictionless customer experiences and approve more transactions while reducing chargebacks and the risk of fraud.

Text: We are looking for a forward-thinking Interim Assistant Controller to be part of the financial success team of our quickly-growing company. The Interim Assistant Controller will play an integral role within the accounting team and as such you will:Acting as the focal point between Pipl Search Ltd & the outsourced payroll firm, reviewing their work, and handling onboarding & offboarding and payroll insurance agents. Update monthly revenue trackers.Assist with managing revenue on our ERP system.Assist with billing of complex transactions. Prepare subsidiary data for consolidation.Assist with the financial month-end closes.Review bills are properly approved prior to outgoing payments.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Accounting/Finance/Business or related Field. CPA (Israel) 4-5 years of progressive accounting experience.Experience in MS Office tools with intermediate or advanced Excel skills.Broad knowledge of accounting principles and practices (GAAP), financial policies and procedures, and internal controls (In particular knowledge of revenue recognition ASC 606)interim.Experience with Israeli payroll and familiarity with payroll lawsStrong team orientation and willingness to help the entire team meet goals and responsibilities.Experience with NetSuite ERP- a plus.This is a hybrid role with a minimum of in-office time of two days (not including during training which will require more in-office presence) Working at PIPL:Pipl is an identity trust company that makes sure no one pretends to be you. We do this by understanding the deep connections between the data elements that make up an identity and looking at the big picture. We analyze the relationships of many identifiers such as email, mobile-phone and social-media data that spans the globe.Our identity resolution engine continuously collects, cross-references and connects identity records to create data clusters across the internet and numerous exclusive sources. The result is a searchable index of more than 3.5 billion identity profiles comprising over 3.6 billion phone numbers and 1.7 billion email addresses, with coverage in more than 150 countries.Our API and manual review solutions allow merchants to provide frictionless customer experiences and approve more transactions while reducing chargebacks and the risk of fraud.
Requirements: ['Acting as the focal point between Pipl Search Ltd & the outsourced payroll firm, reviewing their work, and handling onboarding & offboarding and payroll insurance agents.', 'Update monthly revenue trackers.', 'Assist with managing revenue on our ERP system.', 'Assist with billing of complex transactions.', 'Prepare subsidiary data for consolidation.', 'Assist with the financial month-end closes.', 'Review bills are properly approved prior to outgoing payments.', "Bachelor's degree in Accounting/Finance/Business or related Field.", 'CPA (Israel) 4-5 years of progressive accounting experience.', 'Experience in MS Office tools with intermediate or advanced Excel skills.', 'Broad knowledge of accounting principles and practices (GAAP), financial policies and procedures, and internal controls (In particular knowledge of revenue recognition ASC 606)interim.', 'Experience with Israeli payroll and familiarity with payroll laws', 'Strong team orientation and willingness to help the entire team meet goals and responsibilities.', 'Experience with NetSuite ERP- a plus.', 'This is a hybrid role with a minimum of in-office time of two days (not including during training which will require more in-office presence)']

Title: Software Engineering Internship
Location: Raanana, Center District, Israel
Text: About The JobWork on managing services on top of Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform, which is an open source container application platform based on top of the Kubernetes container cluster manager for enterprise application development and deployment. The Red Hat Engineering team is looking for a Software Engineering Intern to join us in Raanana, Israel. You’ll need to have excellent technical and communication skills, as you'll work closely with developers both within Red Hat and in the open source community.What You Will DoHave a key role in developing various projects around Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform customer services that allow customers and System Reliability Engineering (SRE) teams to manage their Red Hat OpenShift clustersBe responsible for the quality of our offerings, participate in peer code reviews, continuous integration (CI), and continuous delivery (CD), and respond to security threatsCoordinate with team leads, architects, and other engineers on product design and architectureWork with Red Hat's global customer support team and partner support teams on resolving customer issuesWhat You Will BringCurrently enrolled in a bachelor’s or master’s degree program with up to 1.5 years of studies remaining before graduationKnowledge of one or more high-level programming languages like Go, Python, Java, or C and C++Ability to learn quickly and to produce quality work with a high level of attention to detailProficient written and verbal communication skills in EnglishCVs must be submitted in English.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a passionate data scientist to join an exciting and growing team in our Data & ML research vertical here at Aporia.In this role, you will get the opportunity to drive insights from large-scale data and build machine learning models to empower our product capabilities and experience.As part of your day-to-day job, you will:Research large, complex datasets for insights and machine learning models development.Test new machine learning techniques and research new methodologies.Communicate training, methodologies, and results with internal stakeholders.Extend existing machine learning open source libraries and frameworks.Research different machine learning use cases, extract data from multiple sources.Requirements3+ years experience as a data scientist or related role.Masters degree in statistics, computer science, mathematics, physics, engineering, or a related field.Experience and understanding of a variety of machine learning techniques (decision trees, clustering, gradient boosting, neural networks, etc.) as well as their practical advantages and disadvantages. A solid understanding of advanced statistical concepts and techniques (outliers, distance, regression, distributions, statistical tests, etc.) as well as experience with applications.An in-depth understanding of mathematics, statistics, and algorithms.Great people skills, team player and can-do attitude

Title: Product Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Wiz, we move quickly. We’ve set the record for the fastest first year revenue growth of any tech startup, the fastest company to acquire more than 25% of the Fortune 500 as customers, the fastest company to reach $1B (and then $6B) in valuation, and now the fastest-growing software company ever by going from $1M to $100M in ARR in just 18 months. Most importantly, we provide the fastest ROI of any security product – Wiz connects to the entire multi-cloud environment within 15 minutes and identifies the specific infiltration vectors that make clouds susceptible to a breach in under 24 hours so organizations of all sizes and industries can rapidly identify and remove the most critical risks in AWS, Azure, GCP, and Kubernetes. Join us as we help organizations create secure cloud environments that accelerate their businesses.SummaryProduct Analysts are a key part of Wiz’s new Cloud Detection and Response capabilities. Join us to implement, research, and build various detections and playbooks using scripting languages, including articulating customer-facing technical descriptions and technical remediations.What You’ll DoResearch and analyze cloud audit logs, and implement new detectionsImplement customer requests and industry standards to make Wiz the market leaderAnalyze cloud services, APIs, and log payloads to model the dataWrite customer-facing descriptions and remediation actionsWhat You’ll BringKnowledge in Cloud, OS, networking, or other security related topicsExperience in security or data analysisScripting capabilities (Python, Rego, R or Matlab and similar)An independent self-learnerCommunication and teamwork skillsIf your experience is close but doesn’t fulfill all requirements, please apply. Wiz is on a mission to build a special company. To achieve our goal, we are focused on hiring Wizards with different backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences.Wiz is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, reproductive health decisions, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, genetic information, political views or activity, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.By submitting your application, you acknowledge that Wiz will process your personal data in accordance with Wiz's Privacy Policy.
Requirements: ['Research and analyze cloud audit logs, and implement new detections', 'Implement customer requests and industry standards to make Wiz the market leader', 'Analyze cloud services, APIs, and log payloads to model the data', 'Write customer-facing descriptions and remediation actions', 'Knowledge in Cloud, OS, networking, or other security related topics', 'Experience in security or data analysis', 'Scripting capabilities (Python, Rego, R or Matlab and similar)', 'An independent self-learner', 'Communication and teamwork skills']

Title: Frontend Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We create a safe space for communities to thrive.OpenWeb is on a mission to improve the quality of conversations online — and build an internet where content creators of every kind are empowered to truly own their audience relationships & thrive independently.We build technologies that are rooted in healthy conversations, transparent first-party data relationships and mutual economic prosperity for all stakeholders. Wherever there is a content creator to empower, a conversation to protect or a community to host — OpenWeb will be there.Today, OpenWeb partners with more than 1,000 top-tier publishers (including Wall Street Journal, New York Times, News Corp, Verizon Media, CBS, Fox News, Hearst, Refinery 29 and more) and hosts 100 million monthly active users.Founded in 2012, OpenWeb has over 220 employees between New York City and Tel Aviv, Kiev, San Diego and Canada, and is backed by Insight Venture Partners, Georgian, Entrée Capital, AltaIR Capital, The New York Times, Samsung Next, Dentsu, Norma Investments, and ScaleUpTogether, we are empowering individuals to take action, and demand more from one another. We're crafting technology that naturally brings people together and fosters healthy discussion—so they have more dinner-table talks and less shouting matches online. It starts with us. Let's take the web back from the trolls - together. Are you in?How You'll Contribute as our Frontend Engineer:Your Mission is to be part of the software development initiatives to drive the OpenWeb Product vision. Take charge. Maintain, develop and create the frontend advertisement unit to build the monetization network product capabilities needed to evolve OpenWeb's business model to achieve success. Teamwork. You will be joining a cross-functional team that embraces an Agile/DevOps culture with an emphasis on ownership, accountability, automation, continuous integration and continuous delivery. Fast paced. You will be supporting the design and development of fast and resilient web applications, along with the refactoring of legacy applications. Quality. You will be responsible for writing high quality, defect-free, secure, extensible, and reusable code, and ensuring that code is protected and tested through rigorous automated testing practices. The Skills and Experience You Bring:4+ years experience in developing frontend web applications at Saas related companiesJavascript, Node.js, React.js, WebPack, HTML, and CSS, and Redux Advantage: Xstate, noSQL databases- Redis, MySQL, and MongoDB. 5+ years using concepts like asynchronous programming, closures, types, and ES6Strong experience with browser API's and optimizing frontend performanceExperience with Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration techniquesExperience with test-driven development and automated testing practicesAdtech knowledgeWeb based 3rd party applicationsBuild your skills with us as you build a better web for everyone. Join us!Also, we care about your privacy! Please take a moment to review OpenWeb's Privacy Practices

Title: Marketing Communications Manager - GBM - Tel Aviv
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Responsibilities TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. Why Join UsAt TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.TikTok for Business is looking for a Marketing Communications Manager to work side by side with the business marketing team and help manage ongoing workflows. In this role you will be expected to lead responsibilities end to end. We're looking for an energetic and proactive self-starter, with orientation to details and very strong people skills.The business marketing team plays a core role in GBS enablement. We're looking for a strategic communications manager that will join us. A Marketing Communications Manager is responsible for driving the effectiveness of multiple digital channels such as PPC, SEO, programmatic, social media, email marketing, and more. Developing end-to-end execution, from content and creative inception to final execution. You'll manage the CRM of TikTok for Business, work closely with the team lead to build a reputation for TikTok for Business , identify risks, engage with key stakeholders and improve efficiency, while performing in-depth analysis.The ideal candidate will have strong project management and communication skills, be a quick learner with the ability to thrive in ambiguity and adjust quickly to changes; able to identify new  opportunities to continually manage reputation and brand position against key topics. A highly-driven, enthusiastic individual who has strong quantitative skills, ability to quickly analyze data and take actions and is looking to work within our B2B Marketing team and build our digital assets.Responsibilities- Manage A-Z efforts for all TikTok for Business online assets, working closely with the B2B team to identify, prioritize and produce consistent positioning and messaging across platforms. - Build, manage and maintain our CRM system, executing reports and in-depth analysis based on clients' touchpoints throughout the year. - Plan and execute 360 campaigns, in small and large scale, paid and/or organic, optimizing them to success, advising on and implementing SEO. - Develop and support our digital infrastructure: WEB, CRM, newsletters, e-learning, socials (organic and paid), Google ads, GDN, landing pages, etc. - Ensure content is synced across platforms and build compelling content strategies that drive backlinks and expand the reach and impact of the TikTok for Business collective voice through amplification of key narratives and initiatives. - Work closely with designers, web developers and other relevant vendors. - Seed pro-active content to desired communities. Qualifications - 5+ years of experience in the online advertising industry, with experience across multiple marketing functions: digital, web, social, integrated marketing, etc. - Bachelor’s degree required with emphasis in marketing or digital equivalent experience. - Marketing experience in a global B2B company with an extensive and demonstrable proven track record of driving performance across multiple channels. - Experience managing CRM with a strong affinity to data analytics. - Proven experience with organic and paid campaigns, on a small and large scale. SEO website, Excel, Adwords, GA and Social media management. - Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required. - High abilities in English content writing.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Title: Senior Scientist – Molecular biology
Location: Rehovot, Center District, Israel
Text: Summary of role and team::As a Senior molecular biologist, you will lead the molecular biology lab and manage genetics-related projects within Future Meat Technologies. You will be part of our biology and genomics team and will collaborate closely with scientific and regulatory experts.Your day-to-day:As the company’s molecular biology expert, you will lead and manage projects related to development and characterization of new cell lines.  You will collaborate with scientists from different divisions within the company. Your collaboration will be required to answer key question in the genomics and metabolomics fields.Plan studies utilizing genomic data to answer biological questions and facilitate the development of new cell lines.You will work closely with our computational biologists to execute analysis of large-scale sequencing data (RNA-seq and whole genome).Communicate findings in simple yet accurate manner in presentations, reports, publications, and patents. Manage Junior scientistThe Ideal candidate:Must-Have:PhD or equivalent in relevant discipline (molecular biology, genetics, biotechnology).Experience in creating, developing, and running cellular assays; engineering cell lines to express or knock-down genes of interest, interrogating cellular signal transduction and metabolic pathways (PCR, rt-PCR, CRISPR genome editing, genotyping, mutagenesis, transfections, stable line generation, DNA and RNA preparation).Experience with cell culture (mammalian or avian, adherent or suspension).Excellent written and verbal communication skills, an ability to mentor junior staff, and a history of building strong professional relationshipsHighly organized and accurate.Ability to multi-task and handle many projects simultaneously under minimal supervisionAbility to work in a dynamic & fast-paced environmentNice to Have:2+ years of experience within industry (pharma, biotech, food) .Experience with metabolic pathways- analysis and manipulations.experience with accurate and diligent documentation of work, reagent preparation and sample tracking (electronic lab notebook).Ability to work independently or as part of a teamProblem-solving mindKnowledge in developmental biology & differentiation

Your collaboration will be required to answer key question in the genomics and metabolomics fields.', 'Plan studies utilizing genomic data to answer biological questions and facilitate the development of new cell lines.', 'You will work closely with our computational biologists to execute analysis of large-scale sequencing data (RNA-seq and whole genome).', 'Communicate findings in simple yet accurate manner in presentations, reports, publications, and patents.', 'Manage Junior scientist', 'PhD or equivalent in relevant discipline (molecular biology, genetics, biotechnology).', 'Experience in creating, developing, and running cellular assays; engineering cell lines to express or knock-down genes of interest, interrogating cellular signal transduction and metabolic pathways (PCR, rt-PCR, CRISPR genome editing, genotyping, mutagenesis, transfections, stable line generation, DNA and RNA preparation).', 'Experience with cell culture (mammalian or avian, adherent or suspension).', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills, an ability to mentor junior staff, and a history of building strong professional relationships', 'Highly organized and accurate.', 'Ability to multi-task and handle many projects simultaneously under minimal supervision', 'Ability to work in a dynamic & fast-paced environment', '2+ years of experience within industry (pharma, biotech, food) .', 'Experience with metabolic pathways- analysis and manipulations.', 'experience with accurate and diligent documentation of work, reagent preparation and sample tracking (electronic lab notebook).', 'Ability to work independently or as part of a team', 'Problem-solving mind', 'Knowledge in developmental biology & differentiation']

Title: Senior Data Analyst
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Roundforest's mission is to simplify shopping. We’re looking for a passionate candidate who gets excited from the opportunity to join our journey and impact 40,000,000 consumers (and counting).Senior Data Analyst objective:Enable data driven decisions at Roundforest, by delivering data insights, monitoring, experiments, and actively contributing to the product and business effortsIn Roundforest, we value creative thinking and therefore often will do things differently. Accordingly, Roundforest's Senior Data Analyst role may differ in a few ways from similar positions out there: We are looking for an all-in-one Analyst that will work closely with Product, Business and Engineering to bring impact to Roundforest.Initiate potential value for product improvements, features and other initiatives, based on data. Translate Product and Business needs into data questions.Design A/B experiments, perform statistical analysis and lead the experiment process, in order to optimize and drive future product developments.Perform market activity analysis and any other analytics that would help guide product and business decision making.Translate research data and findings into actionable and strategic insights using strong storytelling, data visualization, and presentation skills.Define and track KPIs, and be responsible for the data integrity in the organization.Finally, we’re looking for candidates with a ׳hop margin׳ - a secret ingredient we look for in all new hires. In other words, this position requires the candidate to leap into the next phase of their career and to step outside their comfort zones, while maintaining a reasonable learning curve. Let's evolve together!Requirements:2+ years of experience as a Data AnalystStrong analytical skills Expert level SQL Excellent communication skills with ability to communicate conclusions effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.Strong user affinity with solid understanding of product usage and performance.Bonus QualificationsB2C experienceWorking experience in an e-commerce companyExperience planning and analyzing A/B experiments Experience working as a Product AnalystExperience working with BigQuery and LookerDiverse Perspectives-We know that innovation thrives on teams where diverse points of view come together to solve hard problems. As such, we explicitly seek people that bring diverse life experiences, diverse educational backgrounds, diverse cultures, and diverse work experiences. Please be prepared to share with us how your perspective will bring something unique and valuable to our team.
Requirements: ['2+ years of experience as a Data Analyst', 'Strong analytical skills', 'Expert level SQL', 'Excellent communication skills with ability to communicate conclusions effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Strong user affinity with solid understanding of product usage and performance.', 'B2C experience', 'Working experience in an e-commerce company', 'Experience planning and analyzing A/B experiments', 'Experience working as a Product Analyst', 'Experience working with BigQuery and Looker']
