Title: Research Analyst, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?Are you looking for an entry-level role in the software industry that will give you the skills and exposure to move into any speciality later? We’re looking for curious individuals who love searching for meaningful answers.In this role, you’ll be given a business problem and will scour the internet for possible solutions. The problems will come from every area of our business: operations, finance, hiring, engineering, and more - giving you broad exposure.Not only will you gain knowledge, you’ll receive regular coaching and training from a team of global tech experts and operations professionals.Jumpstart your career with us today!What You Will Be DoingResearch a variety of high-priority topics that are critical to the businessEvaluate results against provided evaluation criteriaWhat You Won’t Be DoingResearching the same topics repeatedlyWorking on loosely-scoped research with desired outputs not clearly definedGetting lost chasing tangentially-related solutions; our systems and processes will help you focus your research and optimize your timeResearch Analyst Key ResponsibilitiesProvide high-quality research data to support company-wide business decisionsBasic RequirementsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsBasic financial analysis skillsAbility to work in the US timezoneAbout TrilogyHundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!Working with CrossoverThis is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.What to expect next:You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.Important! If you do not receive an email from us:First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/reset-password if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply. Crossover Job Code: LJ-4718-IL-TelAviv-ResearchAnalys.007
Requirements: ['Research a variety of high-priority topics that are critical to the business', 'Evaluate results against provided evaluation criteria', 'Researching the same topics repeatedly', 'Working on loosely-scoped research with desired outputs not clearly defined', 'Getting lost chasing tangentially-related solutions; our systems and processes will help you focus your research and optimize your time', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Basic financial analysis skills', 'Ability to work in the US timezone', 'You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.', 'Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.', 'First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.', 'Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.', 'Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.', 'If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/reset-password if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.']

Tomamos nuestras decisiones de contratación en función de tu experiencia y habilidades.

Title: Senior Scientist, Cell Biology & Team Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Quris Technologies seeks a motivated and hands-on Senior Scientist and Team Leader to contribute to the development of a multiplexed high throughput in-vitro platform for AI based drug safety prediction.The successful candidate will perform cell-based research to enable the development of the platform and screen drug candidates. This person will also manage and guide the day-to-day activities for a small team of scientists. To achieve this objective, the successful candidate will collaborate cross-functionally with scientists in biosensing, automation, bioinformatics and AI, preclinical research, material sciences and fabrication and beyond.We are a dynamic, collaborative, creative startup with diverse talents and experiences, with offices in Tel Aviv and Boston, Massachusetts.ResponsibilitiesConduct in-vitro experiments including cell culture maintenance, transfection, cell model characterization, and end point assaysCollaborate with the VP of Biology to plan, lead, and execute on key projects to drive research forward and screen drug candidates - provide strategic input as neededOptimize and execute assays to assess gene and protein expression (e.g., qPCR, ELISA, Flow Cytometry, Fluorescence Microscopy), and biological effects (e.g., function, viability, localization, enzymatic activity, signaling pathway activation/inhibition) in cell lines and primary 3D organoid culturesWork closely with other scientists to develop different aspects of the platform Maintain excellent electronic lab notebook records of protocols and experimental detailsSummarize findings in presentations to internal stakeholdersReview literature and work with colleagues to develop new methodologies and protocolsManage the day-to-day activities of a small team of scientists Take the lead on project and experiment scientific strategy - while collecting team feedback, identifying risks and potential solutions as appropriateProvide guidance, mentorship, and support to team members to facilitate professional growthTrack and report on the team’s progress internally to the VP of Biology and in cross-functional forumsProvide regular oral and written communication on all projects and milestones to relevant project teamsRequirements:PhD. in cell biology, biochemistry, biotechnology, and 3+ years related experience (post-doctoral or Industry)Extensive experience in cellular biology techniques and development of in-vitro systems Previous leadership experience - managing a small team of scientists (3+) Demonstrated ability to conduct and progress quality research forward and meet deadlinesExtensive experience working with primary human cells and organoidsExperience in Fluorescence Microscopy, qPCR, ELISA, Flow Cytometry and other biochemical assaysAbility to motivate and work well with different types of personalities and levels of expertiseMust be detail oriented, self-motivated, flexible and able to contribute to several fast-paced projects concurrentlyAbility to work as part of a team as well as independently to analyze, interpret, and present dataExcellent communication and organizational skillsCollaborative spirit and a strong desire to work with researchers from different disciplinesAbility to prioritize and balance multiple projects while problem solving on the go Preferred Qualifications5+ years of laboratory experience either in an academic or industry setting.2+ years industry experience (pharmaceutical/biotechnology setting)Experience working with pluripotent cells (iPSC and ESCs) and differentiation of cells into various lineagesExperience in drug toxicity assaysExperience in biosensingAvailable to work on occasional weekends / long hours to maintain experiments

provide strategic input as needed', 'Optimize and execute assays to assess gene and protein expression (e.g., qPCR, ELISA, Flow Cytometry, Fluorescence Microscopy), and biological effects (e.g., function, viability, localization, enzymatic activity, signaling pathway activation/inhibition) in cell lines and primary 3D organoid cultures', 'Work closely with other scientists to develop different aspects of the platform', 'Maintain excellent electronic lab notebook records of protocols and experimental details', 'Summarize findings in presentations to internal stakeholders', 'Review literature and work with colleagues to develop new methodologies and protocols', 'Manage the day-to-day activities of a small team of scientists', 'Take the lead on project and experiment scientific strategy - Title: Performance Copywriter
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: When it comes to creating revolutionary technology that continues to disrupt the IT market, Atera is paving the way. Located in the heart of sunny Tel Aviv, we develop an automated and easy-to-use platform for IT professionals, designed to proactively identify and solve IT issues before they become a problem for their organization.At Atera, we work to instill the values of openness and transparency within our team and strive to create one of the happiest and healthiest work environments. We’re growing quickly and now have over 10,000 customers across more than 105 countries!We are looking for a curious and fearless Performance Criative Copywriter to join our Performance squad. The Digital Performance Copywriter will be responsible for finding new and creative ways to engage with potential users by creating unexpected, experimental, bold online interactions with IT professionals. The Digital Performance Copywriter will work closely with a team that consists of designers, video creator, motion artist, campaign managers, product marketing managers and strategy researcher, together, they will explore areas of potential engagement in our ecosystem to accelerate growth.Responsibilities:Produce and conceptualize performance-oriented creative copy and content that engages customers and pulls them into the funnel via all marketing channels (including emails, in-app messages, pop-ups, banners, video scripts, templates, webinars, etc)Measure the impact of content created and work with the team to optimize conversion.Develop marketing materials and campaigns to communicate the value proposition of our product.Understand user-profiles of IT market and their needs.Work closely with the Marketing, Operations, and Business teams.Be an integral part of the creative team.Requirements:RequirementsAt least 2 years of experience as a Marketing Copywriter - MUST.A native English speaker with outstanding verbal and written communication skills - MUST.Experience in creating ad copies for paid ads on social media and native in a startup or high-tech company (preferred SAAS B2B).Vast experience in writing video scripts, testimonials, and product walk-throughs.A true marketer with a real understanding of online marketing and user behavior.Solid understanding of UI and UX design and how it relates to copy.Ability to adapt and optimize your copy to hit targets.Ability to work on complex projects and processes alongside agile and experimental tasks.Ability to explain the creative choices based on logic and data.Team player - MUST.An energetic, creative, self-motivated, and self-managing individual who gets things done.Writing portfolio required – Please make sure to include your updated portfolio with your CV.German or French speakers- Advantage.Some Of Our BenefitsAtera is highly collaborative and yes, fun! To support you at work (and play) we offer some fantastic perks: ample time to learn from your teammates and contemporaries, time off to relax and recharge, community volunteer days, an annual budget to support your learning & growth, a company paid trip and lots more.More About AteraSmall and medium IT operators are the heroes behind the scenes supporting companies around the world. They care a lot for their clients (external or internal) and often work virtually 24/7. However, small and medium IT service providers have always been underserved.Atera was built for exactly that. With the vision to simplify and streamline the work of Managed Service Providers and IT professionals. To create something that saves them time, energy, and money. To free them from needing to constantly put out fires.That vision created the remote-first IT management software – enabling IT professionals to shift from reactive task takers to proactive problem solvers.Now operating from our beautiful offices on Rothchild in Tel Aviv, Atera is currently used by thousands and thousands of IT professionals all over the world (105+ countries).As we rapidly grow, our goal remains the same: to transform the IT industry with revolutionary technology, while creating one of the happiest and healthiest work environments in the world.
Requirements: ['Produce and conceptualize performance-oriented creative copy and content that engages customers and pulls them into the funnel via all marketing channels (including emails, in-app messages, pop-ups, banners, video scripts, templates, webinars, etc)', 'Measure the impact of content created and work with the team to optimize conversion.', 'Develop marketing materials and campaigns to communicate the value proposition of our product.', 'Understand user-profiles of IT market and their needs.', 'Work closely with the Marketing, Operations, and Business teams.', 'Be an integral part of the creative team.', 'At least 2 years of experience as a Marketing Copywriter - MUST.', 'A native English speaker with outstanding verbal and written communication skills - MUST.', 'Experience in creating ad copies for paid ads on social media and native in a startup or high-tech company (preferred SAAS B2B).', 'Vast experience in writing video scripts, testimonials, and product walk-throughs.', 'A true marketer with a real understanding of online marketing and user behavior.', 'Solid understanding of UI and UX design and how it relates to copy.', 'Ability to adapt and optimize your copy to hit targets.', 'Ability to work on complex projects and processes alongside agile and experimental tasks.', 'Ability to explain the creative choices based on logic and data.', 'Team player - MUST.', 'An energetic, creative, self-motivated, and self-managing individual who gets things done.', 'Writing portfolio required – Please make sure to include your updated portfolio with your CV.', 'German or French speakers- Advantage.']

Title: Investor Relations Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As an Investor Relations Manager, you will play an impactful role in scaling our company via relationship building with our investor network, from lead generation through deal closure and asset management.You will be the person creating and nurturing relationships with our community of high net worth investors, offering them the opportunity to invest in startups they could not invest in before. By closing deals, you’ll be helping not only the investors in our network, but also startup employees who will be able to become shareholders and participate in the success of the companies they worked so hard to build.About the Role:Manage, nurture and grow a pipeline of interested clients and engage with inbound leads via calls/email/socialGenerating highly qualified leads that produce new sales opportunitiesLead all email marketing efforts for the IR side - Work with marketing to define and execute the email marketing activity for Equitybee’s investor network, analyze and optimize our efforts Work in close collaboration with the Sales team on strategic business initiatives to generate new opportunities.Be able to explain Equitybee’s offerings and the legal investment documents to prospective and current investorsRequirementsA minimum experience of 2 years in sales for financial or investment products - MUSTExperience in working with potential investors from registration to completing their first investment, owning portfolio growth, retention, churn and expansion - MUSTA proven ability to effectively communicate complex concepts in a simple manner, all the way to closing a dealA proven track record of meeting sales goalsNative level Hebrew & English - MUSTA very good understanding of investment and equity mechanics, with specific knowledge about stock optionsA demonstrated ability to achieve strategic goals in a fast-paced environmentExcellent team player that can also work well independentlyPositive attitude and strong work ethicAdvantages:Network of accredited investors - BIG advantageA strong familiarity with the startup ecosystemExperience with secondary transactions, stock options or private offeringsExperience with EXCEL, SQL, LookerBenefits Hybrid work model | Work from our Tel Aviv office & the comfort of your home. Equity | Enjoy a competitive stock option package. Family-friendly | Discover EquityBee’s family-first approach. Parental leave | Get paid parental leave, regardless of gender. Dog-friendly | Join the EquityBee pack by bringing your pet to work. Education fund | Receive a tax-free employee savings plan.  Sick leave | Get paid for sick days from day one. Meal allowance | Enjoy a 1000-NIS monthly meal budget. Work-life balance | Join our frequent virtual and in-person events, happy hours, and hangouts.

Title: Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Job SummarySpot is a dynamic, fast-growing tech startup with headquarters located in Tel-Aviv and additional offices in San Francisco, New York, Washington D.C. and London.Spot is building innovative technology that is revolutionizing the cloud-computing industry and a team of highly motivated and creative employees, our vision is to optimize the way DevOps and R&D teams consume cloud computing.ContainersContainers are redefining how developers and DevOps are building, deploying, and running their applications. Spot Ocean is working on building the future of infrastructure and cluster management for containers while delivering a unique “Serverless Containers” engine that lets developers deploy containers without managing infrastructure.Spot Ocean is looking for a Product Manager to help us execute product strategy and accelerate the adoption of containers in the cloud.As a Product Manager, you will own the execution of our product roadmap in front of engineering, design, marketing, support, documentation and other teams within Spot. You will be in charge of feature definition, prioritization, planning, coordination and release of the Ocean product.Job RequirementsBasic Qualifications: 2+ years of product management experience in the cloud computing (AWS/GCP/Azure) technology space BS or BA in computer science, engineering or math. Demonstrated success working on complex software solutions delivery, including specification writing, closely working with engineers and follow up execution. Solid technical background, with understanding or hands-on experience in Software development or DevOps philosophy. Strong interpersonal skills, ability to influence others and work effectively in a cross-functional team Preferred QualificationsExperience with scheduling and cluster management technologies such as Docker, Azure ACI, GKE Autopilot/Fargate/Kubernetes/Docker Swarm/AWS ECS/Hashicorp Nomad etc. Experience with Cloud Computing Entrepreneurial spirit with a track record for delivering results in fast-moving environments
Requirements: ['2+ years of product management experience in the cloud computing (AWS/GCP/Azure) technology space', 'BS or BA in computer science, engineering or math.', 'Demonstrated success working on complex software solutions delivery, including specification writing, closely working with engineers and follow up execution.', 'Solid technical background, with understanding or hands-on experience in Software development or DevOps philosophy.', 'Strong interpersonal skills, ability to influence others and work effectively in a cross-functional team', 'Experience with scheduling and cluster management technologies such as Docker, Azure ACI, GKE Autopilot/Fargate/Kubernetes/Docker Swarm/AWS ECS/Hashicorp Nomad etc.', 'Experience with Cloud Computing', 'Entrepreneurial spirit with a track record for delivering results in fast-moving environments']

Title: Director of Product Performance
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: AutoLeadStar is leading innovation and disrupting the US digital automotive space. We are replacing data silos with a fully connected and automated data platform (CDXP) that gives control and transparency over the whole customer journey!Our products are constantly evolving to provide smart data-driven solutions to the exciting new challenges raised by a fast-moving industry.We are a growing global team of ~ 100 people based out of Israel and the US. Our team is made of fun, smart, and goals-driven individuals who work in a highly collaborative way. We truly believe in each one’s ability to make a significant impact in any position and strongly encourage internal growth opportunities.We are seeking a talented Director of Product Performance to build and manage our new Performance Department. You will be responsible for analyzing, planning and building a strong Product Performance department while being deeply involved in the weeds of product performance and making a major impact on the scale of the business.The ideal candidate is passionate about data and product, has a strong sense of ownership while being able to grasp and juggle with multiple priorities and stakeholders, and demonstrates leadership skills.This position reports to the CPO.Requirements:3 years experience in building and leading product teams in B2B SaaS companiesStrong data science background (or related)Experience in building performance optimization modelsKnowledge of performance marketing data - strong advantageAbility to integrate different interfaces’ feedback and needs in the performance challengesExcellent English communication skills, both verbal and writtenSelf-learner, multi-tasker, and able to work independentlyPassionate about performance and thrive for continuous improvementResponsibilities:Deep dive into the product performance data and build out models to improve itContinuously look for performance optimization with well thought through processes and solutionsTake full ownership over all product performance aspectsAnalyze performance gaps and scaling needs to build out a performance teamLead and mentor the performance team Initiate & manage cutting-edge projects from inception to deliveryInterface with different departments to understand performance related challenges and collaborate in tackling them

Title: Office Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Armis is looking for a few of the very best people in their field to join our A-team of big thinkers, doers, movers, and shakers. This unique opportunity truly offers the best of all worlds—start up culture, enterprise level benefits and security, and top pay for the industry. Got your attention yet? Good, keep reading, it only gets better.Ok, so what exactly does Armis do?Connected assets are growing at an explosive rate, across every industry and every geo. In today’s world of smart devices and BYOD, these assets come from every direction and are found in every possible environment and industry. And they’re critical to success for every enterprise. And because every single asset represents a very real potential vulnerability, they’re also the last line of defense against today’s sophisticated cyber criminals.Armis gives companies of every size—across every industry and geo—complete asset visibility, contextual intelligence, and continuous security. We have partnerships and integrations with the planet’s leading tech and cybersecurity players. And we’re building an incredibly smart and diverse global team of thought-leading technologists, creative visionaries and proven game changers who are ready to take Armis to the next level.About The PositionWe are looking for a highly energetic Receptionist & Office Manager to join our amazing Operations team in IL.ResponsibilitiesManage and coordinate general office tasks such as office supplies, food orders, office logistics, repairs, maintenance etc.Front Desk Coordination: greet and guide guests, candidates, vendors, and other visitors.Work on global onboarding/offboarding processes and on executing various cross company initiatives.Manage and schedule meeting rooms calendars.Assist the HR Team and other departments with administrative tasks.Support the People team executing site’s events, Happy Hours, fun days, team buildings, off-sites, large meetings and local activities.Perform other duties and ad-hoc special projectsRequirementsRelevant experience in the High-tech industry preferable in startup companies - an advantage.Team player , people person, service orientedA quick learner, confident and independent with excellent personal skills and lots of patienceExcellent organizational skills and ability to prioritize multiple tasksEnergetic, pro-active & creative.Demonstrated customer service skillsFluent English and Hebrew.Willingness to work in a full time position from the office.The choices you make in your career journey matter. You want to do interesting work in an important field while also having time to live your life, which is why we place so much value in your life-work balance. Armis sets you up for success with comprehensive health benefits, discretionary time off, paid holidays including monthly me days, and a highly inclusive and diverse workplace. Put your unique experiences and perspective to work in an environment where they will enable you to thrive, grow, and live your life with integrity.Armis is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We never discriminate based on race, ethnicity, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, marital status or any other legally protected (or not) status. In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to submit satisfactory proof of identity and legal authorization.Please click here to review our privacy practices.

Title: IT Support Admin
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The IT support admin is a part of the company’s IT support team.You will be working in a fast-growing dynamic environment with cutting-edge technologies.Maintain and improve the company’s systems infrastructure while focusing on security protocols.Provide professional service and support for end users and colleagues located in ActiveFence sites. Work on complex and escalated support issues.Work in a fast and dynamic environment.Create/terminate users and working environments (onboarding/offboarding procedures and automation). Requirements:At least 4 years of proven relevant experience in an IT support/Sys Admin role – mustHands-on experience and deep knowledge with ‘Google Workspace’ platform (G-suite) - mustExperience with Network design infrastructure and configuration - mustHands-on experience with troubleshooting and support MacOS and Windows 10/11 devices - mustExperience working with Okta, InfiniPoint, Jamf (the company’s core systems) - a significant advantageExperience with scripting languages (PowerShell, Python, Bash) – advantageExperience in maintaining ‘VMware horizon’ infrastructure – advantageExperience working with AWS cloud platforms (ec2, s3, workspaces) - advantageService-oriented with good communication skills, both verbal and writtenWell-organized with high attention to detailsAbility to learn and implement new technologies.Willingness to be available 24/7 (including weekends) when urgent requests emerge.About ActiveFence:ActiveFence is the leading tool stack for Trust & Safety teams, worldwide. By relying on ActiveFence’s end-to-end solution, Trust & Safety teams – of all sizes – can keep users safe from the widest spectrum of online harms, unwanted content, and malicious behavior, including child safety, disinformation, fraud, hate speech, terror, nudity, and more. Using cutting-edge AI and a team of world-class subject-matter experts to continuously collect, analyze, and contextualize data, ActiveFence ensures that in an ever-changing world, customers are always two steps ahead of bad actors. As a result, Trust & Safety teams can be proactive and provide maximum protection to users across a multitude of abuse areas, in 70+ languages. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors such as CRV and Norwest, ActiveFence has raised $100M to date; employs 300 people worldwide, and has contributed to the online safety of billions of users across the globe.
Requirements: ['Maintain and improve the company’s systems infrastructure while focusing on security protocols.', 'Provide professional service and support for end users and colleagues located in ActiveFence sites.', 'Work on complex and escalated support issues.', 'Work in a fast and dynamic environment.', 'Create/terminate users and working environments (onboarding/offboarding procedures and automation).', 'At least 4 years of proven relevant experience in an IT support/Sys Admin role – must', 'Hands-on experience and deep knowledge with ‘Google Workspace’ platform (G-suite) - must', 'Experience with Network design infrastructure and configuration - must', 'Hands-on experience with troubleshooting and support MacOS and Windows 10/11 devices - must', 'Experience working with Okta, InfiniPoint, Jamf (the company’s core systems) - a significant advantage', 'Experience with scripting languages (PowerShell, Python, Bash) – advantage', 'Experience in maintaining ‘VMware horizon’ infrastructure – advantage', 'Experience working with AWS cloud platforms (ec2, s3, workspaces) - advantage', 'Service-oriented with good communication skills, both verbal and written', 'Well-organized with high attention to details', 'Ability to learn and implement new technologies.', 'Willingness to be available 24/7 (including weekends) when urgent requests emerge.']

Title: Customer Care B3-I
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Customer Service Representative`s main task is to provide best in class customer service to Mars trade partners and to drive excellence in supply chain together with other functions in the market. Systematically work on building and enhancing existing internal and external relationships for accelerated value creation. Be curious and interested in the systems side of the role in order to work efficiently and be able to resolve problems swiftly. Finally, the success in the job is also determined by living the Mars company culture and being actively engaged not only in respective market unit but also in the broader regional community.The position is part of regional Customer Service team, having 10 peers located across the whole region. The position reports to Customer Service Manager for Baltics, Balkans, Adriatic and Israel markets.This particular associate will be responsible for work with Mars distributors in Israel.What are we looking for?High School Diploma.Good communication skills, customer oriented, problem solving, action oriented, strong planning and prioritizing skills.Ability to work independently.Team player, proactive, able to build and maintain relationships within team and outside.Previous experience: experience in similar role is preferable, at least 1-2 years.Systems knowledge: experience using SAP / Atlas is preferable, as well as experience of using office productivity software (such as Microsoft Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint etc.).Fluent in Hebrew and English.What will be your key responsibilities?Processing of all order types, customer claim resolutions, invoicing in timely manner and in accordance with defined procedures.Provide service-oriented customer support on topics related to logistics product information.Provide necessary reports and confirmations that enable efficient execution of period-end and year-end processes.Timely and accurate maintenance of the active range of products for each market in order to avoid any losses during item changes. Align and execute the process of reserving stock for customers in case of planned quotas and ensure that the customers are informed about non-deliveries.Ownership or support with reporting to state authorities (e.g. Intrastat, Green Point Packaging report).Support warehouse, financial, quality and inventory audits.Address deviations from planned performance and KPIs with suitable deep-dives and action plans to improve unsatisfactory performance.Be prepared for quality handovers and efficient succession process.Report and inform internal key stakeholders (and external if needed) about Customer KPIs.Establish a customer collaboration plan for key customers across internal and external stakeholders with the objective to improve customer’s performance KPIs and its engagement.On team level secure a high level of engagement through active participation, positive behaviour and personal development (living Mars Five principles).Plan and devote time and effort to build relationship with customers through physical and virtual meetings in order to improve processes and support each other’s KPIs.Actively participate in and support of regional customer service team meetings to engage knowledge transfer and best practice sharing.Act as a local SAP/Atlas User (testing, new process, solving issues).What can you expect from Mars?Work with over 430 like-minded and talented Associates, all guided by The Five Principles.Join a purpose driven company, where we’re striving to build the world we want tomorrow, today.Best-in-class learning and development support from day one, including access to our in-house Mars University.An industry competitive salary and benefits package, including company bonus.

Title: Art Director
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Communix is the biggest up and coming social gaming start-up and we're looking for a very talented Art Director to lead the product and monetization Art department of Poker Face mobile game.As an Art Director, you’ll be in charge of creating engaging & captivating designs that would attract people to play our game.Requirements:2+ years of experience in managing art/creative teams from the gaming industry.2+ Years of experience of practice in interactive/games/design.Passion for games, UX and Art.Vast knowledge in all needed art disciplines (2D, UI/UX, animation, illustration).Strong knowledge and understanding of concept art, composition UI and animation.Thorough understanding and passion for user experience design.Good knowledge of English.Responsibilities:Create games!Manage a team of Illustrators, UI/UX Designers, Monetization designers, 2D Artist, and Animators. Develop visual concepts and ideas.Overlook a complete game production pipeline.Help build a dynamic, creative environment in which you can create while also motivating and mentoring your team members.Work closely with Product Managers, R&D.Lead rapid iterations and testing on a variety of concepts and features, from wireframes to fully designed compositions.Lead and own, mutually with the marketing team, the creative concepts and flow that will support our growth and monetization efforts in various global markets.Review final products and ensure they are fun and pixel perfect.

Title: QA Developer

Text: We are looking for a QA Developer to oversee our Quality Assurance team. You will be required to oversee all aspects of software and product testing within the company. This may include developing test strategies, drawing up test documents, identifying faults, and reviewing QA reports.To ensure success as a QA Developer you should have knowledge in analytics, high-level problem-solving skills, and the ability to project manage.Responsibilities:Meeting with the software/product designers to determine quality assurance parameters.Writing and working with test case documentation (STD, STP).Implementing testing procedures and overseeing the QA process.Troubleshooting quality issues and modifying test procedures.Conducting analysis checks on product specifications.Reviewing Quality Assurance reports.Manage/execute automated tests.Measure and monitor the production web quality and push the development teams to constantly improve and fix the prioritized bugs.Responding to requests from the design team and management.Requirements:Experience in frontend (web) and backend testing.High-level analytical skills.Experience with databases & Postman - Advantage1-2 Experience with QA methodology and testing processesAdvanced written and verbal communication skills.Ability to read logs and identify critical informationExperience in creating, setting up, running and analyzing QA testsExperience with working in an agile methodology. – AdvantageProven strong technical skills with the ability to deep dive into complex problems and find their root cause.Detail oriented with an ability to see the bigger picture.Self-motivated and independent.

Title: SOC Analyst
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are Cognyte , the global leader in security analytics software, and we are looking for an exceptional and passionate SOC Analyst, to join our Legal unit in Herzliya, Israel.If you want to apply your expertise and well-honed skills in the field of computer forensics, operating systems and:are driven by curiosity,thrive on solving the most complex security challenges, andwant a unique opportunity to grow and contributein an exciting and rewarding environmentthen we want to meet you!Your impactInvestigating cyber security incidents and suspicious activities that are related to information securityEscalating cyber security incidents according to SOC proceduresCollaborating with technical teams to resolve and mitigate cyber security incidentsAssisting with the containment and remediation of cyber security threatsSupporting users with information security requests according to Cognyte’s policiesExpanding the team knowledge base and act to expand its operational abilitiesRequirements:Your tool boxTechnical knowledge in networking, Windows and Linux, familiarity with informational security products (or BSc student in computer science, engineering)Familiarity with cyber attacks and known malwaresGood English (written and spoken)Ability to work in flexible hours to accommodate 24/7 operations coverage on siteAbility to work 4-5 shifts per week including a minimum of 3 morning shifts on Sunday-Thursday Nice to haveFamiliarity with known investigation tools.Basic knowledge in SQL or pythonWhy Cognyte is your perfect matchWe’re a values-driven business with a strong passion for innovation that makes a meaningful impact on the world around us. We are calling out to YOU - the curious minds of the world, who are looking to break new ground and bring innovative ideas to life.If this describes you, we could be your perfect match!Curious? Apply now.

Title: איש/אשת צוות הגנת הסייבר
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: תיאור הפעילויות והמטלות המרכזיות בתפקיד:חלק מצוות הגנת הסייבר המנחה ומבקר פרויקטים, מאתר סיכונים למידע ומגבש פתרונות להקטנתם.ליווי פרויקטים טכנולוגיים בהיבטי אבטחת מידע ותשתית בכל שלבי מחזור החיים בפרויקט.הגדרת צרכי אבטחת מידע, מציאה והטמעת פתרונות מתאימים, התאמת טכנולוגיות רלוונטיות וביצוע בחינה טכנולוגית לשיפור מערך אבטחת המידע.שותפות בתכנון ארכיטקטורה מאובטחת בהתאם למדיניות החברה.ליווי סקרי אבטחה ומבדקי חדירה ותיקופם.סריקות שוטפות ועפ"י מודיעין, לאיתור חשיפות בציוד מחשוב ברשת, לרבות ציוד תקשורת, וייזום פעילות לתיקון החשיפותRequirements:לפחות שנתיים ניסיון בתפקיד דומה או בתפקידים אחרים בצוות אבטחת מידע - חובה.ניסיון באבטחת מידע בארגון פיננסי גדול - יתרון.הסמכות בתחום אבטחת מידע CISSP, CISM- יתרון.ידע בחשיפות אבטחת מידע ברמת מערכות הפעלה ותקשורת והדרכים לטיפול בהן- יתרון.ידע בעולמות מחשוב הענן ועולם המובייל- יתרון.הכרת עקרונות בארכיטקטורה, תקשורת, פרוטוקולים, ואפליקציות- יתרון.ידע בתקשורת והבנה בעולם הסיסטם והתשתיות- יתרון.יכולת עבודה ותקשורת מול ממשקים רבים בארגון כגון: גורמים עסקיים, טכניים, חברי הנהלה- יתרון.

Title: Head of R&D
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About The PositionAt Second Nature, we’re building a state-of-the-art dialogue system that changes how sales teams speak to their prospects. We’re working with some of the largest companies in the world, helping them onboarding new team members, master product presentations and better understand their clients’ needs.Our engineering team develops voice and conversational AI technologies to support this unique training platform, and we’re looking for a Head of R&D to lead it.In this role, you will:Manage a team of highly qualified professionals with diverse personal and professional backgrounds. Setting team goals aligned with business priorities Establishes prioritization work processes to ensure value-based utilization of resources Ensures robust product development process practices and implementation of functional excellence initiatives. Coaching and mentoring the R&D org Member of the company’s management team. Requirements:We’re excited to have you since you’ve got:Bachelor’s Degree or higher in a Science or Engineering Field 5+ years of people management Proven leadership experience managing a team of direct reports (developing high performers, managing poor performance, structuring teams for success and change) A passionate leader with experience in developing leaders and high performers, while motivating teams for optimal success. Highly motivated leader with strong self-awareness Action oriented strategic thinker, with a natural ability to collaborate with a wide array of stakeholders It would be awesome (but not a must) if you’ve got:Previous experience in AI/NLP domain

Title: Bioinformatics Scientist- Image Analysis
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: You will be joining a multi-disciplinary team of bioinformaticians and biologists to tackle the most burning questions of the pharmaceutical industry using cutting-edge data.You will run the pipelines that generate and integrate machine-learning models of the immune system. Disease models are dynamic and constantly improve as data accumulates. These models are based on human clinical and molecular data and are employed for deciphering disease mechanisms, identifying biomarkers of drug response, identifying novel drug targets, and predicting combinations.Requirements:MSc in Biomedical Informatics, Computational Biology or related disciplines 2+ years of hands-on experience in omics data analysisExperience in working with spatial transcriptomics data or image analysis Comfort in running existing pipelines Experience in R Strong communication skills with fluency in English Responsibilities:Operate and maintain the existing pipelines for QC, processing and integration of new datasets and data types into company’s Disease Model collection Work closely with immunologists to explore the data, build and execute analysis plans and test the resultsWork with our core team to implement new algorithms, specifically focusing on image analysis and spatial transcriptomic data into existing pipelines to push our technology even furtherAdvantages:Experience analyzing diverse data types (e.g. cell, proteomics, microbiome) Background in Immunology Experience working in a team with biologists
Requirements: ['MSc in Biomedical Informatics, Computational Biology or related disciplines', '2+ years of hands-on experience in omics data analysis', 'Experience in working with spatial transcriptomics data or image analysis', 'Comfort in running existing pipelines', 'Experience in R', 'Strong communication skills with fluency in English', 'Operate and maintain the existing pipelines for QC, processing and integration of new datasets and data types into company’s Disease Model collection', 'Work closely with immunologists to explore the data, build and execute analysis plans and test the results', 'Work with our core team to implement new algorithms, specifically focusing on image analysis and spatial transcriptomic data into existing pipelines to push our technology even further', 'Experience analyzing diverse data types (e.g. cell, proteomics, microbiome)', 'Background in Immunology', 'Experience working in a team with biologists']

Title: Product Marketing Leader
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who are we?Papaya Global is an established B2B tech unicorn in hypergrowth. We are on a mission to reimagine the payroll category with a game-changing, disruptive technology.Papaya Global is reinventing workforce management, global payroll and payroll payments to remove the friction of complexity and regulation create. Our automated platform helps companies hire, onboard, manage, and pay people in more than 160 countries.We don’t just cover the globe with our solution; we are global. We are comprised of people from different countries, different cultures, and different backgrounds. Diversity is our secret weapon.We are seeking an action-oriented, product marketer Leader who is craving to be part of a great company, disruptive product offering, and fast-growing industry. The Product Marketing Leader will Lead our product marketing team and will be responsible for driving key elements of our GTM strategy, product launches, creating sales enablement content, supporting digital campaigns, events and developing persona-based solution messaging.The ideal candidate demonstrates attention to detail and quality, along with the ability to clearly present our value proposition and describe how we solve our buyers’ problems.You will:Work across teams to develop impactful persona-based messaging, value propositions, and supporting collateral that describes the unique benefits of Papaya GlobalCoordinate and execute product launches including messaging and positioningCollaborate with sales, product management, and other teams to develop product marketing content to support our GTM strategy.Develop content such as case studies, videos, eBooks, infographics, and blog posts.Manage the creation and regular updates of the website content, ensuring that the latest messaging is represented.Requirements:Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience.5+ years of experience in Product Marketing or equivalent in a SaaS tech companyStrong persona-based messaging experienceFamiliarity of HCM, Payroll, or EoR systems – advantageExceptional people and management skills to interact with colleagues, cross-functional teams, and third parties.Very strong written and oral communication skills, an excellent storytellerRobust experience with social media and community participation.
Requirements: ['Work across teams to develop impactful persona-based messaging, value propositions, and supporting collateral that describes the unique benefits of Papaya Global', 'Coordinate and execute product launches including messaging and positioning', 'Collaborate with sales, product management, and other teams to develop product marketing content to support our GTM strategy.', 'Develop content such as case studies, videos, eBooks, infographics, and blog posts.', 'Manage the creation and regular updates of the website content, ensuring that the latest messaging is represented.', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience.', '5+ years of experience in Product Marketing or equivalent in a SaaS tech company', 'Strong persona-based messaging experience', 'Familiarity of HCM, Payroll, or EoR systems – advantage', 'Exceptional people and management skills to interact with colleagues, cross-functional teams, and third parties.', 'Very strong written and oral communication skills, an excellent storyteller', 'Robust experience with social media and community participation.']

Title: Support Operator - Entry Level
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Pontera is a venture-backed FinTech startup revolutionizing wealth management by making it possible for financial advisors to actively manage 401(k) and other held away accounts. Our solution empowers advisors to offer comprehensive, holistic services to their end clients, and enables end clients to rest assured that the entirety of their portfolios are purposely directed. Pontera clients range from Fortune 100 financial services firms and large independent broker dealers to small independent RIA’s and advisory firms.At Pontera, we are proud of our People-First mentality and culture. You will have the unique and exciting opportunity to be part of a team whose mission is to scale Pontera into one of the largest FinTech companies in the world. We have significant funding from some of the most notable venture capital investors in the world and are in a period of hyper-growth. The next critical step in our trajectory is adding to our world-class team, and that’s where you come in.Pontera is looking for an exceptional Support Operator to join our team.You will be responsible for managing data, gathering insights, and connecting the dots. Working closely with our research and development team.This is an ENTRY-LEVEL role (NO academic degree needed or experience required) and you’ll find yourself with a massive opportunity for growth, with support from management and mentors. You’ll gain invaluable experience and real-time gratification in a place where your work and your efforts will be instantly seen and felt.ResponsibilitiesGathering and analyzing dataFinding patterns and trends in the analyzed dataRequirementsEntry level: No degree or previous experience is requiredExcellent English communication skills – a mustProficiency with Microsoft Excel - an advantageOutstanding team player and collaboratorSelf-motivated and a self-learner.Exceptional attention to detail and strong analytical thinkingA "can do” approach.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environmentWhat We OfferThe opportunity to have a major impact and have exposure to all aspects of a fast-growing startup that is revolutionizing the FinTech industryA collegial, collaborative, fun work environmentCompetitive compensationGenerous PTO daysEquity participationA hybrid office WFH work model in our Herzliya office Monday-Wednesday; work from home Sundays and ThursdaysComprehensive insurance benefitsMeal stipend

Title: R&D Group Leader
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!The person in this role will lead the R&D group that will be developing next-generation solutions of WSC Sports and will have end-to-end ownership and will be responsible for all aspects of development in the group, consisting of Backend and Frontend teams - from technologies to processes to people management.You’ll report to the VP of R&D and be a part of the engineering management team, establishing the engineering vision, goals, and culture.What you’ll do:Be an inspiring leader. Such an individual that people wish to follow and work with.Manage a growing group of ~35 strong team members, led by 4 strong team leaders.Lead the design, architecture, and scaling up of our solution, as well as maintain an agile development process.Be responsible for the overall planning, execution, and success of complex technical projects.Improve the group performance and effectiveness.Take responsibility for recruiting and scaling the team to support its growth needs.Develop, mentor, and grow the group leadership.Requirements:What you’ll need:8+ years of experience in Software Engineering2+ years of experience of leading team leaders and a cross-functional team of 30+ high performing engineersTeam player, empathetic, and someone who thrives working in a fast-paced environmentProven track record developing large-scale solutions, including software design and development, database architectures, security, and performance tuningExperience deploying and maintaining a 24/7 production environmentExcellent problem-solving and decision-making skillsExcellent communication skillsGreat collaboration and cross-functional organizational skills

Title: Senior IT Support
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Zynga Israel is looking for an exceptional on-site Senior IT Support Technician to work in our world-class IT support team based at our Tel Aviv (Israel) Studio. As a Senior IT Support Technician, you will play an integral part of supporting, building relationships and improving the future of Zynga corporate desktop support services across multiple studios. You can work on your own initiative just as well as working and leading your local team plus in a geographically dispersed team where collaboration is second nature to you.Reporting to the IT Support Manager, the Senior IT Support will work across multiple support platforms, systems, and software in a truly Global IT organization. They will be required to assist with the support activities plus lead and/or contribute to project related work. The ideal candidate will build and maintain strategic partnerships with the Global Senior IT Support Technicians, business leaders and our studios to support Incidents, requests, and projects.If you’re a strong, dynamic, Senior IT with a proven track record and a passion for technology, we want to hear from you!Main ResponsibilitiesManaging JML (Joiners, Movers, and Leavers), individually and/or with the wider IT Support team across EMEA. Providing IT Onboarding orientations for New Hires. Working tightly with local Work Place Experience teams and People OPs to fulfill JML successfully.Troubleshoots, maintains, and monitors internal hardware, software, printers, and scanners. Provide support to remote workers and vendors. Ensure customer satisfaction by taking ownership of issues, communicating status information appropriately and providing resolutions within the agreed service levels and timely escalation to other support teams as necessary.Contribute to building policies, processes, and procedures in alignment with global standards to ensure efficient and effective service delivery.Proactively monitor the support queues to ensure BAU activity (Incidents and Requests) are fulfilled within defined target SLA as well as raising orders for hardware and software requests.Provide Tier 1 and 2 support at desk side, via phone, email, chat, or remote toolsMaintain and support all IT end-user equipment, hardware, software, Wikis, and supplies in accordance with the defined standards. Contribute to and where required manage IT projects in line with defined standardsProvide training / education of new tools & services for end-users. Create and help maintain documentation including inventory, configuration, procedures as they relate to the IT Support environmentCollaborate with IT Teams across Networking, Engineering, and Applications to fulfill IT Support successfully. Collaborate with the cybersecurity team to assist with critical cybersecurity incidentsRequirements:Requirements:7+ years of IT experience, with a minimum of 3+ years in a Senior IT Support Technician role.Experience with support of Mac / Jamf Cloud and PC / Configuration via SCCM/Intune/AutopilotExperience with administering SCCM, JAMF, Apple Business Manager, Microsoft 365, Intune, MDM and providing PC, Mac and iOS end-user support.Microsoft and Active Directory, Windows Workstations and Apple macOSExcellent interpersonal skills including ability to communicate effortlessly and effectively, both in writing and verbally, with all levels of the organizationHigh attention to detail & able to manage & prioritize own workload and also the support teamStrong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and ability to work effectively within a team as well as on their own initiativeHelp mentor staff on core products and technologies, able to document solutions and create knowledge articlesStrong technical troubleshooting, problem resolution and decision-making skills.Experience with participating in technical projects and structured working style with ability to plan and prioritize workload.Able to exercise sound judgment within defined procedures and practices to determine appropriate action. Flexible to work at other Zynga studios if required, to help with cover and projects.Technically Proficient in:Apple Macs and Windows Devices: hardware and operating systemsProductivity, Email, and Collaboration Platforms: Exchange Online, Office 365, G-Suite Slack, Jira, ZoomIAM, SSO & MFA: Okta, DuoDesktop Networking Core Windows Services: Active Directory, DNS, DHCP JamfCloud, Intune MDM, SCCM, and Microsoft Autopilot JIRA Service Desk including ticketing and issue trackingDesirable:Microsoft and Apple desktop OS certificationsITIL certified and project management experienceJIRA for project management & ConfluenceServiceNow

Title: Marketing Operations
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are currently seeking a marketing operations to join our fast-paced company with a success driven culture.As a marketing operations you will be responsible for executing our marketing strategy. You will focus on devising and carrying out various campaigns and activities, events and operations (in both the online and offline spheres). You will report directly to the CMO as well as assist various departments within the organization.This role is ideal for a passionate, highly organized, marketing- savvy and data-driven individual with excellent communication skills who also likes to have fun!Responsibilities:Plan and execute ongoing campaigns, tools and processes required to run an effective marketing ecosystem.Work closely with relevant stakeholders across marketing, sales and product teams to execute and monitor campaigns.Track, analyze and optimize marketing campaign metrics against goals.Execute event operations both locally and globally.Execute the company’s digital marketing strategy (including website, email marketing, social media, SEO and marketing automation tools).Requirements:3+ years of experience in marketing roles from startup company, including project management with internal and external stakeholders, - Required.Strong execution and project management capabilities.Superb organizational skills: highly- organized, hands-on, detail and process- oriented, methodological, well- organized.A highly motivated and creative individual.Proactive team player, curiosity to learn and grow, fast learnerExcellent English- written and spokenQualifications:Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communication, business development or equivalent.

Title: Web Project Manager
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: חברת abra מגייסת מנהל פרויקטים WEB לפעילות יישום אסטרטגיות.במסגרת התפקיד: אחריות מלאה על ניהול כלל הפרויקטים הדיגיטליים המתקיימים ברשות תוך עמידה באיכות, תקציב ולוחות זמנים , תקנות אבטחת מידע . תחומי אחריות תכנון ובניית תוכנית עבודה של מחזור חיי הפרויקט משלב התכנון עד שלב המסירה ותחזוקה. מילוי הוראות המנהל האחראי לפרויקט, יישום, קידום, תכנון העבודה ושלביה, מנהל הפרויקט יהיה אחראי על עמידה בלוחות זמנים של הפרויקט ביצוע של מעקב ובקרת לו"ז ותקציב.תיאום בין יחידות פונקציונליות שונות.גיוס צוות הפרויקט, הקצאה וקבלת שאר חברי הצוות בקרה תקציבית וניהול הסיכונים לכל אורך הפרויקטמה אנחנו מחפשים?בעל ניסיון של לפחות 4 שנים אחרונות בניהול כל שלבי היישום כמנהל פרויקט ראשי, ניהול כל תכולת הפרויקט משלבי: אפיון פיתוח התקנההטמעה ומסירה של אתרי אינטרנטבעל תואר ראשוןבוגר קורס גבוה בתחום תכנות בהיקף 400 שעות לפחות או הנדסאיבוגר מגמת מחשבים/טכנולוגיה

Title: QA Engineer
Location: Givatayim, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: WSC Sports develops an AI-based automation solution for real-time sports content creation and distribution and is the fastest-growing sports-tech company in the world.Why WSC Sports:You’ll work in an awesome environment alongside some of the most innovative people around, using cutting-edge technologies and tools (video editing, AI, data, etc.), and have the opportunity to directly influence the products and tools used by our clients who include sports giants such as the NBA, Bundesliga, FIBA, ESPN and more. And that’s just the beginning of what WSC Sports has to offer!What you’ll do:Learn new technologies, debug, and solve complex problems.Be responsible for the testing life cycle from planning via execution to release.Conduct tests in various manners including manual, regression.Maintain a high level of quality across all products.Work closely with developers, QA, and Product Managers.Requirements:What you’ll need:Minimum 2 years of experience in manual software testing.Strong writing and understanding of SQL and NoSQL databases.Vast knowledge of QA methodologies including plan, design, execution, and reporting.Experience in testing web applications and server-side applications (API, databases).Strong analytical skills with a methodical approach to problem-solving.Excellent verbal and written English skills.Highly independent, passionate, self-motivated, teamwork skills, autodidact.Bonus Points:Familiarity with Windows-based systems and some admin/shell knowledge.Passionate about sports.Bachelor’s in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/any related fields.Experience with adapting and executing automation - Selenium with C# or Java.
Requirements: ['Learn new technologies, debug, and solve complex problems.', 'Be responsible for the testing life cycle from planning via execution to release.', 'Conduct tests in various manners including manual, regression.', 'Maintain a high level of quality across all products.', 'Work closely with developers, QA, and Product Managers.', 'Minimum 2 years of experience in manual software testing.', 'Strong writing and understanding of SQL and NoSQL databases.', 'Vast knowledge of QA methodologies including plan, design, execution, and reporting.', 'Experience in testing web applications and server-side applications (API, databases).', 'Strong analytical skills with a methodical approach to problem-solving.', 'Excellent verbal and written English skills.', 'Highly independent, passionate, self-motivated, teamwork skills, autodidact.', 'Familiarity with Windows-based systems and some admin/shell knowledge.', 'Passionate about sports.', 'Bachelor’s in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/any related fields.', 'Experience with adapting and executing automation - Selenium with C# or Java.']

Title: Sales development representative
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
