Title: JUNIOR ANALYST - Dubai, UAE
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence What We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term ResponsibilitiesDeveloping new trading tools, strategies and improve existing ones Conducting fundamental research & analysis using Python Working hand in hand with the tech team to implement new business ideas Spearheading entry into new markets/ fields Upholding and living our cultural values Basic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skills Ability to think clearly in critical situations Passion, resilience, and integrity Preferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Analyst. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.
Requirements: ['Lifelong learning with continuous reflection', 'Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas', 'The team is more important than the individual', 'Being the best in any market we enter', 'Hiring and keeping only the most effective people', 'Others must benefit from our existence', 'A full-time position on our Commercial team', 'Committed and remarkably talented colleagues', 'Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance', 'An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career', 'Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business', 'Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term', 'Developing new trading tools, strategies and improve existing ones', 'Conducting fundamental research & analysis using Python', 'Working hand in hand with the tech team to implement new business ideas', 'Spearheading entry into new markets/ fields', 'Upholding and living our cultural values', 'Excellent numerical and logical reasoning skills', 'Ability to think clearly in critical situations', 'Passion, resilience, and integrity']

Title: IT Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About Unit:Unit is building the platform to power the next generation of financial services. Our mission is to help companies expand financial access for all. Our simple and powerful banking-as-a-service API helps companies launch bank accounts, cards, payments, and lending in weeks - not years.Unit was founded by a team with deep fintech and financial services experience and the first banking-as-a-service platform to reach unicorn status. We have raised over $169 million to date from top investors including Insight Partners, Accel, Better Tomorrow Ventures, Aleph, and Flourish and serve 140+ customers including AngelList, Honeybook, Roofstock, and many more.The Role:We are looking for a hands-on IT Specialist to lead our IT efforts. In this role, you will support the overall planning, organizing, and execution of all IT functions across all of our offices. Your day-to-day will include managing and tracking all software subscriptions, maintaining hardware assets, providing ongoing support for our office infrastructure, ensuring that proper regulatory policies and security processes are in place.Key Responsibilities:Installing, configuring, and maintaining company computersManage all aspects of employee endpoints using MDM softwareSet up automatic enforcement of regulatory and security policiesBeing responsible for the maintenance, configuration, and reliable operation of computer systems and networksDefine IT infrastructure roadmap, architecture, and processes and manage ongoing IT projectsLeading desktop and Helpdesk support efforts, making sure all desktop applications, workstations, and related equipment problems are resolved in a timely manner with limited disruptionsExecute and continue to finetune hardware purchasing, logistics, and inventory processes for employeesDeploy and maintain networking, video conferencing, and other physical equipment in our Tel Aviv office and support our US-based offices remotely Work in a hybrid environment Mac/Windows.Work closely with our security and devops teamsWhat We're Looking For?:At least 3 years in an IT or sysadmin-focused role, including experience with end-user supportExperience managing Google WorkspaceExperience setting up and working with MDM softwareAdvanced troubleshooting capabilities with Mac OS and Windows, networking equipment, and SaaS integrationsExperience working with third-party hardware, software, and logistics vendorsExperience with Okta/Other, SSO integrations, and configuring SaaS applicationsA people person with excellent communication skills in Hebrew and EnglishHigh level of independence and time management skillsLeadership experience - AdvantageExperience with Fintech regulations (SOC2, PCI) - AdvantageLife at Unit:Working at Unit means joining a global team on a mission to create a more equitable financial ecosystem.We’re a fast-growing team of individuals who are passionate about their work, see the big picture and always seek to empower our clients and their end-customers.

Title: Junior Auditor
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As a global accounting practice, we are growing our Audit and Advisory division rapidly in Israel, and are looking for an Audit Junior to join our team. The ideal candidate will be well organized with attention to detail, and ability to work towards deadlines. They should have a passion for analysis of financial data and ability to multitask. No prior audit experience is necessary. Responsibilities·        Execute a portfolio of audit clients·        Ensure proper execution and completion of assignments under supervision·        Client liaison·        Involvement in special projects on an ad hoc basisQualifications·        Bachelor of Commerce degree or working towards a degree·        Knowledge of Microsoft Office suite·        Strong organizational and analytical skills·        Detail orientedאנו מגדילים את חטיבת הביקורת והייעוץ שלנו בישראל, ומחפשים אחר Audit Junior להצטרף לצוות שלנו.קורות החיים האידיאלים יהיו של מועמד/ת מאורגנים היטב תוך הקפדה על פרטים, ויכולת לעמוד ביעדים ובלוחות זמנים. עליהם להיות בעלי תשוקה לניתוח נתונים פיננסיים ויכולת לבצע מספר משימות. אין צורך בניסיון קודם בתחום הביקורת. אחריות:·        לבצע ביקורת על תיקי לקוחות·        השלמת מטלות בצורה תקינה ותחת פיקוח·        התנהלות ישירה מול לקוחות·        מעורבות בפרויקטים מיוחדים לפי הצורך במחלקהכישורים:·        תואר ראשון או במהלך סיום התואר בחשבונאות·        ניסיון עבודה והכרות טובה עם Microsoft Office·        יכולות ארגוניות ואנליטיות חזקות·        יכולת ירידה לפרטים ועבודה עם מדויקת·        אנגלית ברמה טובה מאוד·        עברית ברמת שפת אם

Title: Creative Design Team Lead
Location: Holon, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DealHub is a hyper-growth company and we’re looking for a Lead/TL Creative Brand & Marketing Designer to lead the designers in our amazing Creative & Design team.What you’ll do:You are a hands-on design leader, who’s in charge of the brand design. As the leading designer, you will help shape the way we communicate to our global audience, across all our digital channels. Using your vast experiences in the field, you will inspire the design team and drive awareness, traffic and demand.You’ll guide the team to develop their craft and become excellent professionals and have a consistent record of delivering highly effective marketing campaigns with cross-functional teams. Understand and analyze performance data and come up with creative solutions.This is a great opportunity to be a part of a creative team that is making waves to build and expand our brand awareness and reach our global customers.Are you ready to join us? We want to hear from you!Requirements:5+ years experience in marketing design and user acquisition, with at least 1-year experience as a leader.Strong leadership and social skills.Strong conceptual designer and thinker.B2B experience is an advantage.Experience with performance data.Experience in working on brand books.Strong presentation skills.Excellent organizational skills and ability to prioritize and meet deadlines.Focus on execution as well as concepting. Have the skills needed to deliver in a fast paced environment.Self-motivated with the ability to work both independently and as a team player.Understands and is passionate about KPIs, testing, and optimization.Strong portfolio with a deep UI/UX understanding and marketing assets.Have a keen eye for the small details.Up-to-date on the latest trends in the design world with a strong interest in learning new things.Illustration skills - an advantage.Expert at using common design tools - Figma, Photoshop, Indesign, Illustrator.After Effects & Premiere pro - advantage.An understanding of marketing lingo - advantageFlexibility to work on a variety of projects with diverse audiences, formats, and KPI’s.A problem solver who can think outside the box when encountering issues.A leader who can take each project from concept to launch.Good verbal and written communication skills in English.Bachelor’s degree in graphic design or related visual communication design field - A MUSTGood vibes!

Title: Data Center Project Manager
Location: Hod HaSharon, Center District, Israel
Text: MedOne has been leading Israel’s Data Center market, providing comprehensive hosting services to Israel’s largest organizations. With 4 underground data centers' spanning over 25,000 square meters, MedOne provides hosting, backup and business continuity services with the highest SLA, resiliency, and the best standard of security.The company is growing, and we are looking for a Data Center Project Manager.We are responsible for designing, building, and operating our unified data centers; managing the demand planning and capacity utilization of our unified infrastructure; and responsible for all operations needed to run the physical infrastructure (including supply chain, hardware, power, security, and workflow teams). We focus on smart growth with an emphasis on automation, data driven engineering, cost-effectiveness and environmental sustainability.ResponsibilitiesAs a successful Datacenter Project Manager, your performance objectives will consist of:Create and manage end-to-end project plans and ensure on time deliveryEstablish and enhance strong working relationships with customersPlan, managed, and communicated end-to-end project plans with stakeholders and teamsIdentify risks, gaps, and opportunities and communicate to stakeholders and other teams to drive resolutionGather and provide feedback on lessons learned best practices, and innovations on processes/procedures and tools to improve efficiencies and productivityWork with various Engineering, Operations, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineers, DC Build Managers, and Regional Technical Infrastructure Managers during project planning and executionRequirements:Required Skills And Experience3+ year's experience in Project Management positions, Technical focus3+ years experience in Data Center / Computer roomStrong written, verbal in English and interpersonal skills﻿Preferred Skills And ExperienceDemonstrated ability to understand and discuss technical concepts, manage trade-offs, incorporate feedback, and evaluate opportunistic new ideas with a variety of internal and external stakeholdersProven track record for being detail-oriented with a demonstrated ability to self-motivate and follow-through on projectsProven track record of taking ownership and driving results.Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a dynamic and high-pressure environment

Title: Senior Mechanical Engineer - R&D
Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening in-hospital complications such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real-time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster.We are looking for an experienced Mechanical Engineer to join our collaborative and growing R&D department. As a member of the mechanical team, you will be responsible for developing company products and transferring them to production, as well as being involved in full product lifecycle.Roles and Responsibilities:  Work in cross-functional project teams to design, develop and verify modifications to company products. Investigate and determine root cause of both latent and emerging design, manufacturing, or material defects. Develop, implement, test and document solutions for defects according to company standards and departmental operating procedures. Investigate clinical requirements. Provide mechanical engineering support for resolution of field and manufacturing issues.Requirements: B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering. Minimum 3 years experience designing commercial mechanical products. Experience in mechanism design, plastics, and/or disposable medical products is a strong plus. Comfortable with all phases of product development lifecycle including design, implementation, debug, verification, qualification, and transfer to manufacturing. Proficiency using CAD to design and document mechanisms; SolidWorks -mandatory. Mechanical design and analysis skills, including statics, dynamics, kinematics, strength of materials and stress analysis. Demonstrated knowledge of component manufacturing processes (including machining, wire EDM, electropolish, injection molding.) Medical product experience preferred.
Requirements: ['Work in cross-functional project teams to design, develop and verify modifications to company products.', 'Investigate and determine root cause of both latent and emerging design, manufacturing, or material defects.', 'Develop, implement, test and document solutions for defects according to company standards and departmental operating procedures.', 'Investigate clinical requirements.', 'Provide mechanical engineering support for resolution of field and manufacturing issues.', 'B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering.', 'Minimum 3 years experience designing commercial mechanical products. Experience in mechanism design, plastics, and/or disposable medical products is a strong plus.', 'Comfortable with all phases of product development lifecycle including design, implementation, debug, verification, qualification, and transfer to manufacturing.', 'Proficiency using CAD to design and document mechanisms; SolidWorks -mandatory.', 'Mechanical design and analysis skills, including statics, dynamics, kinematics, strength of materials and stress analysis.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of component manufacturing processes (including machining, wire EDM, electropolish, injection molding.)', 'Medical product experience preferred.']

Title: Data Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We offer a hybrid work environment. Most US-based positions can also be performed remotely (any exceptions will be noted in the Minimum Qualifications below.)For Israel-based positions, we encourage working from our Saarona, Tel Aviv office a few days a week, meeting your colleagues, and having a flexible work environment.Our Mission:To a ctively connect people to their next great opportunity.Who We Are: ZipRecruiter is a leading online employment marketplace. Powered by AI-driven smart matching technology, the company actively connects job seekers with millions of businesses of all sizes through innovative mobile app, web, and email services, as well as partnerships with the best job sites on the web. ZipRecruiter has the #1 rated job search app on iOS & Android.Summary of Job:The Analytics & Data Science team’s mission is to empower ZipRecruiter with data through analysis, operational insights, and strategic initiatives. We’re looking for a data analyst that is meticulous, regimented, and creative. Your goal is to drive ZipRecruiter’s growth by using data to improve decision-making, and to help make ZipRecruiter the best place for employers to hire and for job seekers to get hired.Your role is to serve as the interface between ZipRecruiter's data and our business, making sure that timely and accurate analysis is brought to bear on complex problems across our business. You will partner with business stakeholders in Product Management and Engineering to make data-driven decisions. You’ll use data and statistics to uncover new opportunities and empower business leaders making difficult calls.We are currently hiring both Analysts and Senior Data Analysts, depending on prior work experience.Key focuses: Exercise independent judgment to define KPIs, protect data integrity, and create insights and dashboards through analysis of large data sets  Use professional discretion to communicate insights from data analysis to business stakeholders through creation of readable and informative data visualizations  Interpret data and statistics to facilitate ZipRecruiter’s continuous experimentation and advancement  Exercise discretion in identifying strategic opportunities to improve ZipRecruiter’s products and operations through analysis of data  Work closely with cross-functional teams in Product & Engineering to translate findings into actions  Independently solve problems presented by business partners through analysis of data  Continuously learn and develop skills while working with our cutting edge team of analysts and data scientists  Create readable and informative data visualizations to communicate data insights to business stakeholders  Turn ambiguous questions from business partners into clear analytical problems, and solve them using data Minimum Requirements:1-3 year of experience in Analytics, particularly in a cross-functional team environment  SQL experience  Exceptional verbal, written, and visual communication skills  Attention to detail  Structured analytical approach to problem solving  Ability to think creatively and to work well both as part of a team and as an individual contributor  Knowledge of statistics and R/Python skills a strong plus  Experience with experiments a strong plus As part of our team you’ll enjoy: Competitive salary A fun environment where work-life balance is valuedZipRecruiter is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or genetics.Privacy Notice: For information about ZipRecruiter's collection and processing of job applicant personal data for this job, please see our Privacy Notice at: https://www.ziprecruiter.com/careers/job-applicant-privacy-notice

Title: Account Executive
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: This is usArtlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.Artlist consists of 4 products:Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platformArtgrid.io, a curated stock footage platformMotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photosFXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing softwareInterested in joining the coolest company in town, Artlist is growing significantly and we're looking for an Account Executive to join our brand new sales department. It is imperative for us to find a candidate who embraces challenges, is eager to learn, and is passionate about succeeding. The Inside Sales Representative will be responsible for the top of the funnel process, finding, qualifying and nurturing sales leads in order to build sales opportunities. We are looking for a self-motivated teammate with high social intelligence and a natural inclination for selling. The Sales related topics are brand new at Artlist and we just started putting together the team and our offering. The ideal candidate needs to be keen to build processes from scratch and own areas very independently.Responsible for: Communicating with customers, making outbound calls to potential customers, and following up on leads.Managing inbound leads - understanding customers' needs and identifying sales opportunities.Creating relevant collaterals about the product based on value-proposition and industry needs Working and maintaining a database of current and potential customers to build long term relationshipsResearching and qualifying new leads based on existing customers to drive sales pipelineRequirements:The ideal candidate has:A winning mindset and fighter instincts, a always positive attitude, likes to take full blown ownership on any initiatives that this person is tasked withAbility to multitask between business development related tasks and Sales cycles with a variety of customers. 1-2 years of inside sales, sales development, or business development experience, preferably in a B2B product oriented environment (startup, SaaS company) - *MustExcellent knowledge of sales development, lead generation practices, and all of its main principles - *MustProficiency in Microsoft Office, presentation building and CRM software processes - *Must Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written - *Must Languages: English (native level or equivalent) *Must, Hebrew (at least conversational), additional languages (optional)Ability to work worldwide (US, EMEA and AIPAC) *Must (at least during this year)

Text: Noname Security, founded in 2020, is rapidly growing with more than 200 team members globally and only a year out of stealth the company is the first API Security Unicorn, at $1B valuation and $220M in total financing. Noname Security is also one of the fastest growing cybersecurity companies ever.Our mission is to reduce the risk of API security vulnerabilities and cyber attacks. Title: Head of Demand Gen & Growth
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Rivery empowers businesses to unlock the possibilities hidden within their data. Our fully managed platform already helps hundreds of companies around the world to consolidate, orchestrate, and manage all their data with ease and efficiency. We are on a mission to enable our customers to build the perfect ecosystems for all their data processes, and our growing marketing team is looking for all-star candidates who want to join us for an incredible ride.Our data solutions are used by some of the world’s biggest brands, enterprises, and startups in over 20 countries and our platform helps data professionals, CIOs, BI analysts, and marketing experts solve complex data challenges. As our company grows, we are looking for the brightest minds across multiple disciplines to join our teams in New York, London, and Tel Aviv.Are you a revenue-centric marketing leader that thrives on growth? Do you love scaling a demand engine and optimizing marketing funnels? Want to join a global team and shape its brand narrative globally? This is a unique opportunity to join an international marketing team within a fast-paced, fast-growing startup. We’re looking for team players with boundless energy - fearless to the many challenges of hyper-growth and not afraid to tackle bold challenges with creative ideas.What You'll Do:Drive growth and predict performance by owning the entire acquisition strategy with a focus on driving customer acquisition across paid, organic, and integrated marketing campaigns.Build our growth strategy including customer journeys by collaborating with sales, product, and CS teams to engage and convert prospects at each stage of the funnel.Gain a deep understanding of our buyers to create ads, messaging, and promotions that move them through the funnel and speed up sales velocityIdentify opportunities across all stages of the customer lifecycle to drive awareness adoption, activation, and retention by implementing new tactics, running optimization tests, and improving campaign performance.Analyze marketing program outcomes, drawing insights to inform decision-making.Own and execute media planning and budget allocation, responsible for measuring and reporting on ROI.What You Bring:5+ years of experience in SaaS marketing and demand generation and a proven track record of success.Strong analytical skills, data-driven decision-making, and technical ability.Experienced in working with marketing and analytics tools such as HubSpot, LinkedIn, Google Analytics, and Tableau.Able to identify and select new tools to add to the marketing stack and roll out integration and adoption processes across the business.Analytical mind, able to focus on marketing performance and conversion, leading the management of the marketing funnel.
Requirements: ['Drive growth and predict performance by owning the entire acquisition strategy with a focus on driving customer acquisition across paid, organic, and integrated marketing campaigns.', 'Build our growth strategy including customer journeys by collaborating with sales, product, and CS teams to engage and convert prospects at each stage of the funnel.', 'Gain a deep understanding of our buyers to create ads, messaging, and promotions that move them through the funnel and speed up sales velocity', 'Identify opportunities across all stages of the customer lifecycle to drive awareness adoption, activation, and retention by implementing new tactics, running optimization tests, and improving campaign performance.', 'Analyze marketing program outcomes, drawing insights to inform decision-making.', 'Own and execute media planning and budget allocation, responsible for measuring and reporting on ROI.', '5+ years of experience in SaaS marketing and demand generation and a proven track record of success.', 'Strong analytical skills, data-driven decision-making, and technical ability.', 'Experienced in working with marketing and analytics tools such as HubSpot, LinkedIn, Google Analytics, and Tableau.', 'Able to identify and select new tools to add to the marketing stack and roll out integration and adoption processes across the business.', 'Analytical mind, able to focus on marketing performance and conversion, leading the management of the marketing funnel.']

Title: Support Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Granulate is on a mission to help companies scale by removing the compute cost pain and overcoming performance challenges. We’re developing the world’s first autonomous, continuous workload optimization solution, enabling immediate application performance improvements and reduced infrastructure costs by up to 63% - with no code changes required.Our new and growing Support Engineer team will be on the front lines, providing a white-glove support experience for our largest customers. Support Engineers are innovative, proactive and empowered to solve the customer challenges of today, while thinking strategically to provide customer solutions and means of support and excite customers of tomorrow.Requirements:At least 2 years of relevant experience in a Technical support / Project management position.Must be a self-starter comfortable working in a startup environment.Ability to clearly organize and convey technical instructions and concepts in an easy-to-understand manner.Great team player, enabling his peers to succeed.Great interpersonal skills.Extremely detail-oriented and well organized, comfortable working independently, and have the technical aptitude to learn new technical concepts.Responsibilities:You will provide technical support via email, chat, and/or web conferencing for our largest customers using Granulate and achieve core KPIs.You will create technical and educational materials to drive our customer experience forward both internally and externally.You will master Granulate solutions and provide integration support.You will represent the customer with Success, Sales and Product teams.You will also Collaborate closely with Solutions Engineering, dev and product teams to triage potential bugs, build test cases, and identify workarounds.
Requirements: ['At least 2 years of relevant experience in a Technical support / Project management position.', 'Must be a self-starter comfortable working in a startup environment.', 'Ability to clearly organize and convey technical instructions and concepts in an easy-to-understand manner.', 'Great team player, enabling his peers to succeed.', 'Great interpersonal skills.', 'Extremely detail-oriented and well organized, comfortable working independently, and have the technical aptitude to learn new technical concepts.', 'You will provide technical support via email, chat, and/or web conferencing for our largest customers using Granulate and achieve core KPIs.', 'You will create technical and educational materials to drive our customer experience forward both internally and externally.', 'You will master Granulate solutions and provide integration support.', 'You will represent the customer with Success, Sales and Product teams.', 'You will also Collaborate closely with Solutions Engineering, dev and product teams to triage potential bugs, build test cases, and identify workarounds.']

Title: Corporate Travel Advisor - Israel #4020
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: FROSCH has a unique opportunity for a Corporate Travel Advisor to make a direct impact on the success of our company. This is an excellent opportunity to display your skills as a high performing individual. You will work in a multicultural collaborative environment where problem solvers and proactive thinkers are valued. Break free of the call center environment and provide a truly unique customer service experience.Job Details:Be a true Travel Consultant and uphold the “WOW” factor in client customer serviceListen and guide the conversation to solve problems in a timely manner with all types of customers in all circumstancesComplete travel reservations from their initial request to completionBe a trusted advisor by offering informed and insightful recommendations which provide the very best traveler experience in each situationRemain current on value we provide to each customerAdapt and change as requirements of the business changeBe responsive to client’s needs and issue resolution with excellent communication and follow upEmbrace new technology and ways of working that promote flexibility to adjust quickly to shifting needs of the businessInteract with VIP administrators and/or clients to solicit travel preferences and initial profile informationEmbody FROSCH core values at all times: Respect, Integrity, Excellence, Communication, Commitment and Delivering the UnexpectedRequirementsRecent, native GDS experience on SabreExperience arranging international travel for multiple corporate clientsCapability to setup PNR’s, ticketing and exchange tickets is preferredProficient with Microsoft Office, specifically Outlook and WordStrong attention to detailAbility to work well under pressureStrong sense of urgency as well as flexibility to change as neededFamiliarity with visa and passport requirements to provide effective adviceProvide Best in Class Customer Service that exceeds our client’s expectationsAble to work well on a team to ensure worldwide coverage for clientsPreferably proficient in English in addition to 1-2 other languagesBenefitsOpportunity to make a difference in a growing global companyStrong collaborative environmentContinued Industry TrainingEmployee Recognition ProgramWe aspire to define ourselves as the travel company of choice, to deliver industry-leading expertise and service to our customers and build on the tremendous pride our employees have in all they accomplish. We will continue to align our resources to further integrate leading technologies into our customer experience. Through it all, we will remain faithful to our core values: Respect, Integrity, Excellence, Communication, and Delivering the Unexpected.Position Description DisclaimerThis document is representative of the qualifications, competencies, activities, and responsibilities an employee may encounter within the position; it is not exhaustive.  FROSCH/FT Travel Management, LLC retains the right to change or assign other duties, responsibilities, and activities at any time with or without notice.Equal Employment Opportunity Policy StatementFROSCH/FT Travel Management, LLC provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, FROSCH/FT Travel Management, LLC complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.

Title: Product Manager - Business Oriented
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We’re looking for an experienced Product Manager who is an owner at heart and wants to work on today’s most innovative digital products!Zemingo is a digital product agency that designs & develops digital products and services for local and international companies, who range from early-stage start-ups to large corporations.As Product Manager, you will work on a wide variety of projects in diverse industries, including medical and biotech, banking and finance, insurance, smart-home and more.You will own and manage multiple clients and projects, and be responsible for driving high-quality and innovative product definitions and user experience for our clients.ResponsibilitiesLearn, analyze and own a complex new project, technology, market, and product in a short timeBuild and maintain a professional and valuable relationship with our business clients and become the go-to-personCollect requirements, drive product decisions, prioritization, and execution of product definitions and UX designs to maximize the product’s successLead internal research efforts and organize research findings into actionable insights that promote the product design processAdvocate research findings and product-related decisions clearly and persuasivelyWork closely with design and R&D both internally and on the client’s sideRequirements:Requirements2-3 years experience as Product ManagerPre-sales, Post-sales, or entrepreneurial business experience - a significant advantageExperience managing corporate accounts - an advantageAbility to present and pitch solutions to internal and external stakeholdersDeep understanding of UX and User-Centric Design principlesExcellent written, verbal, and presentation communication skillsFluent in EnglishHigh level of ownership, accountability, and delivery

Title: Operations Manager - TAR
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: TAR Ideal Concepts from the Avnon Group, an energetic company that is in tremendous growth and deals in the defence sector, needs an operations manager to join the family!Responsibilities:Locating sub-contractors in Israel and abroad, handling project operations and logistics processes, supervision and control of post order workflow including supplier delivery, shipments, customs clearance, obtaining export permits/ Import, transport, and payments and more.This position is in the core of our business activity, involved in the project flow from its very beginning and responsible for the success of the process once it enters the post order phase and until it reaches the customer.This position is a full-time job and requires working at our offices in Kfar Saba and may involve inland and international travelling to perform its responsibilities.Requirements:The Operations Manager is the company’s face in front of the supplier and sub-contractor from the moment it begins to process and deliver an order, and therefore, this position’s core requirements are: Fluent English both in writing and speaking - mandatory Experience and familiarity with the world of shipping in general and imports in particular including Trading and Incoterms Familiarity with the Priority system - an advantage High ability in managing negotiations, reducing costs, locating new suppliers Willingness to work long and strenuous hours and sometimes at unusual hours Ability to learn and apply quickly thorough, organized, energetic, flexible, excellent interpersonal communication and ability to work independently Direct and ongoing interface with the company's project Managers and Procurement Managers and many sub-entities during a project. Experience and familiarity with the world of international procurement - an advantageThe job requires fluent English and careful writing!
Requirements: ['Fluent English both in writing and speaking - mandatory', 'Experience and familiarity with the world of shipping in general and imports in particular including Trading and Incoterms', 'Familiarity with the Priority system - an advantage', 'High ability in managing negotiations, reducing costs, locating new suppliers', 'Willingness to work long and strenuous hours and sometimes at unusual hours', 'Ability to learn and apply quickly', 'thorough, organized, energetic, flexible, excellent interpersonal communication and ability to work independently', "Direct and ongoing interface with the company's project Managers and Procurement Managers and many sub-entities during a project.", 'Experience and familiarity with the world of international procurement - an advantage']

Title: Technical Support Team Lead EMEA
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: On Rivery’s Technical Support Team, we are customer-obsessed and focused on delivering fantastic customer service. We have a positive, collaborative team environment with coworkers who genuinely care about their work and value a high level of professionalism in everything we do. The foundation of our philosophy is continuous teaching, learning, and growth for all team members as they share in the journey that is the story of our company.What You'll Do:Manage, develop, coach, and mentor a team of Technical Support Engineers who respond to client requests, reproduce and troubleshoot issues, and dive into Rivery’s numerous integrations.Act as the owner for your team’s accountability and performance - partnering closely with peers and upper management to facilitate performance reviews, performance plans, and any other related needs for your direct reports.Ensure successful training and onboarding of new hires.Guide the team through technical-training, certificates and additional learning and development needs.Build out documentation and knowledge base articles for a variety of technologies.Drive projects or initiatives to improve team productivity, process, or procedure.Collaborate with internal teams and customers on high-priority escalations and act as a resource to resolve escalations from team members as necessary.Develop a strong technical understanding of the Rivery platform and its capabilities.Take on a player/coach role and lead by example to help your team triage, resolve customer issues and understand & follow processes.What You Bring:5+ years experience in Customer Support or related field.2-5+ years of experience managing a team.Passion for people management and/or mentorship with previous experience leading and scaling a team in a SaaS-startup environment.Strong sense of customer and team empathy, with the ability to balance both.Self-motivated, detail-attentive, with a desire for continuous learning.A critical thinker with a deep analytical skill set who defaults to a client-centric approach.A tinkerer with some programming experience and with knowledge of Data Engineering concepts & tools (ELT/ETL, SQL).Data-oriented mindset, with a passion for understanding trends, setting clear and measurable goals & KPIs, and building scalable solutions.Ability to develop a strong team culture and work with team members across the globe.Must be a self-starter, capable of maneuvering through a global organization and driving results without a direct reporting structure.Demonstrated success in developing efficient and effective foundational processes for a growing support team.Working knowledge of customer service software, databases, and tools such as Salesforce Support and Jira.Strong client-facing and communication skills; Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Hebrew.Advantages:Python knowledgeExposure to REST API-based services

Title: Product Manager
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: This is an exciting opportunity for a Product Manager!The Product Manager at Nayax will be part of the Product team, and will report to the VP Product Manager, Web and Mobile Solutions.IN THIS POSITION YOU WILL:Lead end-to-end product management, including product strategy, roadmap, requirements definition, UX/UI, development, and releaseManage complicated products in terms of functionality and performanceCompose specifications documents, mock-ups and user storiesIdentify user pain-points and drive product innovationCollaborate with the other PM's while leveraging your technical understandingWork closely with Sales, Marketing, R&D, QA, Support and Project management to manage effective communication between the stakeholders and appropriate audiencesRequirements:WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WITH:3+ years of experience managing a SAAS product – a mustPrevious experience working in an agile development environment and development teamsStrong understanding of all aspects of the product development lifecycleBeing able to present and explain complex technical notions to both technical and non-technical audiencesExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsADVANTAGES:Bachelor's Degree in Information systems/Computer Science/Engineering or relevant technical experienceDevelopment experienceExperience with B2B companiesKnowledge in the payment industryKnowledge and hands-on SQL experienceWho we are:Nayax is a leading global end-to-end retail technology platform for unattended & attended commerce. Our mission is to simplify commerce and payments for retailers while driving growth, optimizing operations, and enhancing consumer engagement.Nayax Israel is located in the prestigious Herzliya Hills, just a short drive north of Tel Aviv or a very short walk from the train station.Our open space offices accommodate our 400+ employees and when we’re not hard at work, you can find us enjoying an afternoon coffee on the balcony. We’re the largest Nayax site, housing over 20 different departments.For a glimpse of what it's like to work at Nayax, check out our Instagram account! https://bit.ly/3G3QDc4.Check out Nayax's page under "Best Cool Israeli Companies 2022" by Secret Tel-Aviv: https://bit.ly/3LqzElA.Nayax is constantly growing and we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic, innovative and eager individuals to join us in our growth!

Title: Technical Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About Us and the Role:We are looking for a talented, passionate, and motivated Product Manager. In your role as a member of the PM team, you will work closely with Software Engineering leaders to validate requests and prioritize effectively. The Product Manager will be an active member of the R&D team, defining functional specifications, breaking down feature requests, and bringing new features/products to market.Coro is the fastest-growing security company for small and medium businesses (SMBs) in the US. We provide security-as-a-service for SMBs powered by AI and Cloud with a cloud security platform that protects private data stored in the cloud.So, if a company is using Office365, Google Drive, Or Dropbox, Coro makes sure that data stays secure through multiple layers of protection. We are one of only a few companies in the world providing this service.We recently wrapped up our Series C, where we secured $100M in funding for our Cybersecurity Software Solutions. Coro started in Tel-Aviv, Israel and is also headquartered in Chicago, IL. As a global organization, Coro gives you the ability to work with people and teammates from across the world.Come be a part of expanding the Coro Team!Responsibilities:Research and analyze product and market requirements by leveraging our vast customer base and field teams while maintaining expertise in relevant cloud security technological domains Analyze opportunities that may change the course of Coro's business Work with the Engineering team to ensure user experience and engineering viability meet market requirements Achieve a sustainable product/market fit Promote the solution area internally and externally Skills and Experience:A minimum of 2+ years' experience in product management/development/technical lead in cyber security, preferably focused on email cloud security Technical and market knowledge of security technologies with a particular focus on email security, spam, malware, and cloud services Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English Ability to coordinate with multiple teams throughout the organization and pay close attention to details Proactive, highly motivated individual with a strong work ethic Fast learning ability Ability to execute and achieve goals with strategic thinking and little supervision Job Benefits and How We Work:Competitive and market value compensation packages Growth opportunities World-class product Office and home perks during launches This is a hybrid position in our TLV office What to Expect in the Interview Process::Phone Screen-10/15 minutes with our Recruiting Team Virtual Interview-45 minutes with Hiring Manager Virtual or In-Person Interview-60 minutes with HRBP and Head of R&D Integrity Assessment

Title: VP Product, Games (Remote)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: A global leader and original creator behind a gaming blockbuster series with over 250,000,000 downloads is looking for a talented experienced Director of Product. To put it simply - they make natural gaming evolution come to life and they're growing like crazy! The company's reach is made possible by the expertise of experienced teams in the Web3 gaming space. Want to be part of a fast-paced company that lands in the top of app stores charts and of of the world's leading mobile games in its category.See more details below!Job Description SummaryThe company is excited to be one of the first group of highly experienced game creators and publishers that will utilize the Web3 concepts, capabilities and innovative technologies to create and build massive gaming projects that will become the natural metaverse space for their players, competitive gamers and the Web3 guilds supported by the biggest brands from all over the world.The VP Product is in charge of defining game's vision and strategy. They will direct and work with the Product Leads on managing the game in a live environment and on creating the mechanics and features that will improve the game's performance according to the defined strategy. As a senior manager, the VP Product will be working alongside the other VP's and C-levels.The Product Team Reporting To Them Is Responsible ForDefine the vision and strategy for the product and execute the product's roadmap against themContinuously asses the game's performance and find opportunities for improvements and optimizationsConducting A/B tests (or other discovery methods) to inform better decision making as part of executing against the product's visionDevelop, train, and support the entire product team along with the Design department to provide a complete analysis of each element of the company's product to drive revenue and meet the product goals.Essential Job FunctionsSupervise the Product Managers across the game team.Ensure that each Product Manager is meeting the goals and execution expectations.Provide Creative input and Design comprehensive testing strategies for features that will be tested in-game across multiple productsOwn the long-term vision and strategy of the productReview weekly KPIs and proactively identify opportunities, trends, and threats to the product.Keep up-to-date on notable mobile games competitors.QualificationsEducation: MBA or equivalent experienceRequired Experience7+ Years experienceExperience in Gaming, Mobile Gaming required.Knowledge, Skills And AbilitiesAgile/Scrum software development experienceCritical Thinking and Creative Problem SolvingAbility to develop positive relationships and communicate effectively with Marketing, Design, Developers, QA, Analysts and Producers.Product discovery experienceAbility to translate business goals into a visionExcellent Organizational skillsProven leadership skills

Title: Head of Data Science
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Location: Hybrid/FlexibleAt Fairmatic we’re on a mission to make roads safer, one fleet at a time. We think about insurance, risk and underwriting in an unconventional way. Auto insurance has alway been unfair: safe and unsafe drivers that look alike pay the same. Because of this, safe drivers end up subsidizing risky ones. It doesn’t make sense. We’re using data and AI to introduce a personalized option that incentivizes safe driving with savings. Our predictive risk models have been trained with nearly 200 billion miles of driving data and tested with hundreds of thousands of paying drivers with industry-leading underwriting results. And we’re just getting started.Our leadership team includes serial entrepreneurs, insurance industry savants and start-up veterans. We’ve raised $42M from leading VCs as well as insurtech, fintech and technology industry angel investors.At Fairmatic we do our best work while living our best lives, regardless of where we are. We have thriving teams across the globe and we are constantly looking for talented folks to welcome into the family. We are a curious, adaptable and diverse bunch of technologists and problem solvers who are obsessed about creating positive impact in the world. In our work together, we strive for close collaboration, humbleness and constant learning.We are looking for a motivated and talented Head of Data Science to lead our rapidly growing Risk Intelligence team. Risk Intelligence is at the core of everything we do. In this role, you will drive all R&D efforts associated with improving the machine learning models predicting claim frequency, claims severity and fraud detection. You will help automate claims payouts and enhance other aspects of rating, claims, and the customer experience (e.g. insight to improve fleet safety). This role involves overseeing continuous experimentation, A/B testing, and an iterative approach to productizing our learnings. You will manage a team of data scientists and work closely with product managers, underwriters, actuaries, machine learning engineers and other product/engineering teams.A day in the life:Define the data science methodologies and best practices and enforce their practiceIntroduce new statistics/data science methodologies and algorithms to develop highly predictive risk models to improve our risk management and claims treatment Manage priorities, and deliverables of a set of data science projects; drive alignment on the scope and objectives; own the quality of the deliverablesPartner with product management, engineering and other cross-functional teams in all product development effortsProactively identify opportunities to apply data and data sciences to Fairmatic’s product suite.Assess Fairmatic’s modeling techniques, identify improvements and communicate results with internal stakeholders, including leadership, to ensure these are incorporated into business processesOversee R&D efforts for doing proof of concepts to validate new product ideas and experiments to improve existing predictive modelsDesign data collection, observability strategies and their applications for building new products, and proactively monitoring their performancePlay an active role in the recruiting process; interview, hire, and train new Data Science staffExemplify and foster Fairmatic’s humble, collaborative and impact-obsessed cultureRequirementsIf you feel we’re describing you, it was meant to be…BS / MS with 10+ years experience as a data scientist or 5+ years relevant experience post Ph.D. in Statistics / Machine Learning2+ years experience leading data sciences teamsDemonstrated ability to hire and grow a teamTrack record of leading data science solutions and driving them to completionTrack record in designing and implementing MLOps, including data observability strategiesHands-on in programming languages like R and Python with expertise in supervised and unsupervised machine learning models (GLM, GAM, XGBoost, Deep Learning, etc)Strong expertise in using regularization, feature selection, and feature creation techniques to improve the accuracy of machine learning modelsA product-driven mindset with a knack for transforming research outcomes into impactful productsExcellent verbal/written communication skills, with the ability to articulate experiment goals and methodologies clearly and communicate insights in an easily accessible way to the teamKeep yourself up to date with new developments in the AI field and adopt these to improve existing productsBenefitsEmployee Health Insurance ProgramPrivate Health CareUnlimited HolidaysMobile and Broad Band allowanceEntertainment allowance Wellbeing allowancePension contribution

Text: About UsDESCRIPTIONDemostack is the world's first Demo Experience Platform. Our solution gives software companies complete control, customization, and insight over demoing their product. Demostack customers can create, share, and track personalized demo experiences for every prospect, without requiring R&D resources. We're on a journey to build the perfect demo environment and we want you to join!The roleThe Responsibilities Of This Role IncludeWe are looking for a curious, motivated, fast-learner, product-oriented Data Analyst to join our awesome product team. This person should have a strong passion for leveraging data to solve business and product problems.Drive the way data is used in our decision-making process by helping define our north star metrics, measuring their impact, and diving deep into the data to find supporting insights.Define key metrics and analyze them to uncover the reasons behind changes, identify trends, and make recommendations.Perform funnel analysis to understand the path users take through our product and find new opportunities using different breakdowns.Create SQL processes that pull data from both raw events and aggregated databases.Create and maintain dashboards that make key metrics easier to understand for all stakeholders.Present key findings to stakeholders across the company in order to drive business and product decisions.Requirements3+ years of experience as a data/product/business analyst, preferably at a SaaS, B2B company, or a fast-growing tech startupExcellent SQL skills with experience in querying large, complex data setsAdvanced Excel / Google sheets capabilitiesExperienced in working with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.)Educational background in a field emphasizing quantitative analysis (industrial engineering, mathematics, statistics, or a related field).Passionate about data with outstanding analytical skillsIndependent, fast learner who is able to prioritize well while working in a fast-paced environment Excellent visualization and presentation skills, and great communication skills both in person and in writing, including in English in a professional capacity.AdvantagesExperience with PythonExperience in blending data from cross-platform sources such as marketing tools, sales management platforms and CRM systemsExperience working in a product teamExperience with data pipelines and processes, including event definition and maintenance.

Title: E-Commerce Data & Insights Specialist חברת נספרסו
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: אנחנו קבוצת נסטלה נספרסו SA, וגאים להיות אחת מיחידות הפעילות הצומחות במהירות הרבה ביותר של נסטלה. הצוות התוסס ובעל האופי היזמי שלנו, הפך את נספרסו לנקודת ההתייחסות בתחום קפסולות הקפה, ולאחד המותגים המהימנים ביותר בעולם. הצמיחה שלנו נובעת ממחויבותנו למחקר ופיתוח, על מנת לסלול דרך ולהיות נקודת ההתייחסות בתחום קפסולות הקפה, בכדי לספק קפה באיכות הגבוהה ביותר, שניתן ליהנות ממנו בבית בנוחות, וכן להתענג עליו מחוץ לבית, במקומות כמו מסעדות, בתי מלון, משרדים, ועסקי קמעונות יוקרה. אנו מבטיחים איכות, בזכות גישה זהירה ומתחשבת באופן שבו אנו בוחרים את המרכיבים שלנו, מייצרים, ומשווקים את מוצרי קפה הפרימיום שלנו. עם משרדים ראשיים בלוזאן, שוויץ, נספרסו נוכחת ביותר מ-60 מדינות, ומעסיקה יותר מ-12,000 עובדים ברחבי העולם. כדי ללמוד עוד, בקרו ב-www.nespresso.com Nespresso is hiring E-Commerce Data & Insights SpecialistThe E-Commerce Data & Insights Specialist is responsible for accelerating the performance of the market's digital & eCommerce channels and for enhancing E2E Personalization through data and insightsThe specialist supports all eCommerce business needs by analyzing data, building dashboards, monitoring AB tests for statistical significance, optimizing KPIs, and enlightening the team with strategic insightsS/he has the ability to create an independent vision, analytical expertise centered, for a better data-influenced future. As a professional figure, s/he has the responsibility to keep the eCommerce team motivated and data-oriented through challenges, decision-making processes, dashboards, and metrics – all supporting organization and channel KPIsMust haveUp to 3 years experience in web analytics for eCommerceProven experience in google analytics & Data studioExperience in google tag manager, and google optimizeProven ability to perform in-depth analysis, synthesize results, develop stories, build strategies and make recommendations to business and technical leadersExcellent ability to design, develop and prepare business presentations and reports to senior managementStrong familiarity with business and marketing metricsBasic knowledge of Power BIFluent in Englishנסטלה היא חברת המזון והמשקאות הגדולה ביותר. אנחנו 308,000 איש, המונעים בעוצמה על ידי התכלית של שיפור איכות החיים ותרומה לעתיד בריא יותר. ערכינו מושרשים בכבוד: כבוד לעצמנו, כבוד לאחרים, כבוד לגיוון, וכבוד לעתיד שלנו. עם יותר מ-91.4 מיליארד פרנק שוויצרי ב-2018, יש לנו נוכחות רחבה עם 413 מפעלים ביותר מ-85 מדינות. אנו מאמינים שאנשינו הם הנכס החשוב ביותר שלנו, לכן נציע לך סביבת עבודה בינלאומית, דינמית וכוללת, עם הזדמנויות רבות בעסקים, יחידות ואזורים גיאוגרפיים שונים, תוך עבודה עם צוותים ותרבויות מגוונות. רוצה לשמוע עוד? בקרו אותנו ב-www.nestle.com.
Industries: Food and Beverage Services, Food and Beverage Manufacturing, and Manufacturing

Title: Marketing & Content Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Job DescriptionAre you an experienced designer with a wild imagination and passion for creating eye-catching advertising? Do you strive for nothing less than world-class? If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you!Role BackgroundSince launching in Tel Aviv in 2018, we've grown beyond all expectations across the country! We're now in 120+ different locations in Israel (with even more planned) and we're adding new partners on a daily basis, offering everything from pizza to paracetamol.Regardless of how fast we are growing, we strive for the best-in-the-world in everything we do. We don’t compromise on quality and we’re fanatic about being the world #1 level. We’ve managed to be best-in-the-world in several things we do, and our brand is now known in many places in the world. Our marketing team is looking to expand it even further. We would love you to join our team!As such we’re looking for a talented Design & Content specialist who will be responsible for delivering effective and eye-catching assets that will be used for our marketing efforts inside and outside our app. Specifically, this role will focus on providing creatives and assets for our Israel market in which the campaigns will run on multiple platforms ranging from very own app, digital media (including social media), office environment, and much more.What You’ll Be DoingIdeate with the marketing team and agencies, create and deliver on-brand and eye-catching assets, amazing copy and campaigns that will be used for our Israeli market.Define and develop campaign materials with your colleagues and produce assets according to the brief.Translate and localize global creatives and adjust them to the local market needs, including content & copywriting. Work closely with the global creative team, the performance marketing team, and the local Israel marketing team to produce digital imagery in various formats for Wolt’s various channels (Email, Application, Social Media, company events, etc). Build creative best practices & continuously improve the performance of our online creatives.Participate in design, content, and marketing meetings, brainstorming sessions, reviews, workshops and more. Keep iterating the creatives to achieve the best possible results.Our humble expectationsSolid graphic and writing (copywriting & Content) skills. Proven hands-on experience throughout image production processes – from beginning to end.Solid skills in Adobe CC (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.) You have a comprehensive visual portfolio including work examples for advertising in Israel.Interest in current design trends and the latest technologies applicable to design.Creativity, proactivity, tons of initiatives.Good communication & writing skills in English and fluent in Hebrew.Good time-management skills. You are organized and know how to allocate your time efficiently. Next StepsIf you are excited about taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!We will be reviewing applications on an on-going basis, so send through your application ASAP! The positions will be filled once we have found the suitable candidates. 😊About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Since launching 7 years ago, Wolt has expanded from a restaurant food delivery platform in the Nordics to a leading player in the delivery of everything across EMEA. Wolt works together with tens of thousands of restaurant and retail partners, as well as with over a hundred thousand courier partners across 23 countries and 250+ cities. In November 2021 Wolt and DoorDash announced they are joining forces, and the transaction is expected to close in H1 2022. We continue to expand rapidly and are looking for more talented individuals to join us.Wolt not only offers great apps to customers and partners, but is also developing a broad range of technologies and solutions. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest reviews, largely because of our customer-centric approach to how we build our products and operations. For example, our customer service team responds in a matter of minutes, in the customer’s own language.So, why work at Wolt?At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together.
Requirements: ['Ideate with the marketing team and agencies, create and deliver on-brand and eye-catching assets, amazing copy and campaigns that will be used for our Israeli market.', 'Define and develop campaign materials with your colleagues and produce assets according to the brief.', 'Translate and localize global creatives and adjust them to the local market needs, including content & copywriting.', 'Work closely with the global creative team, the performance marketing team, and the local Israel marketing team to produce digital imagery in various formats for Wolt’s various channels (Email, Application, Social Media, company events, etc).', 'Build creative best practices & continuously improve the performance of our online creatives.', 'Participate in design, content, and marketing meetings, brainstorming sessions, reviews, workshops and more.', 'Keep iterating the creatives to achieve the best possible results.', 'Solid graphic and writing (copywriting & Content) skills.', 'Proven hands-on experience throughout image production processes – from beginning to end.', 'Solid skills in Adobe CC (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.)', 'You have a comprehensive visual portfolio including work examples for advertising in Israel.', 'Interest in current design trends and the latest technologies applicable to design.', 'Creativity, proactivity, tons of initiatives.', 'Good communication & writing skills in English and fluent in Hebrew.', 'Good time-management skills. You are organized and know how to allocate your time efficiently.']

Title: Senior Product Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About us: It’s 2022, people. Health ‘benefits’ should be easy, accessible, and affordable. Enter Healthee, which helps employees discover what’s covered, which provider to see, what it costs, and how to book an appointment—all within 27 seconds. It’s a win-win for HR Pros, reducing your workload and costs, and making your employees healthier, happier, and more loyal. Empower your employees to take full advantage of their health benefits, without replacing your broker.We’re on a mission to support employees and transform their health care experience. We’re building an AI powered platform that is designed to support every employee with healthcare benefits, navigate their plans and optimize care..Want to join our mission-driven team? Read on.We are looking for an experienced product manager with proven ability to create successful products that customers love, that is excited to join our growing team and to be part of making people healthier.ObjectivesBe obsessed with the customer - understand their needs and challenges pains and motivationsOwn your product vision and roadmap based on customer and business needsLead the product lifecycle from ideation to execution to drive fast impact to our customers Develop and monitor key metrics to measure the success of the product to drive the business goalsManage ongoing collaboration with engineering, PM, design, CX, Sales and marketingAnalyze the market and competitive landscapeRequirements At least 7 years of product experience of building impactful productsExperience working in B2C companiesPassionate about user experience Strategic thinker with a ‘can-do’ and ‘get things done’ attitude Self driven, take ownership and obsess with impact Analytical and data driven mindsetA people person and team playerAdvantage: Expert in the American health insurance systemBenefitsHybrid WorkStock OptionsTraining & Development
Requirements: ['Be obsessed with the customer - understand their needs and challenges pains and motivations', 'Own your product vision and roadmap based on customer and business needs', 'Lead the product lifecycle from ideation to execution to drive fast impact to our customers', 'Develop and monitor key metrics to measure the success of the product to drive the business goals', 'Manage ongoing collaboration with engineering, PM, design, CX, Sales and marketing', 'Analyze the market and competitive landscape', 'At least 7 years of product experience of building impactful products', 'Experience working in B2C companies', 'Passionate about user experience', 'Strategic thinker with a ‘can-do’ and ‘get things done’ attitude', 'Self driven, take ownership and obsess with impact', 'Analytical and data driven mindset', 'A people person and team player', 'Advantage: Expert in the American health insurance system', 'Hybrid Work', 'Stock Options', 'Training & Development']

Title: Data Annotator and Processor
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The data annotator and processor will be responsible for delivering and updating a unified management, maintenance, and annotation of public & proprietary metadata from life science research and clinical trials, in addition, he will be responsible for the automatic and manual QC processing of Cytoreason’s data.CytoReason relies, among other things, on accurate annotations of huge data sets, public and proprietary and this is a central role in the company. It requires a highly detail-oriented person who strives for order and is not afraid of digging into and standardizing huge amount of data.You will be joining our expanding, multidisciplinary and creative team of biologists, data engineers, data scientists and bioinformaticians.Requirements:BSc in Computational biology or Bioinformatics 1-2 years of programming experience with R/Python SQL experience (preferably PostgreSQL / MySQL) Detail-oriented, organized, and capable of meeting deadlines1+ years experience in the life sciences field1+ years of experience working with a teamVery strong communication skills in EnglishFull proficiency in ExcelResponsibilities:Understanding and defining data structure, quality and ontologiesMaintaining and updating large databases with experimental data related to human samples & sorted cells including related data, patient demographics and clinical dataManual and automatic annotation of datasetsMapping the availability of relevant data sourcesOperating and maintenance of existing pipelines for QC, processing, and integration of new datasets and data types into the company’s Model collection Work with immunologists, bioinformaticians and project managers to implement needed search requestsWork with the multidisciplinary product and software teams to define new tools for data annotation and maintenanceAdvantages:Immunological knowledgeExperience with Tableau, SQL, PythonExperience with multiple omics technologies
Requirements: ['BSc in Computational biology or Bioinformatics', '1-2 years of programming experience with R/Python', 'SQL experience (preferably PostgreSQL / MySQL)', 'Detail-oriented, organized, and capable of meeting deadlines', '1+ years experience in the life sciences field', '1+ years of experience working with a team', 'Very strong communication skills in English', 'Full proficiency in Excel', 'Understanding and defining data structure, quality and ontologies', 'Maintaining and updating large databases with experimental data related to human samples & sorted cells including related data, patient demographics and clinical data', 'Manual and automatic annotation of datasets', 'Mapping the availability of relevant data sources', 'Operating and maintenance of existing pipelines for QC, processing, and integration of new datasets and data types into the company’s Model collection', 'Work with immunologists, bioinformaticians and project managers to implement needed search requests', 'Work with the multidisciplinary product and software teams to define new tools for data annotation and maintenance', 'Immunological knowledge', 'Experience with Tableau, SQL, Python', 'Experience with multiple omics technologies']

Title: Mechanical Engineer Team Leader
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: SolarEdge is a top global leader in smart energy technology. The company's broad range of products encompasses intelligent inverter and storage systems, revolutionary EV charger, smart energy management solutions and more.As a member of our Mechanical group you'll be responsible for developing all SolarEdge's line of products. We are searching for a self-motivated and passionate Mechanical Engineering team leader to take part in research and development of the company's innovative products in the fields of renewable energies.The position is located in Herzeliya What you will be doing :Lead and mentor team of mechanical engineers for design of electronic packaging outdoor products with high power dissipation.Work with cross-functional teams to achieve product performance, schedule, cost, reliability, and quality targets.Your team activities will include:Design parts using plastic injection, die cast, extrusion and sheet metalPCB mechanical design including shoulder to shoulder work with electrical engineersPreparation of production files including mechanical drawing, PCB mechanical drawingsSpecification review and approval of manufacturing tools and moldsFirst article inspection review and approvalRequirements: B. Sc. or higher degree in mechanical engineering from recognized instituteExperience in managing small teams, or as a Tech-LeadPassionate about design: Driven to conceive of and execute new designs that are differentiated relative to all else in the market todayLeadership ability in terms of strong interpersonal, collaboration and influence skills3-8 years of experience in mechanical design (hands on)At least 2-3 years in electronic packaging design to meet safety and environmental requirementsExperience in products design for manufacturing by plastic injection, die casting and metal forming - MustExperience in PCB design - MustExperience in drawings and production files preparation - MustExperience in validation, testing and troubleshooting of mechanical first articles - MustExperience in production supportExperience in design with a 3D CAD software - Must (SolidWorks- Advantage)Experience with PDM/PLM and ERP software - AdvantageExperience in thermal and strength evaluations - AdvantageFluent in EnglishAbility to work on several project in parallel
