Title: Fullstack Developer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DagsHub is looking for a great Full Stack Developer to build our product. If you want to build things from the ground up and have a central role in the company, this is the stage to join.As a Full Stack Developer, you will be working on all aspects of our core product. You’ll write code in Go, Javascript, and Python, and work on our modern Kubernetes-based tech stack. You’ll have a ton of impact on bringing the vision of an open-source data science platform and community to life, working alongside our team, made of people who love honing their craft.You willBuild a web platform and SaaS that is scalable and delightful to useShape the product - understand users and what really matters to them, research tech and business trends, think ten steps in advance to where the product should be goingDevelop on all fronts – work on our front-facing web platform, built using React. Extend our backend servers and infrastructure, built mostly using Go and Python but flexible and expanding. Work with and architect our cloud infrastructure.Engage with the data science world - dive deep into the field of machine learning engineering. Write blog posts, create open-source projects, and speak at conferences.Qualifications – You AreExperienced (2+ years of industry experience) working as a developer.Experienced in Javascript, and in frontend frameworks like React or similar.Experienced in at least one more programming language like Go, Python, C++, Java, etc.Experienced working with Git and Github.Experienced in thinking in terms of business and product goals, translating them to technical solutions, and implementing those solutions.A fun person to work with! We are in this together for the long haul.BonusCurious and passionate about data science and DevOps - you're a tech enthusiast at heart.You enjoy outward-facing activities such as speaking at events, writing blog posts about your work, and interacting with developer communities.Experience with cloud infrastructure and distributed applications.You have an interest or experience in building or contributing to open source projects.You're experienced in data engineering, machine learning, and the required infrastructure.About DagsHubAt DAGsHub, we're building the next generation GitHub - for data scientists & machine learning engineers. We provide everything data science teams need to manage their projects and collaborate. We are transforming well-established software practices into their natural equivalents in the data-science wild west, and creating new effective ways for data scientists to work together.Our product helps people and teams discover data science experiments & projects, understand the thought process behind experiments, reproduce results and incorporate & review changes in code as well as data and models. We believe this is the way to create the most vibrant collaborative data science community in the world.DAGsHub is a well-funded, high-growth startup building tools for the Open Source Data Science community, with a fast-growing international community on the platform.
Requirements: ['Build a web platform and SaaS that is scalable and delightful to use', 'Shape the product - understand users and what really matters to them, research tech and business trends, think ten steps in advance to where the product should be going', 'Develop on all fronts – work on our front-facing web platform, built using React. Extend our backend servers and infrastructure, built mostly using Go and Python but flexible and expanding. Work with and architect our cloud infrastructure.', 'Engage with the data science world - dive deep into the field of machine learning engineering. Write blog posts, create open-source projects, and speak at conferences.', 'Experienced (2+ years of industry experience) working as a developer.', 'Experienced in Javascript, and in frontend frameworks like React or similar.', 'Experienced in at least one more programming language like Go, Python, C++, Java, etc.', 'Experienced working with Git and Github.', 'Experienced in thinking in terms of business and product goals, translating them to technical solutions, and implementing those solutions.', 'A fun person to work with! We are in this together for the long haul.', "Curious and passionate about data science and DevOps - you're a tech enthusiast at heart.", 'You enjoy outward-facing activities such as speaking at events, writing blog posts about your work, and interacting with developer communities.', 'Experience with cloud infrastructure and distributed applications.', 'You have an interest or experience in building or contributing to open source projects.', "You're experienced in data engineering, machine learning, and the required infrastructure."]

Title: Technical Support Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: CYREBRO is the first interactive SOC Platform, transforming how today’s businesses respond to and mitigate cyber threats with a centralized security operations infrastructure. The platform provides complete clarity, insight, and real-time cyber recommendations for businesses of all sizes by integrating their security events into one central command.We are looking for a Manager of Technical Support who will oversee the organization's technical support and service operations and functions. Title: JUNIOR TRADER - Dubai, UAE
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum + performance based bonus' - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflectionIndependent thinking through a meritocracy of ideasThe team is more important than the individualBeing the best in any market we enterHiring and keeping only the most effective peopleOthers must benefit from our existenceWhat We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial teamCommitted and remarkably talented colleaguesHighly competitive compensation dependent on performanceAn exciting, challenging and fulfilling careerInvestment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in businessEquity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long termResponsibilitiesOwning, managing, and profitably trading in the European power markets while implementing any relevant strategiesInnovating new ideas for trading tools and strategies then working with the analysis and development teams to implement themWorking as a part of our 24/7 operating trading team, to ensure markets are always coveredUtilising self-starter capability while also working efficiently within a team environmentEnsuring all power market regulations and requirements are upheld through good communication with the system operatorsUpholding and living our cultural valuesBasic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skillsAbility to think clearly in critical situationsPassion, resilience, and integrityPreferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Trader. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

Title: Team Leader ( Squad Leader)

Text: About UsSunbit builds financial technology for real life. Our technology eases the stress of paying for life’s expenses by giving people more options on how and when they pay. Founded in 2016, Sunbit offers a next-generation, no-fee credit card that can be managed through a powerful mobile app, as well as a point-of-sale payment option available at more than 16,000 service locations, including auto dealership service centers, optical practices, dentist offices, veterinary clinics, and specialty healthcare services. Sunbit was included on the 2022 Inc. 5000 list. The financial technology company has also been named as a Most Loved Workplace®, Best Point of Sale Company, and as a Top Fintech Startup by CB Insights. We use cutting-edge innovations in financial technology to bring leading data and features that allow individuals to be qualified instantly, making purchases at the point-of-sale fast, fair and easy for consumers from all walks of life. We create value focused on our core values; we work tirelessly to ensure that Sunbit becomes available to everyone, everywhere.We invite you to #UnleashYourCuriosity and join our ever-growing R&D organization.Check out the open positions & feel free to reach out with any questions!What You’ll Do:The mission of the squad leader is to coordinate all other functions in the squad and to drive the product development process. A squad leader owns and drives the squad. A Squad Leader regularly collaborates with development leaders, software engineers, architects, Product Managers, and management.Lead, and manage a squad that develops and maintains design and create solutions that support a highly reliable, scalable, performant enterpriseWork with other engineers, researchers, and product managers to deliver on our roadmap. Text: At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Title: Marketing & Content Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Job DescriptionAre you an experienced designer with a wild imagination and passion for creating eye-catching advertising? Do you strive for nothing less than world-class? If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you!Role BackgroundSince launching in Tel Aviv in 2018, we've grown beyond all expectations across the country! We're now in 120+ different locations in Israel (with even more planned) and we're adding new partners on a daily basis, offering everything from pizza to paracetamol.Regardless of how fast we are growing, we strive for the best-in-the-world in everything we do. We don’t compromise on quality and we’re fanatic about being the world #1 level. We’ve managed to be best-in-the-world in several things we do, and our brand is now known in many places in the world. Our marketing team is looking to expand it even further. We would love you to join our team!As such we’re looking for a talented Design & Content specialist who will be responsible for delivering effective and eye-catching assets that will be used for our marketing efforts inside and outside our app. Specifically, this role will focus on providing creatives and assets for our Israel market in which the campaigns will run on multiple platforms ranging from very own app, digital media (including social media), office environment, and much more.What You’ll Be DoingIdeate with the marketing team and agencies, create and deliver on-brand and eye-catching assets, amazing copy and campaigns that will be used for our Israeli market.Define and develop campaign materials with your colleagues and produce assets according to the brief.Translate and localize global creatives and adjust them to the local market needs, including content & copywriting. Work closely with the global creative team, the performance marketing team, and the local Israel marketing team to produce digital imagery in various formats for Wolt’s various channels (Email, Application, Social Media, company events, etc). Build creative best practices & continuously improve the performance of our online creatives.Participate in design, content, and marketing meetings, brainstorming sessions, reviews, workshops and more. Keep iterating the creatives to achieve the best possible results.Our humble expectationsSolid graphic and writing (copywriting & Content) skills. Proven hands-on experience throughout image production processes – from beginning to end.Solid skills in Adobe CC (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.) You have a comprehensive visual portfolio including work examples for advertising in Israel.Interest in current design trends and the latest technologies applicable to design.Creativity, proactivity, tons of initiatives.Good communication & writing skills in English and fluent in Hebrew.Good time-management skills. You are organized and know how to allocate your time efficiently. Next StepsIf you are excited about taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!We will be reviewing applications on an on-going basis, so send through your application ASAP! The positions will be filled once we have found the suitable candidates. 😊About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Since launching 7 years ago, Wolt has expanded from a restaurant food delivery platform in the Nordics to a leading player in the delivery of everything across EMEA. Wolt works together with tens of thousands of restaurant and retail partners, as well as with over a hundred thousand courier partners across 23 countries and 250+ cities. In November 2021 Wolt and DoorDash announced they are joining forces, and the transaction is expected to close in H1 2022. We continue to expand rapidly and are looking for more talented individuals to join us.Wolt not only offers great apps to customers and partners, but is also developing a broad range of technologies and solutions. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest reviews, largely because of our customer-centric approach to how we build our products and operations. For example, our customer service team responds in a matter of minutes, in the customer’s own language.So, why work at Wolt?At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together.

Title: Customer Success Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for an experienced, cyber-oriented Customer Success Manager to take full ownership of partners and customers. In this role, you will focus on delivering an exceptional customer experience to the Cynet customers by partnering with them to achieve their goals with Cynet. A successful CSM will enable the customer on the Cynet products while learning about their customer’s goals and the KPIs they are tracking.This position requires a passion for customer success. If you are able to add immediate value to your customer engagements and identify risks while up-selling opportunities, then this is the job for you!Requirements:3+ years of experience in Customer Success rolesExcellent communication skillsTeam player with a positive and forward-looking attitudeAbility to work creatively under pressureStrong business skillsWhat will you do: Manage customer relationship with Cynet via a regular cadence of communication. Partner with customers to determine goals and KPIs and manage them through successful completion. Serve as a point of escalation for customers. Perform Executive Business Reviews (EBRs) involving C-levels from the customer and Cynet Advocate internally and externally while effectively maintaining a customer communication plan on pending issues. Collaborate with internal teams such as product management, PS, engineering, and sales Become a trusted advisor with customers by deeply understanding their business and aligning their needs with our solutions. Track and monitor customer status, identify risk, and demonstrate new product features and functionality.About Us:Cynet is a technology-oriented company continuously looking for new ways to innovate the Cybersecurity world. Our main priority is to defend our customers from any harm in the vast digital ocean. But Cynet is more than just a product; we are a family. We value each one of our members and their inputs. Cynet is a place where your work will directly impact the way we service our customers.You’ll be joining a growing company with offices in Boston, the UK, Italy, and Israel and collaborating with a world-class Sales, Marketing, and executive team in a fast-paced, rapidly advancing cybersecurity space.BENEFITS:Compensation will depend on skills and experience. Cynet offers a comprehensive, high-quality benefits program that includes medical and dental care, Paid Time Off, 401k matched by the company, maternity leave plan, and other benefits to its employees.EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER:Due to the anticipated volume of responses, we will contact only those candidates who most closely match our requirements. We’re an equal opportunity employer dedicated to building a culturally and experientially diverse and balanced team.

Title: עוזר/ת למנהל/ת חשבונות
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: מי אנחנוחברה גלובאלית הנותנת שירותים של חללי עבודה יפים ומעוררי השראה לצוותים בכל הגדלים: יזמים, פרילנסרים, סטארטפים, מעצבים, נותני שירות ועוד. אנו מציעים שירותים והטבות לחברים שלנו על מנת שיוכלו להגיע למשרד ולדאוג רק לעסק ולהצלחה שלהם. חללים אלגנטיים ויפים מספקים נוחות, מה שמאפשר ללקוחות שלנו להתמקד במה שחשוב- הצמיחה וההתפתחות שלהם.אנחנו מגייסיםרוצה להצטרף לצוות שלנו? אנחנו מחפשים מועמד/ ת שיודע/ ת לעבוד קשה ולהצליח. אנו מחפשים עוזר/ת למנהל/ת חשבונות שתצטרף למשפחה שלנו. מדובר במשרה חלקית בתל אביב.תחומי אחראיות עיקריים בתפקידרישום פקודות יומןהתאמות מול ספקים והזמנת חשבוניות רכשהתאמות בנקיםהתאמת כרטיסי אשראי וקבלותעדכון מערכת SAP B1אדמיניסטרציה וארגון מסמכיםדיווח למנהל/ ת חשבונות ראשיתRequirements:ניסיון ודרישות תפקיד:תעודת מנהל/ת חשבונות ( רמה 2 ומעלה )שנתיים ניסיוןשליטה טובה באופיס , בעיקר ב- EXCEL ו- OUTLOOK . יכולת להסתגל למערכות מידע חדשותיכולת ארגון מעולה ותשומת לב לפרטים , גישה חיוביתתודעת שירות גבוהההיכרות עם SAPB1 – יתרוןאנגלית בסיסית

Title: Talent Acquisition Team Leader
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We’re looking for a Talent Acquisition Team Leader to join our HR team!At Overwolf, it’s all about the people, and we understand that in the deepest manner. As a Talent Acquisition Manager, you’ll take ownership of high-scale recruitment efforts and lead a team of 3 to create a legendary recruiting process for our candidates and managers.Our vision starts with our end-users - AAA gamers, to our customers, the in-game creators, and our people behind the scenes who make it all happen.We see you as the next link in the chain, someone who leads our Talent Acquisition team to legendary outcomes.Ready to join the pack?Requirements:4+ years of experience recruiting for tech positions in startups1+ years of experience leading recruiters in startupsStrong background in a variety of recruiting tools and sourcing strategiesExcellent communication skills (Hebrew and English)High attention to detail, a can-do attitude, and the ability to work in a dynamic environmentHands-on experience with ComeetBonus points:Global recruitment experienceBuilding and scaling recruitment processes and talent development at early-stage companiesBA in a relevant fieldAbout Us:Overwolf is the world’s leading platform for in-game creators and gamers who build or consume user-generated content around their favorite games. We’re talking about some of the biggest AAA titles – games like Minecraft, League of Legends, World of Warcraft, PUBG, and Fortnite – to name a few.The way people create and play games worldwide is changing, and Overwolf is leading the revolution. We empower just about 100K creators to make the best games even better - giving them everything they need to create unique gaming experiences that serve more than 31M gamers monthly.Our mission is to turn in-game creation into a new profession and build the next generation of games. And we’re just getting started.Are you ready to join the pack and shape the future of gaming?Responsibilities:﻿Hire for a range of roles across the company in a hands-on capacityManage the hiring process & continuously refine itLead & build a strong recruiting team (~4 members)Set clear goals, KPIs, and deadlinesProvide mentorship, guidance, and motivationCreate an inspiring environment with an open communication cultureDevelop, maintain and improve recruitment data and its analysis to fuel decision makingContinuously monitor the industry and be on top of fresh sourcing channelsEstablish and maintain meaningful relationships with hiring managers and key cross-functional stakeholdersProvide a great candidate experience - collect and deliver feedback and drive timely mannered communication and decision makingHelp build a welcoming employer brand, promoting our employer value proposition and growing brand awarenessKeep management updated on the team's performance
Requirements: ['4+ years of experience recruiting for tech positions in startups', '1+ years of experience leading recruiters in startups', 'Strong background in a variety of recruiting tools and sourcing strategies', 'Excellent communication skills (Hebrew and English)', 'High attention to detail, a can-do attitude, and the ability to work in a dynamic environment', 'Hands-on experience with Comeet', 'Global recruitment experience', 'Building and scaling recruitment processes and talent development at early-stage companies', 'BA in a relevant field', '\ufeffHire for a range of roles across the company in a hands-on capacity', 'Manage the hiring process & continuously refine it', 'Lead & build a strong recruiting team (~4 members)', 'Set clear goals, KPIs, and deadlines', 'Provide mentorship, guidance, and motivation', 'Create an inspiring environment with an open communication culture', 'Develop, maintain and improve recruitment data and its analysis to fuel decision making', 'Continuously monitor the industry and be on top of fresh sourcing channels', 'Establish and maintain meaningful relationships with hiring managers and key cross-functional stakeholders', 'Provide a great candidate experience - collect and deliver feedback and drive timely mannered communication and decision making', 'Help build a welcoming employer brand, promoting our employer value proposition and growing brand awareness', "Keep management updated on the team's performance"]

Title: Commercial Counsel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Claroty empowers the world's largest enterprises to secure their cyber-physical systems across industrial (OT), healthcare (IoMT), and enterprise (IoT) environments: the Extended Internet of Things (IoT). The Claroty Platform integrates with customers’ existing infrastructure to provide a full range of controls for visibility, risk and vulnerability management, threat detection, and secure remote access. Our platform is deployed by hundreds of organizations at thousands of sites across all seven continents, and our customers represent critical national infrastructure across the healthcare, oil & gas, utilities, mining, and manufacturing verticals.Founded in 2015, Claroty is headquartered in New York City, with more than 400 employees across the Americas, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and Tel Aviv. Claroty has raised $635 million in funding from the world’s largest investment firms and industrial automation vendors – including SoftBank, Bessemer Venture Partners, Rockwell Automation, Schneider Electric, and Siemens – making it the most well-funded industrial cybersecurity company.Claroty is a dynamic, fast-growing company, and we live our values of People First, Customer Obsession, Strive for Excellence, and Integrity. We are always searching for energetic people who will get excited about these values and make a difference. Claroty is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment for all. We encourage applications from candidates of all diverse backgrounds.We are looking for an exceptionally gifted Commercial Counsel to join our growing team of the most outstanding and creative minds in cybersecurity.Requirements:2-5 years of experience working as a Commercial lawyer in a leading law firm and/or in-house legal departmentSignificant experience with negotiating various commercial transactions worldwide, including SaaS and other licensing agreements, partner agreements and general purchasing mattersFamiliarity with privacy law issues, including GDPRExcellent drafting and conversational skills in English Ability to balance legal concerns with requirements of businessAbility to work under pressureAvailability outside normal business hoursHighly motivated team player, with attention to details and problem-solving attitudeStrong organizational and interpersonal skillsFamiliarity with corporate law and financing transactions is a plusLaw degree from Top UniversityResponsibilities:In this role you will, among other things:(i) draft and negotiate all types of agreements between the Company and its customers, partners and vendors;(ii) ensure compliance with various regulatory matters, including privacy matters(iii) handle various corporate matters related to the Company and its subsidiaries worldwide; and(iv) work and coordinate with local, outside counsel as necessary. The position is in Israel and will report to the Company’s Legal Counsel.
Requirements: ['2-5 years of experience working as a Commercial lawyer in a leading law firm and/or in-house legal department', 'Significant experience with negotiating various commercial transactions worldwide, including SaaS and other licensing agreements, partner agreements and general purchasing matters', 'Familiarity with privacy law issues, including GDPR', 'Excellent drafting and conversational skills in English', 'Ability to balance legal concerns with requirements of business', 'Ability to work under pressure', 'Availability outside normal business hours', 'Highly motivated team player, with attention to details and problem-solving attitude', 'Strong organizational and interpersonal skills', 'Familiarity with corporate law and financing transactions is a plus', 'Law degree from Top University']

Title: SDR
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who Connecteam is:Connecteam is a TLV-based startup that's on a mission to change the work experience for 80% of the world's global workforce - the deskless employees.Our business management platform helps thousands of businesses thrive by taking away the daily hustle and complexities of managing teams, so they can have the peace of mind to grow and run their business.What's the job?As an SDR at Connecteam you will work closely with both Marketing and Sales teams. You will engage with Inbound leads (requests for demos, quotes, trials and general information etc) and also prospect into a defined target audience as part of our new Outbound efforts.Your role would be to help scale the operation by nurturing intent among leads that expressed interest in what we do, while generating interest through our new Outbound motions working closely with Sales and leadership to build, optimize and scale the new programs.What you'll be doing: As an SDR you'll help us engage with inbound leads via calls/email/socialIdentify the qualified leads and set up qualified demos for Sales to establish and grow pipeline opportunitiesEmail campaigns and follow up with relevant leadsEstablish and nurture long term relationships with Top of funnel leads via LinkedIn/emails/chat, moving them through the sales funnel, until they are ready for high intent engagement with a sales rep. Manage all of your prospecting efforts in our CRM tool (hubspot) to ensure we can track all sales and prospecting activityWork in close collaboration with the Sales team on strategic new business initiatives (markets, roles, geographies etc.) to generate new opportunities. Researching and mapping our target audience around organizational structure, people, and existing technology, and creating a plan with product marketing of whom to contact and with which offering. Manage, nurture and grow a pipeline of relevant outband prospectsResearch and prospect our markets to find the ideal companies and contacts who will benefit from our product, and to establish new business and build relationships with key decision-makers in those targeted accounts (ABM). What you'll bring with you: Hunger for success, high energy, self motivation, team player, happy person with a proactive and positive attitude. Willingness to get scrappy, we're a start-up!Native English speaker - must! Joining Connecteam Is The Smart Move:We build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we recognize the value in always nurturing and training them so they can go above and beyond in their skills and job duties. We make an impact on our customer's business. We are on a mission to provide managers of all business types and sizes with the tools they need to communicate, operate, engage, and run their deskless workforce. Our product offers them an effective and affordable solution to run their business. We get the job done. Connecteam employees are passionate in executing their job duties so they can drive the company forward and provide real value to our customers. We have fun! From weekly happy hours to holiday parties, we always enjoy each other's company (and good food, of course). Connecteam is like one big, happy family!Everyone is welcome. Connecteam is committed to building an encouraging, caring, and supportive environment. We share a responsibility to support our team and enrich their lives. Together we will shape the future of work!

Title: Team8-Marketing Graphic Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About Team8Team8 is a company-building venture group that builds and invests in companies specializing in Data, AI, Fintech, and Cybersecurity. The Team8 model supports entrepreneurs with an in-house team of researchers, growth experts, and talent acquisition specialists, and a “village” community of enterprise c-level executives and thought leaders. Whether building a new company from scratch or investing in companies already on their journey, Team8 brings a rich ecosystem to work hand in hand with entrepreneurs in accelerating.About the role:We’re hiring an experienced Marketing Graphic Designer to help us bring our communications, branding, and marketing alive using intelligent and thoughtful design. As part of this role, you will work closely with our marketing team and report to the VP of Marketing. Responsibilities:Work with marketing leads on defining the brand and product identitiesWork with the Go to Market team to create beautiful marketing materials, original content, artist/fan shareable, promotions, and initiativesCreate digital graphics for email communications, banners, websites, partner splash pages, etc.Design creative content for presentations, blogs, video diaries, social media, and moreWork with branding to maintain a consistent feel and brand identity across all creative contentRequirements:4+ years of experience as a Graphic Designer Excellent digital and print design, illustration, and typography skillsExperience with video editing and motion graphicsThe ability to create inspired, original designsAbility to execute production-level design work across multiple applicationsProficiency in Adobe Creative Suite programs (After Effects, Premiere Pro, XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)Ability to adhere to deadlines and production schedulesExperience using Discord, Telegram, Twitter and other key platforms & toolsStrong communication skills

Title: מנתח.ת מערכות מנוסה
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Globalbit_ היא חברה מובילה בתחום פיתוח מערכות דיגיטל. יותר מ-200,000,000 אנשים בעולם מסתמכים על האפליקציות והאתרים שבנינו בחיי היומיום שלהם. כן, גם את/ה.אנו מגייסים מנתח.ת מערכות מנוסה שיצטרף לצוות שלנו בחברת ביטוח פיננסים מובילה במרכז!Requirements:תואר ראשון/השכלה גבוהה בתחום מערכות מידע.ניסיון מוכח של לפחות 4 שנות עבודה בניתוח ואפיון מערכות מורכבות.הבנה עסקית עמוקה ויכולת ניתוח טכני של לוגיקה עסקית.ניסיון בניתוח כחלק מתהליך פיתוח מוצרים מורכבים/מערכות ליבה.בדגש על טכנולוגיות חדשות (לא AS400 ולגאסי).ניסיון בניתוח ממשקים (API), תהליכים ואינטגרציה בין מערכות.ניסיון בעבודה עם/מול צוותי פיתוח.ידע וניסיון בעבודה מול בסיסי נתונים.ניסיון עבר כמפתח/ת – יתרון משמעותיResponsibilites:מנתח/ת מערכות מנוסה עבור פרויקטי פיתוח תשתיות אפליקטיביות.הבנה עסקית עמוקה ויכולת ניתוח טכני של לוגיקה עסקית וכתיבת מסמכי אפיון פונקציונאליים וטכניים מורכבים עבור צוותי הפיתוח.כולל:כתיבת מסמכי דרישה/אפיון.התנהלות מול צוותי פיתוח.ליווי הפיתוח והבדיקות.התנהלות מול גורמים חוץ ופנים ארגוניים.אינטגרציה והטמעת יכולות חדשות בתחום.

Title: QA Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About Us and the Role:We are looking for a talented, passionate, and motivated QA Engineer. This position is responsible for the full quality lifecycle, including; planning, monitoring, and testing for our new and existing features.Coro is the fastest-growing security company for small and medium businesses (SMBs) in the US. We provide security-as-a-service for SMBs powered by AI and Cloud with a cloud security platform that protects private data stored in the cloud.So, if a company is using Office365, Google Drive, Or Dropbox, Coro makes sure that data stays secure through multiple layers of protection. We are one of only a few companies in the world providing this service.We recently wrapped up our Series C, where we secured $100M in funding for our Cybersecurity Software Solutions. Coro started in Tel-Aviv, Israel and is also headquartered in Chicago, IL. As a global organization, Coro gives you the ability to work with people and teammates from across the world.Come be a part of expanding the Coro Team!Responsibilities:Full quality lifecycle (planning, monitoring, and testing) for new and existing features Performing manual testing on web and desktop applications Working with a team of QA engineers Tracking and monitoring the QA and prod environment status at any given time Keeping up with the processes, standards, and test methodologies that your team has agreed upon Communicating the technical work of your team to other product development teams Ensuring you and others continuously improve the product quality and user experience of the product Ensuring product release warrantySkills and Experience:A minimum of 3 years of QA experience Familiarity with QA methodologies and knowledge of Agile methodologies Experience with both testing web and desktop apps Experience with testing micro-services Experience with API testing Experience with relation / non-relation DBs Experience with AWS, or any other cloud platform Good communication skills, including strong verbal and written English Proactive thinking and initiative mindset Strong analytical skills Strong responsibility skill Good self-organization skills and ability to self dive into details Experience with CI/CD tools is a plus Kibana, Grafana, Linux bash and shell scripting is a plus Job Benefits and How We Work:Competitive and market value compensation packages Growth opportunities World-class product Office and home perks during launches This is a hybrid position in our TLV office What to Expect in the Interview Process::Phone Screen-15 minutes with our Recruiting Team Virtual Interview-45 minutes with Hiring Manager Virtual or In-Person Interview-45 minutes with VP R&D

Title: Data Scientist - Thetaray
Location: Hod HaSharon, Center District, Israel
Text: ThetaRay is the leading provider of AI-based Big Data analytics.We are dedicated to helping financial organizations combat financial crimes through money laundering facilitating malicious crimes such as terrorist financing, narco trafficking, and human trafficking which negatively impact the global economy.Our Unsupervised and Semi-Supervised Intuitive AI solutions enable clients to manage risk, detect money laundering schemes, uncover operational issues, and reveal valuable new growth opportunities.ThetaRay is looking for a Data Scientist for customer-facing projects that combine data science with deep knowledge and understanding of machine learning and big data technologies to create solutions for customers’ challenges and needs, defining and developing appropriate technical and business solutions. The Data Scientist will work closely with ThetaRay’s Product Management, Algorithm, Engineering, and Customer Success teams and lead external partners to successful implementations of the ThetaRay platform and solutions.Requirements: 3+ years of experience as a data scientist/data engineer/big-data developer BSc or equivalent in Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Economics or another related field Must have proven professional experience in data analytics for financial services with strong data mining and forensic skills Experience working with customers. Advantage – financial customers Must have Hands-on experience and knowledge of scripting languages: Python/PySpark as well as DS workflow management tools including MLflow, Airflow, etc. Hands-on experience using Big Data and statistical analysis tools such as Hadoop/Spark, SQL, and Matlab Experience in NLP or Graph Algorithms - an advantage Working experience with Linux OS (Redhat/Ubuntu) Fluent English & Hebrew both written and spoken Ability to travel to customer locations abroad up to 30%Key Responsibilities Deliver successful deployment and Pilots Manage and design the Customer-specific technical solution throughout the project life cycle Technical leadership of Data Science & Engineering aspects and team members including partners Work on various data sources and apply sophisticated feature engineering capabilities Bring and use business knowledge Extract insights and actionable recommendations from large volumes of data and Investigate anomalies in Big Data Build and manage technical relationships with customers and partners Provide product requirements input to the Product Management team Train the customers on the system – system usage and monitoring aspects Travel to customer locations both domestically and abroadCore Competencies Able to solve tech problems for customers; improvise; cope with unexpected challenges Able to drive relevant internal functions to deliver/solve a problem for customers/partners Ability to design creative solutions for complex requirements Ability to learn and lead projects independently, and to work with minimal supervision at customers’ sites Strong interpersonal relationship building A motivated, self-starter who can demonstrate high analytical and technical skills Ability to execute multiple projects and drive key business results under tight deadlinesthetaray.C8.029@applynow.io

Title: Product Manager - Data (Remote)
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The RoleAs a Data Product Manager, you will work with customers and industry experts to plan and deliver products that will enrich our data platform for our customers.This role provides a fantastic chance to shape the product of a fast growing company from an early stage and work directly with founders, a highly experienced leadership team and Fortune 500 customers.The data teams are responsible for the acquisition, collection, standardization and insights of our data. You will be working in a cross-functional team of technical product managers, Data Analysts, Data Scientists, and Data Engineers to define, build and maintain our end-to-end data processes (from raw data acquisition all the way to insights).You should not be afraid to roll up your sleeves, be hands-on, and have that no-task-too-small mentality. You should be an expert in standard product management methods while simultaneously have the analytical mind-set to translate high level client data requests to specific data points.About LeadgenceLeadgence is a VC backed Continuous Intelligence platform on a mission to improve the ROI in every touchpoint between an Enterprise and its business customers through advanced insights from external data.Through a mix of AI driven big data processes and applications on top of the data that help action the data, we are able to help enterprises targeting SMBs dramatically improve their revenue.In 2 years, Leadgence's service has already been adopted by enterprises including Fortune500, fintech unicorns and financial services and insurance companies.ResponsibilitiesResearch and map your data domain, review the business needs, prioritize the next directions to go, and data to acquire.Work with data scientists and data analysts on translating high level client data requests to data points we can developWork with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, feedback and improve our data products.Translates product roadmap features into well-defined product requirementsOwn the relationship with raw data suppliersWho are you?Have a track record of working in data roles (Data analyst/ Data engineer/ Data product manager, Solutions Engineer for a data company etc.)Accountable and responsible for your product domain.Customer and business oriented, ensuring the product delivers value to our users and businesses Native English speaker - a Must!Why you should join usWe're proud to say that the company is on an exceptional growth trajectory as we have been routinely doubling our revenue every quarter.Having the opportunity to become our first data product manager and build out a data product team.The market we are tackling is huge ($105B!) and sits at the intersection of big data, AI, Fintech, Insurtech and accelerating revenue. There is virtually no ceiling for either what you will be doing or learning here, and we want to support you to grow exponentially, along with the company;We offer competitive compensations, benefits, remote work and all sorts of tools and resources to empower you to do your best work.

Title: Software QA Engineer
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We're looking for a Software QA Engineer to join our QA team and test tools and systems that serve content creators worldwide!As a Software QA Engineer, you will be in charge of testing our unique platform, handling both the back-end and front-end aspects.Overwolf is revolutionizing the way people create and play games. With over 15B yearly downloads of in-game apps and mods, we empower over 95K creators to build gaming experiences that serve 31M gamers monthly.We're on a quest to turn "in-game creator" into a new profession and build the next generation of games.Ready to join the pack?Requirements:2 years of practical experience in QAHardcore PC gamer (MMO, Sandbox, Crafting, and Simulator games)Organized, methodical and able to handle metronomic workExcellent English written communication skillsAbility to read logs and identify critical informationEnthusiastic about new technologiesAdvantages:Experience with test automation frameworksExperience with FiddlerExperience with any coding languageAbout Us:Overwolf is the world’s leading platform for in-game creators and gamers who build or consume user-generated content around their favorite games. We’re talking about some of the biggest AAA titles – games like Minecraft, League of Legends, World of Warcraft, PUBG, and Fortnite – to name a few.The way people create and play games worldwide is changing, and Overwolf is leading the revolution. We empower just about 100K creators to make the best games even better - giving them everything they need to create unique gaming experiences that serve more than 31M gamers monthly.Our mission is to turn in-game creation into a new profession and build the next generation of games. And we’re just getting started.Are you ready to join the pack and shape the future of gaming?Responsibilities:In this role, you will:﻿Providing feedback on product performance and user experienceWriting and working with test case documentation (STD, STP)Planning and executing tests for cross-platform software (Windows, Mac, Linux)Manual exploratory and regression testingHandling complex work-flows under tight deadlinesInvestigating issues in productionTaking part in the team's Discord activity

Title: Information Operations Webint Analyst
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: ActiveFence’s Information Operations team is working to detect and analyze disinformation campaigns for customers who want to protect their users and reputation from threat actors who actively seek to spread fake news, misinformation, and propaganda for political influence or other motives.We are looking for an OSINT Analyst. Candidates must be internet-fluent, with online resourcefulness, broad areas of interest, technical skills and hacker-like thinking to solve puzzles and lawfully access difficult-to-come-by open-source data from the deep-web.You’re a white-hat hacker or assume you could be a great one. You enjoy finding things online and nothing would stop you from finding answers. You are comfortable with data, a highly technical environment and high-stakes challenges.You will be analyzing malicious activities online while getting to their sources and distribution methods.Data mining and advanced analysis – conducting high-level Open Source Intelligence investigations as well as creating ad-hoc reports on different topics in order to support the sales, intelligence and R&D efforts of the company.Analyzing large data sets and providing meaningful insights.Conducting deep investigationsUtilizing an array of tools and techniquesMapping networks of actors operating in a coordinated fashionRequirements:Skills and qualifications:A pro-active and independent thinker and doer.A Quick learner of new practice areas and technological tools.Tons of curiosity.A methodological approach to the art of web intelligence with stellar organizational skillsAbility to find patterns in complex structuresExtensive WEBINT / OSINT experience (4+ years).Intelligence Background – an advantage.Scripting knowledge – an advantage.Strong written and verbal communication skills.Fluent English.Excellent Excel/Google sheets skillsAdditional languages a plus, especially Chinese and SpanishAbout ActiveFence:ActiveFence is the leading tool stack for Trust & Safety teams, worldwide. By relying on ActiveFence’s end-to-end solution, Trust & Safety teams – of all sizes – can keep users safe from the widest spectrum of online harms, unwanted content, and malicious behavior, including child safety, disinformation, fraud, hate speech, terror, nudity, and more.Using cutting-edge AI and a team of world-class subject-matter experts to continuously collect, analyze, and contextualize data, ActiveFence ensures that in an ever-changing world, customers are always two steps ahead of bad actors. As a result, Trust & Safety teams can be proactive and provide maximum protection to users across a multitude of abuse areas, in 70+ languages.Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors such as CRV and Norwest, ActiveFence has raised $100M to date; employs 300 people worldwide, and has contributed to the online safety of billions of users across the globe.

Title: Tesla Advisor
Location: Rishon LeZion, Center District, Israel
Text: What To ExpectAs a Tesla Advisor it is your responsibility to offer seamless customer service throughout the entire customer journey. You have relentless determination to succeed and you are driven by the mission of Tesla to accelerate the world’s transition to sustainable energy. You act as a pioneer for Tesla products, sharing your knowledge and building lasting relationships.You are part of a larger sales team who works closely and flexibly on all tasks. You are expected to cooperate frequently and display a one-team mentality to achieve sales and delivery targets.What You’ll Do To offer excellent customer service throughout the sales and delivery process. Ensure close and tailored communication with customers at all touch points. Maintain a presentable showroom while proactively addressing all customer queries and appointments. To inform and educate about Tesla at every opportunity. Help create, maintain and develop sales pipelines. Be a strong contributor to achieving store sales and delivery targets. Maintain sales administrative duties including contract completion, finance and ensuring systems are up to date, as well as effectively managing all outbound activities and reporting. Ensure readiness of fleet cars at any given time and have an overview of resources available. Prepare customer vehicles in advance of delivery appointments as well as perform direct deliveries. Manage any additional duties to support wider business requirements.What You’ll Bring Experience in providing excellent customer service in a fast-paced environment. Confident in creating great conversations and relationships tailored to the customer’s need. Ability to thrive in a team-based environment and achieve common goals Great problem solving skills, and strong ability to take initiative and be proactive. Ability to effectively handle multiple priorities, organize workload, and meet deadlines Resilience, adaptability and a constant desire to develop Capable of working autonomously as well as in a team. Title: Financial Controller

Text: Our Global Finance Team is seeking a talented financial controller who thrives on executing in a fast-paced growing organization. The position responsibilities will include actively participating in establishing budget & actual reports, forecasting performance, identifying & analyzing variances. You will be responsible for ensuring efficient delivery of monthly accounts, cash control, costing systems in support of reporting requirements. This is a hands-on, strategic role and will require a solid understanding of all aspects of the business. Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Our storyWhether they know us as 10Bis/ Just Eat Takeaway.com/ Lieferando.de, or any of our 11 international brand names, customers associate us with one thing – easy access to the food they love. Having expanded as Just Eat Takeaway.com, we're now delivering in 22 countries worldwide- from the Netherlands to New Zealand, and known as the leading global online food delivery marketplace outside China.But the secret to our growth isn't food, it's people. From marketing maestros to tech specialists and analytics experts, our international teams give us the ingredients for success. Do you want to contribute to one of the most dynamic and fastest-growing businesses? Then this could be the right challenge for you.All About The Role10Bis's Finance team is looking for an ambitious Accountant Assistance to join our team. The Accountant Assistance should have the ability to quickly understand and execute 10Bis's financial, and accounting needs. The Accountant Assistance will report to the Controller and will be responsible for helping in preparing 10Bis's financial statements and monthly financial reports. We are looking for a team player to collaborate with other team members to execute 10Bis's financial needs to the highest standard. Click Apply now and send us your CV!Department: Finance

Title: JUNIOR TRADER - Dubai, UAE
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum + performance based bonus' - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflectionIndependent thinking through a meritocracy of ideasThe team is more important than the individualBeing the best in any market we enterHiring and keeping only the most effective peopleOthers must benefit from our existenceWhat We Offer In This RoleA full-time position on our Commercial teamCommitted and remarkably talented colleaguesHighly competitive compensation dependent on performanceAn exciting, challenging and fulfilling careerInvestment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in businessEquity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long termResponsibilitiesOwning, managing, and profitably trading in the European power markets while implementing any relevant strategiesInnovating new ideas for trading tools and strategies then working with the analysis and development teams to implement themWorking as a part of our 24/7 operating trading team, to ensure markets are always coveredUtilising self-starter capability while also working efficiently within a team environmentEnsuring all power market regulations and requirements are upheld through good communication with the system operatorsUpholding and living our cultural valuesBasic QualificationsExcellent numerical and logical reasoning skillsAbility to think clearly in critical situationsPassion, resilience, and integrityPreferred Qualification & BackgroundWe look for individuals from strong numerical backgrounds as such skills carry over well for excelling as a Junior Trader. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

Title: Project Manager
Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: Novidea is an insurance technology company solving the toughest challenges faced by insurance distribution businesses. Our innovative, data-driven insurance software platform allows to manage the entire policy lifecycle across all lines of business, using data to inform every business decision, cross-sell and up-sell. Novidea delivers a 360-degree business view, and a powerful competitive advantage.We are looking for an excellent Project Manager to join our Product team.What's the job:As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for planning and monitoring both customer-facing and infrastructure projects, according to a planned schedule, scope, and quality KPIs, as well as identifying and resolving issues, conflicts, and slips (including resources dilemmas between activities), manage the day-to-day coordination of all teams.As a Project Manager in the product department your main responsibilities will be:Handling project requirements from the product, delivery and accompanying processesManaging the project’s roadmap plan - scheduling, resource planning, budget & time tracking;Identify problems and issues, work with stakeholders to develop solutions, and implement an appropriate course of action;Build strong relationships with internal customers, stakeholders, and integration teams to ensure project’s successRequirements:What you have:3-5 years of project management experience.Experience in product development cyclesExperience in managing complex projects simultaneously – in line with specifications and budget.Global experience in implementation systems and project management abroad.Bonus points:Experience in IT systems analysis Familiarity with the world of insurance and insurance systems Knowledge in Salesforce Life at Novidea We hire people, not just skills. We encourage you to apply if you think this role is a great fit for you, even if you don’t meet 100% of the requirements.Novidea is an equal opportunity employer. We believe that diversity is integral to our success, and we are proud and committed to providing equal opportunity employment to all individuals regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, citizenship, national origin, disability, Veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Follow us on social media for more of #lifeatNovideaLinkedIn | Instagram | Facebook

Title: SDR SMB, Israel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who We Are And What We DoDeel is a global team that helps businesses hire anyone, anywhere, easily. Deel consists of more than a thousand self-driven individuals spanning over 75 countries. Our unified yet diverse culture keeps us continually learning and innovating the Deel platform and our products for customers.Companies should be able to hire the best talent anywhere in the world, so we are building the best platform to make that a reality. Our market-leading technology, expertise, and global team are crucial to the success of Deel’s platform. We deliver the best products and platform features in our space, enabling millions of jobs worldwide and connecting the global workforce with the best companies and opportunities.Why should you be part of Deel's success story?A 30-mile hiring radius should no longer dictate how companies hire because great talent lives everywhere. Deel sees a world without hiring borders and endless talent that pairs perfect candidates with great companies.We offer global teams all the tools they need to hire, onboard, manage, pay, and scale at full speed. We aim to foster a diverse global economy by building a generational platform that seamlessly connects companies with talent worldwide.There’s never been a more exciting time to join Deel — the market leader in international payroll and compliance.The PositionAs one of our SDR, you'll be playing a crucial role of breaking into new accounts and fostering relationships with multiple contacts within all levels of our target customer segments. You understand the impact that you'll create to the bottom line, playing one of the most vital roles in the company. The day-to-day role includes collaboration with the wider sales team, market research to identify new potential customers and leads, and qualification of these leads by learning about their approach to onboarding.DutiesDrive Deel's growth through inbound and outbound prospecting efforts, generating sales leads that will turn into opportunities and closed business.Learn from our well-seasoned sales team and help build out our world-class Sales Playbook and Tech Stack.Educate and develop leads through inbound or outbound prospecting via phone calls, emails, events, webinars, and assorted campaigns.Identify and develop an in-depth understanding of each lead generation process, supporting marketing activities, prospect touch-points, and the handoff to an Account Executive.Generate emails sequences, make cold-calls to map and penetrate accounts.Conduct follow-up calls and emails until meetings are set.RequirementsYou are smart and work hardYou have an entrepreneurial spirit/experience with a strong growth mindsetYou have a way with words and can write email copy and sequence campaigns that convertYou are adaptable and comfortable with a fast-paced environmentYou are an active relationship builder who can collaborate with internal and external teams to consistently improve processes and communication workflowsWe’d especially love to speak with you if:You have worked for an HR or Fintech companyYou've worked at a fast-growing startupYou have previously successfully worked in a remote & distributed teamTotal RewardsOur workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.At Deel, you’ll enjoy:A laptop required for this position will be delivered to your door, plus items of your choice from a selection of remote-working equipment available in your region (to be ordered through our service provider)Stock grant opportunities for new hires, promotions, performance, and refreshFlexible Paid Time OffParental leave$100 per month Health and Wellness budget$30 per month Learning and Development budgetChoose where you work with FlexWork. Work from your home, the beach, a Deel office, or the WeWork global membership program.At Deel, we're an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

Title: Event Manager - Replacement for Maternity Leave
Location: Hod HaSharon, Center District, Israel
Text: As Panaya’s Event Manager you will create, coordinate, execute, report, and analyze activities and events to increase awareness and demand generation in the main target countries. The ideal candidate will have an eye for detail, a creative soul, and strong project management skills. The role requires a strong team player with a can-do attitude who is proactive, self-motivated, organized, and methodical.This person will be a strong member of Panaya marketing team but also be involved with the regional sales teams to understand the needs of our most strategic customers.Responsibilities: End-to-end responsibility for a key regional event: drive the development, planning, production, and execution of event projects from proposal to delivery onsite.Deliver events on time, within budget, and exceeding expectations.Manage supplier relationships - such as liaison with venues, event management agencies, AV companies, designers, speakers, agencies, etc. (negotiate pricing where needed). Manage/coordinate operational and administrative tasks such as finance-related activities or closing contracts liaising with our legal department.Ensuring excellent customer service and quality delivery.Maximize Panaya’s reach and presence at third-party events through sponsorship execution and complimentary marketing campaign creation.Leverage, tailor, and localize corporate digital media strategies to scale market awareness and education.Scope: Maternity leave replacement – approx. 6 months.Requirements: 1-2 years’ experience in a B2B field marketing and/or events management, or marketing project management roles. Demonstrates end to end responsibility for an event (concept, production. Budget). Preferred - previous experience in a technology provider, expertise on events in the IT industry.Passion for events with knowledge of industry trends and the latest innovationsStrong team player, project, and people manager - able to gain trust, respect, and confidence quickly and effectively. Strong communicator with the ability to keep stakeholders informedNegotiation skills and demonstrates a strong commercial awareness to maximize performance.Proven Project Management skills showcasing organized and skilled management across multiple work streams. Results-oriented with the ability to think strategically and turn insights into initiatives Ability to prioritize and juggle multiple projects that take place at the same timeResourceful, reliable and able to meet deadlines.Excellent problem-solving skills balanced with both a creative and analytical focus.Adaptable, flexible, cool under pressure, and able to react to changing environments.High attention to detailFluent English; other European languages – advantage  Ability to travel (at least 10% as required)

Title: QA Engineer
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Nayax is looking for a Quality Assurance (QA) engineer to write, execute and run test cases to test mobile apps on several operating systems and verify product quality.The QA engineer role plays an important role in our company’s product development cycle. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for participating in a team that is writing test cases, executing test cycles, and overseeing the development of a feature to ensure it meets both the company’s standards as well as the client’s needs. Ultimately, the position will be someone who will own the features they have worked on and can work to resolve system malfunctions and raise the quality of the company’s system components.The QA Engineer will be part of the R&D team, and will report to the QA Team Leader.IN THIS POSITION YOU WILL:Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents and provide meaningful feedbackCreate detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test casesEstimate, prioritize and help plan testing activitiesParticipate in sprints, assisting the team and communicating status and blockers in a clear and concise mannerIdentify, record and document bugsPerform regression and sanity testing according to the definition of the sprint and product lifecycleRequirements:WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WITH:At least 1 year of proven work experience in software testingKnowledge of QA methodologies, tools and processesExperience in writing test cases and incident reporting.Experience in mobile app testingSQL knowledgeADVANTAGES:Bachelor’s degree in computer science/engineeringExperience with BDDKnowledge of Elasticsearch toolsPrevious experience/knowledge in the areas of IoT or financial/banking platformsEnglish communication skillsWho we are:Nayax is a leading global end-to-end retail technology platform for unattended & attended commerce. Our mission is to simplify commerce and payments for retailers while driving growth, optimizing operations, and enhancing consumer engagement.Nayax Israel is located in the prestigious Herzliya Hills, just a short drive north of Tel Aviv or a very short walk from the train station.Our open space offices accommodate our 400+ employees and when we’re not hard at work, you can find us enjoying an afternoon coffee on the balcony. We’re the largest Nayax site, housing over 20 different departments.For a glimpse of what it's like to work at Nayax, check out our Instagram account! https://bit.ly/3G3QDc4.Check out Nayax's page under "Best Cool Israeli Companies 2022" by Secret Tel-Aviv: https://bit.ly/3LqzElA.Nayax is constantly growing and we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic, innovative and eager individuals to join us in our growth!
Requirements: ['Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents and provide meaningful feedback', 'Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases', 'Estimate, prioritize and help plan testing activities', 'Participate in sprints, assisting the team and communicating status and blockers in a clear and concise manner', 'Identify, record and document bugs', 'Perform regression and sanity testing according to the definition of the sprint and product lifecycle', 'At least 1 year of proven work experience in software testing', 'Knowledge of QA methodologies, tools and processes', 'Experience in writing test cases and incident reporting.', 'Experience in mobile app testing', 'SQL knowledge', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science/engineering', 'Experience with BDD', 'Knowledge of Elasticsearch tools', 'Previous experience/knowledge in the areas of IoT or financial/banking platforms', 'English communication skills']

Title: Data Insights
Location: Center District, Israel
Text: Percepto is the leading provider of autonomous inspection and monitoring solutions, harnessing robotics, including our very own market-leading industrial drone-in-a-box solution. Our team is made up of software and hardware engineers, industry experts and professionals who are all passionate about innovation and driven to push the boundaries of what’s possible with software, AI, and hardware. We are a fast growing company with offices in Israel, the U.S. and Australia, with Fortune 500 clients around the world. Our company growth is not stopping any time soon, and we are looking for great talent like you to join our teamThe data insights specialist will join the Percepto team and be part of the Product Operation department, translating the data gathered from sensors to meaningful reports and insights. These insights impact our customers on a daily basis, exposing them to actionable items.Why join Percepto? We care about the people we work with. We want our team members to grow and develop professionally, to find their job rewarding and intellectually stimulating, and of course - to have fun and feel that they are part of the Percepto family.Requirements:Student/Degree in Information Systems, Industrial Engineering or similarFluent English - MUSTExcellent technical skillsProblem solver, mission oriented, team player Responsibilities:Translate data into insights while understanding the startup environment and dynamicsLearn and understand various industries of Percepto’s clientsOwn and push forward your daily tasks while working according to the timeline of our clients Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze gathered dataCollaborate with various teams across the organization to share and explore the data of our client Broad overview of our platform and in-depth understanding of Percepto’s deliverablesWilling to work full time (hourly pay)

Title: Director of Engineering
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Snappy is looking for a Director of Engineering to join our TLV office.In this role, you will be responsible for managing multiple multidisciplinary teams (Scrum) and being an integral part of our engineering team by providing technical leadership, mentoring, coaching, and guidance. In order to ensure proper delivery, you will work with key stakeholders from the product and business units as well as software engineers. You will report to Snappy's VP R&D and be part of the R&D management.The ideal candidate will be a natural leader, combining strong management and technical skills, along with a history of success in high-growth B2B / B2C SaaS companies.Responsibilities:Lead and mentor a growing group of engineers and team leaders in various aspects such as design, architecture, development, etc. Recruit, grow, and retain top talent to your team!Oversee that the teams deliver the products with engineering excellenceTrack development process and assume full ownership and accountability over product delivery, quality, production monitoring and timelinesDirect a group of developers through the development life cycle, assuring successful project execution. Scrum of scrum lead and advantageHands-on attitude get into the technical details where requiredEmbed Agile ways of working and values within the organizationRequirements:10+ years of experience in software development5+ years of leadership experience2+ years of managing managersExperience in building large scale B2B SaaS productsExtensive experience and a genuine passion for building and running cutting-edge product engineering teamsSuccessfully recruited and built great teamsTeam player, 'can-do' attitude, strong interpersonal skillsExperience in architecting, designing, developing, and implementing cloud solutions on AWS platformsExperience with Node.js, React - a big advantageThorough knowledge and understanding of modern software languages and engineering best practicesProven track record of leading technology groups, and leading project execution to successMSc. or BSc. in Computer Sciences from a top universitySnappy is an award winning, all-in-one gifting platform that helps companies reward their employees and customers - boosting loyalty and engagement through a fun and engaging digital experience. Snappy's gifting algorithm automates the selection and sending off personal gifts and messages at scale, and notifies recipients through fun and personalized digital unboxing experiences.We specialize in building recognition programs for all sorts of businesses - Amazon, Zoom, Salesforce, Microsoft, Uber, Deloitte and over 3000 more, Plus, we're growing everyday, if you want to get technical!We've seen firsthand that our experience boosts morale, improves performance, and (most importantly!) spreads joy.Snappy has its headquarters in New York and 300 employees in four countries (New York, Tel-Aviv, London, and Ukraine).
