Title: Senior Social Media Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Who Connecteam is:Connecteam is a TLV-based startup that's on a mission to change the work experience for 80% of the world's global workforce - the deskless employees.Our business management platform helps thousands of businesses thrive by taking away the daily hustle and complexities of managing teams, so they can have the peace of mind to grow and run their business.We see the Social Media channel as one of our most significant strategic ends for the coming years! We are looking for an experienced social media professional to take ownership of YouTube & Tik-Tok and grow our followers and engagement through its social media outlet.What's the job?As Connecteam's Senior Social Media Manager, you will be a part of our growing Social Media team.You will be responsible for building a comprehensive social media strategy for a dedicated channel, planning and executing branding strategy on social outlets, and creating meaningful engagement with our target audience of small business owners and operators.What you'll be doing: Take ownership of a dedicated social media channel Develop and implement Connecteam's social media brand strategy for the designated channelPlan and execute branding strategy together with the social teamCreate community and marketing materialsExplore opportunities on other social media platforms, such as Reddit, Dribbble, Pinterest, and ClubhouseRespond to customer comments/messages on social outletsCoordinate and develop social media best practices and strategies with other departments that utilize social accountsUse a data-driven approach to inform and build an overall social strategy to increase awareness and engagementWork with relevant stakeholders to develop and execute creative ideas, plans, and strategiesWhich qualifications you'll need:Native written and spoken English - MUST3+ years of experience managing social media channels - MUSTProven experience developing and implementing a successful social media strategy at scaleExperience in planning and executing branding strategy in all social media outlets, especially on YouTube, Tik-Tok. Have a keen understanding of industry trends, new platforms, and best practicesExcellent interpersonal and organizational skillsAbility to work under pressure and meet tight deadlinesExperience in SaaS B2B - an advantageBackground working with SMB audiences - an advantageHiring process with us: At Connecteam, we aim to complete our hiring processes at lightning speed, keeping the time between when we receive your CV until you (hopefully) sign with us super short, communicative and transparent.Joining Connecteam Is The Smart Move:We build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we recognize the value in always nurturing and training them so they can go above and beyond in their skills and job duties. We make an impact on our customer's business. We are on a mission to provide managers of all business types and sizes with the tools they need to communicate, operate, engage, and run their deskless workforce. Our product offers them an effective and affordable solution to run their business. We get the job done. Connecteam employees are passionate in executing their job duties so they can drive the company forward and provide real value to our customers. We have fun! From weekly happy hours to holiday parties, we always enjoy each other's company (and good food, of course). Connecteam is like one big, happy family!Everyone is welcome. Connecteam is committed to building an encouraging, caring, and supportive environment. We share a responsibility to support our team and enrich their lives. Together we will shape the future of work!

Title: Collection Team Lead

Text: Papaya Global is an established B2B tech unicorn in hypergrowth. We are on a mission to reimagine the payroll category with a game-changing, disruptive technology. Papaya Global is reinventing workforce management, global payroll and payroll payments to remove the friction of complexity and regulation create. Our automated platform helps companies hire, onboard, manage, and pay people in more than 160 countries. We don’t just cover the globe with our solution; we are global. Title: Marketing Content Writer - IL
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: We are seeking to add a skilled marketing content writer to join our marketing team and be part of working on a wide range of marketing projects in the B2B area. The marketing content writer will be responsible for creating different marketing materials such as blog posts, white papers, brochures, presentations, as well as social media content and digital content including ad words and landing pages. In addition, in this position the writer will be responsible for drafting video scripts, including tutorials and filmed interviews and will work closely with the video editing team as well as with other relevant teams in the company.The ideal candidate will have prior professional experience as a marketing writer, and/or professional copywriter for advertising agencies. They must be highly organized and have the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and complete high-quality work on tight deadlines.Responsibilities:Conceptualize and write different types of content, ensuring a consistent, compelling narrative, style and brand voice in alignment with company’s marketing strategy and core messaging.Deliver effective and impactful content on a multitude of projects including blog posts, research reports, white papers, content for the website, social media posts, email and digital campaigns, case studies, thought leadership bylines and more. Work with our video team as well as product teams on creating different videos and tutorialsContinually refine and improve content based on feedback and analyticsConduct in-depth research, using external and internal resourcesFollow an editorial calendar, collaborating with other members of the marketing team to ensure timely delivery of materialsRequirements:3+ years of content marketing writing experience in B2B SaaS companiesA native English speaker and writer with outstanding verbal and written communication skills – a mustExperience in writing video scripts, including tutorials – an advantageExperience in writing different thought leadership marketing materials such as articles, reports and whitepapersExperience in creating B2B lead generation campaigns including ads, landing pages and newslettersPrevious experience working with Hubspot – an advantageFamiliarity and understanding of SEO best practices – an advantageA true marketeer – real understanding of the B2B marketing world and a storyteller by natureWriting portfolio required – Please make sure to include your updated portfolio with your CV

Title: Israel Scientific & Regulatory Affairs Director
Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: Applies the Group's regulatory strategy and ensures the accountability of his/her entity in implementing regulations, particularly cosmetic and chemical regulations, for the commercialization of products. Lead a team responsible for: Ensuring finished product compliance, while shortening time-to-market and enabling fluent business operation Review and validation of marketing claims and all product labels' based on local regulatory requirements, scientific substantiation and best practices Independently masters the composition of regulatory files and all matters concerning technical management in compliance with quality and set deadlines. Develop established expertise in local technical regulations Represent L’Oréal in dealings with local authorities Act as scientific advisor to the Country Manager and his management committee, particularly with regard to crisis management Act as a leading figure within professional organizations and provide proactive monitoring of changes to local regulations Help promote proactive product communications in compliance with the Group’s and country's regulations and ethical values Lead cross-disciplinary projects initiated within the technical-regulatory networkPROFESSIONAL & TECHNICAL COMPETENCIESSCIENTIFIC/TECHNICAL EXCELLENCE. Ensures compliance with quality, safety and sustainability.COLLABORATIVE LEADERSHIP FOR INNOVATION Shares the vision and translates it into effective goals Acts with a local and global perspective to achieve the multipolar innovation goals Promotes collaboration among functions to ensure collective performance Fosters dialogue with the business and brands to transform innovation into big market opportunities.

Title: System QA
Location: Raanana, Center District, Israel
Text: D-Fend Solutions values its employees as our greatest asset. Our professionals and subject matter experts, including personnel from elite military intelligence technology units, provide the best possible solutions to our leading customers around the world. We are proud of our impressive presence across different environments and industries, as well as the results we have helped our customers achieve in contending with their counter-drone challenges.In addition to professional expertise, D-Fend Solutions seeks candidates who will thrive in a fast-moving, innovative and collaborative culture. It helps if you enjoy having fun – our “D-Fenders” are a light-hearted bunch who have stashed rubber ducks all around our headquarters.Are you interested in working with the world’s leading cyber-takeover counter-drone technology provider?Join D-Fend Solutions in helping to make the world a safer place by addressing emerging challenges in the dynamic and exciting counter-drone arena!We are looking for experienced manual system tester, who will take an integral role in designing building and overseeing the execution of the system testing. Leading and maintaining ownership of major features while assisting the other team members.What will your job look like?Test system features and functionalityDefine and maintain test plans for new features and regression testConduct system performance tests (indoor and outdoor)Manage, analyze and validate defects. Assist the TL in bequeath the current testing methodologies as well as implementing new tools and approaches Requirements:At least 2 years of experience as a manual system QA tester or similar relevant experienceAbility to work under dynamic, changing, and multidisciplinary environmentHighly motivated, self-driven, independentAbility to mentor and assist new team membersBackground in Computer science/programming – advantageExperience in Jira (X-Ray) and Kibana – advantageExperience with Linux environment - advantage

Title: Marketing Communications Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: If you’re motivated, creative, and a seasoned or developing marketing pro - this position is for you! By touching all elements involved in traditional marketing communications, this is a dynamic and fast-paced role filled with exciting opportunities and meaningful impact within the organization. Apply today if this sounds like the right fit for you:Create internal and external presentations, one-pagers, catalogues, brochures, and technical documents including graphic design in Adobe suite programs and content writing/creation in a high standard Manage partner relations including onboarding partners into our partner network, provide regular updates on available marketing materials/opportunities with Gauzy, and be a general marketing point of contact for partners Translate written content from English to Hebrew (other languages a plus) including marketing collateral or press releases Coordinate and manage photo and video shoots at local/international projects and installations, or for products Support digital marketing manager with social media strategy including content writing, image selection, scheduling posts and finding content to share Support HR marketing efforts including templates, internal event invites/visuals, posting on our internal social site Maintain marketing materials database in internal and shared folders Manage marketing finance requests including entry of purchase requests and orders into systems * This position reports directly to the VP of Marketing, supports all members of the marketing team, and works closely with sales and other cross organizational departments Requirements:Highly proficient use of Adobe Suite primarily photoshop, indesign, illustrator, and PPT Proficient in video editing softwares/platforms, Mailchimp, and Monday.com - a big plus Strong content writing and editing skills Motivated, hungry, high volume output, ready to learn, a positive attitude, and ready to be an A player for an A Team Extremely organized and strong project management skills Bilingual (Hebrew, English – A MUST) Creative, detail oriented, and an eye for design A degree or previous work in marketing, communications, or something similar Flexibility to work with an international company and team

Title: Financial Planning and Analysis Manager
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: Do you want to use your strong analytical skills and stakeholder management abilities on creating insights and driving business performance? Do you enjoy leading a team and aspire to work in a fast paced and dynamic environment? Then maybe you are the "Financial Planning & Analysis Manager" we are looking for!The DepartmentFinancial Planning and Analysis department is part of the Finance & Operations organisation in Novo Nordisk Israel, alongside Commercial Supply Chain, Accounting & Taxation, Digital Data & IT.The PositionAs Financial Planning and Analysis Manager you will lead the periodic budgeting exercise, sales forecasting, cost controlling, and act as trusted finance partner to the Business Units.Specific Duties Include, But Not Limited ToFinancial management, planning and reportingOwn the budget/rolling estimate processes and preparation of final budget/estimates.Responsible for month end process and monthly reporting.Continuous monitoring of sales and cost, with special focus on productivity & resource allocation.Own internal controls and ensure keeping House in Order.Financial business partneringKeep Israel Leadership Team / BUs informed about the financial performance and prepare proposals of preventive and corrective actions if necessary to keep targets and requirements.Act as a business partner to BUs / departments and continuously look for opportunities to optimise and improve financial performance Identify when financial data and market analysis can support a strategic discussion and serve as a tool for efficient decision makingContribute to a high performing teamLead, manage and motivate the FP&A teamContribute to a positive and attractive working environmentAct as sparring partner for the Finance & Operations DirectorYour QualificationsIt is required for this position that:You have completed a master’s degree in Finance or Economics with excellent results and have a minimum of 3-5 years of experience in Finance, with a focus in financial planning and/or strategic finance.You have expertise in financial systems such as SAP and BW BO, Microsoft Excel, and PowerPoint. Experience with Business Intelligence tools such as QlikSense or PowerBI is an advantageYou speak English fluentlyYou have strong communication and analytical skillsInternational experience & people management experience are considered a plus.FurthermoreYou are hands-on analytical person, ready to support the line of business in any task that unexpectedly unfolds. You are flexible, easy to adapt to new circumstances, and communicative. You come with a can-do attitude to drive analysis and processes forward. You have sound stakeholder management skills including emotional intelligence, a customer mindset and the ability to communicate complex insights in an effective way to both senior management and throughout the organization.Working at Novo NordiskWe are a proud life-science company, and life is our reason to exist. We’re inspired by life in all its forms and shapes, ups and downs, opportunities, and challenges. For employees at Novo Nordisk, life means many things – from the building blocks of life that form the basis of ground-breaking scientific research, to our rich personal lives that motivate and energise us to perform our best at work. Ultimately, life is why we’re all here - to ensure that people can lead a life independent of chronic disease.DeadlineApply before November 30ContactIf you believe you are qualified and are willing to take the challenge, please send your motivation letter, CV, and relevant documentation directly via our online application tool. In case of any doubts related to the position, please get in touch with Thanassis Kyriakopoulos, Finance & Operations Director in Israel, via email atky@novonordisk.comWe commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.
Requirements: ['Own the budget/rolling estimate processes and preparation of final budget/estimates.', 'Responsible for month end process and monthly reporting.', 'Continuous monitoring of sales and cost, with special focus on productivity & resource allocation.', 'Own internal controls and ensure keeping House in Order.', 'Keep Israel Leadership Team / BUs informed about the financial performance and prepare proposals of preventive and corrective actions if necessary to keep targets and requirements.', 'Act as a business partner to BUs / departments and continuously look for opportunities to optimise and improve financial performance', 'Identify when financial data and market analysis can support a strategic discussion and serve as a tool for efficient decision making', 'Lead, manage and motivate the FP&A team', 'Contribute to a positive and attractive working environment', 'Act as sparring partner for the Finance & Operations Director', 'You have completed a master’s degree in Finance or Economics with excellent results and have a minimum of 3-5 years of experience in Finance, with a focus in financial planning and/or strategic finance.', 'You have expertise in financial systems such as SAP and BW BO, Microsoft Excel, and PowerPoint. Experience with Business Intelligence tools such as QlikSense or PowerBI is an advantage', 'You speak English fluently', 'You have strong communication and analytical skills', 'International experience & people management experience are considered a plus.']

Title: Social Media Manager (Remote)
Location: Ashdod, South District, Israel
Text: The objective of this role is to help drive the social media needs of the INFUSEmedia business. This encompasses all of our social media platforms (Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, youtube, etc).Position Objectives:Working with the marketing and sales teams to help build and manage the social media campaigns, content promotion, and driving inbound lead generation. Identifying patterns in social media performance and guiding creation. Managing and assisting in the creation of a social media schedule across multiple platforms (incl. LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter). Creating regular reports, monitoring campaign and content success rates to guide future strategies. Helping to build and maintain a consistent brand voice with different audiences. Coordinate with the Creative Team to produce graphics and designs that support our social media promotions. About YouYou are passionate about social media and have experience in managing all the above elements. Any B2B marketing experience would be advantageous but is not necessary. Experience using all social media platforms and tailoring campaigns to meet their requirements. Experience using Hubspot to manage social media campaignsExcellent verbal and organizational skills. Experience building social media strategies that drive results and grow engagement. You are not afraid to bring new ideas to the table and challenge the status quo when necessary. Keen to learn and progress. Familiar with Google Analytics, Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Hubspot, and the ins and outs of social media analytics. Our Hiring Process:We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals—every person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment.We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team.At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting (or Zoom, for as long as we are in a pandemic) where you will meet our INFUSEmedia team.From thereon, it's decision time! If you are still excited to join INFUSEmedia and we like you as much, we will have a conversation about your offer. We do not make offers without giving you the opportunity to speak with us live. After all, we consider our team members our family, and we want you to feel comfortable and welcomed.
Requirements: ['Working with the marketing and sales teams to help build and manage the social media campaigns, content promotion, and driving inbound lead generation.', 'Identifying patterns in social media performance and guiding creation.', 'Managing and assisting in the creation of a social media schedule across multiple platforms (incl. LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter).', 'Creating regular reports, monitoring campaign and content success rates to guide future strategies.', 'Helping to build and maintain a consistent brand voice with different audiences.', 'Coordinate with the Creative Team to produce graphics and designs that support our social media promotions.', 'You are passionate about social media and have experience in managing all the above elements.', 'Any B2B marketing experience would be advantageous but is not necessary.', 'Experience using all social media platforms and tailoring campaigns to meet their requirements.', 'Experience using Hubspot to manage social media campaigns', 'Excellent verbal and organizational skills.', 'Experience building social media strategies that drive results and grow engagement.', 'You are not afraid to bring new ideas to the table and challenge the status quo when necessary.', 'Keen to learn and progress.', 'Familiar with Google Analytics, Google Docs, Microsoft Office, Hubspot, and the ins and outs of social media analytics.']

Title: Middle Office
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a Middle Office to help our Securities team make sure our trades clear and settle correctly.Requirements:Bachelor’s degree in related fields. 3-5 years of experience in Capital Markets at an investment bank, retail bank or other financial services institution – A must. An in-depth understanding of Israeli, US and European assets trade life cycle, settlement practices, corporate actions, and relevant controls – A must. Familiarity with the following asset classes: ETFs, equities, options, bonds, both on Israeli and foreign capital markets – A must.Previous experience in Risk Management or Compliance department – Big advantageExcellent organizational skills with the ability and desire to follow through on all outstanding issues.Able to handle competing priorities and work effectively in a challenging, fast-paced environment.Excellent computer skills with MS, trading systems and Bloomberg.Positive professional attitude and presence.Must be discreet, trustworthy, and mature.Fluent English required.Responsibilities:Our trade flows are complex and happen very rapidly—you’ll be a key part of the team responsible for making sure these trades are reported, allocated, and cleared as intended. You will support new counterparty onboarding processes and maintain existing counterparty databases.You’ll sit at the hub of our trading activity each day, helping to build and maintain operational processes and relationships with brokers, counterparties, and clients. You’ll leverage these connections, working closely with external partners, to confirm that all parties agree on the terms of a trade. When issues arise, you’ll be responsible for resolving them immediately.Attention to detail and a “no job too small” attitude will be important for the daily activities of this role. Additionally, the ability to see the big picture and appreciate how various pieces fit together will prove critical for helping us examine our processes, look for ways to automate, and increase the efficiency of our current workflows.
Requirements: ['Bachelor’s degree in related fields.', '3-5 years of experience in Capital Markets at an investment bank, retail bank or other financial services institution – A must.', 'An in-depth understanding of Israeli, US and European assets trade life cycle, settlement practices, corporate actions, and relevant controls – A must.', 'Familiarity with the following asset classes: ETFs, equities, options, bonds, both on Israeli and foreign capital markets – A must.', 'Previous experience in Risk Management or Compliance department – Big advantage', 'Excellent organizational skills with the ability and desire to follow through on all outstanding issues.', 'Able to handle competing priorities and work effectively in a challenging, fast-paced environment.', 'Excellent computer skills with MS, trading systems and Bloomberg.', 'Positive professional attitude and presence.', 'Must be discreet, trustworthy, and mature.', 'Fluent English required.']

Title: Office Manager and Personal Assistant
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: CloudZone is currently seeking a Office Manager and Personal Assistant to join our fast-paced company with a success driven culture.CloudZone is the leading multi-Cloud service provider in Israel, and a top-tier partner of all three leading Public Cloud Platforms - Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. with satellite offices in NYC, Portugal, and France, we serve customers across the US, Europe, Middle East, and Africa. Title: Legal Counsel

Text: AudioCodes is looking for an accomplished and talented Legal Counsel, who is execution-oriented, ambitious and has an “enabler” attitude, to join our legal department in Airport City, Lod. regarding business decisions and operations, and advising on mitigations.

Title: Electronics Engineer

Title: מחווט/ת
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: לחברה ביטחונית מובילה העוסקת במערכות אלקטרו-אופטיות ומולטידיסיפלנריות דרוש/ה מחווט/תלטובת בדיקות סופיות ובדיקות בתהליך ייצור של מערכות אופטיות מכ"מ ותקשורתביצוע הרכבות עדינות של מכלולים אלקטרוניים, הלחמות, עבודת הרכבות מכאניות משתנות ומגוונותתפקיד מספק הזדמנות מיוחדת להשתלב בייצור מוצרים בתחום ה- RF ומערכות צבאיות ואזרחיות (כגון ל"א, מכ"ם ותקשורת).העבודה במשרה מלאה במשרדי החברה.Requirements: ניסיון בחיווט צבאי - חובהניסיון טכני בעבודה במפעלי אלקטרוניקה, הרכבות עדינות וכן הלחמות - חובה.מנוסה בעבודה בהלחמות מדויקות - חובה.יכולת קריאת שרטוטים טכניים – חובה.יכולת עבודת בצוות ושיתוף פעולה.יכולת עבודה מסודרת ויעילה.נכונות לעבודה מאומצת.שפות: עברית, אנגלית בסיסית
Requirements: ['ביצוע הרכבות עדינות של מכלולים אלקטרוניים, הלחמות, עבודת הרכבות מכאניות משתנות ומגוונות']

Title: Talent Sourcer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Run:ai is looking for a full-time, in-house global talent sourcer to join our growing recruiting team in our Tel Aviv office.In this role you will work closely with recruiters and hiring managers to recognize and attract top Engineering, Product Managers, Support, Sales and Marketing prospects globally.The ideal candidate will be passionate about experimenting with new methods and approaches to driving top talent to our open positions, with a genuine interest in connecting top talent with their perfect next opportunity.If you have a desire to do the impossible and showcase your sourcing skills, then this is the right challenge for you.ResponsibilitiesWork closely with recruiters and hiring managers to fully understand the requirements of the role, its function, how it fits into the organization, and optimize the performance of job listings. Build and share sourcing best practices within the Talent Acquisition team. Identify, explore, and execute effective tactics for sourcing and screening candidates. Find, engage, and activate passive candidates through Stack Overflow, GitHub, LinkedIn, AngelList, Facebook, Twitter, forums, meetups, and alternative sources. Develop strategies to ensure talent pipelines are sufficient for our current needs, as well as our future business growth. Leverage social media platforms for raising awareness of the company's recruiting needs and activities. Requirements3+ years of broad sourcing experience, with focus on technical, marketing and sales positions in Hi-Tech/Sourcing Agencies2+ years of global sourcing experience, USA is a PLUS. Proven experience identifying and engaging passive candidatesProficiency with sourcing tools such as LinkedIn Recruiter, GitHub, ATS, forums, social media, or recruiting database required; advanced Boolean skills requiredProven experience in behavioral phone interviewsDeep understanding of engineering functions and ability to assess a candidate's professional skillsSkilled at establishing trust and great working relationships with hiring managers and recruitersAbility to thrive and prioritize in a dynamic, rapidly changing environment. Compelling communication skills, fluent English and creativity for the use of social mediaProven background in using innovative research and sourcing methods and relentless in the pursuit to hire for niche areas and "hard to fill" roles. Ability to leverage multiple recruiting channels to drive results: email, LinkedIn, phone, or in person
Requirements: ['Work closely with recruiters and hiring managers to fully understand the requirements of the role, its function, how it fits into the organization, and optimize the performance of job listings.', 'Build and share sourcing best practices within the Talent Acquisition team.', 'Identify, explore, and execute effective tactics for sourcing and screening candidates.', 'Find, engage, and activate passive candidates through Stack Overflow, GitHub, LinkedIn, AngelList, Facebook, Twitter, forums, meetups, and alternative sources.', 'Develop strategies to ensure talent pipelines are sufficient for our current needs, as well as our future business growth.', "Leverage social media platforms for raising awareness of the company's recruiting needs and activities.", '3+ years of broad sourcing experience, with focus on technical, marketing and sales positions in Hi-Tech/Sourcing Agencies', '2+ years of global sourcing experience, USA is a PLUS.', 'Proven experience identifying and engaging passive candidates', 'Proficiency with sourcing tools such as LinkedIn Recruiter, GitHub, ATS, forums, social media, or recruiting database required; advanced Boolean skills required', 'Proven experience in behavioral phone interviews', "Deep understanding of engineering functions and ability to assess a candidate's professional skills", 'Skilled at establishing trust and great working relationships with hiring managers and recruiters', 'Ability to thrive and prioritize in a dynamic, rapidly changing environment.', 'Compelling communication skills, fluent English and creativity for the use of social media', 'Proven background in using innovative research and sourcing methods and relentless in the pursuit to hire for niche areas and "hard to fill" roles.', 'Ability to leverage multiple recruiting channels to drive results: email, LinkedIn, phone, or in person']

Title: R&D Learning & Training Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Axonius is the cybersecurity asset management platform that gives organizations a comprehensive asset inventory, uncovers gaps, and automatically validates and enforces policies. Deployed in minutes, the Axonius cyber asset attack surface management (CAASM) solution integrates with hundreds of data sources to give customers the confidence to control complexity by mitigating threats, navigating risk, decreasing incidents, automating response actions, and informing business-level strategy. Hundreds of customers worldwide like The New York Times, Schneider Electric, and AB InBev trust Axonius to control complexity.Headquartered in New York, New York, Axonius employs over 600 people worldwide and achieved unicorn status in early 2021. Axonius has been recognized with the Great Place to Work Certification™, was named one of Fortune's 2021 Best Small and Medium Workplaces™, and was named to Dun's Best Start Up Companies to Work for Over 100 Employees. Most recently, Axonius was also named to the 2021 and 2022 Forbes Cloud 100 list of the top 100 private SaaS companies in the world, as well as named to Inc. magazine's 2022 Best Workplaces and has been cited as the fastest growing cybersecurity company in history by revenue.We are growing rapidly and are looking for superstars to join our rocket ship.Responsibilities:Lead the training programs of R&D end to end - from collecting developers' needs to implementations of the deliverables. Develop annual training and learning programs for our international R&D engineers.. Identify and assess training needs, measure and deliver effective and innovative learning programs for R&D audience Enhance and activate the onboarding process of R&D new talent Tailor global learning programs and learning solutions to the R&D needs Empower and enable content creators, learning leaders, and instructors to design and implement learning programs Advise and support managers and employees in learning & development matters Work with training vendors to develop and deliver training Manage learning platforms technologies that provide our talent with professional knowledge and a unique learning experience (LMS, LXP, Coding games etc.) Requirements:Experience working at a global software or technology company Technical background - MUST Vast and proven experience in designing, executing, and leading large-scale projects with various interfaces High-end excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Hebrew Ability to self-manage and work well independently and prioritize effectively Experience developing training materials using blended methods (i.e., e-learning, webinars, video tutorials, presentations, etc. Strong communication skills and ability to build relationships along with leadership skills Experience in working and adapting in a dynamic, constantly changing environment Advantages: Background in Python - big advantage Editing video skills Portuguese speaker BS in a relevant field, particularly in learning and technology Experience in a global Cyber SaaS company A little more about Axonius: We are a remote-first culture. We have offices in New York and in Tel Aviv, but the majority of our employees are working from home across the US and Internationally. Our people aren't just great professionals, they are great people. We are all here to support each other, ready to help and do what's best for the entire company. Focus on Career growth. We love seeing our people grow into new roles and work hard to ensure everyone sees and can realize a long term career path here at Axonius. At Axonius we support a diverse and inclusive workplace and believe in equal employment opportunity. We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives, regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, age, sex, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status.
Requirements: ["Lead the training programs of R&D end to end - from collecting developers' needs to implementations of the deliverables.", 'Develop annual training and learning programs for our international R&D engineers..', 'Identify and assess training needs, measure and deliver effective and innovative learning programs for R&D audience', 'Enhance and activate the onboarding process of R&D new talent', 'Tailor global learning programs and learning solutions to the R&D needs', 'Empower and enable content creators, learning leaders, and instructors to design and implement learning programs', 'Advise and support managers and employees in learning & development matters', 'Work with training vendors to develop and deliver training', 'Manage learning platforms technologies that provide our talent with professional knowledge and a unique learning experience (LMS, LXP, Coding games etc.)', 'Experience working at a global software or technology company', 'Technical background - MUST', 'Vast and proven experience in designing, executing, and leading large-scale projects with various interfaces', 'High-end excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Hebrew', 'Ability to self-manage and work well independently and prioritize effectively', 'Experience developing training materials using blended methods (i.e., e-learning, webinars, video tutorials, presentations, etc.', 'Strong communication skills and ability to build relationships along with leadership skills', 'Experience in working and adapting in a dynamic, constantly changing environment', 'Background in Python - big advantage', 'Editing video skills', 'Portuguese speaker', 'BS in a relevant field, particularly in learning and technology', 'Experience in a global Cyber SaaS company', 'We are a remote-first culture. Title: Technical Writer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Axis our mission is to elevate secure access to power a modern workplace where people, and technology, work in harmony.Atmos, short for "atmosphere," is our cloud-native platform that artfully extends secure connectivity out to the user's location through our 350 points of presence.The security service edge (SSE) platform sits inline and inspects all traffic, seamlessly brokering connections based on identity and policy, while performing end-user experience monitoring. Thus, IT leaders are empowered to make hybrid work simple, digital experience a competitive advantage, and can ensure business data remains protected.Axis is looking for an experienced technical writer. You will report to the Director Of Product and work closely with cross company teams from R&D,Product and UX, Customer Success, Solution Architects, and Marketing.At Axis we believe in a modern workplace powered by connectivity that is always in-sync with the business. We are committed to enabling a world where access to any business resource, from anywhere, can always be simple, safe and reliable. In doing so, our customers will make hybrid work simple, turn digital experience into a competitive advantage, and better protect their data from threats.What will you do?You will write user-friendly articles to simplify the deployment and management of our platform to end-users and admins. Improve and enrich the knowledge base according to customer feedback to create more clarity, by delivering help articles, release notes, etc. Provide UI text (i.e., UI tooltips, labels, error messages, etc.) for use by our UX and Engineering teams. You will Increase end-user understanding through the use of photographs, drawings, diagrams, animations, and charts. Assist in defining standards, style, and terminology for the platform. What skills/experience we would like:5+ years extensive proven experience as a technical writer in a security company, creating and editing software documentation, technical manuals and release notes. Ability to understand complex technical concepts and explain them clearly. Experience in UI writing. Native English speaker with excellent written communication skills. Multi-tasker who knows how to prioritize. Organized and pays attention to details. Proactive and able to take initiative. A team player. Ability to learn new tools and technologies. Experience with the following is a plus:Experience in SaaS, big data analytics, and large-scale products. Experience with Markdown, Readme. Fluent speaker of Hebrew. Content writing experience. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex or national origin.
Requirements: ['You will write user-friendly articles to simplify the deployment and management of our platform to end-users and admins.', 'Improve and enrich the knowledge base according to customer feedback to create more clarity, by delivering help articles, release notes, etc.', 'Provide UI text (i.e., UI tooltips, labels, error messages, etc.) for use by our UX and Engineering teams.', 'You will Increase end-user understanding through the use of photographs, drawings, diagrams, animations, and charts.', 'Assist in defining standards, style, and terminology for the platform.', '5+ years extensive proven experience as a technical writer in a security company, creating and editing software documentation, technical manuals and release notes.', 'Ability to understand complex technical concepts and explain them clearly.', 'Experience in UI writing.', 'Native English speaker with excellent written communication skills.', 'Multi-tasker who knows how to prioritize.', 'Organized and pays attention to details.', 'Proactive and able to take initiative.', 'A team player.', 'Ability to learn new tools and technologies.', 'Experience in SaaS, big data analytics, and large-scale products.', 'Experience with Markdown, Readme.', 'Fluent speaker of Hebrew.', 'Content writing experience.']

Title: PR Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a Public Relations Manager to lead our communication efforts, globally and locally. In your role, you will be responsible for setting, growing, and managing AI21 Labs' public relations strategy and working with US and Israeli agencies to expand the media presence.Requirements:3+ years experience in public relationsProven track record designing and executing successful public relations campaigns at both a local and national levelExceptional storytelling, writing and editing skills Excellent organizational skillsSolid experience with social media including blogs, Facebook, Twitter, etc.A natural inclination to stay connected on social media and news outletsKnowledge of the AI domain - a plusRole and Responsibilities:Coordinate all public relations activities, global and localPlan, budget, and implement a marketing media relations strategyDevelop communications initiatives that reflect our unique position and story through cross-functional collaborationManage media inquiries and interview requestsProduce content for press releases, byline articles and keynote presentationsMonitor, analyze and communicate PR results on a quarterly basisEvaluate opportunities for partnerships, sponsorships and advertising on an on-going basisBuild relationships with thought leaders to grow industry awarenessMaintain a keen understanding of industry trends affecting clients, and make appropriate recommendations regarding communication strategy surrounding themAbout Us:AI21 Labs was co-founded by AI luminaries and serial entrepreneurs Prof. Amnon Shashua (Hebrew U, Mobileye), Prof. Yoav Shoham (Stanford, Google), and Ori Goshen (8200, Crowdx). The company is set to reimagine the way we interact with text, making reading and writing an AI-first experience. It is also one of the world's leading NLP research labs, conducting basic research in the field and publishing award winning papers in the prominent AI conferences.The company’s product portfolio includes Wordtune, a writing companion tool used daily by millions across the world, that helps you rephrase your writing to say exactly what you mean. Wordtune Read, an AI reader that summarizes long documents so you can understand more, faster. And AI21 Studio, helping developers and businesses use cutting-edge language models, with no NLP expertise required.
Requirements: ['3+ years experience in public relations', 'Proven track record designing and executing successful public relations campaigns at both a local and national level', 'Exceptional storytelling, writing and editing skills', 'Excellent organizational skills', 'Solid experience with social media including blogs, Facebook, Twitter, etc.', 'A natural inclination to stay connected on social media and news outlets', 'Knowledge of the AI domain - a plus', 'Coordinate all public relations activities, global and local', 'Plan, budget, and implement a marketing media relations strategy', 'Develop communications initiatives that reflect our unique position and story through cross-functional collaboration', 'Manage media inquiries and interview requests', 'Produce content for press releases, byline articles and keynote presentations', 'Monitor, analyze and communicate PR results on a quarterly basis', 'Evaluate opportunities for partnerships, sponsorships and advertising on an on-going basis', 'Build relationships with thought leaders to grow industry awareness', 'Maintain a keen understanding of industry trends affecting clients, and make appropriate recommendations regarding communication strategy surrounding them']

Title: Materials Researcher
Location: Rehovot, Center District, Israel
Text: Landa seeks a Materials Researcher to promote the development of the printing blankets.Requirements:M.Sc. degree in materials sciences, chemistry, or chemical engineering with at least 2 years of work experience; or Ph.D. in material sciences, chemistry, or chemical engineering.Experience in practical organic chemistry or materials engineering.Experience with analytical tools for materials characterization.Responsibilities:Material research and development for Landa Digital Printing’s blankets.Formulate and prepare polymeric and composite materials.Design and perform laboratory experiments.Define and implement parameters for process scale-up.Transfer new process technology to production.Support production on-site, as well as through troubleshooting and lab testing.Attributes:Technical inclination and good hands-on technical capabilities.Able to work independently according to pre-defined objectives.Willingness to learn, develop new competencies, and deepen understanding in new fields.Organized, with attention to detail, working methodically and creating clear documentation.Excellent interpersonal skills, able to work with various interfaces.Agile and able to handle and navigate multiple tasks simultaneously.Proactive, self-motivated, and success oriented.Fluent communication in English

Title: Data Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As a Data Engineer at Tikal, you will be involved in the most interesting and challenging projects for our clients. High scale and traffic mixed with demanding SLAs and big volumes of data are just the beginning. Title: Hardware Data Scientist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Wiliot was founded by the team that invented one of the technologies at the heart of 5G. Their next vision was to develop an IoT sticker, a computing element that can power itself by harvesting radio frequency energy, bringing connectivity and intelligence to everyday products and packaging, things previously disconnect from the IoT. This revolutionary mixture of cloud and semiconductor technology is being used by some of the world’s largest consumer, retail, food and pharmaceutical companies to change the way we make, distribute, sell, use and recycle products.Our investors include Softbank, Amazon, Alibaba, Verizon, NTT DoCoMo, Qualcomm and PepsiCo.We are growing fast and need people that want to be part of the journey, commercializing Sensing as a Service and enabling “Intelligence for Everyday Thing”.This role offers a unique opportunity to work directly with the cutting-edge hardware team while we work on optimizing the yield on our postage-stamp-sized computers. You will work on failure analysis, simulations, and developing reporting to help us understand the yield trends over time.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Math, CS, data science/engineering or equivalent analytical degree2-5 years of relevant professional experienceStrong Python skillsExperience/familiarity with semiconductors and chip assembly processes Visualization tools experience including UI design (Plotly, Tableau, PowerBI, Grafana)Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving abilitiesExcellent interpersonal and communication skillsAbility to be self-sufficient and execute quickly when given autonomyFlexible team player who will thrive in a dynamic, constantly evolving environmentResponsibilities:Work with multi-disciplinary teams to develop a deep understanding of our tags and the assembly process. Develop failure analysis processes to identify points of failure and iterate as we scale our production.Develop key KPI’s and reporting tools to track yield performance over time.Share findings with broader data team to develop holistic data solutions.
Requirements: ["Bachelor's degree in Math, CS, data science/engineering or equivalent analytical degree", '2-5 years of relevant professional experience', 'Strong Python skills', 'Experience/familiarity with semiconductors and chip assembly processes', 'Visualization tools experience including UI design (Plotly, Tableau, PowerBI, Grafana)', 'Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving abilities', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication skills', 'Ability to be self-sufficient and execute quickly when given autonomy', 'Flexible team player who will thrive in a dynamic, constantly evolving environment', 'Work with multi-disciplinary teams to develop a deep understanding of our tags and the assembly process.', 'Develop failure analysis processes to identify points of failure and iterate as we scale our production.', 'Develop key KPI’s and reporting tools to track yield performance over time.', 'Share findings with broader data team to develop holistic data solutions.']

Title: Lab Student
Location: Hod HaSharon, Center District, Israel
Text: אנחנו מחפשים סטודנט/ית לתפקיד של לבורנט/טכנאי לבדיקות איכות במעבדת הפלסטיקה של החברה.העבודה כוללת הכנת דוגמאות, שימוש במכשירים האנליטיים השונים, עיבוד נתונים ועזרה למנהל המעבדה בעבודה השוטפת.היקף המשרה: מדובר בעבודה במשמרות, 2-3 פעמים בשבוע. אחת לשבוע, תידרש גם משמרת שניה: בשעות אחר צהרים-ערב. ייתכנו שבועות בהן תידרש נוכחות מוגברת. חלק מהמשמרות יתקיימו בימי שישי במהלך הבוקר ועד (מקסימום) השעה 15:00. משך התפקיד כסטודנט - העדפה לעד שנתיים. בתום הלימודים, תיתכן אפשרות לעבור לתפקיד של מהנדס בחברה.Requirements:חובה - סטודנט בתחומי המדעים או ההנדסה, לתואר ראשון או הנדסאי, בשנתו השנייה או השלישית (במידה ומדובר בתואר מהנדס) בתחומי: כימיה, הנדסת כימיה, הנדסת חומרים, הנדסת פלסטיקה.חובה - נדרש כלי רכב, בשל שעות מאוחרות ועבודה בימי שישי, מדי פעם.חובה - מגורים באזור המרכז/השרון.דייקנות גבוהה. סדר וניקיון.שליטה בתוכנות מחשב בסיסיות.אמינות גבוהה.יחסי אנוש מעולים.אנגלית ברמה טובה.

Title: Campaign Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a highly motivated and creative Campaign Manager to join our growing team. We're looking for someone who can initiate, create, scale and optimize high volume PPC and digital media campaigns across all buying platforms. The Campaign Manager will find themselves work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Candidates must be super creative, analytical, independent, 'out of the box' thinkers and quick learners. Title: Technical Writer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Axis our mission is to elevate secure access to power a modern workplace where people, and technology, work in harmony.Atmos, short for "atmosphere," is our cloud-native platform that artfully extends secure connectivity out to the user's location through our 350 points of presence.The security service edge (SSE) platform sits inline and inspects all traffic, seamlessly brokering connections based on identity and policy, while performing end-user experience monitoring. Thus, IT leaders are empowered to make hybrid work simple, digital experience a competitive advantage, and can ensure business data remains protected.Axis is looking for an experienced technical writer. You will report to the Director Of Product and work closely with cross company teams from R&D,Product and UX, Customer Success, Solution Architects, and Marketing.At Axis we believe in a modern workplace powered by connectivity that is always in-sync with the business. We are committed to enabling a world where access to any business resource, from anywhere, can always be simple, safe and reliable. In doing so, our customers will make hybrid work simple, turn digital experience into a competitive advantage, and better protect their data from threats.What will you do?You will write user-friendly articles to simplify the deployment and management of our platform to end-users and admins. Improve and enrich the knowledge base according to customer feedback to create more clarity, by delivering help articles, release notes, etc. Provide UI text (i.e., UI tooltips, labels, error messages, etc.) for use by our UX and Engineering teams. You will Increase end-user understanding through the use of photographs, drawings, diagrams, animations, and charts. Assist in defining standards, style, and terminology for the platform. What skills/experience we would like:5+ years extensive proven experience as a technical writer in a security company, creating and editing software documentation, technical manuals and release notes. Ability to understand complex technical concepts and explain them clearly. Experience in UI writing. Native English speaker with excellent written communication skills. Multi-tasker who knows how to prioritize. Organized and pays attention to details. Proactive and able to take initiative. A team player. Ability to learn new tools and technologies. Experience with the following is a plus:Experience in SaaS, big data analytics, and large-scale products. Experience with Markdown, Readme. Fluent speaker of Hebrew. Content writing experience. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex or national origin.
Requirements: ['You will write user-friendly articles to simplify the deployment and management of our platform to end-users and admins.', 'Improve and enrich the knowledge base according to customer feedback to create more clarity, by delivering help articles, release notes, etc.', 'Provide UI text (i.e., UI tooltips, labels, error messages, etc.) for use by our UX and Engineering teams.', 'You will Increase end-user understanding through the use of photographs, drawings, diagrams, animations, and charts.', 'Assist in defining standards, style, and terminology for the platform.', '5+ years extensive proven experience as a technical writer in a security company, creating and editing software documentation, technical manuals and release notes.', 'Ability to understand complex technical concepts and explain them clearly.', 'Experience in UI writing.', 'Native English speaker with excellent written communication skills.', 'Multi-tasker who knows how to prioritize.', 'Organized and pays attention to details.', 'Proactive and able to take initiative.', 'A team player.', 'Ability to learn new tools and technologies.', 'Experience in SaaS, big data analytics, and large-scale products.', 'Experience with Markdown, Readme.', 'Fluent speaker of Hebrew.', 'Content writing experience.']

Title: PR Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a Public Relations Manager to lead our communication efforts, globally and locally. In your role, you will be responsible for setting, growing, and managing AI21 Labs' public relations strategy and working with US and Israeli agencies to expand the media presence.Requirements:3+ years experience in public relationsProven track record designing and executing successful public relations campaigns at both a local and national levelExceptional storytelling, writing and editing skills Excellent organizational skillsSolid experience with social media including blogs, Facebook, Twitter, etc.A natural inclination to stay connected on social media and news outletsKnowledge of the AI domain - a plusRole and Responsibilities:Coordinate all public relations activities, global and localPlan, budget, and implement a marketing media relations strategyDevelop communications initiatives that reflect our unique position and story through cross-functional collaborationManage media inquiries and interview requestsProduce content for press releases, byline articles and keynote presentationsMonitor, analyze and communicate PR results on a quarterly basisEvaluate opportunities for partnerships, sponsorships and advertising on an on-going basisBuild relationships with thought leaders to grow industry awarenessMaintain a keen understanding of industry trends affecting clients, and make appropriate recommendations regarding communication strategy surrounding themAbout Us:AI21 Labs was co-founded by AI luminaries and serial entrepreneurs Prof. Amnon Shashua (Hebrew U, Mobileye), Prof. Yoav Shoham (Stanford, Google), and Ori Goshen (8200, Crowdx). The company is set to reimagine the way we interact with text, making reading and writing an AI-first experience. It is also one of the world's leading NLP research labs, conducting basic research in the field and publishing award winning papers in the prominent AI conferences.The company’s product portfolio includes Wordtune, a writing companion tool used daily by millions across the world, that helps you rephrase your writing to say exactly what you mean. Wordtune Read, an AI reader that summarizes long documents so you can understand more, faster. And AI21 Studio, helping developers and businesses use cutting-edge language models, with no NLP expertise required.
Requirements: ['3+ years experience in public relations', 'Proven track record designing and executing successful public relations campaigns at both a local and national level', 'Exceptional storytelling, writing and editing skills', 'Excellent organizational skills', 'Solid experience with social media including blogs, Facebook, Twitter, etc.', 'A natural inclination to stay connected on social media and news outlets', 'Knowledge of the AI domain - a plus', 'Coordinate all public relations activities, global and local', 'Plan, budget, and implement a marketing media relations strategy', 'Develop communications initiatives that reflect our unique position and story through cross-functional collaboration', 'Manage media inquiries and interview requests', 'Produce content for press releases, byline articles and keynote presentations', 'Monitor, analyze and communicate PR results on a quarterly basis', 'Evaluate opportunities for partnerships, sponsorships and advertising on an on-going basis', 'Build relationships with thought leaders to grow industry awareness', 'Maintain a keen understanding of industry trends affecting clients, and make appropriate recommendations regarding communication strategy surrounding them']

Title: Materials Researcher
Location: Rehovot, Center District, Israel
Text: Landa seeks a Materials Researcher to promote the development of the printing blankets.Requirements:M.Sc. degree in materials sciences, chemistry, or chemical engineering with at least 2 years of work experience; or Ph.D. in material sciences, chemistry, or chemical engineering.Experience in practical organic chemistry or materials engineering.Experience with analytical tools for materials characterization.Responsibilities:Material research and development for Landa Digital Printing’s blankets.Formulate and prepare polymeric and composite materials.Design and perform laboratory experiments.Define and implement parameters for process scale-up.Transfer new process technology to production.Support production on-site, as well as through troubleshooting and lab testing.Attributes:Technical inclination and good hands-on technical capabilities.Able to work independently according to pre-defined objectives.Willingness to learn, develop new competencies, and deepen understanding in new fields.Organized, with attention to detail, working methodically and creating clear documentation.Excellent interpersonal skills, able to work with various interfaces.Agile and able to handle and navigate multiple tasks simultaneously.Proactive, self-motivated, and success oriented.Fluent communication in English

Title: Hardware Data Scientist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Wiliot was founded by the team that invented one of the technologies at the heart of 5G. Their next vision was to develop an IoT sticker, a computing element that can power itself by harvesting radio frequency energy, bringing connectivity and intelligence to everyday products and packaging, things previously disconnect from the IoT. This revolutionary mixture of cloud and semiconductor technology is being used by some of the world’s largest consumer, retail, food and pharmaceutical companies to change the way we make, distribute, sell, use and recycle products.Our investors include Softbank, Amazon, Alibaba, Verizon, NTT DoCoMo, Qualcomm and PepsiCo.We are growing fast and need people that want to be part of the journey, commercializing Sensing as a Service and enabling “Intelligence for Everyday Thing”.This role offers a unique opportunity to work directly with the cutting-edge hardware team while we work on optimizing the yield on our postage-stamp-sized computers. You will work on failure analysis, simulations, and developing reporting to help us understand the yield trends over time.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Math, CS, data science/engineering or equivalent analytical degree2-5 years of relevant professional experienceStrong Python skillsExperience/familiarity with semiconductors and chip assembly processes Visualization tools experience including UI design (Plotly, Tableau, PowerBI, Grafana)Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving abilitiesExcellent interpersonal and communication skillsAbility to be self-sufficient and execute quickly when given autonomyFlexible team player who will thrive in a dynamic, constantly evolving environmentResponsibilities:Work with multi-disciplinary teams to develop a deep understanding of our tags and the assembly process. Develop failure analysis processes to identify points of failure and iterate as we scale our production.Develop key KPI’s and reporting tools to track yield performance over time.Share findings with broader data team to develop holistic data solutions.
Requirements: ["Bachelor's degree in Math, CS, data science/engineering or equivalent analytical degree", '2-5 years of relevant professional experience', 'Strong Python skills', 'Experience/familiarity with semiconductors and chip assembly processes', 'Visualization tools experience including UI design (Plotly, Tableau, PowerBI, Grafana)', 'Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving abilities', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication skills', 'Ability to be self-sufficient and execute quickly when given autonomy', 'Flexible team player who will thrive in a dynamic, constantly evolving environment', 'Work with multi-disciplinary teams to develop a deep understanding of our tags and the assembly process.', 'Develop failure analysis processes to identify points of failure and iterate as we scale our production.', 'Develop key KPI’s and reporting tools to track yield performance over time.', 'Share findings with broader data team to develop holistic data solutions.']

Title: Data Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As a Data Engineer at Tikal, you will be involved in the most interesting and challenging projects for our clients. High scale and traffic mixed with demanding SLAs and big volumes of data are just the beginning. Knowing and using the latest and best-suited technologies is what makes us leaders in the fields of Big Data, Streaming Data and CEPRequirements:At least 5 years of experience in Java/Scala and/or PythonExperience in NoSQL and data storage (e.g. C*, Redis, MongoDB, CouchBase, Redshift, BigQuery)Experience in data formats (Parquet, Avro, ORC)Experience in Big Data Technologies (Spark, HDFS, MapReduce)Experience in streaming (Spark Streaming, Flink, Kafka Streams, Beam, etc.)Experience in messaging (Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc.)Experience with Machine Learning (Spark ML, TensorFlow, etc.) - PlusExperience in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)Passion for technology and constant exploration - MustAttitude for caring and sharing knowledge - MustLove challenges - Must

Title: Campaign Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a highly motivated and creative Campaign Manager to join our growing team. We're looking for someone who can initiate, create, scale and optimize high volume PPC and digital media campaigns across all buying platforms. The Campaign Manager will find themselves work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Candidates must be super creative, analytical, independent, 'out of the box' thinkers and quick learners. Using your analytical mindset, you will be responsible for the platform strategy, execution, performance and reporting of digital media campaigns across all buying platforms Work with mass media specialists in developing and delivering integrated media plans Build training materials and best practice documentation Leverage first party data for targeting and insights Oversee the work of multiple specialists, train technical knowledge and manage workflow. Provide strategic guidance and oversight Coordinate assets and tags with vendors and ensuring campaigns are delivering against KPIs and proactively managing campaign execution Responsible for overseeing client pacing & performance across digital media portfolio Recommend forward thinking strategies and innovations Consult and work with other cross-channel leaders for seamless execution Work with the data teams to provide analytical insights to the clientRequirements:2+ years experience working in the digital media buying & planning space 2 + years of Hands-on expertise with Google's DV360 - a must!Proficient user of digital ad trafficking tools (Campaign Manager)Understanding of the digital media landscape with a focus on shopper marketing, eRetail, or retail media networksFamiliarity and/or proficiency with publisher-side tools (Google Ad Manager)Experience against various media buying strategies; self-service, managed buyer, partner negotiationsMust love and be curious about data analytics and how that affects the bottom lineWell-versed in the Microsoft Office suite specifically, Excel and PowerPointProfessional client communication, both written and verbalAbility to handle multiple projects and prioritize responsibilitiesAbility to work efficiently in a fast-pace environment

Title: Lab Student
Location: Hod HaSharon, Center District, Israel
Text: אנחנו מחפשים סטודנט/ית לתפקיד של לבורנט/טכנאי לבדיקות איכות במעבדת הפלסטיקה של החברה.העבודה כוללת הכנת דוגמאות, שימוש במכשירים האנליטיים השונים, עיבוד נתונים ועזרה למנהל המעבדה בעבודה השוטפת.היקף המשרה: מדובר בעבודה במשמרות, 2-3 פעמים בשבוע. אחת לשבוע, תידרש גם משמרת שניה: בשעות אחר צהרים-ערב. ייתכנו שבועות בהן תידרש נוכחות מוגברת. חלק מהמשמרות יתקיימו בימי שישי במהלך הבוקר ועד (מקסימום) השעה 15:00. משך התפקיד כסטודנט - העדפה לעד שנתיים. בתום הלימודים, תיתכן אפשרות לעבור לתפקיד של מהנדס בחברה.Requirements:חובה - סטודנט בתחומי המדעים או ההנדסה, לתואר ראשון או הנדסאי, בשנתו השנייה או השלישית (במידה ומדובר בתואר מהנדס) בתחומי: כימיה, הנדסת כימיה, הנדסת חומרים, הנדסת פלסטיקה.חובה - נדרש כלי רכב, בשל שעות מאוחרות ועבודה בימי שישי, מדי פעם.חובה - מגורים באזור המרכז/השרון.דייקנות גבוהה. סדר וניקיון.שליטה בתוכנות מחשב בסיסיות.אמינות גבוהה.יחסי אנוש מעולים.אנגלית ברמה טובה.
Requirements: ['מדובר בעבודה במשמרות, 2-3 פעמים בשבוע. אחת לשבוע, תידרש גם משמרת שניה: בשעות אחר צהרים-ערב.', 'ייתכנו שבועות בהן תידרש נוכחות מוגברת.', 'חלק מהמשמרות יתקיימו בימי שישי במהלך הבוקר ועד (מקסימום) השעה 15:00.', 'משך התפקיד כסטודנט - העדפה לעד שנתיים.', 'בתום הלימודים, תיתכן אפשרות לעבור לתפקיד של מהנדס בחברה.', 'חובה - סטודנט בתחומי המדעים או ההנדסה, לתואר ראשון או הנדסאי, בשנתו השנייה או השלישית (במידה ומדובר בתואר מהנדס) בתחומי: כימיה, הנדסת כימיה, הנדסת חומרים, הנדסת פלסטיקה.', 'חובה - נדרש כלי רכב, בשל שעות מאוחרות ועבודה בימי שישי, מדי פעם.', 'חובה - מגורים באזור המרכז/השרון.', 'דייקנות גבוהה.', 'סדר וניקיון.', 'שליטה בתוכנות מחשב בסיסיות.', 'אמינות גבוהה.', 'יחסי אנוש מעולים.', 'אנגלית ברמה טובה.']

Title: UX/UI Product Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Shopic is an AI start-up specializing in retail solutions and shopping experiences. Our technology turns any shopping cart into a smart cart. Powered by computer vision and data analytics, the cart lets shoppers grab the products they want and skip the checkout lines when they leave the store.We are based in Tel Aviv, deployed by major grocery chains worldwide, and employ some of the best minds in the AI sector.Shopic’s Product team is looking for an exceptional and passionate UX/UI Product Designer to help shape and craft a product that's simple and intuitive. As a UX/UI Product Designer at Shopic you will be a key player in shaping our solutions, by leading the design process from research and vision to excellent execution, through close collaboration with the Product and engineering teams.You’ll join our Product Team based in our headquarters in Tel Aviv, Israel.Requirements:At least 3 years of proven working experience in a consumer-oriented product company.Experience with complex systems - AdvantageInnovative problem solver - your passion is transforming complex problems into simple and intuitive user experiencesDeep understanding of product with the ability to understand and distill complex problems into elegant, informed solutionsUnderstanding of both qualitative and quantitative user data (i.e. A/B testing, surveys, analytics tools, usability testing)Independent, capable of prioritizing and meeting deadlines, and open to feedback. You know your craft and tools - up to speed with design trends. Superb knowledge of Figma, Sketch, Photoshop, and illustrator and fearless of learning new ones as neededResponsabilities:Lead all aspects of the UX/UI design process, while taking a user-centric approach.Deliver intuitive, seamless, and excellent user experiences, designed in a great level of detail while thinking of all scenarios.Be the product brand and Style Guide gatekeeper when needed.Validate solutions using data and user testingCollaborate daily with Product Managers and Software Developers to define, design, and deliver extraordinary products.Create micro animations for data visualization display.Only candidates with a portfolio and/or live examples of their projects will be considered.

Title: CEO Personal Assistant
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Innovid (NYSE:CTV) powers advertising delivery, personalization, measurement and outcomes across linear, CTV and digital for the world’s largest brands. Through a global infrastructure that enables cross-platform ad serving, data-driven creative, and currency-grade measurement, Innovid offers its clients always-on intelligence to optimize advertising investment across channels, platforms, screens, and devices. Innovid is an independent platform that leads the market in converged TV innovation, through proprietary technology and exclusive partnerships designed to reimagine TV advertising. Headquartered in New York City, Innovid serves a global client base through offices across the Americas, Europe, and Asia Pacific. To learn more, visit innovid.com or follow us on LinkedIn or Twitter.We are looking for an Personal Assistant for our CEO. In this role you will provide administrative assistance, calendar and meeting management, travel planning, events scheduling, and more. We are looking for a fast learner who loves providing excellent service and is comfortable working in an informal team environment and is willing to play a behind-the-scenes role. Our ideal candidate holds a strong sense of service level, is Independent with a proactive approach, is highly organized, and has the ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment.You will- Support our CEO with daily administrative tasks Play a critical role in ensuring a smooth day-to-day flow and aspire for efficiency Handle complex scheduling for the CEO - you’ll need to always be one step ahead of our CEO’s busy schedule (including conferences and teleconferences) Be responsible for meeting coordination from sending invites, scheduling catering, securing meeting spaces, and follow-up correspondence Collaborate with multiple interfaces including executives, management level and highly senior industry professionals Manage travel coordination such as booking flights, hotels, and local transportation while monitoring for travel experience and proactive schedule adjustments Compose, collect & distribute presentations & documents on behalf of the CEO Assist with the preparation of presentations Support special cross-company projects Support and coordinate company events Act as a vital member of the people operations team and support the office management effortsYou should have- At least 1 year of experience as a Personal Assistant, Administrative Assistant, Office Manager or a similar role Fast learning abilities & love for providing great service can-do attitude, smiling, diligent, capable to take the initiative and perform well under pressure Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize work High sense of responsibility and accountability Strong organizational skills and the ability to multitask while remaining detail-oriented High-level competency with Microsoft Office Suite To be able to work independently and under short deadlines Be discrete, sharp and representative To be a problem solver with the ability to see potential problems before they occur Enjoy improvising and solving problems English proficiency Experience in startups - big advantage BA degreeWhat We'll Offer YouHigh visibility roles with a tremendous amount of growth potentialWide and varied Learning & Development resources and culture that supports itGlobal team and cross-company collaboration unlike anywhere else!Amazing people to work with!!!Good work-life balanceRSU’s (Restricted Stock Units) planBeautiful office with a view near to the train stationWork next to our best friends on 4 (Dogs friendly), but also a friendly environment for those who don’t appreciate the furry walkers.Subsidized mealPilates lesson in the officeEvents, treats, and a nice plus kitchen ;)There is no such thing as the perfect resume, or someone that checks every box. At Innovid, we are generous with our time and knowledge, and always ready to teach. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day and add to Innovid.Equal Opportunity Employer: Innovid is an equal opportunity employer, committed to our diversity and inclusiveness. We consider all qualified applicants regardless of race, color, nationality, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, disability or age. We strongly encourage women, people of color, members of the LGBTQIA community, people with disabilities and veterans to apply. We are actively working to be an anti-racist organization. We're committing to creating an inclusive and equitable workplace for all of our employees. You can read more about our commitment to DEI here.If you are located within the EEA and subject to GDPR or are a California resident subject to the California Consumer Privacy Act, click here to understand how Innovid processes your personal information and how you can exercise your rights.

Title: Product Marketing Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are looking for a talented Product Marketing Manager to join our Marketing team! Someone with strong communications, strategy, and people skills who understands what motivates users, and translates it into marketing activities. As a Product Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for marketing one of the most known AI consumer brands, Wordtune, working closely with the Product and leading product marketing campaigns.Requirements:3+ years of experience as a Product Marketing Manager, preferably for a consumer related product Execution of relevant marketing campaigns and activities for new products and featuresStrong verbal, written, and presentation skillsExperience in working with internal interfaces: marketing, product, design, customer service, and salesFlexibility and ability to adapt in fast-paced environmentsStrong analytical skills, highly capable of interpreting data, performing qualitative research, and translating results into actionable key takeawaysAn understanding of data systems concepts, databases, business intelligence, usability testing, and market researchFluent English – written and spokenRole and Responsibilities:Create Marketing and Growth strategy for our productDrive competitive analysis and market research, understand the competitive landscapeMaximize the potential of new and existing usersCreate insight and become the 'voice of the customer' for cross-company teams, enabling them to make relevant decisions and improvementsLead and coordinate positioning and marketing plans related to the product Develop Product Marketing strategies (campaign briefs, advertising, product launching)Measure the impact of marketing activities including user acquisition, influencer, and brand awareness campaignsAbout Us:AI21 Labs was co-founded by AI luminaries and serial entrepreneurs Prof. Amnon Shashua (Hebrew U, Mobileye), Prof. Yoav Shoham (Stanford, Google), and Ori Goshen (8200, Crowdx). The company is set to reimagine the way we interact with text, making reading and writing an AI-first experience. It is also one of the world's leading NLP research labs, conducting basic research in the field and publishing award winning papers in the prominent AI conferences.The company’s product portfolio includes Wordtune, a writing companion tool used daily by millions across the world, that helps you rephrase your writing to say exactly what you mean. Wordtune Read, an AI reader that summarizes long documents so you can understand more, faster. And AI21 Studio, helping developers and businesses use cutting-edge language models, with no NLP expertise required.
