Title: Brand Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About UsRiskified empowers merchants and shoppers to realize the full potential of eCommerce by making it safe, accessible, and frictionless. Our global team helps the world’s most-innovative eCommerce merchants eliminate risk and uncertainty from their business. Merchants integrate Riskified’s machine learning platform to create trusted customer relationships, driving higher sales while reducing costs. Riskified has reviewed hundreds of millions of transactions and approved billions of dollars of revenue for global brands and fast-growing businesses across industries, including Wayfair, Wish, Peloton, Gucci, and many more. As of July 29th, 2021, Riskified has begun trading on NYSE under the ticker RSKD.About The RoleRiskified values design and makes every effort to provide a cohesive and unique experience across all mediums. Our design team works across all visual channels, from application UX/UI to product marketing and other organizational design needs. Our design team is dynamic and collaborates profoundly with each other daily. Our company and team's spirit fosters an environment that encourages taking initiative, being open to new ideas, and working towards your vision.We're looking for an experienced Brand Designer to join our team. A designer who is passionate about brand & user experience, and familiar with new trends and work methods. The Brand Design Group at Riskified is responsible for creating the look and feel of the company and translating our brand values into graphic assets and brand deliverables across different platforms - our website, social channels, etc.What You'll Be DoingTake part in the evolution of the Riskified brand, by creating and implementing our guidelines for our main brand and sub-brands - Create beautiful design assets while always staying true to our brand identity. Design engaging web experiences on our website and other platforms, by using UX UI experience and tools. Come up with creative ways to deliver our messaging to our target audience. Think about how to translate complex ideas into beautiful visuals, which will shed light on Riskified’s technology and products.Lead the creation of beautiful and diverse projects from concept to launch.Collaborate and work closely with the different teams - Communication and brand, Product marketing & the web-dev team, as well as employee branding, wellness, and other teams.Work on several projects at a time, and under pressure, so you’ll need to be able to multitask.Be an integral part of our design department. Review, improve and provide feedback to your team.QualificationsAt least 3 years of proven experience in interactive and brand design.Conceptual and creative thinking both in visual and interactive design.Strong design skills: visual design, typography, layouts and composition, Data visualization, and image-making skills.Strong portfolio featuring a variety of brand design and image-making, web experiences, marketing materials, landing pages, emails, infographics, and data visualization.Expert in Illustrator, Photoshop, and other Adobe creative suite applicationsProficiency in Figma Great personality and social skillsMotion skills and proficiency in Adobe After Effects - a big advantageKnowledge of HTML and CSS in design assets - an advantageKnowledge of CSS and Lottie animations - an advantage Life at RiskifiedWe are a fast-growing and dynamic tech company with 750+ team members globally. We value collaboration and innovative thinking. We’re looking for bright, driven, and passionate people to grow with us.COVID-19 UpdateOur Tel-Aviv team is currently working in a hybrid of remote and in-office work for all our team members. We have recently moved to our new space in Tel Aviv - check it out here! Some Of Our Tel Aviv Benefits & PerksEquity for all employees, Keren Hishtalmut, pension Private medical insurance, extra time off for parents and caregiversCommuter and parking benefitsTeam events, fully-stocked kitchen,lunch stipend, happy hours, yoga, pilates, functional training, basketball, soccerWide-ranging opportunities to volunteer and make an impactCommitment to your professional development with global onboarding, skills-based courses, full access to Udemy, lunch & learnsAwesome Riskified gifts and swag! Title: Israel - Portfolio Recruiter
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Hello.We are NFX, the largest pre-seed and seed venture firm in the world, and one of the fastest growing brands in tech. With offices in Herzlia and the Silicon Valley, we're building the venture firm we wish existed when we were running startups.We're not formal. We collaborate, we learn, we have fun, and we're committed to being magic makers. We anticipate amazing things for you in this role and for all those reasons, we're looking for someone extraordinary.We're now expanding our Israeli team, looking to hire our first recruiter. This is the first role of its kind for NFX, where you'll be dedicated to supporting our portfolio (the Guild) of Founders in Israel. Because we invest in pre-seed and seed stage, most of our companies don't have in-house recruiters, and are too busy building to prioritize hiring at that stage. They need an advocate, a strategist, someone who knows how to implement a winning recruiting strategy.That's where you come in.If you feel like we're describing you, this was meant to be.You're a people person. Chatting with people gives you a buzz. You love sharing your infectious energy and tend to be energized by creating delightful experiences for others.You're a natural communicator. Charismatic, perceptive, humble, humorous, and confident. You listen, you lead, you follow-up quickly. You earn people's trust.You're a superstar networker. You've been filling startup tech positions for at least a few years, and have built a strong network of top talent.You've been in startups / tech / VC. Bonus points if you've been on a founding team yourself. You've been doing this long enough to know the lingo, the major players, and the trends.You like Founders, and Founders like you. Entrepreneurs are your favorite kind of people. Maybe you've been one. Maybe you aspire to be one someday. You're passionate about helping founders fulfill their visions. You match their speed. Your career is instrumental to their success.You're hands-on. Not only can you build strategy, you also implement tactics. You can execute Recruiting campaigns, write job descriptions like this one, but better.You hustle. You're always looking for opportunities to add value, and are known by your peers as being proactive and going after it.You're a closer. You have a winning attitude, validated by years of hiring top talent. You've got stories of times you closed people no one thought they could.You're system oriented. You're great at following processes that create a top candidate experience, and you've also helped implement applicant tracking systems, and develop competency based scoring rubrics.If you're still reading this, we should talk. Here's some of the finer details to confirm this is for you: You have prior experience in recruiting and/or human resources at an early stage startup (ideally), with knowledge of sourcing, screening, interviewing, and hiring best practices.Bonus experience includes having a similar role where you supported hiring for a portfolio of early stage foundersYou're passionate about finding untapped talent, driving company growth, and helping individuals find promising careers.You have 5+ years' experience in recruitment and/or human resourcesYou're an exceptional communicator, and have strong interpersonal and decision-making skillsYou're very knowledgeable of database management, internet search, and are up to date with all the top recruiting tech available.You have proven experience developing and implementing recruiting strategies and can share some impressive hiring stats with us.You have a Bachelor's degree in human resource management (or related field) ideally.We will probably *not* be a good fit for you if: You prefer as little ambiguity as possible. You're disorganized, and don't work well when you don't have explicit instructionsYou're not service oriented. This job is all about creating value. You're a 9-5 person. Founders work hard. So will you. You're not captivated by how companies are born and grow. Excited? We're eager to meet you too! Let's chat. To apply, please send us:Your resume or LinkedIn profileA memo about why NFX is interesting to you.
Requirements: ['You prefer as little ambiguity as possible.', "You're disorganized, and don't work well when you don't have explicit instructions", "You're not service oriented. This job is all about creating value.", "You're a 9-5 person. Founders work hard. So will you.", "You're not captivated by how companies are born and grow.", 'Your resume or LinkedIn profile', 'A memo about why NFX is interesting to you.']

Text: FundGuard is the new generation investment accounting utility for asset managers and their service providers. Our cloud-native, AI-powered operating system and technology platform are transforming investment operations. FundGuard existentially changes asset servicing to enable reduced fees and the ability to offer new and innovative products, including crypto-asset services, at scale, today and tomorrow.The company is led by an experienced team with successful exits and has raised more than $55 million, backed by strategic partners including Citi and State Street Corp, venture firms Blumberg Capital, LionBird Ventures, and Team8 Capital among others. Title: Product Designer

Text: Vicarius is an Israeli-born cybersecurity startup backed by tier-1 investors from San Francisco and Tel Aviv. Currently operating out of NYC and Jerusalem (+WFH), Vicarius is set to solve the biggest challenge of all: security vulnerabilities. The Vicarius-powered platform, TOPIA, is a simple and self-serve product that helps IT professionals identify, prioritize and fix security threats in an integrated, automated, and non-traditional manner.After successfully closing our Series A funding round, we’re looking for an experienced, ambitious, and motivated UI Designer (UX/UI) to join our product design team to craft the best web experience for our customers. In this role, you will be responsible for building and leading the content UX domain in Vicarius and will help us shape the tone and voice of the product from the onboarding phases to the incremental updates.Our ideal candidate lives and breathes product, loves technology, and is addicted to building tools with great user experience.Objectives of this RoleDesign end-to-end, simple, and elegant user experiences from concept to launchWork closely with product manager and developers to generate ideas, concepts, flows, and user journeysConduct research and take an active part in the Discovery Phase in all UX ProjectsProduce top-notch design by creating optimal UX and pixel-perfect UICreate new UI components and develop new techniquesValidate solutions by conducting user testing sessionsWork closely with the R&D team to:Ensure assets and guidelines are built for efficient implementationEnsure the final production product meets visual standards (design GQA)Skills And QualificationsAn experienced Product Designer - At least 3 years of experienceExcellent knowledge of design and prototyping software (e.g., Figma)Experience in conducting user-testing sessions A design portfolio is a mustStrong visual design skills and expertise in creating flows, user journeys, page layouts/templates, functional design, iconography, and style guidesStrong communication and presentation skills - written, verbal and visual (Hebrew and English)Experience in designing complex desktop applicationsSoft Skills, Education, OtherDegree in Design (interaction, graphic, visual communications)Understanding web technologies (no coding required) - An advantageExperience working with complex systems/cyber industry - An advantageExperience working with designing systems - An advantageSelf-motivated and detail-oriented with an ability to hit deadlines and work on multiple projects simultaneously.Ability to work independently and as a part of a team

Title: Senior Recruiter - Israel
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Funded.club, we run exclusive, fully retained searches for some of the most exciting startups in the world.We helped 188 startups build their teams in 2021 and we have even greater plans for 2022! For 2022 we're growing our team of like-minded professionals with an entrepreneurial mindset.We love flexibility and self-organizing teams - we expect total commitment to delivering projects and nothing more. You work from anywhere in the world serving customers in your time zone. We will not track your time - no fixed hours, unlimited vacation time. Recruiters should be available for a minimum of 3 searches in parallel, while 10 projects is a manageable load for a full-time commitment.Earn smarter than your peers - get attractive project commissions with guaranteed earnings. Our recruiters earn, 3 - 7500/month Euro depending on how busy they want to be :)We're also a diverse team with a fair and transparent culture, led by our Global Director of Recruiting.If you are an accomplished recruiter who wants to work independently, has a sales mind set and a passion for helping startups grow please consider Funded.club and help us build on our success!Learn more about our unique approach to startup hiring at: https://www.funded.club/join?hsLang=enBenefitsRepresent the hottest startups around the world who have secured significant funding and are set for rapid growth (Funded.club clients have secured at least USD 1 million in funding or equivalent in annual revenue). Work on exclusive assignments and enjoy close cooperation with each startup and scale-up. Receive guaranteed project advances plus attractive commission. Training and support from professionals with decades of experience in HR and recruiting. The best tools in the world to aid your candidate sourcing and job promotionManage your own work schedule - source and screen great candidates, report progress regularly and make placements. Your time is your own to manage as you see fit. Successful placements lead to more assignments = account management opportunity with clients. (40% of our current revenue is based on repeat business) Easy, streamlined onboarding receiving assignments within 1 - 10 days from signing onJob Requirements5+ years sourcing and placing technical and commercial candidates in technology-driven businesses. Experience managing customers, providing feedback and updates on progress. Ability to craft and pitch an employer's story in writing and on the phone. You ask great questions and you're able to qualify talent quickly. You have exceptional English and written communication skills. You have meticulous attention to detail and love keeping the CRM/ATS updated at all timesYou know, from experience, which job promotion channels and sources work best for various technical, commercial and support roles in your markets. You're pro-active and skilled at headhunting candidates online with X-Ray searches, Linkedin, Github, Slack, networks and groups. You're obsessed with quality and finding the very best people. Thank you for considering this opportunity. Funded.club Senior Recruiters work exclusively with Startups and are in direct communication with hiring managers and founding team members.Your application will be fully reviewed by a dedicated recruiter who will respond based on the matching of your experience and qualifications.

Title: Financial & Planning Analyst
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: Does shining a light on the unknown interest you? Can you use available data to investigate myriads of issues a business can face? And are you ready for the next step in your career? If you got excited by thinking about this, you may be our new Business Insights Analyst - Finance Department in Novo Nordisk Israel. Come drive the change with us and get a life changing career!The PositionAs Financial & Planning Analyst you will work in our Finance & Operations department, reporting to the Financial Planning & Analysis Manager.You will be Responsible for developing business insights and intelligence for Israel, providing value, and adding insights through data analysis for better business outcomes.As Your Main Accountabilities You WillClose cooperate with FP&A manager to ensure strong cross functional alignment and smooth process and outcomesAnalyse market data and come up with value-adding insights for forecasting and budget meetingsSupport BUs with cost controlling and to optimize forecasting exerciseDefine, implement, and provide guidance with regards to business intelligence & analytics journeySupport in better data visualisation/analytics through digital tools (dashboards)QualificationsWe would expect you to have the following requirements:Relevant academic degree within business (Economy, Industrial Engineering etc.)At least 3 years of working experience in similar positionsWorking experience in the pharmaceutical industry and familiarity with pharmaceutical sales, marketing, medical and market access functions.Ability to translate insights and datasets into marketing/sales requirementsQualifications in Qlik / BI-tools (considered a plus)Strong Analytical skills, combined with structured and transparent way of workingProficient level in Office ExcelFluency in English- Spoken and writtenWorking at Novo NordiskWe are a proud life-science company, and life is our reason to exist. We’re inspired by life in all its forms and shapes, ups and downs, opportunities, and challenges. For employees at Novo Nordisk, life means many things – from the building blocks of life that form the basis of ground-breaking scientific research, to our rich personal lives that motivate and energise us to perform our best at work. Ultimately, life is why we’re all here - to ensure that people can lead a life independent of chronic disease.DeadlineApply before December 24ContactIf you believe you are qualified and are willing to take the challenge, please send your motivation letter, CV, and relevant documentation directly via our online application tool. In case of any doubts related to the position, please get in touch with Thanassis Kyriakopoulos, Finance & Operations Director in Israel, via email atky@novonordisk.comWe commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.
Requirements: ['Close cooperate with FP&A manager to ensure strong cross functional alignment and smooth process and outcomes', 'Analyse market data and come up with value-adding insights for forecasting and budget meetings', 'Support BUs with cost controlling and to optimize forecasting exercise', 'Define, implement, and provide guidance with regards to business intelligence & analytics journey', 'Support in better data visualisation/analytics through digital tools (dashboards)', 'Relevant academic degree within business (Economy, Industrial Engineering etc.)', 'At least 3 years of working experience in similar positions', 'Working experience in the pharmaceutical industry and familiarity with pharmaceutical sales, marketing, medical and market access functions.', 'Ability to translate insights and datasets into marketing/sales requirements', 'Qualifications in Qlik / BI-tools (considered a plus)', 'Strong Analytical skills, combined with structured and transparent way of working', 'Proficient level in Office Excel', 'Fluency in English- Spoken and written']

Title: Brand Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We AreWix Marketing’s design studio. We’re continuously developing a world-class brand to communicate and engage with a wide range of audiences. Our creative, energetic and diverse team plays a hands-on role in elevating the brand with rich and sophisticated designs across all of Wix’s products, reaching more than 200 million users around the world.You AreA passionate designer with experience in a professional design environment. You’re a creative conceptual thinker with a beautiful online portfolio consisting of strong graphic principles. You’re proficient in Adobe CC, Sketch or Figma and other design tools. You’re artistically talented, you pay close attention to details and aesthetics and you know how to create beautiful, interactive designs.You’re an excellent communicator and a team player. You follow design and web trends and you’ll get bonus points if you’ve worked in a digital agency, have prior knowledge in motion design or code and if you have excellent spoken and written English.As a Web Brand Designer You WillDevelop and elevate Wix’s brand identity and standardsOwn brand design projects dealing with brand identity, UX/UI design, digital assets, interface and interaction design workBuild innovative marketing assets that engage our potential users and employeesConstruct creative concepts and communicate them in a clear wayWork with other stakeholders to gather information, understand the goals and strategize visual communication approachesWe’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Wix was built around the idea that everyone has the right to be successful, online. This same vision defines us as an employer: creating a work environment where everyone is welcome, and anyone has the right to succeed.
Requirements: ['Develop and elevate Wix’s brand identity and standards', 'Own brand design projects dealing with brand identity, UX/UI design, digital assets, interface and interaction design work', 'Build innovative marketing assets that engage our potential users and employees', 'Construct creative concepts and communicate them in a clear way', 'Work with other stakeholders to gather information, understand the goals and strategize visual communication approaches']

Text: Guesty is a short-term property management software. By reimagining the future of vacation rentals, we believe we can help reshape the world's hospitality experience.As a Marketing Automation Specialist, you will be laser-focused on growing revenue from our customer base. You will use data and marketing automations to deliver campaigns that drive customer engagement and feature adoption revenue.Requirements:1+ years of marketing experience in growth or automation positions with tech companies, preferably B2B oriented Experienced working with email automation tools like Hubspot, MixMax or Salesforce Marketing Cloud Experienced in creating and executing marketing programs that drive customer or prospect engagement and advocacy You take pride in consistently meeting or exceeding targets in a revenue or demand generation role Excellent spoken and written English – experience in writing B2B content is a plus Comfortable leading complex projects that require buy-in and participation from multiple stakeholders on multiple teams You are analytical, possessing the interest and skill to determine marketing effectiveness and ROI of customer engagement efforts You Understand the needs and concerns of short term rentals market (big advantage)Responsibilities: Plan, manage and execute Guesty’s email automation campaigns Help with the day to day data management, cleanup & analysis using hubspot, Data Studio and Excel Work with our product team to drive new feature adoption with our platform users Understand our user pain points as to help refine their buying personas and brief the content team Take ownership of a wide variety of tech stack including Chilipier, Influ2,Typeform, Slintel, Zapier and more Build dashboards with our BI team to measure and optimize our campaign performances Partner with our SDR team to support our Enterprise Marketing initiatives

Title: VP R&D
Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: One Digital is a software development company working on a range of projects Such as :IOT , agriculture, banking, e-commerce, medical devices and more using the best software stacks around. If you like building great products, working on projects from scratch, you don't mind switching context almost daily and like to work in a fast-paced environment then One Digital is the ideal workplace for you.We are looking for a VP R&D to lead the R&D teams and be responsible for growing our Developing teams.The ideal candidate will be a technological leader with a can-do approach, powerful leadership and interpersonal skills that thrives in a fast-paced environment.Lead our high-performance, development teams including ~40 team members in a dynamic Agile environmentDefine the R&D roadmap, growth plan and strategy. Optimize methodology, work process and efficiency to align with business goals and yield competitive advantagesEnsure collaborations with other cross-functional groups (product, Project and HR) to streamline work processes and support the development and deployment of all productsCommunicate the technology strategy to high-level leadership, partners and investorsCoach, support and provide feedback for your direct reports to positively impact their career development and growth and secure key talent retention. Requirements:B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science,At least 5+ years of experience in managing and scaling R&D teams, including experience as senior R&D or Engineering management roles (Head of DEV/CTO) from Project companies.Development that integrates multiple technologies Web/MOBILE/IOT in the stack of: React, Node.js, Django, Flutter, Angular, Swift and Kotlin.Proven success working closely with product management, contributing to the product strategy, and helping to successfully deliverProven success Customer Facing.A first-hand understanding of Agile development methodologiesStrong verbal, visual, and written communication skills with the ability to communicate at all levels in the organization, including key stakeholders.A strong leader- You have solid interpersonal and leadership skills, and you are passionate about empowering members of your teamAbility to think strategically and see the big pictureExcellent problem-solving skills. High Level English.

Title: Legal Counsel
Location: Ra'anana, Center District, Israel
Text: Cyberbit is the world’s leading provider of a cyber-security training platform with clients from Fortune 500 companies, universities and Governments worldwide.Cyberbit’s platform deploys real-world attacks using reverse-engineered malware onto a virtual network, allowing users to defend against live attacks. Sounds intriguing? That’s because it is!What will your job look like? Providing practical, business-oriented legal advice to senior management on significant issues. Drafting, reviewing, negotiating and closing a wide variety of commercial contracts with Company’s international customers, suppliers and partners. Interacting with all other Company departments in Israel and with our subsidiaries abroad. Managing and working closely with external law firms in different territories. Handling data protection / privacy related issues. Dealing with IP matters, copyrights and trademarks related issues. Participating in the definition and development of corporate policies. Dealing with HR matters in Israel and abroad.Requirements: 3-4 years of experience in commercial international law; preferably working in a legal department of a technology company or in a hi-tech department of a leading law firm. English – Native / Full professional proficiency – must. Efficient team player, service oriented, can operate independently while multi-tasking. Dynamic and pro-active personality. Hard worker, well-organized, creative.You will love working with us:We were ranked as the #16 best place to work with in Israel out of all tech companies, and #25 out of ALL companies in Israel in 2022!We’re well funded, and have raised $100M so farWe provide growth opportunities – some of our best managers have grown in the organizationWe love a good party, so you can expect themed happy hours, holiday toasts, parties, and water fightsAnd no – we won’t throw massive dance parties with top international DJs, but we’ll know each and every one of you by name, and whenever there’s a personal reason to celebrate, or when something went wrong, we’ll be there for you – that’s why we call ourselves family.

Title: IT Global Service Excellence Manager
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Playtika Technology division is looking for a Senior IT Global Service excellence manager to join our Corporate IT unit and lead our Excellence center in Israel.Playtika corporate IT plays a significant role in delivering reliable and sustainable technologies services to more than 4000 employees in 19 sites across the entire globe, with offices just about anywhere.In Addition, our unit is initiating and catalyzing digitalization processes to support Playtika business growth and deeply involved in the implementation of technology-driven initiatives to maximize our employees experience.If you are curious, ambitious, highly motivated with passion to learn and evolve – join usRequirements:3+ years of experience in a similar role in a hi-tech company.4+ years prior experience as an IT support engineerProven experience in leading and implementing service operation and service improvement programs.Excellent communication and customer service skills.Excellent time management and an ability to multitask across multiple projects and prioritize in fast paced environmentKnowledge and experience in supporting development (R&D) teamsStrong knowledge of Microsoft Windows operating system’ Microsoft Office products, Mac operating system and Mac management - MustProven experience in Active directory, Office 365, VPN, Printers, Personal computing, conference systems, Exchange administration (email accounts, distribution lists, shared mailboxes, resources)Knowledge of computer imaging to specification using SCCM/JAMF/MDM –advantageFamiliar with security products (AV, EDR etc.).Excellent written and verbal communications skills in EnglishAble to work with a globally distributed teamHardworking and flexible with the ability to work under pressureThe roll requires high availability and accountability also in off business hoursResponsibilities:Manage the IT Service Excellence center, comprised of at least 10 IT service desks and Technicians in IL and globallyCollaborate with local stakeholders to provide IT solutions to help meet their needs.Tight monitoring of IT service performances as: SLA, case backlog, customer satisfaction, service efficiencies, service quality and compliance with the IT and security guided standards.Develop service improvement plan for the Service Desk Operation, set service and efficiency KPI’s.Review Core support process, team skills and knowledge, service tools and plan and implement the required improvements in order to upscale the IT service level and the service teams efficiency.Establish and maintain strong relationships across teams within IT and with internal customersManage the Service desk and the technicians teams, monitor and ensure their performance meet the IT targets as well as improvements by time.Follow up with customers to identify areas of improvement and handle ad hock service issuesManage critical service related escalationsProvide technical leadership - Train and support the teamTake active roll in the roll-out of new services and hardware to ensure the serviceability of the new services and HW.Asset management ownership – manage the IT assets, transactions, HW physical and SW inventory levels and the quality of their deployment to the users (including the compliance quality).Be accountable for assets reports, procurement and costsOccasionally working with third parties to rectify issue

Title: Immunologist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As an immunologist at CytoReason, you will receive an intense “data training” and work closely with our expanding multi-disciplinary team of biologists, software engineers and bioinformaticians. You’ll tackle the pharmaceutical industry’s most burning questions using cutting edge data. You’ll decipher disease mechanisms, identify biomarkers, find novel drug targets, and develop new approaches for computational models use cases in pharma discovery.This role is customer facing. You’ll accompany the world’s top pharma companies as they enter the era of precision medicine and as they make groundbreaking discoveries and bring novel therapies to patients who most need them.Requirements:PhD in ImmunologyVery strong communication skills in EnglishExcellent presentation skillsResponsibilities:Work closely with the pharma scientists to define the key deliverables of the projectYou will have to quickly learn the biology around the program and become our top expert on that topicPerform data interpretation and analysis from a biologist’s perspectiveBuild a plan with an internal team and guide them through the project, the questions, the data and interpretation of the outputAdministrative and scientific leadership, including presenting the progress of the project and deliver reports to the clientsAdvantages:Experience in building biological hypothesis from high dimensional dataExperience in supporting pharma R&D projectsExperience with multiple omics technologies
Requirements: ['PhD in Immunology', 'Very strong communication skills in English', 'Excellent presentation skills', 'Work closely with the pharma scientists to define the key deliverables of the project', 'You will have to quickly learn the biology around the program and become our top expert on that topic', 'Perform data interpretation and analysis from a biologist’s perspective', 'Build a plan with an internal team and guide them through the project, the questions, the data and interpretation of the output', 'Administrative and scientific leadership, including presenting the progress of the project and deliver reports to the clients', 'Experience in building biological hypothesis from high dimensional data', 'Experience in supporting pharma R&D projects', 'Experience with multiple omics technologies']

Title: User Acquisition Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: With over 30 Million users on our platform, we’re here to change the future of business. Our all-in-one platform makes starting a business affordable and accessible to everyone - we welcome more than 800k new business owners every month. From our products to our careers, there are endless opportunities for growth.Our team | Our core | Our dream fulfillersWhen we started Tailor Brands, we wanted to help people to accelerate their growth and fulfill their dreams. Title: Full Stack
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Attenti, a global provider of leading presence and location verification technologies Located in Ramat Hachayal, Tel Aviv. The Company's systems are employed by private operators and government agencies throughout the world and its technology spearheads the Electronic Monitoring market.We are looking for an outstanding and passionate Full Stack Software Engineer who is motivated to combine the art of software design with the art of programming, to join our Next Generation Platform team.As a Full Stack engineer you will be part of a talented software team using top-notch technologies and software engineering methodologies. You will provide your expertise in the full software development life-cycle, from concept and design to development and unit testing, interfacing with other teams and departments such as product management, scrum masters, UX , Mobile, Embedded and QA teams.Build micro-services that will support large scale applications and 3rd party APIs to support our next generation IoT system.Design and develop the company's core business.Optimize application for maximum performance and scalability.Collaborate with other teams and scrum-team members in an Agile work environment.Requirements:BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject from a well known University or College1-5 years of proven hands-on Software Development experience.Strong background in computer science fundamentals - data structures, Object-Oriented and multi threading.Proven working experience in C# or Node.JS.Hands on experience in designing and developing large scale highly performing applications.Experience with relational / non relational databases.Team player.Passionate, can do attitude.Fast learning capabilities with a strong sense of ownership.AdvantagesExperience with Enterprise production systems.Experience with test-driven development.Experience with micro-service architecture, docker containers, REST and Kafka Experience with HTML5, CSS3, SASS.Experience with JavaScript, ES6, TypeScript Good understanding of multi treading conceptsPrevious experience with Cloud deployment.

Title: Dev Support
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Imagine there was a platform that allows operating multiple autonomous vehicles, in the air and on the ground, across the globe, from a single location. How awesome would that be?!What if you were the one that helped build it from scratch?Based in TLV , Bluewhite is a world leader in autonomous technologies and unmanned systems. We are seeking a passionate, Dev Support to join our R&D team & help build our new revolutionary RaaS (Robot-as-a-Service) platform.You will play a key role in a fast-growing team with significant impact and potential for professional and personal growth.If you are an individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment, who leads, takes ownership, is tech-savvy and loves client interactions - we’re waiting to hear from you!This is an amazing opportunity for those who want to take part in an evolving team, to gain significant experience and make a real business impact!Responsibilities - what you’ll be doing:Support customers and provide creative technical solutions while making an impact onthe R&D & Product roadmapDeploy BWR products from cloud infrastructureInstall and monitor different network systems deployed on customer premisesDeploy & install Linux-based systems and administrate themManage the Israel on-call dutyEscalation Engineer for Tier 1 and Tier 2 troubleshooting issuesBe accountable for training & knowledge sharing across the CA US and IL teamsWork night/day shifts according to the client’s changing schedule and needsFlexibility in hours and ability to work as a remote team with the Israel R&D teamAvailability to travel abroad hi- frequentlyRequirements:Requirements - does this describe you?5+ years of directing in technical customer support / field service-based environment – Must3+ years proven hands-on support for Cloud Based Systems (preference in AWS) - Must2+ years in IT industry experience - MustExperience in working in remote deployment environments - MustKnowledge of basic principles of hardware, network, software, database – Mustknowledge in Linux operation systems such as Ubuntu - MustAnalytical and troubleshooting skillsAble to take initiative and drive change and handle pressureKeen learner with a technical attitude to assimilate new learning quicklyCapacity and passion to help customersMust be authorized to work in the USFluent in English – MustAdvantages - these will bring you to our front row:Scripting: Bash/Shell, Python, and IP networkingExperience in troubleshooting distributed applications like Docker / KubernetesExperience with low-level analytics & logsAbout Us:Bluewhite provides cutting-edge autonomous systems and services globally. Our solutions aim to optimize operations and productivity in various domains like agriculture, security and smart mobility. We help our customers adopt new autonomous technologies, and improve efficiency and effectiveness on their existing products & services.Bluewhite is led by ex-IAF pilots and engineers with more than 20 years of experience in designing, developing and operating autonomous systems both in the air and on ground. Our team of 100+ professionals is composed of autonomous operation experts, system engineers, robotics experts and optimization & AI algorithms developers. Among our customers and partners you will find companies like Intel, Nvidia and Renault.

Text: בנק מזרחיחברת abra מגייסת PMO לפעילות יישום אסטרטגיות.נדרש PROJECT OFFICER, שיסייע למנהל הפר' המקצועי בהכנת תוכניות עבודה ובהכנת תוכנית ניהול סיכונים, מעקב אחרי ביצוע משימות והכנת מצגות סטטוס. ניהול גירסאות ניהול תכולה, תהליכי אישורים, מעקב על פיתוח ובדיקות ויכולת "הרמת דגלים" בהתאם לנדרש (יש 4 גרסאות בשנה).מה דרוש לתפקיד?ניסיון כPMO 3 שניםניסיון בעבודה עם MS-PROJECT - יתרוןתואר ראשון בהנדסת תעו"נ – יתרון משמעותי.המשרה – בתל אביב

Title: בודק/ת מערכתי/ת
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: ניתוח הדרישות המערכתיותכתיבת מסמך בדיקות והעברת סקרי בדיקותמימוש וביצוע הבדיקות במעבדות המערכתיות וניתוח תוצאות הבדיקהדיווח על תקלות ובדיקת תיקוני התקלותהשתתפות באינטגרציות במעבדה ובדיקות באתרי הלקוחRequirements:הבנה מערכתית מעולה של מערכות מורכבות והפגנת יכולות לניתוח והבנת התקלות, מקורן וההשפעה המערכתית שלהן.יכולת טובה לניתוח דרישות.ניסיון בבדיקות תוכנה עם עדיפות לבדיקות מערכת.ניסיון בבדיקות חומרה.כישורים בינאישיים גבוהים ויכולת עבודה מול ממשקים רבים בחברה ומחוצה לההשכלה אקדמאית בתחום ההנדסה - יתרוןידע בפיתוח בפייתון - יתרוןניסיון בבדיקות מערכות צבאיות מורכבות - יתרון משמעותיניסיון בהובלה וניהול - יתרון משמעותי.

Title: Sales Development Representative
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As a Sales Development Representative (SDR), your main goal is to collaborate with our Account Executives to open up important business opportunities for AI21 Studio. It will also require more strategy than a standard pipeline development role. You will be tasked with mapping out accounts we want to sell into and creating strategic plans for opening discussions with them. Your performance will depend on your ability to expand AI21 Studio’s client base.Requirements:2-3 years of experience in growth stage B2B Saas or AI company.Fluent English, written and verbal.Knowledge of leading Saas sales tools (such as Salesforce, Zoominfo, Apollo).SDR methodologies (7-15 steps).Ability to coordinate with cross functional teams, such as Marketing - lead source, quality of leads, recommendations.Ability to hold a 10-15 min conversation about the platform.Role and Responsibilities:Generate pipeline through outbound calls and inbound leads.Maintain proactive engagement with new and existing leads.Research prospects and identify CxO-level contact opportunities and set up meetings with Account Executives.Conduct high-level conversations with senior executives of prospective clients.Build and manage an accurate sales pipeline and maintain a high volume of activity including outbound cold calling, email, and social networking.About Us:AI21 Labs was co-founded by AI luminaries and serial entrepreneurs Prof. Amnon Shashua (Hebrew U, Mobileye), Prof. Yoav Shoham (Stanford, Google), and Ori Goshen (8200, Crowdx). The company is set to reimagine the way we interact with text, making reading and writing an AI-first experience. It is also one of the world's leading NLP research labs, conducting basic research in the field and publishing award winning papers in the prominent AI conferences.The company’s product portfolio includes Wordtune, a writing companion tool used daily by millions across the world, that helps you rephrase your writing to say exactly what you mean. Wordtune Read, an AI reader that summarizes long documents so you can understand more, faster. And AI21 Studio, helping developers and businesses use cutting-edge language models, with no NLP expertise required.
Requirements: ['2-3 years of experience in growth stage B2B Saas or AI company.', 'Fluent English, written and verbal.', 'Knowledge of leading Saas sales tools (such as Salesforce, Zoominfo, Apollo).', 'SDR methodologies (7-15 steps).', 'Ability to coordinate with cross functional teams, such as Marketing - lead source, quality of leads, recommendations.', 'Ability to hold a 10-15 min conversation about the platform.', 'Generate pipeline through outbound calls and inbound leads.', 'Maintain proactive engagement with new and existing leads.', 'Research prospects and identify CxO-level contact opportunities and set up meetings with Account Executives.', 'Conduct high-level conversations with senior executives of prospective clients.', 'Build and manage an accurate sales pipeline and maintain a high volume of activity including outbound cold calling, email, and social networking.']

Title: Sales Representative, SMB

Text: חטיבת הקמעונאות של חברת הייטק מצליחה בהרצליה, דרושים אנשי מכירות עם ניסיון במכירת מוצרי סליקה/ קופות ממוחשבות/ ניסיון מובהק מהעולם הקמעונאי.תנאים מעולים למתאימים.איש המכירות יהיה חלק מצוות המכירות של נאייקס ריטייל וידווח לסמנכ"ל המכירות.תחומי אחריות:מכירת מוצרי החברה והגדלת הפעילות במגוון רחב של לקוחות מקטנים עד גדוליםמתן תמיכה והגדלת מכירות בלקוחות קיימיםהכרת המוצרים ברמה גבוהה והצגת היתרונות ללקוחותRequirements:ניסיון במכירות קופות ממוחשבות/מסופונים/מוצרי סליקה- חובההיכרות עם העולם הקמעונאי- חובהיכולת יצירת קשרים עם לקוחות ומקסום הזדמנויותיכולות עבודה בצוותWho we are:Nayax is a leading global end-to-end retail technology platform for unattended & attended commerce. Our mission is to simplify commerce and payments for retailers while driving growth, optimizing operations, and enhancing consumer engagement.Nayax Israel is located in the prestigious Herzliya Hills, just a short drive north of Tel Aviv or a very short walk from the train station.Our open space offices accommodate our 400+ employees and when we’re not hard at work, you can find us enjoying an afternoon coffee on the balcony. We’re the largest Nayax site, housing over 20 different departments.For a glimpse of what it's like to work at Nayax, check out our Instagram account! https://bit.ly/3G3QDc4.Check out Nayax's page under "Best Cool Israeli Companies 2022" by Secret Tel-Aviv: https://bit.ly/3LqzElA.Nayax is constantly growing and we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic, innovative and eager individuals to join us in our growth!

Title: PA & Workplace Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv District, Israel

Title: Monetization Creative Lead

Title: R&D Group Manager

Title: Full Stack
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Attenti, a global provider of leading presence and location verification technologies Located in Ramat Hachayal, Tel Aviv. The Company's systems are employed by private operators and government agencies throughout the world and its technology spearheads the Electronic Monitoring market.We are looking for an outstanding and passionate Full Stack Software Engineer who is motivated to combine the art of software design with the art of programming, to join our Next Generation Platform team.As a Full Stack engineer you will be part of a talented software team using top-notch technologies and software engineering methodologies. You will provide your expertise in the full software development life-cycle, from concept and design to development and unit testing, interfacing with other teams and departments such as product management, scrum masters, UX , Mobile, Embedded and QA teams.Build micro-services that will support large scale applications and 3rd party APIs to support our next generation IoT system.Design and develop the company's core business.Optimize application for maximum performance and scalability.Collaborate with other teams and scrum-team members in an Agile work environment.Requirements:BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject from a well known University or College1-5 years of proven hands-on Software Development experience.Strong background in computer science fundamentals - data structures, Object-Oriented and multi threading.Proven working experience in C# or Node.JS.Hands on experience in designing and developing large scale highly performing applications.Experience with relational / non relational databases.Team player.Passionate, can do attitude.Fast learning capabilities with a strong sense of ownership.AdvantagesExperience with Enterprise production systems.Experience with test-driven development.Experience with micro-service architecture, docker containers, REST and Kafka Experience with HTML5, CSS3, SASS.Experience with JavaScript, ES6, TypeScript Good understanding of multi treading conceptsPrevious experience with Cloud deployment.

Title: Dev Support
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Imagine there was a platform that allows operating multiple autonomous vehicles, in the air and on the ground, across the globe, from a single location. How awesome would that be?!What if you were the one that helped build it from scratch?Based in TLV , Bluewhite is a world leader in autonomous technologies and unmanned systems. We are seeking a passionate, Dev Support to join our R&D team & help build our new revolutionary RaaS (Robot-as-a-Service) platform.You will play a key role in a fast-growing team with significant impact and potential for professional and personal growth.If you are an individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment, who leads, takes ownership, is tech-savvy and loves client interactions - we’re waiting to hear from you!This is an amazing opportunity for those who want to take part in an evolving team, to gain significant experience and make a real business impact!Responsibilities - what you’ll be doing:Support customers and provide creative technical solutions while making an impact onthe R&D & Product roadmapDeploy BWR products from cloud infrastructureInstall and monitor different network systems deployed on customer premisesDeploy & install Linux-based systems and administrate themManage the Israel on-call dutyEscalation Engineer for Tier 1 and Tier 2 troubleshooting issuesBe accountable for training & knowledge sharing across the CA US and IL teamsWork night/day shifts according to the client’s changing schedule and needsFlexibility in hours and ability to work as a remote team with the Israel R&D teamAvailability to travel abroad hi- frequentlyRequirements:Requirements - does this describe you?5+ years of directing in technical customer support / field service-based environment – Must3+ years proven hands-on support for Cloud Based Systems (preference in AWS) - Must2+ years in IT industry experience - MustExperience in working in remote deployment environments - MustKnowledge of basic principles of hardware, network, software, database – Mustknowledge in Linux operation systems such as Ubuntu - MustAnalytical and troubleshooting skillsAble to take initiative and drive change and handle pressureKeen learner with a technical attitude to assimilate new learning quicklyCapacity and passion to help customersMust be authorized to work in the USFluent in English – MustAdvantages - these will bring you to our front row:Scripting: Bash/Shell, Python, and IP networkingExperience in troubleshooting distributed applications like Docker / KubernetesExperience with low-level analytics & logsAbout Us:Bluewhite provides cutting-edge autonomous systems and services globally. Our solutions aim to optimize operations and productivity in various domains like agriculture, security and smart mobility. We help our customers adopt new autonomous technologies, and improve efficiency and effectiveness on their existing products & services.Bluewhite is led by ex-IAF pilots and engineers with more than 20 years of experience in designing, developing and operating autonomous systems both in the air and on ground. Our team of 100+ professionals is composed of autonomous operation experts, system engineers, robotics experts and optimization & AI algorithms developers. Among our customers and partners you will find companies like Intel, Nvidia and Renault.

Text: ניתוח הדרישות המערכתיותכתיבת מסמך בדיקות והעברת סקרי בדיקותמימוש וביצוע הבדיקות במעבדות המערכתיות וניתוח תוצאות הבדיקהדיווח על תקלות ובדיקת תיקוני התקלותהשתתפות באינטגרציות במעבדה ובדיקות באתרי הלקוחRequirements:הבנה מערכתית מעולה של מערכות מורכבות והפגנת יכולות לניתוח והבנת התקלות, מקורן וההשפעה המערכתית שלהן.יכולת טובה לניתוח דרישות.ניסיון בבדיקות תוכנה עם עדיפות לבדיקות מערכת.ניסיון בבדיקות חומרה.כישורים בינאישיים גבוהים ויכולת עבודה מול ממשקים רבים בחברה ומחוצה לההשכלה אקדמאית בתחום ההנדסה - יתרוןידע בפיתוח בפייתון - יתרוןניסיון בבדיקות מערכות צבאיות מורכבות - יתרון משמעותיניסיון בהובלה וניהול - יתרון משמעותי.

Title: Sales Representative, SMB

Text: חטיבת הקמעונאות של חברת הייטק מצליחה בהרצליה, דרושים אנשי מכירות עם ניסיון במכירת מוצרי סליקה/ קופות ממוחשבות/ ניסיון מובהק מהעולם הקמעונאי.תנאים מעולים למתאימים.איש המכירות יהיה חלק מצוות המכירות של נאייקס ריטייל וידווח לסמנכ"ל המכירות.תחומי אחריות:מכירת מוצרי החברה והגדלת הפעילות במגוון רחב של לקוחות מקטנים עד גדוליםמתן תמיכה והגדלת מכירות בלקוחות קיימיםהכרת המוצרים ברמה גבוהה והצגת היתרונות ללקוחותRequirements:ניסיון במכירות קופות ממוחשבות/מסופונים/מוצרי סליקה- חובההיכרות עם העולם הקמעונאי- חובהיכולת יצירת קשרים עם לקוחות ומקסום הזדמנויותיכולות עבודה בצוותWho we are:Nayax is a leading global end-to-end retail technology platform for unattended & attended commerce. Our mission is to simplify commerce and payments for retailers while driving growth, optimizing operations, and enhancing consumer engagement.Nayax Israel is located in the prestigious Herzliya Hills, just a short drive north of Tel Aviv or a very short walk from the train station.Our open space offices accommodate our 400+ employees and when we’re not hard at work, you can find us enjoying an afternoon coffee on the balcony. We’re the largest Nayax site, housing over 20 different departments.For a glimpse of what it's like to work at Nayax, check out our Instagram account! https://bit.ly/3G3QDc4.Check out Nayax's page under "Best Cool Israeli Companies 2022" by Secret Tel-Aviv: https://bit.ly/3LqzElA.Nayax is constantly growing and we are always on the lookout for enthusiastic, innovative and eager individuals to join us in our growth!

Title: Sales Development Representative
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As a Sales Development Representative (SDR), your main goal is to collaborate with our Account Executives to open up important business opportunities for AI21 Studio. It will also require more strategy than a standard pipeline development role. You will be tasked with mapping out accounts we want to sell into and creating strategic plans for opening discussions with them. Your performance will depend on your ability to expand AI21 Studio’s client base.Requirements:2-3 years of experience in growth stage B2B Saas or AI company.Fluent English, written and verbal.Knowledge of leading Saas sales tools (such as Salesforce, Zoominfo, Apollo).SDR methodologies (7-15 steps).Ability to coordinate with cross functional teams, such as Marketing - lead source, quality of leads, recommendations.Ability to hold a 10-15 min conversation about the platform.Role and Responsibilities:Generate pipeline through outbound calls and inbound leads.Maintain proactive engagement with new and existing leads.Research prospects and identify CxO-level contact opportunities and set up meetings with Account Executives.Conduct high-level conversations with senior executives of prospective clients.Build and manage an accurate sales pipeline and maintain a high volume of activity including outbound cold calling, email, and social networking.About Us:AI21 Labs was co-founded by AI luminaries and serial entrepreneurs Prof. Amnon Shashua (Hebrew U, Mobileye), Prof. Yoav Shoham (Stanford, Google), and Ori Goshen (8200, Crowdx). The company is set to reimagine the way we interact with text, making reading and writing an AI-first experience. It is also one of the world's leading NLP research labs, conducting basic research in the field and publishing award winning papers in the prominent AI conferences.The company’s product portfolio includes Wordtune, a writing companion tool used daily by millions across the world, that helps you rephrase your writing to say exactly what you mean. Wordtune Read, an AI reader that summarizes long documents so you can understand more, faster. And AI21 Studio, helping developers and businesses use cutting-edge language models, with no NLP expertise required.
Requirements: ['2-3 years of experience in growth stage B2B Saas or AI company.', 'Fluent English, written and verbal.', 'Knowledge of leading Saas sales tools (such as Salesforce, Zoominfo, Apollo).', 'SDR methodologies (7-15 steps).', 'Ability to coordinate with cross functional teams, such as Marketing - lead source, quality of leads, recommendations.', 'Ability to hold a 10-15 min conversation about the platform.', 'Generate pipeline through outbound calls and inbound leads.', 'Maintain proactive engagement with new and existing leads.', 'Research prospects and identify CxO-level contact opportunities and set up meetings with Account Executives.', 'Conduct high-level conversations with senior executives of prospective clients.', 'Build and manage an accurate sales pipeline and maintain a high volume of activity including outbound cold calling, email, and social networking.']

Title: CISO
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DescriptionShield is growing and expanding fast and we’re looking for an important piece of the puzzle.This experienced CISO will define, build and implement the information security strategy to ensure the protection of our Customers, cloud environment, corporate infrastructure, and Software Development Environment. You’ll ensure that we are compliant with industry best practices and external regulations and policies and drive the company's security strategy forward.We can’t promise it will be easy, but it will be exciting and most importantly - FUN. In this position, you’ll be reporting to our CTO.Let’s Get Down To BusinessThe opportunity Manage, mentor, and monitor a small team of Security & ITDevelop, implement, and monitor strategic, comprehensive information security and IT risk management planLead all security policies standards and proceduresWork directly with the business units to facilitate risk assessment and risk management processesProvide guidance on proposed security best practices to the different business functions.Ability to retain, lead, train, and motivate othersLead the company’s security incident response processesDevelop and maintain a plan for employee information security awarenessBuild and implement an application security plan (SDLC)Manage and maintain the company’s SOC 2 certificationDevelop, implement, and monitor strategic of DR and BCPRequirementsExperience and skills5+ years of experience as CISO in a global organization including demonstrated ability to design and execute Security programs initiativesAn understanding of current and emerging threats and countermeasures.An excellent understanding of security standards and best practices e.g., SOC2, ISO27001, NIST, etc., as well as familiarity with GDPR.Professional Certification (CISSP, CISM, CISA, CRISC)Excellent communication skillsKnowledge and expertise working with security and data protection standards and regulations such as ISO/IEC 27001, SOC-2, SOX, PCI DSS, NIST Cybersecurity Framework, GDPR, etc.Experience in cloud, Kubernetes with big advantage to AWS.Hands-on knowledge and expertise in implementing, configuring, auditing and using security products like Firewalls, DLP products, IDS Products, Vulnerability-Assessment tools etc.Fluent in English (written and verbal)Exceptionally self-motivated, directed, and detail-oriented with a strong sense of ownership.Ability and experience in working at a fast paste and growing start-up – an advantage Oh hey, you made it all the way down!So in case you were wondering,Shield is a fast-growing start-up in the domain of financial services, we’re solving complex challenges for financial enterprises, using a blend of regulatory expertise, and technology, sprinkled with some artificial intelligence.Our platform analyses digital interactions to fight market manipulations and mitigate a toxic workplace environment.We’re currently in a rapid growth mode. After being bootstrapped for over 3 years, we’ve successfully completed a $15M Series A and are doing great, thanks for asking!We believe that we’ve built a special and limitless place to work where individuals are encouraged to bring their passion and align to our shared purpose and culture of excellence and innovation.We are a global company with offices in Tel Aviv, London, New York, and Lisbon.

Title: Business Development Representative - EMEA
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Work model: Hybrid (2 days from home)Akeyless is the leading SaaS-based Secrets Management Platform for securing credentials, certificates and keys in DevOps and hybrid and multi-cloud environments. The company is backed by top cybersecurity investors (JVP and Team8) and provides a unified approach to securing a full range of both machine and human-to-machine secrets, empowering organizations to move fast, without sacrificing security.Join us and become part of an innovative, fast growing start-up that’s making an impact in the world of cybersecurity by helping organizations protect their most critical workloads and data.The Business Development Representative (BDR) will work closely with the Sales and Marketing team. This role will sit at the intersection of Marketing and Sales to educate customers on the Akeyless platform's value and competitive differentiation and progress them to opportunities. The BDRs are focused on generating outbound leads and qualifying and developing them into sales opportunities.Responsibilities include:Appointment scheduling, preparation and presentation to prospectsConducting initial qualification of leads based on phone discussionsScheduling appointments for outside Sales reps Researching prospects and incorporate our value proposition with their businessSupporting prospect outreach initiatives by creating email campaigns and calling leads derived from Marketing lists, referrals and advertising programsWorking closely with Marketing and Sales to build a strong pipeline of prospective clientsUsing Hubspot to capture information regarding leads as well as facilitate lead flow to others in the sales processUtilizing CRM (Hubspot) to provide timely and accurate activity tracking and status updatesUsing email to correspond with leads to follow up and/or to confirm appointmentsCollaborating with Product Marketing and Product Management teams to understand product offerings, future plans, value propositions and road maps to meet customer needsPerform other duties as assignedRequirements:1-2 years of experience in outbound BDR - strong preferability in Cyber SecurityVery strong written and oral communication skills, an excellent storyteller - in English and HebrewExceptional people skills to interact with executives, colleagues, cross-functional teams, partners, and customersExcellent relationship-building skillsExperience working in a fast-growing, B2B SaaS Security and/or IT focused early-stage company, preferredFluent in one or more of the following tools: ZoomInfo, HubSpot, Lusha, Outreach, Salesloft, Sales Navigator
Requirements: ['Appointment scheduling, preparation and presentation to prospects', 'Conducting initial qualification of leads based on phone discussions', 'Scheduling appointments for outside Sales reps', 'Researching prospects and incorporate our value proposition with their business', 'Supporting prospect outreach initiatives by creating email campaigns and calling leads derived from Marketing lists, referrals and advertising programs', 'Working closely with Marketing and Sales to build a strong pipeline of prospective clients', 'Using Hubspot to capture information regarding leads as well as facilitate lead flow to others in the sales process', 'Utilizing CRM (Hubspot) to provide timely and accurate activity tracking and status updates', 'Using email to correspond with leads to follow up and/or to confirm appointments', 'Collaborating with Product Marketing and Product Management teams to understand product offerings, future plans, value propositions and road maps to meet customer needs', 'Perform other duties as assigned', '1-2 years of experience in outbound BDR - strong preferability in Cyber Security', 'Very strong written and oral communication skills, an excellent storyteller - in English and Hebrew', 'Exceptional people skills to interact with executives, colleagues, cross-functional teams, partners, and customers', 'Excellent relationship-building skills', 'Experience working in a fast-growing, B2B SaaS Security and/or IT focused early-stage company, preferred', 'Fluent in one or more of the following tools: ZoomInfo, HubSpot, Lusha, Outreach, Salesloft, Sales Navigator']

Title: Secretary
Company: Dr. M. Druker & Co. - Advocates And Notaries
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: דרוש/ה מזכיר/ה למשרדנו בתל אביבלמשרד עו"ד , ד"ר מ. דרוקר ושות', במרכז תל אביב דרוש /ה מזכיר/ה אנרגטי/ת ומנוסה.התפקיד כולל: מענה טלפוני וניהול יומנים של שותפים בכירים, הזמנת ציוד למשרד, בק אופיס.העבודה במשרה מלאה בימים א'-ה'. שעות העבודה גמישות ונקבעות בין צוות המזכירות על בסיס שבועי בין השעות 08:30-17:00 או בין השעות 10:30-19:00. דרישות:- ניסיון אדמיניסטרטיבי - חובה.- אנגלית ברמה טובה מאוד - חובה.- שליטה מלאה בתוכנות אופיס, אאוטלוק - חובה.- ראש גדול, מוסר עבודה, שירותיות.- יכולת מולטיטסקינג, יכולת עבודה תחת לחץ, יסודיות, יחסי אנוש טובים.* המשרה מיועדת לנשים וגברים כאחד.** שכר גבוה מובטח למתקבלים. נא לשלוח קו"ח למייל: OMER@DRUKERLAW.CO.ILA secretary is needed for our office in Tel AvivThe law firm, Dr. M. Druker & Co. in the center of Tel Aviv, looking for an energetic and experienced secretary.The job includes: answering the phone and managing diaries of senior partners, ordering equipment for the office, back office.Full-time work on Sundays-Thursdays. The working hours are flexible and are determined by the secretarial staff weekly hours of 08: 30 - 17: 00 or hours of 10: 30 - 19: 00. Requirements:-Administrative experience - is required.-English at a very good level - is required.-Full control of Office software, Outlook - required.-Bighead, work ethic, services.-Multitasking ability, ability to work under pressure, thoroughness, good interpersonal skills.* The position is intended for both women and men.** High wages are guaranteed. Please send a CV to email: omer@drukerlaw.co.il

Title: Quality Lead
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: ActiveFence is looking for a director of quality to join the engineering leadership team, reporting to the EVP of R&D, to oversee the quality activities of the engineering department as a whole.As a director of quality, you will be leading, defining, and executing the quality & automation strategy.We are looking for a leader with extensive experience in the quality domain, with a strong orientation to continuous integration & delivery while leveraging automation testing as the main gatekeeper of quality.As we see it, quality is not just about testing, it relates to every step of our development lifecycle, starting from planning, implementing and releasing.As a leader, you will need to understand our customer's usage of the platform and collaborate with all parties within the department to assure that the quality processes (which will be defined by you) will be addressed by leveraging the infrastructure that you will put in place.What You’ll DoDesign and build our automation infrastructure and building blocksDefine and build cross-group quality processes.Define the QA strategy, approach, standards and execution across our portfolio.Raise awareness and build a strong quality mindset within the engineering organization and within the team.Work with product managers, developers, and development managers to prioritize quality and testing opportunities in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.Oversee the product release quality and risks.Reduce time for testing while maintaining and improving the quality.Requirements:Experience in quality leadership roles for at least 2 years8+ years of hands-on experience in quality & automation frameworks and quality architecture.Experience leading the quality of SaaS products used at a high scale.Experience leading the quality of ML-based products used at a high scale.Experience in functional and non-functional testing; performance, stability, and upgradability testingHands-on experience working with Node.js, K8S, and Python including scripting skills and CI tools.BSc /BA Computer Science or equivalent Practical experience in software development and Agile methodologiesCan-do and keep a promising attitude, result driven, and able to effectively build relationshipsExceptional interpersonal skills: open-minded, team player, result orientedExcellent communication skills in English (verbal and written)About ActiveFence:ActiveFence is the leading tool stack for Trust & Safety teams, worldwide. By relying on ActiveFence’s end-to-end solution, Trust & Safety teams – of all sizes – can keep users safe from the widest spectrum of online harms, unwanted content, and malicious behavior, including child safety, disinformation, and fraud, hate speech, terror, nudity, and more.Using cutting-edge AI and a team of world-class subject-matter experts to continuously collect, analyze, and contextualize data, ActiveFence ensures that in an ever-changing world, customers are always two steps ahead of bad actors. As a result, Trust & Safety teams can be proactive and provide maximum protection to users across a multitude of abuse areas, in 70+ languages.Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors such as CRV and Norwest, ActiveFence has raised $100M to date; employs 300 people worldwide, and has contributed to the online safety of billions of users across the globe.
Requirements: ['Design and build our automation infrastructure and building blocks', 'Define and build cross-group quality processes.', 'Define the QA strategy, approach, standards and execution across our portfolio.', 'Raise awareness and build a strong quality mindset within the engineering organization and within the team.', 'Work with product managers, developers, and development managers to prioritize quality and testing opportunities in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.', 'Oversee the product release quality and risks.', 'Reduce time for testing while maintaining and improving the quality.', 'Experience in quality leadership roles for at least 2 years', '8+ years of hands-on experience in quality & automation frameworks and quality architecture.', 'Experience leading the quality of SaaS products used at a high scale.', 'Experience leading the quality of ML-based products used at a high scale.', 'Experience in functional and non-functional testing; performance, stability, and upgradability testing', 'Hands-on experience working with Node.js, K8S, and Python including scripting skills and CI tools.', 'BSc /BA Computer Science or equivalent', 'Practical experience in software development and Agile methodologies', 'Can-do and keep a promising attitude, result driven, and able to effectively build relationships', 'Exceptional interpersonal skills: open-minded, team player, result oriented']

Title: Privacy Officer
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Playtika (NASDAQ: PLTK) is a mobile gaming entertainment and technology market leader with a portfolio of multiple game titles. Founded in 2010, Playtika was among the first to offer free-to-play social games on social networks and, shortly after, on mobile platforms. Headquartered in Herzliya, Israel, and guided by a mission to entertain the world through infinite ways to play, Playtika has offices worldwide and employs over 4,000 employees .Playtika is looking to recruit a Privacy Officer who is an expert privacy professional that would be responsible for the privacy and data protection for the Playtika group worldwide. This person would also act as the Data Protection Officer (DPO) under the European Union (EU) General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for Playtika. The Privacy Officer will set strategy for privacy and data protection for Playtika worldwide, develop and revise privacy and data protection policies, work within a team to implement such policies, and monitor compliance and data practices internally to ensure the business and its functions comply with the applicable requirements under privacy laws and regulation in the territories Playtika provides its services.To be successful in this role, the Privacy Officer should have in-depth knowledge of worldwide privacy laws, with a special emphasis on GDPR, Israeli data privacy regulation and California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), robust knowledge of technological infrastructures and database systems. This position suits you if you are a motivated professional who enjoys working in a dynamic, fast-paced and collaborative environment.Requirements: Degree in law L.L.B (must) and any other degree in business or related field - an advantage. Strong and vast legal experience and knowledge of data privacy and data protection regulations, especially GDPR, and a good understanding of other major privacy frameworks and evolving legislation worldwide, including CCPA. Hold at least one Data Protection and/or Privacy certification such as, CIPP or CIPT, (preferred). Work Experience of 7+ years in data protection legal consultation and legal compliance within a legal team as an in-house privacy counsel or as part of a privacy department in a specialized law firm. Experience in developing policy and compliance training. Sufficient knowledge of information technology and data management systems required. Experience working in a large, global organization Excellent writing, presentation, and communication skills with strong proficiency in English and Hebrew. Ability to handle confidential and sensitive information with appropriate discretion. Knowledge of PC applications, including MS Office, familiarity with computer security systemsAdditional Requirements Some international travel may be required. The statements contained in this position description are not necessarily all-inclusive. Additional duties may be assigned, and requirements may vary from time to time.Responsibilities:In this role, you will work closely with the games studios, Compliance, IT and Information Security functions to develop and monitor policies and standards applicable to the business and in compliance with the privacy laws.Duties will include: Providing legal consultation on a verity of privacy related questions under different legal privacy frameworks. Implementing measures and a privacy governance framework to manage data use in compliance with the privacy laws, including developing templates for data collection, assisting with data mapping, and vendor management reviews. Serving as the primary point of contact and liaison for the Lead Supervisory Authority and other EEA Data Protection Authorities on all data protection related matters under the GDPR, and similar bodies for privacy and data protection matters worldwide for Playtika. Monitoring changes to local privacy laws and making recommendations to the legal and technological management. Setting standards and reviewing policies and procedures globally that meet the requirements under the privacy laws applicable to Playtika and any localization requirements in countries of operation. Developing and delivering privacy training to various business functions. Developing strategies and initiatives to ensure engagement with key internal and external stakeholders. Coordinating and conducting data privacy audits.
Requirements: ['Degree in law L.L.B (must) and any other degree in business or related field - an advantage.', 'Strong and vast legal experience and knowledge of data privacy and data protection
