Title: Content Marketing Director- IL
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: Global-e is looking for an experienced Content Marketing Director to join our growing team. The Content Marketing Director is a player-coach role where you’ll be both managing and creating content.In this position, you will lead the team of marketing content writers and serve as an in-house editor, responsible for all responsible for driving content excellence, as well as create content for our wide portfolio of marketing channels, external and internal.The Content Marketing Director will be the program lead for all of the company content deliverables, working closely with VP of Marketing to implement an integrated content strategy, in alignment with the company's marketing goals.We’re looking for a creative individual with a passion for marketing and technology, extensive experience in content writing for B2B and SaaS and proven management skills.The ideal candidate is a great team player, a gifted storyteller with a strong data-driven marketing mindset, curious and self-starter, open to feedback and driven by improving quality. A true leader, ambitious and results-oriented, that is motivated by challenges and is looking to thrive and create impact.Responsibilities:Plan, write and edit different types of content, ensuring a consistent, compelling narrative, style and brand voice, in alignment with the company’s brand strategy and core messaging.Create best-in-class bespoke content that drives brand awareness, sales enablement, lead generation, and market engagement; Deliver effective and impactful content on a multitude of projects including blog posts, research reports, white papers, social media posts, email and digital campaigns, case studies, video scripts, thought leadership bylines, and more.Develop and maintain an editorial calendar, holding other team members accountable for their part in supporting the plan. Proactively identify content gaps and liaise with key stakeholders in the company to fill those gaps.Ensure consistency in brand voice, messaging, and style across all assets and platforms.Manage the creative process from start to finish, working closely with our in-house design team to create engaging, eye-catching content in alignment with our brand’s language.Lead our team of content writers; Drive creative and strategic thinking, guide and help them develop and execute best-in-class content.Continually refine and improve content, based on feedback and analytics.Requirements:At least 5+ years of experience in content marketing for B2B SaaS companies, and at least 2 years of experience managing a content team - a mustA native English speaker and writer with outstanding verbal and written communication skills – a mustExperience as a content writer/ leader in a public company – an advantage.Proven success leading and mentoring a team of writers; previous experience in editing content produced by other writers to drive consistency across marketing materials and messaging.A true marketer – a real understanding of the B2B marketing world and eexceptional knowledge of current digital and integrated marketing tools, tactics and trends.Strong project management skills with ability to handle multiple ongoing content projects, meet fast-paced deadlines and juggle priorities.A good grasp of technical concepts and strong research and analytical skills.An eye for detail and an ear for nuance.Positive, energetic, with a strong can-do attitude and the ability to pivot as needed.Excellent interpersonal skills.
Requirements: ['Plan, write and edit different types of content, ensuring a consistent, compelling narrative, style and brand voice, in alignment with the company’s brand strategy and core messaging.', 'Create best-in-class bespoke content that drives brand awareness, sales enablement, lead generation, and market engagement; Deliver effective and impactful content on a multitude of projects including blog posts, research reports, white papers, social media posts, email and digital campaigns, case studies, video scripts, thought leadership bylines, and more.', 'Develop and maintain an editorial calendar, holding other team members accountable for their part in supporting the plan. Proactively identify content gaps and liaise with key stakeholders in the company to fill those gaps.', 'Ensure consistency in brand voice, messaging, and style across all assets and platforms.', 'Manage the creative process from start to finish, working closely with our in-house design team to create engaging, eye-catching content in alignment with our brand’s language.', 'Lead our team of content writers; Drive creative and strategic thinking, guide and help them develop and execute best-in-class content.', 'Continually refine and improve content, based on feedback and analytics.', 'At least 5+ years of experience in content marketing for B2B SaaS companies, and at least 2 years of experience managing a content team - a must', 'A native English speaker and writer with outstanding verbal and written communication skills – a must', 'Experience as a content writer/ leader in a public company – an advantage.', 'Proven success leading and mentoring a team of writers; previous experience in editing content produced by other writers to drive consistency across marketing materials and messaging.', 'A true marketer – a real understanding of the B2B marketing world and eexceptional knowledge of current digital and integrated marketing tools, tactics and trends.', 'Strong project management skills with ability to handle multiple ongoing content projects, meet fast-paced deadlines and juggle priorities.', 'A good grasp of technical concepts and strong research and analytical skills.', 'An eye for detail and an ear for nuance.', 'Positive, energetic, with a strong can-do attitude and the ability to pivot as needed.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills.']

Title: NOC איש/אשת
Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: דרוש/ה איש/אשת NOC. התפקיד כולל:הפעלה ותחזוקת מערכות שליטה ובקרה ב NOC.אחריות על תפעול וניהול תקלות בזמן אמת במערכות מידע ותשתיות תוך הפעלת גורמי פנים וחוץ שוניםמתן תמיכה ללקוחות פנים ארגוניים ולקוחות בינלאומיים.תאום ומעקב אחר השבתות ושדרוגים.העבודה במשמרות של 24/7 ודורשת התנהלות שוטפת בשפות: עברית ואנגלית.Requirements:ניסיון של שנה ומעלה בתחום התמיכהזמינות לעבודה במשמרות של 24/7 במשרדי החברהידע ברשתות מחשוב ומערכות ניטוראנגלית ברמה טובה מאוד -רקע וניסיון במערכות: Office 365 ,Windows , VMware ,Active directoryידע בפיתוח בסיסי (סקריפטים) - יתרוןאוריינטציה שירותית, אחריות והגדלת ראש.

Title: NOC Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: An opportunity to join our NOC team, which is responsible for the monitoring of the infrastructure, application and business aspects of the company. We provide the opportunity to get acquainted with the inner workings of the exciting world of Fintech and online payments. Many of our NOC specialists where promoted internally and integrated into development, DevOps and product. We work in 24/7 shifts: 08:00 to 17:00, 17:00 to 00:00, 00:00 to 08:00ResponsibilitiesCommitment required for a minimum of 4 shifts a week. Requires a responsibility to work at nightsResponding to events and various technical problems in real timeMonitoring and liaising activities of the production environment, maintaining the company's monitoring systems, network, business transactions reports and data analysis regularlyTracking the events until problems are resolved, contacting the relevant factors in the organization as neededData analysis and fault investigationsRequirementsPrograming skills - An advantageIP communication protocols knowledge - An advantageBasic knowledge of SQL - An advantageA self-learner – A mustAble to provide in depth analyses in a short timeGood Microsoft Office skills: Excel/Outlook/Word/0ffice 365Fluent English - Ability to converse, write/answer emails in English. Title: Bookkeeper
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: DescriptionMoon Active is one of the world’s fastest-growing mobile game companies, providing entertainment for millions of active users across the universe. The company is headquartered in the heart of Tel Aviv.We’re looking for an experienced Bookkeeper to join our growing Finance team.As a Bookkeeper, you’ll be responsible for maintaining financial records, managing priorities, invoices, tax payments, overseeing bank reconciliations on a weekly basis, and cash disbursements.ResponsibilitiesManage foreign vendors. Record A/P invoices. Prepare and manage month-end and mid-month payments. Manage expenses, travel reimbursements and all expense reports. Record credit card transactions, invoices, payments and monthly reconciliation. Assist with month-end closing and other projects as needed. Requirements2 + years of bookkeeping experienceLevel 1-2 Bookkeeping DiplomaEnglish - high level (writing, reading and speaking). Basic skills in Microsoft Excel.An AdvantageExperience with NetSuite ERP softwarePrevious experience at a hi-tech company and multi-currency environment
Requirements: ['Manage foreign vendors.', 'Record A/P invoices.', 'Prepare and manage month-end and mid-month payments.', 'Manage expenses, travel reimbursements and all expense reports.', 'Record credit card transactions, invoices, payments and monthly reconciliation.', 'Assist with month-end closing and other projects as needed.', '2 + years of bookkeeping experience', 'Level 1-2 Bookkeeping Diploma', 'English - high level (writing, reading and speaking).', 'Basic skills in Microsoft Excel.', 'Experience with NetSuite ERP software', 'Previous experience at a hi-tech company and multi-currency environment']

Title: Software Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Job SummarySpot by NetApp® is the undoubtable unicorn of the Cloud world. By continuously optimizing cloud infrastructure to always be highly available and for the lowest possible cost, we revolutionize the way businesses manage their cloud. Spot is a fast-paced startup that operates within NetApp and enjoys all benefits of a large-scale organization while maintaining the startup culture, mentality, and pace.We are looking for a junior/intermediate level backend software engineer to join our cloud compute team. Our backend engineer will be responsible for the design, development, testing and maintenance of our API-based and database-driven web applications that will drive our software engineering efforts and provide crucial control tools for our customers.ResponsibilitiesResearch and design new product features and componentsLeading the development of modules/features in all technical aspects such as finding the best technological solution, suggest the suitable architecture and design, apply smart algorithms and suchDeveloping, testing and debugging complicated problems and algorithmsWriting design and architecture documentsIntegrate with all sorts of parts of a system, such as MySQL, Elastic, Redis, AWS services etc.Job Requirements2-4 years of Strong fundamental software engineering skills (design patterns, algorithms, data structures)Experience working in a Linux environment Preferred Qualifications: Object-oriented development experience in JavaExperience working with Amazon Web ServicesQuick learner, always up to date with new technologiesAbility to work independently and lead others if so requiredTeam player with strong social and communication skillsWorked in an Agile development environment such as Scrum/Kanban
Requirements: ['2-4 years of Strong fundamental software engineering skills (design patterns, algorithms, data structures)', 'Experience working in a Linux environment', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Object-oriented development experience in Java', 'Experience working with Amazon Web Services', 'Quick learner, always up to date with new technologies', 'Ability to work independently and lead others if so required', 'Team player with strong social and communication skills', 'Worked in an Agile development environment such as Scrum/Kanban']

Title: Global Director of Compensation and Benefits & HRIS
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: About The RoleAs a Global Director of Compensation and Benefits & HRIS for our Netafim business, you will take a leading role in planning, executing and overseeing the organization's C&B and HRIS programs, reporting to Netafim’s VP HR, as part of Orbia’s global team of C&B & HRIS experts.,As the Director of Global C&B & HRIS, you will:Be an integral part of a global team of C&B & HRIS experts within Orbia focused on building and executing best in class compensation programs and initiatives to support the business Be proactive member of Netafim's people leadership team in building and executing the people strategy of the company, to fit the dynamic environment of the marketManage a global team of Netafim C&B and HRIS experts and analysts, as well as a local Payroll team in with compensation, bonus, equity/LTI, benefits, sales incentive plansStrong analytical capabilities to support a culture of analytics and data-driven decisionsAbility to communicate with different HR functions as well as HRBPs, managers and employees on compensation related issuesHave significant experience in implementing/managing SuccessFactors and other HR systemsStrong collaboration, partnering with C-Suite executives Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing the tasks while planning ahead to meet timelines and KPIsCan do approachTeam player

Title: Vulnerability Researcher
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are a young and innovative digital intelligence startup with a groundbreaking product, looking for highly motivated candidates to join our exceptionally talented and passionate research group that constantly challenges the boundaries of what’s possible. In this role you will have the opportunity to take part in world-class vulnerability research, solve incredibly complex and satisfying technological challenges, learn all the time from the best researchers in the industry, and join us on our journey to engineer a safer future!We look for candidates who are:Passionate: care deeply about the technology challenges, strive for excellence, determined to make a meaningful impact Curious: learn rapidly and eagerly; ask “why?” and “what if?” a lotInnovative: think outside the box, challenge the prevailing assumptions, create new ideasCollaborative: understand that truly great achievements come from great teamwork, enjoy collaborating with others and eager to share the journey with usHands-on: able to hack and dissect new technology, rapidly implement and verify ideas and translate them to working codeRequirements:The candidates should be experienced in one or more of the following areas:Vulnerability researchAdvanced exploitation techniquesDeep knowledge of complex low-level system mechanisms (kernel, networking, services, operating systems, embedded etc.)
Requirements: ['Passionate: care deeply about the technology challenges, strive for excellence, determined to make a meaningful impact', 'Curious: learn rapidly and eagerly; ask “why?” and “what if?” a lot', 'Innovative: think outside the box, challenge the prevailing assumptions, create new ideas', 'Collaborative: understand that truly great achievements come from great teamwork, enjoy collaborating with others and eager to share the journey with us', 'Hands-on: able to hack and dissect new technology, rapidly implement and verify ideas and translate them to working code', 'Vulnerability research', 'Advanced exploitation techniques', 'Deep knowledge of complex low-level system mechanisms (kernel, networking, services, operating systems, embedded etc.)']

Location: Netanya, Center District, Israel
Text: PassportCard is looking for a talented and enthusiastic UI/UX designerThe role will includeTaking design responsibility of all the company’s digital tools and assetsUpgrading and upscaling usability and user experience by innovative and meticulous designLeading and correcting design and materials processes product and development teamsRequirements:2 years hands-on experience in UI/UX Web and Native Mobile designRelevant certificationRelevant design portfolioExperience in creating wireframes and mockupsProven experience in complex interfaces UX designProven experience in B2C products UX designPrior knowledge in HTML/CSSProficient in FigmaProven experience in development processes and Agile methodologiesTeam playerExcellent communications skills including presenting design solutions to team and management membersEnglish language proficiencyPrior knowledge and experience in the insurance field – an advantage

Title: Data Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: The company is on a mission to change the way we, as a society, take care of every older adult who needs it. We are leveraging the power of AI and data to ensure safety, dignity, and satisfaction in every caregiver-care recipient interaction.Why SensiWork with a purpose. Join us in creating an ideal care environment for older adults. Be a part of our founding team; help us make Sensi a new industry standard for the long-term care industry.About The RoleSensi.Ai is a fast-growing SaaS Company, looking for a super talented Data Engineer to join our awesome R&D team.As part of our team, you’ll take a key role in building and developing the core infrastructure, take on an influential role in a team with a highly creative and informal atmosphere.You’ll have the opportunity to be in the front seat in our early-stage startup and really make a difference in future AI platforms for older adults.Help drive technological and architectural changes in our ever-evolving SaaS solution, solve complex engineering challenges in a dynamic environment and rapidly increasing scale.Most importantly, be part of our amazing and unique company culture.Responsibilities:A technical focal point for software development best practices and design of main components, services and systemsDesign and develop Data services and infrastructure.Full ownership and responsibility for multiple development projects.Research new technologies, create prototypes and develop into full production functionality.Contribute to challenging server-side development with microservices architecture, using the industry’s latest trendsRequirements:4+ years of experience in Software/Data engineeringExperience with architecting and developing high-performance distributed systemsProven working in a base cloud environment (AWS, GCP, Azure)4 years experience in at least one scripting programming language (Python, etc.)Proven working experience with a container environmentExperience with queues (SQS/Kafka)Experience with SQL/NoSQL/Analytics DBsPassion for new technologies and dataExperience with Build systems and CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Teamcity, etc.)Attention to details and passion for qualityTeam player with excellent collaboration, communication and leadership skills.Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Hebrew, including communication with executives, developers, and product managers.BSc. degree in Math/Statistics/Computer ScienceBasic background with AI – an advantage

Requirements: ['Passionate: care deeply about the technology challenges, strive for excellence, determined to make a meaningful impact', 'Curious: learn rapidly and eagerly; ask “why?” and “what if?” a lot', 'Innovative: think outside the box, challenge the prevailing assumptions, create new ideas', 'Collaborative: understand that truly great achievements come from great teamwork, enjoy collaborating with others and eager to share the journey with us', 'Hands-on: able to hack and dissect new technology, rapidly implement and verify ideas and translate them to working code', 'Vulnerability research', 'Advanced exploitation techniques', 'Deep knowledge of complex low-level system mechanisms (kernel, networking, services, operating systems, embedded etc.)']

Title: Talent Acquisition Partner

Text: Convexum is a cyber security start-up in the counter-drones defense domain. It’s the premier cyber counter-drone platform designed to automatically detect, take over and safely land unauthorized commercial drones in a designated zone.If you want to join the defense counter-drones revolution, take part in designing and developing game-changer multi-disciplinary innovative technologies, make an impact right from the start, and work in the most advanced technologies, all – while working in an environment of constant innovation, and with A-players who are the most sharp, talented professionals in their field, on the one hand, but who also love to party and have fun, on the other hand - Apply now!As a Talent Acquisition Partner, you will:•Own and lead the entire recruitment cycle, from defining the job description with the hiring manager, through CV screening, sourcing, managing the candidate pipeline, holding an HR interview and presenting job offers.•Work closely with the hiring manager to align the hiring decisions with the company’s business needs and culture.•Source passive talents through referrals, networking and sourcing tools, such as LinkedIn, community forums, Facebook, etc.•Create an amazing candidate experience.•Be an ambassador for our culture and play a major role in achieving the company’s growth goals.You should have: •At least 3 years of experience as a Talent Acquisition from a global hi-tech company, with a full ownership in end-to-end hiring processes- Must•Experience in leading recruiting process for technology positions.•Proven experience with sourcing methods and skills•Multi-tasking capabilities and ability to work well in a very dynamic environment•Team Player•Recruitment must be your passion! :)

Title: Business Partnership Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Responsibilities TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.At TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.The Business Partner Manager Team work with the industry’s leading export advertisers in various verticals, helping them scale at efficiency. The team is responsible for working closely with very sophisticated advertisers, maintaining high levels of engagement and relationship, in order to position TikTok as a trusted partner to help our clients grow.Responsibilities Business Management- Build and manage strong partnerships with key customers within the web portfolio, with the goal of developing effective digital strategies, increasing TikTok product knowledge and adoption, optimizing client advertising investment and growing the business.- Develop and maintain C-level relationships, serve as a point of contact to customers.- Initiate joint business plans to maintain long term growth by understanding of their business objectives, KPIs and challenges.- Support client performance by supplying data trends and industry insights, develop strategic sales plans, and prepare and conduct transformational pitches and sales presentations.Campaign Planning and Management- Facilitate ad campaigns from start to finish, with deep knowledge of TikTok ads solutions and understanding of the clients' needs.- Plan and build compelling storylines and data-driven presentations that are customized to clients' KPIs and challenges.Cross functional collaboration- Work with cross-functional Client Solutions team to maintain healthy ROI, improve work efficiency, and build long term growth.- Work with Marketing team to develop pitch narratives and case studies, and take part in industry events and conferences to be positioned as a thought leader. Qualifications QualificationsBachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.3 years of experience in media account management and/or the marketing/advertising industry.Fluency in English and Hebrew, with ability to effectively communicate with and serve English speaking clients.Experience and success in strategically growing and maintaining complex, high-value managed accounts, through a consultative approach.Experience in building trusted relationships with directors and C-level stakeholders by developing a strong understanding of the client business and driving deep, data-driven insights.Deep knowledge of the digital advertising platforms and ecosystem.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Title: GM Assistant & P&O Coordinator
Location: Kfar Sava, Center District, Israel
Text: Are you a driven and committed Personal Assistant? Do you thrive in providing excellent executive-level administrative support? Are you passionate about people, processes and projects? Do you know how to motivate and engage stakeholders, while connecting the dots across a large organisation?Do you aspire to work for a company, which brings life-changing treatments to its patients? If so, then this role might be just what you’re looking for!About The PositionsThis position combines Personal Assistant and HR Coordinator roles:Reports to: Israel GM + Dotted Line to P&O DirectorGM Assistant- Key AccountabilitiesAs a personal assistant you will primarily support the General Manager (GM) and functional area with communicative, administrative and practical tasks.You Will Work With a Wide Range Of Interesting Tasks Such AsYou will have the opportunity to work in close collaboration with the leadership team and different internal and external stakeholders.Support with everything from scheduling meetings, practical details related to travel, seminar planning and meeting minutes Secure efficient planning and related hands-on work, Strategically aligning documentation and compiling presentations, Follow up on GM related tasks. Enter forums for planning and coordination across the organisation You will collaborate with many different internal and external stakeholders and be a key employee in the department. We always invest in your personal and professional growth as you navigate a globally dynamic environment and work with many challenging tasks.P&O Coordinator - Key Accountabilities Logistics organisation for trainings, events and meetings including: venue, equipment, refreshments, transportation, Registration. Manage & Follow up on P&O Department budgets, FTEs, Internal Cross-Charges etc. Maintaining data within the different P&O systems. Schedule meetings, interviews and trainings with internal and external stakeholders including candidates and vendors. Preparation and submission of visa applications for international employees (Expats, Short term assignments). Administrative support to P&O Director: Schedule meetings; expenses report; booking flights, hotels etc. Follow up on tasks related to execution of HR programmes, projects and activities. Oversee P&O meeting’s agenda, summaries and follow up on prior meeting. Compiling P&O presentations towards submissions / visits etc. Negotiate and settle terms with suppliers, Agreements with vendors / speakers, Upload and Manage Contracts and Purchase Orders (POs) in scope to the system. Work Experience5 years of experience in administrative role including working with executive leaders. BA – Academic degree preferably in Human Resources, Communication, or Business Administration Previous work experience in HR department. Previous experience in multinational / Global organisation- must. Pharmaceutical / Healthcare industry experience- a plus. HR IT Systems knowledge & experience. Technical Knowledge And SkillsPrevious experience working with HR IT systems (SAP, Malam) Solid computer skills (MS Office including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) including building presentations Strong verbal and written communication skills Ability to maintain confidentiality Fluent in Hebrew and in English (verbal and written)- must! CompetenciesPlanning & Organising Delivering ResultsProblem solvingAbility to work in a high pace environment Team player – ability to collaborate Embracing Change, agility and flexibility Customer Service oriented Analytical skills Working at Novo NordiskAt Novo Nordisk, we are driving change to defeat diabetes and other serious chronic conditions. Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company with nearly 100 years of innovation and leadership in diabetes care and other serious chronic conditions: Haemophilia, Growth disorders and Obesity.Headquartered in Denmark, Novo Nordisk employs approximately 48,000 people in 80 countries. Novo Nordisk Israel office is located in Kfar-Saba and we are the leading company in Diabetes care in Israel.ContactAboutIf you have questions about these opportunities, please feel free to contactTo submit your application, please upload your CV online (click on Apply and follow the instructions). Internal candidates are kindly requested to inform their line Manager before applying.Keren Berko, People & Organisation Director – knbk@novonordisk.com.DeadlineApply before December 18.We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.

Text: Contribution We are looking for a Product manager to join SABON Product team. Contributing to reinforce relevant synergies between SABON and Rocher group (formula, development process, group projects …) and to the Brand equity and global product strategy. Title: Electro-optics development engineer
Location: Ness Ziona, Center District, Israel

Title: Associate Market Manager
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Associate Market Manager       The Associate Market Manager's primary responsibility in his/her assigned territory is to initiate, develop and maintain a high quality portfolio of hotel products (i.e. relevant, attractive and competitive) for Expedia's fast-growing global customer base. In doing so, Associate Market Managers will also continuously work with their hotel partners to help them maximize the production potential from their participation in the Expedia marketplace by smartly utilizing the power of Expedia LPS' unique data insights, marketing, distribution and revenue management toolset. This role focuses on the core of the Market Management's team responsibility, which is to ensure that Expedia's brands' global customers always find the most suitable hotel for their dream trip wherever they want to go, and that our hotel partners can effectively, efficiently and throughout the year, reach Expedia's unique breath of global traveler demand.  What You'll Do:        Develop and sustain strong partner relationships by providing relevant data insights and superior consulting services to hotel partners (revenue management advice, marketing opportunities on the Expedia marketplace)        Ensure that their partner hotels' product (content, rates and availability) is consistently optimized and competitive on the Expedia sites to maximize customer conversion        Secure additional inventory over high demand and compression periods to satisfy customers' pressing needs        Secure seasonal deals, evergreen and dynamic promotions within the guidelines set by Management to support the brands' merchandising and marketing efforts.        Continuously promote to and develop hotel partners' high engagement with Expedia's full suite of: o Unique market insights (partner reports, competitive data, key performance drivers)        Revenue management tools (dynamic promotions, packages, fenced deals, mobile)        Marketing and merchandising opportunities        Specialized brands (e.g. Hotwire, Media Solutions) potential opportunities        Self-service tools (Expedia Partner Central), Connectivity solutions (Expedia Quick Connect) and key support functions (Property Assistance team)        Execute effectively based on KPI metrics (targets, goals and/or strategic objectives)         20 - 30% of travel will be required for this position        Other reasonable duties, as assigned         Who You Are:        Bachelor's Degree; major in tourism or hospitality a plus but not required or equivalent professional experience        1-2 years' experience        20 - 30% of travel will be required for market visits        High impact personality: intellectual agility, entrepreneurship, empathy in relationship, team player        Hungry, ambitious, motivated, action-oriented, results-focused and metrics-driven        Organization and time management skills, rigor, attention to details        Proven follow-up/persistence when facing challenging situations        Ability to multi-task effectively; must be able to change gears quickly without skipping a beat        Demonstrates ability to prioritize work and be laser-focused on achieving a variety of KPIs (targets, goals and/or strategic objectives) set by LPS leadership team        Sincere relationship builder; earns the confidence of others;        Bridges and sustains solid partnerships based on mutual support through a collaborative style        Appetite for innovative technology, fast-changing business environment, data-driven decision making        Demonstrates problem solving skills        Ability to select and present insightful dataset including performance, market and competitor analysis and to implement meaningful action plans based on the data        Proficiency in English and Hebrew.        Presents ideas and directives clearly and persuasively; actively listens when spoken/presented to        Ability to effectively communicate to various levels and through a variety of communication channels        Able to work independently as well as be a strong team player, always seeking to improve team and organizational performance
Requirements: ['Develop and sustain strong partner relationships by providing relevant data insights and superior consulting services to hotel partners (revenue management advice, marketing opportunities on the Expedia marketplace)', "Ensure that their partner hotels' product (content, rates and availability) is consistently optimized and competitive on the Expedia sites to maximize customer conversion", "Secure additional inventory over high demand and compression periods to satisfy customers' pressing needs", "Secure seasonal deals, evergreen and dynamic promotions within the guidelines set by Management to support the brands' merchandising and marketing efforts.", "Continuously promote to and develop hotel partners' high engagement with Expedia's full suite of: o Unique market insights (partner reports, competitive data, key performance drivers)", 'Revenue management tools (dynamic promotions, packages, fenced deals, mobile)', 'Marketing and merchandising opportunities', 'Specialized brands (e.g. Hotwire, Media Solutions) potential opportunities', 'Self-service tools (Expedia Partner Central), Connectivity solutions (Expedia Quick Connect) and key support functions (Property Assistance team)', 'Execute effectively based on KPI metrics (targets, goals and/or strategic objectives)', '20 - 30% of travel will be required for this position', 'Other reasonable duties, as assigned', "Bachelor's Degree; Title: Junior Cyber Security Engineer
Location: Rosh HaAyin, Center District, Israel
Text: ספיידר פתרונות מתמחה באבטחת מידע ותקשורת מעל שני עשורים.אנחנו עובדים מול לקוחות גדולים ובינלאומיים בכל תחומי אבטחת המידע ותקשורת נתוניםמשלב ההתאמה ללקוח, ארכיטקטורה, עיצוב, מכירה של חומרה ותוכנה ומספקים שירותי מומחים.בואו להיות חלק מחברה שנהנית ממוניטין מנצח של מקצועיות ללא פשרות, שירות מעולהאפשרויות למידה מרובות והתפתחות מקצועית.חופש חברה שכולל בני/ות זוג ומשפחה, ערבי צוות וערבי חברה.אווירה טובה בסביבה תומכת.על התפקידמענה לפניות של לקוחות שהועברו לצוות התפעול בנושאי פתרון תקלות, אינטגרציה,הקמות, שדרוגים, פרויקטים ועודלו"ז מסודר פרט לתקלות משביתות.העבודה לרוב מהמשרד ויציאה ללקוחות רק במידה ולא ניתן לבצע מרחוק.במידה ונדרשת יציאה ללקוח, הגעה וחזרה על חשבון החברה.התנהלות עצמאית במשרת אמון.במידה ויש צורך בהשלמת ידע, חודשים ראשונים עבודה במשרה מלאהעל מעבדות אבטחת מידע, האזנות למומחים בחברה ויציאה לקורסיםמקצועיים על חשבון החברה.Requirements:חובה - ניסיון של שנתיים לפחות בתפקידי תמיכה טכנית/תקשורת/אבטחת מידע/סיסטםחובה - ניסיון בהגדרות של ציודי תקשורת כמו סווטצ'ים וראוטריםיתרון לניסיון בעבודה עם:Firewall, Layer 7זמינות למשרה מלאה, כולל כוננויות (מענה רק במקרים של תקלות משביתות)
Requirements: ['הקמות, שדרוגים, פרויקטים ועוד']

Title: Testing Engineer & Quality Control Assistant
Location: Ra'anana, Center District, Israel
Text: Inspira Technologies is an innovative medical device start-up in the respiratory care industry. Inspira is developing the ART device, an early extracorporeal respiratory support system and array of innovative sensors that have the potential to make it safer . The product is currently in the development stage.We invite you to join our growing team in Raánana! Awesome people, wonderful growth opportunities and an inspiring work environment.﻿Position SummaryAs a medical device company, we are committed to high standards and developing state of the art products. We are looking for an experienced V&V Assistant to empower our QC and V&V procedures. The focus of this position is to serve as the right hand of the V&V manager, work closely but independently to perform & overview our QC and V&V cycles, insuring we develop and manufacture our products to perfection.Responsibilities Perform QC inspection throughout the production flow: Raw material incoming inspection In process inspection – onsite at contractor/ manufacture Final testing / source inspection Create & maintain QC documentation Product verification + validation testing (both SW & HW): Hands-on for functional & electrical testing Perform routine & edge cases test-scenarios Generate test reports & maintain all V&V documentation Support the V&V manger and any relevant stake holders in order to promote productivity and efficiencyRequirements: 2+ years of experience in QC and V&V testing Technical capabilities (HW/SW/Mechanics) – A MUST Good background in Electronics /SW/ Biomedical Engineering – an advantage Working on a multidisciplinary system – an advantage Background in medical device industry – an advantage Self-starter & self-motivated with a “whatever it takes” attitude Creative thinker with strong analytical skills Organized and detail oriented Curious & enthusiastic about learning our QC and V&V testing environment and procedures Peoples’ person & team player – we love to work together! English in high level – A MUST Familiarity with Linux environment – an advantage

Title: QA Team Lead
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We are Rewire, a Fintech startup creating an International Financial Services Platform for migrants. We provide a game-changing all-in-one solution that is transparent, cost-effective, and simple to use for migrant workers across Europe and Israel in order to let them fulfill their financial potential.As a Backend team lead at Rewire, you will have the opportunity to build innovative products that affect our customers’ lives directly, lead and mentor a team of talented engineers, and build top-notch consumer-facing applications for hundreds of thousands of users using the most advanced technologies.We are looking for a highly motivated, experienced QA Team Lead t in order to lead a team to a decision point, quickly assess risk, and ensure plans- These executed are critical skills required to perform this role.What you will get:High growth startup - It is a great opportunity to join us in our high growth phase, while there is still room to shape our future products and help us distrupt the world of cross-border finance.Getting into the Fintech industry - You will get the opportunity to gain deep knowledge in the Fintech industry including payments, banking system, fraud, and much more.Sharpen your management skills - Working with our strong leadership team you will have the opportunity to sharpen your managerial skills, such as planning, mentoring, agile and cross team collaboration.Leading a team of A-players - The team you are going to lead consists of strong engineers, hence you will be able to leverage and improve your technical skills as well.And most important purpose - Get rewarded by developing a product for real people who brings them one step forward to financial inclusion.ResponsibilitiesManage a QA team of 3 engineers.Participate in the design process to understand, analyze and influence the application/service/system to be tested.Identify the risks and appropriate test coverage to validate new features as well as regression, and develop test plans and cases.Create, maintain and upgrade automation suite and roadmap.Come up with more efficient ways to test features and identify the area of testing that can be automated.Execute test cases, manually or in an automated fashion, capture and analyze the results, document issues and prepare test reports.Present testing results and progress to the management teamAnalyze and identify the issues found during testing, either work with the QA teams and/or the R&D teams to diagnose them.Understand the business aspects, as well as the ways the customers are using the system.Take over a Test Activity and feature/s lead; including planning, executing, communicating, tracking, and reporting.Leading activity and test project capabilities include Planning, designing, preparing, and executing the tests.Lead daily meetings and scrum rituals within the team.Promote a spirit of collaboration across teams and individuals.Requirements:4+ years of QA experience including writing and executing test plans2-3 years of management experience2-3 years of experience in designing and writing QA automation tests using testim.io and Endtest.Strong design and debugging skills (hands-on).Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test casesAdvanced hands-on experience in building automated regression testing capabilities using current technologiesTeam player, Independent, out-of-the-box thinker, and self-learner.The ability to work in a dynamic environment which can be changed frequentlyGood interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills in EnglishPreferred QualificationsExperience with monitoring tools such as Looker, Redash, sentry, Rapid7, Grafana.Familiar with CI, CD processesExperience with JIRA preferredExperience in the fintech industry - Big advantage

Title: Local Marketing Admin Support
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: We believe in a world where growth thrives across borders and cultures. That's why our Founder and CEO Rick Hammell started Atlas, coining the term Employer of Record (EOR) simultaneously. As an EOR, Atlas employs people to work for companies anywhere in the world. Before we came along, the only businesses offering a similar solution were essentially brokers. They'd outsource your HR and payroll services to third-party providers in different countries. Today, we're the only 100% Direct EOR in the world, partnering with clients to get to market 82% faster, at a reduced cost, and with lower risk through local expertise in over 160 countries.Atlas technology powers the idea that companies can employ whoever they want, wherever they are in the world. Through our cloud-based platform, we deliver the Human Resources infrastructure that underpins international growth, leaving companies free to focus on the strategy that makes it happen. We partner with our clients through their international life cycle from the first dip in the global pool until the moment it's time to set up their own entities and run payroll. Atlas is here from point A to point Z.The future of work is borderless, and so are we. So, it helps that our people are located around the globe — in the US, UK, India, China and beyond — and speak 90+ languages. Diversity and inclusion are at our core.We're excited about our next phase of growth. We're launching new tech, adding new solutions and now we're looking for YOU — eager for a challenge, energized by innovation and aligned with our mission to deliver a future of work without borders.Marketing Admin Support complete tasks that support an organization's overall regional or local marketing initiatives. Reviews marketing material specifications and acts as point of contact and liaison with centralized marketing, analysis and research groups to coordinate the completion and submission of financial, marketing and various client specific property data to incorporate into customized property information packages.Key ResponsibilitiesConducting research to analyze competitive landscape, market trends and customer behavior and preparing reports by collecting, summarizing, and analyzing dataSupporting the Marketing Director in establishing and evaluating a marketing strategy and plan by analyzing and assembling sales forecasts, updating calendars, and organizing and planning promotional presentationsCommunicating campaign deliverables, objectives and timelines to their team while providing instructions for promotion or usePlanning and managing trade shows, conferences, events, and meetings by identifying, coordinating, and assembling requirements, developing assignments and schedules, coordinating mailing lists and establishing contactsMaintaining an inventory and directory of sales support materials making sure all resources are accurate and current while coordinating new material creation as neededContinually seeking and researching new sources of prospective customers while providing recommendations to marketing and sales leadership Developing and implementing marketing campaigns to promote products or services within a specific region or stateEvaluating the effectiveness of marketing campaigns by analyzing statistics such as return on investment or customer retention ratesManaging and maintaining relationships with current and potential clients to ensure continuous business growthDeveloping strategies and tactics for increasing awareness of products or Title: Junior Cyber Security Engineer
Location: Rosh HaAyin, Center District, Israel
Text: ספיידר פתרונות מתמחה באבטחת מידע ותקשורת מעל שני עשורים.אנחנו עובדים מול לקוחות גדולים ובינלאומיים בכל תחומי אבטחת המידע ותקשורת נתוניםמשלב ההתאמה ללקוח, ארכיטקטורה, עיצוב, מכירה של חומרה ותוכנה ומספקים שירותי מומחים.בואו להיות חלק מחברה שנהנית ממוניטין מנצח של מקצועיות ללא פשרות, שירות מעולהאפשרויות למידה מרובות והתפתחות מקצועית.חופש חברה שכולל בני/ות זוג ומשפחה, ערבי צוות וערבי חברה.אווירה טובה בסביבה תומכת.על התפקידמענה לפניות של לקוחות שהועברו לצוות התפעול בנושאי פתרון תקלות, אינטגרציה,הקמות, שדרוגים, פרויקטים ועודלו"ז מסודר פרט לתקלות משביתות.העבודה לרוב מהמשרד ויציאה ללקוחות רק במידה ולא ניתן לבצע מרחוק.במידה ונדרשת יציאה ללקוח, הגעה וחזרה על חשבון החברה.התנהלות עצמאית במשרת אמון.במידה ויש צורך בהשלמת ידע, חודשים ראשונים עבודה במשרה מלאהעל מעבדות אבטחת מידע, האזנות למומחים בחברה ויציאה לקורסיםמקצועיים על חשבון החברה.Requirements:חובה - ניסיון של שנתיים לפחות בתפקידי תמיכה טכנית/תקשורת/אבטחת מידע/סיסטםחובה - ניסיון בהגדרות של ציודי תקשורת כמו סווטצ'ים וראוטריםיתרון לניסיון בעבודה עם:Firewall, Layer 7זמינות למשרה מלאה, כולל כוננויות (מענה רק במקרים של תקלות משביתות)
Requirements: ['הקמות, שדרוגים, פרויקטים ועוד']

Title: מנהל/ת חשבונות חברת נספרסו
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: אנחנו קבוצת נסטלה נספרסו SA, וגאים להיות אחת מיחידות הפעילות הצומחות במהירות הרבה ביותר של נסטלה. הצוות התוסס ובעל האופי היזמי שלנו, הפך את נספרסו לנקודת ההתייחסות בתחום קפסולות הקפה, ולאחד המותגים המהימנים ביותר בעולם. הצמיחה שלנו נובעת ממחויבותנו למחקר ופיתוח, על מנת לסלול דרך ולהיות נקודת ההתייחסות בתחום קפסולות הקפה, בכדי לספק קפה באיכות הגבוהה ביותר, שניתן ליהנות ממנו בבית בנוחות, וכן להתענג עליו מחוץ לבית, במקומות כמו מסעדות, בתי מלון, משרדים, ועסקי קמעונות יוקרה. אנו מבטיחים איכות, בזכות גישה זהירה ומתחשבת באופן שבו אנו בוחרים את המרכיבים שלנו, מייצרים, ומשווקים את מוצרי קפה הפרימיום שלנו. עם משרדים ראשיים בלוזאן, שוויץ, נספרסו נוכחת ביותר מ-60 מדינות, ומעסיקה יותר מ-12,000 עובדים ברחבי העולם. כדי ללמוד עוד, בקרו ב-www.nespresso.comנספרסו מגייסת מנהל/ת חשבונות סוג 2 למטה החברה בפתח תקווהתיאור תפקיד:ניהול רכוש קבוע ופחת (תוכנת חיסולית)ביצוע התאמות בנק וכרטיסי אשראי ודיווח לחשב החברההתנהלות שוטפת מול הלקוחות ומול מחלקות תומכות בחברה, וביצוע התאמות חודשיותאחריות על פורטפוליו לקוחות ומעקב שוטף אחר גבייה של הלקוחות מתן מענה שוטף ותמיכה לבוטיקים, התאמות וסגירות חודש למזומן וכרטיסי אשראיביצוע בקרות על קבלני משנה. עבודה שוטפת מול ברינקס לצורף גבייה מזומןדרישות:תעודת הנהלת חשבונות סוג 2 לפחות - חובהניסיון מוכח בעבודת הנה"ח, לרבות ניסיון בלקוחות וגבייה - חובהניסיון מוכח בעבודת רכוש קבוע ופחת (תוכנת חיסולית) - יתרון ניסיון בעבודת הנה"ח ספקים ובדיווחים שוטפים לרשויות – יתרוןאנגלית ברמה טובה, שליטה ברוסית - יתרוןידע ושליטה באקסל יכולת עבודה בצוות, בעל.ת יחסי אנוש טובים ובעל/ת גישה פרואקטיביתנסטלה היא חברת המזון והמשקאות הגדולה ביותר. אנחנו 308,000 איש, המונעים בעוצמה על ידי התכלית של שיפור איכות החיים ותרומה לעתיד בריא יותר. ערכינו מושרשים בכבוד: כבוד לעצמנו, כבוד לאחרים, כבוד לגיוון, וכבוד לעתיד שלנו. עם יותר מ-91.4 מיליארד פרנק שוויצרי ב-2018, יש לנו נוכחות רחבה עם 413 מפעלים ביותר מ-85 מדינות. אנו מאמינים שאנשינו הם הנכס החשוב ביותר שלנו, לכן נציע לך סביבת עבודה בינלאומית, דינמית וכוללת, עם הזדמנויות רבות בעסקים, יחידות ואזורים גיאוגרפיים שונים, תוך עבודה עם צוותים ותרבויות מגוונות. רוצה לשמוע עוד? בקרו אותנו ב-www.nestle.com.
Requirements: ['ניהול רכוש קבוע ופחת (תוכנת חיסולית)', 'ביצוע התאמות בנק וכרטיסי אשראי ודיווח לחשב החברה', 'התנהלות שוטפת מול הלקוחות ומול מחלקות תומכות בחברה, וביצוע התאמות חודשיות', 'אחריות על פורטפוליו לקוחות ומעקב שוטף אחר גבייה של הלקוחות', 'מתן מענה שוטף ותמיכה לבוטיקים, התאמות וסגירות חודש למזומן וכרטיסי אשראי', 'ביצוע בקרות על קבלני משנה.', 'עבודה שוטפת מול ברינקס לצורף גבייה מזומן', 'תעודת הנהלת חשבונות סוג 2 לפחות - חובה', 'ניסיון מוכח בעבודת הנה"ח, לרבות ניסיון בלקוחות וגבייה - חובה', 'ניסיון מוכח בעבודת רכוש קבוע ופחת (תוכנת חיסולית) - יתרון', 'ניסיון בעבודת הנה"ח ספקים ובדיווחים שוטפים לרשויות – יתרון', 'אנגלית ברמה טובה, שליטה ברוסית - יתרון', 'ידע ושליטה באקסל', 'יכולת עבודה בצוות, בעל.ת יחסי אנוש טובים ובעל/ת גישה פרואקטיבית']

Title: SW Tools & Automation Student
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Summary Will you help us design future generations of revolutionary Apple products? Be inspired every single day. We’re visionaries. Inventors. Forever tinkering with products and processes, always on the lookout for better. A job at Apple is one that requires a lot of you, but it’s also one that rewards forward-thinking, creative thinking, and hard work. None of us here at Apple would have it any other way. At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? Do you like changing the game? As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the rare and rewarding opportunity to craft upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every single day. Title: 7736 - Manual QA
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: DescriptionQualitest is the world's largest, independent managed services provider of quality assurance and testing solutions. As a strategic partner, we help brands move beyond functional testing to adopt new innovations such as automation, AI, and crowd-sourced UX testing. We leverage our domain expertise across industries, including financial services, insurance, media and entertainment, retail, technology, gaming, telecom, among others.At QualiTest, we provide Software Testing solutions to some of the biggest and innovative companies in the world. We are the world’s largest pure play testing company with over 3,000 employees worldwide and with technology at the heart of most businesses, our mission is to keep their software running smoothly.We are industry pioneers and innovators. Title: SW Tools & Automation Student
Location: Herzliya, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Summary Will you help us design future generations of revolutionary Apple products? Be inspired every single day. We’re visionaries. Inventors. Forever tinkering with products and processes, always on the lookout for better. A job at Apple is one that requires a lot of you, but it’s also one that rewards forward-thinking, creative thinking, and hard work. None of us here at Apple would have it any other way. At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? Do you like changing the game? We have an opportunity for forward-thinking and uncommonly hardworking students to join our teams. As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the rare and rewarding opportunity to craft upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every single day. Key Qualifications -  Experience with Swift / Objective-C / Python or any other scripting languages is an advantage-  Great teammate Description Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Our Applications team is seeking for highly motivated and strong student that is willing to grow and learn from experienced SW engineers.You should have an interest in Automation and Infrastructure for advanced testing environment, user interface implementation, and/or application architecture focusing on high level software. Education & Experience Pursuing a B.Sc. in Computer Engineering, SW Engineering or Computer Science from a leading university. Students who have completed at least 3 semesters. Additional Requirements -  Please add your Grades sheet when applying.Apple is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to inclusion and diversity. We take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants, including minorities, women, and individuals with disabilities. Role Number: 200340738

Title: Technical Office Engineer
Location: Petah Tikva, Center District, Israel
Text: What's The RoleAre you looking for a role where you can use your engineering and problem-solving skills, but you also enjoy working and interaction with different people and stakeholders? In Hilti Engineering you’ll have a consultative role, where you’ll enjoy the best of both worlds – working with leading technical innovations and solutions while building relationships with our customers. Engineering at Hilti is a great opportunity to combine your technical and commercial skills in an outstanding team!Our engineers get involved from the early stage of a project, making the connection between a customer’s need and our product design, and then translating these into solutions helping our customers to build faster, safer and more productive. Technical Engineers are the backbone of our Engineering department providing consultation, support and designs for technical solutions when it comes to passive fire protection, anchoring, modular support systems and the other technical areas of Hilti – supporting our customers and the entire organization.Who Is HiltiA global company with 30,000 employees worldwide and deploymentIn 120 countries. The company develops, manufactures and sells premium productsAnd solutions to the construction industry. We are partners in projectsBoth small and large in Israel and worldwide, and investors in developmentInnovative technology, market leader and creative, which provides a solutionAccurate to our customers. The strategy that leads us is a saleDirect to our customers, from industrial customers to companiesMajor construction in Israel and abroad. Our people provide advice,Guidance and solutions for construction managers, engineers and constructors ""On Site"".What Does The Role InvolveThe purpose of the role is to provide technical advice and educate assigned customers on Hilti’s products, software, and services. The role involves providing technical advice to architects and engineers in order to secure specifications early in the design process. The job holder is responsible for key project specification of Hilti products, software and services, supporting the sales team in their efforts to sell a variety of Hilti solutions.Scope: Anchor job - field-based engineer with specifier territory.81% of our employees consider our company as a total a great place to work.What do we offer?We have a very thorough people review process; unlike any we know of in any other business. We screen everyone in the company in a regular people potential matching process which includes not only your skills but the element what brings for you the most energy in your daily work. It means we can pair the potential with opportunities within the company - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. By combining the energy and enjoyment and your gained skills you're able to achieve your full potential quicker on your career. Hilti is where your best belongs.Work life balance - hybrid job.What you need is: Technical or commercial engineering degree (B.Sc or M.Sc)  Strong team player  Willingness and ability to learn new things and areas  Good problem-solving skills  Pro-activity and can-do attitude  Experience in sales-oriented positions is a plus, but not requirement  Relevant work experience from civil engineering, project management or construction is an advantage, but not a requirement  Hebrew and, English at working proficiency level  Why should you apply?We have an excellent mix of people and some of our best employees joined us with no experience of the construction industry. So, if you’ve never worked in sales or construction, that’s fine with us. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, no matter what your background.
Requirements: ['Technical or commercial engineering degree (B.Sc or M.Sc)', 'Strong team player', 'Willingness and ability to learn new things and areas', 'Good problem-solving skills', 'Pro-activity and can-do attitude', 'Experience in sales-oriented positions is a plus, but not requirement', 'Relevant work experience from civil engineering, project management or construction is an advantage, but not a requirement', 'Hebrew and, English at working proficiency level']
Industries: Construction, Civil Engineering, and Industrial Machinery Manufacturing

Title: FP&A Analyst

Text: As an FP&A Analyst, you will be responsible for Analyzing financial and operational results to> Better understand company performance> Producing financial models to project long term growth and for decision making> Recommending new productivity or cost-saving initiativesTracking financial and operational metrics (KPIs) across departments and preparing weekly/quarterly/annual performance reports for leadershipIdentify and drive process improvements, including the creation of standard reports, automated reporting/forecasting tools and dashboardsPerform market research, data mining, business intelligence, and valuation compsMaintain up-to-date knowledge of financial benchmarks, market conditions, and trends ManageWork with the accounting team to evaluate previous budgets, implement future budgets and monitor performance (actual vs budget)Support the design and implementation of BI/financial systems Requirements:BA or BS degree required (Accounting/Finance/Economics)CPA certification is an advantage3-5 years of relevant analytical experience at an FP&A position - in a SaaS company - Must!Advanced knowledge of Excel (formulas, functions, and PowerQuery) and full proficiency working with MS office.Experience working with the following Software: SalesForce, Netsuite Power BI- Must.Self-starter with excellent interpersonal communication and problem-solving skillsGood business acumenExcellent EnglishAbout Us:Cynet is a technology-oriented company continuously looking for new ways to innovate the Cybersecurity world. Our main priority is to defend our customers from any harm in the vast digital ocean. But Cynet is more than just a product, we are a family. We value each one of our members and their inputs. Cynet is a place where your work will have a direct impact on the way we service our customers.

Title: Product Designer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: A little about us:Our mission at Karma is simple (but ambitious!): to create the best online shopping experience. Our mobile app and desktop extension helps over 4 million people to get what they want—by making shopping a magical experience for all.We’re team players, focused on winning together and building a company that will revolutionize the online shopping industry.We are currently in hyper-growth mode and looking for a full-time Product Designer to join our *kickass* Product team in our Tel-Aviv HQ.A little about you:If you’re looking for career growth, new challenges, and incredible coworkers - you’ve come to the right place. If you bring passion, enthusiasm and integrity to everything you do - you’ll fit right in.You have strategic thinking and you understand the product’s lifecycle: from research through prototyping to design and usability testing. In this role, you'll work with different teams to create pixel-perfect web and mobile products. We're looking for deep thinkers who are passionate about UX, design and product. We are looking for a business -minded designer that will translate business goals and user’s needs into user experiences. Reporting to the Head of Product Design.Requirements:At least 3 years of experience in designing (UX and UI) customer facing digital products (web and mobile).Conceptual thinker with an ability to understand user behavior, conversion, simplicity and usability.Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, UX patterns, techniques, and technologies.Excellent communication skills (able to clearly articulate design decisions).Pixel-perfect with attention to the smallest of details.Strong typography knowledge and design layout principles.Extensive mastery of Figma/Sketch/InVision and other prototyping tools.Team player with great communication skills, experienced working in an Agile environment.Experience in e-commerce/payments – advantage. Self learner and never shy away from asking hard questions.Familiarity with CSS + HTML - advantage.Online portfolio – a Must.Responsibilities:Create pixel perfect user interfaces and uncompromised user experience.Pay attention to the smallest details with great attention to typography.Brainstorm and design new features and take concepts through to production.Focus on user experience using A/B tests and live results.Collaborate with the product, engineering, data science, and marketing teams to develop a smooth user experience with high-end look and feel.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Tikal is growing and we are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our team!We are a tech consultancy with over 130 experts in all R&D domains: frontend, devOps, mobile, backend, and machine learning.Working at Tikal means that you will get to work hands-on on the most interesting products being developed in the Israeli tech market today. We believe in knowledge sharing both internally and externally, which means you will have weekly meetings with your Tikal domain group. We also have the largest Tech community in Israel, with over 13k members. Every expert at Tikal is assigned a mentor, and together you will plan your personal development roadmap.Tikal's unique technical roadmap will take you further towards becoming a Tech Lead or an Architect by taking part in our courses, workshops, and client consultations.As an ML engineer at Tikal, you will help clients unleash the power of ML by providing production-grade infrastructure, from the development phase, through CI/CD, ML pipelines, and model monitoring. In most cases, our clients require knowledge and experience in building ML systems for production using python.Requirements:We are looking for someone who is experienced with:Python (At least 3 years)Software development practices, including development, testing, deployment, and monitoringBuilding and monitoring model-based systemsML concepts understanding: Supervised and unsupervised learning, classification and regression, training and prediction, feature engineering etc.Docker & Kubernetes (hands-on)

Title: Security Researcher
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: Silverfort is a Tel Aviv-based cyber-security startup that develops a revolutionary identity protection platform. Using patented technology, our product enables strong authentication across entire corporate networks and cloud environments, without any modifications to endpoints and servers. In addition, we use advanced behaviour analytics to apply adaptive authentication policies and prevent cyber-attacks in real-time. Our team includes exceptional researchers, engineers, and technology experts who successfully tackle some of the most complex challenges in cyber-security. Silverfort has happy customers world-wide, strong market validation (including several industry awards), strategic partnerships with the largest security vendors in the world, and significant funding from leading VCs.We are looking for a senior Security Researcher to take a central role in the Silverfort Labs team, Silverfort’s research, innovation and strategy department. In this role, you will analyze and simulate attacks, come up with ways to detect and stop them, and discover new vulnerabilities.Requirements:At least 4+ years of R&D/security experience, out of which at least 1 year as a security researcher Experience in Python or another programming language Wide knowledge in information security, deep understanding of security practices, vulnerabilities and defenses. Creative thinker, has the ability quickly dive into new unfamiliar challenges Reverse engineering experience Good communication skills, ability to explain and simplify complex ideas. Vulnerability research experience – a big advantage Experience working with customers –an advantageBachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent Degree - an advantage Knowledge in network protocols – an advantage Desire to work in a fun, fast paced environment, in a great team! Responsibilities:Analyze emerging cyber-security threats Find ways to use the Silverfort Identity Protection Platform to detect and prevent these threats Work with the product and development team to improve the product to include these detections and preventionsPublish your findings to share the knowledge with our customers and industry Vulnerability research
Requirements: ['At least 4+ years of R&D/security experience, out of which at least 1 year as a security researcher', 'Experience in Python or another programming language', 'Wide knowledge in information security, deep understanding of security practices, vulnerabilities and defenses.', 'Creative thinker, has the ability quickly dive into new unfamiliar challenges', 'Reverse engineering experience', 'Good communication skills, ability to explain and simplify complex ideas.', 'Vulnerability research experience – a big advantage', 'Experience working with customers –an advantage', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent Degree - an advantage", 'Knowledge in network protocols – an advantage', 'Desire to work in a fun, fast paced environment, in a great team!', 'Analyze emerging cyber-security threats', 'Find ways to use the Silverfort Identity Protection Platform to detect and prevent these threats', 'Work with the product and development team to improve the product to include these detections and preventions', 'Publish your findings to share the knowledge with our customers and industry', 'Vulnerability research']

Title: Assistant Controller
Company: Hever Human Capital | חבר הון אנושי
Location: Raanana, Center District, Israel
Text: לחברה טכנולוגית - קבוצת תוכנה ישראלית ברעננה דרוש/ה עוזר/ת בקרה! 💰🖥️✅ יש חנייה עם סידורי חנייה.✅ תנאים סוציאליים והטבות מהיום הראשון כגון: קה"ש, סיבוס ע"ס 550 ש"ח, ביטוח בריאות ועוד!.✅ שכר מתגמל ביותר!.✅ מקום איכותי שהוא חממה מצויינת ללמידה והתפתחות (משקיעים מאוד בעובדים)!.✅ מודל עבודה היברידי וגמיש במיוחד בכפוף למנהל הישיר.✅ עבודה בחברה גלובלית עם מורכבות פיננסית, סביבה מרובת ממשקים ומאתגרת.תיאור התפקיד:🔸 אחריות על דרישות דיווח של הישות הישראלית (כגון: חשבונות סטטוטוריים, החזר מס שנתי, דוחות מע"מ חודשיים, דיווח IIA).🔸 עבודה עם קבלן המשנה של החברה לשכר וניהול קצבאות חודשיות הקשורות לשכר (פיצויים/חופשה) בספרי החברה.🔸 אחריות על התשלומים בזמן לרשויות המס והממשלה (כגון תשלומי ביטוח לאומי).🔸 תמיכה בייעול נהלים פנימיים ושמירה על בקרות נאותות של הנהלים.🔸 עיקר התפקיד לעשות פיקוח, ניתוחים ודוחות ולראות שינויים.🔸 ייתכן שבהמשך יכלול אחריות על כל נושאי השכר - לעבוד מול חילן ומול עובדים בכל הקשור להקמת עובד במערכת, נוכחות, עזיבה וכו'.דרישות המשרה:🔹 אנגלית ברמה גבוהה מאוד - חובה.🔹 כישורי אקסל ברמה גבוהה - חובה.🔹 ידע בשכר כולל הפרשות שכר (הבראה, פיצויים וכדומה) - חובה.🔹 ניסיון של עד שנה בחברה גלובלית/טכנולוגית - יתרון משמעותי.🔹 יוצאי התמחות ברו"ח ביג 6 - יתרון גדול.🔹 בוגרי תואר בתחום - חובה!.🔹 בוגרי תואר אוניברסיטאי - יתרון משמעותי.🔹 ניסיון בתוכנות חשבונאיות כגון סיילספורס, אורקל או SAP - יתרון משמעותי.🔹 ידע במס - יתרון.🔹 ידע ושיטות חשבונאיות ברמה גבוהה של IFRS - יתרון.🔹 עצמאי/ת, דיסקרטי/ת, מכוונ/ת פרטים ושחקן צוות - חובה!.🔹 סקרנ/ית, בעל/ת ראייה רחבה וביקורתית שאוהבים לחקור ולשאול שאלות - חובה!.📧 לשליחת קו"ח: aviad.simon@hever.co.il⚠️ נא לציין בכותרת עבור תפקיד עוזר/ת בקרה בחברה טכנולוגית.

Title: Human Exploitation Researcher
Location: Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: As a human exploitation researcher at ActiveFence, you’ll need to process large amounts of both qualitative and quantitative data and reach valuable insights regarding, for example, indicators of online threats, ways of distributing content, motivations, and trends.You will be expected to:Create daily intel reports for the company’s clients Be the “final stamp” for each deliverable related to human exploitationBe on top of trends and developments in the field of human exploitation worldwide Contribute to the internal knowledge databaseRequirements:Excellent research and writing abilities - making sense of data and “telling a story” in a compelling way Research experience of 2+ years in the academia, journalism or private sector - a must Experience in research/intelligence analysis in the field of human exploitation - big advantageGreat attention to detailsOrganized, motivated, great at cross-functional workAbility to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environmentOSINT experience – big advantageNative English speaker – advantageAdditional language skills - advantageAbout ActiveFence:ActiveFence is the leading tool stack for Trust & Safety teams, worldwide. By relying on ActiveFence’s end-to-end solution, Trust & Safety teams – of all sizes – can keep users safe from the widest spectrum of online harms, unwanted content, and malicious behavior, including child safety, disinformation, fraud, hate speech, terror, nudity, and more.Using cutting-edge AI and a team of world-class subject-matter experts to continuously collect, analyze, and contextualize data, ActiveFence ensures that in an ever-changing world, customers are always two steps ahead of bad actors. As a result, Trust & Safety teams can be proactive and provide maximum protection to users across a multitude of abuse areas, in 70+ languages.Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors such as CRV and Norwest, ActiveFence has raised $100M to date; employs 300 people worldwide, and has contributed to the online safety of billions of users across the globe.
Requirements: ['Create daily intel reports for the company’s clients', 'Be the “final stamp” for each deliverable related to human exploitation', 'Be on top of trends and developments in the field of human exploitation worldwide', 'Contribute to the internal knowledge database', 'Excellent research and writing abilities - making sense of data and “telling a story” in a compelling way', 'Research experience of 2+ years in the academia, journalism or private sector - a must', 'Experience in research/intelligence analysis in the field of human exploitation - big advantage', 'Great attention to details', 'Organized, motivated, great at cross-functional work', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment', 'OSINT experience – big advantage', 'Native English speaker – advantage', 'Additional language skills - advantage']

Title: People Experience Specialist
Location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
Text: At Wiz, we move quickly. We’ve set the record for the fastest first year revenue growth of any tech startup, the fastest company to acquire more than 25% of the Fortune 500 as customers, the fastest company to reach $1B (and then $6B) in valuation, and now the fastest-growing software company ever by going from $1M to $100M in ARR in just 18 months. Most importantly, we provide the fastest ROI of any security product – Wiz connects to the entire multi-cloud environment within 15 minutes and identifies the specific infiltration vectors that make clouds susceptible to a breach in under 24 hours so organizations of all sizes and industries can rapidly identify and remove the most critical risks in AWS, Azure, GCP, and Kubernetes. Join us as we help organizations create secure cloud environments that accelerate their businesses.SummaryHow skilled are you at creating magic?We are looking for a talented Wizard to join our People Experience team in Tel Aviv.Are you creative, can problem-solve, and have a hands-on attitude? As a member of the small but mighty People Experience team, you'll help handle and manage company events, projects, swag, deliveries, and more for our Israel and worldwide people and offices.In this role, you will report to the Head of People Experience at Wiz and work alongside a group focused on building a magical environment that allows our employees to thrive.What You'll DoAbout the RoleBe a part of the global People Experience team that leads, manages, and executes projects and plans for our people, such as onboarding, holiday events, and other occasions.Coordinate social and company activities, collaborate with Israeli and global teams and work extensively with outside vendors.Collaborate closely with the design department.Manage the entire operation, including the budget, planning, deliveries, etc.What You'll Bring3+ years of experience in a People Experience role in the Hi-Tech industry. Strong English skills. Passion for your work, self-motivation, a hands-on attitude, and creative thinking.Outstanding personal communication skills.Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects and work under pressure. Available to work flexible hours.If your experience is close but doesn’t fulfill all requirements, please apply. Wiz is on a mission to build a special company. To achieve our goal, we are focused on hiring Wizards with different backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences.Wiz is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, reproductive health decisions, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, genetic information, political views or activity, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.By submitting your application, you acknowledge that Wiz will process your personal data in accordance with Wiz's Privacy Policy.
Requirements: ['Be a part of the global People Experience team that leads, manages, and executes projects and plans for our people, such as onboarding, holiday events, and other occasions.', 'Coordinate social and company activities, collaborate with Israeli and global teams and work extensively with outside vendors.', 'Collaborate closely with the design department.', 'Manage the entire operation, including the budget, planning, deliveries, etc.', '3+ years of experience in a People Experience role in the Hi-Tech industry.', 'Strong English skills.', 'Passion for your work, self-motivation, a hands-on attitude, and creative thinking.', 'Outstanding personal communication skills.', 'Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects and work under pressure.', 'Available to work flexible hours.']
